column2: Abraham po aso, Dabhit po agijing, anang so Jisu Khristo asar-lar alekha alo bangpo lo.
Abraham po asoke Aijak po; Aijak po asoke Jakup po aro Jakup po asoke Judap po pen anang penso akorte-musohel;
Tamarpe aso ke Perej po pen Jerap po anangpa ke Judap po; Perej po asoke Hejron po, Hejron po asoke Aram po.
Aram po asoke Aminadap po, Aminadap po asoke Nason po; Nason po asoke Salmon po;
aro Rahap pe para Salmon po aso Buwaj po plango; Buwaj po asoke Obet po plango; Obet po asoke Jesi po;
Jesi po aso ke Dabhit Rechopo. Aro Dabhit po aso Solomon po plango, anang aike akithi Uriya po apiso kido;
Solomon po asoke Rehobowam po; Rehobowam po asoke Abija po; Abija po asoke Asap po;
Asap po asoke Jehosaphat po; Jehosaphat po asoke Joram po; Joram po asoke Ujiya po;
Ujiya po asoke Jotham po, Jotham po asoke Ahas po, Ahas po asoke Hejekiya po;
Hejekiya po asoke Mannase po, Mannase po asoke Amos po, Amos po asoke Josiya po;
aro Bebilon alongri yok kinep pon amun Josiya po aso Jesoniya; aro anang penso akortehel plango.
Aro Bebilon alongriyok kinep pon aphel chingthurne kiwang aphel Jesoniya po aso Seyeltiyel po plango; aro Seyeltiyel po asoke Jerubabel po kido.
Jerubabel po asoke Abiyut po, Abiyut po asoke Eliyakim po; Eliyakim po asoke Ajor po,
Ajor po asoke Jado po, Jado po asoke Asim po; Asim po asoke Eliyut po;
Eliyut po asoke Eliyajar po; Eliyajar po asoke Mathan po; Mathan po aso ke Jakup po;
Jakup po asoke Jusep po; anang Mary pe apihan; aro inghoyok Khristo ta puman, labang Jisu labang Mary pe para plango.

Ladisi Abraham po para Dabhit po ayok ahuwit pachiloksi owe kerephili chokngo; aro Dabhit po para Bebilon alongriyok kinep pon ayok owe kere phili chokman; aro Bebilon alongri yok kinep pon para Khristo yok ta owe kere-phili chokngo.
Jisu Khristo kiplang atomo ladi kido. Anang ai Mary peyok Jusep poyok lam-athip pilo apot, anali bang-hini kachi-en-eh ango si, anangyok Jiuli-Kangthir para agat kido pahlongo.
La-amun anang apihan Jusep po dhorom kangthir arleng kido apotsi, Mary pe yok rat ango amahang kapatharak ahisa wesi katikang jolyok angthin long chirono.

Manta langot, anang lamehel alam chironsi kido amunsi, Hemphu atharlon ihut anangyok pharlo long chiklangsi pulo, “O Dabhit po agijing nang Jusep po, nang piso Mary peyok kachi-en yok phere yek; piyok pu tene anang agat kido ke Jiuli-Kangthir parasi chok do.
Anang ihut So penso paplang nge, aro nang anangmen ke Jisu binot. Piyok pu tene anangsi abithang arleng hel yok pap hel para pajok nge;
Hemphu pot alam turki po parasi kapathan, lake,
“Langot, labang so-arlope agat dosi, So penso paplange, aro arleng hel anang men Immanuwel biye;” [labang alam acho ke “Arnam ili pen do”] labang alam kichok aphan ladisi chiplang ngo.
Konam Jusep po amek-kijang para thursi, Hemphu atharlon po anangyok kithan badisi, Mary pe pen chi-eno;
manta penso oso-so plangple lengyok ke, anang Mary pe ape-rik dong dunde yongot; la-aphel anang labang Oso so amen Jisu bilo.
Herod rechopo kido apor Judiya ahol long kido Bethlehem rongso along Jisu plango; langot, ni-hang aga para angkhan kithek-kire abang Jerusalem rongpe yok wangsi arjulo,
“Jihudi hel aphan recho kiplang, Oso so dak longte do? Piyok pu tene hali anang chiklo-langso ni-hang agak ka-ole theksi, anangyok kachirdom yok wang ngo.”
Herod recho po labang alam arjusi, anang pen Jerusalem kido ahuwit ta angthin ihik-bihiksi do detno.
La-amun anang ahuwit bor-bangthe pen arleng hel kanong paklang helyok pangrumsi arjulo, “Khristo daklong te wang plange?”
Anali anangyok pulo, “Judiya ahol Bethlehem rongso along hali labangpo thek hlongo, piyok pu tene turkipo parasi labadi kiwi do,
Juda alongri Bethlehem abang, Juda rongpe hel adak nali bekchot kalek, piyok pu tene nali sitem para ihut kapangdom po ole ye, anangsi ne Israyel arlengyok al-en pone.”
La-amun Herod po kithek-kire abangyok taram jolsi, labang chiklolangso kachiklang konbak adin chokdo, bangpo apor pangtheksi anali para arjulo.
Aro analiyok Bethlehem yok tolsi pulo, “Nali, damne labang oso soyok me-atne chilangdam; aro anangyok thekngo tene neyok ta wangthanot, la tangsi ne ta damsi chirdom dam une.”

Anali Herod recho po alamthe arjusi damjongo; la-amun langot, labang chiklo-langso anali ni-hang aga kithek, labang chiklolangso anali kidam ango-ango damsi, Oso so kido athem hlongsi, anang aphuthaksi ri-dam kukngo.
Labang chiklo langso kiridamkuk theksi anali aneng arong ongo.
Aro hem arlo lut damsi, anang ai Mary pe pen kachikso yok theksi, anangyok tarhuksi chirdomo; aro anali ador-ong abihini chulpo para ser, hujung aro kanempru ajangthu olesi anangyok banta pilo.
Aro Herod po adung kipadam phakphe yok anali apharlo long Arnam para kithan hlong si, prek aduwarsi abithang alongriyok dam phakngo.

Laparake langot, kithek-kire abang kachikak aphel, Hemphu tharlon ihut Jusep poyok apharlo chihomansi pulo, “Thurnot, Oso so aro anang aipe yok ensi, Ijip alongriyok kak-hrol not, aro ne nangyok nangthanthe lengke lalong donot; piyok pu tene Oso soyok kamari ayok, Herod po kapasandi damwor yok arleng toldo.”
Aro Jusep po thursi, Oso so yok aro anang aipe yok anuwepesi ensi, Ijip alongri ayok chipon detno;
aro Herod po thitheleng ke lalong si dolo; “Ne Ijip longri para neso yok chitaramo,” labang alam turki po parasi Hemphu kipathan, alamthe chokplengyok ladisi chiplango.

La-amun Herod po kithek-kire abang nichobel peno pusi chithan unsi, anang nengkang halo, aro kithek-kire abang para me-at arjusi kiplang apor atengsi, Bethlehem aro adung arel kido nengkan hini abo oso aro layok kibek chot penso oso majit, arleng tolsi pamari det no.
Latengsi Jeremiya turkipo yok Arnam kapathan alamthe hel chok penno, lake,
“Rama rongso long kasurujo aro nengduk kiwangjin arju hlongo, Rachelpe asomar anat suru-surusi, anali kangwedet theksi, nengpangsam hlongyok, aneng wedet no.”
Manta langot, Herod po thilo apot, Hemphu atharlon ihut Ijip alongri long Jusep poyok apharlo long chiklangsi pulo,
“Thurnot, Oso so pen aro anang ai yok en-ne Israyel alongri yok dam phak ngot; piyok pu tene Oso so yok kamariyok kiron, labang arleng hel thidet no.”
La-amun anang thursi, Oso so aro anang ai yok ensi, Israyel alongri ayok wango.

Manta Judiya along Arkhelayus po anangpa Herod po kithitang aphel recho kachiplang arjusi, anang lalong kidamyok chiphere lo; laparake apharlo long Arnam para kithan hlongsi, Galili aholyok damphakngo.
Aro Najaret rongso long damsi pahem-paretsi dolo; “Anang yok ke Najaret abang pusi taramme,” pune turkihel parasi kipathan, alamthepo kichok ayok ladisi chiplang peno.
Labang adin Johon Baptist po wangsi, Judiya angnam aju Arnam alam paharsi pulo,
“Pap aneng chipharlep mot, piyok pu tene ethakpe-alongri adung hetno.”
Piyok pu tene, ingho alam Jisoya turki po parasi ladi kipathan, lake, “Ingnam aju kihang ihut asi lalo, nali Hemphu aduwarpo chihonjok, aro anang duwarsone chipakengot.” labangke anango.
Johon po mihonghang areng apesi kachi-ik, areng pensi amicheng kachikok; aro anang long-chupur pen ingnam apiyo alangsi kicho.
La-amun Jerusalem pen Judiya ahol aro Jordan langjon pe dung ahuwit arleng anang dung yok damsi,
anali abithang pap katikihel hoi chosi, Johon po parasi Jordan langjonpe long baptist chiplango.
Manta Pharisi hel pen Saduki hel anang dung baptist yok kiwangjap theksi, Johon po analiyok pulo, “Nali phurul badi angho abi kido abang, Arnam aneng akang kiwange para jok-une pusi ingho nali thano?
La-apot nali aneng kachipharlep pamichangne athe kiwang katiki parane chipaklangot,
aro Abraham po hali apa, puke nali neng chironnek; piyok pu tene ne naliyok thanbang, Arnam labang arlong hel parasi Abraham po aphan agijing pawang unman.
Layok minonta thengpe akangri kuthar biwen do; la-apot jimehel athengpe akime athe wangwe, labang thudetsi, me-long phlong detman.

Aneng kachipharlep aphan, ne ke naliyok lang along baptist otedo, manta ne phel kiwang jongpo neyok ta ajakong kidochot; ne anang keng-op kirung ponyok ta michangche; anangsi naliyok Jiuli-Kangthir long aro mepensi baptist ote ye.
Anang balengpo me-atsi aphi pangthirsi do, anang sok rak thalsi biye, manta aphi hel ke jutjelen me-aten long pasek detne.”
La-amunsi Jisu, Johon po arideng baptist kachiplangyok, Galili para Jordon yok, Johon po adung yok wango.
Manta Johon po anangyok tengklaksi pulo, “Nang parasi baptist kachiplang nange doman, lalesi nang nedungyoksi wangdo ma?”
Manta Jisu ke puphak ngo, “Minonke labadine pachok sonang; piyok pu tene ladisi ahuwit Arnam dhorom kangthir kidopo pachok hlonge.” La-amun Johon po hoicholo.

Aro Jisu baptist chiplang tang aphel, lajongsi lang para ingthuro; aro langot, ethakpe aduwar anangyok ingpu pilo, aro Arnam Jiuli-Kangthir yok wothum badi wangsunsi, anang phuthak wang kirikuk chithekngo.
Aro langot, “Anang ne nengdok Aso, ananglong ne neng ingsam man,” labadi ethakpe alam asi wango.
La-aphel, Jisu long si-ik parasi honjat kilangpon ayok, anangyok ajiuli parasi ingnam aju ponno.
Aro angkol-hini adin pen angkol-hini ajo an kihum aphel, Jisu an-chiro.
La-amun si-ik anang dung wangsi pulo, “Nang Arnam Aso, tene labang arlong hel him kachiplang yok thanot.”
Lalong Jisu puphakngo, “Munusi ke an pen detke hreng un-eh ye, manta Arnam angho para kiwang alamthe pensi hrenge,” labadi pusi kiwi do.
La-aphel si-ik anangyok kangthir rongpe yok ponsi, Arnam ahem kartulchot long parjap damsi,

aro anang yok pulo, “Nang Arnam Aso lo, tene nang alingyok wang chonnot; piyok pu tene lo-kangthir long wido, “Nang Arnam atharlonhel yok nang phan thane; aro nangkeng arlong athak kijangje ayok, la-amun nangyok ari pen wangdeng dun loknge.”
Jisu puphak ngo, “Manta lo-kangthir longke pudo, nang Arnam Hemphu yok honjat langek.”
Aro si-ik ke anangyok inglong longklam yok ponsi, pirthepe long ahuwit longri aro lalong kilang me pomar paklango;
aro si-ik anangyok pulo, “Nang tarhukne, neyok chirdom, tene labang ahuwit nangyok piye.”
La-amun Jisu anangyok pulo, “Damot! si-ik!” piyok pu tene lo-kangthir long kiwi do, ‘Nang Hemphu Arnam yok chirdom, aro anangsal detsi tiki.”
Laparake si-ik Jisu yok tikango; aro langot, ethakpe atharlonhel wangsi anangyok al wang eno.
Minonke Johon po ayok nepsi akrol kibeng alam arjusi, Jisu Galili ayok damo;
aro Najaret tikangsi, Jebulun pen Naptali ajat ahol long, langpe akung kido Kaparnaum rongso long dodamo;
lake Jisoya turki po parasi kapathan alam chokpeno:
“Jebulun alongri aro Naptali alongri, langpe akung aduwar, aro Jordan langjonpe ha aga apar kido angbong, Bang-ajat hel kido Galili,

lake inghosi kangting long kido abang, anali akithe katha-ang isi thek hlongo, aro inghosi kithi alongri aro aben long kido, anali phuthakta Arnam katha-ang wano;” labang alamthe kichokyok labadisi chiplango.
La-apor para Jisu Arnam alam kithan chengpono, “Aneng chipharlep mot; piyok pu tene ethakpe-alongri adung hetno.”

La-aphel Jisu Galili langpe akung-akung kidam amun, bang hini korte-muso, lake Simon po, anangyok Pitor po puta taramman, aro anang muso Andriu poyok, langpe long lan kiwar thekngo; piyok pu tene analike ok kirhi arleng kido.
Aro Jisu analiyok pulo, “Ne phel wangot, ne naliyok arleng kirhi arleng inghole.”
La-jongsi anali lan tikangsi anang phel phel duno.

Aro anang lalong para damjongsi, prek bang-hini korte-muso lake Jebedi po aso Jems po aro anang muso Johon poyok, anali apa Jebedi po pen tilong athak anali lanhel chipademsi kido theksi, Jisu analiyokta taramo.
Lalong analita la-amunsi tilong aro anali apa yok tikangsi, anang phel phel angduno.
La-aphel Jisu ajal-dungsi Galili alongri artingworsi, Jihudi Arnam ahem along paklangsi, Arnam-alongri kime-alamthe paharsi, arleng hel asitem kamprek kiso kilak aro ajat-jat kiso-kilak hel pamelo.

Lalong anang kime katiki jortangpo Siriya alongridung chitha-ang det no; aro si-ik kachu-uh, tengrai kiso, atot kangwe kiso mehel prek-prek kiso-kilak aro duk-tap kido kiso arleng helyok anang dungyok wansi, anang analiyok pame detno.
Aro Galili, Dekopolis, Jerusalem aro Judiya para, aro Jordon ha aga apar parata ako-ong arleng anang aphel aphel duno.
Jisu labang ratmaryok theksi inglong kartulpe athakyok damo; aro lalong iningo apot, adun hel anang dungyok wango.
Lalong anang, analiyok kithan kipuyok chengponsi, ladi alam thansi paklang pono,
“Jiuli-long kachohrek abang bor-eh chokman; piyok pu tene ethakpe-alongri ke anali phansi!
“Aneng kadoho kido abang si bor-eh chokman; piyok pu tene Arnam anali neng pangsam me!
“Chingduk hopne kido abangsi bor-eh chokman; piyokte pu tene anali Arnam seme-kitang longri hlonge!
“Dhorom kangthir poyok kangchir aro kalang-ik abangsi bor-eh chokman; piyok pu tene Arnam analiyok aneng pangsam phlenne!
“Bangyok kajinso abangsi bor-eh chokman; piyok pu tene Arnam analiyok jinsoye!
“Aneng kachipangthir abangsi bor-eh chokman; piyok pu tene analisi Arnam yok thek hlonge!
“Kapangsam aphan pachingbar asal katiki abangsi bor-eh chokman: piyok pu tene anali yoksi Arnam asohel puye!
“Dhorom kangthir anat honjat kachichak hlong abangsi bor-eh chokman; piyok pu tene ethakpe-alongri ke anali phansi!
“Konam arlenghel hane natsi naliyok patharaknge aro honjat piye, aro naliyok ado pisi asisik thansi, ahuwit ajat-jat nali puye, la-amun nali bor-eh chokman.
“Anengrong aro lam-lun pen nengsam chipado, piyok pu tene ethakpe long nali banta ako-ong do. Piyok pu tene aporong turkihel pot badi kido, analiyokta arleng hel ladisi honjat kipi.
“Nalisi pirthimipe ingti; manta ingti lam plakngo, tene anangyok potbadi padok phak une? Labang la-amun parake isi asal meme, mokol yok kitidet, aro arleng hel dong sinek aphan si michangman.
“Nalisi pirthepe akatha-ang. Inglong kartul athak kikem rongpe buti un-eh.
Aro arleng me-lur pakarsi, pachi arlo bibesi, gosa athaksi biman; la-amun hem along kido ahuwityok patha-angman.
Ladisi nali katha-ang arleng hel angot pachiklanot; lalong anali naliyok kime asal pomar theksi, ethakpe long kido nali Apa yok jortang piye.
“Ne kanong, lale turkihel alamthe kapangwe yok wangdo puke nali chironek; ne kapangwe yok ke wangwe yong, manta anali lamthe pomar pachokpleng yoksi wango.
Piyok pu tene ne aserengsi nali thando, ethakpe aro pirthimipe prel detde lengke, aro kido kangwe chokphrot weleng ke, kanong kiwi alam itheta ingbobeye.

Lasi, inghosi kanong hel itheta mengme, aro bang hel yokta la mat matsi pachirliman, anangyok ke ethakpe-alongri long pabekchotne, manta inghosi kanong hel mengsi tikiman, aro ladisi pachirliman, anang ethakpe-alongri long aghaichot pusi chiklane.
Piyok pu tene ne naliyok pubang, kanong kapaklang aro Pharisi hel yokta nali dhorom kangthir ong-eh lengke, nali jatsi ethakpe-alongri long lutdun un-eh ye.
Aporong arleng hel angot kithan alam, nali arjuhlongo, “Nang arleng marihopot; aro inghosi arleng mariman, anang bisar-kahonthe long ado chiku hlonge.”

Manta ne nali thando, inghosi anang korteyok aneng kang, anang ke bisar-kahonthe along ado chiku hlonge; aro inghosi anang korte yok sotongapo pu, anang ason-amel along ado chiku hlonge; aro inghosi akorteyok “kamango po” pu, anangke me-aten long kiwar ado chiku hlonge.
Lasi, athuli long nang banta kipi kapahleye amun, nang korte pen penebak kachilang set-set hel kido nangneng chipurki phlut,
tene labang athuli long ango nang kipi-kapahle tikangne damot, nang korte pen chipangsam dammot, tangsi wang phakne nang kipi kapahle ye abantahel pajir.

Nang kachi-ojorpo pen nang duwar along kido amunsi, anang pen chipangsam sirakngot; penebak badi ka-ojorpo nangyok bisarpo arideng champi detne, aro bisarpoke sonturi arideng champisi, la-amun nangyok akrol long nang thalbo.
Ne naliyok khanangsi thando, kirichok atanga athengso nang pidetde lengke, lalong para jatsi nang jok un-eh ye.
“Nang kangho kidoner asal tikiyek, labang kipu, nali arju hlongo.”
Manta ne nali thando, inghosi arloso arlengyok kangho kidoner yok chironsi lang, anang la-amunsi anenglong bangpe pen kangho dotango.
Lasi nang ancho-ari amekpo pap pawangman, tene bangpo hekpokne nang para tinot; piyok pu tene nang abangpo jomlong kachiti ayok ke, abangpo isi arorem kapanghosi nangphan akime.
Aro nang ancho-aripo nangpap pawangman, tene bangpoyok ta thuhletne nangpara tinot; piyok pu tene nang abangpo jom along kachiti ayok ke, isi abangpo arorem kapangwesi nangphan akime.
“Labang pota kipu, inghosi abithang apisope ayok seman, anang bangpeyok kise porman alopo pinot.”

Manta ne nali thando, inghosi kangho kidoner aparke, prek aron anat abithang apisope yok seh ma, anangke bangpe yok bangpen kangho padonerman; aro inghosi kise arloso peyok jorme-chihap, anangta kangho donerman.
“Nang than phak do, nang asisik ke seme-tangtesi, Hemphu yok nang kasemetang along mengne tiki ponot, labang aporong arleng hel ango kipu, labang nali arju hlongo.
Manta ne naliyok thando, jatsi isi semetangek; ethakpe amen penta kalek, piyok pu tene labang ke Arnam kangning anghol;
aro pirthimipe amen penta kalek, piyok pu tene labang ke anang kengpak kibi anghol; aro Jerusalem amen penta semetangek, piyok pu tene labang ke kithe recho kido arongpe.
Aro aphu ot ke semetangek, piyok pu tene achu ikokta nang aki-ik lale akilok ote un-eh.
Manta nali lamthe, ‘oik’ pu tene ‘oik’ pu, lale ‘kalek’ pu tene ‘kalek’ punot; layok ke ongchot pu tene, anang pap-ajiu parasi wangman.
Labang kipu, nali arju hlongo, “Amek aholan amek, aso aholan aso;
manta ne nali thando, nali kapangho poyok teng dunnek; manta inghone bak nang ancho-ari aga ang-om nang ardep, tene debera-ari aga ang-omta bipiwen.
Aro inghone bak nang phuthak ojor pisi nangcholpo enpon, tene anangyok nangbang kido ape pota pidetnot.
Aro inghone bak nangyok mayel isi aduwar nang papon-el tene, anang pen mayel hiniyok dunnot.
Aro inghosi nang para dhar chakman, anangyok pimoke doyek.
Labang ta kipu, labang nali arjuhlongo, “Nang adung arel abangyok nengdok ngot, aro nang huturyok ke simot;”
Manta ne nali thando, nali huturhel yok nengdok ngot, aro naliyok honjat kilang hel aphan pingkit pinot.

La-tangsi nali ethakpe long kido Apa asohel chiplang une; piyok pu tene akangho aro akime arleng hini aphuthak anang arni katha-ang piman, aro dhorom kangthir pen kadhoromre la hini aphu-thak arwe ta pajangman.
Piyok pu tene ingho arleng naliyok nengdokman, analiyok detsi nengdok tene, nali pot aman pahlonge? Kalukdar helta labenthot tiki ke ma?
Aro nali korte-musoyok detsi kardom pi man, tene bangyok ongchot pot tikiye? Kikrolkre Bang-ajat helta labenthot tiki ke ma?
Lasi nali ethakpe long Apa jibadi kime chokphlen, nalita lateng chokphlen chiplangot.
Meso chilangot, arleng ango kapaklang yok nalike dhorom abi-pun mar tiki yek; ladi tiki tene, nali ethakpe long kido Apa adung nali jatsi aman hlonghle ye.

“Lasi nang konam banta piman, la-amun arleng para kaparklam hlongyok nengsik hel badike Arnam ahem ahem aro duwar ajon-jon, nang ngo-ngo cheng thep ke chipaklang wor-rek; ne naliyok khanangsi thando, anali abithang aman hlong tango.
Manta nang konam banta piman, la-amun nang ancho-aripo pot tikiman, debera aripoyok bangpo pachithan un nangne ye.
Tangsi nang banta kipi chiklangkle ye, aro chi-arsi kithek nang Apa nang-wolpi phaknge.

Aro nali konam pingkit, la-amun nengsik hel badike doyek; piyok pu tene arleng kapaklangyok anali Arnam ahem-ahem aro duwar atok hel along arjapsi kapingkit aneng dokman. Ne naliyok khanangsi thando, analike abithang aman hel hlong tango.
Manta konam nang pingkit, la-amun nang hem apulu yok lut damot, aro inghap chinghapsi, chi-arsitsi kido nang Apa angot pingkit not; la-long kithekjol nang Apa nangyok nangwol pi phak nge.
Aro kapingkit apor, nang Bang-ajat hel badike akijol alam puyek; piyok pu tene anali ke aki-ong alam anatsi Arnam arjuye pusi anali chironman.
La-apot nali lahel badi do yek; piyok pu tene nali potsi kanange doma, bangpo nali anangyok kachihanghe angosi, nali Apa thek detman.
La-apot nali ladi pingkitnot: Hali ethakpe kido Apa, nangmen parklam nang.
Nang longri pawang; jibadi ethakpe long, labadisi pirthimipe longta, nang kar-ih pachok ngot.
Hali kanange a-an mini hali pinot.
Hali dhar kichak helyok hali jibadi rono, ladisi haliyok ta dhar hali ronnot.
Haliyok honjat long hali ponek, manta pap ajiu para hali ralnot.”
Piyok pu tene nang bangyok adohel ronman, tene nali ethakpe long kido Apa nali yokta rone.
Manta nalike bang adohel ronre, tene nali Apa ta nali ado ronre ye.

“Aro nali konam an-hum man, la-amun neng-sik hel badike amahang ingtingsu ke do yek; piyok pu tene analike an-humdo pusi arlengyok kapaklang aphan mahang pangtingsu man. Ne naliyok khanangsi thando, anali kihlong nange banta hlong tango.
Manta nang an kihum amun, arleng angot an-kihum paklangkle si, mahang chi-arsi kido Apa angot nang an kihum chipaklang, la-anat nang phu jangthu chihel, aro mahang ta chirmunot;
la-amun mahang chi-arsi theksi kido nang Apa nangyok kime angban nangpiye.
“Pot athem long arhlok aro mamor choman, aro kanghu hel tuksi chunghuman, ladi pirthimipe long puru chihansi yek.
Manta dak long arhlok aro mamor cho-un-eh, kanghuta tuksi ponpe, ladi ethakpe long abithang aphan puru chihansi not.
Piyok pu tene daklongsi nang apuru do, lalongsi nang thin ta doye.
Ameksi abangpo katha-ang; la-apot nangmek akime do, tene nang abangpo apumpak tha-ang dange.
Manta nang mek meme, tene nang abang apumpak ingting detne. La-apot nangthin long katha-angpo pangting kukman, tene labang kangting konbak phere meme kangting chiplange.

Ihutpo bang-hini ahemphu long sal tiki un-eh; piyok pu tene anang ihut yok lang un-eh ye, aro ihutyok ke nengdoknge; lale ihutyok mengketsi, aro ihutyok ke pangwe ye; nali Arnam aro apuru, la hinilong tiki un-eh.

La-apotsi ne naliyok thando, pot te chobo, lale pot te junbo? Ladi pusi ajiu aphan, lale pot chi-ikbo? Ladi puke chirondingek. Kicho-kijunyok ke ajiupo, aro pe-rik yok ke abangposi songkhan chot kalekma?
Suneng kangjar awo helyok langot; analike ripta rip-re, rot ta rotre, aro rak longta thalthe; yongta nali ethakpe long Apa lahel yokta kicho a-an pachoman. Nali mehelyok ke ador ongchot kalek ma?
Aro nali sitem inghote chirondingsi anang bithang ajiupo ingrup isibak chipading une ma?
Aro pe-rik ayok, piyok la-an chironding do? Bitharlong kido amirhel pot badi theman, bangpo chiron lang; lamehel salta tikike, pe-rik ta chithak the;
yongta ne naliyok thando, Solomon po anang ahuwit abihini doyong ta lamehel mir ikok atengta kilangme chot pe-rik kachi-ik-eh.
La-apot, bithar long pot abap hel mini dojongdo, minap ayok melong pasek detne, bang poyok ta Arnam ladisi nali pachi-ikman,— nali kikrol la-an beksodet ma?
La-apot, “Pot te chobo? Pot te jun bo? Aro pot te chi-ikbo? Ladi puke chirondingek.”
Piyok pu tene Bang-ajat hel lamehel ahuwit abihini ar-ih man; aro labang ahuwit nali kanangedo, bangpo nali ethakpe long Apa than un.
Manta nali ke ango Arnam longri aro anang dhorom kangthir chihang; la-amun labang ahuwit naliyok nalipiye.
La-apot minap aphan chiron nek; piyok pu tene minap aphan minap abithang chiron une. Inirsi kidukpo, inirsi aphanke latengsi dor.
“Nali bangyok ado bisarek, tangsi naliyok ta ado bisarse ye.
Piyok pu tene jibadi bisarsi naliyok bisar ma, labadi abisar pensi naliyok ta labenthot Arnam nali ado bisare; aro jibadi linsi nali lindo ma, labang alin pensi naliyok linbo.
Nang bithang amek ber poyok chilanglesi, nang korte amek ber poyoksi piyok langdo?
Aro langot, nang bithang amek ber ihong kido amunsi, nang mek berpo pahekngot, labadi alam nang musoyok pot badi than une?
Nali nengsik abang, angoke nang bithang amek berpo chihek ngot, tangsi nang muso amek berpo kihekyok me-atsi thek phlene.
Hik helyok kangthir abihini piyek; aro nali kilang me-at ser-atheng phak hel ango tiyek; pene bak ke anali keng pen dong sinek nge, aro wang chiru phaksi naliyok ta wangkor phaknge.
“Chihang, tangsi naliyok piye; chibisar, tangsi pahlonge; chipardeng, tangsi naliyok owa ingpu piye.
Piyok pu tene jai chihang, labangsi hlongman; jai chibisar, labangsi thek hlongman; aro jai pardeng, anangyok si owa ingpu piman.
Piyok pu tene asopo him hang, tene anangyok arlong piye, lang-ok neng tene phurul piye,
nali sitem ladi ingho arlengpo do ma?
Lasi nali kangho yongta nangso yok akime abihini pi thek, tene la yokta nali ethakpe kido Apa anangyok kachihang abangyok kime abihini pipe ye ma?
“La-apot ahuwit alam long, bang hel naliyok jibadi arkel-pasi tene, nali akime hlong, nali ta analiyok ladi arkel-pasi; piyok pu tene lalo kanong aro turki hel kithan alamthe acho.
“Awar kibek owa agasi lutdam; piyok pu tene pot owasi aro pot aduwarsi kapangho yok ponman, labang owa awar kithe, duwar ta kidam kajalso, aro labang aga kilutdam arleng ta ongjap.
Piyok pu tene pot owasi aro pot aduwarsi khanang ajiuliyok ponman, labang awar kibek, duwarta kachisep, aro bangpo kihlongdun abangta bekso det.
“Kachobel turkihel bherabik badi chiplangsi nang dungyok wang; manta aneng arlo ke kaphere meme timit badi, lahelyok chilangwen not.
Anali katiki angban parasi nali lahelyok chiniye. Arleng hel angsu kido arong parake rihanthu athe, lale dumuru athe wang un ma?.
Ladisi ahuwit akime thengpe arongten akime athe wangman; manta akangho thengpe arongsi akangho athe wangman.
Akime athengpe akangho athe wangwe aro irong akangho thengpe parata akime athe wangwe.
Pot athengpe athe wangwe, bangpo thudetsi, melong tidetman.
La-apotsi nali athe parasi lahelyok chiniye.
“Inghosi neyok Hemphu, Hemphu, pusi taram, anali ahuwit ethakpe long lutdam une pu ke kalek; manta inghosi ethakpe long kido ne Apa aneng badi mainotman, anangsi lut dam une.

Laba arnike ako-ong arleng neyok nepuye, O Hemphu, O Hemphu, hali nang menpen katurki alamthe paharhe yongma? Aro nang menpen hali si-ik ujharjhe yong ma? Aro nang menpen ajat-jat asombhik asal tikike yong ma?
La-amun ne analiyok parjudaksi puye, “Ne naliyok jatsi chinine yong; ei kangho katiki abang, ne dung para chiterek ngot.”
“Inghone bak ne labang ahuwit alamthe onesi mainot, anang arlong athak hem kikem budhi-ater arlengpo pen pangbare.
La-aphel arwe wang jango, lang akithe ingbak ngo, aro tomon japsi labang ahem long wang tongo; manta anang abhiti arlong athak apot, anang pakrep un-eh yongot.
“Aro inghonebak labang hane lamehel alam onesi mainotne, sangtel athak hem kikem kamango arlengpo pen anangyok pangbare.
Lalong arwe wang jangsi, lang akithe wang ingbaksi, aro tomon japsi labang ahem long wang tongo, hempo krepmo; aro labang ahem chingho phrotno.”
Jisu lamehel alamthe thansi patango, rat hel anang kapaklang hel asombhik hlong detno;
piyok pu tene anang anali kanong paklang hel ateng thanthesi, ajakong kido arleng badisi analiyok thano.
Anang inglong kartulpe para wang kisun amun, arleng ako-ong anang phel duno.
Aro langot, ihut arje ibeng kiso arleng anang dungyok wangsi, tarhuksi pulo, “O Hemphu, nang aneng do, tene neyok pangthir phlen une.”
Lalongsi Jisu ari chirungsi anangyok papholo aro pulo, “Ne anengdo, nang ingthir phlenot.” La jong-jongsi anang arje ibeng kiso pame detno.
Aro Jisu anangyok pulo, “Chilang wenot, labang alam kai yokta thanenot; manta damot, bangthepo ango nang chipaklang damot, bang angot hakhi kipiyok, Mosi po kipu ateng athuli long nibot pidamot.
Jisu Kaparnaum yok kilutdam amun, ihut Roman sonturi aghai po anang dung wangsi, anangyok chingduksi pulo,
“O Hemphu, ne murkiya ihut aturu po atot-kangwe kisosi tan-atsi, hemlong tihetsi do.”
Aro Jisu anangyok pulo, “Ne damsi anangyok pame ye.”
Labang sonturi aghaipo puphak ngo, “O Hemphu, nang nehem kilut dam yok, ne ladi michangche; manta ithe alamthe det punot, la-amunsi ne turupo medetne.

Piyok pu tene ne ta ihut bang arlo arleng dohlong do; ne arlo ta sonturi hel do; aro ne ihut yok ‘dam!’ putene, anang daman, ne ihut poyok ‘wang!’ pu tene, anang wangman; aro ne turu poyok labangpo tiki pu tene, lata anang tikiman.
Jisu labang alam arjusi asombhik hlongsi, aphel wang-kidun arleng helyok pulo, “Ne naliyok khanangsi thando, Israyel asitem ne la-an kikrol jatsi pahlonghle yong.
Aro ne nali thando, arleng ako-ong ni-hang pen ni-chel aga para wangsi, Abraham po, Aisak aro Jakup po pen ethakpe longri long anali chojun yok wang ininge.
Manta longri long kido asohel yok mokol kangting aju tidetne; lalong surujo ye aro aso chingkretne.”
Aro Jisu sonturi aghai poyok pulo, “Nang hemyok damot; aro jibadi krolo, latengne nang pachok dun nang.” Lalongsi labang turu po la-apor jongsi me detno.
Aro Jisu ke Pitor po ahem lutdamsi, anang anipe yok asesi ki-ih thek damo.
Lalong Jisu arlengpe ari otnosi, parake ase hamo, aro anang thursi mesosi anangyok al eno.
Anithu apor chokngo, arleng hel ako-ong si-ik kachu-u arleng Jisu adung wano apot, Jisu lamthe ajakong pensi si-ik hel ujharo, aro ahuwit kisohelyok pamelo.
“Anangsi ili ki-un-eh hel eno, aro ili kiso hel pon detno,” labang alam Jisoya turkipo parasi kipu alamthe, kichok pen ayok lamehel chiplango.
Jisu anang chikomwolsi rat ako-ong theksi, bilpe ha aga apar anang adun hel ayok kapadam ayok thano.
Aro labang apor ihut kanong paklangpo wang phitsi anangyok pulo, “Paklang po, nang jotmahal damta, ne ta nang phel-phel dune.”
Lasi Jisu anangyok pulo, “Mengsurung helke kido ang-gogdo, suneng kangjar awo helta atar do; manta Arleng Aso ke ki-ih aphu kibichok athemso ta ingjong pen.
Adun hel asitem prek adun ihut pulo, “Hemphu, ango ke damsi, ne apa yok kipep dam aphan neyok hawang nepi not.”
Manta Jisu anangyok pulo, “Nang ne phel-phel angdunot; kithi arleng hel anali abithangne pachipep nang.
Jisu tilong athak arlulo, aro anang adun hel anang phel duno.
La-amun langot, langpe long tomon akithe wangsi, lang adul anat tilong tol rang-rango; manta Jisu ke amek jangsitsi kido.
La-amun adun hel anang dung damsi, anangyok pangthursi pulo, “Hemphu, hali ralnot; halike thi hlongbo.”
Jisu analiyok pulo, “Nali beksodet kikrol abang, nali piyok pheredet do? Laparake anang thursi, tomon pen lang adulyok kapaham aphan pusero; la aphel jongsi ingsam hetno.
Lalong ahuwit ta asombhik hlongsi pulo, “Anang ke pot badihak arleng! Tomon aro langpe ta anang lam mengman?”

Laparake Jisu ha aga apar damsi, Gadara hel alongri yok damsi, lalong si-ik kihap bang hini arleng thiri long para olesi, anang ango wang hlengo; lahel la-an kaphere meme arleng anat, kaita labang aduwar ajon dam wang un-ehsi kido.
La-amun langot, lahel Jisu yok hangsolsi pulo, “Ei Arnam Aso, halipen nang pot asal do? Apor kichokche angotsi haliyok aduk kipiyok wango ma?”
La-amun anali para bekso akaholo long, phak ajhakura isi chopansi kido.
Lasi si-ik kihap abang Jisu yok chingdukngo, “Nang hali ujhare tene, phak ajhakura arloyok hali tolnot.”
Aro Jisu analiyok pulo, “damot.” La-amunsi si-ik hel mokol olesi, phak helyok hapdamo; aro langot, labang phak hel ajhaksi kat-katsi, langpe akung para chonprulsi, lang along thidetno.
Phak kiwi arleng hel rongso yok katsi damo aro si-ik kihap arleng hel pot kachiplang ma thandam detno.
Aro langot, ahuwit rongso para Jisu pen kapochak yok wango; aro anangyok theksi, anali hol para tikangne kapadam yok chingdukngo.
La-aphel Jisu tilong long arlusi langpe arpatsi abithang rongso yok wang phakngo.

Aro langot, angkhan arleng tar along pa-ih hetsi kibi ihut atot kangwe kiso arleng anang dung yok wano; la-apor Jisu anali kikrolpo theksi, labang atot kangwe kiso arlengpo yok pulo, “Ei pa, la-an neng aduk chiwanek; nang pap hel rontango.”
Lapara angkhan kanong paklang abang analidak chipulo, “Anang Arnam yok kapatharak alam thando.”
La-amun Jisu ke anali kachiron hel than unsi pulo, “Piyokte nalithin arlo akangho chiron do?”
Piyok pu tene nang pap hel rontango; ma thurne kengkam chijornot; la hini alam dakthu kipuyok jalso chot?
Manta pirthimipe apap kiron ayok Arleng Aso apharan do, labang kithek ayok, la-amun anang atot kangwe kiso poyok pulo, “Thurnot, nang tar chi-olne hemyok damot.”
Aro arlengpo thursi abithang ahemyok damo.
Labangpo theksi rat hel phere detno; aro Arnam ke munusi yok ladi apharan pilo, pusi Arnam yok jortang pajiro.
Jisu labang athempo para kidam amun, Mothi amen ihut arlengyok khajana kirung ahemlong iningsi kido theksi, anangyok pulo, “Ne phel-phel wangdun not.” Aro anang thursi anang phel-phel duno.
La-aphel langot, anang hem along kicho yok kangning amunsi, kalukdar hel aro papi arleng wangsi, Jisu aro anang adun hel pen wang ining duno.
Pharisi hel labangpo theksi, anang adunhelyok pulo, “Nali paklangpo ke khajana kirung aro papi helpen piyokte choman?”
Anang bangpo arjusi pulo, “So-lak kangwe arleng daktor nangne, manta kiso aphansi kanange do.
Nali damot, ne buli karkli nali hanghe, jinsosi hangdo, labang alamthe acho chirli damot. Piyok pu tene ne dhorom kangthir aphan kalek, manta papi helyok kataram aphansi wangdo.”
La-amun Johon Baptist po adun hel Jisu adungyok wangsi pulo, “Hali aro Pharisi abangta an-hum lenman, manta nang adun helke an-humhe, bangpo aronke pot te?”

La-amun Jisu analiyok pulo, “Konbak adin jorme alokjor hel pen osopo doman, la-arniyok anali aneng doho unman ma? Manta konam arnisi anali alokjorpara osopoyok pon detman, la-arnipe wang hlenge, la-amun anali an-humme.
Kaita aban ape long akimi ape bang-tunte; piyok pu tene akimi ape pen bang-tun tene, labang ape si aban ape ayok pangsekman; la-amun chingseknek ongman.

Aro arleng hel akimi ahor aban areng mathi along bibe; ladi bitene, areng mathi inghang detman, hor alangta lidet man, aro areng mathipo chingho detne, manta hor akimipoke akimi areng mathi alongsi thalman, tangsi la hinita arni dingsi bi un.”

Jisu analiyok lamehel alam thanne kido amunsi, langot, ihut phu-phangpo wangsi anangyok tarhuksi pulo, “Neso pe minon jongsi thilo; manta nang wangsi bangpe aphuthak nang-ari batnot, la-amun anang hrenge.”
Lasi Jisu thursi, anang adun hel pen chiloksi anang phel phel duno.
Aro langot, nengkan kere-hini arloso aron kiboilen ihutpe Jisu aphel aga wangsi, anang pe-apre otno.
Piyok pu tene anang anenglong kachipu, “Ne anang pe otchet hlongta, ne mepenne.”
La-amun Jisu aphel kachilang phaksi arloso pe yok theksi pulo, “Ei ai, la-an neng aduk chiwanek; nang kikrolposi nangyok pamelo.” Aro la apor jongsi arloso pe me peno.
Aro Jisu labang kapangdom phu-phangpo ahem hlengsi, pongsi kibut arleng helyok aro rat surujo kido arlengyok theksi,
anang pulo, “Chiterek detnot; piyok pu tene osope thithe yong, amek jangsi do.” La-amun lahel anangyok ingneksolo.
La aphel ke arleng helyok wang pa-ole detsi Jisu osope kido apuluyok lut damsi, oso pe arilong otno apot, osope thuro.
Labang kichok ajortangpo longri dungsi chitha-ang detno.
Aro Jisu lalong para kidam amun, bang hini chotok arleng anang phel phel dunsi, hang-wongsi pulo, “O Dabhit po asopo, toh haliyok jinsonot.”
La-amun Jisu hemlong lut damo, la chotok arleng bang-hini anang dungyok wango. La-amun Jisu analiyok arjulo, “Bangpo ne pame unyok jakongdo pusi nali nekrol do ma?” Anali anangyok pulo, “Oik Hemphu.”
Lapara ke Jisu anali mek hel otsi pulo, “Nali kikrol atengsi nali pame nang.”
Aro la-amun analimek hel charo. Aro Jisu analiyok than klaksi pulo, “Chilangwen, kaiyok ta thanne not.”
Manta anali olesi damo aro labang longri dungsi anang ajortangpo longri dungsi pachitha-ang detno.
Anali olesi kidam amun, langot, arleng hel si-ik kachu-u ihut kalar Jisu adungyok wano.
La-ako labang si-ik ujhar tango, parake kalarpo lam thanpono. Lalong rat hel asombhik hlongsi pulo, “Israyel adak labadi jatsi thek hlonghle yong.”
Manta Pharisi hel ke pulo, “Anang ke si-ik arecho po apotsi, anang si-ik helyok ujhar man.”
Jisu ahuwit rongpe aro rong long arting damsi, anali kachirdom ahem long paklango, longri kime-alamthe paharo, aro ajat jat bet hel aro kiso kilak helta pame detno.
Konam anang arleng helyok thekngo, analiyok anang kajinso wango; piyok pu tene anali ke khokhre kangwe bherabik hel badi, duk-tap kachiplang.
La-aporsi anang adun hel yok pulo, “Kirot nange sok dojap do, manta katiki abang bekso det;
lasi anang bithar asok longyok katiki abang kitolyok, sok Ahemphu ayok pingkit not.”
La-amun Jisu bang kere-hini adun helyok anang dungyok taramsi, kangho ajiuli kahujhar yok, aro ajat jat bet hel, aro ahuwit kiso-kilak hel kapame aphan analiyok apharan pilo.
Labang bangkere-hini adun amen helke lalo: kichengke Simon po, anangyok ke Pitor po ta puman, aro anang muso Andriu po, aro Jebedi po aso Jems po pen anang muso Johon po,
Philip po aro Bartholomiyu po, Thomas po aro Mothi po, anangke kalukdar, Alphayus po aso Jems po aro Thadeyus po.
Simon poke Kanan arleng aro Judas Iskariyot po, anangsi Jisu yok kichampi.
La bangkere-hini yok Jisu angtolsi labadi than no, “Bang-ajat asitem ke damek; Samariya arongso hel longta lut damek,
manta layok ke Israyel agijing hel kachingbojang bherabik aso hel adungyok damot.
Aro nali kidamjong amun, pahar ponsi thannot, “Ethakpe-alongri adung hetno.”
“Kiso kilak pamenot, kithi arleng paburnot, arje ibeng kiso helyok pangthir not, si-ik hel ujharnot; nali ador wesi hlongo, ador wene pinot.
Nali abithang awamkok long ser, rupa, aro tama chipon nek.
Aro duwar kidam apor chul lale chol agol pak-ni, keng-op, tokok, lamehel chi-en nek; piyok pu tene katiki abang aphan ke kicho kijun dowene.
Aro nali konam rongpe lale rongso lut dam tene, lalong kamichang abangyok pangthek, aro lalong para tikangsi damde lengke lalong donot.
Aro nali hem kilut dam amun, analiyok kardom pipon.
Aro labang kamichang ahem, tene nali nengsam anali phuthak padonang; manta chingden pameme, tene labang nengsam nalilong pawang phak nang.
Aro inghone bak nali chidengde, aro nali lam onene, tene konam anali hem lale rongso katikang amun, nali kengtak chihijir detnot.
Ne naliyok khanangsi thando, Arnam kabisare arni labang rongso yok ke Sodum aro Gomura abangsi kachihi jalsochot bo.
“Langot, timit hel asitemyok bherabik badi ne nali toldo; lasi nali phurul hel badi chipare aro wothum badi kachinomhop chiplangot.
Manta arlengyok atot chipado, piyok pu tene lahel ason amel alongyok nali champiye, aro anali kachirdom ahemlong nali pame;
aro mehel naliyok ne natsi gobornor aro recho hel angoyok, lahel nenghong aphan aro Bang-ajat ayok hakhi kipi aphan nali pone.
Manta konam naliyok anali arideng champiye, la-amun pot badi lale pot alam nali than nange, labang chiron hap mek; piyok pu tene nali pot than nange, labang la-amunsi nali yok nalipiye.
Piyok pu tene labang alam kithanpo nali kalek, manta nali Apa ajiuli si nali ingthin long kithanpo.
Anangka po ke amusopo yok aro apo poke aso poyok kithi aphan pek detne; aro asohel ape-apo pen chilang setsetsi, analiyok mariye.
Aro nemen anat, nali yok ahuwit sime; manta inghosi kijutyok chirchisi doye, labang ihutsi jok hlonge.
Konam isi rongpelong naliyok honjat piman, la-amun kamprek rongpe yok kat hrolnot; ne naliyok khanangsi thando, nali Israyel ahuwit rongsohel yok karting tang angotsi, Arleng Aso wange.
Paklangpo yok ke adunpo thechot un-eh, aro hem ahemphupo ayok murkiyapo thechot un-eh.
Adunhel anang paklangpo badi, aro murkiya po anang ahemphupo ateng chokngo pu tene anang phan doro. Anali hem ahemphupo yok Belsabul pu-un, tene anang ahem arleng helyok konbak kanghochot puye.
“Lasi nali mehelyok ke phereyek; piyok pu tene isi kachiklangkle abihini dodeye, ladi kupklaksi kibi isi abihini ingjong; aro kachithan un-eh, ladi kabuti abihini ingjong.
Kangting long ne naliyok potsi thando, bangpo nali katha-ang long thanot; aro ano long potsi arju hlong, labang hem sarnuk athak para paharnot.
Aro inghosi abang poyok mariman, ajiupoyok mari un-eh, lamehel ayok phereyek; manta inghosi ajiupo aro abangpo, la-hinita jom long paprel unman, anangyok pherenot.
Jon-ni wosirika poisa isipen jorje ma? Layongta nali Apa hawang pipe lengke ijon awota lungle athak jang bob be.
Manta nali phu achu akokten alekha en detdo.
Lasi phereyek, nali ako-ong wosirka yokta ador dochot.
“Lasi inghosi arleng ango neyok hoi choye, ethakpe long kido ne Apa angot ne ta anangyok hoi choye.
Manta arleng ango inghosi neyok hoi chocheye, ethakpe long kido ne Apa angot ne ta anangyok hoi choche ye.
“Ne pirthimipe long nengsam kipiyok wango, ladi chironek, ne nengsam kipiyok kalek, manta nokjir kipiyok wango.
Apo po anang so poyok, anang aipe yok asope, anipe yok amunpe pachilang set-set yoksi wango.
Aro arleng abithang ahem abangsi anang hutur doye.
“Inghosi neyok ke anang ai pen anang pa yok nengdok chotman, anangke ne pen michangche; aro inghosi anangso lale aso pe yok neyok ta nengdok chot, anang ne pen michangche.
Aro inghosi anang kros po ensi ne phel-phel wang dunde; anangta nepen michangche.
Inghosi abithang ajiu hlongman, anangke bangpo chipangbo ye; aro inghosi ne nat anang ajiu chiti, anang labang po pahlong phaknge.
“Inghosi naliyok chingden pame; anang neyoksi chingden man; aro inghosi neyok chingden, anangke neyok wang kitol poyoksi chingdenman.
Ingho turki po pusi turkipo yok chingden, anangke turkipo aman hlonge; aro inghosi dhorom arleng po pusi dhorom arlengyok chingden, anangke kadhorom aman hlonge;
aro inghosi labang akibek hel asitem ihutyok adunpo pusi langhan isi nangset kangsam alang pajun, ne naliyok khanangsi thando, anangta jatsi abithang aman chipangbobe ye.”
Ladisi Jisu anang bangkere-hini adun hel yok kithan aphel, lalong para tikangsi, anali rongpe jon-jan kapaklang ayok aro kapahar ayok damo.
Laparake Johon Baptist po akrol along, Jisu Khristo katiki asal arjusi, anang adun hel angkhan yok ladi thansi tolo,
aro Jisu yok pulo, “Kiwang nangepo nango ma, ma hali kamprek ihutyok inghong nang?”
Lasi Jisu analiyok than phakngo, “Damot aro potsi arju hlongdo aro thek hlongdo, labang a-udi Johon poyok than dammot:
Chotok po amek thekdo, kengkok hel akeng chijordo, arje ibeng kiso hel pangthir phlendo, nothong hel arju hlongdo, kithihel thurdo aro kicho-kangweyok kime-alamthe pahardo.
Aro inghosi neyok aduk hlonghle, anangsi bor-eh chok.
Anali kidam jong amun, Jisu ke Johon po alam rat hel angot labadi alam than pono, “Nali pot kilangyok ingnam ajuyok olesi kidam? Tomon kapaklem ingkra ma?
Tene pot kilang yok kidam? Kang-ar ape kachi-ik arleng kilang yok ma? Langot, inghosi ladi kang-ar ape chi-ik, anali recho ahem longsi doman.
Tene piyokte olesi kidam? Turki poyok kilang aphan ma? Oik, ne nali thando, turkipo ayok ta kithechot ihut poyok.
Johon po alam lo-kangthir long ladisi wido, “Langot, ne tharlon poyok nang ango tole, anang nang ngo-ngo si duwar honjoknge.”
Ne naliyok khanangsi thando, arlosohel para kiplang hel adak, Johon Baptist po ateng aghai kaita wangwe yong; manta ethakpe-alongri long kibek yokta kibek posi anang yokta aghaichot.
Johon Baptist po adin para minonhok ke ethakpe-alongri paduk-hap do, aro sotonga arleng hel sepsi en man.
Piyok pu tene Johon po arniyok ahuwit turki aro Mosi po kanong long mophel kachiplange alam pachiklano.
Aro nali labang alam kachidenge anengdo, tene anang kiwang nange ke Elija po.
Ingho bangposi anodo ma, anang onenot!
Manta labang owepo arleng helyok ingho pente ne pachingbar bo? Jibadi oso hel hathi long iningsi, anang kijal alokjor helyok chitaramsi puman,
“Hali nali ngot muri-butpilo, manta nali kanke yongot, hali kasuru ghuk-ghuk manta, nali aneng dohojinje yongot.” Anali labang oso hel badilo.
Piyok pu tene Johon po wangsi cho-junje yongot; la-apotsi arleng hel anangyok ke si-ik kihap po pusi puman.

Arleng Aso wangsi cho-juno; la-apot arleng hel puman, “Langot te, bangpo kicho akhok aro hor kangri, kalukdar aro papi hel akhoipo. Manta agiyan, anang bithang katiki parasi khanang pusi aporman pido.”
La-amun jotmahal arongpe long anang ki-ongchot ajakong asal katiki, lalong arleng hel neng kachipharleple apot, anang labang arongpe helyok ado pisi tampono.

“Ayoh, Korasin abang, ayoh Bethsaida abang, nali kaphere me-me do! piyok pu tene nali sitem long jipe jakong kithe tikilo, labang asal hel Sidon aro Tayar rongpe long katiki nang tene, lalong kido abang angoke bosta ape chi-iksi aro thetlo chihelsi pap hel para neng chipharlep mo hoi.
Manta ne nali thando, bisar-akithe arni nali aduk ayok ke Tayar aro Sidon aduk kachihi jalso chotbo.

Aro ei Kaparnam abang, nang ethakpe yok thur une pusi chiron do ma? Jom ayoksi sun hlonge. Piyok pu tene nali sitem konbak jakong kithe asal tikilo, labang asal Sodum long katiki nang tene, bangpo minihok ta dojongo hoi.
Manta ne nali thando, bisar-akithe arni nang aduk yok ke Sodum alongri aduk kachihi jalso chot bo.”
La-apor Jisu parju daksi pulo, “O Pa, ethakpe aro pirthimipe Hemphu, nang agiyan aro budhi-ater abang para lamehel butisi, oso hel angot chiklango, lasi nangyok kardom pajir do.
Oik Pa, ladisi nang mahang semsemsi neng samjin kihlong apot, nangyok kardom nangpi do.
Ne Apa parasi ahuwit neyok champi detdo; aro Apa aparke kaita Asoyok chinine; Aso aparke aro Aso ingho ango anang yok pachiklang yok anengman, anang aparke kaita Apa yok chinine.
Kilak aro kaharjak abang, nedung yok wangot; ne naliyok kisang nali piye.
Ne ke chipabek hop aro angthin kangduk arleng; la-apot nali thak ne jongal chibat, aro ne para chirlinot; la-amun nali bithang anenglong kisang hlonge.
Piyok pu tene ne jongal ke chihi me-at, aro abhar ta karjang.”
La-apor Jisu kisang-arni sok-abithar asitem kidam jong amun, anang adun hel kangchir ongsi, sok ingphrum ponhisi chopon no.
Manta Pharisi hel bangpo theksi Jisu yok pulo, “Langot, jipe asal kisang-arni tiki hopot, bangpo nang adun hel tikido.”
La-amun anang lahelyok pulo, “Dabhit po aro anang alok hel kangchir amun,
pot badi, anang Arnam ahem lut damsi, bangthe aparke kanong badike chohopot, kangton ahim chosi, anang aro anang lokjor hel potsi tikilo, bangpo nali chiporhe hlonghle yong ma?
Lale kisang-arni bangthe hel Arnam ahem long kisang-arni kanong pangho yongta ado weh, bangpo kanong alo long chiporhe hlonghle yong ma?
Manta ne naliyok thando, Arnam ahem yokta akithe ihut holek do.
Aro “Ne buli karkli hanghe, jinso si hangdo.” Nali labang alam achopo kithan un nang tene, adai kangwe helyok adai kolke yongo hoi.
Piyok pu tene Arleng Aso kisang-arni ahemphu lo.”
Laparake Jisu labang athem po tikangsi anali kachirdom ahem long lut damo.
Aro langot, lalong ari atot kangwe ihut arleng kido. La-amun Jisu yok ado kipiyok chironsi anali anang yok arjulo, “Kisang-arni kiso kapame kanong long doma?”
La-amun Jisu analiyok pulo, “Nali sitem inghone bak arlengpo ijon bherabik do aro labang bherabik ijon kisang-arni ahilik long ingjang, tene anang anangyok otsi ka-olele, ladi inghote do?
Ijon bherabik yok ke arleng ihut konbak ador dochot! La-apotsi, kisang-arni kanong badike akime asal tiki un.
Lapara anang arlengpo yok pulo, “Nang aripo pakeng.” La-amun anang aripo pakengo, aro ha aga aripo badisi medetno.
Manta Pharisi hel mokol damsi anangyok pot badi mari une, anangyok lang setsetsi lam chirhep mo.
Manta Jisu labang po atot chihlongsi, lalong para dam hrolo; lalong arleng ako-ong anang phel duno; aro anang lahel ahuwit yokta pame detno;
aro anangyok bang angot anang lam pathan hlonghle yok anang than klakngo.
Jisoya turki po parasi kipathan, lake,
“Langot, ne murkiyapo, ne arwalo, ne nengdok po nanglongsi ne neng ingsamman. Anang phuthak ne jiuli piye, aro anang Bang-ajat hel yok kangthir bisar alam pahare.
Anang chiprong preye lale suru hang-wong wehye, lale duwar ajon ihut bakta anang asi arjujeye.
Anang kangthir bisar kihal chokche leng ke, anang kilerpak ingkra ingbengbe ye, lale kar lip-lip mihik kiwangsu hola ame pajutje ye;
aro anang men pensi Bang-ajat hel chiha ye.” labang alam kichokyok ladisi chiplango.
La-amun si-ik kihap kalar aro chotok ihut anang dungyok wano; aro anang anangyok pame detno, aro la apotsi kalarpo lam than uno aro amek thekngo.
Aro ahuwit arleng hel asombhik hlongsi pulo, anangsi Dabhit po aso kipupo ma?
Manta konam Pharisi hel labang alam arju hlongsi anali pulo, lake si-ik arecho Belsabul po pensi labang arlengpo si-ik helyok ujhar man.
Anali kachiron hel Jisu ke than unsi, anang analiyok pulo, “Alongriten chilang set-set tene chiphlak detsi arjap un-eh ye aro rongpe lale hem abithang adak chilang setsetne dota chirjap un-eh ye.
Aro si-ik ke si-ikyok chi-ujhar tene anali bithang chilang setsetsi chiphlak detne. Tene, pot badi anali longripo chirjapme?
Aro ne Belsabul po pen si-ik helyok ujhar tene, ingho pente nali sohel analiyok ujhare? La apotsi naliyok analisi bisarpo chiplange.
Manta Arnam Jiuli pen ne si-ik ujhardo tene, Arnam longri nali dung wang hlengo.
Ajakong kido arlengpo ahem ingho bangpo lut dam une? Ango anangyok kok ke lengke kanghupo bihinihel ching-hu pon un-eh. Laparake anang hem para ching-hu pon une.
Inghosi ne pen dode, anangke neyok lang un-eh; aro inghosi ne pen chingrumre anangke chidat salman.
Lasi ne nali thando, arleng apap hel aro Arnam yok kapatharak arleng hel yok ronne, manta Jiuli yok kapatharak poyok ke ronreye.
Inghosi Arleng Aso yok kilang un-eh alam puye anangyok ke ronne, manta inghosi Jiuli-Kangthir yok kilang un-eh alam ingjeye anangyok ke minon aro mophel awe yokta ron un-eh ye.”
Thengpe arongpe metene atheta meye, aro thengpe arongpe meme tene atheta meme. Thengpe arong athepo parasi pachini unman.
Nali phurul ajat badi angho abi kido abang, nali akangho aneng para pot badi akime nali than une? Nang thin long potsi doma ladisi thanman.
Akime arlengke akime apuru long para akime abihini wanman, aro akangho arlengke anang kangho apuru long para kangho wanman.
Ne naliyok thando, arleng hel konbak kangwe alam than, bisar kangning arni lamehel ahuwit alam alekha pihlonge.
Piyok pu tene nang bithang lamthe parasi ado kol le, lale abithang lamthe parasi ado pusi alekhot enne.”
La-amun kanong kapaklang helpen Pharisi hel anang yok pulo, “Paklangpo, nang para hali asin isi kilange anengdo.”
Manta anang analiyok puphakngo, “Nali kangho aro kidoner owe abang, nali asin isi kapaklang yok arjudo, manta Jona turki po para kamprek asombhik asin nali pipe ye.
Jona po ok akithe apok arlo ni-thom adin aro nuwe kithom kido, lasi Arleng Aso ta ni-thom adin pen nuwe kithom lungle arlo doye.
Ninebi arleng hel labang owepo pen bisar long arjap dunsi ado piye, piyok pu tene Jona po kapahar amun anali neng chipharlepmo, aro langot, holek Jona po yokta aghaichot ihut do.

Ni-ting aga rechope thursi labang owepo pen bisar long arjap dunsi ado piye, piyok pu tene anang pirthimipe kijut para Solomon po kapaklang agiyan ka-oneyok kiwang; manta langot, Solomon po yok ke kithe chot ihut do.”
Konam kangho ajiuli kachu-u ihut para olesi dam, la-amun lang kangwe athem long kisang yok bisar damman, manta anang pahlong un-eh.
La-amun anang puye, “Ne tikangne kiwang ahempo yoksi ne dam phakbo.” Anang lalong kihlengyok ke hempo ahuna pangthir phlensi meso kibi wang thekngo.

La-amun anang damsi, anang angoyok kanghochot thorok-isi kamprek ajiuli chiwansi, lalong lut damsi dolo. Aro labang arlengpo angoyok ke aphelsi ingho chotman. Labang adin kangho arleng helta chiplangbo.”
Jisu arleng hel angot lam than jongne kido amun, langot, anang ai pen amusohel wangsi anang pen lam kachithan yok mokol arjap phrongsi kido.
Inghone bak anangyok pulo, “Nang ai aro nang musohel wangsi nang pen lam kachithan yok mokol long inghong phrong si do.”
Manta anang labang arlengpo yok pudun phakngo, “Ne ai ke ingho te? Aro ne muso hel ke ingho te?”
La-amun anang adun hel aga anang aripo jongsi pulo, “Holek kido abangsi ne ai aro ne kortehel.
Inghosi ethakpe long kido ne Apa aneng ateng mainot analisi ne muso aro ne ingjir aro ne ai.”
La-arni mat-matsi Jisu hem para olesi, langpe akung iningo.
Lalong rat ako-ong anang dung chingrumo, lasi anang tilong along arlusi lalong iningo, aro ahuwit rat hel langpe akung arjap phrongsi dolo.
Aro anang ako-ong athenghlan pensi analiyok pulo,“Chili kirip arleng ihut kirip yok olesi damo.
Aro anang kirip amun angkhan amu duwar akung jang damo aro wohel wangsi chodetno.
Aro angkhan amu ke arlong along jang damo aro lalong lungle kang-ar apotsi arong wang dapmo.
Manta arni solo parake kudulo aro angkur kidam un-eh apotsi arong hel kreng hapmo.
Aro angkhan amu ingsu aju jang damo, la-amun ingsu arong wangsi, labang helyok jol detno.
Angkhan amu ke a-or alungle athak jang damo aro athe wango, angkhan ke aphoro yok, angkhan ke angkol kithom, angkhan ke thom-kep yokta letno.
Inghosi anodo ma, anang pa-onenang.”
Lapara ke anang adun hel wangsi anangyok arjulo, “Nang pot anat analingo athenghlansi than man?”
Aro anang analiyok pulo, “Ethakpe-alongri long kabutisit alam achohel pathek yok nali pido; manta lamehel analiyok ke pipelang.
Piyok pu tene inghosi ako-ong do, anang yoksi piye, la-amun anang ongchotne; manta inghosi kangwe, anang potsi do, bangso ta anang para pondet bo.
Piyok pu tene anali thek yongta thek phlenphle, arju yongta arju phlenphle, aro abhu ta hlonghle; la-apot analingot ne athenghlansi thando.
Anali long Jisoya turki po kithan alam khanangsi chokpeno. Anang kithan, “Nali khanangsi arjuye manta jatsi abhu hlonghle ye aro nali khanangsi theknge manta jatsi atot hlonghle ye.

Piyok pu tene labang arleng hel angthin ingtang ongo, aro anali ano hel arthat ongo aro anali amek hel solokngo lale tene anali amek hel thekngo hoi, anali ano hel arjulo hoi, anali angthin hel long abhu hlongo hoi, aro anali ne dungyok wang phakngo hoi, aro analiyok pamelo hoi.”
Manta nali mek helsi bor-e do, piyok pu tene anali thekman aro anali ano hel ke karju aphan.

Ne naliyok khanangsi thando, nali potsi thekdo, bangpo amokha turkihel aro dhorom kangthir arleng hel kilange yok kang-hong yongta thek hlonghle yongot, aro nali potsi arju hlongdo, bangpo karju ye kanghong yongta, arju hlonghle yongot.
“La-apot nali labang kirip arleng athenghlan acho alampo onenot.
Konam inghone bak Arnam-alongri alam arju manta abhu hlonghle, la-amun kangho ajiuli wangsi, anang angthin long kirip tangso, kharpon detman; labang duwar akung kijangdam sok amu mat matno.
Arlong athak kijangdam asok lam achopoke labadilo, arleng hel Arnam alam arjusi, aneng arong pensi chideng penpanman.
Manta anang angthin angkur kangwe apot anang bekso arni yoksi do man; lapara ke Arnam alamthe anat duk-hap lale honjat kiwang penpan Arnam alampo tikangman.
Ingsu aju kijangdam asok ke ladilo, arleng hel Arnam alamthe oneman manta pirthepe long kicho-kijun kachiron aro nohok aneng kipi chotsi lamthe berklakman; la-amun anang akijol chiplangman.

Lungle a-or athak kijangdam asok amu hel ke ladilo, anang Arnam alamthe arjusi abhu hlongman; anang khanang athe wang man, aro angkhan ke phoro isi, angkhan ke angkol kithom, angkhan ke thom-kep yokta let chotsi athe wangman.”
Jisu kamprek athenghlan anali ngot thano, “Ethakpe-alongri ke arleng ihut anang bithar long amu akime kirip badi pachingbar un.
Manta arleng hel amek kijangklip amun anang hutur wangsi anang sok aju bap amu rip-putsi dam hrolo.
Lasi konam arong hel dingo aro phri si athe kiwang yok ke uri abap athe helta chiklango.
Aro aturuhel wangsi ahemphu poyok pulo, “Hemphu, nang bithar long amu akime kiripre ma? Tene pot badi labang uri athe hel wango?”
Anang analiyok pulo, “Labangke hutur ihutsi tikilo. Turuhel anangyok pulo, tene nang hali padamsi lamehel phusi kapangrum yok thane ma?
Manta anang pulo, kalek, piyok pu tene uri abap kiphu amun gom asok ta phudun ponge.
Kirot kirim weleng ayok ke gom asokpen uri abap hinita pathesonang aro kirot kirim aporsi kirot abangyok thanne uri abap hel pangrum aro kapasek ayok pangsem, manta gom asok poke rak long thal dam.”
Anang kamprek athenghlan anali ngot pulo, “Ethakpe-alongri ke arleng ihut jamu amu en-ne anang bithar long kirip dam badi.

Ahuwit amu helyok labang si kibek chot amu, manta konam labangpo theye, bangpo kijirtum arongyok thechot man, aro thengpe arong chiplang man, lasi angsong kangjar wohel ta wangsi aroten long atar chipatarman, labadi arongpe chiplangman.”
Jisu analiyok aro isi athenghlan pisi thano, “Jipe athengkur ihut arloso pe ensi, hothom him aduk asitem long ajaldung kangdetde lengke dip klaksi bilo, bangpo badi ethakpe-alongri.”
Jisu ahuwit lamehel rat helyok parhlansi thano. Anang parhlan penpe lengke analiyok lam thanthe yong ngo.
Turki po pot kipu labangpo chok peno, “Ne parhlan pensi ne angho ingko ye, pirthepe kahurji para pot kachibuti hel done, pachiklan bo.”
Laparake Jisu rat hel yok tikango aro hem arloyok damo. Aro anang adun hel wangsi anangyok pulo, “Bithar long kido uri abap hel athenghlan alam haliyok thandak ngot.
Anang thano, “Akime amu kirip poke Arleng Aso lo.
Bithar ke pirthepe lo, amu akime poke longri asohel aro uri abap helke akangho asohel.
Aro hutur hel ke ingho rip mo lake si-ik, kirot kirim ke kijut aporpolo aro kirot kirim abangke Arnam tharlonhelo.
Uri abap hel kapangrum aro mepen kapasek labangpoke kijut aporpo lo.
Arleng Aso anang tharlon helyok tole aro analiyok anang longri long kido ahuwit papi aro kangho katiki abangyok pangrume.
Aro analiyok kikar jong me-aten long tiye. Lalong arleng hel suru-jo ye aro anali aso chingkretne.
Lapara dhorom kangthir abangke anali Apa alongri long arni badisi patha-angsi doye. Inghosi ano doma anang pa-one nang.

“Ethakpe-alongri ke bithar asitem long butisi kibi apuru badi; bangpo inghone bak arleng po thek hlongsi, butisi biman; la-aphel anengrong pen damsi, anang ahuwit kidohel chijor detsi, labang bitharpo namo.”
“Aro ethakpe-alongri ke kimechot ser kabisar ihut kijor-kihrep badi.
Anang isi adorchot ser thek hlongsi damo, anang ahuwit kidohel chijor detsi, bangpo namo.”
“Aro ethakpe-alongri ke langpe long kiwar aro ajatjat ok hel kapangrum ipak lan badi.
Konam lanpo plengo, arleng hel bamyok wansi, lalong iningsi, aro akime ok helke bu along thalsi, akangho helke tidetno.
Ladisi owepo kijut aporta chiplange; ethakpe atharlon hel wangsi dhorom kangthir abang asitem para kangho helyok papreksi,
anali yok kikar jong ame longsi tiye; la-amun arleng hel surujo ye aro anali aso-chingkre ye.”
“Nali lamehel abhu hlongdo ma?” Anali anangyok pulo, “Oik,”
aro anang analiyok pulo, “Lasi kanong kapaklang abangten inghosi ethakpe-alongri aphan chirwalo, anangke hem hemphu ihut anang apuru long para aban aro akimi olene kiwan badi.”
Jisu labang athenghlan po pa-orsi anang athempo tikangsi damo.
Aro anang abithang alongri wangsi, lahel kachirdom ahemlong kapaklang hel asombhik hlongo, aro pulo, “Labang arlengpo labang agiyan aro lamehel ajakong daklong para hlongo?”
Anangke hem kakundarpo aso kalek ma? Anang aipe amen Mary kipu pe kalaek ma? Aro amuso hel amen Jems po, Jusep po, Simon po aro Judas po kalek ma?
Aro angjir pe hel ahuwit ili pen holek dode yong ma? Tene labang ahuwit daklong parate hlongo?”
Aro anali anangyok ado pahlongo. Manta Jisu analiyok pulo, “Abithang alongri aro abithang ahem aparke jotmehel turki ihut aman wepho dode.”
Aro anali kikrolkre anat anang lalong ako-ong asombhik asal tiki ke paklangkle yongo.
Labang apor Herod rechopo Jisu katiki kachitha-ang arjusi;
anang murkiya helyok pulo, “Labang ke Johon Baptist po anang kithi para bur phakngo la apotsi anang long lamehel asal katiki un apharan hel hlongo.”
Herod po Johon po yok nepmo aro anangyok koksi akrol long thalo. Anang labang asal amuso Philip po apiso Herodiyas pe anatsi katiki.
Piyok pu tene Johon po anangyok pulo, “Labang ke nang anangyok ki-en nange kanong kalek.”
Herod po anangyok kamari aneng kido manta anang arleng helyok pherelo, piyok pu tene anali anang yok turki ihut pusi kikrol.
Manta konam Herod po kiplang adin kamainot arni wang hlengo, Herodiyas pe asope donhel ango kano aro Herod poyok aneng pangsamo.
Lasi anang seme-tangsi anang pot hange kipiyok ching-akngo.
Anang aipe kithan wen badisi anang pulo, “John Baptist aphupo senge ipak long nepi.”
La-amun rechopo aneng doholo, manta anang donhel ango seme-kitang apot, aro anangpen cho-junlong kangning hel aphan ta, anang kipiyok thano.
Anang tolo aro akrol long Johon po aphu pathu hletno.
Aro anang aphupo senge ipak long wano aro so-arlope yok pilo aro anangke anang aipe yok wang pilo.
La aphel anang adun hel wango, aro anang abangpo pono, labang pepmo aro anali damsi Jisu yok thano.
Jisu bangpo mar arjusi, lalong para chitereksi, nisotjot athemyok tilong pen prek do damo. Manta rat hel bangpo arjusi, rongpe hel para langpe akung-kung Jisu aphel phel duno.
Anang lang akungyok kidam apor rat ako-ong thekngo aro anang kajinso wango aro anali yok kisohel pamelo,
konam anithulo, adun hel anang dungyok wangsi pulo, “Holek ilong nisotjot athem aro minonke arnita chelo, rat helyok rong hel aga tolnot aro abithang an pachinam dam minang.”
Jisu pulo, “Analiyok padam hlongek, nali analiyok pene bak kapacho yok pinot.”
Anali anangyok pulo, “Holek hali long him plang phongo aro ok jon- ni detsi do.”
Aro anang pulo, “Lamehel holek hane dungyok wanot.”

Aro anang rat hel yok bap aju pangning yok thano, laparake anang him plang phongo aro ok jon-ni ensi ethakpe aga lango aro bor-eh hangsi ingbengo aro adun helyok him hel pilo, aro adun helke labang pomar rat helyok thakngo.
Aro anali ahuwit ta cholo aro aneng ingsamo. Aro anali kicho agol hel pangrumsi pachik kere hini plengsopsi hlongo.
Aro inghosi cholo lahel oso aro arloso kido yongta hajar phongobak apenso kido.
Lapara ke anang rat hel pen kachikak apor adun helyok tilong athak parlulo aro anang ango ango kamprek aga padamo.
Aro anang rat hel pen kachikak aphel anang abithang kapingkit aphan inglong yok damo. Konam anithu lo lalong ahudetsi dolo.
Manta tilong hel lungle para holo witsi kido, labang apor lang adul wang tongo lapen tomon ango aga para anali yok wang japmo.
Aro adap prang baji-phili apor anang langpe athak keng-kam chijorsi anali dungyok wango.
Manta konam adun hel anangyok lang athak akeng-kam chijorsi kiwang thekngo, anali phere detsi pulo, “Labang ke samonpo” aro anali pheresi hangsolo.
Manta analiyok anang photsi thansi pulo, “Aha chipado, lake hanesi, phereyek.”
Aro Pitor po anangyok pulo, “Hemphu, lake nang tene, lang athak nang dungyok pawang tolyok thanot.
Anang pulo, “Wangot” lasi Pitor po tilong para suno aro lang athak keng-kam chijoro, aro Jisu akengthun damo.
Manta tomon akithe kijap theksi, pheresi, lang inglum rang-rango apot, anang hang-wongsi pulo, “Hemphu niralnot.”
La-amun Jisu anang ari dengsi, anangyok ot pen pansi pulo, “Nang beksosi kikrolpo, piyok nangthin ihik-bihik dolo?”
Aro anali konam tilong athak arlulo aro tomon ta hamo.
Aro tilong long kido abang anangyok chirdomsi pulo, “Khanangsi nang Arnam Aso.”
Anali langpe arpatsi Genesarat alongri yok wango.
Aro lalong kido arleng hel anang yok chinisi anali ahuwit ta labang ahol dungyok tolo aro ahuwit ta kiso arleng hel anang dungyok wango.
Aro anali anangpe apreso detsi ki-ot chet hlongyok, labadi anangyok chingduk ngo; aro konbak arleng otno anali, labang ahuwit ta medet no.
La-amun Pharisi aro kanong paklang hel Jerusalem para Jisu adungyok wangsi pulo, “Nang adun hel sar-larhel awe para awe tikijongsi kiwang abi-pun piyok mengme?
Piyok pu tene anali ari chichamche detsi choman.”
La-amun anang analiyok pulo, “Nali ta awe para awe tikisi kiwang abi-pun anatsi, Arnam kithan alamthe piyok mengme?
Piyok pu tene Arnam pudo, “Nang apa aro aipe yok aman paklang aro inghosi anang apa lale anang aipe yok kangho ingjeman, anang aserengsi pathi nang.”
Manta nali puman, inghosi anang pa po lale anang aipe yok thanman, ne para pot pensi nang akime chokngo hoi, bangpo Arnam yoksi pidet do,
anang apa poyok jatsi aman piye not. Ladisi nali awe para awe tikisi kiwang abi-pun anat, Arnam alamthe pangwe det no.
Ei nali nengsik abang! Jisoya po me-atsi turki alamthe nali paharo. Anang kipu,
lamehel arleng helke, anali angho pensi aman nepaklang man, manta anali angthinhel ke ne para kaholo do.
Akijolsi anali ne chirdomman, arleng kapaklang aphansi kanong alam pusi pachirliman.
Aro anang arleng helyok adung taramo aro analiyok pulo, “Onenot aro abhu pahlongot!
Arleng ihut angho arlo potsi lut dam lake pasim un-eh manta angho para pot oleman labangsi pasim un.”
Laparake adun hel anang dung wangsi pulo,“Nang thekdo ma, konam Pharisi hel nang kipu alam arju hlongsi aneng kidoho?”
Anang pulo, “Ethakpe long kido ne Apa ki-eh arong tenta phur detne.
Anali hudetne pado nang, analike chotok yok duwar kapaklang pon arleng. Aro chotok arleng ihut chotok arleng ihutyok paklang pon tene bang hinita ahilik long jang dame.”
Manta Pitor po anangyok pulo, “Kaparhlan alam acho hali yok meso than phrot not.”
Aro anang pulo, “Nang minon hokta abhu hlonghle lang ma?
Nali thek the ma jipe angho pen potsi choman, lamehel apok yok hlengsi, aro bayot along ole detman, bangpo nali abhu hlonghle yong ma?
Manta potsi anghopara mokol yok oleman lake angthin parasi wangman aro labang si arleng ihut yok pasimman.
Angthin long parasi kangho kachiron hel, lake arleng kamari, kachopak, kangho kidoner, kanghu, kachobel, asisik hakhi kipihel wang oleman.
Lamehel si arleng ihut yok pasim un, manta ari chichamche si kicho arleng ihut yok pasim un-eh.
Aro Jisu lalong para tikangsi Tayar aro Sidon alongri ahol yok damo.
Aro langot, Kanan arloso ihut labang ahol para olesi wango aro hangsi pulo, “Nang Dabhit po aso, toh ne jinso not, neso pe phere memesi si-ik hapdo.”
Manta Jisu anangyok lam itheta thanthe yongot. Anang adun hel wango aro anangyok chingduk ngo. “Anangyok tolnot, anangke ili phel-phel hangwongsi wangdun do.”
Anang pulo, “Neyok Israyel ahem kachingbo bherabik helyok detsi wang toldo.
Manta anang angot tarhuksi pulo, “Hemphu nerap mot.”
Aro anang pulo, “Osohel ahimpo en detsi, labangpo hik-helyok kipi akime kalek.”
Anang pulo, “Oik, Hemphu, hik hel ahemphupo para kapajang somar cho hlong man.
Lapara ke Jisu anangyok pulo, “Ei arloso pe, nang kikrol kar-ih atengne nang pachok dun nang.” Aro anang sope la jongsi medetno.
Jisu lalong para damsi Galili langpe akung kung damo. Anang inglong yok ujelo aro lalong iningo.
Aro arleng ako-ong anang dungyok wango aro chotok, kengkok, kalar, konga aro ajatjat kiso, analiyok Jisu akeng-ari long wang bilo aro anang analiyok pamelo.
Lasi kalar lam kithan, konga kime phlen, kengkok akeng kidam aro chotok amek kithek, arleng hel theksi asombhik hlongo aro anali Israyel Arnam yok jortang pilo.

Lapara ke Jisu anang adun hel yok adung taramsi pulo, “Rat helyok ne jinso memesi hlong do, piyok pu tene anali ne pen nithom do aro kicho apot wepeno. Ne analiyok pangchirlap ke kitol aneng ingjong, anali duwar ibeng abang atot weye.”
Aro adun hel anangyok pulo, “Sangtel aju la-an arat kapacho yok an daklongte hlonge?”
La-amun Jisu analiyok arjulo, “Nali long plangkan him do?” Anali pulo, “Plang thorok isi aro ok aso bekso bak do.”
Lasi Jisu rat helyok lungle athak kangning yok thano.
Anang him plang thorok-isi aro lang-ok eno aro Arnam yok kardom pisi anang lamehel ingbengsi adun hel yok pilo aro adun hel lamehel rat yok pilo.
Aro anali ahuwit ta cholo aro aneng ingsamo, aro anali pachi thorok-isi plengsopsi abeng-ano kirihel pangrumo.
Anali kicho abang hajar-phili apenso kido. Layongta oso aro arloso alekha en-eh yong.
Aro Jisu rat helyok tol detsi anang tilong athak arlulo aro Magadan ahol yok damo.
La-amun Pharisi aro Saduki hel adung wangsi, Jisu yok porman kilang yoksi, ethakpe para asin isi anali paklangpi ayok chingduk ngo.
Anang analiyok thano, “Anithu apor inghun ero tene, botor meye pusi nali puman.
Aro adap prang apor, ‘minike tomon herel arwe wangta hal’ piyok pu tene inghun ero aro suneng ingder do, manta nali asinhel aporke thandak un-eh.
Labang owelong kangho aro kidoner arlengke asin chihangman, manta Jona po asin aparke lahelyok prek asin pipe ye.” La-amun anang analiyok tikangsi chikakngo.
Konam adun hel prek aga hlengo anali kicho ahim kipon yok tenge jango.
Jisu anali yok pulo, “Pharisi pen Saduki hel athengkur para atot chipado.”
Aro labangso anali dak chirwalsi pulo, “Ili him wanwe yong.”
Manta Jisu atot hlongsi pulo, “Ei kikrol chet abang, piyok te nali him kangwe apot nali chirwal do?
Nali minon hokta abhu hlonghle yong ma? Him plang phongo pen hajar phongo arleng yok kapacho, nali neng ri-re yong ma? Aro pachi kante nali pangrumo?
Lale plang thorok isi ahim pen hajar phili aro pachi kante nali pangrumo?
Ne him alam nali kithan pot badi nali abhu hlongkel lo? Pharisi aro Saduki hel athengkur para atot chipado.”
Laparasi anali abhu hlongo, anang anali yok him long kapalok dun thengkur alampoke thanthe yong manta Pharisi pen Saduki hel kapaklang alam yoksi kipu.
Aro Jisu Sisiriya Philipi ahol ayok damsi anang adun hel yok arjulo, “Rat hel Arleng Aso yok inghote pusi puman?”
Aro anali pulo, “Angkhan ke pudo Johon Baptist po, kamprek ke pudo Elija po, aro kamprek hel ke pudo Jeremiya po lale turkihel ihut.”
Anang analiyok pulo, “Manta nalike neyok inghote pusi nepuye?”
Simon Pitor po pulo, “Nangke Khristo, kihreng Arnam Aso.
Aro Jisu anangyok pulo, “Ei Jona po aso Simon po, nang bor-eh kichokpo; piyok pu tene bangpo awi aro a-okpen bangpo nang ngo pachiklangkle yong, manta ethakpe-along kido hane Apa si pachiklango.
Aro ne ta nangyok thando, nangke Pitor po aro labang arlong athak ne kachikruk ne keme, aro kithi ajakong bangpo yok hal un-eh ye.

Ne nangyok ethakpe-alongri sabihel nangpiye; aro lalong nang pirthimipe along potsi chingnak nge ma, ethakpe longta chingnak nge aro nang pirthimipe long potsi nang phloknge ma, ethakpe longta phloknge.”
La-amun, anango Khristo pu ke kaiyok ta pathan hlonghle yok, anang adun helyok than klakngo.

Labang apor para Jisu anang adun hel yok kapaklang cheng pono, te anang Jerusalem yok dam nange, akisarhel, bor-bangthe, kanong paklang hel para ako-ong duk-tap cho nange, aro thi hlongsi, ni-thom arnike burphak hlonge.
Aro Pitor po anangyok pono aro anang kitamyok chengo, “O Hemphu, Arnam nangyok kajinso padonang; labang ke nangyok jat chiplangple ye.
Manta anang chipharlep-wolsi Pitor po yok pulo, “Nephel damot, si-ikpo, nang neyok kapangho po. Nang Arnam alamthe chironresi, arleng alamthesi chiron do.”
Lapara Jisu adun hel yok pulo, “Inghone bak nephel kiwang ar-ih, tene anang bithang chipangdom, aro abithang kros en-ne, nephel-phel wangdun not.
Piyok pu tene inghosi abithang ajiu aphan chipajok yok ronne, anangke bangpo chipangbo ye, manta inghosi nenat ajiu chitiye, anangke bangpo hlonge.
Piyok pu tene jai arleng pirthepe dungsi pahlong yongta, anang ajiu chipangho, tene anang pot te alap? Aro arleng abithang ajiu aholan ke pot-wolpi une?
Piyok pu tene Arleng Aso anang Apa jortang pen anang tharlon helyok ensi kiwangyok aro anang la-amun abangtenyok abithang katiki atengsi angban piye.
Ne naliyok khanangsi thando, Arleng Aso yok abithang longriyok kiwang thek hlonghle lengke kithi chikuke ye, angkhan arleng, holek arjapsi kido abang asitem do.”
La ni-thorok aphel Jisu si Pitor po pen Jemspo aro amuso Johon po yok ensi, analipen isi inglong kartul athak analiyok pono.
Aro anali ngot anang athokpo chipharlepsi mahangpo arni badi tha-angwet no aro anang pe-rik helta katha-ang badi phlan etno.
Aro langot te, lalong analiyok Mosi po pen Elija po chiklango aro anang pen lam chithano.
Lasi Pitor po Jisu yok pulo, “Hemphu, ili holek kidopo akimelo, nang anengdo tene ne holek kuntulu ahem hum-thom keme, ihumke nang phan, ihumke Mosi po aphan aro ihum ke Elija po aphan.”
Anang labang kithanjong amun, anang thak inghun phung klakngo aro langot, inghun para isi asi wangsi pulo, “Anangke ne nengdok Aso, anangyok ne neng ingsamman; anang lam onenot.”
Adunhel labang arjusi, anali lungle athak mahang tong bakngo, aro kachiphere chilut detno.
Manta Jisu wangsi analiyok otsi pulo, “Thurnot, phereye not.”
Aro la-amun anali kilang ke, Jisu yok aparke kaiyok ta thekthe yongot.
Aro ladisi anali inglong kartul para wangkisun jong amun, Jisu analiyok thano, “Arleng Aso kithi asitem para bur phakphe lengke labang kachiklang alampo kaiyok ta thanek.”
La-amun anang adun hel anangyok arjulo, “Tene Elija po si ango wangpen nange pusi kanong paklang hel piyok puman?”
Anang pu phakngo, “Elija po wangsi ahuwit abihini hel pangning phaknge,
manta ne naliyok thando, Elija po ke daknesi wango; aro anali chinine si, anangyok nali neng potsi kar-ih labadi si anangyok sanselo. Ladisi anali parasi Arleng Aso duk hapme.”
La-amun Johon Baptist po alamsi anang analiyok thando pusi adun hel abhu hlongo.
Aro konam anali rat adungyok wango, ihut arleng anang dung wangsi, anang ngo tarhuksi pulo,
“Hemphu, toh neso poyok jinso not, piyok pu tene anang tengrai kisopo phere memesi chiplang do, anang me along aro lang along jang damman.
Ne anangyok nang adun hel adungyok kiwan manta anali pame un-eh yongot.”
Aro Jisu pulo, “Kikrolkre aro kangho awe abang konbak adin ayok ne nalipen dobo? Konbak adin ayok ne nali pen chipaning ding bo? Ne dungyok oso-so wan.”
Jisu anangyok tamsero, aro si-ik anang para wang olesi damo; aro la jongsi oso-so ta medetno.
Laparake adun hel detsi Jisu adungyok wangsi pulo, “Piyok hali labang ujhar un-eh yongot?”

La-amun anang analiyok pulo, “Nali kikrol bekso det. Piyok pu tene ne naliyok khanangsi thando, nali jamu amu athek krolta, nang konam inglong kartulpe yok puye, “Holek para ha aga yok dam,” aro anang dame; aro isi abihini tiki un-eh ke weye.”
Labang ke ladi ujhar un-eh ye manta pingkit aro an-kihum pensi une.
Galili alongri kachingrum apor, Jisu analiyok pulo, “Arleng Asoyok arleng hel arideng champi detne,
aro anali anangyok mariye, manta ni-thom arni anang wangbur phaknge.” aro anali aneng doho detno.
La-amun anali Kaparnaum yok wango apot, inghosi adhuli isi khajana kirung, labang kalukdar hel Pitor po adungyok wangsi arjulo, “Nali paklangpo khajana pipe ma?”

Anang pulo, “Oik pido.” Aro konam anang hem wang-kilut amun, Jisu ke pangosi anang yok pulo, “Simon, pirthimipe arechohel khajana ingho para en? Abithang asohel para ma, ma bang arleng hel para? Nang nenglong pot chiron do?”
Aro konam anang pulo, “Bang hel para” Jisu anangyok pulo, “Lasi aso helke joksi do.”

La yongta ili analiyok aneng pangho nangne, la anat nang langpe yok damsi, burhi parhinot; labang parhi cheng amun ango kihlong okpo, nepsi, bangpo angho eksi, nang tanga isi hlonge, labangso en-ne, ne phan aro nang phan analiyok pinot.”
La apor adun hel Jisu adungyok wangsi pulo, “Ethakpe-alongri longke inghote thechot?”
Lasi Jisu oso ihut taramsi anangyok adun hel asitem long parjapmo,
aro pulo, “Khanangsi ne naliyok thando, nali neng chipharlepsi oso badi chiplangple leng ke, nali jatsi ethakpe-alongri long lut un-eh ye.
Inghosi anang bithang labang oso badi chipabek hopme, anangsi ethakpe-alongri long ke thechot.
Inghosi ne men pen ladi ihut osoyok chideng, anangke neyoksi chidengman.
“Manta nali sitem inghone bak neyok kikrol labang oso asitem ihutyok honjat pi, anang phanke angphun long isi arlong akithe chibam dungsi aro anangyok langpe abi long pardip plupsi mechot.
Ahonjat anat pirthepe long kaphere memedo! Piyok pu tene honjat wange, manta ingho para honjat wange, labang arleng kaphere meme do!

Lasi nang ari lale akengpo honjatyok nangpon, tene bangpo thum hletne nang para war-chor; ari hong-ni lale akeng hong-ni dosi, jutjelen me-thengdang long kiwar damyok, akeng-ari ihong konga, lale akeng ihong kengkok kido, ajiubong karjapsi nangphan mechot.
Aro nang mekpo nang honjat pawangman, tene labang amekpo hek ngot, nang para olene tinot; amek hini dosi me-thengdang jom along kachiti damyok ke, amek isi done, karjaksi nangphan mechot.
“Chilang wenot, labang akibek osohel ihut yok ta langmo ke doyek; piyok pu tene ne nali thando, ethakpe long kido ne Apa amahang, ethakpe long anang atharlonhel, arni thek lendo.
piyok pu tene ingho chingbo jango, anangyok bisarsi kiral ayok Arleng Aso wango.

Nali neng long pot chirondo? Arleng ihut phoro isi bherabik do tene, anali sitem para ijon chingbo det, tene anang jon-kep pen sirkepne-sirkep ayok inglong akung tikangsi, labang kangbo ijonso yok lang damde ma?
Aro anang labangso hlong, tene khanangsi ne nali thando, kangbobe jon-kep pen sirkepne-sirkep bherabik yok ke, labang ijon bherabik ayoksi aneng arong chot.
Ladisi labang osohel asitem ihut ta kapangho ayok, ethakpe long kido nali Apa aneng ingjong.”
“Manta nang korte pone nangyok kangho tiki, tene damot, anang ahudet kido amun, anangyok adukpo chithanot. Anang nang lampo onedo, tene nang kortepo yok nang hlongo.
Manta anang nanglam one, tene jaibak ke bang-hini, lale bang-kithom arleng hakhi alam ahuwit khanang chikenge, la anat aro ihut lale bang-hini nang pen chiponot.
Anang analiyok ta lampo o-eh, tene labangpo kachikruk yok thanot; aro kachikruk alamta ado katikipo o-eh, tene anangyok ihutke nali phan bang adhorom ajat aro ihut papi kalukdar badi pado nang.”
“Ne naliyok khanangsi thando, nali pirthimipe athak potsi ingnaknge, ethakpe longta chingnak nge, aro pirthimipe long athak jibak phlok, labangsi ethakpe long ta phloknge.
Ne nali thanphak do, pirthimipe along nali bang-hini arleng kapingkit penebak alam isi-aneng chiplang, tene ethakpe kido ne Apa parasi analiyok bangpo pachok piye.
Piyok pu tene daklong bang-hini, lale bang-kithom nemen pen chingrumdo, lalong ne ta anali sitem doman.”
La-amun Pitor po wangsi Jisu yok pulo, “Hemphu, ne kortepo neyok phongkan kangho tiki tene ne anangyok ron nange? Phong thorok isi ma?
Jisu anangyok pulo, “Phong thorok isi puke ne nang thanthe, manta phong kepthorok isine thorok isi ayok.”
La-apot ethakpe-alongri ke murkiyahel pen alekha hel kilang phrot yok kiron ihut rechopo badisi pachingbar do.
Konam anang kachilang phrotyok chengo, ihutpo inghosi hajarkep ki-en anangyok wano.
Aro, anang kipi un-eh pho apot, anangyok aro anang piso, aso lamehel ahuwit anang kido jorphrotsi, kapawol detyok anang ahemphupo thano.
Lapor labang murkiyapo anang keng-ari long tarhuksi chingduksi pulo, “Hemphu, chihinot, ne nangyok kido-kangwe nangwol detne.
La-amun labang murkiyapo yok ahemphupo ingjinso memelo, anang murkiyapo yok pajokngo aro anang kipi nangepo dhar ta ronno.
Manta labang murkiyapo, mokolyok damsi, anang phoro isi nohok kipi dhar ki-en ihut murkiya alokjor pochaksi, anang yok otsi, angphun tumsi pulo, “Nang pot kipi nangedo pinot.”
Laparake anang alokjorpo tarhuksi aro chingduksi pulo, “Bekso apor nechihi not, ne nangyok nangwol piye.”
Manta anang mengme yongot, aro nohok pipe lengke, anangyok akrol long thalsi bilo.
Konam anang murkiya alokjor hel labang kachiplang theksi, anali aneng dohodaksi, anali ahemphupo adung damsi, jibak chiplango, labang ahuwit thano.
Laparake anang ahemphupo murkiyapo yok taramsi anangyok pulo, “Ei nang pamuktong amurkiya po, nang neyok kachinduk apot, ne nang labang ahuwit kichak nohok nang rono.
Tene ne jibadi nangyok kajinso kido, nangta ladi nang murkiya alokjorpo yok jinso nangne ma?
Aro la-amun anang ahemphupo aneng kang ongsi, murkiyapo kichak pon anohok pidetde lengke, anang yok kapaduk akrol phu-phang helyok champilo.
Nali abangten nang kortepo ingthinpen ronpipe, tene ne ethakpe long Apa ta nali abangten yok labadisi inghole.
Konam Jisu lamehel alam thansi patango, Galili para damsi, aro Judiya ahol Jordan langpe ha aga apar lut damo.
Aro ako-ong arat anang phel duno, aro lalong anang analiyok kiso pame detno.
La-amun Pharisi hel anang dungyok wangsi, anangyok honjat kilang yok arjulo, “Pene bak aron anat apiso yok kise un kanong doma?
Anang pulo, “Nali chiporhe hlonghle yong ma, analiyok kithep kicheng cheng para analiyok penso aro arloso si thepmo,
aro pulo, ‘la anatsi arleng ihut anang pa pen anang ai tikangsi, anang pisope pen chiloksi, bang-hini ihut det abang chiplange pusi thano, labang alam nali chiporhe hlonghle yong ma?’
Tene anali aro bang-hini kalek, manta ihutdet abang. La-apot Arnam inghoyok pachilok ngo, labang yok arlengke pachise nangne.”
Anali anangyok pulo, “Tene kachise ipak porman alo pisi, kachise ayok Mosi po piyok thano?”
Anang analiyok pulo, “Nali angthin karthat ong anatsi Mosi po naliyok abithang apiso yok kiseyok hawang pilo, manta kicheng cheng parake bangpo ladi kangwe.”

Aro ne nali thando, “Jipe kangho kidoner aparke, kamprek aron long anang piso ayok sekuksi bangyok chi-en, anang kangho donerman, aro jipe kisetang labangpe arlosope yok chi-en, anangta kangho donerman.”
La-amun adun hel anang yok pulo, “Ili bithang piso pe ihut apenso popen ladi arjak hlong, tene kachi-en ehsi mechot.”
Manta anang analiyok pulo, “Inghoyok ajakong pido, analiyok aparke prek kaita labang alam chideng un-eh.

Piyok pu tene angkhan ke ape apok parasi apunchakwe si wangplang do, angkhan ke arlengsi ka-ote apunchakwe abangdo, aro angkhan ke ethakpe-alongri aphan abithangyok apunchakwe abangdo. Jai labang alam chideng un, anang pachideng nang.”
Laparake Jisu adungyok oso helyok anali abang long ari batsi kapingkit aphan wano. Adun helke arleng hel yok tamsero;
