manta Jisu pulo, “Osohel hane dungyok pawang nang, aro analiyok tengek. Piyok pu tene ethakpe-alongri lamehel aphan si.”
La-amun anang anali abang ari batsi, labang athem para dam holo.
Aro langot, arleng ihut Jisu adung wangsi pulo, “Paklangpo, ne ki-or-eh ajiubong kihlong yok pot akime asal tiki nange?”
Aro Jisu anangyok pulo, “Akime ke potsi labang alam piyok te neyoksi ne-arju do? Ingho akime lake ihut detsi do. Nang labang ajiulong kilut dun anengdo, tene Arnam kanong hel mainot pon.
Anang Jisu yok arjulo, “Mehel ke pot te?” Jisu pulo, “Nang arleng mari yek, nang bangpen donerek, chunghuyek, nang asisik hakhi piyek;
nang aipe pen nang apa poyok ta aman pi; lapen nang adung-arel abangyok nang bithang badi nengdok ngot.”
Riso arlengpo anangyok pulo, “Ne lamehel ahuwit mainot detdo, ne aro pot te katikime dolang?”

Jisu anangyok pulo, “Nang kichok phrot aneng do, tene damot, kido-kangwe chijordet, aro kicho kangwe abangyok nohok pajirnot, aro nangphan ethakpe long apuru doye; lapara ke wangot, ne phel-phel wang dunot.”
Konam risopo labang alam arjulo, anang aneng dohosi dam hrolo, piyok pu tene anang apuru kido-ong arleng kido.
Aro Jisu anang adun hel yok pulo, “Ne naliyok khanangsi thando, ethakpe-alongri long kilut ihut hem kime arleng aphan akisum.
Aro ne nali thanphak do, ahem kime arleng ihut Arnam-alongri long kilut damyok ke mihonghang ijon imprim ang-gog aga kilut damsi jalso chot.”
Konam adun hel labangpo arjulo, adun hel asombhik hlongsi pulo, “Lapara ke ingho te jok unbo?”
Manta Jisu anangyok lang etsi pulo, “Arlengke un-eh, manta Arnam ahuwit tiki un.”
La-amun Pitor po pulo, “Langot, hali kido-kangwe tikang detsi nang phel wang duno. Lapara ke hali pot hlonge?”

La-amun Jisu analiyok pulo, “Ne khanangsi nali thando, akimi kasanse along, konam Arleng Aso anang jortang anghol athak ininge, la-amun nephel-phel kiwang abang nali Israyel long kere-hini ajatyok bisar otesi kere-hini anghol hel athak ininge.

Aro abangten hem ret, lale anang korte, lale anang angjirpe, lale anang ai anang pa, lale osohel, lale lungle phalang ne men anat katikang hlong abang, phoro isi yokta ako-ong hlonge aro ki-or-eh jiuli piye.
Manta ango kido abangke paphele aro aphel abangke pango ye.”
Ethakpe-alongri ke ladi ihut lungle ahemphu badi, inghosi anang rihanthu barikpo aphan sal kapatiki ayok adap prang dat-katiki arleng langworsi olesi damo.
Anang dat-katiki arleng hel pen adhuli isi adat kapachip aphel, analiyok anang rihanthu barikyok tolo.
Anang baji sirkep apun olesi kidam amun salwepho si lapara karjap rul arleng hathi long thekngo;
aro anang lahelyok pulo, “Nalita ne rihanthu barikpo longyok damot, aro potsi kihlong nangeso nali piye.” Lasi lahel damo.
Konam anang baji kerehini apun aro baji kithom apun damsi, labenthotsi tikilo.
Aro baji phongo apun anang oledamsi, aro prek abang hel arjap rulne kido theksi, aro analiyok arjulo, “Piyokte nalike holek ladi arjap rulsi do?”
Anali anangyok pulo, “Haliyok kaita chak ponpe yong.” Anang analiyok pulo, “Nalita rihanthu barik longyok damot.”
Konam anethu aporo, rihanthu barik ahemphupo anang murkiyapo yok pulo, “Sal katiki abangyok taramne, aphel katiki abang chengsi ango katiki abangyok anali kihlonge adat pinot.”
Aro baji phongo apun katiki abangta wangsi adhuli isi hlong repmo.
Minon konam ango katiki abang wango, anali ongchotsi hlonge pusi kachiron; manta anali arni katiki badi abangten adhuli isi detsi hlong repmo.
Aro konam anali bangso hlongo, anali lungle ahemphu poyok patuhurnuk si aneng thilo,
anali pulo, “Aphel katiki abang helke baji isi detsi tikilo aro halike arsini-jon arni asok chichaksi sal tikilo manta nang hali yokta anali pensi pachingbar hletno.”
Manta anang lahel ihutpo yok pulo, “Ei lokjor hel, ne nang yok ongnai tiki pipe yong; nang ne pen adhuli isi kapachip kalek ma?
Nang kihlong nangeso nang chi-enot aro damot; ne labang aphel poyok ta nangyok kipi atengsi kipiyok ne arwal do.
Ne bithang abihini pen ne karwal ateng ne tiki hlonghle ma? Lale ne nengwakdak kipi theksi, nalimek sodo ma?’
Lasi aphel abangke pangoye, aro ango abang ke paphele.”
Jisu Jerusalem athak kidam jong apor bang kerehini adun hel det yoksi papreksi pono aro anang duwar ibeng along anang yok pulo,
“Langot, ili Jerusalem yok dam jongdo, lalong Arleng Asoyok kanong paklang hel aro bangthehel arideng champiye, aro analisi anangyok ado kolsi mariye;
Laparake anali Bang-ajat arideng yok champiye aro patharaknge aro pasapme aro kros long tare; aro ni-thom arni anang bur phaknge.”
La-amun Jebedi po asomar anang aipe anang aso bang-hiniyok ensi, aro Jisu adung yok wangsi, anang ngo tarhuksi pene bak chihango.
Aro Jisu anangyok pulo, “Nang pot te kanange do?” Anang Jisu yok pulo, “Nang longri long ne sopenso bang hiniyok ihutke nang ancho-ari aga, prek ihutke debera-ari aga pangning nang, pune than.”
Manta Jisu pulo, “Nali pot chihangdo, nang thekthe yong. Ne jipe alanghan kijunyok chihonjok do, nali labang alanghan jun une ma? Anali anangyok pulo, “Hali une.”

Anang analiyok pulo, “Nali ne langhan long jun une, manta ne ancho-ari aga pen debera-ari aga kapangning tolyok ne than un-eh ye, manta lamehel ingho yoksi ne Apa honjok wen doma lamehel aphansi bido.”
Aro konam bangpo bang-kepta arjulo, anali akorte bang-hini yok aneng kango.
Manta Jisu analiyok taramsi pulo, “Nali thek, Bang-ajat kapangdom ahemphu helke anali phuthak pahemphu man, aro anali aghai arleng helke anali phuthak apharan pensi tikiman, bangpo nalithek.
Labadi inghosi nali sitem aghai kachiplang yok aneng doman, anangke nali murkiya chiplangot,
aro inghosi nali sitem ango chiplange, anangke turu pachiplang pen nange;
jibadi Arleng Aso ke al kapa-en yok ke kalek, al ki-en yok, aro ako-ong arleng kapajok ador aholan abithang ajiu kachiti yoksi wango”.
Anali Jeriko arong para olesi kidam apor rat ako-ong anangphel duno.
Aro lalong duwar akung chotok bang hini ining phrongsi kido. Konam anali Jisu la-aga chirpat si kidam alam arjusi, hang-wongsi pulo, “O nang Dabhit po Aso, hali jinso not.”
Ratmar analiyok tamsero, aro padosit aphan analiyok thano, manta lahel hangchot-chot si pulo, “Hemphu, nang Dabhit po asopo, hali jinso not.”
La-amun Jisu sang kuksi, lahel yok taramsi arjulo, “Ne nali phan pot katikipi ayok aneng do?”
Anali anangyok pulo, “Hemphu, halimek hel pachar not.”
Nenglong chineng-otsi, Jisu analiyok mek hel otno. La-amunsi analimek hel thekphak ngo aro anang phel phel duno.
Konam anali Jerusalem adung wango aro Olip anglongpe akung Betphagi arong yok wang hlengsi, laparake Jisu adun bang hiniyok tolsi,
anali yok pulo, “Nali rongpo angoyok dam, aro lalong ijon noselmurep apepe, adomora pen kokne kibi thekdam penpane; anali yok hlone nedung yok wanot.
Inghone bak naliyok pene bak pu tene, nali than, “Hemphu analiyok kanange do aro anang analiyok photsi wanghlo dun pen pane.”
Turki po parasi pot alam kipathan, labang alam kichok ayoksi ladi chiplango,
“Jayon asope yok than, langot, nali rechopo nali dungyok wangsi do, chipabek hopsi noselmurep apepe aro adomora athak, arlusi wang do.”
Adunhel damo aro Jisu lahelyok kithan alam badisi tikilo;
anali noselmurep aro adomorapo yok wano, aro anali thak pehlemo, lamehel athak Jisu arlulo.
Ako-ong chot arat anali pehel duwar athak hlemo aro angkhan ke thengpe arong arohel thu-thusi duwar athak deno.
Rat hel anang ngo-ngo aro anang phel kidun abang hang pono, “Dabhit recho Aso po! pahal nang! pahal nang! Inghosi Hemphu amen pen wangdo bor-eh pado nang! Ethakpe long kidopo pahalnang.”
Konam Jisu Jerusalem lut damo, aro rongpe long arleng hel chibhongsol lo, aro anali pulo, “Anang ingho te?”
Rat hel pulo, “Labang ke Galili kido Najaret arongso para kiwang Jisu turkipo.”
Jisu Arnam ahem lut damo, Arnam ahem kijor aro kinam abangyok mokol pa-ole detno, aro anang nohok kachihole abang anghol hel pen wothum kijor abang anghol helyok harlek phrotno.
Anang analiyok pulo, labadisi wido, “Ne hempo kapingkit ahem pusi puye, manta nalike kanghu hel kachibuti longdangsi inghol phakdo.”
Chotok arleng aro kengkok arleng Arnam ahem along anang dung wango, aro anang analiyok pamelo.
Manta konam bor-bangthe aro kanong paklang hel anang katiki asombhik asal hel, aro “Dabhit po Aso pahal nang!” ladi pusi Arnam ahem kihangsol oso helyok theksi, arju hlongsi anali aneng kango,

aro anali anangyok pulo, “Lamehel pot pu do, nang arjudo ma?” Jisu analiyok pulo, “Oik; nang oso hel yok pachirlilo aro oso aleta hel angho parata khanang kardom pachok peno puke Lo-kangthir long chiporhe hlonghle yong ma?”
Jisu analiyok tikangsi, Bethani arongpe yok olesi damo, aro anang lalong anuwe rilo.
Phiyo adap prang, konam anang rongpe yok wang kachirul amun, anang ingchiro.

Aro anang duwar akung dumuru irong theksi, anang labang adungyok damo, aro ahuwit arwodet detsi aro athe thekthe yongot. Laparake anang bangpoyok pulo, “Nang long moyok athe pawang phakphe nang!” Aro dumuru arong pe lajong jongsi kreng hapmo.
Konam adun hel labang thekngo, anali asombhik hlong detsi pulo, “Dumuru arongpe pot badi jong-jongsi kreng hap mo?”

Jisu analiyok pulo, “Ne naliyok khanangsi thando, nali kroldo pu tene aro ihik-bihik dode tene, dumuru arongpe yok kanghol badi detke kalek, manta labang inglong kartulpe yok ta nali pu, “Holek para ingthur aro langpe long jang damot,” labang ta choknge.
Nang kikrol pen pingkitsi potsi chihang, nang hlonge.”
Konam Jisu Arnam ahem lutdamo, anang lamthe paklangsi kido amun, bor-bangthe hel aro kithe-kiding abang wango aro pulo, “Pot ajakong para lamehel tikido aro labang ajakong ingho nangpilo?”
Jisu analiyok pulo, “Ne ta naliyok lam imung nali arjudo; bangpo neyok nethan, tangsi ne ta pot apharan pensi lamehel tiki do bangpo nali thane.

Johon po baptist daklong parasi kiwang? Ethakpe para ma arleng parasi kiwang? La-amun lahel ihut para ihut lam chirjusi pulo, “Ethakpe para” pusi than nang, tene “piyok anang yok krol-kre yongot?” pusi anang ladi ili puye.
Manta “Arleng para,” pusi punang, tene arleng hel ili kachiphere memedo; piyok pu tene ahuwit ta Johon po ayok ihut turki pusi krolman.”
Lasi anali Jisu yok pulo, “Halike thek the.” Aro la-amun anangta analiyok pulo, “Ladi tene pot apharan pen si lamehel tikido, ne ta nali thanthe.”
“Nali pot chironman? Ihut arleng bang hini sopenso kido aro anang aklengpo adung damsi pulo, “Ei nesopo, damot aro minike rihanthu barik sal tiki dammot.”
Anang pulo, “Ne ke damde” manta bekso aphel anang neng chipharlep si dam phak ngo.
Anang pa po la-adun asopo adung laben thotsi pu damo; aro anang pulo, “Oik dame, pa;” manta anang damde yongot.

Bang-hini adak dak bangpo te anang papo angthin badi tikilo?” Anali pulo, “Akleng po.” Jisu analiyok pulo, ne naliyok khanangsi thando, kalukdar hel aro bang pen kidoner kangho arloso pemar ta nali-ngosi Arnam-alongri ayok dame.

Piyok pu tene Johon Baptist po kadhorom aduwar pensi nali dung wango, layongta nali anangyok krolkre yongot, manta kalukdar hel aro kangho kidoner arloso pemar si anangyok krol duno; nalike bangpo thek-er yongta, aphel kikrol yok nalineng chipharleple yongot.

Jisu pulo, “Kamprek athenghlan isi onenot, ihut rihathu barik kikom lungle ahemphu kido. Anang barikpo gomora komdetsi alang kisor yok tukngo aro tong kemo aro sukunihel yok peksi kamprek alongri yok damo.
Athe kapangrum apor wang kihleng amun, anang bhakpo kihlongyok sukuni kipipo adungyok anang murkiya helyok angtolo.
Sukuni ki-en abang helke anang murkiya hel ihutyok nepcheksi pamo, ihutyok ke mari klakngo aro la ihut yok ke arlong waro.
Aro anang angoyok ke ongchotsi kamprek amurkiya tolo aro analiyok ta anali labenthotsi ingholo.
Kijut amun anang so poyok anali dung tolsi pulo, ‘Ananli neso poyok ke aman paklange.’
Manta sukuni kicho abang aso poyok kithek amun anali abithang adak chipulo, ‘Labang ke ahemphupo aso po, wangot anangyok mari minang aro anang kihlonge abhak ili en nang!’
Lasi anali anang yok nepmo, rihanthu barik apar waro, aro anangyok marilo.
Minonke rihanthu barik ahemphupo wangsi, anang sukuni kipi abangyok pot inghole?”
Anali Jisu yok pulo, “Anang labang sotonghler helyok dul-lak pisi mariye, aro inghosi athe apor atengsi anang bhakpo pi-une, ladi sukuni arideng yoksi barikpo sukuni pi phaknge.”

Jisu analiyok pulo, “Nali lo-kangthir long jatsi porhe hlonghle yongma: ‘Hem kikem abang kanangne arlengpo atok long arlong aghai chiplango; labangsi Hemphu ke tiki do, aro labang ke imek ango konbak asombhik;’
“Lasi ne nali thando, Arnam-alongri nali para pon detne aro athe kiwang ajatyok si piye.
Labang arlongpo athak inghosi jange, anang abeng-ano chiplange, manta ingho athak labang arlongpo jange, anangyok pangjir phrotne.”
Bangthehel pen Pharisi hel anang athenghlan kipu arjusi analiyok anang paphosi pudo pusi atot chihlongo.
Aro anangyok kinepyok awak kilang amun, anali rat abangyok chipherelo, piyok pu tene anali anangyok turki pusi kamainot.
Jisu iphong arleng helyok athenghlan thansi, pulo,
“Ethakpe-alongri poke ihut recho asopo aphan jorme chojun kahonjok pen pachingbar do.
Anang jorme chojun long kapawang aphan anang murkiya helyok pataram damyok tolo manta anali kiwang yok aneng dode yongot.

Phiyo anang prek murkiya helyok tol phaksi pulo, “Kataram abang yok parjupon, langot, ne anithu an-asan kicho honjok ngo, ne chorong aro kangtub klung adomorapo thatno, aro kido kangwe honjok weno; jorme chojunyok wangot.”
Manta anali arjuyongta kaseletsi dam phlungo, ihut ke abithang bitharyok damo, aro ihutke abithang kijor kihrep longyok damo.
Konam angkhan amurkiya helyok nepsi, analiyok arbulo aro mari krengo.
Recho po aneng kang ongo. Anang sonturi hel yok tolo, arleng kamari abang yok pamarilo, aro anali rongpe ta me-pakel detno.
Laparake anang murkiya hel yok pulo, “Jorme ke honjok weno, manta kataram abang kiwang michangche ngo.
Lasi damot, duwarpe along, aro abangten kapochak arleng majit ke jorme chojun yok taram.”
Labang murkiyahel duwarpe along oledamsi aro anali inghoyok kapochak, abangyok kime lale kangho abangyok pangrumo; lasi jorme purli ahem don detsi plengthip mo.
“Manta konam rechopo wangsi don helyok lango, anang lalong ihut arlengyok jorme ape-rik kachi-ik thek hlonghle yongo,
aro anang bangpo yok pulo, “Ei khoi, nang jorme ape chi-ik esi pot badi holek wang lut duno? Aro arlengpo lam ingje thekthe dungo.
Laparake rechopo murkiya hel ayok pulo, “Anangyok ari aro akeng ingnak ngot, aro mokol kangting along tidamot, lalong anang surusi doye aro aso chingkresi doye.
Piyok pu tene kataram arlengke ako-ong, manta karwal arlengke beksodet.”
Laparake Pharisi hel damo, aro anang kiputang alampen ado kapangjang yok lam chihrep mo.

Lasi Pharisi adun hel pen Herodias pe arleng pachiloksi Jisu adungyok tolsi, pathano, “Paklangpo, nang neng kangthirpo, aro khanang pensi Arnam aduwar paklangdo, aro kaiyok ta pherere; piyok pu tene nangke arlengyok ibak detke langle.
Tene hali thantha, nangke pot chirondo. Roman recho Sijar poyok khajana pi-un ma pi-un eh?
Manta Jisu anali kangho angthin than unsi pulo, “Ei nengsik abang, piyokte neyok ahonjat lang do?”
Khajana kipi atanga athengpo nepaklang! Anali tanga athengpo anangyok wan pilo.
Lapara ke anang analiyok pulo, “Labang ke ingho arjan aro amen te?”
Anali pulo, “Roman rechopo.” Laparake Jisu analiyok pulo, “Lasi Sijar po kihlong nange abhakpo ke Sijar po yok pinot, aro Arnam kihlong nange abhak ke Arnam yok pinot.”
Konam anali labang arju hlongo, lahel asombhik hlong detno; aro anali anangyok tikango aro dam phlungo.
La-arni jongsi, inghosi kithi kiburphak ingjong pusi kipuman Saduki hel Jisu adungyok wangsi, anali anangyok isi alam arjusi pulo,
“Paklangpo, arleng ihut aso chibubesi thilo, tene amusopo himepe yok chi-ensi, anangka po aphan aso paplange, Mosi po labadi kanong pilo.
Minon, halidak korte bang thorok isi kido. Aklengpo piso ki-en aro aso chibubesi thilo, anang apiso peyok ke amuso po aphan tikangsi damo.
Laben thotsi amu po pen asitem poyok aro bang thorok-isi yokta chiplango.
Aphel yok ke arloso pe ta thilo.
Tene kithi kibur arni, anang labang bang thorok-isi adak ingho apiso chiplange? Piyok pu tene abangten ta anang penke chi-eno.”
Jisu analiyok pulo, “Nali kipu wangwe yong, piyok pu tene nalike lo-kangthir alam lale Arnam apharan thekthe yong.
Kibur phak arni analike jorme-kachihap weye, lale jorme-pachohap pipe ye, manta ethakpe long kido Arnam tharlonhel badisi doye.
Aro kithi abang kibur phaknge aphan Arnam para naliyok pot kithan,
“Ne lo Abraham po Arnam, Aijak po Arnam, Jakup po Arnam” labang nali chiporhe hlonghle yongma? Anang ke kithi abang Arnam kalek, manta kihreng abang Arnam.”
Aro konam ratmar labangpo arjulo, anali anang kapaklang pomar asombhik hlong detno.
Jisu konam Saduki hel yok padoklip mo pusi Pharisi hel arju hlongo, anali wang chingrum pungo,
aro anali dak ihut, kanong kithekpo, Jisu yok honjat langsi ithe alam arjulo,
“Paklangpo, kanong alongke kithechot alam poke dak bangpo te?”
Jisu anangyok thano, “Nang ahuwit nang thin, ahuwit ajiu, aro ahuwit anengpen nang Hemphu nang Arnamyok nengdok ngot;
Labang si kithechot aro kicheng kanong.
Aro labadisi the-ni long ke ladilo, nang adung arel abangyok nang bithangyok badi nengdok ngot.
La hini kanong longsi kido-kangwe kanong aro turki hel alam chiphosi do.”
Minon ke konam Pharisi hel chingrum pungsi kido, Jisu ke analiyok labang alam arjulo,
“Khristo aphan nali pot te chirondo? Anangke ingho te aso?” Anali anangyok pulo, “Dabhit po aso.”
Jisu analiyok pulo, “Pot badi tene, Dabhit po para anangyok “Hemphu,” pusi jiuli pen nengrungsi thano?”
Aro pulo, “Hemphusi ne Hemphuyok pulo, ne nang hutur helyok nang kengpak arlo bibeleng ke, ne ancho-ari aga iningne do.”
La-apot Dabhit po anangyok “Hemphu” pune taram, tene anang pot badi anangso chiplang une?”
Aro ihut ta anangyok lamthe wol un-eh yongot, aro la-arni para ihut ta lam ithe arju halhe yongo.
Laparake Jisu rat hel aro anang dunhel yok pulo,
“Kanong paklang hel aro Pharisi hel Mosi po anghol long ining do;”
lasi naliyok anali kithan hel tiki aro bangpo mengpon, manta anali katiki badike tiki yek, piyok pu tene anali abithang kithan hel anali bithang ta tiki ke.
Anali kirungpon un-eh kardip abhar ingnaksi arleng hel aphang long batman, manta anali bithang ke ari munso-so ta paklem chetche.
Anali arleng kapathek yoksi anali ahuwit asal tikiman, anali thengkur arik chihom jalsi enman aro anali pe-apre helke akiding.
Anali cho-jun long aman kihlong athemsi neng dokman aro Arnam kachirdom ahem long ta kimechot kangning athemsi aneng dokman,
aro hathi hel along aman paklangsi kardom kipi aro arleng hel analiyok “mastor” pune kipu akime hlongman.
Manta nali “rabbi, mastor po” puke taramek, piyok pu tene nali ahuwit ihut detsi “paklang po” do, aro nali ahuwit ta korte.
Aro pirthimipe long kaiyokta nali “apa” puke taramek; piyok pu tene ihut po, lake ethakpe long kidopo si nali “Apa” do.
Lale “Paklang po” puke taramek, piyok pu tene ihut det paklangpo do, lake Khristo.
Nali dak akithe chotpo ke, nali murkiya chiplange.
Ahuwit inghosi abithang yok parklam anang chipabek hop nange, aro ingho si abithang yok chipabek hopme anangyok patheye.

“Manta nali nengsik kanong paklang aro Pharisi hel, nali kaphere memedo! Piyok pu tene nali ango ethakpe-alongri inghap klakdo; piyok pu tene nali bithang ta lutle aro kilutne abang yokta nali tengklakman.
Ei nali nengsik kanong paklang aro Pharisi hel! nali kaphere meme do; nali himepe hel ahem phatman aro pading hrimsi Arnam kapingkit chipaklang man, lasi nali kithe chot adai chibat hlonge.

“Ei nali nengsik kanong paklang aro Pharisi hel! nali kaphere memedo, piyok pu tene nali ihut arleng Jihudi dhorom kapa-enyok, langpe chirpatsi aro pirthimipe dung arting-worman; aro jai arleng dhorom wang-en dunman, anali yokta bar-ni jom along tolman.
“Ei nali mek-chotok duwar ki-etpon abang, nali pu man te, Arnam ahem otsi hopot cho, tene jat inghohe, manta inghosi Arnam ahem ser along otsi hopot cho, anang hopot kichopo tikipen hlonge.
Ei nali chotok hel! Piyok pu tene ser aro seryok kapangthir Arnam ahem, la hini asitem dak bangpo thechot?
Aro nali pudo, “Inghone bak athuli long otsi hopot cho, tene jat inghohe, manta inghonebak athuli long kipi nibot otsi hopot cho, anang hopot kichopo pachok hlonge.
Ei nali konbak kachotok! Piyok pu tene dak bang te thechot, nibot lale nibot yok kapangthir un athulipo ma?
Lasi ingho athuli long otsi hopot choman, anang athuli long, aro labang athak ahuwit long otsi hopot kicho chokman;
aro inghosi Arnam kangthir ahem otsi hopot cho, anangke lalong kidopo pen hopot choman;
aro inghosi ethakpe amenpen hopot cho, anangke Arnam anghol amenpen hopot choman aro labang ethakpe long kangning ihutpo ayok hopot choman.

“Ei nali nengsik kanong paklang aro Pharisi hel kaphere memedo! Piyok pu tene nali pudina, mosola, jira, lamehel ke Arnam yok kep para isi piman, aro kanong kardip alamthe: bisar-kangthir aro kajinso ar kikrol mehel panung kulo. Labang hel tikangkesi aro katiki nange kido.
Ei nali chotok kipaklang abang! Nali butu ingjang tene archeman, manta mihonghang poyok ke jolman.
“Ei nali nengsik kanong-paklang aro Pharisi hel kaphere memedo! Piyok pu tene senge aro langhan anglangke pangthir man, manta arloke amek alot aro abithang aphan detsi chironman.
Ei nali nengsik kanong paklang aro Pharisi hel kaphere memedo! Ango langhan arlo pangthir, tangsi anglang aga ta ingthire!

“Ei nali nengsik kanong paklang aro Pharisi hel kaphere-memedo! piyok pu tene nali palok phlansi karmil thiri ahilik badi, lamehel anglang ke kilang me-at, manta arlo aga kithi arleng arupe aro ahuwit ajatjat aninik plengthip.
Lasi nalita anglang ke dhorom kangthir paklangdo, manta nali angthin arloke nali nengsik aro pap detsi plengthip si do.
“Ei nali nengsik kanong paklang aro Pharisi hel kaphere memedo! Piyok pu tene nali turki hel aphan ahilik buldo, aro dhorom kangthir hel athiri helyok arje palangme do,
aro nali pudo, Sar-lar hel apor ili kido tene, hali turkihel kamari apor anali pen chilok dundelo hoi.
Ladisi nali turkihel kamari agijing pusi nali bithang hakhi chipiman.
Tene nali sar-lar hel alin chirlinot, laparake, chipachok ngot.
Ei phurul badi angho abi kido abang! Pot badi nali jom long duk-tap para joknge?”

Lasi ne nali dungyok turki hel, kithek-kire arleng, aro kanong paklang yok tolman, nali angkhan yok mariye aro angkhan yok ke kros long tare, angkhan yok ke Arnam ahem long sabuk pen sapme aro rongso para rongso yok nang ujhare,

lasi ado kangwe Hebol po para Barakhiya po asopo Jakhariya apo yok kangthir athem pen athuli asitem nali marilo, anang awi kili pirthimipe athak ahuwit dhorom kangthirhel awi kili ado nali aphuthak wange.
Khanangsi ne nali thando, lamehel ahuwit kamari ado hel labang owepo arleng hel aphuthak wange.

“Turki helyok kamari, aro naliyok wangkitol helyok arlong kiwar ei Jerusalem abang, Jerusalem abang, wope anang awengkong arlo asohel kachikruk pon badi, konbak apor ne naliso helyok kachikom aneng kido, aro nalike wang chinom dunde yongot!
Langot, nali hempo tikangsi nisotjot aro ahuna lo.
Piyok pu tene ne naliyok thando, “Inghosi Hemphu amenpen wangdo anangke bor-eh chokdo, ladine pupe lengke, minon para nali nethek phak hlonghle ye.”
Jisu Arnam ahem tikangsi aro kidam amun, anang adun hel anang dungyok wangsi Arnam ahem arlong kachirhap hel paklangyok adungyok wano.
Laparake anang analiyok pulo, “Nali labang ahuwit thek doma, ma ingjong? Khanangsi ne nali thando, ahuwit wang pasun detne; holek isi arlongta isi athak isi arlong pachirhap ke bibe ye.”

Konam Jisu Olip anglong kartulpe athak iningne kido apor, adun hel jolsi anang dung yok wangsi arjulo, “Lamehel konam chiplange? Aro nang kiwang phaknge, aro labang owe kijut apor asin pot te? Bangpo haliyok thanot.”
Jisu analiyok pulo, “Chilangwen, kaita ta nali pangho ponpe nang.
Ako-ong nemen pen wangsi puye, “nesi khristo,” aro anali ako-ong akangho aga nali pone.
Aro nali dhawa aro dhawa alam kapangjar arju hlonge, manta nali chiphere yek, labang ke chiplang penne, manta ki-or aporke wangwe lang.
Piyok pu tene ason para ason chilareye, aro longri para longri chilareye, aro along alongke akal aro chiklik wange:
Ahuwit labang doye manta duk-tap hel oso kiplang abi kicheng badisi chenge.
Laparake nali nepsi kipam kitheng aduk kipiyok champiye aro mariye, aro ahuwit ason ne men anatsi naliyok sime.
Lapara ke ako-ong arleng kikrol tikangsi inghoye, aro ihut para ihut yok hutur arideng champiye, aro ihut para ihutyok sime.
Aro ako-ong turki asisik hel wang chiklange aro kangho aga pone.
Piyok pu tene kangho arleng hel chan chotne aro ako-ong chot arleng hel nengdok ingsam detne.
Manta inghosi ki-oryok chihisi do ye, anangsi joknge.
Aro labang Arnam-alongri kime-alamthe, ason hel ayok hakhi kipi aphan, pirthepe ajal-dungsi pahar nange aro la-tangsi ki-or wange.

“Lasi ili kapangho kisim meme abihini alamthe Daniyel turki po parasi kapathan, “Kaphere meme kiwang kangho apor nali theknge, anangyok kangthir athem long karjap nali thek hlonge” kachiporhe abang abhu pahlong nang,
lapara ke Judiya long kido abang hel inglong helyok pakat nang;
Hem athak inghosi doye anang hem arlo potdo ki-enyok wang pasunse nang;
inghosi bithar long doye anang cholpo ki-en damyok pawang phakphe nang.
Inghosi apok oso aro aso mok-pachu si doye anali konbak kaphere me-me doye!
Nali kikat kichum apor lale kisang arni kichokche yok pingkit.
Piyok pu tene la-apor ladi kithe aduk-tap doye, lake ladi aduk pirthepe kicheng para minon hok chiplangple yong aro jat chiplangpleye.
Aro labang arnihel alekha pathik chotche tene munusi dungsi jokjelo hoi, manta karwal wen abang anatsi labang arnihel alekha pathi-otne.
“Laparake inghone bak naliyok than tene, “Langot, holeksi Khristo do!” lale “halek do,”— labangpo jatsi krolek.
Piyok pu tene asisik khristo aro asisik turkihel chiklange aro akithe asin aro asombhik asal paklangsi, akangho yok pone, un tene, Arnam karwal abang yokta chobele.
Onenot, ne labang apor ango si nali thano.
“Lasi, anali ke nang than, “Langot, anang ingnam along do,” pu tene oleke damek. Lahel nang than, “Langot! Anang hem arlosi do,” labang yok krolek.
Piyok pu tene suneng kangder amun nihang para ni-chel yok katha-ang det badi Arleng Aso ta labadisi wange.
Dak longsi kithi arangpo doye, lalongsi wo-hungun helta chipangrume.
“Duk-tap aphel jong-jongsi arni ingting klaknge aro chiklota katha-ang pipe ye aro suneng para chiklolangso hel jange aro ethakpe apharan hel hujuk detne.
Lapara ke Arleng Aso asin suneng long chiklange aro lapara pirthimipe long ahuwit ajat hel nengdoho ye, aro anali Arleng Aso inghun long ajakong aro akithe jortang pen kiwang theknge.
Aro anang asi akithesi pongka butsi kataram tharlonhel yok wangtole aro anali phili atok para karwal arleng helyok ethakpe long isi aga para prek agayok wansi pangrume.
“Dumuru arongpe para isi athenghlan chirli: konam anang arwo angjok chingjokngo tene nali phang-oh apor wang hlengo pusi chini un.
Labadisi, konam lamehel abihini nali theknge anang hem owa adung hetno pusi nali than une.
Khanangsi ne nali than do, labang owepo kiprelpre ango si lamehel chiplange.
Ethakpe pen pirthimipe prel detne, manta nelamthe helke prelpre ye.
“Manta labang arni aphan aporpo ihut bakta than un-eh ye, ethakpe atharlon hel aro Aso ta than un-eh, manta Apa detsi than un.
Piyok pu tene Nowa po arni jibadi, labadisi Arleng Aso kiwang amun ta chiplange.
Piyok pu tene ban-alang ango Nowa po, jahaj long karludam arniyok arleng hel kicho kijun, aro jorme pachihapsi kido aro jorme pachihap jongsi kido,
aro analiyok langpon detde lengyok ke lahel jat kithan un-eh, Arleng Aso kiwang amun ta ladi chiplange?
Laparake bang hini arleng bithar long sal tikine kido amun; ihutke pon detne aro ihutke tikange.
Bang hini arloso dhingsal along sok kitok jong amun, ihut pondetne aro ihutke tikange.
Lasi inghongne donot, piyok pu tene nali Hemphu dakbang apor wange, bangpo nali than un-eh.
Manta bangpo abhu hlongot: hem ahemphu kanghu kiwang aporpo kithan untene, anang amek jangjesi do uno hoi aro kanghuta anang hempo lut un-eh lo hoi.
Lasi nalita chihonjok wenne do, piyok pu tene Arleng Aso kiwang aporta nali kachiron un-eh aporsi wange.
“Laparake inghote apor kichok ateng kicho kijun kipithek, jipe murkiya poyok anang ahemphupo anali aphuthak kilangpon phu-phang pekngo, labadi kikrol aro agun kido murkiya po inghote?
Ahemphu po kiwang arni, labang murkiyapo ladi katiki wang thek hlong tene, konbak bor-eh kichokpo!
Khanangsi ne nali thando, anang kido kangwe hem-ret majitke anangyok kapalang aphan biye.
Manta anang akangho murkiyapo ke, anang abithang chirondo, “Ne hemphu kiwang arni dinge,”
aro anangke alok murkiya helyok kipam chengpono aro hor kangri abang pensi chodun aro jundunsi,
konam arni labang murkiyapo kanghonghe, aro konam apor anang than un-eh, ladi apor si anang ahemphupo wange.
Aro anangyok thubongsi, aneng asik abang pen anang kihlong nange abhak pachip me, la amun suru-cher hlonge aro aso chingkre hlonge.
“La-apor sati ame ensi, osopo yok ango kachingden ayok olesi kidam bang-kep osope mar pen ethakpe-alongri pachingbare.
Anali sitem bang-phongo kamango kido, aro bang-phongo ke agun kido.
Konam kamango abangke anali me-lur ki-en amun, anali jangthu agol chi-en-eh yongo;
manta agun pemar ke anali me-lurpen abithang langpong pen jangthu ta chi-eno.
Osopo kiwang abhemdo apot, ahuwit ami-ih wango aro amek jang phril lo.
Manta nuwe jarlo apunsi, “Langot! osopo wang hlengo! Wangot anangyok chingden dam minang,” pusi chihang solo.
Laparake labang ahuwit so-arjang hel ingthuro, aro anali melur hel pakaro.
Ladi apor kamango pemar ke, agun abangyok pulo, “Nali jangthu para bekso hali pinot, piyok pu tene me-lurhel jut rang-rangdo.
Manta agun pemar ke pulo, “Kalek, penebak ke nali phan aro hali phan ayok dorde ye; nali kijor arleng adung damot aro, naliphan chinam damot.”
Aro konam anali kachinam dam amunsi, osopo wang hlengo, aro ingho trepsi kido abangke oso po pen jorme cho-junyok lutdamo; aro inghap hangar klakngo.
Laphel prek so-arjang helta wangsi, pulo, “O Hemphu, O Hemphu, haliyok ingpu pinot.
Manta anang pu phakngo, “Khanangsi ne nali thando, ne nali chinine.”
Lasi inghong dingne do, piyok pu tene labang adin lale aporpo nali than un-eh.
“Piyok pu tene ethakpe-alongri ke ladi ihut arleng badi, te anang turuhel yok taramsi, anang bihini hel lahel arideng champisi, kaholo alongriyok damo.
Anang ihutyok phoro phongo, ihutpo yok phoro hini, la ihutpo yok phoro isi, abangten yokta anang ki-un ateng langsi, nohok pisi anang dam hrolo.
La-amun inghosi phoro-phongo kihlong, anang phot damsi, labang pen chijor-chihrepsi, aro phoro-phongo alapmo.
Ladisi, ingho phoro-hini kihlong, anangta aro phoro-hini alapmo.
Manta inghosi phoro isi hlongo, anang damsi lungle tuksi, anang ahemphu anohokso butisitsi bilo.
Jokha arni ding hrim aphel, la turu hel ahemphupo wangsi, anali pen alekha pachingbaro.
La-amun inghosi phoro phongo kihlong, anang aro phoro-phongo ongchot wansi pulo, “O Hemphu, nang neyok phoro-phongo nekipi; langot, ne aro phoro-phongo alapmo.”
Anang ahemphupo anangyok pulo, akime tikilo, “Akime kikrol murkiyapo, nang beksodet yongta krolthipsi kido, nangyok ako-ong chot puru-hemphu pangninge;” nang hemphupo anengrong long lut dunnot!
Aro inghosi phoro-hini kihlong, anangta wangsi pulo, “O Hemphu nang neyok phoro-hini nekipi; langot ne phoro-hini alapmo.”
Anang ahemphupo anangyok pulo, “Akime tikilo, akime kikrolthip murkiyapo, nang bekso alamta kikrolthip. Nangyok ako-ong puru-hemphu pangninge;” nang Hemphu pen anengrong long lut dunnot.
Laparake inghosi phoro isi kihlong, anang wangsi pulo, “O Hemphu, nang angthin kangtang arleng, bangpo ne than uno; nangke sok ki-eh eh alongsi parotman aro kiripre alongsi sok papangrum man;
lasi ne chipheresi, ne damsi, nang nohok lungle arlo pepsitsi bilo. Holek nang potsi kipi nang chi-en not.
Manta anang ahemphupo pulo, “Ei nang sotonga aro kaselet murkiyapo! Ne sok ki-eh-eh alongsi rot man, aro kiripre alongsi sok pangrumman pusi nang kithan un ma?
Laparake nang ne nohokpo bank along bipon uno hoi, aro ne wangsi kichan anohokso pen ne nohok chihlong detno hoi.
Lasi, anang para nohokpo endetsi, inghosi phoro-kep do, anangyok pinot.
Piyok pu tene ingho dochongdo, anang yoksi pibo, la-amun anang ongchot bo; manta inghosi kangwe, anang potsi do, bangso ta anang para pondet bo.
Kichakche murkiya poyok ke, mokol kangting aju anangyok warnot; lalong surujoye aro aso-chingkre ye.
“Konam Arleng Aso anang jortang pen wange, aro ahuwit tharlonhel anang pen doye, la amun anang jortang anghol athak anang ininge.
Ahuwit ason anang ango pangrume, aro anang khokhrepo bik pen bherabik kabhalek badi anang analiyok ihut para ihut yok bhaleknge,
aro anang bherabik helyok ke ancho-ari aga biye aro bik helyok ke debera aga biye.
Laparake rechopo ancho-ari aga kido abangyok puye, “Wangot, ne Apa abor-eh kihlonge aidot kido abangyok pirthepe kasanse ango para nali phan longri honjok wensi bilo;
piyok pu tene ne kangchir aro nali an nepilo, ne lang-ik aro nali penebak nepajuno, ne ihut don badisi kido aro neyok nali nechingden pamelo,
ne pe-rik kangwe aro nali pe nepa-ikngo, ne kisosi kido aro nali al eno, ne akrol longsi kido aro nali neyok wang lango.
“Lapara ke kadhorom abang anangyok pu ye, “Hemphu, konam te hali nangyok kangchir kitheksi aro nang kapacho hlong kalang-ik aro lang nang kapajun hlong?
Aro hali konam nangyok kachinine adon theksi kapado hlong? Lale pe-rik kangwe theksi, pe nang kapa-ik hlong?
Aro hali konam nangyok kiso nang theksi, lale akrol kithal nang theksi, nang kilangdam hlong?
Aro la-amun rechopo analiyok pu ye, “Khanangsi ne nali thando, nali ne kortehel asitem kibekso yokta pot katiki, bangpo ne phansi katiki.
La-amun anang debera ari aga kido abang yok anang pu ye, “Ei hao kihlong hel, si-ik aro anang tharlon hel aphan kahonjok me-aten dang along nali ne para chiterekne damot;
piyok pu tene kangchirsi kido manta nali an nepipe yongo, ne kalang-iksi kido aro nali lang nepajunje yongo.
Ne don badi kido aro nali netaramre yongo, pe-rik kangwe detsi kido aro nali pe nepa-ik-eh yongo, ne kiso aro akrol longsi kido manta nali ne wang langle yongo.
Laparake analita pu ye, “O Hemphu, konam te kangchir nang kithek hlong, lale kalang-ik, lale don badi, lale pe-rik kangwe, lale kiso, lale akrol long kido, nangthek si al nang-en hlonghle yongo?”
Laparake anang analiyok pu ye, “Khanangsi ne nali thando, lamehel jipe ta akibek chotso yok kirap dun kachikengke poke neyoksi kachikeng ke.
Aro analike ki-or-eh pen aduk kipi ayok tol krenge manta dhorom abangke ki-or-eh len ajiu ayok dame.”
Konam Jisu lamehel ahuwit kipu tango, anang adun hel yok pulo,
“Nali than un, ni-ni aphel ke Kijoktang-kamai doye, aro Arleng Aso yok kros along kitar ayok champiye.”
Lapara ke bangthe hel aro kithe kiding abang hel Kaiphas bor-bangthepo ahem chingrumo,
aro inansi Jisu yok kinep aro kamari ye yok chipangchimo.
Manta anali pulo, “Kamai adak ke ili tiki nangne, piyok pu tene arleng hel adak ahul wange.”
Konam Jisu Bethani rongso long Simon po arje ibeng kiso ahem kido amun ihut arloso pe,
ador-ong kanempru jangthu kiplengsop isi tema ensi, Jisu adungyok wangsi, anang kicho along iningsi kido amun, anang aphu long dungo.
Konam adun hel labang theksi aneng kango aro anali pulo, “Piyokte labangpo panghon do?
Labang kanempru jangthupo jor tene ador ako-ong hlonge, aro kangwe abangyok pi uno hoi.”
Manta Jisu atot hlongsi anali yok pulo, “Piyokte nali arlosope yok aduk pido? Anang akime asalsi ne aphan tikilo.
Piyok pu tene kicho kangwe abangke nalipen arnita doye, manta nali arniten nepen ke dode ye.
Nebang athak kanempru jangthu kidungke anang neyok kipep aphan honjok ngo.
Khanangsi ne nali thando, pirthepe ajaldung daklong labang kime-alamthe pahare, la-amun anang katikipo anangyok neng chipurki ye.”
La-amun bang kere-hini adun asitem, Judas Iskariyot amen ihutpo bor-bangthe hel adung yok damsi pulo,
“Ne nali rideng anangyok champidet tene, neyok pot kipiyok aneng man?” Anali thom-kep rupa tanga atheng anangyok pilo.
Aro la-amun para, anang Jisu yok hutur arideng kichampi yok asek lango.
Kicheng arni Onga Ahim kicho ayok, adun hel Jisu adung wangsi pulo, “Daklong te nang kar-ih ateng Kijoktang-kamai chojun aphan nang honjok pinang?”
Anang pulo, “Rongpe yok damsi ihutpoyok than, ‘Paklangpo pudo, ne porpo adung hetno; ne adun helpen ne nanghem longsi Kijoktang-kamai mainot bo.”
Lasi adun hel Jisu kithan ateng si tikilo, aro anali Kijoktang-kamai cho-jun honjok damo.
Anithu apor Jisu bang kere-hini adun hel pen kicho yok iningo;
aro anali chojongne kido apor, anang pulo, “Khanang ne nali thando, nalidak para ihut hutur arideng nechampi ye.”
Aro anali aneng doho daksi, abangten ta anangyok arjulo, “Hemphu, labang ke “Ne lo ma?”
Jisu pulo, “Ne pen inghosi kicho-asenge along ari jokplupme, anangsi nechampi ye.
Arleng Aso alam lo-kangthir long kiwi ateng choknge, manta jai arleng pensi Arleng Aso yok champiman, anang kaphere meme do! Labang arleng kiplangple detsi, anang phan akime kido.
Anang yok kichampiye Judas po pulo, “Hemphu, labang ke nelo ma?” Jisu anangyok pulo, “Nang khanangsi pulo.”
Anali chojongne kido apor, Jisu him ensi, Arnam yok bor-eh hangsi, ingbengsi, adun hel yok pisi pulo, “Enot, chonot; labang ke nebangpo.”
Aro anang lang-hanpo ensi Arnam yok kardom pisi, analiyok pisi pulo, “Bangpo, nali ahuwit ta junot;
piyok pu tene bangpo lo, ne angtonpo awi, pap hel kiron aphan ako-ong arleng aphan lisi wando.
Ne nali thando, ne Apa alongri long nali pen akimine junje lengke, ne rihanthu athe alang jun phakphe lo.”
Konam anali pingkit alun kilun, anali Olip anglong kartulpe yok olesi damo.
Laparake Jisu analiyok pulo, “Labang anuwe nali netikang detne, labang ke wisi do, “Ne khokhre poyok aduk piye, aro bherabik ajhak kat sal le.
Manta ne kibur phak aphel, naliyok ango ne Galili yok dame.”
Pitor po anangyok pudakngo, ahuwit nang anat aduk hlong yongta, ne ke nangyok jatsi tikangke.”
Jisu anangyok pulo, “Khanangsi ne nangyok thando, labang anuwepe, wopo kiku ango, neyok barthom nang hoi choche ye.”
Pitor po anangyok pulo, “Ne nangpen thidun hlong yongta, ne nangyok chobelbe ye.” Aro adun hel ahuwit ta laben thotsi pulo.
Laparake Jisu Getsemani barik yok adun hel pen damo aro anang anali yok pulo, “Holek iningot, ne halong damsi pingkit bang.”
Aro anang pen Pitor po aro Jebedi po aso bang hiniyok chipono, aro anang aneng doho lo aro angthin ihik-bihik dolo.
Laparake anang anali yok pulo, “Ne thin doho ongdo, holek done neyok inghong ngot.”
Aro ango dam chotsi anang lungle athak parhubaksi pingkitno, “Nang ne Apa, un tene, labang langhan ne para terek pon. La manta, nengthin badike kalek manta nangthin ateng pachok nang.”
La-amun anang dunhel adung wangsi anali amek jangklipsi thekngo aro anang Pitor po yok pulo, “Nali ghonta isita ne-inghong un-eh yongo ma?
Honjat yok ponpe yok, la-aphan pingkit chinghongne do; ajiu long ke ar-ih do, manta a-ok long un-eh.”
Phongni Jisu dam phakngo aro pingkitno, “Nang ne Apa, ne labang junje lengke terek un-eh tene, nangthin atengne pachok nang.”
Aro anang wang phaksi analiyok amek kijangklip wang thek phakngo.
Lasi analiyok tikang phaksi anang phong-thom ayok damo aro labenthot alamsi pingkitno.
Lapara ke anang adun hel adung wangsi analiyok pulo, “Minon hokta nali mek jangklipsi aro sangdo lang ma? Langot, aporpo adung hetno, aro Arleng Aso yok papihel arideng champi tango.
Thurnot, ili dam minang. Langot, neyok kichampi arlengpo wang hleng choro.”
Anang lam kangje jong amunsi bangkere hini asitem ihut, Judas po wango aro bangthe helpen kithe kiding abang anangpen rat ako-ong nokjirpen kalbong-kalthe pa-en repsi duno.
Minon ke kichampi arlengpo analiyok atewa isi pisi pulo, “Ihut yok ne munge bangposi arlengpo; anang yok nepmot.”
Aro Judas po Jisu adung damo aro pulo, “Hemphu, kardomo” pusi anang mungo.
Jisu anangyok pulo, “O khoi, nang holek pot aphan te wangdo.” Laparake anali adung wang chotno aro Jisu yok ari ot thipsi nepmo.
Aro langot, Jisu pen kido arleng hel para ihut anang nokjir olesi bangthepo aturu yok ano isi chor weno.
La-amun Jisu anangyok pulo, “Nang nokjir anang ahomlong thal phakngot. Piyok pu tene inghosi nokjir en-ne, anangke nokjir pensi ore.
Ne Apa yok ne chi-ojor tene aro hajar kere hini yok ong chot sonturi atharlon wang tol pen un-eh ye pusi nali chirondo ma?.
Ladi tene labidi tiki pu tene lo-kangthir long alampo pot badi chok plenge?”
La-apor Jisu rat ayok pulo, “Nali kanghu yok akhep kido badi nokjir pen kalbong-kalthe pensi nekinep yok olesi wangdo ma? Arni-arni ne Arnam ahem long kangning amun paklango manta nali nenepne yongo.
Manta turkihel lo-kangthir long kiwi alamthe kichokpen yoksi ladi chiplango.” Laparake adun hel anangyok tikang detsi kat det no.
La-aphel Jisu yok kinep pon abang, kanong-paklang helpen kithe kiding hel bor-bangthe ka-oneyok ahem inan kachingrum yok pono.
Manta Pitor po bor-bangthepo ahem sotal hlenghle lengke, chipaholo chipaholosi, anang phel-phel duno, aro anang sonturihel pen ining si ki-oryok lang duno.
Bangthehel aro ason amel abang Jisu yok akhep kido anat anali kamaripen yok asisik ahakhi pawan japmo,
manta ako-ong arleng asisik hakhi wanjap mo, yongta anali paklang un-eh yongo. Aphel ke bang-hini angoyok wango,
aro pulo, “Labang arlengpo kipu, “Ne Arnam ahempo pangho det une, aro ni-thom arni ne kem une.”
Bor-bangthepo arjapsi Jisu yok pulo, “Lamehel arleng hel asisik hakhi nang pijap do, te nang ke ithe ta thanthelo ma?”
Manta Jisu dositsi dolo. Laparake bor-bangthe po anangyok pu phak ngo, “Kihreng Arnam amen pen ne nang arju do, nangsi Arnam Aso, Khristo tene hali thanot.”
Jisu anangyok pulo,“Nang bithangsi pulo. Manta ne nang thando, minon parake Arleng Aso yok ancho-ari aga apharan pen ininge aro inghun athak ethakpe para kiwang theknge.”
La-amun bor-bangthepo anang pe ingsek chersi pulo, “Anang Arnam yok patharak do! Piyok ili minon hakhi kanange do? Nali minonsi anang Arnam ayok kapatharak arju hlongo.
Nang bisarpo pot pachipdo? Anali pulo, “Anang kithi pen nange adodo.”
Laparake anang amahang long anali ingthi ingthokngo aro angkhan ke anangyok ardep mo,
aro pulo, “Ei nang Khristo, haliyok turkine thannot! Inghote nangthengo.”
Labang apor Pitor po mokol aga sotal along iningsi kido. Ihut turupe anang dungyok wangsi pulo, “Nang ta Galili arleng Jisu pen kido.”
Manta Pitor po ahuwit ango chobelsi, pulo, “Nang pot pudo, ne abhu hlonghle yong.”
La-aphel anang hem honthukam yok damo apot, prek ihutpe anangyok thekngo, aro anang lalong karjap helyok pulo, “Labang arlengpo Najaret Jisu pen kido.”
Anang chobel phaksi hopot cholo, “Ne labang arleng poyok chinine si.”
Bekso aphel konam arjapsi kido abang wango aro Pitor poyok pulo, “Khanangsi nangta anali sitem ihutpo, piyok pu tene nang kachobel alam asi nang chinido.”
Lalong anang hao pisi aro hopot chosi pulo, “Ne bang arlengpo yok chinine pen. Aro lajongsi wopo kulo.”
La-amun si “wopo kiku angosi, nang neyok barthom chobele,” pusi Jisu kithan, alam Pitor po aneng chipurkilo: Aro anang mokol yok damsi, aneng aduk-ongsi suru ghuk-ghuk ngo.
Konam adap prango, ahuwit bangthehel aro rat asitem kithe kiding abang inansi ado kolsi Jisu yok kamari aphan lam chipangchimo.
Aro anali anangyok bamthipsi pono aro Pilat po arideng champilo.

Konam, hutur arideng kichampi Judas po, akijolsi Jisu yok ado pek hlongo pusi thekngo, lalong anang neng chipharlep mo aro thom-kep rupa tanga atheng ensi bangthe hel pen kithe kiding adungyok woldam phakngo.
Anang pulo, “Ne ado kangwe awi arlengyok champisi ne pap tiki hlongo.” Manta analike pulo, “Hali penke pot te do? Lake nang bithangne chilang ngot.”
Rupa tanga atheng hel Arnam ahem long warsalsi anang damo, aro laparake anang damsi abithang chiweksi thilo.
Manta bangthehel tanga atheng hel humsi pulo, “Labang ke arleng kamari para kihlong anohok apot apuru longke bi-hopot.”
Anali inan chirwal tang aphel, aro anali labang anohok pen bang alongri arleng kipep ayok kumarpo alungle namo.
Labang anatsi mini hok ta “awi alungle” puman.
Laparake Jeremiya turki po parasi kipu, lake “Aro Israyel asohel ihutpo aphuthak ador pachipmo, labang ador kapachip po yok thom-kep rupa tanga atheng eno,
aro Hemphu ke neyok kithan alam badi kumarpo alungle aphan analiyok pilo, kipu alamthe chokngo.”
Minon ke Jisu labang alongri gobornorpo ango parjapmo; aro gobornorpo anangyok arjulo, “Nangsi Jihudi hel Recho ma?” Jisu anangyok pulo, “Nang bithangsi pudo.”
Manta bor-bangthe aro kithe-kiding hel anangyok ado kikol amun, anang itheta pudunde yongo.
Lapara ke Pilat po anangyok pulo, “Anali nang nat konbak ado nang pijap do, mehel nang arjuje yong ma?”
Manta anang itheta anangyok kipupe apotsi gobornorpo asombhik hlong detno.
Kijoktang-kamai kido aphongten gobornorpo akrol long kibeng arleng ihut yok ke rat kihang atengsi hloman.
La-apor lalong kangho chot arleng Barabas amen pusi ihut akrol long kido.
Lasi konam anali kachingrum aphel, Pilat po analiyok pulo, “Ne nali phan ingho yok te kapajokpi aneng do, Barabas poyok ma, ma Khristo kipu Jisu yok?”
Piyok pu tene anali amek kachiso anatsi Jisu yok kichampi pusi Pilat po kithan un.
Konam Pilat po bisar anghol long iningo, anang pisope lam imung hloduno,“Dhorom arlengpo alam long nang aduk kipinange ingjong, piyok pu tene tuwe nepharlo long anang natsi duk-hap hlongo.”
Minon ke Bangthe hel pen kithe kiding abang, ratyok lam chutsi Barabas poyok hlosi Jisu yok kamari yok pahang tolo.
Gobornorpo analiyok arju phakngo, “Bang hini adak ingho bangpoyok te naliphan nepajok tol nali anengdo?” Aro anali pulo, “Barabas po yok.”
Pilat po analiyok pulo, “Tene Khristo kipu Jisu yok pot te inghol nang? Anali ahuwit ta pulo, “Anangyok kros long tarnot.”
Laparake anang arjulo, “Piyok te, anang pot akangho tiki lo?” Manta anali ahuwit “anang yok kros long tarnot!” pusi hang chot chotno.

Lasi konam Pilat po anang kapajok nge kiron ayok ke ahul wangcheng chot-chot theksi, anang bekso lang ensi, aro rat ango ari chichamsi pulo, “Labang arlengpo kamari yok ne ado en-eh, labang ke nali bithang ado enot.”
La-amun ahuwit rat dungsi pulo, “Anang wi haliyok aro hali sohel aphuthak padonang.”
La-amun anang anali phan Barabas po yok pajokngo aro Jisu yok ke sabuk pen sap sapsi anang yok kros long kitar yok pekngo.
Laparake gobornorpo asonturi hel Jisu yok hem arloyok pono, aro anali sonturi alokjor hel anangyok komwolsi eno.
Anali anangpe hel phlok detno aro aki-er arohon ape anangyok pa-ikngo,
aro laparake anali anang phu athak ingsu phurkup otesi pa-ikngo. Ananli Jisu ancho-ari long tokok ihong pilo aro anang ngot tarhukngo aro “Jihudi hel Recho, aju pading nang” pusi chongnek ngo.
Anali anangyok ingthi ingthokngo, aro tokok eno aro anang phu long pamklango.
Anangyok chongnek tang aphel, anali anangpe aki-er so phlok detno aro anang abithang apehel pa-ik phakngo. Laparake anangyok kros long kitar ayok pono.
Anali olene kidam amun, Simon amen Sairene arleng ihutyok hlongo; anali bangpo arlengpo yok Jisu para kros parung pon tolo.
Aro konam anali Golgotha (lake aphu akhorlop) kipu athempo yok wango,
anali anangyok athe pen akiho alang paloksi tungo; manta konam labang wetno, anang junje yongo.
Aro konam anali Jisu yok kros athak taro, la amun anali anang pe hel analidak akorom chilangsi chithak detsi eno.
laparake anali lalong ining repmo aro anangyok lang phrongsi dolo.
Aro anang aphutang long anang yok ado-kikol alam, “Anang Jihudi arecho Jisu” ladi wisi tar duno.
Laparake bang hini kanghu, ihut ke ancho-ari aga aro ihutke debera aga anang pen kros long tarduno.
Inghosi duwar kidam abangke aphu chihujuk-chihujuksi, Jisu yok ingthi ingthoksi patharak ngo,
aro pulo, “Nang Arnam ahem pangho phrotsi nithom det kikem detne po nang bithang chiral! Nang Arnam Aso tene kros para wangsun.”
Ladi mat-matsi bangthe hel pen kanong paklang hel aro kithe kiding abang, anangyok chongneksi, pulo,
“Bang helyok anang ral unman; manta anang bithangyok ke chiral un-eh. Anangsi Israyel Recho; anang kros para minon wang pasun nang, aro hali anangyok krole.
Anang Arnam yok kroldo; aneng do tene, minon Arnam anangyok paral nang; piyok pu tene anang kipu, “Ne ke Arnam Aso.”
Anang pen kros long kitar kanghu helta anangyok laben thotsi patharakngo.
Anelo sitem dut-dut amun, ghonta kithom apunyok longri dungsi ingting klaksi kido.
Aro baji kithom bak apun Jisu suru hang-wongsi pulo, “Eli Eli, lema Sabachthani?” Labang alam poke, “Ne Arnam, ne Arnam, nang piyok netikang detno?”
Konam angkhan arjapsi kilangdun abang labangpo arjulo, anali pulo, “Langnot, anangke Elija po yok taram do.”
Lajongsi anali sitem ihutke katno aro pe kangduk icher ensi akithor alang long nimo aro dharim ihong alon along labang bamsi anangyok wetno.
Manta kamprek helke pulo, “Inghong ngot, Elija po wangsi anangyok angrale ma angralre ili lang sonang.”
Laparake Jisu phongni yok suruphak si hang-wongo aro anang ajiu achithe oro.
Labang amunsi, Arnam ahem kihing pachi-ar klak ape athak para aling yok, bhak-ni chingsek phleno. Chiklik wango, aro arlong helta inghango.
Aro thiri ahilik hel chingpulo, aro kangthir abang kithi kibi arang pomar ako-ong burphakngo.
Anang kipep ahilik para kiburphak aphel anali kithi ahilik para olelo, aro kangthir Jerusalem rongpe yok damo, aro ako-ong arlengyok ango chiklango.

Minonke konam phoro isi sonturi aghaipo aro anang pen Jisu yok honsi kido, aro alok hel, labadi chiklik hel aro ajat jat kachiplang theksi, anali chiphere detno, aro pulo, “Khanangsi labang arlengpo Arnam Aso kido.”
Lalong ako-ong arlosohel, Jisu yok al-poson ensi, Galili para anang phel-phel kiwang, mehel ahuwit arloso akaholo para lang phrongsi kido.
Analidak Mary Megdalini pe, Jems po aro Jusep po anang ai Mary pe, aro Jebedi po aso bang hini anali aipe mar kido.
Anithu amun, Jisu adun kachiplang Arimathiya arong para Jusep amen ihut hem-kime arleng wango.
Anang Pilat po adungyok damo, aro Jisu abangpo hango; laparake Pilat po anangyok papitol yok thano.
Lasi Jusep po anang abangpo eno aro linen asut ape ipak pen pero,
aro anang akimi ne kanghol kipep arlong holungsi kituk ahilik long abangpo bilo. Anang laparake akithe arlong iplang pen thiri amahang bang klaksi bilo aro dam phlungo.
Mary Megdalini pe aro kamprek Mary pe kipep ahilik long chimahang phrongsi lalong iningsi kido.
Phiyo arni, lake, Kachihonjok-arni aphel arni kido, bangthehel pen Pharisi hel Pilat po ango chingrum damo,
aro pulo, “O kithepo, hali neng kachipurki alamthe ke kachobelpo Jisu hrengsi kido apor kipu, “Ne ni-thom aphel wang burphaknge.”

Lasi ni-thom akhap arniyok thirilong kapahon tolyok thanot; lale tene, anang adun hel dame aro anangyok chinghu pon detne, aro “Anang kithi para bur-phakngo” pusi rat ayok than dame, labangsi ango kachobel yok ke aphelsi kachobelsi ingho chotbo.”
Pilat po analiyok pulo, “Nali ikhel kihon sonturihel enot; damot, nali ki-un ateng pahon tolnot.”
Lasi anali sonturipen damo, aro thiripo arlong aplangpo along asap pamsi sonturi helyok pahonsi bilo.
Kisang-arni aphel, kicheng hathi-arul arni adap prang kangting rim-rim apor, Mary Megdalini pe aro kamprek Mary pe thiri ahilikpo kilangyok damo.
Aro langot, chiklik aghai wango; piyok pu tene Hemphu atharlon ihut, ethakpe para wang sunsi, wango aro arlong aplangpo pakonglongo, aro labang athak iningo.
Anang mahangpo suneng kabarlang badi kido, aro anang kachi-ik apehel ingphet badi lok phlan.
Piyok pu tene kihon abang anang yok phere ongo, aro abang klem detsi kithi arlengmat chiplango.
Manta tharlonpo arloso helyok thano, “Nali phere yek; ne than undo, nali kros long kithi Jisu yok lang-wor do.
Anang holek ingjong; piyok pu tene anang jibadi kipu, labadisi thuro. Wangot, anangyok kibi athem wang langot.

Laparake dam sirakngot, aro anang adun hel yok labang alam thanot, “Anang kithi para burphak ngo; aro langot, anang nalingo si Galili yok dam jongsi do; lalong nali anangyok thek hlonge; langot, labangke ne naliyok kapahar alam thano.”
Lasi anali kaphere pensi aro aneng arong ongsi thiri ahilik para parjangwet si damo aro anang adun hel yok kat katsi kithan yok damo.
La-amun photsi, Jisu analiyok chiklango aro pulo, “Nali pen nengsam pado nang.” Aro anali anang dungyok wango, anang keng otno, aro anangyok chirdomo.
Laparake Jisu analiyok pulo, “Phere yek; damot, aro ne-korte hel Galiliyok padam tol alam than damot, lahel lalong neyok thek hlonge.”
Konam anali dam jongsi kido amun, angkhan kihon abang rongpeyok damo aro bangthe hel yok kido kangwe kachiplang hel thandam detno.
Kithe kiding helpen sar-lar hel chipangrum mo, anali bod-sere chirhepsi sonturi helyok nohok ako-ong pilo,
analiyok pulo, “Hali mek kijang amunsi, anang adun hel anuwe wango, aro anangyok chunghu si pon detno,’ ladi pune thanot.”
Labang alam gobornorpo arjuhlong, tene hali anangyok padok nge aro naliyok phere-sohrim nali pangweye.”
Lasi anali nohok eno aro anali kapathan badisi tikilo. Aro labangpo atomo Jihudi hel asitem chitha-angsi, minihok do.
Minon ke bang kere-isi adun hel Galili along, inglong kartulpe yok kidamyok Jisu kithan apot lalong yok damo.
Konam anali anangyok thekngo, anali anangyok chirdomo; manta angkhan ke kikrol ahik-hak dolo.
Aro Jisu adungyok wango aro analiyok pulo, “Ethakpe pen pirthimipe athak long ahuwit apharan neyok nepilo.
Lasi damot, aro ahuwit asonyok adun otenot, analiyok Apa, aro Aso aro Jiuli-Kangthir amenpen baptist otenot,
aro ne naliyok pot thano, lamehel ahuwit kamainot yok analiyok paklangot. Aro nengchipari, ne owepo kijut arniyok, nalipen arnita do dunne.”
Kime-alamthe kicheng ke Arnam Aso, Jisu Khristo.
Jisoya turki po alo long labadi wido, “Langot, ne ahara po ayok tole, anangsi nang phan duwar honjoknge;
Ingnam aju kihang-wong asi kipi alam ke ladi: Hemphu aduwar chihonjok, anang duwar long kidam pakeng.”
Labadisi ingnam along baptist ka-ote po, aro pap kikol aphan neng chipharlep si baptist kachiplang alamthe kaparjupon Johon po wango.
Aro ajaldungsi Judiya alongri pen ahuwit Jerusalem arleng hel anang dung damsi, abithang apap pomar hoichosi anang parasi Jordan langjonpe long baptist chiplango.
Minon ke Johon po mihonghang amel ape pensi kachi-ik aro amicheng long areng pen ringkok kachikok aro anang long-chupur pen ingnam piyo alang helsi kicho.
Anang paharsi pulo, “Neyok jakongchot po nephel wangsi do. Anang keng-op arik chingkuk si kiphlok yokta ne michangche.
Ne naliyok lang pen baptist otelo, manta anangke Jiuli-Kangthir pen baptist nali ote ye.”
Labang arnike Jisu Galili alongri ahol Najaret para wangsi, Johon po parasi Jordan langjon along baptist chiplango.
Aro anang lang para thursi kiwang amun, inghun chibhalaksi, aro Jiuli yok ijon wothum badi anang phuthak sunsi kiwang thekngo.
Aro labang ethakpe para lamthe wango, “Nang nenengdok Aso; nanglong neneng ingsamdo.
Aro la-amunsi Jiuli po anangyok ingnam ajuyok ponhrolo.
Anang ingnam ajulong angkol-hini adinyok si-ik para hongjat kipon; aro anang ingnam okpe helpen kido; aro ethakpe atharlon hel anangyok al-eno.
Minon ke Johon po yok kinep aphel, Jisu Galili alongri damsi, Arnam kime-alamthe paharo,
aro pulo, “Apor po chokngo, aro Arnam-alongri adung hetno; neng chipharlep mot, aro kime-alamthe long krolnot.”
Jisu Galili langpe akung kung kidam jong apor, Simon po, pen anang muso Andriu po yok, langpe along lan kiwarjong thekngo— piyok pu tene anali ok kirhi arleng kido.
Aro Jisu analiyok pulo, “Ne phel wang dunot, aro ne naliyok arleng kirhi arleng ote ye.”
Aro jongsi anali lanhel tikango, aro anang phel-phel duno.
Anang bekso akaholo damsi, anang Jebedi po aso Jems po pen anang amuso Johon po yok thekngo; anali tilong athak lanhel pademsi kido.
La-amunsi Jisu analiyok taramo; aro anali abithang apo Jebedi po yok sal-katiki arleng hel pen tilong along tikango, aro anang aphel duno.
Anali Kaparnaum yok damo; aro anang konam kisang-arni wanghlengo, anang Arnam ahem lutdam aro lamthe paklango.
Anali anang kapaklangpo arleng hel asombhik hlong detno, piyok pu tene anang kanong-paklang hel badike kalek aro ihut apharan kido badisi analiyok paklango.
Lalongsi laparake anali Arnam ahemlong si-ik kihap ihut arleng kido,
aro anang hangwongsi pulo, “Ei nang Najaret Jisu, nang halipen pot asal do? Nang hali yok kapangho yoksi wango ma? Nang inghosi neke than undo, nang ihut Arnam Kangthir po.
Manta Jisu anangyok tamsersi pulo, “Dositne do, aro anang para wang ole!”
Aro la si-ik ajiu, anangyok huweng retno aro klem phlak phlaksi pahang-wongsi, anang para wang olelo.
Anali ahuwit asombhik hlong, aro anali sitem ihut para ihutyok chirju prupsi pulo, “Bang po ke pot te? Isi akimi paklangdo— Anang si-ik yokta apharan pen thando, aro anali ta anangyok mengdo.”
La-amun jongsi Jisu katiki amen-anang Galili ahol chitha-ang detno.
Anali Arnam ahem para wang-ole penpan, Jems po aro Johon po pen, Simon po aro Andriu po ahemyok lut damo.
Minon ke Simon po anipe asesi ihlapsi kido, aro anali la-amunsi anang lam Jisu yok pulo.
Jisu adungyok wango, aro anangyok ari-otno aro pangthuro. Laparake anang long ase ham detno, aro arlengpe analiyok al-eno.
La-arni anithu, arni chelo apot, arleng hel ahuwit kiso-kilak lale si-ik kihap helyok anang dungyok wano.
Aro rongpe long ahuwit arleng hem owalong wang chingrumo.
Aro anang ajat-jat kiso hel pamelo, aro anang ako-ong si-ik ujharo; aro anang si-ik helyok lamthe pathan hlonghle yongo, piyok pu tene anali anangyok chini uno.
Adap prang, ingting rim kido amun, anang ingthuro, aro nisot-jot athem yok damo, aro anang pingkitno.
Aro Simonpo aro anang alokjor hel anang phel duno.
Konam anali anangyok pahlongo, anali anangyok pulo, “Abangten nangyok nang bisardo.”
Anang pulo, “Ili adung arel kido prek-prek rongso helyok damsonang, ladisi ne lalong ta lamthe pahar nange; piyok pu tene la aphansi ne olesi wango.”
Aro anang ahuwit Galili alongri damo, anali kachirdom ahem hel artingsi lamthe paharo, aro si-ik helyok ujharo.
Ihut arje ibeng kiso Jisu adung wango, aro anang angot tarhuksi Jisu yok pulo, “Nang aneng do, tene nang neyok pangthir une.”
Kajinso wangsi, Jisu ari-jongsi anangyok otno aro anangyok pulo, “Ne aneng do; ingthir phlen not.”
Lajongsi arje ibeng kiso damo, aro anang ingthirsi melo.
Aro Jisu anangyok than klaksi, la-amunsi anang yok tolpen pano,
anang pulo, “Chilang, kaiyok ta jat thanek; manta damot, nang bithang bangthepo ayok chipaklang damot, aro analiyok hakhi kipi aphan, Mosi po kithan badi kachipangthir aphan, nibot pidamot.

Manta anang olesi damo aro neng wak phlensi thanno aro ladi lamthe pachitha-ang pono, la-amun Jisu rat ango chiklangke isi arong along lutdam un-eh si, mokol along nisot-jot athem long dolo; aro labang angbong arleng chikomwolsi anang dung yok wango.
Konam angkhan arni aphel Jisu Kaparnaum yok dam phakngo, anang hem longsi do pusi arjulo.
La-an rat ako-ong chingrumo apot, owa amahangyok, anghor wedet no; la-amun anang analiyok kime-alamthe paharo.
Laparake angkhan arleng, lake bang-phili arleng chirchongsi ihut atot kangwe kiso po yok anang dungyok wano.
Aro konam anali Jisu kido hem arloyok wan un-ehsi rat kitan-ong anat, anali sarnuk tereksi aro awak otesi, atot kangwe kisopo ki-ih atar pen pasuno.
Konam Jisu anali kikrol thekngo, anang atot kangwe kisopo yok pulo, “Ei oso po, nang pap rontango.”
Minon ke lalong kanong paklang abang iningsi kido, anali angthin long chirwalsi pulo,
“Piyok labang arleng po ladi alamthe pulo? Arnam yoksi patharak do! Manta ihutdet Arnam aparke ingho pap ron unman?
Lajongsi Jisu ajiuli long anali dak ladi kachirwal atot chihlongo; aro anang lahelyok pulo, “Piyok nali ingthin long ladi chirondo?
Atot kangwe kisopo yok kipu, dak bangpo te kajalso chot, nang pap ron tango; lale “Thurnot, aro nang tar chi-olnot aro akeng chijornot?
Manta pirthimipe long pap kiron unyok Arleng Aso apharan do,” bangpo nali chini unyok— anang atot kangwe kisopo yok pulo—
“Ne nangyok nang thando, thur not, nang tarpo chi-olnot, aro nang hemyok damot.”
Aro anang thuro, aro parjangwet si tarpo chi-ol pono aro anali ahuwit ango dam phlungo; la-amun ahuwit asombhik hlongo aro Arnam ayok jortangpo pilo, pulo, “Hali labadi jatsi thek hlonghle yong!”
Jisu langpe akungyok olesi dam phakngo; rat athawolsi anang dungyok wango, aro anang lahel yok lamthe paklango.
Anang damjongsi kido apor, Alphayus po aso Lebi po yok, khajana ki-en ahem iningsi kido thekngo, aro anang anangyok pulo, “Ne phel-phel wang dunot.” Aro anang thuro aro anang phel-phel duno.
Aro anang Lebi po ahem anethu an-asan kichoyok iningo, la-amun ako-ong kalukdar aro papi arleng, anang aro adun hel pen iningo— piyok pu tene lahel ako-ong arleng anang phel-phel kidun.
Konam anang papi aro kalukdar helpen kicho thek duno, la-amun Pharisi hel aro kanong paklang abang Jisu adun helyok pulo, “Kalukdar aro papihel pensi anang piyok cho-jun dunman?”
Jisu labang arjusi analiyok pulo, “Akime arleng hel ojha nangne, manta kisohel aphansi; ne dhorom kangthir abang aphan ke wangwe yong, manta papi yok kataram aphansi wangdo.”
Minonke Johon po adun hel aro Pharisi hel ke an-kihum; aro arleng hel wango aro Jisu yok pulo, “Johon po adun pen Pharisi adun hel ke an-humman, manta piyok te nang adun helke an humhe?”
Jisu analiyok pulo, “Jorme-pachihap long don hel oso po analipen kido amun anali an-hum unman ma? Konbak arniyok oso po analipen kido jong alengke, anali an-hum un-eh.
Manta ladi arni wange konam Oso po yok anali sitem para pondetne, la-arni anali an-hume.
“Kaita aban ape athakpe akimi bang-tunte; ladine inghol tene, aban po yok pangrak pon phlene, lake akimi pe abeng aban ape yok pangrak phlenman, aro la-amun ingrak chot-chotman.

Aro aban areng amathi long akimi ahor kaita bibe; bi yongta, horpo la arengyok pangbop phunne, aro la-amun hor po alang aro arengpo inghon detne; manta hor akimi ke akimi thon areng amathi longsi thalman.”
Inirsi kisang-arni bithar asitem kidam jongsi kido; aro damjongsi kido amun anang adun hel sok ingphrum ponhilo.
Pharisi hel Jisu yok pulo, “Langot, kisang-arni potsi katiki hopot bangposi lahel piyokte tiki do?”
Aro Jisu analiyok pulo, “Dabhit po konam anang aro anang alokjor hel an-kangchir aro an kanange kido, labang alam chiporhe hlonghle yongma?
Konam Abiyathor po bor-bangthe kido amun, aro anang Arnam ahem lut damsi, bangthe hel apar ke, kaita kicho-hopot Arnam yok kangton ahimpo cholo, aro alokjor helyok ta pilo.”
Laparake Jisu analiyok pulo, “Kisang-arni munusi aphansi ingholo, munusi ke kisang arnipe aphanke kalek;
la-apotsi Arleng Aso si kisang-arni aphanta ahemphu lo.”
Jisu Arnam kachirdom ahem long lutdam phakngo, aro lalong ari atot kangwe arleng ihut kido.
Anali Jisu yok kisang-arni pame unma un-eh ma pusi anangyok ado kipiyok, anang yok lang dun phrong ngo.
Aro anang la ari atot kangwe arlengpo yok pulo, “Amahang wang arjap mot.”
Laparake anang analiyok pulo, “Kisang-arni ke kime asal katiki yok, ma kangho asal katiki yok, arleng pahreng aphan ma, ma kamari aphan?” Manta anali doklipsi dolo.
Jisu anali angthin kangtang hel anat neng dohosi; aneng thisi chikomwelsi analiyok lang si, labang arleng poyok pulo, “Nang aripo pakengot.” Anang ari pakengo, aro labang aripo medetno.
Pharisi hel olesi damo, aro Herodiya pe arleng pen la-amunsi chingrum penpansi pot badi Jisu yok adopisi mari une labang alamthe chipangchimo.
Jisu abithang adun hel pen langpepe akungyok damo; aro Galili para, aro Judiya parata rat ako-ong anang phel-phel duno;
Jerusalem, Idumiya, Jordan langjon apar aga parata, Tayar pen Sidon rongpe adung arleng ako-ong anang katiki ahuwit alam arjusi, anang dungyok wango.
Rat hel chidol hur-har hlonghle yok, tilong isi anang dung kahonjok yok, anang adun helyok thano;
piyok pu tene anang ako-ong arleng yok kapame apot, bet ki-un ahuwit arleng anangyok ki-ot ayok chidol rul-ralsi kido.
Konamsi si-ik hel anangyok kithek, mehel anang ngo krep-phrilsi hangsolsi pulo, “Nang ke Arnam Aso!”
Manta Jisu si-ik helyok anang ingho, labang pachitha-ang hlonghle yok than klakngo.
Jisu inglong kartulpe long damo, aro inghoyok anang anengo analiyok taramo, aro anali anang dungyok wango.
Aro anang pen anali kidoyok, ingho yok kangthir adun amen bilo, aro kime-alamthe kapahar aphan kitol ayok anang bang kere-hini ayok arwalo,
aro anali si-ik hel ka-ujhar apharan kipi ayok arwalo.
Lasi anang bang kere-hini pachakngo: Pitor (ladi kataram amen, Simon kibi);
Jebidi po aso Jems po, Jems po amuso Johon po (la bang-hiniyok Bonargos, lake suneng-kangder asopo pusi kataram amen bilo);
aro Andriupo, aro Philip po, aro Bartholomiu po, aro Mothi po, aro Thomas po, Alphayus po aso Jems po, aro Thadeyus po, aro Simon Kananiya po,
aro Jisu yok hutur arideng kichampi Judas Iskariyot po, labang bang kere-hini yok anang pachakngo.
Laparake anang idon ahem ayok lut damo;
aro labadi rat akithe chingrum phakngo, lasi anali kicho yok apor pahlonghle yongot.
Konam anang hem abang labang arju hlongsi, “Anangke ingcham chipharlo do” pusi kinep ponyok damo.
Aro Jerusalem para kiwang adhok kanong paklang hel pulo, “Anang longke si-ik arecho Belsabul po do, aro la si-ik arecho parasi anang si-ikyok ujharman.
Aro la-amun Jisu analiyok anang dung taramsi athenghlan pensi lam thano, “Si-ik ajiu ke si-ikyok pot badi ujhar un?”
Dakne bak alongri isi abithang adak chilang set-set tene labang alongri chirjap un-eh.
Aro dakne bak ahem bang chilang set-set, tene labang ahem chirjap un-eh ye.
Aro si-ik hel abithang adak chingthursi chilang set-set, labang ta aro chirjap un-eh, manta lahel orsi wangman.
Manta ajakong kido poyok ango bambe tene, kaita anang hem lut dam ke anang bihini chunghupon un-eh; kangnak aphelsi anang hem abihini hel chunghupon det une.
“Khanangsi ne nali thando, munusi asohel apap aro Arnam yok kapatharak alam kangje ahuwit apap ron une;
manta inghosi Jiuli-Kangthir yok patharaknge, anangyok ke jatsi ronpi un-eh ye, manta anangke or-eh len apap ado doman”—
piyok pu tene anali kipu, “Anang long si-ik akangho do.”
Laparake Jisu anang ai pen amusohel wango; aro mokol arjap phrongsi, anang dung tolo aro pataram damo.
Isi rat anang dung komwolsi iningsi kido; aro anali anangyok pulo, “Nang aipe, nang muso aro nangjir hel mokol along do, nangyok nangtaram do.”
Aro Jisu pu phakngo, “Ne aipe aro ne-korte hel ke ingho te?”
Aro anang dung chikomwol si kangning abangyok langsi, anang pulo, “Holek si ne aipe aro nemuso hel do!
Piyok pu tene inghosi Arnam kar-ih alam mainot pone, nemuso, aro ingjirpe, aro ne aipe ta anali lo.”

Anang langpe akung damsi paklangpon phakngo. Lalong la-an ako-ong arleng anangdung long wang chingrumo, anang langpe long isi tilong along arlusi iningo; aro la ahuwit arleng langpe adung bam alongsi dolo.
Anang pathenghlan si analiyok ako-ong alamthe paklang ponhilo, aro anang kapaklang amun analiyok pulo:
“Onenot! ihut amu kirippo chili amu kiripyok olesi damo.
Aro anang kiripjong akosi, adhok achili amu ke duwar akung jang damo; aro wohel wango aro chongthok det no.
Kamprek chili amu ke lungle kang-ar kido longsek athak jango aro lunglepo karthakthe apotsi, arong wangdapmo.
Aro konam arnipe wango, la-amun phang-oh ongsi, angkur kidam un-eh apot si, kreng hapmo.
Kamprek chili amu ke ingsu aju jangdamo, lalong ingsu arong hel thesi anangyok sok arong hel jol detno, aro athe wang un-eh yongot.
Kamprek chili amu ke akor kido lungle athak jangdamo, aro arong wango, aro arongpe thelo, aro ahrong dingo, aro sok akok polong athe wango, aro thom-kep, aro kep thorok, aro phoro isi athe wango.”
Aro anang pulo, “Nali ano do tene one-not!”
Konam Jisu ahudet kido, anang alokjor helpen bang kere-hini adun abang anangyok chikomwol si athenghlan hel aron meso arjulo.
Aro anang analiyok pulo, “Naliyok Arnam-alongri kabutisit acho alamthe nali pido, manta ingho mokol along do, ahuwit abihini athenghlan along wang phrotman:

Labang hel aphan, “anali thek ke theknge, manta chiron un-eh ye, aro karju ke arjuye, manta abhu hlonghle ye, aro pene bak ke nali chirul phaksi wang, aro anali pap ronpi ye, la-anat anali ngot ahuwit alam athenghlan pensi analiyok thando.”
Aro anang analiyok pulo, “Nali labang athenghlan abhu hlonghle yong ma? Laparake ahuwit athenghlan pot badi abhu hlonge?
Labang amu kirip arleng po lamthe ripman.
La mehel ke duwar akung kirip chili amu helo, ingho yok lamthe ripman, konam anali oneman, si-ik jongsi wangman aro anali long kirip alamthe kharpon detman.
Aro ladisi arlong athak kirip chili amupo: konam arleng hel lamthe oneman, anali jongke aneng arongsi chidengman.
Manta anali bithang angkur kangwe anat, aro anang bekso arni yoksi chihiman; laparake, konam lamthe anat aduk-tap, lale honjat wang, jongsi anali lamthe tikang det man.
Aro kamprek amupo mar ke ingsu ajulong ripmo: anali ke, ingho lamthe oneman,
manta pirthepe yok nengpi-ongsi, aro lungle-phalang palorsi, aro boi-bihini alop wango, aro lamthe jol detman, aro athe paklang un-eh yongot.
Aro akime alungle long kirip chili amupo anali ke: anali lamthe arjuman aro mehel chideng man, aro thom-kep, aro kep-thorok aro phoro-isi athe wangman.”
Anang analiyok aro pulo, “Me-lur isi gosa athak bibesi, ho arlo lale ki-ih ahong arlo biman ma?
Piyok pu tene paklang si kibi aparke, isi abihini bisitse yong; lale patha-ang si kibi aparke, isi abihini butisit ke bibeyong.
Inghone bak karju ano do pu tene onenot.”
Aro anang anali yokta pulo, “Nali potsi arju man bangpo nengpine one-not; nang kipi alin atengsi nangyok ta alin pachirline, aro layongta ongchot nangpiye.
Piyok pu tene ingho long do, anangyok ongchot pibo; aro ingho beksota wedung, anali pot dochokdo, anang rideng para ponpi detne.
Anang aro pulo, “Arnam-alongri poke ihut arlengpo lungle athak chili amu kiripsal badi,
aro amek jange aro thure, anuwe aro anelo, aro chili arong ingbobme aro the-dinge, bang po pot badi chiplang anang chithan un-eh.
Pirthimipe abithangsi, ango ke arwo-pawang man, laparake arong ahrong pawang man, bangpo aphel ke apum, la aphel sok athe-amu pawang man.
Manta sok konam athe mene, jongsi nok-ke ensi dame, piyok pu tene sok kirot apor wang hlengo.”
Anang pu pono, “Pot pen te ili Arnam-alongri pangbar une, lale pot athenghlan pen ili pachiklan pon une?
Bangpo ke isi jamu amu badi, bangso, konam lungle long ripme, pirthimipe athak ahuwit amu yok akibek chot;
yongta konam labangso ripme, aro ahuwit bap arongyok thechotman, aro arorem wangman, lasi suneng kangjar awohel labang aben long atar chihorman.”
Labadisi ako-ong athenghlan pensi, Jisu anali ka-one un aleng analiyok bangpo alamthe thano;
anang athenghlan kithan aparke ke, anali yok isita thanthe yongot, manta anang abithang adun hel yok ahudetsi ahuwit alamthe mesosi than dakngo.
Labang arni, konam anithu apor wang hlengo, anang analiyok pulo, “Ili langpe ha aga apar damsonang doh.”
Aro rat ayok tikang detsi, anali Jisu yok tilong athak anang kidomat matsi pono. Aro kamprek tilong helta anali pen kido.
Isi tomon akithe wangjap mo, aro lang adul tilongyok wang tongo, lasi tilong along lang pleng rang rango.
Manta Jisu tilong angkon long punghul athak aphu bisi, amek jangsi kido; aro la-amun adun hel anangyok pangthuro aro pulo, “O Paklang po hali ke thibo, bangpo nang hali chiron dunde yong ma?”
Anang thuro, aro tomon yok tamo, aro langpe yok pulo, “Ingsam mot, ham mot.” Laparake tomon ingsamo, aro ham detno.
Anang analiyok pulo, “Nali piyok phere do? Minon hok ta krolkre ma?”
Aro anali chiphere ongsi, ihut para ihutyok chipujolo, “Anang ke inghote, tomon pen langpe ta anang yok mengman?”
Anali langpe haga apar damsi, Geresani alongri yok wango.
Aro anang tilong para wang kisun amun, jongsi si-ik ajiu kihap ihut arleng ahilik para kiwang anangyok pochakngo.
Anang anang thirihel alongsi kido; aro anangyok kaita anangyok bamthip si, layok ke hirkuli penta bamsi bi un-eh yongo;
piyok pu tene anang aphongten akeng ari hirkuli pen ingnak ngo, manta anang hirkuli kapamet, aro akeng kangnak hirkuli helta kibeng prop; aro ihut ta anangyok pangdom ke bi un-eh si kido.
Anuwe aro anelo anang thiri ahilik hel along kido aro inglong-kartul along dosi arnita hangchersi kido aro abithang yok arlong pen chipachang man.
Konam akaholo para anang Jisu yok thekngo, anang wang katno aro anang yok chirdom hupmo;
aro hang chersi pulo, “O Kithechot Arnam Aso Jisu, nang nepen pot katiki yok do? Ne nangyok Arnam amen pen nang chingduk do, aduk nepiyek.”
Piyok pu tene anang bangpo yok kipu, “O nang si-ik ajiu, labang arlengpo para wang olenot!”
Laparake Jisu ke anangyok arjulo, “Nang men pot te?” Anang angpudun phakngo, “Ne menke amokha, piyok pu tene hali ako-ong do.”
Anang Jisu yok chingduk chohangsi longri para lahel yok padam tolte yok chipabek ngo.
Minonke inglong akung amokha phak pachopansi kido;
aro si-ik ajiuhel Jisu yok chingdukngo, “Haliyok phak hel along hali tolnot; hali lalong lutdam detne.”
Lasi Jisu analiyok hawang pilo. Aro si-ik ajiuhel arlengpo parake olesi damo aro phak helyok hap damo; aro hajar-hini phak apal dam kul-kulsi, langpe long jangdam plupsi thidetno.
Phak kihon abang akeng chiparjangsi rongpe aro longri dungsi lampo pachitha-ang detno. Laparake potsi chiplango arleng hel kilangyok olesi wango.
Anali Jisu adung wango aro si-ik ajiu kihap poyok, lake amokha kihap poyok, pe-rik chi-ik wetsi, aro agiyan hlongsi, arlengpo iningsi kido thekngo aro anali chiphere detno.
Ingho kithek abangke, labang si-ik ajiu kihappo pot badi chiplango, anang aro phak hel alam panirsi analiyok thandetno.
Laparake anali Jisu yok abithang ahol para anang yok chitereksi kidamyok chingdukngo.
La-aphel Jisu tilong athak karlujong akosi, labang si-ik ajiu kihap arlengpo anangpen kidun aphan anangyok chingdukngo.
Manta Jisu anangyok padam hlonghle si pulo, “Nang bithang hem hembang adungyok dam phakngot, aro Hemphu nangyok kajinso si, nali phan konbak akithe asal tikilo, bangpo a-odi analiyok pidamot.”
Aro anang lalong para damsi, Jisu anangyok potsi akithe asal tikilo, bangpo Dekapolis alongri jon-jan than-woro; la-amun ahuwit ta asombhik pahlongo.
Konam Jisu tilong pen langpepe haga aparyok dam phakngo, lalong rat ako-ong anang dung wang chingrumo; la-amun anang langpepe akungsi kido.
Laparake Jairas amen kachirdom ahem ahemphu thawang ihut wangsi, anangyok theksi, anang keng-ari otsi,
aro anangyok chinduk jongsi pulo, “Neso peso kithibo detno. Wangot aro anang thak ari bat pinot, lasi anang medet bo aro hrenge.”
La-amun Jisu anang pen duno. Aro Jisu anang pen rat akithe duno, aro anangyok komthip mo.
Minon ke lalongsi nengkan kere-hini para awi kiboi jong kiso, arloso ihut kido.
Anang ajat-jat ojha adung otdamsi jokha kiso chilango, aro jokha nohok panghono, manta kimeye bak ke ingho pon chot-chotno.
Arlosope Jisu alam arjulo, aro rat asitem lutdunsi Jisu aphel aga para wangsi, anangpe long otno,
piyok pu tene anang bithangsi kachipu, “Ne anang ape otdunchet hlongta, ne medetne.”
Jong-jongsi anang awi kiboi jut-hletno; aro anang abang long kido behali hel kimedet ahari hlongo.
Lajongsi Jisu anang para ajakong kidam than unsi, anang rat asitem amahang chirting si arjulo, “Ne pe long ingho te otno?”
Aro anang adun hel anangyok pulo, “Ratmar nangyok konbak pimpro-sorodo nang thek yongta, ingho neyok otno pusi arjudo ma?”
Jisu chighuren-wolsi ingho labang asal tikilo kithekpen ayok lango.
Arlosope anang bithangyok potsi chiplango, chithan unsi, anang chiphere dersi klem klemsi Jisu akeng long chirdomsi asereng alampo anangyok than detno.
Lalong Jisu anangyok pulo, “Ei nesope, nang kikrol si nang pamelo; nengsam damot, aro nang behali kiso medetnot.”
Konam Jisu labang alam kithan amunsi, Arnam ahem thawang Jairas po ahem para wangsi anangyok pulo, “Nang sope thilo. Piyok paklang po yok la-an aduk pido?”
Manta anali potsi kithan Jisu aneng pipesi, anangyok pulo, “Phereyek, krolne do.”
Anang Pitor po pen Jems po aparke kaiyok ta padam tolte yongo aro anang muso Johon po yokdet chi-en chomsi damo.
Konam anang kachirdom ahem thawangpo ahemyok wango, anali hang-taramsi aro surujosi kido wang thekngo.
Konam anang hem arloyok lutdamo, anang analiyok pulo, “Nali piyok te la-an hang-taramsi aro surujo do? Asope thithe lang, ameksi jangdo!”
Aro anali ingnek hulo. Laparake anang lahelyok mokol pa-ole phrotno, aro osope ape aro apo aro anang alok helyok ensi, osope kidoyok lut damo.
Anang osope ayok ari otsi anang yok pulo, “Talitha kum,” la acho alamke, “Oso pe, ne nang thando thurnot!”
Aro jongsi oso pe thuro, aro keng-kam damo; piyok pu tene ospe abo nengkan kere-hini kichok. Labadi si anali asombhik si hlong detno.
Labang alam kaiyok ta pathanthe yok, Jisu analiyok thano; aro osope yok kicho abihini kipiyok pulo.
Jisu lalong para olesi, abithang arong ayok wango; aro anang adun helta anang aphel aphel wang duno.

Kisang-arni apot, anang kachirdom ahem along kapaklang yok cheng pono, aro ako-ong karju arleng hel asombhik pahlongo. Anali pulo, “Labang arlengpo lamehel daklong para hlongo? Anang kipi agiyan pot badi? Aro labang arideng parasi la-an ajakong asal tikido, anang ke inghote?
Lake hem kakundar po kalek ma? Mary pe asopo, aro Jems po, Josep po, Judas po aro Simon po anangka kalek ma? Anang angjirpe hel ta ili pen kidohel kalek ma?” Ladisi anang anali pen ado pangthek ngo!
La-amun Jisu analiyok pulo, “Abithang alongri, abithang adon-arat, abithang ajat, abithang ahem aparke, prek along turki ihut jotmahal aman wephoke chiplangple.”
Aro lalong Jisu asombhik asal tiki un-eh yongot, angkhan kiso arleng ayok ari kibat detsi kiso pame uno.
Aro anali kikrol mo anat Jisu asombhik hlongo.
La-aphel ke anang kamprek arong-arong arting-worsi paklang pono.
Laparake anang la bang kere-hini adunyok adung taramsi, bang-hini bang-hini pachiloksi analiyok kitol cheng pono, aro analiyok si-ik hel aphuthak apharan si, labang alam thano,
“Nali kidam kiwang aphan tokok detsi enot, chul, him lale, nohok, lamehel isita enponek;
manta keng-op chi-ikngot, aro chol pak-ni chingcholek.”
Anang analiyok aro pulo, “Nali daklong potsi idon ahem lutdam, lalong para olesi damde lengke, lalongne do.
Daknebak athem long nali chidengde tene, aro arleng hel nali lamthe onene pu tene, lalong para olesi kidam amun, analiyok hakhi kichok aphan, nali kengtak chihijir detnot.”
Lasi anali olesi damo aro arlenghel neng chipharlep nange pusi paharpono.
Anali ako-ong si-ik ujharo, aro ako-ong kiso-kilak abangyok jangthu helsi, aro anali kiso pamelo.
La-amun Jisu amen chitha-ang detno apot, Herod recho po arjusi pulo, “Johon Baptist po kithi asitem para ingthur phakngo; la-anatsi labang ahuwit jakong kithe anali long tikisi pachok undo.”
Manta kamprek helke pulo, “Anang ke Elija po.” Aro kamprek helke pulo, “Anang atono badi ihut turki po.”
Manta konam Herod po arjulo, anang pulo, “Ne angphun kithuhlet, Johon po burphak ngo.”
Piyok pu tene Herod po abithang amuso Philip po apiso Herodiyas pe yok chi-eno, anang phan ango abithang arleng tolsi, Johon po yok nepsi, akrol along kithal.
Piyok pu tene Johon po Herod po yok kipu, “Nang muso apisope yok ki-enpo, nang phan labangpo kanong longke ingjong.”
Aro La-amun Herodiyas pe anangyok lang un-ehsi, aro anangyok kamariyok rono. Manta anang un-eh yongo,

piyok pu tene Herod po Johon po yok ihut dhorom aro kangthir arleng pusi kithan un, aro Herod po anangyok kiral dun. Konam anang lam arjulo, chiron un-eh phosi dolo; aro anang lam karjuyok akime kihlong.
Manta akime adin wangchok ngo, konam Herod po kiplang adin kamainot asel arni, anang kithe-kiding, thawang helyok aro Galili kido kithe-kiding helyok taramsi anuwe an kapacho ayok honjok ngo.

La-aphel Herodias pe abithang asope hem arloyok wango, aro kano, anang Herod poyok aro anang pen kicho don-ratyok aneng pangsamo; aro recho po asope yok pulo, “Nang pot si anengdo ma nehangot, aro ne nangpiye.”
Aro anang hopot ta chosi anang yok thano, “Nang neyok chihange pu tene, longripo adha yokta, nangyok nang piye.”
So-arloso pe mokol ayok damo, aro anang aipe yok arju damo, “Ne pot abihini chohang nang?” Anang aipe thano, “Johon Baptist po aphu.”
La-jongsi anang parjangsi hem arloyok rechopo adung ayok wang si hango, Johon Baptist po aphu po ipak sengelong minon jong-jong neyok nepinot, ne labang nangchihang do.”
Recho po aneng aduk do ong-ngo; yongta abithang hopot kicho apot, aro kicho adonhel ango apotsi, anangyok mo ke pu-un-eh yongo.
Lajongsi rechopo atoruhel ayok Johon po aphu kapawan yok sonturi ihutyok thansi tolo. La-amun sunturipo damo aro akrol along Johon po aphu po thatsi,
ipak senge along wano, aro so-arlope yok pilo. aro so-arlope ke anang aipe yok pilo.
