Konam anang adun hel arjulo, anali wango, aro anang abang abeng po pono aro thiri long bidamo.
La-aphel kangthir adun hel Jisu adung ayok wang chingrumsi, anali potsi tikilo, aro potsi paklango, lamehel anang ango panirsi thano.
La-amun anang analiyok pulo, “Nali ahudet nisotjot athem yok wangne, bekso apor sang dammot; piyok pu tene ako-ong arleng hel dam-wangsi kido anat; anali kichoyok aporso ta hlonghle yongo.”
La-amun anali bithang tilong long arlusi ahudet isi nisotjot athem long damo.
Lalong ako-ong arleng analiyok kidam thekngo aro chinisi, anali lalong kihlenghle ango si ahuwit rongso hel para katsi, analiyok ta parjangsi lalong yok hlengo.

La-amun anang olesi, konam suno isi ako-ong arat thekngo aro anang anali phuthak kachineng-ot wang detno; piyok pu tene anali ihut khokhre kangwepho bherabik bik hel badi kido; aro anang analiyok ako-ong alamthe paklang cheng pono.
La-aphel konam apor damo, anang adun hel Jisu adungyok wangsi pulo, “Labang athem nisotjot, aporta aporjoro;
arleng hel kichoyok ahuwit rong hel long damne penebak kicho aphan pachinam nang, analiyok tolnot.”
Manta Jisu anali yok pulo, “Nali anali phan penebak kichoyok pinot.” Anali anang yok pulo, “Hali damsi phoro hini rupa atheng pen him namsi analiyok labang po pacho nang ma?”
Manta anang analiyok pulo, “Konbak ako-ong ahim nali long do? Damne langdamot.” La-aphel konam anali langsi hlongo, anali pulo, “Him plang phongo aro ok jon-ni.”
Laparake anang analiyok thano, “Ahuwit yok pachingrum chom-chomsi bap-aju along pangning yok thano.
Lasi anali asem asemsi angkhan ke phoro isi, angkhan ke kep-phongo, dosi chijeng kri-kri si iningo.
Anang him plang-phongo aro ok-joni ensi, ethakpe yok lango, aro Arnam bor-eh hango, aro himhel ingbengo, aro adun helyok pisi arleng helyok pathak tolo; aro ok jon-ni ta anali ahuwit yok pathak tolo.
Aro anali ahuwit ta chosi aneng ingsamo;
aro anali abeng anohel aro ok abeng pangrumsi pachik kere-hini rungsi wano.
Labang him kicho arleng hajar phongo kido.
Lajongsi anang arleng helyok padamtol si, anang adun helyok, anang ango ha aga apar Bethsaida ayok kidam tilong athak parlusi tolo.
La-amun anang kitol tang kreng aphel inglong along kapingkit ayok damo.
Lapara ke anithulo apot, tilong langpe asitem kido, manta anang hudet bam along dolo.
Konam apor tomon kijapsi, adun abang tilong besi aduk kihlong apot, jarlo baji phili apun, langpe athak anang kengkam chijorsi anali dung yok wangsi, analiyok letchorsi kidam ayok chirono.
Manta anang lang athak keng-kam chijorsi kiwang theksi, anali lake si-ik hele pusi hang taramo;
piyok pu tene ahuwit anangyok kithek, aro anali chiron hapmo. Manta jongsi anang analiyok thano, “Ne si, neng chipachip; phereyek.”
Laparake anang tilong ayok arlulo aro tomon ta hamo. Aro anali lang phrongsi chiron un-eh pho ateng asombhik hlongo,
piyok pu tene him kicho alam anali abhu hlongkelo, manta anali angthin chiparthat phakngo.
Konam anali arpat tangsi, Genesaret arong hlengsi, aro tilong pasango.
La-amun anali tilong para wang kisun jong-jongsi, rat Jisu yok chini uno,
aro labang alongri dung si arleng hel parjangsi kiso arleng helyok ki-ih tarlong chirung chibatsi Jisu kido along yok wano.

Aro jotmahal rongpe aro rongso anang kilut, la-ahuwit long kiso helyok hathi-chari kido kiso kilak arleng helyok bisi, Jisu yok anali ape so ta pa-ot hlongyok chihango, aro konbak arlengyok otno, lahel ahuwit ta kiso melo.
Minonke konam Jerusalem para kiwang Pharisi, aro angkhan kanong paklang hel chikomwolsi wang kido,
anali angkhan adun helyok ari chichamche si akisim ari pensi kicho thek duno.
Piyok pu tene Pharisi aro ahuwit Jihudi helke me-atsi anali arihel chichamche lengke choche, ladisi sar-lar hel abi-pun mainot do,

aro anali hathi-chari para wangsi me-at chichamche lengke jatsi cho-junje; aro labadi kamprek ajat-jat abi-pun do lake senge kangthel, langhan, suria, phule, aro ladi abihini hel langlong kicham ajat-jat abi-apun do.
Lasi Pharisi aro kanong paklang abang Jisu yok arjulo, “Piyok te nang adun hel ke sar-larhel abi-pun badi kengkam chijorje, manta akisim aripen piyok cho-jun do?”
Jisu analiyok thano, “Jisoya po nali nengsik hel me-atsi turkisi thantango, aro kiwi do, ‘Labang arleng hel de-tur penke neyok mainot do, manta anali angthinke ne para kaholo do;
anali arleng awe-awe para kapangning abi-pun helsi kapaklang nange alam pusi pachirli do, akijolsi anali neyok chirdom do.’
Nali Arnam kanong tikango aro awe awe para munusi abi-punsi meng phakngo.”
Laparake anang analiyok pulo, “Nalike nali sar-lar hel abi-pun chi-enthipsi, Arnam kanong hel me-atsi tikang detno!
Piyok pu tene Mosi po kipu, ‘Nang aipe aro nang apa yok mainotpon;’ aro ‘Inghosi anang aipe, lale anang apa yok kangho ingjeye khanangsi thiye.’
Manta nali thando, ‘Inghone bak arleng nang wangrap dun pu tene ne para ‘Korban’ chokpeno hoi, (lake Arnam aphan ingtonsi pilo)—
laparake nang apa lale aipe aphan penebak jatsi patiki kelo,
ladisi nali awe-awe parasi kiwang abi-pun hel pachirlisi Arnam alamthe hel pa-orsi wangdo. Aro labadi prek asal tikisi do.”
Laparake arleng helyok anang dung taramdun phakngo aro pulo, “Nali ahuwit, ne lam onenot, aro abhu pahlong:
mokol para arleng apok lut ke kapasuwa un isi abihini ingjong, manta arleng para potsi mokolyok ole, labang helsi arlengyok pasuwaman.
Ingho ka-one ano do, anang onenot.”
Aro konam anang ratyok tikangsi idon ahem lutdamo, anang adun hel labang athenghlan acho alampo Jisu yok arjulo.
Anang analiyok pulo, “Laparake nali ta abhu hlonghe lang ma? Mokol para arleng apok arloyok potsi lut, labang ke anangyok pasuwa un-eh,
anang angthin arlo ke lutle, manta anang apok arlo damsi bayot kidam amun mokol ole detde ma?” (Ladi pusi Jisu ahuwit kicho abihini majit ke kangthir pulo.)
Aro anang pulo, “Arleng apok arlo para potsi ole, labang posi arlengyok pasuwaman.
Piyok pu tene arlo para apot, lake arleng angthin arlo para, kangho kachiron, kidoner, kachunghu, arleng kamari,
kachopak, alop, kasotonga, kachobel, mek-er, kapatharak, kaborai, kamango, lamehel olesi wang man.
Labang ahuwit kangho hel angthin arlo para olesi wangman, aro lamehel si ihut arleng ayok pasuwaman.
Lalong para Jisu thursi, Tayar aro Sidon aholyok damo. La-amun anang idon ahem lutno, aro kaita kachithan un-eh badisi kidoyok anengdo lo, manta chibutike do un-eh yongo,
manta ihut arloso aso peyok si-ik kihap, labang arlosope, jongsi Jisu alamthe arjulo, aro adungyok wango aro anang keng-ri long chirdomo.
Labang arlosope Bang-ajat kido, lake Seropheniya ajat kido. Anang asope para si-ik ka-ujhar aphan anang keng chingdukngo.
Jisu yok pulo, “Angoke oso helyok pachotang sonang, piyok pu tene osohel kicho ahim ensi aro hik ayok kipidun akime kalek.”
Manta arlosope anangyok pulo, “Oik Hemphu, hong arlo kido hik helta osohel para kicho kachidat ahim hel chodun hlong do.”
Laparake Jisu pulo, “Labadi alam kithan anat, nang damot— nang sope para si-ik tikangsi damo.”
Lasi anang ahem damsi, asope hong along isi kido thekngo, aro si-ik katno.
Laparake anang Tayar ahol asitem para chirulo, Sidon akengthun damsi Galili langpe aga damsi, Dekapolis ahol yok damo.
La-amun anali ihut nothong pen ade alamthe kangwe kalar arleng ihutyok anang dungyok wano; aro anali anang thak ari pa-ot tol yok chingduk ngo.
Lalong anang amokha arleng asitem para, anangyok ahudet prek athem ayok pono, aro anang ari munso pen lili ano otno, aro anang ingthi ingthokngo aro kalar arleng ade ot no.
Laparake ethakpe yok langsi, asithe ensi, arlengpo yok pulo, “Eph pha-tha,” lake “chingpunot.”
Aro lajongsi ano hel chingpu pen pano, aro anangdeso chiphlok ngo, aro anang lamthe wangdak si thano.
La-aphel arleng ihut yokta pathanmo ayok thano, manta nengrong ongsi labang alam pahar pono.
Aro arleng hel asombhik hlongsi, pulo, “Anang ahuwit yokta sal pamesi tikilo; anangsi ano nothong yokta karjuyok aro debal ta lam pathan pilo.”
Labang arni ako-ong arleng chingrumsi, anali kicho apot kangwesi, Jisu anang adun hel yok anang dung taramsi analiyok pulo,
“Ne labang arleng helyok kachineng-ot wangdo, piyok pu tene anali ne pensi mini ni-thom arniyok do, aro anali kichoyok jatsi ingjong.
Ne analiyok abithang ahem ayok pangchirne tol, tene duwar ibengsi an alek hlonge, piyok pu tene angkhan ke kaholo para wangdo.”
Lasi anang adun hel anangyok angpu phak ngo, “Labang nisotjot athem long inghote mehel arelngyok him pacho une?”
Jisu analiyok arjulo, “Nalipen plangkan him do?” Lahel thano, “Plang thorok-isi do.”

Laparake anang ratyok lungle long kangning ayok thano; aro anang plang thorok-isi him eno, aro Arnam yok kardom pajir tangsi, anang mehel ingbengo, aro anang adun helyok kapathak yok pilo; aro anali arleng helyok thak pono.
Anali bekso aso ok ta kido; aro mehel yok bor-eh batsi, anang mehelyok ta pathak yok thano.
Arleng hel chosi neng ingsamo aro ingkrango; aro kicho kiri abeng anohel humsi, pachik thorok-isi paplengo.
Minon ke lalong hajar phili arleng kido. Aro anang analiyok tol phlungo.
Aro jongsi anang adun helpen tilong arlulo, aro Dalmunatha alongri yok damo.
La-amun Pharisi hel wangsi, Jisu yok honjat langsi, suneng para penebak isi asin anang para chohangsi, anang pen lam chingjelo.
La-amun anang ajiuli long asithe pading hrimsi pulo, “Labang owe arleng hel piyokte asin hangdo? Khanangsi ne nali thando, labang owepo arlengyok jatsi asin paklangkle ye.”
Aro anang analiyok tikango, aro tilong arlu dam phaksi, ha aga aparyok damo.
Minon ke adun hel jatsi him kachiwan tenge jango; aro tilong along analiphan iplang detsi him kido.
Aro amunsi anang lahelyok arsaksi kipu alam thano, “Pharisi hel athengkur aro Herod po athengkur para chilang wen.”
Labang apor lahel ihut para ihutyok chithan prupsi chirwalsi thano, “Oh ili long him ingjong apotsi thano.”
Aro bang alamthe chithan uno apot, Jisu analiyok pulo, “Nalipen him ingjong pusi piyokte chithan dolang? Nali minon hokta abhu hlonghle lang ma? Nali ingthin chiparthat kulsi dolang ma?
Nali amekdo yong ta, nali thekthe ma? Nali ano doyong ta, arjuje ma? Aro nali neng chiri-re ma?
Konam ne hajar phongo arleng asitem plang phongo him ingbengsi kipi, la-amun nali abeng ano hel pachik-kan nali kapapleng?” Anali pulo, “Kere hini.”
“Aro konam hajar phili arleng asitem plang thorok-isi him ingbengsi kipi, la-amun abeng ano pachik kante kapangrum?” Aro lahel anangyok pulo, “Thorok isi.”
Laparake anang analiyok pulo, “Nali minon hokta abhu hlonghle lang ma?”
Anali Bethsaida arongyok wango. Angkhan arleng Jisu adungyok ihut chotok poyok wano, aro anangyok ki-otyok Jisu yok chihango.
Aro Jisu la chotokpo arilong otsi, anangyok rong para mokol yok pono; aro konam anang amek long ingthi ingthokngo, aro abanglong ari bisi, anang arjulo, “Nang pene bak thekdo ma?”
Aro arlengpo lang chaksi pulo, “Arleng helyok thek hlongdo, manta anali thengpe arong hel badi, keng-kamdo.”
Laparake Jisu anang mek long ari bat phakngo; aro anang lang-etno aro anang mephleno aro anang ahuwityok thek phleno.
La-aphel Jisu anangyok abithang ahemyok tolsi pulo,“Rongso long dam phaknge not.”
Jisu anang adun hel pen Sisiriya Philipi arong helyok olesi damo; aro duwar ibeng along anang adun helyok arjulo, “Arleng hel neyok ingho pusi ili pudo?”
Aro lahel Jisu yok angpu duno, “Johon Baptist po; aro kamprek helke puman Elija po; aro kamprek abangke katurki hel ihutpo pusi pudo.”
Anang analiyok arjulo, “Manta nalike ne yok ingho pusi pudo?” Pitor po pulo, “Nango Ral Hemphu.”
aro analiyok anang lam bang ango kithanthe ayok, than klakngo.
Laparake Jisu analiyok pachirli ponhilo, lake Arleng Aso ako-ong duk choye, aro kithe-kiding abang aro bor-bangthe hel aro kanong kapaklang abang nesimme aro mariye, manta ni-thom aphel burphaknge.”
Anang labang pachiklan daksi thano. Aro Pitor po, Jisu yok prek aga pono, aro ingjelo.
Manta anang chirtingwul si, adun hel yok thek hlongsi, Pitor po yok tamo aro pulo, “Ne phel dam, si-ikpo! Piyok pu tene nang nengpo Arnam aphan chironre si, munusi alamsi chiron do.”
Anang dungyok rat aro adung helyok taramsi thano, “Inghone bak nephel-phel wang kidun anengdo, anali abithang yok chipangdom, aro anang kros po rungsi nephel-phel wang dunnot.
Piyok pu tene inghosi abithang ajiu chirale, anang labang chipangbo ye, aro ingho ne nat, aro kime-alamthe anat abithang ajiu chipangbo ye, labang joknge.
Piyok pu tene ihut arleng pirthepe dung hlong phrotsi, abithang ajiuli chipangbo det, tene bangpo anali pot alap hlonge?
Khanangke, anali abithang ajiu aholan pot te pi une?

Inghosi labang owelong kidoner aro papi arleng hel, inghone bak neyok aro ne lamthe long tharaknge, Arleng Aso konam tharlon helpen anang Apa jortang pen wange, la-amun anangta labang arleng poyok tharaknge.”
Aro anang analiyok pulo, “Khanangsi ne nali thando, Arnam-alongri kihal-ajakong pen kiwang thekthe lengke thihlonghle ye, ladi angkhan arleng holek arjap si kido abang asitem do.”
La-arni para ni-thorok aphel, Jisu pen Pitor po aro Johon po yok eno, aro anali isi inglong kartulyok ujelo. Aro anang analingot prek athok chipharlepmo,
aro anang pehel phlan-etno, aro pirthimipe adak labadi kiphlan-et ke pe chok un-eh.
Aro lalong Mosi po pen Elija po analiyok chiklangsi, Jisu pen lam chithano.
Laparake Pitor po lam thandunsi Jisu yok pulo, “Paklangpo, holek kidosi iliphan mepen do; hali nangphan ihum, Mosi po yok ihum, Elija po yok ihum, la humthom kuntulu ahem kemnang.”
Anang potsi punange, anang chithan un-ehsi kido, piyok pu tene anali phere dersi kido.
Laparake iplang inghun analiyok wang bam klakngo, aro labang inghun para ithe alam wango, “Anangsi nenengdok ne So, anang lamthe onenot!”
Lajongsi konam anali kilangwor ke, anang pen kaita wedetno, manta Jisu detsi thek hlongo.
Anali inglong kartul para wang kisunjong amunsi, Jisu analiyok jipe thekngo, Arleng Aso kithi para burphak welengke, labang alam kapathan hlonghle yok thano.”
Lasi anali daksi, kithi para kiburphak nge ke pot te pusi chirju propsi dolo.
Laparake anali Jisu yok arjulo, “Elija po ango wang hlonge pusi kanong paklang abangke pot badi pudo?”
Anang analiyok pulo, “Khanang ke, Elija po ango wangsi ahuwit abihini me-at pangningdo; aro laparake Arleng Aso aphan ke anang ajat-jat aduk chohlonge, aro anangyok sedetne puke lolong wiwe-yong ma?
Manta ne nali thando, “Elija po wang tango, aro kiwiwen alamthe atengsi, anali pot katiki kar-ih ladi tikilo.”
Konam anali adun hel adungyok wango, analiyok ako-ong arat chikomwolsi kido thekngo, aro angkhan kanong paklanghel pen anali lam chirung chibatsi kido.
La-amunsi rat Jisu yok thekngo, aro ahuwit ta asombhik hlong detno aro anali katsi anang dung chirdom damo.
Anang analiyok arjulo, “Nali anangpen pot alam chirung chibat do?”
Rat asitem para ihut anangyok pulo, “O Paklang, neso poyok nangdung wando; anangyok isi debal asi-ik hapsi lamthan thekthesi do;

aro konamsi ajiupo ananglong ajhok wang, anangyok lungle long partiman; aro angho para achoplep wangman, aro anang angho aso chingkreman aro anang chungkreng detno; aro anangyok ka-ujhar yok adun hel ango chingdukngo, manta anali un-eh yongot.”
Anang analiyok pulo, “O kikrolkre agijing hel, ne nali sitem konbak arniyok doye? Konbak arniyok nali long chihibo? Anangyok nedung wanot.”
Aro anali oso soyok Jisu adung wano. Konam ajiupo Jisu yok thekpen-pan, jongsi oso soyok huweng bopmo, aro ososo lungle athak krep dungo, aro anghopen aplep pa-olesi, konglong-kongthalsi dolo.
Jisu oso so anang payok arjulo, “Anang labadi kachiplang nikan bak chokngo?” Anang pulo, “Oso apun para chiplangdo.”
Anangyok kapaduk ayok aphongten melong, aro lang long pajang man; manta nang penebak tiki un tene, haliyok jinsonot, aro hali rapmot.”
Jisu anang yok pulo, “Nang un tene!— kikrol arleng aphan ahuwit tiki un.”
Lajongsi oso anang apa po hang-wongo, “Ne kroldo; ne kikrol un-eh long nerapmot.”
La-apor idhol arleng inan katsi kiwang theksi, la si-ik ajiupo yok tamsi pulo, “Nang debal pen nothong ajiupo, ne nangthando, nang anang para mokol olene wangot, aro jatsi lalong lutphak ngek!”
La-amunsi anang hang chiro, aro oso so yok huwengsit no, aro oso so kithi nak chiplango, lasi ako-ong arlengke pulo, “Anang ke thilo.”
Manta Jisu anangyok aripen otsi anang yok pangthuro, aro anang ingthur uno.
Konam anang idon ahem lut damo, anang adun hel anang yoksi ahudetsi arjulo, “Piyok hali anangyok ujhar un-eh yongo?”
Jisu anali yok pulo, “Labang po ke pingkit pendetsi olesi wangman.”
Anali labang athem para damo aro Galili asitem damjongsi dolo. Anang kaiyok ta pathan un-eh yok aneng kido;
piyokte pu tene anang abithang adun hel yok paklangsi, analiyok kipu, “Arleng Aso yok arleng hel arideng champiye, aro anali anangyok mariye, aro ni-thom arni aphel anang bur phaknge.”
Manta anang potsi kipu abhu hlonghle yongot aro anangyok karjuyok ta chipherelo.
Laparake anali Kaparnaum yok wango; aro anang hem arlo kido amun analiyok arjulo, “Nali duwar ibeng long pot te alam kachingje?”
Manta analike doklip mo; piyokte pu tene ingho thechot, labang alam duwar ibeng anali ihut para ihut lam kachipuwang.
Lalong anang iningo, aro bang kere-hini adunyok taramo aro pulo, “Inghosi ango kidoyok anengdo man, anang ahuwit yok ta ajut aro ahuwit aphan murkiya chiplange.”
Laparake anang oso ihut yok wano aro anali sitem bilo; aro anang awamlong ensi, anang analiyok pulo,
“Inghosi labadi oso ihutyok nemen pen chidengman, anang neyoksi chidengman; aro ingho neyok chidengman, anang neyok det ke kalek manta neyok wangkitol poyok si chidengman.”
La-amunsi Johon po anangyok pulo, “O Paklang po, hali inghut arlengyok nangmen pensi si-ik ka-ujhar thek hlongo, aro hali ananyok kiteng dunyok rono, piyok pu tene anang hali adun kalek.”
Manta Jisu pulo, “Anangyok tengek; piyok pu tene ingho nemen apharan pensi tikilo, mophel jongke neyok kapatharak alam kaita thanthe ye.
Inghosi iliyok ado-kolke, anang iliphan.
Piyok pu tene khanang ne nang thando, ingho nemenpen naliyok lang-han isi lang pajun, tene nali Khristo adun kipu apot nali banta jatsi chipangbobe ye.”
“Nali sitem inghonebak neyok kikrol oso hel ihutyok panghopon do, tene anang phanke phukuli arlong isi angphun bamdungsi aro nangyok langpe long pangjang plupsi mechot.
Nang aripo si nang panghodo, tene labangyok thuhlet;
ari-hongni dosi, jom along lake kijutje me-aten long kidamyok ke ari kongane kido ajiubongsi mechot.
Aro nang kengsi nang panghodo, tene bangpoyok thuhlet;
akeng hong-ni dosi jom arlo kiwaryok ke kengkok ajiubong kidosi nangphan mechot.
Aro nangmek helne nang panghodo, tene bangpo yokta hekpok; nangmek hini dosi aro jom along kiwar yok ke, amek isi pen Arnam longri kilutsi mechot,
lalong lamehel ingthan ape thithe ye, aro me-aten jatsi jutje ye.
“Piyok pu tene abangten yokta kangton ingtipen pangthirtangsi mepen pangthire.
Ingti ke akime; manta ingti asok lammo, tene bangpo pot pente asok pado une? Nali bithang angthin long ingti asok chipado, aro nali ihut para ihutyok nengsam chipado.”
Jisu lalong para damo, aro Jordan langjonpe chirpatno aro Judiya aholyok damo. Aro rat ako-ong anang dung wang chingrum phakngo; aro, anang abi-pun badi, anang lahel yok lamthe paklango.
Angkhan Pharisi wangsi, anangyok honjat kilangyok arjulo, “Apenso po abithang apiso pe yok kanong badike se-un ma?”
Anang analiyok pulo, “Mosi po naliyok pot akanong pilo?”
Lahel pulo, “Mosi po ihut apiso kise aporman alo wisi, pachise ayok hawang pilo.”
Manta Jisu analiyok pulo, “Nali angthin karthat-ong anat, anang labang kanong nali phan wisi pilo.
Manta kasanse cheng amun ke ‘Arnam analiyok apenso aro arloso si sanselo.’
‘Labang anatsi ihut arleng abithang apo-ape yok tikangsi, apiso pe pen chilok hlongdo,
aro bang-hini isidet abang chiplange.’ Lasi anali bang hini kalek, manta isi a-ok.
La-apot Arnam pot jorme pachiloksi bilo, kaita phat dun nangne.”
Laparake labang alam adun hel Jisu yok hemlong arju phakngo.
Anang anali yok pulo, “Inghosi anang pisope yok chisedo, aro prek ihut arloso chi-endo anang bangpe pen kangho donerdo;
aro arloso ta abithang apihan yok chisesi, aro prekyok chi-en do, pu tene anangpe ta kangho donerdo.
La-aphel arleng hel oso helyok ari kibat aphan Jisu adung wano; aro adun hel analiyok tamsi tolo.
Manta Jisu labang theksi aneng thilo, aro analiyok pulo, “Oso hel yok nedung pawang nang, analiyok tengek; piyok pu tene Arnam-alongri ke labadi hel aphansi.
Khanangsi ne nali thando, “Inghosi osohel badi chiplangsi Arnam-alongri hlonghle, anang lalong jatsi lutdun un-eh ye.”
Aro anang analiyok arbak si eno, aro analiyok bor-eh pilo.
Jisu duwar ajon kidamjong amun, arleng ihut anang dungyok wangkatsi, anang ngo tarhuksi arjulo, “Kime Paklangpo, or-eh len ajiubong kihlongyok ne pot ote nange?”
Jisu anangyok pulo, “Neyok piyok akime nepudo? Kaita akime kalek, manta Arnam detsi akime.
‘Arleng mari yek; nang kangho donerek; nang chunghu yek; nang asisik hakhi piyek; nang chobelek; nang apo-ape yok mainot; labang kanong hel nang thekdo.”
Anang Jisu yok pulo, “O Paklang po, ne riso apun para mehel ahuwit mengsi wang do.”

Jisu, anangyok langsi, anangyok nengdokngo aro pulo, “Nang isi abihini mengme yong; damot, nangpotsi do, aro nohok hel kicho-kangwe abangyok pinot, aro nangphan ethakpe long apuru doye; laparake wangot, nephel-phel wangdun not.”
Konam labang alamthe arjulo, anang amahang ingtingsu lo, aro anang neng aduksi dam hrolo, piyok pu tene anang apuru ki-ong arleng kido.
Laparake Jisu chighurensi lang-woro aro anang adun helyok pulo, “Hem kime arleng hel Arnam-alongri long kilut un-eh pho!”
Anang adun hel labang alamthe arjusi asombhik hlongo. Manta Jisu analiyok puphak ngo, “Osohel, inghosi nohok apuru long kroldo, anali Arnam alongri kilut konbak atan!”
Ingho hem kime arleng ihut Arnam-alongri kilutyok ke, mihonghang ijon imprim ang-gog aga kiletsi jalsochot.
Anali watsi asombhik hlongo, aro anali ihut para ihutyok chipu propmo, “Tene inghote jok une?”
Jisu analiyok lango aro pulo, “Ajiu kithi arlengke un-eh, manta Arnam ke ladi kalek; piyok pu tene Arnam ke ahuwit tiki un.”
Lalong Pitor po Jisu yok pulo, “Hali ahuwit tikangsi, nang phel-phel wangduno.”
Jisu pulo, “Khanangsi ne nali thando, inghonebak ne nat, aro kime-alamthe anat, hem, lale korte lale ingjir, lale ape lale apo, lale asohel, lale lungle phalang tikang,
kihreng adak honjat tongsi hem, korte-ingjir, ape, aso, aro lungle, lamehel aphoro ajiuli aro mo-phel amun or-eh len ajiu hlonghleye— labadi kaita ingjong.
Manta ango abang ako-ong arleng paphele, aro aphel abangke pango ye.”

Anali honjeng damjongsi, Jerusalem kidam amun, aro Jisu anali ngo-ngo kidam; anali la-apor asombhik hlongo aro aphel-aphel kidunhel kaphere wango. Anang bang kere-hini adun yok pangrum phaksi, ananglong kachiplange hel analiyok thanpon hilo,
pulo, “Langot, ili Jerusalem yok damsi do; aro Arleng Aso bor-bangthe aro kanong paklang hel arideng champi ye, aro analike anangyok kamari ado batne; laparake anali Bang-ajat hel arideng pekdetne;
analike anangyok chongneknge, aro anangyok ingthoknge, aro sabuk pen sapme, aro mariye; aro ni-thom arni aphel anang bur phaknge.”
Jebedi po aso Jems po aro Johon po, Jisu adungyok wango aro anangyok pulo, “O Paklang po, hali nangyok potsi chihang, labang hali katikipi aneng do.”
Aro anang analiyok pulo, “Ne nali phan, pot katikipi nange aneng do?”
Aro anali Jisu yok pulo, “Nang jortangpen, hali ihutyok nang ancho-ari aga aro ihut yok debera ari aga ining dun hlong ayok, bor-eh pinot.”
Manta Jisu analiyok pulo, “Nali potsi chihangdo, bangpo nali thekthe yong. Ne kijun alanghan nali jun une ma, lale ne baptist kachiplang badi nali baptist chiplang une ma?
Anali anangyok pulo, “Hali une.” Laparake Jisu analiyok pulo, “Ne kijun alanghan nali jun hlonge; aro ne baptist kachiplang badi, nalita ladi baptist chiplang hlonge;
manta ne ancho-ari aga lale debera-ari aga kangning tolyok ne apharan ingjong, manta ingho aphansi honjoksi bido, anangsi hlonge.”
Konam bang-kep adun hel labangpo alam arjulo, anali Jems po pen Johon po yok aneng thilo.
Lasi Jisu analiyok anang dung inan taramsi pulo, “Nali Bang-ajat yok thekdo, lake anali kapangdom abangdo anali aphuthak kithe-kiding asal kapatiki apharan do.
Manta nali sitem ke labadi kalek, manta inghosi nali sitem akithe chiplange nali sitem murkiya chiplang nange,
aro nali sitem inghosi akithepo kachiplang yok aneng do, anang ahuwit aphan murkiya chiplang nange.
Piyok pu tene Arleng Aso al-kihlong yok kalek, manta al-ki-en yok, aro ako-ong kijok ajiuli ador aphan abithang ajiu kipi yok wango.”
La-aphel anali Jeriko rongpe yok wango. Jisu aro adun hel aro rat ako-ong Jeriko tikangsi kidam amun Timayus po aso Bartimayus amen, kachohrek-wor mek-chotok ihut duwar akung iningsi kido.
Konam, bangpo Najaret Jisu pusi arju hlongo, anang hang-wongsi pulo, “O Dabhit po agijing Jisu, neyok jinso not!”
Ako-ong arleng anang kido-sit yok tam-reno, manta anang hang ong-ongsi pulo, “O Dabhit po agijing, neyok jinso not!”
Jisu sang kuk ngo aro pulo, “Anangyok holek taramot.” Aro arleng hel mek-chotok poyok taramo, anangyok pulo, “Neng chipangdom; thurnot, anang nangyok taramdo.”
La-akosi anang pe-rik mar warsi, chonthelsi, aro Jisu adungyok wango.
Laparake Jisu anangyok pulo, “Ne nangyok pot katikipi ayok anengdo?” Mek-chotok po anangyok pulo, “Ne Paklang po, nemek pathek phakngot.”
Jisu anangyok pulo, “Damot; nang kikrolsi nangyok nang pamelo.” Lajongsi anang mek thek hlongo aro duwar ajon anang phel-phel duno.
Konam anali Jerusalem padungsi, Betphaj aro Bethani along, Olip Anglong adung hlengo apot, anang adun bang-hiniyok thansi tolo,
aro analiyok pulo, “Nali dung kido rongsoyok damot; aro lajongsi nali kilut amun, nali kaita jatsi karlule ijon noselmurep aso wonsi kibi lalong hlonge; bangpo phlokngot aro wanot.
Inghone bak naliyok arju, tene nali thanot, “Hemphu kanange do, aro anang jongsi bangpo yok holek yok wan phaknge.”
Anali damo, duwar amahang mokol along, noselmurep aso ijon wonsi kibi hlongo. Anali bangpo phloksi kido amunsi,
angkhan lalong karjap phrong hel analiyok pulo, “Nali noselmurep aso soyok phloksi, pot inghol do?”
Anali Jisu kapathan tol badisi pulo, aro lahel analiyok pawan tolo.
Laparake lahel la noselmurep aso Jisu adung wano, aro anang labang athak pe hlemo, aro labang athak iningo.
Ako-ong arat anali pe-rik hel duwar along hlemo, aro kamprek helke bithar along kithu thengpe arwo arorem hel wansi duwar long hlemsi bilo.
Anang ango aro aphel kidam abangke hangsolsi pu ponhilo,“Pahal nang, pahal nang, ingho Hemphu amen pen wangdo, anang bor-eh chokdo!
Aro ili sar-lar Dabhit po pot longri wangdo, anangta bor-eh pachoknang! Ethakpe long parklam nang.”
Laparake anang Jerusalem lut damo aro Arnam ahemyok lut damo; aro ahuwit abihini chighurensi lango, anethulo apot, anang bang kere-hini adun helpen olesi Bethani yok damo.
Aphel arni, konam anali Bethani along para olesi wango, Jisu ingchiro.

La-amun kaholo para arwo pen irong dumuru arongpe thek hlongsi, lalong kicho athe hlonge mene pusi chironsi, lalong damo. Konam adung kihleng ke, arwodet aparke ipum athe hlonghle yongot; piyokte pu tene bangpo dumuru athe kiwang apor kalek.
Lalong Jisu bangpe arongpe yok pulo, ‘Minon parake kaita nang para jatsi athe pacho hlonghle nang.’ Labang alam anang adun helta arju hlongo.

Laparake anali Jerusalem yok wango. Jisu Arnam ahem lut damo, aro Arnam ahemlong kijor-kihrep abangyok mokol pa-ole detno aro ingho lalong nohok kachihole abang ahong, aro wothum kijor kangning anghol hel harlek phrotno;
aro Arnam ahem asitem kaiyok ta isi apot papon tolte yongo.
Anang lamthe paklango aro analiyok pulo, ‘Ne hemyok ahuwit ason aphan kapingkit ahem puye puke wiwe-yong ma’? Manta nali bangpo kanghu ahemsi ingholo.”

Aro konam labang alam bor-bangthe aro kanong paklang abang arjulo, anali Jisu yok pot badi mari une; awak chilangsi dolo; piyok pu tene anali anangyok pherelo; piyok pu tene rat ajaldungsi anang kapaklang hel asombhik hlongo.
Aro anithulo apotsi, Jisu aro anang adun hel rongpe mokolyok olesi damo.
La-aphel arni adap, lahel la-duwar kidamjong amun, anali dumuru arongpe angkur yok kikreng hap thekngo.
Laparake Pitor po aneng chipurkisi Jisu yok pulo, “Paklang po, langot, nang hao kipi dumuru arongpe kreng hapmo.”
La-ako Jisu analiyok puphak ngo, “Arnam yok krol;

khanangsi ne nali thando, nali labang inglong kartulpe ayok than, ‘chingphur not aro langpe long jangdam plupmot,’ aro nali nenglong ihik-bihik wesi, aro nang pot pu, bangpo choknge pune krol, tene labang anangyok chiplange.
Lasi ne nali thando, nali pingkit amun potsi chihang, labang ahuwit hlongo pune krol, aro bangpo nali choknge.
“Konam pingkitsi arjapme, nang ihutpen ado penebak ado do tene, pap ronnot, lasi ethakpe long kido nali Apa naliyok ta pap naliron piye.”
Manta nali pap ron pipe, tene nali ethakpe long kido Apa ta nali pap ado nali ron pipeye.”
Anali Jerusalem yok wang phakngo. Anang Arnam ahemlong kidamjong amunsi, bor-bangthe, kanong kapaklang, aro kithe-kiding hel anang dungyok wangsi arjulo,
aro pulo, “Nang pot apharan pensi lamehel abihini tikido? Ingho lamehel katikiyok labang apharan nangyok nangpilo?”
Jisu analiyok pulo, “Ne naliyok lam imung nali arjudo, nali neyok nethan-phak, aro ne pot apharan pensi lamehel tikido, bangpo naliyok thane.
Johon po ka-ote baptist ke ethakpe para kiwang ma, ma munusi para kiwang? Neyok nethan not.”
La-amun anali ihut para ihut lam chipu-prupsi pulo, “Ethakpe para pu, tene anang yok piyok krolkre yongo?” Anang ladisi puye.
Manta ili “arleng para” pusi punang ma?”— lahel rat ayok kaphere, piyok pu tene ahuwit ta Johon poyok aserengsi ihut turki pusi kikroldet.
Lasi lahel Jisu yok angpu phakngo, “Hali ke thekthe.” Aro Jisu ta analiyok pulo, “Ne pot apharan pensi lamehel tikido, bangpo ne ta nali thanthe.”

Laparake anang athenghlan pensi analiyok than pono, “Ihut arlengpo rihanthu barik chikomo, labang komwolsi gomora pal hrep detno, alang kisor ahilik tuksi, tong kemo; aro anang rihanthu barikpo kihon abangyok adhi pisi kamprek alongri yok damo.
La-aphel athe kiwang aporo, kihon abang para anang rihanthu barik athe abhakpo kapahlongyok, anang anali dungyok ihut murkiya yok wangtolo.
Manta lahel anangyok nepsi pamsi, anangyok ari hunasi angtol hrolo.
Aro prek ihut murkiya ayok anang analidung wangtolo, lahel anang aphulong pamsi, anangyok ta patharak-jokngo.
Laparake prek ihutyok wangtolo lahel anangyok marilo, aro prek ako-ong abangyok pamo, aro angkhanyok marilo.
Aphel yok ke, anang ihutdet asopo detsi dolo, labangke anang nengdok aso; laparake ‘neso poyok aman piye’ pusi, kijut amun asopo yoksi anali dungyok wangtolo.
Manta lungle adhi ki-en abang chipujosi pulo, ‘Labangpo ke ahemphu kicho aidot aso po, wangot, ili anangyok mari minang, tangsi lungle-phalang kihlonge aidot ke ilisi chiplange.’
Lasi lahel anangyok nepsi, marisi, rihanthu barik apar mokolyok waro.
Labang rihanthu barik ahemphupo pot inghole? Anang wangsi, la adhi ki-en helyok mariphrotsi, aro labang rihanthu barikpo bangyok piye.
Labang lo-kangthir long nali chiporhe hlonghle yong ma? “Hem kikem abang potsi arlong kise, labangsi atok long aghai arlongpo chiplango.
Labang ke Hemphu parasi chokngo, aro ili mek ango konbak asombhik?”
Konam anang anali yok ado kipi athenghlan thano pusi chithan unsi, anali Jisu yok kinep awak lango, manta ratyok chipheresi, anangyok tikang hrolsi dam phlungo.
Laparake anangyok lamthe ahonjat kilang aphan, anali angkhan Pharisi aro angkhan Herod po akhel arleng anang dungyok wangtolo.

Lahel wangsi anangyok pulo, “O Paklang po, nang kikrol kangthir, aro kaiyokta kaphere ingjong, bangpo hali than-undo; piyok pu tene nang arleng amahang yok langle, manta khanang Arnam aduwarsi paklang do. Koisor po yok kanong atengke khajana pi-un ma pi un-eh?”
Analiyok ili pinang ma pinangne? Manta anang anali anengsik than-unsi pulo, “Nali piyok te neyok honjat langdo? Hane kilangyok isi tanga atheng niphan wanot.”
La-aphel anali isi wano, anang analiyok pulo, “Labang agoya aro amenpo ingho te do? ‘Koisor po’ pusi lahel pulo.”
La-amun Jisu analiyok pulo, “Pot si Koisor po kihlong nange abhak ke Koisor po yok pinot, aro potsi Arnam kihlong nange abhak ke Arnam yok pinot.” La-ako lahel Jisu yok bismat hlongo.
Aro kithi kiburphak ingjong pusi kipuman Saduki abang Jisu adungyok wangsi anangyok arjulo,
“Paklang po, ‘ihut arleng akortepo ihut aso chibubesi thi tene, arlengpo himepe yok chi-ensi aro kithi akortepo aphan aso paplang une, pusi Mosi po haliyok wilo.’
Lahel, bangthorok-isi korte kido; angopo piso ensi, aso chibubesi thilo.
Adunpo ta anang chi-eno, aro aso chibubesi thilo aro bangkithom pota, ladisi chiplango.
Aro bangthorok ta aso chibubesi thilo.
Kithi para kibur arnike anali asitem bangpe ingho apiso chiplange? Piyok putene bang thorok ta anangyok chi-eno.”
Jisu analiyok pulo, “Lo-kangthir aro Arnam ajakong kithekthe anatsi nali kangho kachiron kalek ma?
Piyok put tene konam kithi asitem para burphak man, lalong anali jorme-chihap heye jorme-pachihap ta weh, manta ethakpe long kido tharlon badi doye.

Manta kithi paburphak man, labang alam ne Abraham po Arnam, Aijak po Arnam, Jakup po Arnam pusi Mosi poyok Arnam pot badi kithan, bangpo nali Mosi po alo long, kijirtum arongpe atomo long, chiporhe hlonghle yong ma?
Anang ke kithi hel Arnam kalek, kihreng hel Arnam, nali kangho chirondo!”
Kanong paklang ihut po adungyok wangsi, anali sitem ladi kachirwal alam arjusi, Jisu Saduki helyok me-atsi pu phleno pusi chithan unsi, anangyok arjulo, “Dak bangpo kanong ahuwit yok ango chot?”
Jisu pu phakngo, “Ango ke lalo, ei Israyel abang onenot, Hemphu si ili Arnam, Hemphu ke ihutdet;
aro nang ahuwit angthin, nang ajiu, nangneng aro nang ajakong pen Hemphu nang Arnam yok nengdok ngot.’
The-ni ke lalo, ‘Nang adung arel abangyok nang bithang yok badi nengdok ngot.’ Labang hini yok prek kanong ingjong.”
La-amun kanong paklangpo anangyok pulo, “Paklang po, melo; nang aserengsi pudo, te anang ihutdet, anang aparke kamprek ihut ta ingjong;
aro ahuwit ingthin, ahuwit abudhi, aro ahuwit ajakong pen anangyok nengdokngot, aro ibithangyok badi adung-arel abangyok nengdokngot, lalo ahuwit kiphi-kangton aro buli karkliyok ta songkhan chot.”
Lalong Jisu anangyok me-at chironsi angkipu dun theksi, Jisu anang yok pulo, “Nang Arnam-alongri parake akaholo dode yong.” La-amun para anangyok lam karju yok kaita aha wangwe yongo.
Jisu Arnam ahem long paklangsi kido amun, anang pulo, Khristo ke Dabhit po agijing pusi bangpo kanong paklang hel pot badi pudo?
Dabhit po Jiuli-Kangthir pen abithang kithan dak, “Hemphu si ne Hemphu yok pulo, ne nang hutur helyok nang kengpak arlo bibe lengke, holek ne ancho-ari aga iningot.
Dabhit po abithang anangyok ‘Hemphu;’ kipu, tene pot badi anangso chiplange?” Aro rat ke aneng arongsi anang lamhel arjulo.
Kapaklang asitemsi, anang pulo, “Inghosi pe akiding achol chi-iksi karting-wor akime hlongman, aro hathi-chari long aman pisi kardom en-worman,
aro Arnam ahemlong aghai anghol iningman, aro cho-jun aman kido aghai athem doman, ladi kanong paklang helyok chilangwen!
Anali himepe ahem panghoman aro pingkit pading hrimsi amahang chipadoman, anali kanghochot adai do ye.”
La-aphel Jisu Arnam ahem puru kithal ahong adung iningsi, arleng hel puru long nohok kithal langdun dingsi kido. Amokha hem-kime arleng hel nohok ako-ong thalo.
La-apor ihut kicho-kangwe hime arloso pe wangsi, tanga atheng aso hini pilo.
Anang adun helyok inan taram pungo aro analiyok pulo, “Khanangsi ne nali thando, puru long kithal ahuwit yok kicho kangwe himepe ongchot pilo.
Piyok pu tene anali ahuwit abithang kido-ong anohok para pilo; manta bangpe kicho kangwe yong ta anang potsi kido, lake anang ahuwit kabunsi hel pilo.”
Arnam ahem para Jisu olene kiwang amun adun ihut pulo, “O Paklang po, langnot te, pot badi arlong aro pot badi arlong kapachirhap ahem!”
Jisu pu phakngo, “Nali labang hem akithe kaparjak thekdo ma? Isi arlong ri-reye, holek isi arlong athak isi pachirhap ke bibesi wardetne.”
Konam Jisu Olip anglong kartulpelong Arnam ahem pamahangsi kangning amun, Pitor po, Jams po, Johon po aro Andriu po jolsi Jisu yok arjulo,
“Lamehel konam chiplange? aro labang ahuwit chokpleng ponyok kahonjok asin pot te?”
Aro Jisu analiyok kipu chengpono, “Kaita nali kachobe un-eh yok, trepne donot.
Amokha hane menpen wangsi, ne si labang po pusi amokha arleng yok chobele.
Manta nali dhawa aro dhawa kidoye kapangjar alam karju hlong amun angthin aduk doyek, labangke chiplang pene manta ki-or aporke wangwe lang.
Isi ason para isi ason chilang setsetne aro along-alongke chiklik wange. Lamehel ke aso kiplang ango abi kiwang badi.
“Nali abithangyok, chilangwen; piyokte pu tene anali tarang ahemyok nangnep pone; aro naliyok kachirdom ahemlong nali pame; aro nemen anat naliyok gobornor ango aro recho ango, hakhi than hlonge.
Aro la ango ason helyok kime-alamthe paharpen nange.

Konam lahel naliyok bisar ahem nangnep pone, aro la-amun pot punange, angoke bangpo chiron hap mek; manta labang apor naliyok potsi pathan hlonge bangpo thanot, piyok pu tene labang kithan po nali kalek, manta Jiuli-Kangthir parasi thane.
Akorte hel abithang amuso kamariyok champiye, aro ihut apa po asohelyok, asohel ape-apoyok lang setsetne aro analiyok mari ye;
aro ne men anatsi naliyok sime. Manta inghosi kijutyok chihisi doye anangsi joknge.
“Manta konam nang kido nangne athem long arjap hlonge, aro sim-meme kapangho abihini thek hlonge.” (kachiporhe abang abhu hlongot) Laparake Judiya kido abangke inglong ayok kat hlonge;
ihut sarnuk athak kido pasun nek, lale hem arlo lutdam ke bihini en damek;
ihut bithar along kido anang phan hem chol pa-en damek.
Agat kido arloso aro oso mok kipi arloso labang arni konbak kaphere me-me doye!
Labang hel kichum arni kichokche aphan pingkit.
Piyok pu tene labang arni potbadi aduk doye, Arnam kahurji long kicheng arni para minihok ladi aduk jatsi hlonghle yong aro hlonghle ye.
Aro Hemphu si lamehel aporhel pakomke nangtene, kaita ralreye; manta karwal tang aphan ke, inghoyok anang arwal, anang phanke labang arnihel pakome.
“Aro la-amun inghone bak naliyok than, ‘Langnot, Khristo holeksi do!’ lale ‘Langnot, anang lalong do,’— yongta bangpo krolek.
Asisik khristo aro asisik turki wang chiklange, aro ajatjat asin, aro apharan, arleng hel yok pharlep pone, un tene karwal tang abangyok ta chobel pone.
Manta chilang wenne donot; ne naliyok ahuwit pango dapsi nali thano.
“Manta lamehel adin, labang aduk aphel, arnipe ingting detne, chiklo aklar pipeye,
aro suneng para klolangso hel jange, aro suneng athak kido apharan hel hujuk detne.
Lapara ke Arleng Aso yok, kihal apharan aro jakong akar pensi inghun along kiwang thek hlonge.
Laparake anang tharlon helyok angtolsi, pirthimipe ahol para sunengpe aholyok, atok phili para Arnam karwal arleng helyok wansi pangrume.
“Dumuru arongpe para isi athenghlan alam chirli: konam kangduk arwo wang olesi, angjok wangman, la-amun phang-oh adin adung wanghlengo pusi nali thekman.
Labadisi konam lamehel kachiplang theknge, la-amun anang wang hlengsi, hem-honthu wanghlengo pusi nali bithangta chitheknge.
Khanangsi ne nali thando, lamehel apot chiplangple lengke, labang owepo arleng prelpre ye.
Suneng aro pirthimipe chilutne, manta ne lamthe chilutle ye.
“Manta Apa aparke ethakpe long kido tharlonhel, lale Aso, kaita labang adin lale labang aporpo than un-eh.
Chilang wenot, inghongne donot; piyok pu tene labang apor konamsi wanghlenge nali than-un eh.
Ihut arleng kamprek alongri kidam arlengpo badi, anang aturu hel yok aro abangten analiyok salpeksi, ahem tikangsi kidam apor duwar kihon poyok inghong dingsi kidoyok kithan, labadi chiplangdo.
Lasi, trepne donot; piyok pu tene hem ahemphu po anithu tong wangmene, lale jarlo tong wangmene, lale wo-kiku apor tong wang mene, lale katha-angbo amun wangmene, nali chithan un-eh,
lale anang photsi kiwang amun anang nalimek kijang thek hlonge mene.
Aro ne potsi pudo, ne ahuwit aphan pudo: trepne do.”
Kijoktang-kamai, lake pholo-kipipe Ahim-kamai ayok aro ni-ni ango kido. Bor-bangthe aro kanong paklang abang Jisu yok joljolsi kinep yok aro kamari aphan awak chilangsi dolo;
piyok pu tene anali pulo, “Kamai-arnike kalek, arleng hel ahul wang ta hal.”

Konam Bethani arong along Simon arje ibeng kisopo ahem kicho ayok, kangning apor ihut arloso pe kanempru aro adorchot ajangthu atema isi wansi, temaso pangholo aro anang phu along kanempru jangthu dungo.
Manta lalong kido abang neng kangsi thano, “Piyokte ladisi akime ajangthu panghon det do?
Piyok pu tene labang ajangthu jorsi phoro kithom ayok ta ongchot nohok hlongo hoi aro kicho kangwe abang ayok banta pajir uno hoi.”
Manta Jisu pulo, “Anang yok ahudet tikangot; piyok nali anangyok aduk pido? Anang nephan akimechot asal tikilo.
Piyok pu tene kicho kangwehel nalipen arnijon doman, aro konam nali kar-ih apor la-amun analiyok jinsodun un; manta ne ke nalipen arnijon dode.
Arlosope ki-un ateng anang tikilo; anang bangpoke thiri long kibi angodapsi ne abangpo long jangthu nehelo.
Khanangsi ne nali thando, pirthepe adak jotmehel labang kime-alamthe paharpon, labang athemlong anangyok neng chipurki aphan, anang pot asal tikilo, bangpota parju ponne.”
Laparake bang kere-hini asitem ihut Judas Iskariyot Jihuda po, anang Jisu yok bor-bangthe hel arideng kichampiyok, anali dungyok damo.
Anali anang lam onesi, aneng arongsi, anang ayok tanga kipiyok ching-akngo. Lalong anangyok me-at apor langsi kichampi ayok chirwalsi dolo.
Pholo kipipe ahim kamai kicheng arni, lake Kijoktang-kamai bik-aso buli karkli arni, anang adun hel anangyok pulo, “Daklongte hali damsi Kijoktang-kamai ahim nang phan kicho honjok damnang?”
La-apor anang anali adun bang-hini yok tolsi pulo, “Nali rongpe yok damot, aro lalong arleng ihut lang kolho isi kiwan jongne kido naliyok pochak nge; alang aphel phel damot,
aro anang kilut along, hem ahemphu yok pu, “Hemphu nang arjudo, dak longte ne adun helpen Kijoktang-kamai arni ne don ahem apulupo do?
Anang abithang kahonjok lapen kapangning, angsong ihum akithe hem apulu nali paklange aro lalong honjok ngot.”
Lasi bang-hini adun hel damo, aro Jisu pot badi kithan labadi hlongo; aro Kijoktang-kamai arni cho-jun honjok pilo.
Konam anithulo, Jisu bangkere-hini pen wang iningo.
Aro konam anali cho-jun athem iningo aro chosi kido amun, Jisu pulo, “Khanangsi ne nali thando, ne pen kicho arleng asitem ihutsi neyok champi ye.”
La apor anali neng aduk wangjin noh, aro ihut ihutsi anangyok arjulo, “Khanangke ne lo ma?”
Jisu analiyok thano, “Lake bangkere-hini adak, ingho ihut ne pensi kicho-asenge long him jokplup, bangpo ke anango.

Piyok pu tene Arleng Aso alam jibadi lo-kangthir long wido, latengsi anang chok pone; manta pot arleng pensi Arleng Aso ayok champidet, anang phan konbak kaphere meme do; labang arlengke kiplangple detsi akime kido.”
Anali chojunsi kido amun, anang him eno, bor-eh kihang aphel anang ingbengo, bangpo analiyok pilo, aro pulo, “Enot; labang ke ne abangpo.”
Laparake anang kijun alanghan eno, aro kardom kapajir aphel anang bangpo analiyok pilo, aro anali ahuwit bangpo para juno.
Anang analiyok pulo, “Lalo Angton along ne wi, lake ako-ong aphan kepsi lilo.
Khanangsi ne nali thando, Arnam-alongri long akimi athe alang junje leng arniyok, minon para rihanthu athe alang aro junjelo.”
La-amun para anali pingkit alun lunsi, anali Olip anglong yok olephlungsi damo.
Aro Jisu analiyok pulo, “Nali ahuwit tikang detne; piyok pu tene lo-kangthir long wido, ne khokhre yok paduknge, aro bherabik hel chisamphru detne.
Manta ne kiburphak aphel, ne nali ngo-ngosi Galili ayok dame.”
Pitor po anangyok pulo, “Ahuwit tikang det, yong ta neke tikangke ye;
Jisu anangyok pulo, “Khanangsi ne nang thando, labang anuwe, wopo bar-ni kiku ango, nang bar-thom neyok kachobel alam puye.”
Manta anang ingtangdut si pulo, “Ne nangpen thidun hlong yongta, ne nangyok chobelbe ye.” Aro anali lamat matsi abangten ta pulo.
Anali Gethsemani kipu athemyok damo; aro Jisu anang adun helyok pulo, “Ne kapingkit amun, nali holek iningne do.”
Anang pen Pitor po aro Jems po aro Johon po yok chipono aro kaphere aro aneng ihik-bihik chiplango.
Aro anang analiyok pulo, “Ne jiu kithibo ateng aduk wangjin do; holek long donot, aro inghongot.”
Aro bekso ango damsi, anang lungle athak tongki lo aro lake labang aduk apor un pu tene anang para tereksi kapangwe aphan, pingkit si pulo,
anang pulo, “Apa, nang ahuwit katiki pachok un; bangpo alanghan ne para terek ngot; yongta, ne kar-ih ateng kalek, manta nang kar-ih ateng.”
Anang wango, aro ahuwit amek jangphril kido thekngo; aro anang Pitor po yok pulo, “Simon, nangmek jangdo ma? Ghonta isi inghongke do un-eh yongo ma?
Inghongne do aro pingkit, nang hongjat apor wangwe ye; jiuli ke ar-ihman, manta a-ok long un-eh.”
Aro Jisu chiterek si damo aro lamat mat alamthesi, pingkit no.
Aro anang wang phakngo, aro analiyok mekjangsi kido thekngo, piyok pu tene anali ami-ih hel kardipsi kido; aro anali pot si kithan dunnange kido, chithan un-eh yongo.
La aphel anang phong-thomyok wango aro analiyok pulo, “Nali minon hok amek jangsi aro sangsi dolang ma? Dor ro! Apor wang hlengo; Arleng Aso yok papi arleng arideng champilo.
Thurnot, ili dam minang. Langot, neyok kichampi po adung wang hlengo.”

Lajong jongsi, anang kithan jong apor, Judas po bang kere-hini asitem ihutpo, wang hlengo; aro anangpen bor-bangthe, aro kanong paklang hel, aro sar-lar para nok aro kalbong ki-en amokha arleng hel wango.
Minonke anangyok kichampi arlengpo analiyok isi atewa pisi, kipu, “Ne kimung arleng polo, anangyok nepmot, aro mesone komrenne ponot!”
Lasi konam anang wango, anang photsi Jisu adung damo aro pulo, “Paklang po” aro, anangyok mungo.
Laparake anali anang abanglong otno, aro anangyok nepmo.
Manta anali adung kido ihutpo anang nok hungthero aro bor-bangthe hel aturu ihut yok dolsetsi, anang ano rot hlet no.
La-amunsi Jisu analiyok pulo, “Nali ke nokjir aro tokok ensi ihut kanghu kinep badisi wangdo ma?
Arnita ne nalipen Arnam ahem along lamthe kipaklang hong, aro nali la-apor ke nepne yongo. Manta bangpo lo-kangthir alamthe kipachok aphansi chiplango.”
Lapor anali ahuwit anangyok tikangsi kat phlungo.
La-apor riso ihut anang kang-ar ape, abang long chi-ik loksi aphel phel kidun. Anali anangyok ta nepmo,
manta anang kang-ar ape, tikangsi abang darang klungsi kat dungo.
Anali Jisu yok bor-bangthe aghaipo adung pono; aro ahuwit bor-bangthe, aro akisar hel aro kithek-kire abang ta wang chingrumo.
Pitor po ta, kaholo do si anang aphel-phel, bor-bangthe ahem adungyok duno, aro kihon abang pen me chinghipsi kido.
Minonke bor-bangthe pen ahuwit melpe dungsi Jisu yok kimari ado kipi aphan neng kachiri akangho alam hakhi arwalo, manta pahlong un-eh yongo.
Ako-ong arleng akijolsi anangyok ado kipi hakhi pilo, manta analihel hakhi chikengke yongot.
Angkhan arjapsi Jisu yok asisiksi hakhi pisi pulo,
“Ari pen kikem labang Arnam ahem hane panghosi, nithom yok, aripen kikemke prek ihum keme, anang ladi alam kipu arjulo!”
Manta, holek ta anali hakhi hel chingbar un-eh detno.
Aro aghai bor-bangthepo analingo arjapsi, Jisu yok arjulo, “Nang ke isi alam ta thanthe ma? Nang panghosi anali pot hakhi pido?”
Manta anang isi alam pupesi, dositsi dolo. Bor-bangthepo anangyok arju phakngo, “Nang ihut bor-eh kichok Aso Khristo ma?”
La-amun Jisu pulo, “Ne lo; aro nali Arleng Aso yok apharan kithechotpo ancho-ari abak iningsi kido theknge, aro suneng athak inghun pen kiwang thek hlonge.”
La-amun aghai bor-bangthepo abithang achol ingseksi pulo, “Ili minon hok pot hakhi kanange dolang?
Nali Arnam ayok kapatharak arjulo! Nali pot pachipdo?” La-amun ahuwit anangyok kithi nango pusi adai kolo.
Adhok ke anang bang along ingthi ingthok ngo, aro anang mahang dipsi anangyok tengsi pulo, “Arnam alam turkinot!” Aro kihon sonturi abang ta anang ang-om ardep mo aro sap pono.
La-apor Pitor po aling sotal along kido, aro aghai bor-bangthepo aturu arloso pe wango.
Konam Pitor po yok me chinghipsi kido thekngo, anangyok lang-etsi pulo, “Nang ta la Najaret Jisu pen kido,”
manta anang chobelsi, pulo, “Nang pot nethan do, lale nang potsi pudo ne abhu hlonghle yong.” Aro anang sotal aghai ayok olesi damo. Laparake wo alopo kulo.
Aro labang so-arloso pe, anangyok theksi, adung arjapsi kido abangyok puphakngo, “Bang arlengpo ta anali sitem ihut.”
Manta anang bangpo chobel phakngo; laparake bekso aphel ke adung arjapsi kido abang Pitor poyok pulo, “Khanangsi anali sitem nang ihut; piyok pu tene nang Galili arleng.”
Manta anang hao pisi aro hopot chosi pulo, “Nali pot arlengpo alam pudo, ne anangyok chinine pen.”

La-aporsi phong-ni yok wo alopo kulo. Laparake Jisu anangyok kipu alam, “wopo phong-ni kiku ango nang neyok phong-thom chobele,” labang aneng chipurkilo. Aro anang neng doho-ongo aro suru ching-ak ngo.

Adap tha-ango, bor-bangthehel kithe-kiding aro akisar helpen, aro kanong paklang helpen, aro lake ajal-dungsi ason amel long anali lam chirwal-chirhepmo. Anali Jisu yok hirkuli pen bamo, anangyok pono, aro Pilat po arideng champilo.
Pilat po anangyok lam arjulo, “Nang Jihudi hel Arecho ma?” Jisu anangyok pulo, “Nang bithangsi thando.”
La-aporsi bor-bangthe hel Jisu yok amokha adai pijap mo.
Laparake Pilat po anangyok arju phakngo, “Nang lam itheta pudun chetche ma? Langot, anali nang pangho si konbak adai pido.”
Manta Jisu ke lam ithe ta harlek dun chetche yongo, lasi Pilat po asombhik hlongo.
Minonke Kijoktang-kamai kido aphongten Pilat po akrol kibeng arleng jaibake ihutyok, rat kihang ateng hlopiman.
La-amun rat-ahul wansi arleng kamari Barabas amen ihut arleng akrol along kido.
Lasi rat ke wango aro la-amun abi-pun ateng lahel aphan katikipi ayok Pilat po adung chindukngo.
Aro anang analiyok thano, “Jihudi hel Arecho po ayok nali pajokpi yok anengdo ma?”
Piyok pu tene anang bor-bangthe helsi Jisu yok amek kiso anatsi anang rideng champido pusi Pilat po kachithan un.
Manta bor-bangthe hel ratyok lam chutkreng si anali phanke Jisu aholan Barabas po yoksi kipahlo tolyok Pilat po yok pathan tolo.
Pilat po ratyok pudun phakngo, “Laparake, nali ingho yok Jihudi hel Arecho pudo, anangyok ke ne pot ote nang?”
Anali hang solsi pulo, “Anangyok kros long tarnot!”
Pilat po lahelyok arjulo, “Piyok, anang pot te ado tiki lo?” Manta lahel hang chot-chotsi pulo, “Anangyok kros long tarnot!”
Lasi Pilat po ratyok aneng kapangsam anengsi, analiyok Barabas po pajokngo; aro Jisu yok sabuk pen pasapsi, kros long kitar yok pekngo.
Laparake sonturi hel gobornor po ahem sotalyok Jisu yok pono; aro anali ahuwit sonturi helyok taramo.
Aro Jisu yok hapek arohon ape pa-ikngo; aro ingsu meresi phurkup badi otesi, anang phu long pa-ikngo.
Aro lahel anangyok chirdomo, “Jihudi hel arechopo, ajiu pading nang!”
Aro anang phulong prichek atokok pen arbulo, aro anangyok ingthi ingthok ngo, aro anali tarhuksi anangyok aman pisi chirdomo.
Anang yok ajatjat chongnek tangsi, anang hapek arohon apehel ingsekngo aro anang bithang ape hel pa-ik phakngo. Laparake anali Jisu yok kros kitaryok pono.
Anali duwar ibengsi, Kuriniya para kiwang arleng, ape-apoke Alekjendar po aro Ruphas pe kido, Simon amen arleng pochakngo aro sonturi hel Jisu kros po parung ponkek ngo.
Laparake anali Jisu yok Golgotha, lake “Aphu akhorlop” kipuman athem anangyok wano.
Aro lahel anangyok hor pen thengpe arong aphek pachiloksi kijunyok pilo manta anang bangpo junje yongot.
Aro anangyok kros along tardongo, aro anang pehel abhak kapahlong ayok, akorom kime chilangsi, anang pehel chithaksi eno.
La-amun adap baji sirkep apun, lahel anang yok kros kitar.
Anangyok kilang setset alamthe ke “Jihudi hel Arecho” pusi kiwi alampen aphu tang athak tarduno.
Aro lahel anang pen bang-hini dakuwal, ihutke anang ancho-ari aga aro ihutke anang debera-ari aga kros tarduno.
“Lalong anangyok kithi nangehel pen alekha chokngo,” kipu labang lo-kangthir alamthe chok peno.
Ingho duwar kidam abang anali phu chihujuk chihujuksi anang patharak jok-joksi pulo, “Lalo, nang Arnam ahem panghosi ni-thom arni ke Arnam ahem kikem unpo,”
nang bithang chiralne kros para wangsun.
Labenthotsi bor-bangthe pen kanong kapaklang abangta anang patharak jok-joksi pulo, “Bang helyok ke anang ralo; anang bithang yok ke chiral un-eh.
Khristo, Israel longri Arecho, minon kros para wang pasun nang, tangsi hali ta theknge aro krolle.” La bang-hini anang pen kros kitar dun abangta, anangyok patharak ngo.
Laparake baji kere-hini apor, nelo sitem dut-dut amun ghonta kithom sukam alongri dung ingting klakngo.
Baji kithombak apun Jisu suru ghuk-ghuk si pulo, “Eloi Eloi, lama sabachthani?” Labang acho alampo ke, “Ne Arnam, ne Arnam piyok te nang netikango?”
Aro adhok arjap dingne kidodun abang labang arjuhlongsi pulo, “Langnot te anangke Elija po yok taramdo.”

Aro ihutke katno, pe kang-ar ipakpen hor akithor long nimo aro dharim alonso long labang homsi kijunyok pilo aro pulo, “Inghong tha, Elija po wangsi anangyok wang pasun ma wang pasun-se ili langsonang.”
Laparake Jisu iphong hang-wongsi anang ki-or ashithe eno.
Aro Arnam ahem kihing kachi-ar ape athak para alingyok phlakni chingsek phleno.
Minonke konam Jisu adungsi kros amahang semsemsi arjapsi kido Santuri aghaipo, ladi haksi anang ki-or asithe ki-en thekngo, aro anang pulo, “Khanangsi labang arlengpo Arnam Aso.”
La-apor Megdalini Mary pe, akibek Jems po, aro Josi po anang ai Mary pe, aro Salomi pe, la-ahuwit arloso hel, Jisu Galili kido amun, anang aphel-phel wang kidun.
Ananli Jisu yok al-poson ki-en, anali, aro kamprek ako-ong arloso anang pen Jerusalem yok wang-kidun, lamehel arloso kaholo para langsi kido.
Anithu aporo, aro labang arni ke kisang-arni ango Kachihonjok-arni kido,
Arimathiya arongpe Josep po, ihut ason amel abangphu aro Arnam-alongri kiwang aphan kanghong ding arleng kido. Anang chipahadut si Pilat po adung ayok damo aro Jisu kithi arangpo anangyok hango.
Manta Pilat po asombhik pahlongsi, Jisu la-an thidapmo ma welang, ladi neng ihik-bihik chiplangsi, aphoro sonturi aghaipo yok pawang tolsi arjulo, “Anang dakne para thi tango ma?”
Sonturi aghaipo para lampo chithan unsi, Pilat po Josep po yok Jisu kithi arangpo pilo.

Josep po kang-ar ape ipak wano aro kithi arangpo papasun si labang ape pensi pero. Anang arlong kangtang long kihuk thiri ahilikpo long pa-isi bilo; laparake anang thiri amahang arlong aplang akithe paklongsi bilo.
Mary Magdalini pe aro Josep po anang ai Mary pe, daklong kithi arangpo kibi athem langdingsi kido.
Kisang-arni kidamtang aphel, Mary Megdalini pe pen Jems po anang ai Mary pe aro Salomi pe Jisu abanglong jangthu kihelyok lahel kanempru jangthu namo.
Ni-arul arni adap prang arni kiwang apor lahel thiri ahilikpo ayok damo.
Thiri aduwar para lahel hijan chipujolo, “Ili phan inghote thiri ahilik arlongpo pakonglong piye?”
La-apor lahel kilang ayok ke, arlongpo pakonglong si kibi thekngo; piyok pu tene labang arlongpo watsi aplang akithe kido.
Lahel thiri ahilikpo yok lutdamsi, akiding pe akilok phlan kachi-ik ihut riso arlengyok ancho-ari aga iningsi kido theksi, lahel bismat pahlongo.
Manta anang analiyok pulo, “Neng sohrim mek; nali kros long kithi Najaret Jisu yok langwor do; anang thuro, holek ingjong; langot, lalo anangyok anangyok kibi athempo.”
Manta nali damot, anang adun hel yok aro Pitor po yok thandamot, anang nalingo-ngo si Galili ayok damjongdo; anang jibadi naliyok kithan, ladisi naliyok lalong anangyok thek hlonge.
La-amun lahel olesi, thiri ahilik po para kat-katsi damo; piyok pu tene kaphere aro bismat hlongo; aro lahel kaiyok ta lam chipuhalhe yongo, piyok pu tene lahel kaphere-ong kido.
Ni-arul arni adap prang Jisu kithi para burphaksi, inghoyoksi Jisu si-ik Arnam bang thorok-isi anang para ka-ujhar, labang Mary Megdalini pe yok ango chiklango.
Anang damsi lahel aneng chipaduk si suru jongne kido ango alok hel yok thano.
Manta Jisu hreng phakngo, aro anangyok thek dungo pusi kipu karju amun, anangyok lahel krolkre yongo.
Labang aphel, lahel bang hini rong ayok damjongne kido ako anali bang hiniyok Jisu kamprek athoksi chiklango.
La-amun lahel damsi bang hel ayok parju pono; manta lahel ta analiyok krolkre yongo.

Labang aphel bang kere-isi adun cho-jun long iningsi kido apor, Jisu analiyok chiklango aro kibur phak aphel, anangyok kithek hlong abang hel kikrolkre apot, anali kikrolmo aro aneng karthat kachibi hel ayok tamo.
Aro anang lahel ayok pulo, “Nali ahuwit pirthepe yok damot, sanse-chanjal ajaldung ango kime-alamthe paharnot.
Lalong ingho krolsi baptist chiplang, anang jok hlonge; manta inghosi krolmo doman, anang ado chibat hlonge, aro labang asinhel kikrol abang adak chiklang dune,
nali nemen pen si-ik ujhar une; akimi-akimi alam than une, phurul ayok rung une;
anali kithi-nange penebak abi alang jun pong yongta, lahel inghohe ye, kiso-kilak arleng abang long ari bat tene lahel meye.”
Labadi si lahelpen lam kachithan tang aphel Hemphu Jisu yok ethakpe yok thur pono aro Arnam ancho-ari aga iningo.
La-aphel lahel ole damsi, ahuwit athem along lamthe pahar pono; aro Arnam la jong-jongsi sal tikisi, labang alamthe atengsi asin aporman paklang pono. Amen.
Ilidak kichok alam amek sungdangne kithek hel aro lamthe kapahar abang ako-ong arleng kiwi-kitok yok anali arideng en pono,
lake anali inghosi kicheng adak para katiki tang asal alam hakhi kido aro lamthe paharsi kiwi, anali haliyok kapaklang atengsi,
ne ta kicheng para ahuwit meso chilang-chibem pachikeng tangsi me-at archalsi, kangthir karjap loseng kangsam Thiyophilas po aphan kiwiyok kime thekngo,
lasi nali khanang alamthe hel thek-re aphan nali kithan tang atengsi wilo.
Judiya arecho Herod po apor Abija po agijing long Jakhariya amen ihut bangthe kido. Anang pisope ke Harun po agijing kido, aro anang menke Elijabet kido.
Anali bang-hini Arnam ango dhorom kangthir kido, aro Hemphu ahuwit kanong aro abi-pun ateng meng phrot si kido.
Manta anali aso wedungsi kido, piyok pu tene Elijabet pe baji kido aro anali bang-hini ta sar ongo.
Iphong anang Arnam ango bangthe asal katiki jong aro anang katiki apal kido,
bangthe po katiki abi apun badisi Hemphu kachirdom ayok katiki apal hlongsi Arnam ahemyok lut damo aro hujung thekngo.
Minonke hujung kithek amun rat hel mokol long kapingkit jong,
laparake anangyok Hemphu atharlon ihut athuli long hujung kithek ancho-ari aga arjapsi anangyok chiklango.
Jakhariya po anangyok theksi anang chiron un-eh pholo aro phere detno.
Manta labang Arnam tharlon anangyok pulo, “Jakhariya, phere yek, nang pingkit arjulo, nang piso Elijabet pe so-penso ihut hlonge, aro nang anang men- Johon binot.
Nang nengrong choknge aro aneng ingsame, aro anang kiplang apor ako-ong arleng nengronge,
piyok pu tene Hemphu angot anang aghai chiplange aro anang hor lale rihanthu alang junjeye, aro anang ai apok para Jiuli-Kangthir pensi plenge.
Anang Israel aso hel ako-ong anali Hemphu Arnam ayok neng pharlepme.
Anang Hemphu yok trepne kido aphan, lasi asomar ayok apohel aneng, aro dhorom kangthir agiyan longyok kimengme abangyok, anang Elija po ajiuli aro ajakong pen Hemphu ango-ango dame.”
Jakhariya po Arnam tharlonpo yok pulo, “Ne ke ihut akisar arleng aro nepiso pe ta saro, ne pot badi labang than une?”
Aro Arnam tharlon anangyok pulo, “Arnam ango arjapsi kidoman Gabriyel po lake ne lo; aro nang pen lam kachithan yok aro labang kime-alamthe nang kithanyok neyok wang tolo.
Manta minon, nang nelamthe kikrolkre apot, nang arni chokche lengke, konam adin bangpomar choknge, la arniyok nang debal chiplangsi lam than un-eh ye.”
La amun arleng hel Jakhariya po ayok inghong dingsi kido, aro anang Arnam ahem long kapabhem apot anali asombhik hlongo.
Konam anang mokol wang olelo, anang anali yok lam than un-eh yongo, aro lasi anang Arnam ahem long penebak kachiklang pusi anali chirono. Anang analiyok ajat-jat ari atewa pilo; aro kalarsi do jongo.
Konam anang katiki asal apor chok tango, anang ahemyok damo.
Labang arni aphel anang piso Elijabet pe agat dolo; aro anang chiklo jon-phongo chibuti sitsi dolo. Anang pulo,
“Konam anang neyok nejinso lo labang ke Hemphu katiki asal aro ne arleng aphan nekapatharak kachihi para, labadisi kangho hel kolo.”
Chiklo jon-thorok apor, Galili alongri Najaret rongpe yok, Gabriyel tharlon yok Arnam para wang kitol,
ihut so-arloso pen arik-kichowen Dabhit po agijing Josep amen ihut arleng kido, aro so arloso amen ke Mary pe kido.
Aro tharlon, anangdung wangsi pulo, “Ei Arnam kajinso kihlong so arloso pe, Hemphu nangpen bor-eh pado nang.”
Manta anang lamthe arjusi chiron hapmo, anang nenglong chirondingo, labangpo ke pot badi bor-eh kichok alam.
Arnam tharlonpo anangyok pulo, “Mary pe, phere yek; piyok pu tene nang Arnam para jinso hlongo.
Aro minon, nang agat dosi, So penso ihut plange, aro anang amen Jisu binot.
Anang kithepo chiplange, aro Aghaichot Arnam Aso pusi chitha-ange, aro Hemphu Arnam anang sar-lar Dabhit po anghol anangyok piye.
Anangsi Jakup po agijing aphuthak anang mophelyok pangdom pone, anang longri ke jat or-eh ye.”
Mary pe Arnam tharlon ayok pulo, “Neke nepihan ingjong, la-apot labang alam pot badi chiplange?”
Arnam tharlon anangyok pulo, “Jiuli-Kangthir nang phuthak wange, aro Aghaichot Arnam ajakong nang phuthak tibene; lasi kiplange Oso so ke Kangthir Arnam Aso pusi chitha-ange.
Aro minon, nang bai Elijabet pe akisar amun yongta ihut sopenso agat do, inghoyok baji kipu, anang agat kido chiklo jon-thorok chokngo.
Piyok pu tene Arnam long ki-un eh ingjong.”
Laparake Mary pe pulo, “Ne holek do, Hemphu amurkiya pelo, nang kipu alamthe badine pachok nang.” Laparake Arnam tharlon anang para chikakngo.
Labang arni adak Mary pe damo aro parjangsi Judiya rongpe inglong alongri yok damsi,
anang Jakhariya po ahemyok damsi Elijabet pe yok Mary pe nengsam kardom pajiro.
Mary pe konam kardom kapajir Elijabet pe arju penpano, anang agat kido oso so klemo; aro Elijabet pe Jiuli-Kangthir plengsi,
aro anang hang-wongsi pulo, “Arloso hel asitem bor-eh kichokpe; aro nang agat kido oso sota bor-eh pachok nang.
Aro Hemphu anang aipe nekapochak yok wango, nekorom kime daklong para chokngo?
Piyok pu tene jongsi ne nengsam kapajir arju hlongo, ne agat kido oso so aneng arongsi klemo.
Aro Hemphu para nangyok jibak kithan, labang ahuwit chokpene pusi kikrolpe, nang krolsi bor-eh kichokpe lo.”
Mary pe pulo, “Ne jiu long Hemphu yok parklam do,
Ne Ral Hemphu Arnam long neneng arong do,
piyok pu tene anang bithang murkiyape chakchepho apunyok lango, lasi minon para awe-awe yokta bor-eh kichokpe pusi nitarane;
piyok pu tene anang inghosi jakong akithe asal nephan tikilo, anang menke kangthir.
Anang yok kaphere owe para owe yok kajinso doman.
Anang awengkong kangtang pensi kihal jakong tikilo; anang ingho angthin kachiron long aborai do, analiyok anang pachidat detno.
Anang ajakong kido abangyok recho anghol para pasunsi, kibek het abang yok pangthuro.
Anang kangchirpo yok akime abihini pen padoro aro kidolepo yok anang pangwe detsi tolo.
Anang neng kajinso kachipurki pen anang murkiya Israyel abangyok anang rapmo,
ili pa Abraham po yok aro anang so-su hel yokta mophel yok anang seme-kitang badi!”
Aro Mary pe, Elijabet pe pen chiklo jon-thom dosi anang hemyok chirulo.
Minonke Elijabet pe oso kihlong apor chokngo, aro anang so penso ihut paplango.
Anang adung arel aro hemphlak hemcher abang helta Hemphu anangyok kajinso chot kapaklang arjusi anali anang pen nengrongo.
Ni-narkep arni oso-so sunnot (a-ok kangtep) kanghol yok anali wano, aro anang pa Jakhariya po badi amen kibiye lo.
Manta anang aipe pulo, “Kalek, anang men ke Johon si biye.”
Anali anangyok, “Nali hembang long ihut ta ladi amen ingjong.”
Aro anali anangpa yok atewa pisi arjulo, “Nang pot amen kibiyok aneng doman?”
Lasi Jakhariya po kiwi silot ipak hango aro wilo, “Anang menke Johon.” Aro anali ahuwit ta asombhik hlongo.
La jongsi Jakhariya po angho ingkosi lam than uno aro anang Arnam yok parklamo.
Lasi anali dung arel abang pherelo aro lamehel alam Judiya inglong alongri dungsi chitha-ang detno.
“Labang oso so potsi chiplange” pusi, abithang anenglong chipherelo, piyok pu tene Hemphu ari anang pen kido.
Laparake anang apa Jakhariya po Jiuli-Kangthir plengsi kido, aro turki ponsi thano:
“Hemphu Arnam bor-eh kido Israyel abang Hemphu Arnam bor-eh pado nang, piyok pu tene anang wango, aro anang arleng helyok pajokngo.
Anang murkiya Dabhit po ahem para kipajok apharan aphan wango,
anang atono kangthir turki hel parasi anang angho pen kithan,
ili hutur hel para aro ili kisim abang arideng para pajoknge,
ili pa helyok kajinsone kaching-ak kapachok aro anang kangthir kachingnak hel kachipurki yok,
dak bangposi ili sar-lar Abraham po yok anang seme-kitang,
lake ili yok pachokngo, ili hutur hel arideng para pajokngo, lake phereresi kachirdom yok,
kangthir aro dhorom si arnita anang ngo do nange.
“Aro nang, ososo Akithechot Arnam turki po pusi puye, piyok pu tene Hemphu damsi anang duwar hel honjok dame,
anang arleng helyok anali pap hel para kijok agiyan kipi yok,
ili Arnam nengdok kajinso para ili thak ethakpe para chiklano,
kangting aro kithi aben long kido abang yok katha-ang kipiyok, aro ili kengkam nengsam aduwar yok ili kipon yok.”
Oso so the-dingsi, aro jiuli pen apharan dolo, aro anang Israyel ajat ango kachiklang adinyok ingnam aju longsi kido.
Koisor Agastas recho po munusi hel alekhot pinange pusi pirthepe dung thano.
Bangposi kicheng cheng arleng alekhot ki-enpon aro Siriya alongri Kuirinias po gobornor kido.
Ahuwit ta amen alekhot kachipi ayok abithang rongso yok damo.
Josep po ta Galili alongri Najaret rongso para Judiya alongri Dabhit po kido rongpe Bethlehem yok damo, piyok pu tene anangke Dabhit recho po kiplang ahem agijing kido.
Anang amen alekha kachipiyok anang don arik-kicho tang, agat kido Mary pe yok ensi damo.
Konam anali lalong hleng damo la-amun aso kiplang apor chokngo.
Aro anang so tahang penso oso paplango aro anangyok pe pen persi longhong long pa-ih lo. Piyokte pu tene don ahem athem kangwe dung.
Labang alongri angbong angkhan khokhre hel bithar long anali anuwe bherabik honsi kido.
Laparake Hemphu long ihut Arnam tharlon anali dung chiklango aro Hemphu Arnam tharlon analiyok katha-ang pilo aro anali chiphere detno.
Manta tharlon analiyok pulo, “Phere yek! Ne nali ahuwit arleng hel aphan kime-alamthe wando.
Mini Dabhit po rongpe long naliphan Ral Hemphu plango, anangsi Khristo, Hemphu lo.
Bangpo nali phan isi asin hlonge: nali ihut oso pepen persi aro longhong long pa-ih lotsi kibi hlong dame.”
Aro jongsi ethakpe para Arnam tharlon ako-ong, labang tharlon pen chiloksi Arnam yok bokhonesi pulo,
“Ethakpe long Arnam jortang padonang, aro pirthimipe athak, anang inghoyok neng jinsoye arleng hel asitem nengsam padonang.”
Konam tharlonhel analiyok tikangsi aro ethakpe ayok damo, khokhre hel chipujolo, “Hemphu Arnam kithan alam kachiplang apotmar kilang ayok ili minon Bethlehem ayok dam nang dou.”
Lasi anali parjangsi damo aro Mary pe pen Josep po yok pochakngo, aro oso so longhong long kapa-ih thek hlongo.
Konam khokhre hel anangyok thekngo, oso so anat Arnam tharlon analiyok potsi kipu alam, labang ahuwit alam thanpono;
aro ahuwit ta khokhre hel kipu alam arjusi asombhik hlongo.
Manta lamehel apot mar Mary pe aneng chiron-chibemsi neng chiparilo.
Khokhre helyok jibadi kipu, ladisi anali ahuwit theksi, Arnam yok bokhone si lunso lunsi chirulsi damo.
Narkep arni kidam aphel, konam oso so a-ok kangtep aporo, la-amun anang menke Jisu pusi bilo. Labang amen, anang apok arlo kido ango Arnam tharlon po parasi amen kipi.
Konam Mosi po kanong badi, anali kachipangthir ayok aporo, la-amun Hemphu long anangyok kichampi yok, anali Jerusalem yok wango,
(Hemphu Arnam kanong long kiwi badi, “So tahang penso oso yok Hemphu lang kangthir pusi puye,” kipu badi),
aro Hemphu kanong long kipu badi analita wothum jor-ni lale wothum aso jon-ni Hemphu Arnam aphan buli kipiyok pidamo.
Minon ke Jerusalem long kido Simiyon amen, ihut arleng kido; anang dhorom kangthir, Arnam kaphere, aro Israyel alongri kiralyok inghong dingsi kido arleng, aro anang phuthak Jiuli-Kangthir kido.
Aro Hemphu, lake Khristo yok thekthe lengke, anang thitheye, labang alam Jiuli-Kangthir parasi anangyok kachiklang.
Jiuli-Kangthir pen nengrungsi Simiyon po Arnam ahem wango; aro konam ape-apo Jisu oso so aphan kanong abi-pun badi tikisi kapatang yok Arnam ahem wano,
Simiyon po oso soyok arbaksi Arnam yok kardom pisi pulo,
“O Hemphu, minon nang lamthe ateng nang murkiya po yok nengsamsi padine tolnot;
piyok pu tene nemek pensi nang kapajoktang thek hlongo.
Jibak kijoktang ahuwit arleng hel amahang kido amunsi nang honjok krengo,
Bang-ajat helyok nang katha-ang kachiklang yok aro nang Israyel arleng jortang kidoyok,”
Aro oso so aphan labang jipe kipu alam thano, anang aipe-apo la-amun asombhik hlong detno.

Laparake Simiyon po analiyok bor-eh pilo aro anang ai Mary pe yok pulo, “Labang oso so akong-ong arleng Israyel agijing adak kanghon aro kijok aphan, aro arleng hel kipatharak asin aphan, Oso-soyok Arnam pachakdo,
aro lake ingthin alam pachiklane—aro ihong nokjir abithang ajiu longta kichang atenge.
Lalong Aser ajat Phanuyel po aso pe Anna amenpen, abo akisar turki pe ihut apihan po pen nengkan thorok isi chi-ensi,
laparake angkol philine-phili anengkan ayok himepe chiplangsi dolo. Anang Arnam ahem para chiterekre pensi, an-kihum aro pingkit pen anelo-anuwe chirdomsi kido.
La-aporsi anangta hem arloyok wang lutno, aro Arnam yok parklamyok aro Jerusalem rongpe kijokyok inghongsi kido ahuwit arleng ango oso so alamthe kithan chengpono.
Konam anali Arnam kanong ateng kanange ahuwit patang detno aro anali Galili alongri, abithang arong Najaret ayok chirulo.
Oso-so thelo aro ajakong wango, aro Arnam kajinso anang phuthak dolo.
Minon ke anengkan ten Jisu ape-apo Kijoktang-kamai aphan Jerusalem yok kidam.
Aro, konam Jisu nengkan kere-hini abo chokngo, anali abi-pun ateng kamai along damo.
Konam kamai oro ar anali chirulsi wango, oso Jisu ke Jerusalem long ri-ero, manta anang ape apo ke than un-eh yongo.
Anang lokjor arleng asitemdo pusi chironsi dolo, anali inirsi aduwar damo. Laparake anang don-rat aro alok-jor asitem bisar damo.
Konam anali Jisu yok pahlong un-eh yongo, anali bisar bisarsi Jerusalem ayok wang phakngo.
Ni-thom aphel anali anangyok Arnam ahem long hlongo, anang paklang hel asitem iningsi, anali lam onesi kido, aro analiyok lam ako-ong arjusi kido pahlong damo.
Aro inghosi anang lam arjulo, anali ahuwit lam abhu kihlong hel aro lam kiwol dun phak hel asombhik hlongo.
Konam anang ape-apo anangyok thekngo anali asombhik hlongo; aro anang aipe anangyok pulo, “Ei pa, haliyok piyok te ladi sansedo? Langot, nang pa pen ne ta konbak aneng aduksi nangyok bisar-wor do.”
Anang ape-apoyok pulo, “Nali piyok te neyok bisar-wor do? Ne Apa ahemlong ne do nange puke nali than un-eh yong ma?”
Manta anang kipu alam abhu hlonghle yongo.
Lapara ke anang analipen damo, aro Najaret yok hlengsi, anali lam mengdun hopsi dolo; anang aipe ke lamehel ahuwit angthin along nengchirilo.
Aro Jisu agiyan pen, aro abo anengkan, aro Arnam aro munusi kajinso long kihari do-longo.

Tiberiyas Koisor recho kachiplang nengkan kere-phongo amun, Pontiyas Pilat po Judiya along gobornor kido, aro Herod po, Galili alongri arecho kido; aro amuso Philip po, Ituria aro Trakhonitis arecho kido aro Lisaniyas poke Abileni alongri arecho kido amun,
Anas po aro Kaiphas po bor-bangthe kido amun, ingnam along Jakhariya po aso Johon po yok Arnam lamthe chiklango.
Anang Jordan adung angbongyok damo, pap kachikol aphan neng chipharlepsi baptist kachiplang alam paharo,
labang alam Jisoya turki po kiwi ateng “Inghone bak ingnam ajiu kihang kataram asi ke ladi: Hemphu aduwar chihonjok, anang duwarne pakengot.
Thol ahlam ten teldetne, inglong aro inglong kartul ten pardel detne, kikek aduwar pakenge, aro khukhrak-mukhrak aduwar hel panele;
aro ahuwit munusi Arnam kapajok thek hlonge.”
Johon po adung baptist kachiplang ayok kiwang arat yok anang pulo, “Ei phurul badi angho abi kido abang! Arnam akang para jok une pusi ingho nali paphere lo?

Neng kachipharlep kamichang athe pawangot. Nali bithangyok Abraham po hali sar-lar, puke chithan wor-rek; piyok pu tene ne naliyok thando, Arnam labang arlong pomar parasi Abraham po asomar paplang un.
Minon manta thengpe akangri kuthar biwen do, la-apot jibak arong akime athe wangwe, labang yok ke thu-detsi melong thek detman.”
Aro rat hel anangyok arjulo, “Tene halike pot tiki nange?”
Aro Johon po anali yok pu phakngo, “Inghosi pak-ni chol doma, anang chol kangwe arlengpo pen chithakngot; aro inghosi kicho kijun doma, anang ta labadi pachithak nang.”
Kalukdar hel yongta baptist kachiplang ayok wangsi anangyok arjulo, “Paklang po halike pot te tiki nange?”
Anang analiyok pulo, “Nali kapachak yok ongchot ke rungek.”
Sonturi hel ta anangyok arjulo, “Hali ta pot te tikinange?” La-amun anang analiyok pulo, “Kaiyok ta apharan pen, lale asisik ado piyek; aro nali adatso atengne aneng nengsam donot.”
Arleng hel kachiha ding, labang Johon po si Khristo lalo ma kalek pusi anali angthin arlo chironsi kido amunsi,

Johon po anali ahuwit yokta puphak ngo, “Ne ke naliyok lang pensi baptist otedo, manta neyok ke apharan kidochot wangsi do; ne anang keng-op arikso ta kiphlok yok ne michangche. Anangsi naliyok Jiuli-Kangthir ame pensi baptist ote ye.
Anang sok anang rak along pangrum yok, anang baleng anang ridengsi do, aro aphe-eh hel ke anang or-eh len me-aten long pasek detne.”
Lasi, anang prek-prek lamthe pen paklangsi, arleng hel angot kime-alamthe paharo.
Manta Herod recho po, anang amuso apiso Herodiyas pe yok kachi-en alam aro kamprek akangho asal katiki alam ta, Johon po parasi kangje apot,
Herod recho po Johon po yok akrol along thalsi, pap katiki aphuthak pap tikilo.
Minonke ahuwit arleng baptist ka-ote amunsi, Jisu yok ta baptist otelo, anang kapingkit apor, ethakpe aduwar chingpulo,
Aro Jiuli-Kangthir athok agor chikarlusi, wothum badi chiplang si, anang aphuthak wang suno. Aro ethakpe para lamthe isi asi wango, “Nang ne nengdok Aso, nangyok ne neng ingsamdo.”
Jisu Arnam asal katiki amun, anang abo ke thom-kep bak anengkan kichok; (banghel abhu kihlong ateng ke) Anang Josep po aso aro Josep po ke Heli po aso,
Heli po ke Manot po aso, Manot po ke Lebi po aso, Lebi po ke Melkhi po aso, Melkhi po ke Janai po aso, Janai po ke Josep po aso,
Josep po ke Matathiyas po aso, Matathiyas po ke Amos po aso, Amos po ke Nahum po aso, Nahum po ke Esli po aso, Esli po ke Nagai po aso,
Nagai po ke Maath po aso, Maath po ke Matathiyas po aso, Matathiyas po ke Semeyin po aso, Semeyin po ke Joses po aso, Joses po ke Joda po aso,
Jado po ke Joanan po aso, Joanan po ke Rihsa aso, Rihsa ke Jerubabel po aso, Jerubabel po ke Seyeltiyel po aso, Seyeltiyel po ke Neri po aso,
Neri po ke Melkhi po aso, Melkhi po ke Adi po aso, Adi po ke Kosam po aso, Kosam po ke Elmadam po aso, Elmadam po ke Er po aso,
Er po ke Josuwa po aso, Josuwa po ke Eliyajar po aso, Eliyajar po ke Jorim po aso, Jorim po ke Mathat po aso, Mathat po ke Lebi po aso,
Lebi po ke Simiyon po aso, Simiyon po ke Juda po aso, Juda po ke Josep po aso, Josep po ke Jonam po aso, Jonam po ke Eliyakim po aso,
Eliyakim po ke Meleya po aso, Meleya po ke Mena po aso, Mena po ke Metanot po aso, Metanot po ke Nathan po aso, Nathan po ke Dabhit po aso,
Dabhit po ke Jesi po aso, Jesi po ke Obet po aso, Obet po ke Bowaj po aso, Bowaj po ke Sala po aso, Sala po ke Nason po aso,
Nason po ke Aminadap po aso, Aminadap po ke Admin po aso, Admin po ke Arnip po aso, Arnip po ke Hejron po aso, Hejron po ke Perej po aso, Perej po ke Juda po aso,
Juda po ke Jakup po aso, Jakup po ke Aijak po aso, Aijak po ke Abraham po aso, Abraham po ke Tera po aso, Tera po ke Nahur po aso,
Nahur po ke Serugpo aso, Serug po ke Reu po aso, Reu po ke Peleg po aso, Peleg po ke Eber po aso, Eber po ke Sela po aso,
Sela po ke Kainan po aso, Kainan po ke Arphasat po aso, Arphasat po ke Sem po aso, Sem po ke Nowa po aso, Nowa po ke Lamek po aso,
Lamek po ke Methusela po aso, Methusela po ke Inuk po aso, Inuk po ke Jaret po aso, Jaret po ke Mahalil po aso, Mahalil po ke Kainan po aso,
Kainan po ke Inus po aso, Inus po ke Seth po aso, Seth po ke Adam po aso, Adam po ke Arnam Aso.
Jisu, Jiuli-Kangthir plengsi, Jordan para wang chirulo aro Jiuli pen ingnam yok pono,
lalong angkol-hini arni ingnam long si-ik para honjat lango, labang arnihel long choche dungsi kido aro kijut arnike anang an ingchiro.
La-amun si-ik anangyok pulo, “Nang Arnam Aso tene, labang arlongpo him kachiplang yok thanot.”
Aro Jisu angpudun phakngo, “Arleng him pen detke hrenghre, ladi kiwi do.”
Lapara ke Jisu yok inglong kartul long ponsi pirthepe ahuwit longri anangyok paklango.
Aro si-ikpo anangyok thano, “Labang ahuwit apharan aro anang jortang ne nangpi ye; piyok pu tene lamehel ne rideng pitango, aro ne ingho yok kipi anengdo, bang poyok ne piman.
Lasi nang neyok nengo chirdom, tene ahuwit nang phansi piye.”
Aro Jisu wang than phakngo, “Nang Hemphu Arnam yok chirdom nange, aro anangyok detne chirdomot.”
La-amun si-ik anangyok Jerusalem pon si Arnam ahem kardong athak ponsi, anangyok pulo, “Nang Arnam Aso lo, tene nang bithang holek para alingyok angjangot,”
piyok pu tene ladisi kiwi do, “Nangyok kiralyok anang abithang tharlon helyok wang pa-en aphan thanne,
aro, nangkeng ke arlong long tong hlonghle, la-anat anali nangyok ari wang dengdun khopme.”
La-amun Jisu angpu phakngo, “Ladi pudo, nang Hemphu Arnam yok honjat langek.”
Aro ladisi si-ik ahuwit honjat lang tangsi, awak kihlong arniyok Jisu yok tikangsi damo.
Laparake Jisu, Jiuli apharan pensi, Galiliyok chirulo, aro anang lamthe adung arel alongri dungyok chitha-ang detno.
Anang anali Arnam ahem long paklango aro ahuwit ta parklamo.
Konam Jisu Najaret yok wango, lalongsi anang thelo-dingo, anang abi-pun kido badi Kisang-arni anang Arnam ahemyok damo. Anang lo-kangthir kataram yok thuro,
anang Jisoya turki po alo anangyok pilo aro anang lo puro aro ilong ladi kiwi hlongo:

“Hemphu Jiuli ne-phuthak do, piyok pu tene kicho kangwehel ango kime-alamthe kapahar yok, anang ne-arwalo, kibeng-thip hel ango kapajok yok, aro chotok abang hel ango amek kicharphak alam kapaharyok, bang hel dongsi hrep kidohel kapajok yok,
aro Hemphu kachideng anengkan kapaharyok netolo.”
Aro anang lopo harluk plaksi adun-dun abangyok piphaksi iningo. Arnam ahem long kido abang anangyok lang phrongo.
Laparake anang analiyok pulo, “Labang lo-kangthir alam mini nali karju hlong lamthe hel chok peno.”
Ahuwit ta anangyok akime pulo aro anang lo para ka-ole kajinso alamhel asombhik hlongo aro anali pulo, “Anangke Josep po aso kalek ma?”

Jisu analiyok pulo, “Khanangsi labang sar alamthe nali neyok pulo, “Ei daktor, nang bithang kiso chipame! Kaparnaum long potsi nang katiki hali arju hlongo, labang ahuwit holek nang bithang longri longta tikinot.”
Aro anang pulo, “Khanangsi ne nali thando, abithang arong longke turki ihutyok ta chideng de.
Manta, khanangsi ne nali thando, Elija po apor Israyel long hime ako-ong kido, la-amun lalong nengkan kithomne chiklo jon-thorok ethakpe arwe kanghap klak kido, aro longri dungsi ka-ongkal ong kido;
yongta Elija po anali kaiyokta tolte yongo, manta Sidon alongri long kido Jarephath po yoksi ihut hime arloso pe adungyok tolo.
Lalong Elisha po kido adak Israel ako-ong arje ibeng kiso arleng kido, aro analiyok ihut yokta pame un-eh yongo, yongta Siriya arleng Naman po detsi melo.”
Konam anali labang arjulo, Arnam ahem kido ahuwit arleng aneng kang phrolo.
Aro anali thur pungo, aro Jisu yok rongpe para ujharo, aro inglong kartul athak kikem rongpe long anangyok ponsi, anali anangyok aling kitiye lo.
Manta anang anali sitem arpatno aro damjongsi dolo.
Anang Galili alongri kido Kaparnaum rongpe yok sunsi damo, aro anang kisang-arni anali yok paklango,
anali anang kapaklang asombhik hlong detno, piyok pu tene anang lamthe apharan pensi kithan.
Arnam ahem long si-ik ajiuli kihap arleng ihut kido, aro anang hangsi pulo.
“Ei Najaret Jisu, nang hali pen pot te katiki ayok do? Nang hali kapangho yoksi wangdo ma? Ne thek, nang Ihut Kangthir Arnam.”
Manta Jisu anangyok tamo, aro pulo, “Dositne do, aro anang para olene wangot!” Konam anali ngosi si-ik ajiu anang yok pakrep dungo, anang para olelo, aro anang yok padukdesi olesi damo.
Aro anali ahuwit ta asombhik hlong detno aro anali ihut para ihut chipulo, “Labang ke pot badi hak thando? Piyok pu tene apharan aro jakong pensi anang si-ik ajiuli yok toldo, aro anali wang-ole do!”
Aro Jisu labang katiki asal alam pomar jotmahal longta chitha-ang detno.
