piyok pu tene anali arleng helyok kapaklang, aro Jisu kithi asitem para kiburphak alam kapahar anat, lahel ahuwit anangyok chihi hodakngo.
Lasi analiyok aripen nep pono, aro aphel arniyok akrol long beng rulsi bilo, piyok pu tene anithulo chokngo.
Manta Arnam alam ka-one hlong ako-ong arleng krolo; aro lalong hajar phongo bak arleng chokngo.
La-aphel arni Jihudi phuphang hel, sar-larhel, kanong paklang hel Jerusalem along chingrumo,
Anas po pusi bor-bangthe po, Kaiphas po, Johon po, Alekjendar po aro bor-bangthe po adon arat, analiyok asitem bisi arjulo.
Konam anali akrol kibi abangyok asitem parjapmo, anali arjulo, “Nali pot apharan pen, lale pot amen pen nali labangpo tikilo?”
Laparake Pitor po yok Jiuli-Kangthir pen plengsi anali yok pulo, “Ei phu-phang arleng hel aro akisarhel,
labang konga arlengpoyok akime asal katiki alam archal langsi, mini hali yok arjudo, labang arlengpo pot badi pame tango,

nali ahuwit, aro ahuwit Israyel arleng thek nange, lake Najaret Jisu Khristo yok nali kros long taro, inghoyok Arnam kithi asitem para paburo, anang amen pensi bangpo arleng medetsi, nali ngo arjapsi do.
Labang Jisu ke “Nali hem kikem abang kilangmo arlongpo, atok long aghai arlong chiplango, lake anango.
Jotmehel long kijok hlonghle, piyok pu tene ingho pen ili kijok nange, suneng arlo arleng asitem kibi labadi prek ihut amen ingjong.”
La-amun Pitor po pen Johon po ladi aha theksi, aro anali thekthe-rere kamango arleng pusi, lahel bismat hlongo aro lahel Jisu alokjor kido pusi analiyok chini lo.
Konam anali kiso kime arlengpo ayok anali kung arjap dingne kido theksi, anali itheta pu dun phak un-eh yongot.
Lasi analiyok ason amel long para kachiterek ayok thansi, anali hijan chirwal ponhisi pulo,
anali pulo, “Lamehel arleng helyok ili pot inghol nang?” Piyok pu tene anali pensi isi akithe asal tikisi paklango, labang Jerusalem kido arleng ango chitha-angsi do, aro ilita hoi chomo un-eh.
Manta arleng hel adak bangpo aro pachisang hlonghle yok, lasi labang Jisu amenpen ihut yok lam kachithan aro kapathan hlonghle aphan analiyok paserek ngot.”
Lasi analiyok taram phaksi, Jisu amen pen jatsi lam kipathan aro kapaklang hlonghle yok thano.
Manta Pitor po pen Johon po analiyok pu phakngo, “Arnam alamthe yok ke nalilam karju Arnam ango kime, ma kalek, bangpo nali bithang chiron langot;
piyok pu tene hali bithang pot thek hlongo aro pot arju hlongo, bangpo pu pe lengke do un-eh.”
Anali aduk kipi awak hlonghle yongot, lasi analiyok paserek phaksi, lahel analiyok tikango; piyok pu tene potsi kachiplang, la anat ahuwit arleng Arnamyok parklam si kido;
piyok pu tene arlengpo yok pamesi asombhik asin paklang tango, labang kime arlengpo abo angkol-hini anengkan yok ongchot kido.
Ladisi Pitor po pen Johon po akrol para kijok aphel, anali khoi adun hel adung damo, aro bor-bangthe aro akisar hel potsi kipu, mehel alam analiyok thano.
Labang alam arjusi ahuwit Arnam yok isi asidetsi hangsolo aro pulo, “O kihal Hemphu, O nang ethakpe, aro pirthimipe, langpe aro mehel asitem kido ahuwit kasansepo.
Nangsi Jiuli-Kangthir pensi nang murkiya Dabhit po, angho labang kipathan, ‘Bang-ajat hel piyok anang kango aro arleng hel piyok akijol alam chirono?
Piyok pu tene labang arongpe longsi, khanangsi, Hemphu pen anang Khristo yok kilang un-eh anatsi, pirthimipe long kido rechohel chingthuro aro kapangdom abang hel pen chingrumo.’
Piyok pu tene, khanangsi, Herod po pen Pontiyas Pilat po, Bang-ajat aro Israyel arleng helpen, jaiyok nang arwalo, labang kangthir murkiya Jisu yok lang un-eh si labang rongpe long kachingrum,
nang-ari pensi aro aporong kapachip wen angden ateng jipe kachiplang ayok ta tiki lo.
Aro minon, O Hemphu, anali kapasek alam kangje hel langot, aro nang adun helyok pherere phosi nang lamthe pathan tolnot,
Aro nang kangthir murkiya Jisu amen pensi, nang ari batsi kiso kapame yok, kiso kapame ayok, aro asin hel aro asombhik asal paklangot.”
Konam labadi pingkit tango, anali kachingrum athempo klem detno; aro ahuwit Jiuli-Kangthir pen plengo, aro Arnam alamthe aha dodutsi than pono.
Minon ke kikrol dun abang isidet angthin pen aro anang isi detsi jiuli pen aro ihut ta abithang boi-bihini hel abithang aphan chipupe yongot, manta anali kido kangwe bihini hel ilongsi bilo.
Kangthir adun hel apharan thesi Hemphu Jisu kithi para kibur hakhi pilo, aro ahuwit aphuthak Arnam jinso kithe hlong chotno.
Anali sitem kanange arleng weh dungo; piyok pu tene konbak arleng lungle lale ahem kido abihini jorsi, aro nohok hel wano.
Anali kangthir adun akeng-ri wangbilo, aro ingho potsi kanange ateng, abangten yok thakngo.
Lalong Jusep po, inghoyok adun helke anangyok Barnabas po pusi kataram (labang lam acho ke “Neng Kirung asopo” amen kibi), anang ihut Lebi aro Saipras ajat, anang idang lungle kido.
Anang idang alungle chijorsi, bang so anohok chiwansi kangthir adun hel akeng-ri long wang bilo.
Manta Ananiyas amen ihut arlengpo, anang piso Saphira pe pen, angthin chingbarsi abithang ilong lungle chijoro;
anang apisope pen chithansi, anang ibhak abithang aphan chibisi, agol ibhakso si kangthir-adun hel akeng-ri along wang bilo.
Pitor po anangyok pulo, “Ei Ananiyas, lungle kijor anohok ibhak abithangyok chibisi, Jiuli-Kangthir angot kachobel ayok, piyokte si-ik aneng chiwano?

Labang lungle kido amunke, nang lungle kangwe ma? Aro kijor tang aphelta nohokso nang ridengsi kangwe ma? Piyokte nang labadi katiki yok nang nenglong wango? Nang arleng angot ke kalek, Arnam angosi chobelo.”
Labang kithan arju pen-pansi Ananiyas po lungle athak kolothetsi thilo. Aro lasi karju hlong abang ahuwit phere detno.
Riso arleng hel wangsi kithi abangpo pepen pero aro anangyok kipep dam aphan chirchongsi pono.
Ghonta kithom bak aphel apisope wango, labang kachiplang chithan un-ehsi kido.
Pitor po anangyok arjulo, “Nali pot badi lungle jorsi la-an anohok hlongo ma, neyok nethanot?” Aro anang pulo, “Oik, la-ansi.”

La-apor Pitor po anangyok pulo, “Nali, Hemphu Ajiuliyok honjat kilangyok piyok chipachip mo? Onenot, inghosi nang pihan poyok pepdamsi wangsi do, anali kengkam owa amahang wang hlengdo, anali nang yokta chirchongsi ole ponbo.”
Lajongsi anang bithang akeng athak krep klungsi thilo. La-aphel riso hel hem arlo wangsi anangyok ta akithi wang thekngo, lasi anangyok mokol pono aro anang pihan akungsi pepmo.
Aro la-amun kachikruk dungsi, aro ahuwit karju hlong abang chiphere detno.
Minonke kangthir-adun hel ako-ong asombhik asal arleng hel asitem tikisi paklango. Aro anali ahuwit ta Solomon po aganthik long chipangrum detno.
Arleng hel analiyok aman paklang chot yong ta analipen ihut ta chilok dunde yongot.
Manta Hemphu long kiral dun abang arloso pen penso analilong arleng ongpon chotchotno.
Lasi kiso arleng helyok duwar ayok olesi wano, aro ki-ih ahong aro tarhel wansi, Pitor po kidam-kiwang long bekso anang abang aben kiso arleng hel ihutbak abang papho nang, pusi chironsi wang bilo.
Aro Jerusalem chikomwelsi kido rongpe ako-ong arleng bet kiso aro si-ik kachu-u abangyok wansi chingrumo apot, anali ahuwit yok pamelo.
Laparake bor-bangthe aro anang lokjorhel, lake Saduki hel kikrol dun abang thur pungsi, amek kachiso anat anali duk-tap kipi yok chipachipmo,
anali kangthir-adun helyok nep mo, aro anali rongbong akrol long beng rulo.
Manta labang anuwesi Hemphu atharlon akrol owapo phloksi analiyok mokolyok wansi pulo,
“Nali damot aro Arnam ahem long arjap, aro labang ajiubong alam ahuwit arleng hel yok thandamot.”

Bangpo arjusi adun hel mengsi anali adap prang Arnam ahemyok lut damo aro anali paklango pono. La-amun bor-bangthepo aro anang alokjor hel wango, anali ason amel aro Israyel asohel ahuwit akisar yok taramsi pangrumo, aro adun hel yok kiwan ayok akrol along paton ayok thansi tolo.
Manta anali akrol long damsi anali yok thekdam hlonghle yongot; lasi wang chirul phaksi labang alam thano.
“Hali akrolpo kahangar thip atengsi kido, aro kihon arleng helyok ta owapo amahang hon phrongsi kido thek hlongo, manta owapo kiphlok yok ke hem arlo ihut yokta thek hlonghle yongot!”
Labang alam arjusi, Arnam ahem thawangpo aro bor-bangthe hel, labang para aro potsi chiplangne, labadi chironsi neng ihik-bihik kido.
Dakne bak arleng ihut hem arlo wangsi analiyok pulo, “Langot, nali pipot arlengyok akrol long kithal, anali Arnam ahem long arjapsi arleng helyok paklangsi do!”
Laparake Arnam ahem kihon thawangpo pen patonhel ensi lalong damo, arlenghel arlong ware mene pusi pheresi, adunhelyok pachirbok solke wanwe yongot.
Anali, analiyok wano, ason amel ango analiyok parjapmo aro bangthepo analiyok arjulo.
Anang pulo, “Labang amen pen kapaklang hlonghle yok hali nali kithan, yongta nali kapaklang alamthesi Jerusalem dung pachitha-ang detno, aro labang arlengpo awi ado hali phuthak kapa-en anengdo!”
Manta Pitor po aro kangthir adun hel pulo, “Ili arleng apharan yok ke Arnam yoksi mainot nange.
Jisu yok nali thengpe long tarsi mari lo, anangyok ili sar-larhel Arnam si paburo.
Israyel arleng helyok neng pharlepsi aro pap kikolpi yok phu-phang aghai aro Ralpo chiplangsi, anang ancho ari agak anangyok kithe aphang pisi pangningo.
Aro lamehel alam hali hakhi do, aro lasi Arnam anangyok kamainot hel yok Jiuli-Kangthir pilo.”
Labang alam arju hlongsi anali aneng kang phrosi adun hel yok kamari yok olelo.
Manta anali sitem Gamaliyel amen Pharisi ason-amel long arjapsi, labang arleng helyok bekso apor mokol papon tolyok than.
Laparake anang ason amel arleng helyok pulo, “Ei korte Israyel abang, lamehel arleng helyok nali pot katiki yok oledo, mesone chilang wen.”

Piyok pu tene labang ango Theyudas po pusi arleng ihut olesi anangta ihut arleng akithe pusi kachipu, aro anang pen phoro phili bak chilok duno; manta anangyok marilo, aro anang pen kimeng dun abang chisang jal aro chibotu detno.
Anang phel Judas pusi Galili arleng alekha ki-en apor anang ta ka-ole, aro angkhan arleng anang agak kidun kreng; anangta thilo, aro anang pen kidun arleng helta chisang putno.
Lasi minon kijo alamke, ne nali thanbang, lamehel arlengyok tikangot aro anali hudet padonang; piyok pu tene lahel katkiki angden lale katiki asal arleng mang-mang tene, mehel jutne;
manta Arnam para, pu tene analiyok paprel un-eh ye ladi alam ke nali Arnamyok lang set-setsi kachirbu abangsi chiplang detne!” Anali anang lamyok krol duno,
aro anali kangthir-adunhel yok taramsi wano, analiyok sapsi, Jisu amen pen lam kithanthe ayok than klakngo aro analiyok tikango.
Anali ason amel para katikang amun, adun hel Jisu amen pen aduk kichol kamichang abang pusi alekhot kachiplang apot, aneng arongo.
Aro arniten Jisu si Khristo pusi Arnam ahem long aro adonten paklang ponyok tikangke yong ngot.

Minonke labang arniyok ke, adun hel alekha kichan ong amun, aro Grik alam kithan Jihudi pen Jihudi khanang hel asitem chiprongo, piyok pu tene arniten banta kirap amun Grik kithan Jihudi hime helyok panungkul do pusi ado pilo.
Aro bang kere-hini adun hel kikrol dun abang yok taramsi pulo, “Arnam alamthe kapahar tikang thusi kicho ahong along detne kachilangke ili meme yong.
Lasi, ei khoi hel, nali dak sal katiki kamichang katiki amen-anang kido aro Jiuli-Kangthir agiyan agun kido, la bang thorok-isi nali sitem para arwalne enot.
la-amun halike, hali aphang ke, hali pingkit dune aro lamthe kapahar aphansi apor chipi ye.”

Anali jipe kithan alam ahuwit rongbong aneng ingsammo, aro ihut kikrol arleng aro Jiuli-Kangthir plengsi kido Istiphen poyok aro inansi Philip po, Prokhoras po, Nikanor po, Timon po, Parmenas po aro Jihudi adhorom kilut Antiyok arleng Nikolas po, labang arleng yok arwalo,
Anali mehel arleng helyok kangthir-adunhel ango parjap mo, la-amun anali pingkitno aro lahel aphuthak anali ari batno.
La-aphel Arnam alamthe chisangsi damo; Jerusalem long adun hel alekha ong pono, aro bangthe helta isi ako-ong arat kikrol abang pen meng duno.
Istiphen po, jinso aro apharan plengthip si, bismat asal aro asombhik asal arleng adak tiki lo.
Laparake Libertin amen kipu arat, angkhan arleng Cyrene aro Alekjendriya arleng kido, aro Silikiya pen Asia ahol angkhan arleng arjapsi Istiphenpo pen lam chirbulo.
Manta anali Jiuli-Kangthir po Istiphen po yok labadi agiyan pilo, anang lam kithan amun anali asisik puke berdun un-eh yongot.
Laparake anali angkhan arleng yok lam chut jol-jolsi papulo, “Hali anangyok Mosi po pen Arnam yok kilang un-eh kangho kithan alamhel hali karju hlong.”
Laparake anali arleng hel pen kithe kiding aro kanong paklang helyok arwul salo; laparake anali anang dung wango, anangyok nepmo, aro ason amel ango wano.
Anali anang lamhel asisik pusi kapathan yok angkhan arleng wansi anali pulo, “Labang arlengpo hali kangthir Arnam ahempo pen Mosi po kanong poyok kilang un-eh alam than lenman;
piyok pu tene Najaret Jisu labang Arnam ahempo pangho detne aro Mosi po kipi abi-pun hel hole detne pusi anang kipu hali arju hlongo.”
Aro ahuwit ason amel long kangning abang anangyok lang phrongo, aro anali anang mahangpo tharlon ihut amahang badi thekngo.
Laparake bor-bangthe po anangyok pulo, “Labang alam hel asereng ma?”
Aro Istiphen po pulo, “Ei korte-muso aro apo hel, nelam onenot. Ili sar-lar Abraham poyok Haran rongpe long kido ango, anang Mesopotamiya long kido amunsi, Arnam ajortang chiklango,
aro anang yok pulo, ‘Nang bithang alongri long, nang hem-ret, don-rat tikangne, potsi alongri ne nang paklange, labang alongri yok damot.’
Laparake anang Saldiyan hel alongri tikangsi, Haran long do damo aro Haran along dolo. Anang papo kithi aphel, minon kangning labang alongri yok Arnam anangyok wano.
Labang apor Abraham po aso kangwe, yongta Arnam anangyok kangning alongri aphan lungle pekpe yongot, layongta Arnam anangyok lungle aro anang monphel agijing yok kipi seme tango.
Aro Arnam anangyok labadi pulo, ‘Anang agijing hel phoro phili anengkan yok bang alongri long dohlonge, aro lalong arleng hel analiyok aturu inghole, aro paduk hapme.
Arnam labadi pulo, ‘Manta anali pot ajat arlo aturu chiplange, ne labang ason bisar oteye, aro la aphel anali wang olesi, labang athempo long neyok wang chirdome.’

Laparake anangyok sunnot ka-ote kanong ta pilo. Aro ladi si Aijak po plango, aro ni-narkep arni anangyok sunnot ingholo. Aro Aijak po Jakup po anangpa chiplango, aro Jakup po ke bang kere-hini asohel aphi-phulo.
Phi-phu hel, Josep po yok amek kiso, anangyok Ijip alongri kapapon yok jor detno; manta Arnam anang alokjor do duno,

aro ahuwit kiduk para anangyok pajoksi, aro Ijip arecho Pharau po mek sundangsi anangyok apharan pen agiyan pilo, rechopo anang yoksi Ijip alongri kapangdom aro anang ahempo kilangpon phu-phang pekngo.
Latangsi Ijip aro Kanan alongri dung akithe akal pen aduk wango, aro ili sar-larhel kicho a-an wepholo.
Manta Ijip alongri sok-sang do pusi Jakup po arjusi, ili sar-larhel yok ango wang tolchengo.
Phongni kidam amun ke, Josep po abithang akorte hel pen chichinilo, aro Josep po ahembang pen Pharau po pachiklango.
Laparake Josep po anang pa Jakuppo pen hemphlak-hemcher ahuwityok, lake kep thorok ne bangkere phongo arleng yok taram duno;
Lasi Jakuppo Ijip yok damo. Anang bithang ta aro ili sarphi-sarphu helta lalongsi thilo,
aro anali abang helyok Sekhem yok wan phakngo, Abraham po Sekhem long Hamor po asohel para nohok pine kinam, la thiripo longsi analiyok pepmo.
“Manta Abraham poyok Arnam potsi seme-kitang, labang seme-kitang chok-pleng si wangne kido amun, Israyel hel Ijip alongri long pachan ongo,
la-aphel, Josep poyok kachinine Ijip alongri prek ihut recho chosi, ili jatpo yok sotongasi iliyok pangdomo.
Anang ili sar-larhel asohel kamariyok, osohel yok hem para mokol pabilo, tangsi anali thi ye, labadi kangho sanselo.
Ladi aporsi Mosi po plango, aro anang Arnam ango kilangme aso kido. Piyok pu tene anang chiklo jon thomyok si, anang pa ahem kido hlong;
aro mokol katikang dam amun, Pharau po asope anangyok al enpono, aro abithang aso badi pathe-pading pono.
Lasi Mosi po Ijip abang ahuwit agiyan chirlilo, aro anang lam aro sal longta apharan dokengo.
“La-aphel anang abo nengkan kep phili kichok amun, anang abithang akortehel ayok, lake Israyel asohel ayok kilang anang aneng wango.
Lalong anang anali arleng ihut yok Ijip arleng ongnai aduk kipi theksi, anangyok kiral yok kidam, Ijip arlengpo yok marisi, aduk kicho arlengpo pen chilokdunsi, ka-ongnai ajar hulo.
Anang aridengsi Arnam anang korte helyok pajokdun do, aro manta labang alam anali abhu hlongdo pusi anang kachiron; manta anali abhu hlonghle yongot.
La-aphel arni, anali bang hini ahul wangsi, Mosi po anali ngo damsi, analiyok kapachilok anangsi pulo, ‘Ei arleng hel, nali korte hijan yongta, piyok te chipangho do?’
Manta ingho si abithang adung kido alok poyok kangho katiki, anang Mosi poyok pek kulsi pulo, ‘Hali phuthak inghote kapangdom aro bisar ka-ote phu-phang pachakngo?
Nang atimi Ijip arlengyok kamari badi nang neyok ta kamari ye anengdo ma?’
Labang so alamthe arju hlongsi Mosi po Ijip para katsi Midiyan alongri dodamo. Lalongsi anangso penso bang-hini chibulo.
Lalong kido nengkan kep-phili choksi, Sinai inglong kartul adung ingnam long, Arnam tharlon irong me-karne kido kijirtum thengpe asitem anangyok chiklango.
Mosi po bangpo thek si, labang kachiklang amun bismat hlongsi, kilang ayok adung damo.
La-amunsi Hemphu alamthe hlongo, ‘Ne nang sar-larhel Arnam, Abraham po, Aijak po, pen Jakup po Arnam.’ La-ako Mosi po kaphere si abang sohrimo, aro kilang yok aha wedungo.
Laparake Hemphu anangyok pulo, “Nang keng para keng-op hel chiphlok, piyok pu tene nang karjap athempo, kangthir alungle.
Ne Ijip long kido ne arleng hel aduk-ong, ne thekpeno; aro anali kasuru, ne arju hlongsi, analiyok kapajok yoksi ne wang suno; minon wangot, ne nangyok Ijip yok nangtol do.’

“Nangyok kapangdom pen bisarpo ‘ingho nang pangningo?’ pusi, anali Mosi poyok kachidengde, labang Mosi poyok Arnam thengpe kijirtum long anangyok kachiklang tharlonpo para kilangpon aro kapajok phu-phang pachaksi tolo.
Anangsi Ijip long, aro Ki-er langpe aro ingnam aju long nengkan kep phili asombhik asal paklangsi, analiyok olesi wano.
Aro ‘Arnam si nali korte hel asitem para ne mat ihut katurki arleng naliphan paplange pusi kipu Israyel aso helyok kithan, anangsi labang Mosi po.’
Inghosi Sinai Inglong kartul long anangyok lamthe kithan tharlon pen ili sar-lar helpen, arat dungsi ingnam aju long chingrumsi kido, aro iliyok kipi ajiuli alam kihlong, anangsi labang polo.
“Ili sar-larhel anang arlo kachingdom yok chikengke si anangyok panung kulsi, anali angthin Ijip yok neng chirting phaksi,

Harun po yok thano, ‘Hali ngo-ngo paklang ponyok haliphan agoya Arnam hali thep pinot; piyok pu tene la Mosi po haliyok Ijip alongri para olesi hali wano, labang Mosi po ke potsi chiplango, hali thekthe.’
Laparake anali chorong athok badi arjan otesi, labang arjan aphan buli wanpisi, anali abithang aripen ka-ote along nengrong chipadolo.

Manta Arnam anali para mahang wesi, athak klolangso helyok kachirdom yok pekngo, turki hel alo long labang alam kiwi dowen do, ‘Ei Israyel abang, nengkan kep phili ingnam aju long, nephan okpe thatsi buli nekipi ma?

Kalek; la-aholan Molok arnam kuntulu aro Riphan chiklolangso arnam potsi nali-ri pen ka-ote arjanpo yoksi kachirdom ayok ki-en ponwor, labang helyoksi kirung ponwor; aro ne naliyok Babilon apar nalipon krenge.’
“Potsi angton thek hlongo, labang angton badi kuntulu kemo, labang alam inghosi Mosi poyok pulo, anang kithan ateng la hakhi kipi kuntulu ili sar-lar hel pen ingnam aju kido.

Monphel awe ili sar-lar hel aro Josuwa po kuntulu chipar phangsi, Bang-ajat helyok Arnam ili sar-lar adung para ujharo, labang ajat helyok kangning alongri pahlongpon amun, arideng kuntulu en ponsi, Dabhit po kido arniyok chi-en pono,
La-aphel Dabhit po Arnam ango jinso pahlongo, Jakup po Arnam aphan hem ihum pakem tolyok chingdukngo.
Manta Solomon po si Arnam ahem ihum kem pilo.
“Yongta Kithechot Arnam ke munusi ari pen kikem ahem long dode; labang alam turki po labadi pudo,
‘Arnam ke pudo, ethakpe ne inghol, aro pirthepe ne kengpak kibi athem. Ne phan pot badi ahem keme? Ne kisang athem daklong te do?
Ne bithang ari pen ahuwit lamehel ka-ote kalek ma?’

Istiphen po pu-hisi damo, “Ei nali konbak angthin karthat, nali angthin aro ano sunnot ka-otete abang, nali arnita Jiuli-Kangthir yok teng klak si dolong do, nali sar-larhel jibadi, nalita ladi Jiuli-Kangthir yok arniten sedo.
Nali sar-larhel turki hel abangten yok ta duk pipe yong ma? Dhorom ihut wange pune ingho turki dapsi kithan, analiyok marilo, aro minon nali anangyoksi hutur arideng champilo aro marilo;
nalisi kanong hel, Arnam tharlon hel para kipi kanong pusi chideng yongta, aro yongta nali labang hel nali mainotne yongot.”
Konam anali Istiphen po alam arjusi anali anang kang-phrolo, aro anangyok akang anat aso chingkre lo.
Manta anang Jiuli-Kangthir plengsi athak ayok lang etsi, Arnam jortang, aro Arnam ancho-ari agak Jisu arjapsi kido thekngo.
Anang pulo, “Langot, athak aduwar kachingpu aro Arleng Aso yok Arnam ancho-ari aga arjapsi kido thek hlong do.”
Manta anali asi pathesi hang solsi ano chidipsi anangyok otdamo.
Aro rongpe para mokol pa-ole ponsi, anangyok arlong waro; aro hakhi kido abang anali pe hel Sol pune kipu riso arlengpo yok palango.
Anali Istiphen poyok arlong warne kido amun, anang pingkitsi pulo, “O Hemphu Jisu, nejiuli enot.”
Laparake anang tarhuksi aro suru-wongsi pulo, “O Hemphu, labang apap anali menpen wiyek.” Labangso thansi anang thilo.

Istiphen po yok kamari alam along Sol po kachikeng dun kido. La arni parake Jerusalem long kachikruk yok kilang set-set honjat wango, aro adun hel aparke, ahuwit ta kikrol abang Judiya aro Samariya alongri along along chisangsi chingsemsi dodamo.
Angkhan kikrol arleng helsi Istiphen po yok pepmo, anang phan aneng chipadukngo.
Manta Sol po adon adon lutsi, arloso aro penso helyok nep ponsi aduk pilo aro akrol long bidamsi, kachikruk ayok padukngo.
La-amun ingho chisangsi chingsemo, lahel ahuwit athem arting artingsi kime-alamthe paharo.
Aro Philip po Samariya rongpe yok damsi lalong arleng hel yok Khristo alam thano.
Philip po lam kithan para rat abang angthin pisi onelo aro anang katiki asombhik asal hel thekngo,
piyok pu tene kangho ajiu hel arlengyok kihap para hang-hangsi olesi wango; aro atot kangwe kiso arleng aro kengkok arleng hel melo.
Lasi rongpe long anang arong do-ongo.
Minon ke labang ango ke labang rongpe along Simon amen ihut arleng bhiliki paklangsi aro anang kithe chotpo chipusi Samariya ason yok asombhik kipaklang.
Ahuwit kithe-kibek ahuwit arleng ta anang lam pulo, “Arnam potsi apharan Kithe puman, labang apharan anango.”
Aro anali jokha arni ango para bhiliki pen analiyok asombhik kapahlong apotsi anang alam long neng pilo.
Manta Philip po Arnam-alongri aro Jisu Khristo amen pen kime-alamthe kapahar amun, anali krolo apot, anali arloso-apenso helyok baptist otelo.
La amun la Simon po jong ta krolsi baptist chiplango, anang Philip po pen dodun kukngo, asombhik asin aro jakong asal theksi anang bismat hlongo.
Ladisi Samariya abang Arnam Alam chideng do, kipu alam Jerusalem kido adun hel arjusi, Pitor aro Johon poyok anali kido along tolo.
Anali lalong damsi, labang arleng hel Jiuli-Kangthir kihlong yok anali phan pingkitno,
(piyok pu tene la arni yokta anali phuthak Jiuli-Kangthir hlonghle lang; anali Hemphu Jisu amen pen baptist ote dolangsi.)
Laparake Pitor po aro Johon po anali phuthak ari bilo, aro anali Jiuli-Kangthir hlongo.
Ladisi adun hel ari kibi para Jiuli-Kangthir hlongdo, labang Simon po thek hlong si, analiyok banta pajirsi,
pulo, “Ne ingho abang long ari kibat, abangke Jiuli-Kangthir pahlong yok, neyok labang apharan nepinot”
Manta Pitor po anangyok pulo, “Nang pen nang nohok paprel nang, piyok pu tene Arnam abor-eh nang nohok pen nam une puke nang chiron do!
Labang alam longke nang abhak lale kihlong nange ingjong, piyok pu tene Arnam ango nangthinpo kangthir kalek.
Lasi Hemphu pene bak nang thin kangho hel nangron mene, la anat nang labang pap hel anat neng chipharlepne Hemphu ango pingkit.
Piyok pu tene ne nangthekdo, nangneng akihodak aro kangting ajiu koksi nang bido.”
La-amun Simon po pulo, “Nali kithan alamthe nelong pachiplangple nang, lasi nali nephan Hemphu ango pingkitnot.”
Ladi anali hakhi pisi Hemphu alam thano, aro Samariya hel ako-ong arong along kime-alamthe pahar paharsi, Jerusalem ayok chirul phakngo.
Laparake Hemphu tharlon ihut Philip poyok pulo, “Nang thurne ni-ting agak, Jerusalem kidam aduwarpo aga Gajayok damjongne do, lake nisotjot athem.” Labang poke sangtel aju aduwar.
Lasi anang thursi damo, aro langot, ihut Ethupiya apunchakwe po, Ethupiya hel rechope montri chiplangsi, anang apuru kilangpi arleng ihut kido, anang Arnam kachirdom yok Jerusalem yok wangsi kido,
aro anang chirulne kidam amunsi, anang rot athak iningsi Jisoya turki alo chiporhesi kidam.
La-aporsi Jiuli po Philip poyok pulo, “Nang adung dam si labang rotpo chiphochak.”
Lasi Philip po anang dungyok katdunsi, anangyok Jisoya turki alo kachiporhe onesi anang arjulo, “Nang pot chiporhe do nang abhu hlongdo ma?”
Aro anang pulo, “Inghone bak paklangkle lengke ne pot badi abhu hlonge?” Laparake Philip po rot long arlusi anangpen wang kangning dunyok, anang chindukngo.

Minonke lo-kangthir ilong anang chiporhesi kido, lake labadi kido: “Bherabik aso badi anangyok kamariyok pono, aro bherabik asoyok amel kirot amun chingdom hopsi kido bherabik aso badi, anang ithe alam pupe yongot.
Anang mahang patharaksi, anangyok ado kabisar hoi choche yongot. Anang agijing alam ingho than une? Piyok pu tene pirthimipe para anang kido apor orsi wangdo.”
La-amun apunchakwe po Philip poyok pulo, “Nang chinduk bang, turki po labang alam ingho alam kipu? Abithang yoksi pudo ma, ma inghone bak yoksi pudo?”
Laparake Philip po thanponsi labang lo-kangthir alam chengsi, anang ngo Jisu kime-alamthe paharo.
Ladisi duwar kidam jong amun, anali ilong lang pahlongsi apunchakwe po pulo, “Langot, holek langdo! Ne baptist kachiplangyok piyok te un-eh ye ma?”
Philip po anangyok pulo, “Nang ahuwit angthin pen kroldo, pu tene nang baptist chiplang une. La-amun anang angpu duno, “Jisu Khristo ke Arnam Aso, bangpo ne kroldo.”
La-amun anang rotpo kapasang yok thansi Philip po pen apunchakwe po anali bang-hini ta lang along suno, aro Philip po anangyok baptist otelo.
Lalong anali lang para wang ka-uje amunsi, Hemphu Ajiuli Philip poyok pon detno; apunchakwe po anangyok thek hlonghle yongot, aro apunchakwe po aneng arong-rongsi anang duwar damo.
Manta Philip poyok Asotus rongpo long hlengo, aro labang angbong damjongsi kido amun, ahuwit rongpehel along kime-alamthe paharsi Sisiriya pahlengo.
La-apor yokta Sol po Hemphu adun hel yok papheresi aro kamari alam thansi, bor-bangthe adung damo,
aro labang kidam aduwar arloso-apenso kaphochak alengke, analiyok bam thipsi Jerusalem yok kiwan ayok Damaskas long kido Arnam ahem ahuwit yok kiwi aporman alo hango.
Laparake anang kidamjong apor Damaskas kihleng rang amun, photsi athak para katha-ang wang chikomwolsi anangyok klano.
Anang lungle athak jang klungo aro, “O Sol, O Sol, neyok piyokte aduk nepido?” anangyok labadi kipu alamthe arju hlongo.
Anang arju dun phakngo, “O Hemphu, nang ke inghote?” Wang than duno, “Inghoyok nang honjat pipon do, hanelo labang- Jisu.
Manta thurnot, rongpe yok lut damot, lalong nang pot tiki hlonge, bangpo nang thane.”
Anang pen kidam arleng hel ke kaiyok ta thekthesi, arki sodet one-hlongsi alamthe wesi arjap phrongsi dodetno.
Lapara ke Sol po lungle para thuro, aro anang amek kichar yongta, anang amek-thekthe detno; lasi anali anangyok ari-otsi Damaskas yok pono.
La-aphel anang ni-thom yok amek thekthe pensi dolo, aro cho-che junjesi dolo.
Labang apor Damaskas long Ananiyas amen ihut adun kido. Hemphu anang yok pharlo long pulo, “Ei Ananiyas po.” Anang pulo, “O Hemphu, langot, ne holekdo.”
Hemphu anangyok pulo, “Nang thurne Kengset kipuman aduwarpo yok damne, Judas po ahem long, Tarsas arongpe para kiwang Sol amen arlengpo yok chilang dammot, piyok pu tene, langot, anang pingkitsi do,
Aro anang amek kichar ayok, apharlo long Ananiyas amen ihut arleng wanglutsi, anang banglong ari kibi thek hlongo.
Manta Ananiyas po pu phakngo, “Hemphu, labang arleng Jerusalem long nang kangthir arleng helyok anang konbak akangho ingholo, labang ne ako-ong arleng para arjulo;
aro holek ta nangmen ki-en ahuwit yok kinep aphan, anang bangthe hel para apharan ensi wangdo.”
Manta Hemphu anangyok pu phakngo, “Nang damot; piyok pu tene Bang-ajat aro rechohel, aro Israyel asohel ango ne men ki-en ponyok, aro anangsi ne arwal tango.
Piyok pu tene nemen anat konbak aduk chichak hlonge, bangpo ne anangyok paklange.”

Lasi Ananiyas po damsi hemyok lut damo. Anang Sol po abang along ari batsi pulo, “Ei korte Sol, nangmek thekngot, aro Jiuli-Kangthir pen plengot, nang kiwang aduwar along Hemphu, lake Jisu nangyok kachiklang, anangsi neyok wangtolo.”
Aro la-amunsi, anang amek para kachithar badi penebak olesi kijang ahari lo, aro anang mek chithek phakngo, aro anang thursi baptist chiplango,
aro lapara ke kicho abihini cholo, anang ajakong hlong phakngo.
La-aphel anang Damaskas long kido adunhel pen bekso adin dosi, “Jisu si Arnam Aso lo,”
Labang alam anang Jihudi kachirdom ahem long pahar penpano.

Lalong ahuwit anang lam ka-one abangke asombhik hlongsi pulo, “Inghosi Jerusalem long Jisu yok kachirdom abang yok kamari, aro anangsi analiyok bamsi bor-bangthe ango kiponyok chironsi holek ayok kiwang, labang po anang kalek ma?”
Manta Sol po aro ajakong hlongsi, Jisu si Khristo la, pusi aporman paklangsi, Damaskas long kido Jihudi arleng hel kipu ye alam pangwe detno.
Jokha adin kidam aphel, Jihudi hel anangyok kamari ye alam chirhepmo,
manta Sol po anali kachirhep alam than uno. Anali anuwe anerlo anangyok kamariyok owa long tono;
manta adun hel anuwesi anangyok enpono, aro pachi along thalsi arpong aga pasuno.
La-aphel Sol po Jerusalem yok wango, anang adun hel pen kachilokdun rono, manta analike anangyok pherelo, piyok pu tene anangta adun chiplango, puke krol un-eh yongot.

Manta Barnabas po anangyok adun hel angoyok ponsi, anang potbadi duwar long Hemphu yok kithek, aro Hemphu anangyok kithan hel, aro anang Damaskas long Jisu amen pen ingtang dutsi kapahar, labang ahuwit alam anali ango than dakngo.
Lasi Sol po anali pen dosi, Jerusalem long Hemphu amen pangtang dutsi paharo.
Anang Grik alam kithanthek Jihudi helpen lam chirwalo aro lam chingje lo; manta lahel anangyok kamaripen ayoksi awak chilango.
Aro kikrol korte hel bangpo than unsi, anangyok Sisiriya yok ponsi, lalong para Tarsas rongpe yok tolo.

La-amunsi ahuwit Judiya, Galili aro Samariya alongri dung kachingrum abang nengsam hlongsi, aro dhorom aneng kihari wango. Hemphuyok kaphere dosi adin padamo, aro Jiuli-Kangthir neng kirung pensi kikrol arleng alekha ong-ongsi damo.
Pitor po kikrol anali ahuwit pen hangkhone arting damsi, anang Lida long kido kangthir arleng adung hlengo.
Lalong anang nengkan hinarkep so-hapsi kido Ayenas amen ihutyok atot kangwe kiso chiplangsi kido thekngo.
Pitor po anangyok pulo, “Ei Ayenas po, Jisu Khristo nang pamenang; thurnot, aro nang tar chi-olnot!” Aro lajongsi anang thur penpano.
Aro Lida pen Saron long kido abang, ahuwit anangyok theksi Hemphu yok aneng chipharlep mo.
Minonke anali lampen Dorkas (Grik alam acho ke “Ok-hi pe.”) puman, khanang ke Tabitha amen ihut adunpe Joppa arong long kido. Anang kime asal katiki aro banta kirap si arloso ihut kido.
La-apor anang kisosi kido, aro thilo. La-amun arleng hel anang kithi arangpo lang palusi athak apulu ahempo long pa-ihsi bilo.
Labang Lida arongpe Joppa adung apot, aro Pitor pota lalong do pusi than-unsi, adun hel lalongyok bang-hini arleng tolsi pathan damo, aro pulo, “Arni padingdene holek wangot.”

Lasi Pitor po ingthursi anali pen damo, aro arleng hel anangyok athak apulu ahemyok pono; aro ahuwit hime arloso hel anang dung kido aro arjap solsi surusi kido aro Dorkaspe anali pen kido apor ka-ote chol akiding hel paklango.

Pitor po anali ahuwit yok mokol pa-olesi, anang tarhuksi pingkit no. Laparake anang kithi arangpo lango aro pulo, “O Tabitha, thur not.” Laparake anang amek charo; aro Pitor poyok theksi, ingthursi iningo.
La-amun Pitor po anangyok ari-otsi pangthuro. Laparake anang kangthir arleng pen hime arloso hel yok taramsi, anali ngo anangyok akihreng paklango.
Labang alampo Joppa arong dung chithang detno, aro ako-ong arleng Hemphu yok krolo.
Labang aphel Pitor po Joppa long, Simon amen ihut musiyar popen jokha adin dolo.
Sisiriya arongpe long ‘Italia sonturi’ asem long Kornoliyas amen ihut, phoro isi sonturi aghaipo kido.
Anang ihut Arnam kimeng arleng kido, aro ahem dungsi Arnam kaphere abang kido; anang arlengyok angthin wakdaksi banta kipi, aro Arnam yok pingkit lensi kido.
Inirsi anithu baji kithom bak apun anang apharlo long, Arnam tharlon anang dung wango, aro anangyok pulo, “O Kornoliyas.”
La-amun anang tharlon yok lang-etsi kaphere anat pulo, “Pot te nethan not Hemphu?” La-amun tharlonpo anangyok pulo, “Nang kapingkit pen banta hel neng kachiri aphan, Arnam ango ethakpe yok hlengo.
Minon Joppa yok arleng tolne, langpe akung kidoman Simon ingho amenke Pitor amen;
Anang langpe akung kido Simon po pusi ihut musiyarpo ahem, don chiplangsi do, anangyok taramne pawanot.
Kornoliyas poyok lam kithan Arnam tharlonpo damo, aro anang hem turu bang hi-ni yok, aro anang kachi-al abang adak kadhorom sonturi ihutyok taramo,
aro labang ahuwit alam thandaksi analiyok Joppa yok tolo.
Anali dam damsi aphel arni Joppa adung hlengo, aro Pitor po anerlo baji kere hini apun kapingkit yok hem athak damo.
Lalong anang an kangchirsi, penebak kicho anengo, manta anang phan kicho kijun kahonjokpi amunsi, anang arti klakngo.
Ladi aporsi athak aduwar chingpusi, atok phili along otsi kapasun pe aplang badi isi senge kipasun thekngo.
Labang asitem akeng hong phili ajatjat apei hel, aro lungle kiklim apei hel, aro athak kangjar awo hel kido.
Laparake, “Ei Pitor, ingthur not aro lamehel marine chonot,” kipu lamthe asi arjulo.
Manta Pitor po pulo, “O Hemphu, ladi ke nangne lang; piyok pu tene ne labang akisim aro kasuwa abihini isita cho-hlonghle yong.”
Latang si phong-ni ayok anangyok labang alam arju hlongo, “Arnam pot ayok pangthiro, bangpo nang akisim puyek.”
Labadi phong-thom than tango apot, labang aplang la-amun si athakyok pon phakngo.
Minonke Pitor po pharlo kithek, labang acho alamke potsine, labadi chiron irsi kido amunsi, langot, Kornoliyas po angkitol arleng hel arju-hisi Simon po ahem owa amahang long arjap phrongsi dolo.
Anali taramsi arjulo, holek kachitha-ang amen ke Pitor po, labang Simonpo ta puman, anang holek doman ma?
Manta Pitor po apharlo alam chiron jong amunsi, Jiuli-Kangthir para anangyok pulo, “Langot, bang kithom arleng nangyok bisarsi wangdo.
Minon nang thurne sunot, aro angthin chi-en eh-ne, anali pen damot; piyok pu tene hanesi analiyok wang tolo.”
Lasi Pitor po sundamsi arleng helyok pulo, “Langot, nali kabisar arlengpo, ne lo.

Nali pot anat wango?” Lalong anali pulo, “Kornoliyas amen dhorom kangthir aro Arnamyok kaphere arleng, aro Jihudi asondung angot kachitha-ang det, pharo-isi sonturi aghaipo nangyok anang hemyok taram ponsi, nang para lamthe ka-oneyok, kangthir tharlon parasi Arnam kithan alam hlongo.”
Lasi Pitor po analiyok hem arlo taram ponsi don chingden pamelo. La-aphel arni anang thursi, anali pen damo, aro Joppa long kido angkhan kortehel kikrol abang anang duno.
La-aphel arni anali Sisiriya yok wang hlengo. Kornoliyas po adon-arat pen alokjor helyok taram pungsi, anali yok inghong dingsi kido.
Pitor po kilut dam amun Kornoliyas po anangyok paphochak si, anang keng otsi chirdomo.
Manta Pitor po anangyok pangthursi pulo, “Thur not, ne ta ihut arlengsi.”
Aro lapara ke anang pen lam chithansi, anang hem lut damo, aro arleng ako-ong kachingrum thek hlongo;

aro Pol po lahelyok theksi pulo, “Bang-ajat arlengpen kachilok, lale kilutdam, Jihudi arleng adak kanghopot alam do, labang nalita chithan undo; manta arleng kaiyokta akisim lale suwa kipupe yok Arnam neyok paklango.
Lasi neyok kataram amun, ingne pupesi ne wango; lasi nali arju bang, nali neyok pot aronsi pataramo?”

La-amun Kornoliyas po pudun phakngo, “Mini hutke ni-phililo, ne baji kithom apun pingkit amun, la-an aporyok kidojong; la-amun langot, kiphlan-et ape kachi-ik ihut arleng ango arjap si, labang nethano.
Anang pulo, ‘Ei Kornoliyas, nang kapingkit arjulo aro nang kipi banta kipihel Arnam anang ingsam mo.
Lasi Joppa yok arleng tolo, aro langpe akung Simon amen ihut musiyar po ahem don badi kido Simon, anang kachithang det amen ke Pitor; anangyok pataram ne wanot.’
Lasi ne la-amunsi nang dungyok arleng tolo; nangta ne wang pilo, me peno. Lasi Hemphu potsi kithan alamthe nangpilo, labang ahuwit ka-oneyok hali ahuwit ta minon Arnam angot inghong dingsi do.”
La-akosi Pitor po kithan yok chengsi pulo: “Arnam ibak det langle,
manta ahuwit ajat asitem inghosi anangyok kapherepo dosi dhorom kangthir arjapman, anangyok anang chidengman, labang ne khanangsi abhu hlongdo.
Inghosi ahuwit aphan Hemphu, labang Jisu Khristo arideng kapajok pon kime-alamthe kapahar amun, Arnam potsi alamthe Israyel aso hel adung wangtolo.
Aro Johon baptist po alam kapahar aphel, Galili along chengsi Judiya yok ajaldung chisang detno, labang alamthe nali than unsi do.

Labang ke ladi, Arnam Najareth Jisu yok Jiuli-Kangthir aro jortang pisi arwaltango, anang rong hel along artingsi kime asal tikisi, si-ik para aduk kihlong ahuwit yok pamelo; piyok pu tene Arnam anang pen kido.
Aro anang Jihudi hel arong hel aro Jerusalem long anang jibak katiki, mehel ahuwit asal hel hakhi halido.
Arleng hel anangyok thengpe along tarsi marilo; manta ni-thom arnike Arnam anangyok pangthursi, pachiklango;
ahuwit arleng ango ke kalek, manta anang kithi asitem para kibur aphel anang pen kicho-kijun hlongdun Arnam karwal ahakhi halisi, hali ngo pachiklango.
Aro kihreng pen kithi, la hiniyok bisarpo kachiplang ayok Arnam inghoyok pachakngo, labangke anango, labang alam rat angot kapahar ayok aro hakhi kipi ayok, anang haliyok thano.
Anang bhaksi ahuwit turkihel labang hakhi piman, lake anangyok kikrol majit anang menpen pap rontang man.”
Pitor po labang alam kipu amunsi, onesi kido abang aphuthak Jiuli-Kangthir wango.
Lalong Pitor po pen kiwang sunnot abi-pun kikrol abang, aro Bang-ajat hel aphuthak ta Jiuli-Kangthir abor-eh kili theksi asombhik hlong detno,
piyok pu tene anali, anali para ajat ten prek alamthe pen thansi Arnam yok kaparklam arju lo.
La-amun Pitor po pulo, “Ili badi Jiuli-Kangthir kihlong labang arleng hel baptist kachiplangple ayok inghone bak lang ayok teng une ma?”
Lasi anang analiyok Jisu Khristo amen pen baptist kachiplang yok thano. La-amun anali bekso adin kipado yok anangyok chingduk ngo.
La-aphel adun hel aro Judiya long kido korte hel arju hlongo, ke Bang-ajat hel ta Arnam alam chidengo.
Pitor po Jerusalem kidam amun, sunnot kachiplang arleng hel anang pen lam chingjesi thano,
“Nang sunnot kachiplangple arleng ahem lutdamsi, anali pen cho-jun duno.”
Laparake Pitor po analiyok isi para isi labang lam anali angot meso pulo.
“Ne Joppa rongpe long pingkitsi kido apor, nephu kartiklak amun isi apharlo thekngo, lake phili atok long otsi athak para kapasun aplang kithe badi isi senge nedung yok wang kisun thek hlongo.
Ne lalong nengpi si kilang-et yok ke akeng hong phili kido aro ingnam kido okthe, ajat-jat apei aro angsong kangjar awohel, mehel yok thek hlongo.
Aro ‘Ei Pitor, ingthur not, lamehel marine chonot;” pusi neyok kipu asi ne arju hlongo.
Manta neke pudun phakngo, ‘O Hemphu, labadi ke nangne lang; piyok pu tene inirsi ta kisim lale suwa apot helke ne angho bibe yong.’
Manta phong-ni athak para asi pu phakngo, ‘Arnam pot pangthir pilo, lamehel nang suwa puke puyek.’
Labangpo phong-thom pusi, lamehel athak yok pon phakngo.
Aro langot, la aporsi Sisiriya para nedungyok wang kitol bang kithom arleng, hali kido ahem long wang hlengo.
La-apor, nenglong pachiron hlonghle si, anali pen kapadun yok Jiuli-Kangthir neyok thano. Aro bang thorok korte helta nepen wangduno; aro hali labang arleng ahem lutdamsi, anang haliyok pulo,
‘Ihut tharlonpo nehem long arjap dingsi chiklangsi pulo, Joppa long arleng tolne, ingho kachitha-ang amen ke Pitor po, labang Simon poyok pataram dam;
Lalong nang aro nang hem ahuwit ta ingho pensi chipajok une, labang alam anang nali thane.’
Aro ne kithanyok kicheng amun, angot adak hali phuthak Jiuli-Kangthir kiwang badisi, anali yokta Jiuli-Kangthir wango.
La-amun Johon po ke langpen baptist otelo, manta nali ke Jiuli-Kangthir long baptist chiplang hlonge, labang alam Hemphu nikipu, bang alampo nineng purkilo.’
Lasi ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo yok kikrol amun, Arnam potsi bor-eh hali pilo labangpo anang naliyokta pisi, Arnam yok kiteng dun ne ihutke ke inghopo te?”
Labadi kithan arjusi, lahel dositsi Arnam yok pingkitsi pulo, “Ladi tene, Arnam Bang-ajat yokta hrengsi kido ajiu aphan neng kachipharlep bor-eh pilo.”

La-angotsi inghosi Stiphen po alam anat kachiplang kido anat chisangsi kachingrum, anali Phonesiya, Saipras aro Antiyok yok arting damsi, Jihudi arleng aparke prek hel angoke Arnam alam thanthe yongot.
Manta anali sitem Sairas aro Sairene alongri angkhan Antiyok yok wangsi Grik hel angota Hemphu Jisu kime-alamthe paharo.
Aro Hemphu ajakong anali pen kirap apot, ako-ong arleng krolsi Hemphu long neng chipharlep mo.
Anali alam kapahar si Jerusalem kachikruk longta arjusi, anali Barnabas poyok Antiyok yok tol lo.

Anang lalong wang hlengsi, Arnam kajinso theksi anang arongo; aro anali angthin kar-ihpo dosi Hemphu long krolketsi kidoyok neng rungo; piyok pu tene anang kangthir arleng, aro Jiuli-Kangthir aro kikrol pleng si kido;
lalong arleng ako-ong adholsi Hemphu long chilok ngo.
Laparake Sol po yok bisarsi Tarsas yok damo; aro anangyok phochaksi Antiyok long yok wano.
Lalong anali nengkan isiyok kachikruk long chingrumsi ako-ong arlengyok lamthe paklango. Aro adun helyoksi ango ke Antiyok rongpe longsi “Khristan” pusi taramo.
Labang aporsi turki hel Jerusalem para Antiyok yok wango.
Aro anali sitem Agabas amen ihut thursi, Jiuli pen parjulo, lake pirthepe dungsi akithe akal wange, Klaudiyas po kido adak ta ladi kachiplang.
Lalong adun hel abang ten apharan ki-un ateng, Judiya long kido korte helyok kirap aphan banta kihlodun alamthe chipachip mo.
La-aphel ladi asal tikisi, Barnabas po pen Sol po arideng phu-phang hel along yok hloduno.
Labang apor Herod recho po angkhan kachikruk abangyok duktap pilo.
Anang Johon po amuso Jems poyok nokjir pen mari lo.
Anang Jihudi helyok anang arong theksi anang Pitor poyok ta panep mo.

La-amun Onga Ahim kamai chojun aporsi kido. Aro Pitor poyok panepsi, Kijoktang-kamai aphel rat ango bisi kabisar yok chironsi, akrol long pathalo; aro bang phili pangsem si khel phili sonturi anangyok kapahonyok lahel arideng champilo.
Ladi si Pitor poyok akrol along thalsi bilo; manta anangphan kachikruk arleng hel nengpisi Arnam ango pingkit si kido.

La aphel Herod po anangyok mokol olesi kiwang ango arni anuwe, Pitor po bang hini sonturi hel asitem hirkuli jeng-ni bam klaksi amek jangsi kido, aro kihon arleng hel ke akrol amahang long honrulsi kido.

La amun langot, Hemphu Atharlon ihut chiklangsi, hem apulu polong patha-ang detno. La-amun tharlon po Pitor poyok hujuksi pangthursi pulo, “Ingthur sirak;” la amun jongsi Pitor po ari para hirkuli hel chiphloksi jango.
Laparake tharlon po anangyok pulo, “Nang amicheng chikokne keng-op chi-ikngot.” Pitor po chi-ik tang aphel, tharlon po pulo, “Nang chol akidingpo chi-ikne nephel phel wangne do.”
Ladisi Pitor po akrol para olesi anang phel-phel duno; manta tharlonpo khanangsi tikilo, labangpo abhu hlongkelsi, pharlo si chithek hlongdo pusi chirono.

Labadi si anali konam isi sonturi aro hi-ni sonturi yok chirkansi, anali rongpeyok kidam-kiwang ingchin owapo, adung kihleng aphel, labang owapo abithangsi chingpu phleno. Laparake anali mokol olesi isi duwar ajon damo aro photsi tharlonpo anangyok tikango.
La-amun Pitor po atot chihlongsi pulo, “Hemphu anang tharlon yok wangtolsi, Herod po arideng pen Jihudi hel ahuwit kar-ih hel para neyok pajokngo, labang ne minon khanangsi than undo.
La-aphel anang chiron chi-ap si Mark amen pen kachitha-ang Johon po, anang ai Mary pe ahemyok damo; lalong arleng ako-ong chingrum si pingkitsi kido.
Pitor po mokol owalong kapardeng aphel, Roda amen aturu pe wang-one lo.
La-amunsi Pitor po asi chinisi, anang arong ongsi owapo ingpu pipe si, hem arloyok katsi, Pitor po owa long wang arjapsi do pusi than damo;
la-amun anali pulo, “Nang ingcham chiplangdo,” manta anang khanang pusi pulo, “Khanangsi, wang pendo, lalo.” La-amun anali pulo, “La tene labangke anang tharlonpo si.”
Manta Pitor poke owalong pardeng jongsi kido; aphel anali inghappo ingpusi, anangyok theksi asombhik hlongo.

La-amun anali kapado klipyok, anang ari atewa pen paklangsi, Hemphu pot badi anangyok akrol along para mokolyok wano, labang atomo analiyok panirsi thano; aro pulo, “Nali Jems popen kortehel ayok labang a-odi parju.” Aro anang olesi prek athemyok damo.
Adap katha-ang aphel, Pitor po pot chiplango, pusi sonturi hijan chibhong hlokngo.

La-amun Herod po anangyok langwor ta pahlong un-ehsi, kihon abangyok bisar-honthesi, sonturi helyok si kamari yok thano; labang aphel Herod po Judiya tikangsi Sisiriya rongpe yok damsi, lalong si dolo.

Labang adak Tayar pen Sidon arleng hel yok Herod po anang akangho kihlong; manta anali inan chirwal pungsi anang ngot damsi, Blastas amen pen kido rechopo arlo kido phu-phangpo analiphan padoksi, kachipangsam ayok chingduk damo; piyok pu tene rechopo alongri parasi anali alongriyok cho-jun abihini hel hloman.
La aphel inirsi kachipachip arni, Herod recho po ape arik chi-iksi recho anghol long iningsi, arlenghel yok lam thano.
La-apor arleng hel hangdun solsi pulo, “Lake arleng alam thanthe yong, arnamsi lam than do.”
Manta labang aman anang Arnam yok pipe yongot, Hemphu atharlon Herod poyok photsi ghuniya ingholo, aro anangyok ingthan cholo, aphel anang thilo.
Manta Arnam alamthe chisangsi chan-chansi damo.
La-aphel Barnabas po pen Sol po potsi katiki aphang kihlong, labangpo anali pachokngo, lalong Mark amen kachitha-ang Johon poyok, anali pen ensi Jerusalem para chirulo.

La parake Barnabas po aro Simiyon anangyok Nigro, aki-ikpo puta puman, aro Sairen arong arleng Lusiyas, aro Herod recho pen kachi-al Mannayen po, pen Sol po, anali ke turki hel aro kapaklang hel Antiyok long kido kachikruk long kido.

Labang adak anali Hemphu yok chirdomsi an-kihum, labang amunsi Jiuli-Kangthir para analiyok pulo, “Ne pot si asal katiki yok Barnabas po pen Sol poyok taramo, la-asal aphan analiyok nemen aphan paprek ngot.”
Laparake anali an-kihum aro pingkitsi, anali bang-hini aphuthak ari batsi analiyok tolo.
Labadi si Jiuli-Kangthir para anali tol tangsi, anali Selekiya yok damo aro lalong para anali tilong pen Saipras yok damo.
Aro Salami rongpe hlengsi, Jihudi hel kachirdom ahem long Arnam Alamthe paharo; Johon po ta analipen sal kirap badi kido.
Ladisi anali Papho rongpe long labang langlompe long artingsi, lalong Bar-Jisu pusi Jihudi arleng asi-ik aro asisik katurki kipaklang arleng ihut yok anali phochak ngo.
Akireset Sarjiyas Paulas amen labang langlompe gobornorpo pen alok kido; labang gobornorpo Barnabas po pen Sol poyok taramsi, anang Arnam alam karjuyok ar-ih lo.
Manta Elimas, (lake Grik amen) kipu bhiliki kapaklangpo gobornor po ayok pakrol hlonghle yok neng parting pon aphan ajat-jat badi analiyok teng duno.
La-amun Sol po, kachini amen Pol pota puman, anang Jiuli-Kangthir plengsi, bhiliki kapaklang arlengpo yok lang-etsi pulo,
“Ei, kangho anang aro kangho asal katiki chot, si-ik asopo, aro ahuwit kadhorom ahutur, nang Hemphu khanang aduwar kapangho yok tikangke lang ma?

Aro minon langot! Hemphu ari nang theksi do; aro nang angkhan adinyok arni thek thesi, nangmek chotoksi dohlonge.” La-amunsi photsi anang mek thek phri-phri detno, aro kangting ben thipmo; aro anang ari otsi kipon ayok, anang arleng bisar-woro.
Ladi kachiplang thek hlongsi, gobornor po Hemphu kapaklang alamthe long asombhik hlongsi krol peno.
La-aphel Pol po aro alokjor pen Papho rongpe para langpe jon-jon tilong pen damsi Pamphiliya alongri Parga arongpeyok damo; manta Johon po analiyok tikangsi Jerusalem yok dam phakngo.
La-aphel anali Parga alongri para damsi Pisidiya alongri Antiyok rongpe hlengsi, kisang-arni anali kachirdom ahemyok lutdamsi iningo.

Lalong Mosi po kanong aro turki hel kiwi alamthe taram tangsi, kachirdom ahem phu-phang thawang hel anali dung thansi parju tolo, “Ei korte hel, arleng helyok nali penebak neng kirung alamdo, pu tene labangpo hali thanot.”
La-amun Pol po arjapsi, ari atewa pen lam kangje yok cheng pono; “Ei Israyel arleng hel, aro O Arnam yok kaphere abang, onenot,
labang Israyel arleng hel Arnam ili sar-lar helyok arwalo; aro Ijip alongri anali kido adak arleng helyok akithe ajat otesi, Arnam apharan akithe pen analiyok Ijip para olesi wano;
aro kep phili anengkan anang analiyok ingnam aju asitem analiyok Apa badi ral duno.
Lalong para anang Kanan alongri ajat thorok-isi paremsi, anali alongripo kangning pon ayok analiyok pilo.
La-aphel kachiplang nengkan phoro philine nengkan kep phongo bak anengkan dam tango. La aphel ke, Samuyel turki po aporyok bisar phu-phang hel ayok arwalo.
Aro anali recho ihut kachihangsi; Arnam Benjamin ajat para Kiss po aso Sol poyok arwalsi, nengkan kep phili ayok recho pang ningo.

Lapara ke anangyok patikangsi, anali recho kachiplang ayok Dabhit po yok paplango. Aro anang lam hakhi pisi pulo: ‘Ne neng ateng ihutyok, lake Jesipo aso Dabhit po yok hlongo; anang ne ahuwit kiron ateng pachoknge.’
Labang Dabhit po agijing para Arnam anang seme-kitang ateng ihut Ral Hemphu, lake Jisu yok, Israyel arleng hel ango wang parjap mo.
Jisu kiwange ango, Johon po, ahuwit Israyel arleng ango pap anang chipharlepsi baptist kachiplang alamthe paharo.

Aro Johon po Arnam asal katiki ki-orbo amun, anang arleng helyok pulo, ‘Nali, neyok inghopo pusi chiron do? Neke anang ihutpo kalek; manta langot! Ingho akeng-op arik so kiphlok yok ta ne michangche, anang ihutpo ne phel wangsi do.’
“Ei kortehel, O Abraham po agijing aso hel, aro nali sitem Arnam kaphere abang, ili yok labang kijok alamthe wangtol do.

Piyokte pu tene Jerusalem kido arlenghel aro anali kapangdom abang anangyok Ral Hemphu puke chininesi, aro kisang-arni tenta kataram turki hel alamthe abhu hlonghlesi, Jisu yok adai kolsi, turkihel alam pachok ngo.
Aro kamariyok isi ado hlonghle yongta, anangyok kamariyok Pilat poyok chihango.
Aro anang phan jibak alam lo-kangthir long kiwi do-ero, labang pachoksi, anangyok kros para pasunsi ahilik long bilo.
Manta Arnam anangyok kithi hel asitem para paburo.
Aro anang Galili para Jerusalem yok anangpen wang kidun abang ango jokha arniyok chiklango; analisi minon arleng hel ango anang hakhi badi do.
Aro ili sar-larhel angot seme-kitang alamthe,

hali nali sitem labang kime-alamthe nali parjudo, te Arnam Jisu yok pabursi, labang seme-kitangpo ili so-suhel aphan pachok plengo. Labang alam lun-parklam longta ladi kiwi do: ‘Nang neso, mini ne nangyok paplango.’
Arnam anangyok kithi para paburo, monphel kanghonhe ayok paburo; labang alam anang kithan, ‘Dabhit poyok kapang-ak potsi abor-eh, labang ahuwit ne naliyok piye.’
Lasi kamprek lun-parklam alongta anang pudo, ‘Nang kangthirpo yok panghon tolek.’
Piyok pu tene Dabhit po Arnam alamthe badi anang adin arleng hel kime asal tikisi momo yok thisi damo; aro anang sar-larhel pensi kipep ahilik arlosi thulo.
Manta ingho yoksi Arnam paburo, bang ihut ke ladike inghohe yongot.
Lasi, O korte hel, labang ihutpo parasi pap-kiron alam nali ngot paharsi wangdo;
aro potsi ado kido ta Mosi po kanong pen joktang un-eh yong, labang ahuwit ado hel, kikrol ahuwit ta anangpen chipajok-unman. Labangpo nali than un pene.
La-apot chilang chidat salne donot; turkihel alo long kiwi alam nali phuthak wange:

‘O nali kangho kithan abang, nali langot, asombhik hlongot, aro neng hel chipang thir; piyok pu tene jipe katiki atomopo, inghone bak nalithan yongta, nali krolkre ye, ladi asal ne nali kido adinsi tiki ye.”
Lapara ke labang alam, kiwang kisang-arni ta pahar tol yok, anali olesi kidame amunsi, arleng hel wang chingduk ngo.
Aro rongbong kachikak amun, ako-ong Jihudi aro Jihudi adhorom kimeng abang, Pol po aro Barnabas po aphel duno; lalong anali pen chithansi, Arnam kajinso long krolsi kido yok nengrungo.
La-aphel kisang-arni rongpe long ahuwit arleng Arnam alam ka-one yok chingrumo.
Manta Jihudi hel ratyok theksi, neng long amek kachiso wangsi patharaksi, Pol po kithan alamthe yok hoi chodunde yongot.

La-amun Pol po pen Barnabas po chipangtang dutsi pulo, “Ango ke nali ngo Arnam alamthe kapahar nange kido; manta nali bangpo sedetsi nali bithangyok or-eh len ajiuli kamichangche paklango apot, langot, hali nali tikangsi Bang-ajat yok dame.
Piyok pu tene Hemphu labadi thano, ‘Pirthimipe aholyok nang kapajok ponyok, nangyok ne Bang-ajat hel aphan katha-ang honjoksi bilo.”
Aro Bang-ajat hel bangpo arjusi anali neng arongsi, Arnam alamthe yok jortang pilo; aro konbak arleng ki-or eh ajiuli kapahlong aphan karwal, latengsi krolo.
Aro ahuwit Hemphu alamthe labang arat ajal dungsi chisang detno.
Manta Jihudi helke, aman kido arloso helyok aro rongpe kilang phu-phang arleng helyok pachonsi, Pol po pen Barnabas poyok honjat papisi, anali rongpe ahol para pa-ujharo.
Lalong adun hel anali kengtak anghan Jihudi hel kilang un-eh anat chihijirsi, Aikoniyam rongpe ayok damo.
Aro adun hel anang arong pen Jiuli-Kangthir plengo.
Aikoniyam rongpe long, anali bang-hini inansi Jihudi hel kachirdom ahem lut damsi, ladi si lamthe thano, aro ako-ong Jihudi aro Grik arleng krolo.
Manta kikrolkre Jihudi abang, kikrol kortehel kapangho yok, Bang-ajat arleng helyok pachonsalsi chipalang set-set otelo.
Lasi adun hel lalong jokha adinyok dosi, potsi Hemphu anali arideng asin aro asombhik asal paklango, anang kajinso alamthe hakhi pilo, labang Hemphu long chipangtang dutsi paharo.
Manta rongpe arleng hel bhak-ni chiphlaksi, angkhanke Jihudi hel aga, aro angkhanke adun hel aga chiplango.
Laparake Bang-ajat pen Jihudi hel aro anali phu-phang hel chiloksi adun hel yok aduk kipiyok aro arlong kiwar yok chipachip mo,
anali labang alampo than un si, Lekaniya alongri Lestra pen Darbe rongpe, aro adung arel kido angbong yok katsi,
lalong anali kime-alamthe paharo.
Lestra rongpe long keng-kam kachijor un-eh, akeng ajakong wesi kiplang para konga arleng ihut iningsi Pol po alam onesi kido.
Lalong anang Pol po yok lang-etsi, kime ayok anang kikrolpo theksi, asi pathesi pulo, “Akeng long chipathir chipakengne thurnot.”
La-amunsi arlengpo chon hrapsi ingthursi, akeng damworo.
La-amun rat abang Pol po katiki asal theksi, Lekaniya alam pen hangsi pulo, “Arnam arleng hel amahang ensi, ili dungyok wang suno!”
Aro anali Barnabas poyok Jihudi amen Dupitor ero, aro Pol po lam kithan thek apotsi, anang men ke Harmes ero.
La-aphel rongpe adung kido Jeus arnam abangthe po ijon chal pen mirsang ensi owapo adung yok wano. Piyok pu tene rat abang adun hel aphan buli karkli yok wango.
Manta Adunhel, lake Barnabas po aro Pol po labang alampo arju hlongsi, anali pehel ingseksi, rat adung dam phitsi hangsi pulo,
“Ei arleng hel, labadi asal piyok tikido? Halita nali badisi kime-kangho pen kido arlengsi. Inghosi, athak, pirthimi pe, langpe aro lalong kido ahuwit abihini yokta sanselo,
aro aporong adin, ahuwit ajat hel yok abithang kar-ih aduwar kengkam kachijor yok tikango,

layongta bor-eh batsi naliyok inghun para arwe pajang pilo, athe kipawang abotor pisi, an pen neng rongsi nali neng pangsamsi, anang hakhi weleng ke tikangke yongot, labadi ajiuli pen Arnam, anangyok nali labang apharan kangwe arnam hel para neng kapharlep yok, hali nali ngot kime-alamthe pahar do.
Labang hel than tangsi, adun hel analiyok buli papipe aphan arleng helyok anali teng klak ngo.
Lalong para Antiyok pen Aikoniyam rongpe angkhan Jihudi arleng lalong wangsi, arleng helyok nengrungsi, Pol po yok arlong pawaro; aro anang thilo pusi chironsi, rongpe para mokolyok wungsi pono.
Manta kikrol adun hel chikom-plengsi karjap amun si, anang thursi rongpe long lut damo; aro la-aphel arni Barnabas po pen Darbe rongpe yok damo.
La-aphel Pol po pen Barnabas po la rongpe long kime-alamthe paharsi ako-ong Adun otesi, Lestra, Aikoniyam, aro Antiyok yok chirul phakngo;
aro “Ili ako-ong duk chihi tangsi Arnam-alongri lut dam nange,” pusi krol thipsi lamthe paklangsi, adun hel anang pachipmo.
Aro anali phan kachikruk ten long phu-phang peksi, pingkit si aro an-humsi, Hemphu arideng kapingkit pen an humsi pekngo.
Lapara anali Pisidiya alongri arpat hletsi Pamphiliya alongri yok damo,
Perga long anali Arnam alam thansi Ataliya rongpe yok damo.
Lalong para anali jipe asal pachok ango, labang asal anat rongpe long anali yok Arnam kajinso kipek tango, labang Antiyok yok tilong pen wango.
Anali Antiyok long hlengsi kachikruk arleng helyok athawol pangrumsi, Arnam anali pen dosi la-an akithe asal tikilo, aro anang Bang-ajat ayok kikrol aduwar ingpu phleno, lamehel panirsi than detno.
Aro anali kikrol dun abang pen jokha arniyok dolo.
Angkhan arleng Judiya para Antiyok yok wangsi kikrol dun abang yok labadi thano, “Mosipo kanong kihlong badike nali sunnot otete lengke nali jok un-eh ye.”

Pol po pen Barnabas po anali pen chiprongo, lasi Pol po pen Barnabas po aro Antiyok long angkhan abang ke Jerusalem damsi adun abang yok kilang pon akisar hel pen labang alampo kachirwal dam aphan chipachipmo.

Lasi kachikruk abang analiyok duwar ibeng thon duno aro anali Phoyenikiya pen Samariya alongri aga kidam amun Bang-ajat hel pot badi Arnam yok angthin chipharlep mo, labang alam anali than pono aro labang alam hel ahuwit kikrol dun abang anang arong dolo.
Anali Jerusalem yok kiwang amun kachikruk abang pen adun hel aro akisar hel analiyok chingdeno aro anali pen Arnam katiki asal hel anali yok than detno.
Manta Pharisi aga kikrol dun abang angkhan arjapsi pulo, “Bang-ajat abangke sunnot ote pen hlonge aro Mosi po kanong meng hlonge.”
Lasi labang alampo kachirwal yok adun hel pen akisar hel athawolsi chingrumo.

Jokha apor lam kachirwal aphel Pitor po arjapsi pulo, “Ei korte hel, Arnam Bang-ajat abang ne angho para kime-alamthe arjusi krolman, lasi angkhan adin angot, Arnam nali sitem para neyok arwal tango, bangpo nali than unsido.
Aro angthin kihlong det Arnam jibadi iliyok, badisi anali yokta Jiuli-Kangthir pisi hakhi pilo;
anang krolpensi angthin chipangthirsi, ilipen anali sitem prek ke parjapje yongot;
lasi ili sar-larhel aro ilita kirung un-eh abi-pun jongali abhar chihi dun un iyongot, lamehel minon adun hel aphang batsi, piyok te Arnam yok honjat langdo?
Manta jibadi, ilita labadi Hemphu Jisu kajinso parasi kijok pahlongo pusi ili kroldo.
Aro Barnabas po pen Pol po Bang-ajat hel asitem Arnam para la-an asombhik asin aro angtar hel tikisi kipaklang, mehel ahuwit kithan aphel ahuwit arleng doklipsi onelo.
Anali kithan tang aphel, Jems po than dakngo; “Ei kortehel, nelam one!
Arnam abithang amen anat Bang-ajat arleng asitem para isi arongbong kaparjap alam Simon po thano,
turki hel alamthe pen chikeng do, lo-kangthir long kiwi do,
‘Owepo kicheng para kithan-un labang asal kapachok Hemphu pudo,
kidochok arleng hel, lake Bang-ajat arleng nemen pen amen-anang chitha-ang man, lahel ahuwit Hemphu yok bisarman, la-anatsi,
ne wang phaksi, Dabhit po chinghodet si kido ahempo kemphak nge; aro labang kachingho hel kemphak si, labang poyok parjaknge.’
Lasi ne chiron-chibemsi, Bang-ajat arleng asitem ingosi Arnam yok chipharlep do, anali yok kamprek aphang pekpe;
manta agoya long kachirdom kisim para, kangho kidoner, angphun bersitsi kamari apei aro awi kimung, lamehel para chitereksi kidoyok winang.
Piyok pu tene aporong para arong tenta Mosi po kanong kapahar abang do, aro kisang-arni ten kachirdom ahem ten long bangpomar chiporheman.”

La-amun kangthir-adunhel aro akisar hel kachikruk dungsi, anali sitem para Judas, anang yok Barsabas po puta puman, aro Silaspo, korte hel asitem labang-hini arlengyok arwalsi, Pol po pen Barnabas poyok Antiyokyok kitol akime thekngo.
Anali ri-deng ipak lo labadi wisi tolo: “Antiyok, Siriya lapen Silikiya kido Bang-ajat kortehel yok adun, akisar, aro korte helyok kardom pido.
Hali than the yongta angkhan arleng hali sitem para damsi, lamthe hel ahul pawangsi nali thin ihik-bihik ingholdo pusi hali arju hlongo.
Lasi hali isi alamthe pahitsi, ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo amen aphan kachirbu ili nengdok Pol po pen Barnabas po yok,
anali pen angkhan arleng arwalsi, nali dungyok kitol akime thekngo.
Lasi Judas po pen Silas poyok nali dung toldo; anali angho penta hali kiwi mat-mat alamhel nali than dame.

Nali agoya long kardom abhog, awi, angphun kiber apei kicho, aro kidoner labang hel para chiterekne donot; labang katiki asal aparke, nali phuthak kamprek aphang papi hlonghle yok, Jiuli-Kangthir aro halita akime thekngo.
Labang hel para nali bithang chitereksi do tene, nali phansi meye. Nali long bor-eh pado nang. Kardomo.”
La-amun anali chipadisi, Antiyok yok wango, aro kikrol arongbong abang chipangrum detsi analiyok lopo pilo;
anali lo po chiporhesi anang neng kirung alamthe hel arjusi neng arong dolo.
Judas po pen Silas po abithangta turki kido apot, anali ta jokha alamthe chithansi korte hel yok nengrungsi kikrol pachipmo.
Ladi si angkhan arni kido aphel, analiyok kitol abang adungyok chirulsi kidamyok, korte helpara nengsamsi chipadilo.
Manta Silas poke lalong kidoyok chipachip mo.
Manta Pol po pen Barnabas po angkhan arlengpen lamthe paklangsi, Hemphu Alamthe paharsi Antiyok long dolo.

Angkhan adin aphel Pol po Barnabas po yok pulo, “Jibak arong long ili Hemphu Alamthe kipahar, labang rongpe hel dam phaknang, aro kortehel adung chipochak damsi, anali pot badi do, labang kilangyok damsonang dou.”
Mark kipuman Johon po ayok Barnabas po ke anangpen kachipon anang kido,
manta inghosi Pamphiliya long analiyok tikango, aro anali pen Arnam asalyok olele yongot, labang arlengyok ki-enpon yok, Pol po akime thekthe yongot.
Lalong labadi ahul wangsi, analidak ihut para ihutyok chitikang prupmo; aro Barnabas po ke Mark po yok ensi jahajpen Saipras langlom ayok damo.
Manta Pol poke Silas po yok arwalsi, kortehel parasi Hemphu kajinso long chipeksi, lalong para anali olelo.
Siriya pen Silikiya alongri aga damsi kachikruk helyok anang pangtang ponsi damo.
Lapara ke Pol po Darbe pen Lestra yok hlengo; aro lalong langot, kikrol ihut Jihudi arloso pe asopo, anangpa ke Grik arleng kido, ladi Timothi amen ihut adun kido.
Anang Lestra pen Aikoniyam rongpe kortehel asitem amen-anang kachitha-ang kido.
Pol po Timothi po yok ki-en pon anangsi, labang ahol kido Jihudi aphan anangyok sunnot otelo; piyok pu tene anang apo poke Grik pusi ahuwit Jihudi chithan-un detsi kido.
La-aphel anali rongpe hel along artingsi, Jerusalem long kido adun hel aro akisarhel kachipachip alamthe kithan hel kamainot yok analiyok thano.
La-amun kachikruk hel kikrol chipangtang si, arni ten alekha ongsi damo.
La-aphel anali Phergiya aro Galatiya ahol agak kidam; la amunsi Asia alongri long lamthe kapaharpo Jiuli-Kangthir para padam hlonghle yongot apot,
anali Musiya alongri adung hlengsi, Bithiniya alongriyok kidam ka-ole; manta Jisu Ajiuli ke analiyok padam hlonghle yongot.
La-amun anali Musiya tikangsi, Troyas rongpe yok damo. Lalong Pol po isi apharlo hlongo;
ihut Mesidoniya arleng arjap dingsi anangyok chingduksi pulo, “Mesidoniya alongri yok wang arpatsi, haliyok wang rapmot!”
Anang labang apharlo hlongsi, Arnam labang alongri arleng hel angot kime-alamthe kapaharyok haliyok taram do, labadi hali khanang abhu hlongo, aro lajongsi Mesidoniya long kidam ayok awak chilango.
La-aphel Troyas para langpe long jahaj pen damsi Samotras yok, aro la-aphel arni Haneyapolis rongpe yok damo.

Lalong para hali Philipi rongpe yok damo; labang Philipi rongpe ke ango Mesidoniya alongri kaphochak cheng angbong rongpe kido, aro Roman hel kangning pam kido; labang rongpe long hali bekso arniyok dolo.
Kisang-arni rongpe owapo para damsi, langjon akung Jihudi hel pingkit athem domene pusi chironsi, lalong damsi, iningsi, lalong kachingrum arloso hel angot lamthe paharo.
Lalong Thoyatira rongpe long hapek arohon kachibhak ape kijor Lidiya amen Arnam yok kimeng ihut arlosope lamthe onesi kido; Pol po kapahar alamthe kamainotyok Hemphu anang neng ingpulo.

La parake anang aro hem ahuwit arleng baptist chiplangsi, haliyok chingduksi pulo, “Nali kachiron ateng ne Hemphu yok krol hlongdo, pu tene nali nehemyok wangne donot; ladisi anang hem ayok padam elo.
La-aphel labang pingkit athem hali kidamjong amunsi, bhiliki alam thansi kapado ahemphu poyok nohok ako-ong alap kihlong ladi dhin-dhini ajiu hapsi kido turupe ihut hali ngo wang hlengo.
Anang Pol po aro hali phel phel wangdun si, hang-hangsi pulo, “Labang arlenghel Kithechot Arnam amurkiya chiplangsi, nali ngot kijok aduwar wang paklang do.”

Anang jokha adin ayok ladi kithan jong apot, Pol po neng hik-hak-lak hlongsi anang si-ikpo yok pulo, “Jisu Khristo amen pen nangyok thando, anang para nang wang olenot.” La amunsi si-ikpo labang kitam detsi olesi damo.
La-amun anang ahemphu hel lahel nohok kiwang anghor kangwe theksi, Pol po aro Silas po yok nepsi, hathi aphu-phang hel adung wungsi pono;
la-aphel bisarpo ango analiyok ponsi pulo, “Hali Roman arleng jipe abi-pun, alam meng nange lale mainot hlonghle,
anali Jihudi arleng chiplangsi labang mar paklango, aro hali rongpe long pasohlokdo.”
Latang si rat hel analiyok kangho hlongsi; aro bisarpo, anali pe hel ingsek detsi tokok pen kisapyok thano.
Analiyok ongnai kipam aphel, anali yok akrol long pathalsi kahangar thipyok jeilar poyok thano.
Labang kithan alam hlongsi, analiyok akrol arlo ponsi, anali keng thengpe kardip pakorklaksi bilo.
Manta ajo-jarlo Pol po aro Silas po Arnam angot pingkitsi lun kilun; aro akrol kido helta anali kilun hel onesi kido.
La apor photsi chiklik akithe wango; akrol ahem abhiti chihujuk detno, aro la-amun photsi owahel chingpu phleno, aro akrol kido arleng hel kibam hirkuli chiphloksi jang detno.
La-amun jeilar po ahari hlongo, aro akrol owa hel kachingpu phlen theksi, akrol arleng hel kat detno pusi anang chirono, aro nokjir ensi abithang kachimari yok anengo.
Manta Pol po hang chersi pulo, “Nang bithang chijorek; piyok pu tene hali holeksi do.”
Jeilarpo me-thengtom hangsi hem arloyok wango, aro klemphlak phlaksi Pol po aro Silaspo angot chirdomo.
Laparake anang analiyok mokolyok wansi arjulo, “Ei sar hel, kijok ayok ne pot te tiki nange?”
Aro anali pulo, “Hemphu Jisu yok krolnot, tanghesi nangpen nang hem dungsi chipajok une.”
Laparake anali anangyok aro anang hem kido abangyok anali Hemphu alam thano.
Aro la-arni anuwe aporsi analiyok ponsi, kisap amek hel champilo; aro la-amunsi anang mat-mat, aro anang hem ahuwit ta baptist chiplang penpano.
La-aphel anang analiyok anang ahemyok ponsi anali ngot cho-jun abihini pisi, hem abang pen Arnamyok krolo apotsi anang arong ongo.
La aphel adap tha-ango, parake bisarpo hel paton ayok tolsi papulo, “Lamehel arleng helyok tikangot.”
Lasi jeilarpo Pol po yok a-odi hel parjusi pulo, “Nali kiphlok yok bisarpo hel wang than dundo; lasi nali minon olene nengsamne damot.”

Manta Pol po analiyok pulo, “Romiya arleng ke hali ta, haliyok ado abisar wesi rongbong ango pamsi, akrol along thalsi, minonke hali tikangjol le ma? Ladi ke kalek; anali abithang wangsi hali papon nang.”
La-amun paton hel, bisarpo helyok mehel than damo aro anali Roman arleng pusi, labang arjusi chipherelo;
analiyok wang chingduksi, rongpe para kapadam tolyok chingdukngo.
La-amun anali akrol para olesi, Lidiya pe ahem lut damo; aro akorte helyok theksi, analiyok anang arong rungsi, lalong para damo.
La-parake Pol po aro Silas po, Amphipolis aro Apoloniya arong aga damsi Thesalonika yok hlengo; lalong Jihudi hel isi Arnam ahem kido;
Pol po abi-pun badisi, anali adung damsi, lalong kithom kisang-arni analiyok lo-kangthir para acho alamthe paklango, aro pharlisi than phleno,
“Khristo duk chosi kithi asitem para kibur nange kido,” aro pulo, “Labang Jisu alamsi ne nali ngo pahardo, anangsi labang Khristo.”
La-amun anali sitem angkhan ke neng rungo, aro angkhan kimeng Grik arleng ako-ong aman kido arloso krolsi, Pol po aro Silas po pen chilokngo.
Manta Jihudi hel mek kachiso aneng eno, aro angkhan kangho arleng pangrumo, aro rongpe long ahul pawango. La-amun Jason po ahem pam-theng damo, aro analiyok ason melpe angot kipon hrilo.
Manta analiyok hlonghlesi, Jason po aro angkhan kikrol abangyok rongpe phu-phang hel ango wung pono aro hangsi pulo, “Labang arleng pirthepe dungsi paso hlokngo, lahel holek ta wang hlengo;
aro analiyok Jason po ahem don badi pado do, aro Jisu amen pen prek ihut recho do pusi, anali abangten Sijar po kithan alam pangho man.”
Labang alam arjusi, rat hel aro rongpe phu-phang helta anang ihik-bihik chiplang detno.
La-amunsi Jason po aro alok hel yokta nohok pisi jamin eno, aro analiyok hlolo.
La-aphel kikrol kortehel parjangsi, anuwesi Pol po aro Silas po yok Beriya rongpe yok tol detno. Anali lalong hlengsi, Jihudi Arnam ahemyok damo.
Thesalonika arlenghel yok ke lalong arleng hel anang kime kido; piyok pu tene anali neng chipisi lamthe ensi, la ma kalek, mehel kithek ayok arnita lo-kangthir alam kachirwal.
Lasi anali sitem ako-ong arleng, aro Grik hel asitem ako-ong aman kido arloso hel aro apenso krolo.
Manta Beriya longta Pol po parasi Arnam alam pahardo, pusi Thesalonika long kido Jihudi hel than unsi lalong yok wangsi, rat helyok arwul salo aro thirthe phosi otelo.
La amun kikrol kortehel parjang si Pol poyok langpepe akungyok tol penpano; manta Silas po pen Timothi poke Beriya longsi dolo.

Aro Pol poyok kithondun arleng hel anangyok Athensyok thon duno; laparake Silas po aro Timothi poyok “ki-un ateng parjangsi, nedung kiwangyok thanot” pusi Pol po para kithan alam hlongsi lahel Athensyok dam dapmo.
La-aphel Pol po Athens along analiyok inghongne kido amun, rongpe long agoya pleng thipsi kido theksi, anang ajiu long ihik-bihik chiplango.
Lasi anang Arnam ahem kido Jihudi hel aro arnam kimeng arleng hel pen, aro hathi long kachiphochak arleng hel pen arnita lam chingjelo.

Lalong Ipikuriyan aro Istoik adhorom agiyan kithek-at angkhan pen lam chirung chibatno. Aro inghone bak ke pulo, “Anang penebak kipu yok rondo?” Angkhan ke pulo, “Kachiron badike, anang bang alongri arnam alam kapahar arleng; piyok putene anang Jisu aro kiburphak alamsi kipahar.”
Lasi anali anangyok nepsi Areyopaga kipu ason mel alongyok wansi pulo, “Nang kipahar pon akimi kapachirlipo pot te, bangpo hali than une ma?
Piyok pu tene nang penebak ki-un-eh alam hali-no wang parjudo; tene lamehel acho alam potne, kitheknge anengman.”
Labang Athens long ahuwit arleng aro wang-kido bang alongri arleng helta sal akijol apor prek asal tikike si, penebak akimi alam chithansi lale onesi apor padam man.
Lalong Pol po Areyopaga ason amel asitem arjapsi labang alam pulo, “Ei Ethens arleng hel, ne naliyok ahuwit alamta arnam-arni kimeng nali thekdo.
Piyok pu tene nali jipe ardomman, labang hel ne kilangwor amun, “Amen hlonghle Arnam yok” pusi kiwi isi athuli thek hlongo. La-apot nali inghoyok thekthe yongta ardom man, bangpo ne naliyok thanbang.
Pirthe aro lalong kido majit abihini kasansepo ke Arnam, anang athak aro pirthimipe Hemphu apot, arleng arideng kikem arnam ahem longke dode.
Aro anang pene-bak kidorde anat, munusi arideng al-pahlong si kidota ta kalek; piyok pu tene anangsi ahuwit yok ajiu, asithe, aro kido-kangwe abihini pajirman.
Aro ahuwit yok pirthepe long kapado aphan, anang ihut parasi munusi ahuwit ajat arleng hel paplangsi, anali kido owe aro anali kangning longri ahol pachipmo,
Lake anali Arnam bisar bisarsi, dakne awak si pahlongman; layongta anang ili para akaholo dode.
Piyok putene ‘Ili anang longsido, hrengdo, klemdo, dojong do.’ Aro nali lo kiwi arleng hel pudo, ‘Piyok putene ili ta anang agijing.’
La-apot ili Arnam agijing apot, Arnam amahangpo munusi kachimangkai aro abudhi pensi ser, rupa, aro arlong agoya badi puke ili chiron nangne.
Arnam labang kithekthe owepo chihilo; manta minonke ahuwit arlengyok neng kachipharlep yok thando.

Piyok pu tene ladi adin anang bithang karwaltang arleng ihut parasi pirthepe adhorom bisar oteye, ladi adin khanang si pachipsi bilo; aro anangyok kithihel asitem para pabursi, ahuwit ango krolpen nange aporman pilo.
Anali Pol po angho para kithihel kibur alam arjusi, angkhanke anangyok chongnekngo; manta angkhan ke pulo, “Labang alam nang para iphong karju phaknge anengdo.”
Ladisi Pol po anali sitem para olesi damo.
Layongta anali angkhanke anangyok chilok dunsi krolo. Anali asitem Areyopaga ason amel abang-phu Dionisiyas po, aro Damaris amen ihut arloso, aro anali pen angkhan arlengta kido.
La-aphel Pol po Ethens long tikangsi Korinth ayok damo;

labang adak Klaudiyas po ahuwit Jihudi helyok Rom arongpe para kapadam alam kithan anat, Pontas alongri kiplang Akila amen ihut Jihudi apiso Priskila pe pen bekso adin ango Itali alongri para kiwang, arlengyok theksi Polpo anang dung damo.
Aro Pol po anali pen isidet asal arleng apot, anali pen do duno, aro anali pen sal tikilo. Piyok pu tene katiki asalke anali kuntulu kikem arleng kido.
Aro kisang-arniten Arnam ahem long lam chirwalsi, Jihudi pen Grik helyok angthin kapharlep yok nengrungo.
La-amun Silas po aro Timothi po Mesidoniya para wang kihleng apot, Pol poke Arnam alam kapahar nengpi si, Jisu si Khristo lo, pusi Jihudi helyok hakhi pilo.
Manta anali anangyok kithan tengklak ngo, aro patharak ngo apot, Pol po pe hijirsi anali yok pulo, “Nali wi nali phu-athak padonang; neke ado ingjong; minon parake ne Bang-ajat adungyok dame.”
Laparake anang lalong para damo, aro Arnam kimeng ihut Taitas Jastas amen arlengpo ahem yok lutdamo; anang ahempo kachirdom ahem akung kido;
aro kachirdom ahem thawang Krispas po anang hembang ahuwit Hemphu yok krolo; aro Korinth arleng hel asitem ako-ong arleng onesi, krolsi baptist chiplango.
La-aphel Hemphu anuwe Pol poyok pharlo chihomansi pulo, “Nang phereyek; dositse si, paharne dopon.
Piyok pu tene ne nangkung-kung do dundo aro nang kapangho yok nangyok kaita nang padukdeye; piyok pu tene labang rongpe long ne arleng ako-ongdo.”
Laparake Polpo anali sitem nengkan isine chiklo jon-thorok dosi, Arnam alam pachirlilo.
Galiyu poyok Akhaya alongri Roman gobornor kido amun, Jihudi hel asapsi Pol poyok langset setsi, tarang ahem kangning angot anangyok ponsi pulo,
“Labang arlengpo hali kanong mengmesi kachirdom ahem para kamprek kachirdom ayok arleng hel nengrungsi do.”
La-amun Pol po lam kithane amunsi, Galiyu po Jihudi helyok pulo, “Ei Jihudihel, labangpo ka-ongnai, lale kangho asal ka-ojor tene, ne nali lam chirchi melo hoi;
manta nali lam detsi, amen, lale nali kanong alam anatsi ahul kiwang abisar, tene nali bithangne chilangot; ladi alam bisarpo kichoyok, ne aneng ingjong.”
Latangsi anang tarang ahem analiyok para toldet no.
La-aphel anali Arnam ahem thawang Sosthenes po yok nepsi, tarang ahem amahangsi anangyok sapmo. Layong ta Galiyu po mehel jat aneng pipe yongot.

La-aphel Pol po lalong aro angkhan adin dosi, kortehel para chipadilo, aro langpe long jahaj pen Siriya alongriyok damo; anang pen Priskila pe aro Akila po ta duno; anang Kinkriya long achu kachingtep; piyok pu tene anang Arnam ango penebak hopot kicho.
La-aphel Ephisiya arongpe hlengo apot, anang analiyok lalong tikangsi, abithang kachirdom ahem lut dunsi Jihudi hel pen lamthe chirwalo;
latlong aro bekso adin kidoyok arleng hel Pol poyok chingdukngo, manta anang kengke yongot;
manta “Arnam ahisa tene, nali dungyok wang chirul phaknge.” pusi langpe aduwarsi jahaj pen Ephisiya para damo.
La-aphel Sisiriya along sunsi, Jerusalem yok damsi kachikrukyok kardom pisi lalong para Antiyok yok wango.
Lalong bekso adin dosi, lalong para damsi, Galatiya aro Phergiya alongri ahol isi para isi long ahuwit adun helyok kikrol pangtango.
Labang apor Apolos amen ihut Jihudi arleng Ephisiya long wango; anang ajat ke Alekjendriya kido, Anang ihut lam kithanthek arleng, lo-kangthir agiyan kido arleng kido.
Anang Hemphu Aduwar alam kachirli, aro jiuli akar kido alam nengrungo, aro Jisu alam pharlisi me-at kapachirli, layongta Johon po baptist alamthe detsi kithek.

Lalong anang kachirdom ahem long chipangtang dutsi lamthe paharpono; lalong Priskila pe pen Akila po anang kapaklang alam arjusi, anangyok anali hem ponsi, Arnam Aduwar aro khanangpo pharlisi abhu pahlongo.

La-aphel Apolos po Akhaya alongri ayok kidam anengo apot, korte hel nengrong piduno aro anangyok ki-enpon yok adun helyok lo wilo. La-amun anang labang athem hlengsi, kajinso hlongsi kikrol abangyok ki-un ateng rapduno.
Piyok pu tene Jisu si Khristo, anang lo-kangthir para labang aporman paklangsi, nengrungsi rat hel ango Jihudi hel kachibat parem detno.
Apolos po Korinth along kido adak, Pol po inglong angbong agak arting hletsi Ephisiya yok wangsi,
lalong angkhan adun pochaksi analiyok arjulo, “Konam nali krolo, la-amun Jiuli-Kangthir kihlong ma?” Anali anangyok pulo, “Jiuli-Kangthir hlongman ma hlonghle, labang halike arju hlonghle yongot.”
Anang pulo, “Tene, pot badi haksi nali baptist chiplango?” Anali pulo,“Johon po baptist ka-ote yoksi.”
Pol po pulo, “Johon po arleng helyok kipu, ‘Ingho nephel wangsi do, anangyok, lake Jisu yok krol;’ ladi pusi anang analiyok neng kachipharlep baptist pensi baptist otelo.
Labang alam arjusi anali Hemphu Jisu amen pen baptist chiplango.
La parake Pol po anali abang along ari bat tangsi, anali phuthak Jiuli-Kangthir wango, lalong anali ajatjat alam thansi katurki alam paharo.
Anali kido kangwe bang kere-hini arleng kido.
Lalong para Pol po Arnam ahemyok lut damsi, Arnam longri alam ensi lamthe chibatno arleng helyok nengrungo, chiklo jon-thom bak chihadutsi paharsi kido.

Manta anali angkhanke angthin parthatno aro mengme yongot, rat hel angot labang kikrol aduwar yok patharakngo apot, anang naliyok tikangsi, adun helyok papreksi, Tarenas amen ihutpo bi-than ahem long arni ta lamthe chirwalo.
Labadisi nengkan hi-niyok dolongo, tangsi Asia alongri long kido ahuwit Jihudi aro Grik helta Hemphu alam arju hlongo.
Arnam ke Pol po aridengsi la-an ajakong asal patikilo,
anang bangpo para pe, pen pongho ensi kiso arleng adung pon penpan, anali kisohel melo, aro si-ik ajiu hel olesi damo.

Manta longri jon-jan kartingwor Jihudi arleng angkhan si-ik ka-ujhar abang, si-ik kihap hel ango Hemphu Jisu amen kithan pon amun puman, ‘Ingho alamthe Pol po pahardo, labang Jisu amen pensi ne naliyok than do.’
Labadi asal Iskiba amen ihut Jihudi bor-bangthe po bang thorok isi aso pensohel ta katiki.
Lalong si-ik ajiu hel analiyok than phakngo, “Jisu yok chiniman, Pol po yokta chiniman; manta nali ke inghote?”

Ladi pusi labang si-ik ajiu kachu-u arlengpo anali thak chon-thel si, ahuwit yok hal detsi, anang apharan pensi halo; la-amun anali pe-rik pangwepho si aro ghunia chiplangsi, labang ahem parake kak detno.
Lasi Ephisiya long kido Jihudi aro Grik arleng hel labang alam arjusi, ahuwit ta pherelo; aro Hemphu Jisu amenyok jortang pilo.
Aro kikrol abang ako-ong wangsi, abithang kangho katiki hel hoi cholo.
Aro bhiliki kapaklang abang abithang kiwi lohel pangrum detsi, rat angot me pasek detno. Labang alohel ador alekha, kep phongo hajar phongo rupa atheng chokngo.
La-an kihal ajakong pen Hemphu alam chisang detsi halo.
Lamehel kachiplang aphel, Pol po Mesidoniya aro Akhaya alongri aga artingsi Jerusalem kidame aneng dosi anang pulo, “Ne lalong kidam aphel Rom arongpe yokta chiklang dam pen hlonge.”
Lasi anangyok kirap dun arleng adak Timothi po aro Erastas po labang hini yok Mesidoniya yok tolsi, abithang Asia alongri angkhan adin dolo.
La aporsi kikrol aduwar anat ahul wango.
Piyok pu tene Artemis arnampe ahempo rupa pen kikem Dametriyas amen ihut honari kido; anang kithep asal ako-ong arlengyok sal kipi.
Laparake Damatriyas po analiyok aro kijor-kihrep along kithep arleng hel pangrum si pulo, “Ei arleng hel, labang bihini kijor-kihrep para ili apuru chokdo, labang nali thekman.

Manta arleng ari pen kithep arnam helke, arnam kalek, pusi la Pol po labadi thansi, Ephisiya longdet kalek, Asia longri dungsi ako-ong arleng ayok nengrung si arleng helyok kamprek aduwar pakrolsi pondo, labang nali theksi do, arjusi do.
