Aro labang ili kijor-kihrep kapangwe detyok kaphere-meme do, ladet kalek, Asia ajaldung si, layok ke, pirthepe dung kachirdom Artemi arnampe, anang ahem yokta pangwe detsi, aro anangyok anang ser apuru para kapangwe yok kaphere nangedo.”
Labang alam arjusi, anali anang kangphro si hang chersi pulo, “Ephisiya long Artemi pe pathe nang!”
Labang rongpe dungsi ahul wang dutno, Pol po pen kidun Mesidoniya arleng Gayas po aro Aristarsas po, anali bang hiniyok nep ponsi, anali arong kapaklang athemyok chingbarsi katsi damo.
Lalong Pol po rat hel asitem kilutyok anang kido apot, adun hel anangyok padam hlonghle yongot.
Aro asia long angkhan arleng ason phu-phang hel Pol po alok chiplangsi, anang dung arleng tolsi, arong kapaklang ahem arlo palut dam hlonghle yok chingdukngo.
Mel along ahul kiwang dut apot, prek ajat arleng hel prek alam pensi chihang solsi kido; aro arleng hel pot anat anali wang kachingrum, lalong ako-ong abangke than un-eh yongot.
La parake Jihudi hel ke Alekjendar poyok ango ayok dolponsi, rat asitem para olesi tolo. Lalong Alekjendar po aripen atewa pisi, arlenghel ango lam angkithan dunyok kiron.
Manta anang Jihudi arleng mene pusi anali pachini unsi, anali “Ephisiya Artemi arnampe pathe nang!” pusi ghonta hiniyok hang solo.

Aphelsi rongpe salchakthe po arleng helyok anang padoklipsi pulo, “Ei Ephisiya abang! Ephisiya rongpepe Artemi arnampe aro suneng para kijang agoyapo ta kachirdom ahem kihon pusi kithekthe arleng asitem ingho do?
Lamehel alamyok ihut ta hoi chomo un-eh ye apot, nali la-an abisar en-eh detne, ingsam klipsi kidomechot;
piyok pu tene potsi arleng nali holek yok wano, anali arnam abihini chunghuhe yong, lale ili arnampe yok kapatharak ta kalek.
Lasi Demestriyas po aro bihini kithep arleng hel inghone bak ka-ojor doman, tene bisar ka-ote arlengdo, bisar aphu-phang ta do, nali lalong chigosor dam une.
Manta nali prek alamthe anat kachingduk alam dolo, tene arni kachingrum mel along chipangsam une.
Piyok pu tene mini ahul kapawang dutpo ithe aron kangwe anat, hali phuthak si ado piye pusi kaphere meme do; aro labang rat kachingrum alam hali jat pudun un-eh ye.”
Ladi kithan aphel anang mel chikakngo.
La-ahul ingsamo apot, Pol po kikrol adun helyok taramsi nengrungsi, chipadi tang aphel Mesidoniya yok kidamyok olelo.
La-parake anang lamehel angbong artingsi, analiyok neng rungo aro anang Grik alongriyok hlengo.
Lalong anang chiklo jonthom dosi, langpe aduwar Siriya alongri kidamyok chihonjok ngo apot, Jihudi arleng hel anangyok lang un-eh yongot, lasi anang Mesidoniya agasi kachiruyok chipachipmo.

Beriya arongpe long Parnes po aso po Sopatar po, aro Thesalonika along Aristarsas po pen Sekundas poke Darbe arongpe long Gaiyas po aro Timothi po, Asia long Tisikas po aro Trophimas po, labang ahuwit Asia long yok anang pen duno.
Manta arleng hel ango dam dapsi, Troyas long hali phan inghongsi kido.
La-aphel Onga Ahim kamai adin dam tangsi, hali Philipi para jahaj pen damsi, ni-phongo aphel Troyas long analiyok chiloksi, lalong hali hat-arul dolo.
Ni-arni anithu hali him kangbeng kichoyok kachingrum apot, Pol po analiyok lamthe paklang phit-phatsi, aro la-aphel arnike kidam jongyok chihonjok ngo apot, ajo-jarlo yok anang lam than jongsi kido.
Aro hali kachingrum ahem athak apulu po long ako-ong me lursi kido.

Lalong inghapso adung iningsi kido Eutikhas pusi ihut riso arleng amek jang sit si kido; Pol po apor padingsi lam kithan jong amunsi, anang amek jangsitno aro anang thak-kithom athak para alingyok jangklungo; lalong anangyok akithisi rungsi wano.
Manta Pol po wang sundunsi, anangyok arbaksi pulo, “Nali surujo yek; piyok pu tene anang abang arlo ajiu do.”
Lapara Pol po athak apulu longyok damsi him ingbengo aro chosi, apor ding si, lake adap arni kiwang yok lam chithansi kido aphel, ladisi damo.
Aro anali labang risopo yok akihreng hlongsi, neng ingsamo.
Manta tilong pen pango dam dapsi, Pol poyok Asos rongpeyok jahaj pen lalong yok damo; piyok pu tene anang abithang akeng pen kidame anang kido apot, ladisi kipadam yok kithan.
Asos arongpe long anang hali pen chiphochaksi, hali anangyok tilong athak parlusi, Mitileni langlompe longyok damsi dolo.
Lalong para jahajpen damsi, aphel arni Khayos langlom pe adung hlengo aro inirsi aphel hali Samos langlompe pahlongsi aro la arni si Miletas rongpeyok wango.
Piyok pu tene Pol po Asia along apor padingdesi, Ephisiya arpatsi kidam yok chipachipmo; piyok pu tene un-putang tene, anang Pentikos-kamai arni Jerusalem kihlengyok parjango.
La-aphel Pol po Miletas para Ephisiya yok arleng tolsi, kachikruk phu-phang hel yok pataramsi wano.
Anali anang dungyok kiwang amun anang analiyok pulo, “Ne Asia alongri kiwang cheng arni para nali pen aporten dosi, chinom hopsi aro mek-kri pajangsi,
aro Jihudi arleng hel kilang setset apotsi nelong honjat wangta pot badi Hemphu murkiya asal tikilo,
aro pot badi nalingot, pene bak kiwang alam kaparju yok do, aro rat ango, aro adonten naliyok lamthe paklangpon yok seleple yongot.
Aro Arnamyok neng kachipharlep aro Hemphu Jisu Khristo yok kikrol alamthe Jihudi aro Grik hel ango hakhi pilo; la- ahuwit nali abithang thek.
Aro minon langot, ne Jiuli-Kangthiryok mengketsi Jerusalem yok dam hlong do; lalong neyok pot chiplangene, bangpo than un-eh.
Kithan un ahol ke, aduk-tap neyok inghong sido aro arongpe ten nelong Juli-Kangthir neyok lam kipathan hakhi pisi do.

Manta ne jiubong nengdok puke beksota alekhot en-ehlo, aro kipatiki asal kapatang ayok pango pon do, aro Hemphu Jisu para kihlong ne kapahar asal, Arnam kajinso kime-alamthe aphan hakhi kipiyok neng pido.
“Aro minon langot, ingho asitem ne Arnam-alongri alamthe paharsi artingo, lake nali lo, nali nemahang aro thek-phak hlonghle ye, labang ne chithan un do.
Lasi apotsi ne ahuwit awi para ingthir phlen, labang hakhi mini nalipi do;
piyok pu tene naliyok Arnam ahuwit aron alam kaparjuyok seleple yongot.

Nali abithang yok, aro Jiuli-Kangthir pen bherabik apal hel asitem naliyok kilang phuphang pangningo, labang ahuwit bherabik apal me-at chilangpon, jaiyok Arnam abithang awi pen kachikruk yok namsi eno, labang poyok al-enpon.
Ne katikang aphel nali sitem timit hel nali sitem lutsi, bherabik apal yok kajinsose aneng paklange.
Aro nali sitem parata angkhan arleng olesi, lahel aphel-phel adun helyok hungsi kiponyok kamprek alam than ne, bangpo ne than-un do.
Lasi nali mesone chinghongne do; aro ne ke nengkan-kithom ayok adap-anuwe nali abang ten aphan nemek-kri pajangsi ahari kipiyok seleple yongot, labang hel chipurkine do.
“Minon, Arnam naliyok krol-kimeng kapachan ponyok, aro kangthir phlen kachiplang ahuwit asitem bor-eh kihlong aden nali pi-une, anangyok aro anang kajinso alamtheyok naliyok nali pek det do.
Bang hel ser, lale rupa, lale pe-rik along ne ke alot ingjong.
Ne aro nelokjor kanange hel ne-ripensi nerapmo, labang nali bithang than undo.

Ahuwit alam ne naliyok arjan nali paklango; nali labadi ne sal tikisi, ki-un eh hel ayok rapdun nange; aro Hemphu Jisu alamthe neng chipurki nange; anang abithang kipu, te ‘Ki-en yok ke banta kipi bor-eh dochot.’”
Labadi alam thansi, anang tarhuksi ahuwit pen pingkit no;
La aphel ahuwit ta surujo lo; aro Pol po yok chirbaksi angphun otsi mungo,
ne mahang aro thek hlonghle ye, kipu alam anang kithan, la-anat watsi neng-doho si, anali anangyok jahajpo yok wang thon duno.
Hali anali para chikaksi, jahaj pen Kos lang-lompe yok damsi, aphel arni Rodas lang-lompe hlongo;
aro lalong para Patara yok damsi, labang athem Phoyenikiya yok kidam jahaj isi hlongsi, hali lalong arlusi damjongo.
La aphel Saipras langlompe theksi, bangpo para debera aga tikangsi, Siriya alongriyok damsi, Tayar arongpe long suno; piyok pu tene jahaj po bihini kapasunme kido.
Labang athem adun helyok angkhan kikrol arleng thek hlongsi, hali lalong hathi irul dolo; anali Jiuli-Kangthir para hlongsi Pol po Jerusalem dam nangne pusi thano.

Labang bekso adin dosi hali chikaksi kidamjong amun, anali so, arloso ahuwit ta rongpe para olesi langpe akungyok hali thon duno; aro langpepe akung hali tarhuksi pingkitsi, lalongsi ihut para ihut chirdomsi chipadisi, hali jahaj along arlulo;
manta lahel anali abithang hemyok chirulsi damo.
Hali jahaj pen Tayar para Polemas yok hlengsi, langpe aduwar kidam pajut no; aro lalong kortehel yok kardom pisi, anali pen inirsi dolo.
La-aphel arni hali lalong para damsi Sisiriya yok hlengsi; aro bang thorok isi asitem kime-alamthe kapahar arnam asal katiki Philip po, ahem lut damsi, anali pensi dodun no.
Aro anang turki alam kithanpon bang-phili pihan ki-en-eh so-arlo kido.
Hali bekso adin lalong kido amun, Judiya para Agabas amen ihut turki kiwang.

Anang hali dung wangsi, Polpo apongho ensi, anang keng-ari chibamsi pulo, “Jiuli-Kangthir labang alam pudo, ‘Ingho pongho ape, labang arleng poyok Jerusalem long Jihudi hel ladisi bamsi, Bang-ajat arideng champiye.’ ”
Hali lamehel alam arjusi hali pen lalong kido arleng hel Pol poyok Jerusalem kidamde yok chingdukngo.
La-apor Pol po pulo, “Nali suru-surusi ne ingthin panghodak si, nali pot ote do? Piyok pu tene Hemphu Jisu amen aphan, neyok Jerusalem long nekibam detke kalek, kithiyok ta trepsi do.”
Anang hali lam kimengme anat, hali doklipsi pulo, “Hemphu pot ahisa, labang pachok minang.”
La-aphel hali boi-bihini chihonjoksi Jerusalem yok damsi dolo.
Aro Sesariya para angkhan adun hali pen angkidun; aro Mason amen Saipras langlompe arleng anang aporong adun ahem hali don badi kido alam kido, anang yok wano.
Hali Jerusalem long wang kihleng amun, kikrol kortehel anang arongpen hali chingdeno.
La-aphel arni Pol po hali pen Jems po ahem lutno; aro kachikruk long akisarhel ahuwit lalong wang kido.
Lalong Pol po anali chirdomsi, Arnam anang sal katiki longpara Bang-ajat asitem potsi tikilo, labang alam kido kangwe alam isi para isi than detno.
Bang alam po arjusi, anali Arnam amen parklamo; aro anangyok pulo, “Ei korte Pol po, nang thek do, Jihudi hel asitem kikrol konbak hajar arleng do; aro lahel ahuwit kanongyok anang kipi abango.

Manta nang lam anali a-odi hlongo, nangke tang Bang-ajat asitem kido Jihudi helyok, Mosi po akanong patikang yok paklangsi thando tang, lake anali asohel yok sunnot ote nangnelo, aro Jihudi abi-pun ateng mengdun nangnelo.
Tene pot tiki nang? Nang wangdo pusi anali arjudo.
Lasi hali nangyok isi alam nang pubang, nang bangpone tiki; hali seme-kitang arleng bang-phili do;

analiyok ponsi, inansi abang chipangthir, aro tang si anali aphu-achu kangtep ayok nang nohok pidunot. La-amun nanglam a-udi parju une, labang parake kime chokche, manta nang bithang Mosi po kanong mengsi tikido pusi rat ahuwit ayok pathek nang.

Manta Bang-ajat hel asitem kikrol abang alamke, arnam kangton, cho-jun, lale awi, lale angphun kiber ape a-ok kicho, aro kidonerhel para abithang yok kachiterek alamhel ke hali chipachip krengsi analiyok lo wisi hlolo.”

Lasi Pol po bang arleng helyok ensi, aphel arni anali abang chipangthirsi, kachirdom ahem lutsi, nali abang-ten aphan, buli karklipi para kapangthir ki-or arniyok, kachipangthir abi-pun nikan-chok nange, parjulo aro abangten banta pajiro.
Manta Ni-thorok isi ki-orbo arni Asia alongri para kiwang Jihudihel anangyok Arnam ahem long theksi, ahuwit rat helyok ahul pawang dutsi, Pol po yok otsi pulo,

“Ei Israyel arleng hel, wangrap mot! Inghosi ili jatpo, kanong aro labang athempo panghosi ahuwit athem long ahuwit arlengyok paklang ponsi do, anangsi lalo. La aparta, anang Grik arleng helyok kachirdom ahem long wang-palutsi, labang kangthir athempo pasuwalo.”
Piyok pu tene anali angota Trophimas amen Ephisiya ihut po yok long thekngo aro Pol po anangyok Arnam ahem arloyok kiwan pusi, anali kachiron.
Laparake rongpe chingthur detsi, arleng hel wang ole pungsi; anali Pol po yok nepsi, kachirdom ahem para mokolyok wungsi pono; aro photsi owahel inghap klakngo.
Labadi si anali Pol po yok kamariyok kiron amunsi, Jerusalem dungsi ahul wangdo pusi, hajar sonturi aghaipo arjulo.
Lajongsi aphoro sonturi aghaipo angkhan kithe-kidingyok ensi rat adung parjang lep si wango. Lalong anali hajar sonturi aghaipo aro sonturi helyok theksi, Pol po yok kipam tikango.
La aphel hajar sonturi aghaipo Pol po adungyok wang si, anangyok nepsi, hirkuli jeng-ni pen anang yok kibamyok thano; laparake anang arjulo, “Labang arlengpo ke inghote, aro pot te katiki?”

La-amun arleng hel asitem kamprek arleng kamprek alamthe pensi chihangsol solo apot, kachihang-hlok anat, anang bangpo alam aron potsi kidolone chipachip thekthe si, Pol po yok sonturi ahem palut pon ayok thano.
Latang si don-karlu amun, arleng hel akang anat, sonturi helsi anangyok rung dangsi pon hlongo;
piyok pu tene arleng hel dun-pungsi hangsol solsi pulo, “Anangyok mari not”.
La-aphel Pol poyok sonturihel kido hem arlo long kipone amunsi, anang hajar sonturi aghaipo yok pulo, “Ne nangyok penebak pu un-eh ma?”
Sonturi aghaipo pulo, “Nang Grik alam thanthek ma? Ijip arlengpo bekso ango ahul kipawang asitem hajar-phili sonturi yok pachonsi ingnam ayok ki-en pon, nang labang arlengpo kalekma?”
Manta Pol po pulo, “Ne ke Silikiya alongri Tarsas arongpe long Jihudi arleng, ne akibek arongpe arleng kalek. Nang chingduk do arleng helyok lam kithanyok apor nepinot.”
Sonturi aghaipo apor kipisi, Pol po don polong athak arjapsi, arleng helyok ari pen kithane atewa pilo; la-apor anali kidoklip amun, Pol po Hibru alampen analiyok lam thano:
“Ei kortehel aro pa hel, minon ne nalingo, nebithang alam nalithan bang, bangpoyok onenot.”
La-amun anang Hibru alam pen lam kithan arjusi anali do klipmo, aro Pol po thanhisi damo:

“Ne Jihudi arleng, aro Silikiya alongri Tarsas arongpe long ne kiplang athem, manta ne labang arongpe long the-dingsi, Gamaliyel po adun kido amunsi ili sar-lar hel kanong hel chirlilo; aro mini nali holek kido badi, ne ta Arnam yok chipeksi kido.
Aro labang aduwar kidam arleng helyok arloso aro penso yokta bamsi ne analiyok akrol long thalsi kamariyok lahelyok aduk kipi.

Labang alam bangthepo pen ason amel abang ne hakhi do. Ne anali parasi Jihudi kortehel yok kiwi alo ensi, Damaskas long inghosi kido, analiyok ado kapapi yok, nepsi Jerusalem yok kiwan aphan, lalongyok damsi kido.”
“Manta ne damjongne kido amun Damaskas adung kihlengyok ke, nerlo sitem arni sokhrang apun photsi athak para katha-ang wang chikomwolsi neyok klano.
Lalong ne lungle athak kikrep dung amunsi, ‘O Sol, O Sol! Ne yok piyok aduk nepido?’ pusi neyok nekithan isi lamthe arju hlongo.
La amun ne angthan duno, ‘Hemphu, nang inghote?’ Anang neyok pulo, ‘Nang ingho yok honjat wangpido, hanesi la Najaret Jisu.’
Nelok kido abang ta katha-angpo thek hlongo; manta neyok nekithan asike wang-arju hlong yongta alamthepo abhu hlonghle yongot.
La aphel ne arjulo, ‘O Hemphu, ne pot inghol nang?’ La-amun Hemphu nethano, ‘Ingthurne, Damaskas yok lutdamot; aro nang katiki nange potsi pachipsi do, labang alam lalongsi nang than detne.’
La aturu po kikar-plam apot nemek kithekthe det, nelok hel ari otsi Damaskas yok damo.
“La-aphel labang arongpe long kido ahuwit Jihudi hel asitem anang kachitha-ang Ananiyas amen pusi kanong kimeng arleng ihut,
nedung wango aro nikung arjap si anang thano, ‘Ei korte Sol po, nang mek thekngot!’ La-aporsi ne amek thek phakngo aro anangyok thekngo.

La-amun anang nipulo, ‘Nang ke ili atono sal-lar hel Arnam nangyok anang neng kihang alamthe kithek yok aro dhorom kangthirpo yok pathek nang, aro anang angho lamthe arjuhlong, la-anat nangyok arwal tango;
piyok pu tene pipotsi thek hlongo, arju hlongo, ahuwit arleng angot anang phan labang kithanpon hakhi chiplang hlonge.
Aro minon piyok pabhem dolang? Thurnot, aro baptist chiplangsi, nang bithang pap hel cham pangthir not.’
“La-aphel ne Jerusalemyok wang phaksi, Arnam ahem long kapingkit jong amun, artihet hlongsi anangyok thekngo.
Anang neyok pulo, ‘Parjang ngot, aro Jerusalem tikangne dam sirak, piyok pu tene labang arleng hel nelamthe hakhi kipipo chidengde ye.’
La-amun ne pulo, ‘O Hemphu, ne nangyok kikrol abangyok Jihudi Arnam ahemten pam-thengsi akrol long kithal,
aro nang hakhi kipi Istiphenpo yok kamari amun, nebithang adung arjap si chikeng dunsi, anangyok kamari arleng hel ape-rik ensi lalong kido.’ Labang alam anali bithang than un.
La-apor Hemphu neyok pulo, ‘Damot; piyok pu tene akaholo kido Bang-ajat abang adung ne nang toldo.”
Labang adengyok anang lam onesi, anali hangsolsi pulo, “Labadi arlengyok pirthimipe para mari minang; piyok pu tene anangyok kihreng kido michangche.”
Anali hangsol solsi, anali pe hel wardetsi, angsong dhula kapangjar amun,

hajar sonturi Roman aghaipo Pol po yok sonturi ahem arlo kapapon yok thano; aro anang yok ado pisi Jihudi hel piyok ladi chihang-hlokdo, labangpo kithan-un aphan, anangyok sabuk pamsi karju tolyok thano.
Latang si anangyok sabuk kipamyok arik kibam amun, Pol po adung arjapsi kido aphoro sonturi aghai poyok pulo, “Ado kangwe Roman arlengyok sabuk kisapyok kanong long ajakong doma?”
Aphoro sonturi aghaipo labang alam arjusi, hajar isi sonturi aghaipo adungyok damsi pulo, “Nang pot katiki yok chirondo? Piyok pu tene labangpo Roman arleng.”
La-amun hajar sonturi aghaipo Pol poyok damsi arjulo, “Nang nethannot, nang Roman arleng ma?” Anang pulo, “Oik.”
Hajar sonturi aghaipo pulo, “Ne nohok ako-ong thok tangsi bangpo asal aphangpo hlongo.” Pol po pulo, “Ne ke kiplang pen-pan hlongo.”

La-amun inghosi Pol poyok bisar-kahonthe yok kido, anali la-aporsi anang para chikak detno; aro hajar sonturi aghaipo Pol poyok Roman arleng pusi than-unsi, anang bithang hirkuli kibam apot, chiphere phakngo.

La-aphel arni Jihudi hel Pol poyok potsi ado kipi, labang khanang alampo kithan-un aneng si hajar sonturi aghaipo anangyok phloksi, bangthe hel aro ason amel ahuwit kachingrum yok than parjulo; aro Pol poyok wang pasunsi anali ngo parjapmo.
Lalong Pol po ason mel abangyok lang etsi pulo, “Ei kortehel, ne ahuwit alam kime angthin pensi Arnam karwal aso badi minihok kengkam-chijorsi do.”
La-amunsi Ananiyas amen bangthepo, adung arjapne kido abangyok Pol po ayok angho kardepyok thano.

Latengsi Pol po anangyok pulo, “Ei akiphlan-et arpongpo, Arnam nangyoksi pasojok ayok honjok wendo; nang kanong ateng neyok bisar-kahonthe yok iningsi, labang kanong panghosi, neyok kipapam tolyok thando ma?”
Pol po adung arjapsi kido arlenghel pulo, “Nang Arnam bor-bangthe yoksi akangho pudo ma?”
Pol po pu phakngo, “Ei kortehel, anang bor-bangthe puke ne than un-ehsi kido; piyok pu tene lo-kangthir long wido, ‘Nang bithang ajat arleng kilang pon phu-phangyok kangho alam ingjeyek.’

Latangsi Pol po anali angkhan Saduki hel aro angkhan ke Pharisi pusi than-unsi, anang mel along hangsi pulo, “Ei kortehel, ne Pharisi aro Pharisi arleng aso; kithi para kiburphak kachiha alamsi neyok hut-bisar chiplangdo.”
Anang labang alam kithansi, Pharisi pen Sadukihel adak lam ahul wango, aro arleng hel bhak-ni chiplango.
Piyok pu tene Saduki hel ke kithi-kiburphak, Arnam tharlon aro ajiuli, lamehel ingjong pusi thanman; manta Pharisi helke la kithomta krolman.
La-apot chihang solo; aro Pharisi hel abak kido kanong kapaklang helke arjapsi lam chitongsi pulo, “Hali labang arlengyok ado hlonghle yong; manta ihut ajiuli lale tharlon anangyok lam thano,”

La-amun chiprong hlok-hlok ongsi, anali Pol poyok chorhletbo pusi ahajar sonturi aghaipo pheresi, sonturihel yok sunpungsi anali asitem para Pol poyok thidetsi sonturi ahem arloyok kapapon alam thano.
La-aphel labang anuwe Hemphu anang dung arjapsi pulo, “Phere yek; piyok pu tene nang Jerusalem long ne lamthe hakhi pilo, lasi nang Rom alongri longta ladisi hakhi pihlonge.”
Adap prango apot, Jihudi hel isi alam chirwal-chirsalsi, Pol poyok marire lengke ili cho-jun nangne pusi, seme-kitang alam chipachipmo.
Labadi kachirhep abang angkol hini yokta ongchot kido.
Latangsi anali bangthe helyok aro akisarhel adung damsi pulo, “Hali ke Pol poyok mari un-eh lengke cho-junje ye, seme-tangsi chingnakngo.

Lasi minon nali ason amel anang lam aro meso karju asolsi, Pol po nalidung kiwanyok Roman hajar sonturi aghaipo angot lo pidam; la-amun Pol po nali dung wang kihlenghle angosi, hali anangyok kamariyok trepsi do.”
La-amun Pol po aphilipo anali tonsi kidoye alamthe arjusi, sonturi ahem lut damsi Pol poyok thandamo.
Lasi Pol po aphoro sonturi aghai poyok taramsi pulo, “Labang riso poyok hajar sonturi aghaipo adung ponnot; piyok pu tene anang pene bak alam kaparju aneng do.”
Lasi anang riso poyok ensi, hajar sonturi aghaipo adung ponsi pulo, “Nang ngo labang risopo penebak alam kipuye do pusi akrol kido Pol po neyok taramsi nang dung anangyok kapawanyok chingdukngo.”
La-amun ahajar sonturi aghai po anang ari-otsi, ihi aga ponsi jolsi arjulo, “Neyok kithane nang pot alam do?”
Anang pulo, “Nang Pol po alam aro mesosi karjuyok kachiron badisi, anangyok minap ason amel long kapapon ayok, nang ngot ladi lo wisi hawang kachohang yok Jihudi hel chipachip do.

La-apot nang anali lam one yek; piyok pu tene lahel angkol hi-niyok ongchot arleng, Pol poyok marire leng ke an-lang cho-junje pusi, seme-tangsi chingnak si tonsi doye; aro minon trepsi do, nang hawang kitho poyok inghongsi do.”
Latangsi ahajar sonturi aghaipo labang risoyok labang chithan chipadisi pulo, “Nang lamehel alam nengo pachitha-ango, bangpo kaiyok ta thane not.”

Lapara anang aphoro sonturi aghai bang hi-niyok adungyok taramsi labang alam thano, “Anuwe baji sirkep apun Sesariya kidamyok phoro hi-ni sonturi, angkol kithomne kep nosel sonturi, aro phoro hi-ni tokan ki-en sonturi honjok;
aro Pol poyok Pheliks gobornor po adung ayok mesone kapahleng aphan anangyok kapatot nosel honjok pinot.”
Lalong sonturi aghaipo ladisi lo wisi pilo,
“Loseng kangsam gobornor aghai Pheliks po yok Klaudiyas Lisiyas po para kardom pajirdo.
Jihudi hel labang arlengpo yok nepsi kamaribo apot, ne sonturi helpen damsi, anang Roman arleng pusi ne than unsi, anangyok ralo.
La-aphel pipot anatsi anali labang yok ado koldo, ne kithan un anengsi, anali ason amel ango anangyok pono.
Ne thekngo, anang kithi nange, lale akrol long kibi nange isi ado tikike yong, anali bithang kanong hel alam kachibisar penebak alam ado ki-ot badisi pahlong do.

La-parake anangyok ado pisi kamariye kachirhep alam ango chiklano apot, ladi kichokpon theksi, ne songkhansi anangyok nang dungyok tolo, aro anangyok ka-ojor arleng helyok ta nang ngot Pol po yok kilangle ojor kipiyok thano. Kiwi pajutno.”
Lasi sonturi hel kithan ateng anuwe Pol poyok ensi, Antipatris arongpe yok pono.
Manta aphel arni nosel sonturi hel anangyok tolsi, angkhanke anali kido athemyok chirulo.
Anali Sisiriya yok pahlongsi, gobornorpo ayok lopo pisi, anangngot Pol poyok champilo.
La amun gobornor po lopo chiporhesi ‘Nang daklong alongri arleng?’ Kipu aphel anang Silikiya arleng pusi than unsi, anang pulo,
“Nang ka-ojor arlengpo wang hleng tangsi ne nang lam oneye.” Aro anangyok Pol poyok Herod po kido ahem long kibiyok thano.
Ni-phongo aphel Ananiyas bor-bangthepo angkhan akisarhel pen Tertulas amen ihut ukil pen Sisiriya yok damsi, gobornor Pheliks po angot Pol po yok ado alam ojoro.
Lalong Pol poyok pataramsi, Tartulas po anang ojorsi pulo, “O loseng kangsam aghai Pheliks, nang kido parasi hali nengsamdo hlongdo; aro nang aphel-ango langsi katiki pon parasi,
ahuwit along ahuwit athem labang ajat aphan kachokem asal tikido, bangpo anat hali kido-kangwe chingduksi chidengdo,
manta nangpen aporpo aro la-an padamdesi, lasi nang chingdukdo, aro nang jinsone hali lam bekso onenot.
Piyok pu tene hali thek hlongo, labang arlengpo awur khanangpen, aro ahuwit pirthepe dung kido Jihudi hel asitem karwulsalpo, aro anang Najareth arleng hel duwar ki-etpon arleng;
la-aparta, anang Arnam ahem kapasuwa yok chiron si kido; la-amunsi hali anangyok nepmo.
Manta sonturi aghaipo Lusiyas po wangsi apharan pensi hali-ri para anangyok khardetsi pono.
Nang labang arleng bisar-ote tene, hali anang yok potsi ka-ojor alam pomar, labang ahuwit alamthe than det une.”
Lalong Jihudi helta chilokdun rensi pulo, “Lamehel alam pomar khanang,” pusi pulo.
Laparake gobornor po Pol po ayok lam kapathanyok atewa kipisi, anang labang pulo, “Nang jokha anengkan para labang ajat bisarpo chiplangsi dolo, labang than unsi neneng arongsi ne lam thando.
Piyok pu tene nang bithang than-une, te kachirdom ayok Jerusalem kidam mini para ni-kere hi-ni det dolang;
la aparta, anali kangthir athem, lale Arnam ahem longta, lale rongpelong ne inghone bak pensi lamthe kachirwal, lale rat kapangrum nethekngo, labangta kalek;
aro minon potsi ado ni-ojordo, labangpo aporman nang ngot pi un-eh ye.

Manta nang ngot ne hoi chodo, te kanong long ahuwit alam, aro turkihel alo-long potsi kiwido, labang ahuwit krolsi, pot aduwar yok analike suwa puman, labang aduwar badisi ne sar-lar hel Arnam yok chirdom man;
aro dhorom kangthir aro suwa la hi-ni arleng kithi para burphaknge pusi anali chihadingsi inghong do, Arnam pen neta labangsi chihado;
Lasi Arnam pen munusi angot mesosi kangthir kachiron kachiral yok ne ta arniten tiki sido.
Aro bekso anangkan parkansi nebithang ajat aphan nohok kirap banta kiwan piyok aro nibot kipi ayok Jerusalem kiwang.

Labadi katikijong amun, arleng hel neyok Arnam ahem long chipangthirsi kido nethekngo; ne pen arleng hel ta ingjongo, aro ahul ta wangwe yongo; manta angkhan Asia para kiwang Jihudi helsi ahul pawango.
Ne long kilang un-eh ka-ojor alam anali kido, pu tene anali bithang nang-ngot wang than uno hoi.
Lale ne ason amel angot karjapdam amun, kithi hel kibur phak alamthe mini nali ngotsi bisar chiplango, labang ithe alam ne anali asitem arjapsi hangchersi kithan hlong,
la aparke, aro pot ado pahlongo, bangpo anali abithang pathan nang.
Pheliks po labang aduwar alam me-atsi kithek apot, bisar pasangsi analiyok pulo, “Lesiyas hajar sonturi aghaipo wang tangsi, nali lampo than phlen une.’
La-aphel anang aphoro sonturi aghaipo ayok thano, nang anangyok pahon dingne binot; manta anang neng pangsamne padopon; aro anang al ki-en ayok, anang adon-arat arleng ihutyok tengek.
Bekso adin aphel Pheliks po, Drusilape kipuman Jihudi apisope pen wangsi, Pol po yok taram ponsi, anang para Jisu Khristo yok kikrol, lamehel alam anang para onelo.

Pol po damsi dhorom kangthir, abang kachingdom, aro monphel bisar ka-ote alam harlek-harlusi kipaklang amun, Pheliks po pheresi pulo, “Minon jongke dammot; ne sal-jolo tene, aphel nangyok taramsi pawan phaknge.”
Aro isi anengke Pol po nohok piye pusi chihasi, anang yok taram jong jongsi lam chirwal jongo.
Manta, nengkan hini aphel Porsiyas Phestas po si Pheliks po aholan gobornor cholo; la-amun Pheliks po Jihudi helyok neng pangsam ayok anangsi, Pol po ayok anang akrol long tikangsi damo.
Phestas po labang alongri wangsi, ni-thom aphel Sisiriya para Jerusalem yok damo.
Lalong si bangthe hel pen Jihudi kithe-kiding abang anang ngo Pol poyok kilang un-eh ado hel parjulo;
aro duwar along tonsi Pol poyok kamari asolsi, Phestas po arleng tolsi Pol po yok Jerusalem pawanbo, ladi chironsi anangyok adopisi kajinso kipahlong yok chingduk damo.
Manta Phistas po angpu duno, “Pol po yok Sisiriya longsi bido, aro bekso aphel ne bithangsi lalong dam dapme.
Labang arlengpo penebak adodo, tene nali long kithe-kiding hel ne pen dunsi, anangyok ojor pinot.”
La-aphel anali long hinarkep adinyok ongchot dodesi, anang Sisiriyayok damsi, aphel arni bisar anghol iningsi Pol poyok kipawan ayok thano.
Polpo ang kihleng amun, Jerusalem para kiwang Jihudi hel anangyok chikomwelsi arjapsi, anangyok kilang un-eh ado wan japmo, manta anali isita aporman paklang un-eh yongot.
La amun Pol po anang bithangyok chiralsi pulo, “Jihudihel kanong, lale Arnam ahem, lale Roman Sijar poyok kapangho ne isi ado tikike yong.”
Manta Phestas po Jihudi hel yok aneng kime kapahlong yok ahisasi, Pol po angpulo, “Nang Jerusalem ayok dam si, lalong nengo lamehel alam, nang bisar kachiplang yok aneng do ma?”
Manta Pol po pulo, “Ne Sijar po bisar ahem angotsi arjapsi do; holeksi bisar donange. Ne Jihudi hel yok akangho tikike yong, pusi nang bithang thek krengdo.

Tene ne kangho katiki arleng pu tene, aro kithi nange penebak asal tikihlongo tene, ne kithi chipajokje. Manta nali neyok pot si ado nepido, labang hel khanang kalek, tene kajinso aphuthak anali rideng neyok kichampi det ayok kaita apharan ingjong. Ne Sijar poyok chi-ojorsi do.”
La-amun Phestas po anang montri helpen chirwalsi Pol poyok pulo, “Nang Sijar po yok ojor pilo; Sijar po ango ayok damot.”
Bekso adin kidam aphel Agripa recho aro Bernis pe yok Sesariya long yok wangsi, Phestas po yok kardom pajiro.
Anali lalong bekso adin kido aphel, Phestas po rechopo angot Pol po ado alam thansi parjulo, “Pheliks po bi si kidam ihut arleng akrol along holek do.
Ne Jerusalem long kido amun, Jihudi bangthehel pen akisar hel anang lam thansi, anangyok adopisi kamari yok kachingduk.

Lasi ne analiyok thano, ka-ojor aro ado kido arlengpo pen amahang semsemne pachipochak hlonghle lengke, aro abithang adohel pachithan hlonghle lengke, ihut arleng yok kajinso aphuthak kichampi Roman abi-apun along ingjong;
lasi anali wangsi, holeksi chingrumsi, apor panghonhesi, aphel arni ne bisar ahem long ining dunsi, arlengpo yok kapawan yok thano.
La-apor ojor kipi abang anangyok komplengsi arjap solsi, potsi ado anali piye pusi kachiron, labadi akangho ado badike lampo wan un-eh yongo.
Manta anali abithang dhorom alam aro Pol po inghoyok hreng jongsi do kipu, labang Jisu amen ihut kithi arlengpo alamsi anali chithan dutsi kido.
Labadi kachithan dut alam, chiphere phaksi ne arjulo, nang Jerusalem damsi, lamehel alam nang bisar kachiplang yok anengdo ma?
Manta Pol po Sijar po along chi-ojoro; lasi anang Sijar po adung tolte leng ke, anang yok kibiyok thano.”
La-amun Agripa po Phestas poyok pulo, “Ne bithang labang arlengpo alam karjuye aneng do.” Manta Phestas po pu phakngo, “Minapsi anang lam arju hlonge.”
La-aphel arni Agripa po aro Bernis pe ajakong pen wangsi, hajar sonturi aghai poyok aro rongpe kapaklang arleng hel recho ahem wango, Phestas po thansi Pol poyok pawano.

Lajong si Phestas po pulo, “O Agripa recho po, pen O hali pen wang kido arleng hel: Jerusalem long aro holek Jihudi arat labang arleng alam ne ngo chingduksi hangsolsi kithan, te anangyok akihreng ke binangne lo; labang arleng poyok nali theksi do.
Manta ne than uno, anang kithi nange isi tikike yong; aro anang bithangsi Sijarpo yok ojor pilo apot, ne kitolyok chipachip mo;
manta ne Sijar po yok anang lam kiwi ayok khanang alamthe pahlonghle yongot. Lasi bisar kido aphel, ne kiwiyok penebak aron hlong tene, lasi nali ngo aro recho Agripa po, ango yok anangyok wano.
Piyok pu tene akrol arleng kitol amun, anang ayok ojor kipi ado pangthek the ke, ne akime thek the yong.
La-aphel Agripa po Pol poyok pulo, “Nang bithang aphan lam nangyok kapathan ayok apor pido.” La-amun Pol po anang ari-jongsi abithang alam angthan duno.
“O Agripa recho, Jihudi hel neyok potsi ado ne koldo, la ahuwit alam nang ngot ne mini nebithang aphan than hlongsi, ne korom-kime do pusi ne chirondo.
Thanbang pu tene Jihudi hel adak potsi abi-pun aro kachingbarbe alamdo, labang ahuwit nangthan unsi do; lasi nang chingduk do, nang chihine ne lam onenot.

“Ne kengkam-kachijor, riso apun para abithang ajat asitem aro Jerusalem long kido ahuwit Jihudi hel kicheng cheng para thek kreng. Ne longri pen Jerusalem long kido, bangpo ahuwit Jihudi arleng thekdet.

Anali kicheng adak para neyok kachini apot, hali adhorom along akisumchot abi-pun alam, labang abi-pun badi ne ke Pharisi chiplangsi cho-arjaksi kido, labang hakhi kipi nange ahisa dotene hakhi pi-un.
Arnam nali sar-lar hel ango posi kapang-ak kido, labang kachiha anat ne minon bisar hlongsi, arjapsi do.
Labang kapang-ak athe kapahlong yok, hali kere-hini ajat anuwe-anerlo nengrungsi chirdomsi, chihasido; labang kachiha alamthe, O recho, Jihudi abang neyok ado koldo.
Arnam kithi helyok pangthuro, bangpo nali kachiron kachibem amun piyok krol un-eh pho pusi chirondo?
“Ne ta labadi Najaret Jisu amen lang setsetsi kangho asal katiki ayok ne bithang kachiron;
aro ladisi ne Jerusalem long katiki; lake bor-bangthe salchak hel para apharan hlongsi, ako-ong kangthir arleng hel yok akrol long kibeng; aro analiyok kamari apor, ne ta kachikeng dun.
Ahuwit Arnam ahem long, analiyok aduk pijongsi, anali kikrolpo dhorom kapatharak hlong ayok, ladi anali phuthak akang kidosi; kamprek alongri arongpe helyok ta aduk kipidam.
“Labang aron anatsi bor-bangthehel jakong aro thansi kiwi alo pahlongsi, Damaskas yok kidamjong amun si.
O recho, anelo apor, duwar asitem arni aturyok katha-ang chot isi katha-ang athak para nepen kidam abangyok chikomwelsi kachiklang thek hlongo.
Aro hali lungle athak kijang amun, ‘O Sol, O Sol, neyok piyok aduk nepido? Chorme kangchim long kitur nang un-eh ye, pusi Hibru alampen neyok kipu alam asi arju hlongo.’
Ne arju dunsi pulo, ‘O Hemphu, nang inghote?’ La-amun Hemphu pulo, ‘Inghoyok nang aduk pido, ne labang Jisu.

Manta thurnot, nang keng chipangtangne arjap mot; piyok pu tene nang kachiklang amun neyok thek hlongo, aro aphel yok ta labang arleng hel aro Bang-ajat hel arideng para nangyok pajoksi, jibadi chiklangsi ne nangyok klange, labang ahuwit alam aharapo, aro hakhi kipiyok, nangyok karwal aphan ne nang chiklango.
Aro anali neyok kikrol parasi pap-kolman, aro kangthir phlen kachiplang asitem aman dopon,
labang chironsi anali mek kapachar yok, analiyok kangting para kapatha-angyok, aro si-ik arlo para Arnam ayok kachipharlep aphan, anali sitem ne nangyok toldo.’
“Tene O Agripa recho po, ne la athak kachiklang alam mengme ke dodesi,

ango ke Damaskas aro Jerusalem long kido abang ango, tangsi Judiya alongri dungsi aro Bang-ajat arleng ango ta, anali neng Arnam yok chipharlepsi, aneng chipharlepsi, kamichang asal tiki pono, lasi paharo.
La-anatsi Jihudi hel Arnam ahem long neyok nepsi kamari yok rono.
La-amun Arnam angkirung dun hlongsi, minihok krolsi do;

aro Khristo aduk kicho aden hlong ta hlonghle ta, kithi asitem ango kibursi, abithang ajat Jihudi hel pen Bang-ajat hel yokta katha-ang pachiklan hlonge, lale hlonghle ye, labang alam ne akithe-akibek ahuwit ango hakhi pisi, turki hel aro Mosi po potsi kachiplange alam kipu, labang aparke prek alam thanthe yong.”
Pol po, ladi anang abithang kachiral alam angkipu amun, Phestas po hang chersi anangyok pulo, “Ei Pol po, nang ingcham chiplango; kithek ongsi ingcham nang ote do.”
Manta Pol po pu phakngo, “O Phestas kithepo, ne ingcham kalek; manta khanang aro agiyan alamthe si thando.

Piyok pu tene rechopo ta labang alamhel thek kreng; lasi ne anang ngot aha pensi thando; piyok pu tene ne khanangsi than-undo, labang alamthe anang ngot isita butite yong; piyok pu tene labang chi-arsit ke chiplangple yong.
O Agripa recho, nang turki hel alam krolman ma? Ne than-undo, nang ke krolman.
La-amun Agripa po Pol po yok pulo, nang neyok khristan kachiplang ayok, labangso kithan pensi ka-ote yok neneng rungdo ma?”

Manta Pol po pulo, “Ne detke kalek, inghosi nelamthe arju hlongdo, lahel ahuwit bekso alampen yongta, lale ako-ong alam yongta, labang hirkuli kibam apar ke, ahuwit anang ne badi kachiplang yok pachiron tol, Arnam ango labangsi pingkit sido.”
Latangsi recho, gobornorpo, Bernis pe aro lalong kangning ahuwit ingthursi,
chiterek dam si, anali ihut para ihut chipulo, “Labang arlengpo kithi nange lale akrol kibi nange isi asal tikike yong.”
Aro Agripa po Phestas po yok pulo, “Anang Sijar po yok kachi-ojorje tene, anang ayok pajok uno hoi.”
La-aphel hali Itali alongriyok jahaj pen kidam pen alam chipachip tangsi, anali recho Akithe sonturi long Juliyas amen aphoro sonturi aghaipo arideng Pol po pen angkhan akrol kido abangyok champilo.
Lalong Asia alongri akung-kungsi kidamyok kahonjok si, Adramitiyam long jahaj hali arlusi, langpe aduwar damsi dolo. Hali pen Thesalonika para kiwang Mesidoniya arleng Aristarkhas po ta kido.
La-aphel arni Sidon arongpe long jahaj hlengo, Juliyas po Pol po yok injinsosi anang alok hel adung damsi neng chipangsam yok hawang pilo.
Lalong para hali langpe aduwar damjongsi, tomon kithe kijapsi, hali, Saipras lang-lompe akungsi damo.
La-aphel Silikiya aro Pamphiliya amahangsi arpatsi, Lidiya alongri, Mira arongpe hlongo.
Lalong aphoro sonturi aghaipo, Itali alongri kidam Alekjendriya rongpeyok kidam jahaj ihong hlongsi, haliyok labang jahaj long parlulo.
Ladi arni kiding dam helsi, aro duk-lak pen Kinidas arongso adungsi, tomon hali tengsi, Kret lang-lompe akung kung, Salmoni chirpatsi,
duk lak pen langlompe akung kung damsi, Kijok Arlok amen isi athem hlongo; labang adungsi Leseya rongso adung kido.
Ladisi kihleng abhemsi, aro An Kihum-kamai arni kidam tang apot langpe-athak kaphere meme chiplang si, Pol po analiyok chirwalsi pulo,
“Ei arlenghel, ne thek hlongdo, labang langpe-athak kidam akisum do aro chipanghon nangbo; lasi dorop aro jahajpo, ladet kalek; manta ili jiuta chipanghon nangbo.
Lasi, aphoro sonturi aghaipo Pol po kipuyok ke, paton pen jahaj ahemphu poyoksi mengdun chotno.

Aro labang arlok polong kichum ongsi langpe akung do-un-eh theksi, ni-ting ni-chel aro ni-tu ni-chel aga aphutangsi kido Kret along Phoyenis arlok arpat uno pu tene, lalongsi kichum adak kido anengwesi, aki-ongchot jahaj ponsi lalongyok kidam chikengo.
Konam ni-tu aga tomon wang jir-jiro, anali kachiron atengsi chokbo pusi chironsi, jahaj ponsi Krete akungyok ponsi dolo.
Manta bekso kidamjong aphel, lalong ‘urakulu’ amen, lake ni-tu ni-hang para kijap atomon kithe wangjap mo;
aro jahajpo yok tomon kiteng anat, tomon amahang pango un-ehsi, jahaj poyok tikang hrol hlongo, la-amun haliyok tomonsi pono.
Lasi Kauda amen aso langlom akung kung damsi, chipaduk manta aso tilong isi ot-duno.
Aro bangpo angsong bat dungsi, potdi si jahajpo alingsi bamket si bilo; manta Syrti along sangtel athak chingthang mene pusi chipheresi kihing ape aplangpo pasuno apot, anglangsi damo.
Aro tomon akithe japsi, jahajpo pling-plangdetno apot, aphel arni ke angkhan bihini-athul hel jahaj athak para war detno,
aro nithom arnike anali abithangsi jahaj abihini hel war krengo.
Jokha adin yok hali arni lale chiklolangso thek hlonghle yongot, aro or-eh len tomon abau angkijap lensi, hali jiu chipajok yokta chiha un-eh pholo.
Bekso adinyok arleng hel an wepho kido apot, Pol po anali sitem arjapsi pulo, “Ei arleng hel, nali labang akisum kachitong aro ili kanghonhe yok, nelam onesi, Krete para jahaj wan nangnelo hoi.
Manta minon ne budi-sere kithaneke lalo, “Aneng aha chipado; piyok pu tene nali sitem ihut arleng inghoheye, jahaj po detsi inghoye.
Piyok pu tene ne Arnam arleng, aro inghoyok chirdoman,

aro anang tharlonpo kidam anuwe nedung wang arjap dingsi pulo, “O Pol po, phere yek; Sijar po ango nang arjap dam nange; aro langot, nang pen jahaj long kidam abang ahuwit yokta Arnam nang aridengsi pilo.’
Lasi, ei arleng hel, nang aha chipado; piyok pu tene neyok potsi nekithan, ladi si chiplang pene, Arnam yok ne ladi krolsi do.
Manta dakne bak isi lang-lompe long ili jangdam hlonge.”
La-aphel Adriya langpe long haliyok li-li aga pon-worsi, nuwe kere-phili arni ajo-jarlo apun, dakne bak bam akung wang hlengo pusi jahaj pen kidam atoru abang chirono.
Lasi anali lang akarnuk punsi, angkol-hini angruk karnuk hlongo,
aro bekso damsi, lang kipun phakyok ke, ingruk kere-phongo karnuk hlongo, aro arlong along tongbo pusi pheresi, jahajpo aphel agak phili awek tisi, aro katha-ang aphan pingkitsi dolo.
Manta jahajlong paton abang ango aga awek kipi asolsi, langpe long tilong pasunsi chipajokyok kikat awak chilango;
manta Pol po aphoro sonturi salchakpo yok aro sonturi helyok pulo, “Lahel jahaj long dode tene, nali bithang chipajok un-eh ye.”
La-amun sonturihel tilong arikpo rotsi, bangpo langlong pajango.
La-aphel adap katha-angbo amun, Pol po anali ahuwit yok bekso an-cho jun tolyok chingduksi pulo, “Mini ni-kere-phili yok nali chinghong si,
nali chohlonghle si, an-lang wesi do, lasi nali chingduk do, nali bekso ancho not; piyok pu tene labangsi nali ajakong piye; piyok pu tene nali ihut ta nali phu achu-ikok ta chingbobe ye.”
Labangpo pusi, anang himpo ensi, ahuwit ango Arnamyok chirdomsi, him-ingbengsi cholo.
Laparake anali ahuwit ta ahado dutsi anali bithangsi an cholo.
Jahaj long hali kidokangwe phoro hini-ne bang kep thorok-isine bang thorok arleng kido.
Ahuwit an chosi neng ingsamsi, anali gom asok hel langpe long tisi jahajpo parjang tango.

Konam tha-ango, anali labang athempo chinine yongot; manta langpe apar anali adop-plang athem ilong thekngo, anali un pu tene jahajpo lalong pango ponsi biye pusi chironsi, awek hel rot detsi langpelong tikango;
aro la amunsi anali arik hel phloksi, tomon along aplang pomar tarsi labang adop-plang athem longyok pango pono.
Manta hini alangpe kachitok athem hlengsi, jahajpo sangtel along chingthango; la-amun ango amahangpo thirkuk si phodamo, aro aphel aga lang-adul anat jahajpo chingho ropmo.
La-amun akrol arleng inghone bak ke langpe ingjongsi kaknge pusi chironsi, sonturi hel analiyok kamari yok chirwalo.
Manta aphoro sonturi aghai poke Pol po yok pajokyok chironsi, labang kamari kachiron po para analiyok tengklaksi, ladi thano, “Inghosi lang ingjong thek, lahel ango chonsi bam alongyok damot;”
aro kiri-er hel ke tokta, lale jahaj long ingho potsi pahlong, labang penne damot. Labadi si ahuwit ta bamyok damsi jokngo.
Hali kijok tang aphel, labang lang-lompe amen Malta pusi than uno.
Aro lalong kido borbor ajat arleng hel haliyok jinso paklang-ngo, lake la amun arwe aro kichum anat me pakar pisi, hali ahuwityok chidengo.
La amun Pol po theng ipeng pangrumsi melong thek ngo, me akiso hlongsi ijon abi-aphurul wang olesi anang arilong ingthok dongsi chimere detno.

Sotong-hlar ajat arlengpo, Pol po ari long phurulpo chiwek lingsi kido theksi anali chipulo, “Labang arlengpo, khanangsi arleng kamari arleng; anang langpe para jok yongta, kime-kangho angban kipipo, anangyok pahrenghre yongot.”
Manta Pol po ari-hujuk si phurul yok melong phrem putno, ananglong abi hlonghle yongot.
Manta anang abang arponge, lale photsi kolothetsi thiye pusi anali langphrong si dolo; manta jokha apun inghong langsi, aphel yokta kanghohe theksi, lahel wang chingduk phaksi pulo, “Anangke Arnam!”
Labang athempo adung Pabliyas amen labang langlompe rongthepo alungle kido. Anang haliyok chingdeno, aro nengdok aneng pen ni-thomyok don badi hali padolo.
La-amun Pabliyas po anang apo po ase aro apok kidam wor-wor kachiplang apot isit si kido apot, Pol po anang hem apulu yok lut damsi pingkit damo, anang abang long ari batsi, anangyok ase pahamo.
Ladi kachiplang aphel, labang lang-lompe long kido ahuwit kiso arleng kido, labang ahuwit wangsi kiso melo.
Lalong anali haliyok banta ako-ong pisi al-eno; aro hali kachikak apor, kanange prek abihini wang pidun si jahaj long wang thal duno.
Chiklo jon-thom aphel, Alekjendriya arongpe ‘diyoskori’ amen, lake “jonja akorte” asin kido ihong jahajpo, labang lang-lompe long kichum apor kido, labang jahajpo long hali arlusi damjongo;
aro Sirakas rongpe long hlengsi, lalong ni-thom dolo.
Lalong para hali jahaj pen chirtingwit aduwar wangsi Rejiyam rongpe yok wang hlengo; inirsi aphel ni-tu agak para tomon kijap apot, ni-ni aphel ke Pateyuli rongso yok wanghlengo.
Lalong hali angkhan kikrol abang pochaksi, anali haliyok lalong hathi irul kido yok chingdukngo; ladisi hali Rom ayok damsi dolo;
Lalong kido kikrol korte hel hali lam arju hlongsi aro Apiyus hathi longyok wango aro Kithom Don ahemyok hali kapochak yok kiwang; Pol po analiyok theksi Arnam yok kardom pisi neng aha chipado dutno.
La-aphel hali Rom arongpe long lutdamsi, Pol po yok kihonpon sonturihel pen kampreksi kido yok hawang pilo.

Ni-thom aphel, anang Jihudi phu-phang helyok taramsi pangrumo; aro anali chingrumo apot, anang pulo, “Ei kortehel, ne ili ajatpo lale sar-lar abi-pun kapangho asal tikike yong; yongta Jerusalem long nenepsi, Roman arlenghel arideng akrol along ne kichampi.
Anali neyok bisar-otesi, nelong kamari ado pangthek un-eh si, kiphlok aneng kido;
manta konam Jihudi hel wangteng dun klakngo, Sijar poyok kachi-ojor alam chiplango; layongta nejat po yok isi ado kipi ayok, puke kalek.
Lasi naliyok kilang aro la kachithan ayok nali taramo, piyok pu tene Israyel yok kachiha anatsi ne labang hirkuli pen chibam hlongdo.”
La-amun anali anang yok pulo, “Hali nanglam Judiya long para ipak lo ta hlonghle yong; aro korte hel asitem kaita holek wangsi, nang lam isi kangho a-odi parjuje yong, lale wang pupe yong.
Manta nang kapaklang alamthe ke pot te, labang hali nang para ka-one akime pusi thekdo; piyok pu tene labang kapaklang alampo, hali than-undo, bangpo jotmehelta akangho pusi pudo.’

Laparake lahel anangyok inirsi adin pachip si, ako-ong arleng anangyok kapochakyok anang kangning ahem long wango; lalong anang adap para anithuyok Mosipo kanong aro turki hel alo para pur-ponsi, Arnam longri hakhi pisi, Jisu alam analiyok nengrungo.
Anang lamhel angkhan ke krolo, manta angkhan ke krolkre yongo.
Lasi anali hijan lam kachikengke apot, anali kachipadi apor en pono; kachikak ango, Pol po labang alam pulo, “Jiuli-Kangthir ke Jisoya turki arideng ili sar-lar hel yok me-atsi pulo,
‘Labang arleng hel adungyok damne than, anali oneke oneye, manta abhu hlonghle ye; thek ke theknge, manta neng wak phlenphle ye;

piyok pu tene labang arleng hel mekpen chithekthe ye, ano kardip, ingthin penta abhu hlonghleye, aro chipharlep ke wangweye, aro ne anali kiso pame hlonghle ye, la-anat anali angthin ardipkul, aro karju yok ta ano ingthong klak; aro anali abithang mek hel chisoloksi do.’
La-apot nali chithan une, Arnam labang kapajok alam Bang-ajat hel asitemyok padam tolsi do; aro anali bangpo oneye.”
Pol po labang alampo kipu aphel, Jihudi hel anali ihut para ihut adaksi ajat-jat ahul chipawang dutsi chikak detno.
La-aphel anang nengkan hi-niyok, abithang nohok kipi ahem dosi, konbak arleng anang dungyok man, lahel ahuwityok chingdensi,
angkipu wedet si, neng chipangtang dutsi Arnam-alongri alam paharsi, Hemphu Jisu Khristo alam paklangsi kido.
Pol po Jisu Khristo murkiya, adun aphan kataram, kime-alamthe kapahar yok paprek tango.
Labang aporong adaksi turkihel para lo-kangthir long anang phan seme tango.
Lake kime-alamthe along Arnam Aso alamthe ateng anang a-ok badike Dabhit po agijing para wang plango;
aro Jiuli-Kangthir apharan pensi, kithi para kibur apot, ili Hemphu ke Jisu Khristo pusi pangthekngo;
anang parasi, ili anang amen anatsi ahuwit asonhel asitem kimeng arlo kachiwan ayok kajinso aro adun aphang pahlongo;
labang ajat hel asitem nali ta Jisu Khristo kataram abang; Arnam nengdoksi konbak kataram kangthir arleng Rom along do, lahel ahuwit alongyok wido.
Ili Apa Arnam aro Hemphu Jisu Khristo para naliyok kajinso aro nengsam pachoknang.
Angoke, ahuwit pirthepe adak nali kikrol apotsi, ne nali ahuwit aphan Jisu Khristo amen pensi Arnam yok kardom pajirdo.
Piyok pu tene, Arnam ne hakhi do pusi ahuwit ne ingthin pen anang Aso kime-alamthe kapahar asal tikido, ne jutje lensi kapingkit amun nali men hel kar-ih chinengri do.
lasi aporten pingkit do, Arnam ahisa tene minon ne nali dungyok kiwange anengdo.
Piyok pu tene ne nali ajiuli abor-eh ajakong pen kapado aphan ne nali kaphochak yok aneng do.
La-anat, nali pen ne adak ihut para ihutyok kikrol kachiha pi unyok pusi aneng wang long do.
O korte hel, ne nalidung kidam aneng do, (manta labadi katiki chiteng klaksi do), tangsi ne nali aro Bang-ajat asitem kidam badi damsi sok rot une, labang nali than un-eh detke kapado aneng ingjong.
Piyok pu tene Grik aro kithekthe ajat, agiyan kido aro kamango, la ahuwit abangyok ne kapahar tang nange do.
Lasi Rom long kido abang aro nali ngota ne ki-un ateng kime-alamthe kapaharyok anengdet do.
Piyok pu tene kime-alamthe pen ne tharakre; abangten kichengke Jihudi, la-aphel Grik hel yok, kikrol abangten ayok kakijok aphan Arnam ajakong do.
Piyok pu tene Arnam dhorom kangthir kikrol para kikrolyok chiklang do; labang alam ladisi wido, “Dhorom kangthir po kikrol parasi hrenge.”
Piyok pu tene ahuwit pap tikisi, labang arleng hel khanang poyok tengman, labang arleng kikrol pangho detno aro pap katiki ado aphuthak si, Arnam akangpo ethakpe para chiklango.
Piyok pu tene Arnam ke anliyok paklang tango, lasi Arnam yok pot badi chinibo bangpo pachiklan detno.
Pirthepe kasanse arni para, anang athok-agor pachini un-ehsi dolo, anang ki-or-eh ajakong aro agun, bihini hel along paklang dakngo, lasi anali jokje ye.

Piyok pu tene anali Arnam yok thek yongta, Arnam badi jortangpo yok kardom pajir thekthe yongo; manta anali bithang adak lam kachingje hel chakche pholo, aro anali nengchiwak phlen thekthe si aneng hel pangtingo.
Abithang yok thek-at paklang si, anali mangojo chiplango.
Aro kiprel arleng, wo, akeng hong-phili okpe, okthe, kiklim apei aro kangjar awohel athok-agor agoya hel pensi Arnam ajortang yok pharlep mo.
Lasi anali sitem anali abangpo aman kachipangbo yok, Arnam lahel angthin kar-ih ateng akisim ayok, champi detno.
Anali Arnam khanang yok asisik pen holelo, aro kithep-kichor po aholan kasanse abihini long chirdomo aro labang asal tiki pono; kithep-kichor poyok mo-moyok kardomo. Amen.
Lasi, Arnam lahelyok aman kangwe det kar-ih along pek detno; anali arlosohel abithang kanange alok tikangsi, kamprek kanangne alok chi-en phakngo.
Ladisi apenso helta abithang kanange arloso alok tikangsi, ihut para ihutyok kidoner aneng dophak si apenso hijanyok katharak asal tikisi, anali bithang yok kachichobe anat kanangne angban chiwano.
Jibadi anali abithang anengten Arnam acho lamthe agiyan en-eh yongot, ladisi Arnam ta lahelyok, kanangne asal katikiyok, kikrolkre anengyok champi detno.
Lahel ahuwit pap, kasotonga, alop, kachilang setset, kachitheng,
arleng kamari, ahul, kachobe, aro hotur detsi plengo; kithan jol-jol, kachursi, Arnam kisim, aborai, kithekrak, kachurwit, kangho kapachiron, aipe pe apa poyok kimengme,
kamango, bi-pun kapangho, nengdokwe, kajinsose chiplang detno.
Aro anali labadi kido-kithak abang kithi kamichang, Arnam abisar kido chithan un yong ta, anali ladi kengkam chijorman, ladet kalek, labadi kengkam kachijor abang pen ta chikeng dunman.

“Ei bangyok bisar-ka-ote arleng hel, nali ihut ta, nang bithang ta chipajok un-eh ye; piyok pu tene nang pot alam bangyok bisar-ote do, la-alam mat-matsi nang bithang yokta bisar otesi pangho do; piyok pu tene bangyok bisar kahonthe nang ihutpo, nang bithang ta lamat matsi asal tiki do.”
“aro ladine kengkam kachijor aphuthak Arnam ado kibat ke khanang, labang hali than-un do.”
Manta O ladi kido-kithak bisar ka-ote abang, nang mat ta ladi asal tikisi, Arnam abisar para joknge pusi chirondo ma?
Lale, Arnam jinso si nangthin pharlep do, labang ahari hlonghlesi, nang Arnam kajinso, kachihi, aro kachipaning ding khanang agun kapangwe rondo ma?
Manta nang thin kangtang aro neng akhep kido angthinyok Arnam bisar-kangthir chiklangsi aro Akang-arniyok, nang bithang yok akang chibiwen do.
Anang abangten katiki atengsi katiki asal angban piye;
inghosi kime asal hel chihisi, jortang padosi, aro kiprelpre yok arwale, analiyok or-eh len ajiu piye;
manta kilang setset abangyok aro khanang po kimengme abang yok Arnam akang aro bisar phoye.
Ango ke Jihudi, la-aphel Grik hel yokta, kangho katiki ahuwit ajiu aduk aro kaphere-meme chiplange;
manta ango Jihudi hel, la-aphel Grik helyok kime asal katiki ahuwit yok jortang kiri, aro nengsam choknge;
piyok pu tene Arnam ke ibak det ke langle.
Inghosi kanong wesi pap tikilo, kanong wesi lahel prel le; aro inghosi kanong do yongta pap tikilo, kanong pensi anali bisar chiplange.
Piyok pu tene kanong ka-onene parake Arnam ango dhorom kangthir chiplang un-eh, manta kanong kimeng abangsi dhorom kangthir abang pusi alekhot chiplange.
Bang-ajat hel asal katiki asot ke kanong badisi tikiman, la-amun kanong kangwe yongta anali katiki asal kanong ateng tikiman.
Anali angthin longsi kanong kiwi badi pachiklanman, anali kachiron parata hakhi piman;
aro lasi, ne kime-alamthe kithan badi la-arni Arnam Jisu Khristo parasi ahuwit angthin arlo kabutisit hel bisar-oteye.
Manta nang bithang ihut Jihudi pusi chitha-angdo pu tene aro kanongyok chihado tene Arnam yok jortang patha-ang do,
aro kanong para chirlisi, anang ahisa chithan undo, aro akime ahol ke chideng pondo,
Aro kanong long agiyan, aro khanang katha-ang hlongsi, nang kangting hel yok duwar kapaklang, kangting abangyok kapatha-ang,
agiyan kangwe abangyok agiyan kipi, aro osohel yok paklangpo pusi chirondo,
Ei nang, bangyok paklang abang, nang abithang yok chipaklang kalek ma? Ei chinghu nangne pusi kapaharpo, manta nang bithang chunghudo ma?
Nali bangpen doner nangne pusi paklangdo, manta nang bithang ke donerdo ma? Ei agoya hel kisimpo, manta nang Arnam ahem long kachirdom ahem chunghu-man ma?
Ei nang kanong long jortang kapatha-angpo, nang kanong panghosi Arnam amahang patharakdo ma?
Piyok pu tene lo-kangthir long wido, “Ladisi Arnam amen Jihudi hel anatsi Bang-ajat hel asitem tharak hlongdo.”
Nang kanong mengdo pu tene, nang sunnot ka-ote mepen do; manta nang kanong mengme pu tene, nang sunnot ka-ote po sunnot ka-otete po chiplango.
Lasi sunnot ka-otete po, Bang-ajat hel kanong meng tene, sunnot ka-otete poyok Arnam anang yok sunnot ka-ote alekhot en-eh ye ma?
Manta kanong kimeng inghosi a-ok pen sunnot otete yong, kiwi alamthe aro sunnot hlong yong ta kanong kimengme nang tene, nangyok bisar otete ye ma?
Piyok pu tene, ihut arleng anglang ke Jihudi, yongta Jihudi kalek; aro anglang a-ok along sunnot ka-ote, labang ke sunnot kalek ngo;

manta inghosi neng longsi Jihudi, anangsi Jihudi lo; aro kiwi para kalek, manta Jiuli pensi, angthin long sunnot ka-oteposi, labangsi sunnot; labadi ihut arleng karklam ke arleng para kalek, manta Arnam parasi chokman.
Laparake Jihudi hel ke pot te akime dolo? Lale sunnot ka-ote pot te kanange dolo?
Ahuwit alamthe nali pahlongo. Piyok pu tene kicheng amun ke, Arnam angho alamthe hel Jihudi helyok kipek;
angkhan ke krolkre detno apotsi pot chiplang bo? Anali kikrolkre anatsi Arnam ke wang meng dundesi doye ma?
Ladi ke weye, ahuwit arleng chobe yong ta, Arnam ke khanang pusi thek nange; labang kiwi alam do, “Nang ke nang bithang kithan alamthe long kangthir alekhot dohlonge, aro bisar amun hal pene.”
Manta ili akangho tiki pon tangsi Arnam dhorom kangthir aporman hlongdo, pu tene ili pot te punang? Labang aneng akang kapachok tang Arnam akangho ma? (ne munusi badisi thando.) Ladi kalek;
akangho lo tene Arnam pirthepe yok pot badi bisar-ote bo?
Manta ne asisik parasi Arnam khanang po anang jortang aphan harman, tene minon papi pusi neyok piyok bisar-ote phakdo?
Aro piyok akime kiwangyok akangho tikike?— ladi pusi angkhan ke ado ili kipiyok ladi pu do. Anali wang kipudun alam abisar kadhorom do.
Laparake pot te? Ili Jihudi hel, Bang-ajat yok kimechot ma? Jat kalek; piyok pu tene ili ango Jihudi aro Grik abang ayok labang pap ado pihlongo,
kiwi alamthe badi: “Ihut ta dhorom kangthir arleng ingjong peno, ihut ta ingjong;
kachiron thek ihut ta ingjong, Arnam yok kar-ih ihut ta ingjong.
Ahuwit kangho aduwar damo, inan chakchepho chiplango; kime kengkam kachijor arleng ingjong, ihut ta wepeno.”
“Anali angphun alangjol mokol thiri natsi; anali ade pen chobeldo; anali angtur arlo abi akujuk hel do.”
“Anali angho hel hao pen akiho plengsi do.”
“Anali keng-kam awi kapajang yok kidam karjang,
Anali ahuwit kidam aduwarhel kanghon aro duk-lak chitongman,
anali nengsam aduwar chithek kel hlongo.”
“Anali mek ango Arnam yok kaphere wepen.”
Hali than-undo, kanong long potsi pudo, ahuwit angho alam kapadosit yok, aro pirthepe dungsi Arnam ango ado kidoyok, labang ahuwit kanong arlo kido abangyok pudo;
piyok pu tene kanong kamainot para ke pirthepe adak ihut ta, Arnam ango kangthir pu ke alekhot chiplangple; kanong parasi pap alam agiyan wang plangman.
Manta minon kanong aro turki hel hakhi piyong ta, Arnam dhorom kangthir alamthe chiklangdo;
Arnam labang dhorom kangthirpo Jisu Khristo long kikrol parasi kikrol abangten yok pahlongman; piyok pu tene ihut ta jat kamprek kalek,
ahuwit pap tikilo, aro Arnam ajortang chipangbo lo,
manta Jisu Khristo longsi kijok do, labang parasi Arnam para adorwesi kajinso hlongsi dhorom kangthir pusi alekhot chiplang un.

Arnam anang kangthir kachihi apharan anat, aporong katiki ajat-jat pap ado ot-eh detsi kido apot, abithang dhorom kangthir kapaklangyok, aro inghosi Jisu Khristo awilong krolman anang ke pap para jok un pusi alekhot kachiplang un aphan,
aro labang pachok tangsi, anangke dhorom kangthir kidolen aphan Jisu ayok kikrol abangten, pap-kiron aphansi anangyok pachiklango.
Labang aphel, ili jiu aborai daklongdo? Bangpo terek detno. Pot badi akanong pensi? Sal katiki akanong pensi ma? Kalek; kikrol kanong pensi.
La-apot kanong kimeng asal tikike yongta, kikrol pensi arleng dhorom kangthir pusi alekhot otman, hali chihlongo.
Arnam Jihudi hel aphan detsi Arnam ma? Anang Bang-ajat aphan ta Arnam kalek ma? Oik, Bang-ajat hel aphanta,
piyok pu tene Arnam ihutdet apot, sunnot kachiplang abang kikrol anat, aro sunnot kangwe abang kikrol parasi dhorom kangthir pusi alekhot enbo.
Tene ili kikrol parasi kanong pachilut detdo ma? Ladike kalek; kanongsi pachipket do.
Laparake ili Sar-lar hel yok a-ok badik ke Abraham po kapahlong, alam ili pot pubo?
Piyok pu tene Abraham po anangsal katiki parasi dhorom kangthir alekha dolo, tene kaborai nange alam anang long do, manta Arnam ango ke kalek.
Piyok pu tene lo-kangthir long pot pudo, “Abraham po Arnam yok kikrol anat, kikrol posi dhorom kangthir alekhot ot no.”
Minonke ingho sal tiki anang adat banta badi pupe alekhot ot eh, kihlong nange alekhot ot-man.
Aro inghosi sal tikikesi, sotonga poyok kironpo anat kroldo anangyok dhorom kangthir pusi alekhot hlongman.
Lasi, ihut arleng ayok sal tikikesi dhorom kangthir alekhot otman, anang yok kardom kapajir alam Dabhit po ta pudo,
“Ingho kangho katiki apap hel ron pilo, aro ingho apap dipsi bilo, anali bor-eh chok.
Ingho arleng aphan Hemphu pap hel alekhot ot-eh ye, anang bor-eh chok.”
Labang bor-eh kichok ke sunnot kachiplang abang yok ma, lale sunnot kachiplangple abang yok ta chokma? Piyok pu tene hali pudo, Abraham po kikrol pensi dhorom kangthir aphan alekhot eno.”
Laparake pot badi apunsi dhorom kangthir alekhot eno? Sunnot ka-ote apun, lale sunnot kangwe apun ma? Sunnot ka-ote apor kalek, sunnot kangwe apunsi dhorom kangthir alekhot otno.

Aro sunnot ka-otete apun kikrol ahuwit aphan anangsi apo po, aro dhorom kangthir analiyok ta alekhot otno, aro sunnot ka-ote det yokta kalek, manta ili sar-lar Abraham po sunnot ka-otete apun potsi kikrol kido, labang kikrol khanang long kengkam kachijor, ladi sunnot ka-ote abang aphan ta apo polo,
Lasi sunnot ka-otete apun ili sar-lar Abraham po kikrol parasi dhorom kangthir chokdo, labang kikrol pensi sunnot badi asin pahlongo.
Piyok pu tene pot seme kitang Abraham po, lale anang agijing helyok kipi, pirthepe adak bor-eh kihlong aidot chiplango, labangke kanong parake kalek, manta kikrol dhorom kangthir parasi hlongo.
Piyok pu tene kanong parasi dhorom kangthir kachiplang hel bor-eh kihlong aidot doman, tene kikrolpo akijol, aro labang seme-kitangpo ta akijol chiplango.
Piyok pu tene kanong ke akang wanman; manta daklong kanong ingjong, lalong kangho ta ingjong.

Labang anatsi, daklong labang seme-kitang ahuwit agijing yok, lake kanong ki-ot long parasi dhorom kangthir kichok helyok kalek, manta Abraham po kikrol kachithak helyok ta chakdo, la-anat kajinso kihlonge aidot helyok anali kikrol parasi chokman, Abraham po (anang ai ili ahuwit aphan apo po,

labadi si kiwi alamthe ta do, “Ne nangyok ako-ong ajat hel aporong phi-phu nali pachakngo”) — kithi helyok ajiu kipipo, aro kido badisi kangwe abangyok kithan alamhel kipi Arnam long anang mahang semsemsi anang krol lo.
“Lasi anang agijing hel alekhot labadi ong-onge,” labang lamthe badi, “Ako-ong ajat hel apo po” kachiplang yok, kachiha weh pho amunta, chihasi krolo;
kikrol seleplesi, (piyok pu tene anang phoro isi anengkan abo ayok) abithang abangpo kithi apunyok, aro Sarape apok aso kijut apor pusi kithek-er.
Arnam seme-kitang yok pheresi krolmo lo, ladi kalek, manta Arnam pot seme-kitang along Arnam yok jortang padosi kikrol dopon chotno,
labang Arnam pachok une pusi khanang than-unsi, anang seme-kitang along Arnam kikrol chipang-tango.
Lasi, labang kikrolpo “anangphan dhorom kangthir aphan alekhot otno.”
Minon lamthe hel, “Anangyok alekhot eno” pusi anangyok detsi wilo, ladi kalek, ili phanta wilo,
manta Hemphu Jisu yok kithi para kapangthur poyok kikrol abang ili yokta alekhot en-ne.
Labang Jisu ili pap anatsi champilo aro ili dhorom kangthir aphan anangyok pang-thuro.
La-anatsi, ili kikrol parasi kikrol kangthir pusi alekhot otsi, ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo parasi Arnam pen ili nengsam do.
Labang kajinso long arjapsi dohlongdo, labang kajinso long lutdun hlongsi, Arnam jortang abhag kihlongdun chihasi nengrong chipado do.
Ladet kalek, manta kamprek duk-lak amunta nengrong chipadonang, piyok pu tene ili than un,
duk-tap hel kachihi wanman, kachihi long aporman piman, aro aporman hel kachiha pachok man,
aro labang kachihapo patharakre, piyok pu tene ili yok kipi Jiuli-Kangthir pensi ili nenglong Arnam nengdok lisi pilo.
Piyok pu tene konam ili chakchepho kido, la-amunsi Khristo kanange apunsi Arnam yok kimengme hel aphan abithang ajiu pilo.
Piyok pu tene dhorom kangthir arleng hel— aphan pudo tene ihut arleng ajiu pipe yongta akime arleng aphan kithiyok ke inghone bak aneng dota hal.
Manta Arnam iliyok anang nengdok aporman paklangdo lake, la-ango konam ili pap longsi kido, la-amun Khristo ili natsi abithang ajiu pilo.
Lasi minon Khristo awi pensi dhorom kangthir pusi alekhot otsi, konbak ongchot bor-eh pen ili anang pensi akang along chipajok une.
Piyok pu tene konam ili hutur naksi kido, la amun Arnam Aso kithi para ili Arnam pen chilok phakngo, tene chilok phaksi, layok ongchotsi anang ajubong pen ili joknge.
Manta layok ke, Arnam pen minon labang pachilok tango, ili labang Hemphu Jisu Khristo pensi Arnam along aborai chipado do.
Lasi, jibadi ihut arleng parasi pap wango, aro pap anatsi kithipo pirthepe long wango, aro ahuwit arleng pap katiki anat, labang kithipo ahuwit arlengyok chisang detno—
kanong kipi ango pirthepe adak pap kido, manta daksi kanong wedung, lalong pap alekhot weman.
Layongta ingho Adam poyok kithan alam kimengme badike pap tikike yong, Adam po para Mosi po arniyok anali phu-thakta kithipo kihal, labang Adam po kiwang nangepo arjan kido.

Manta jibadi pap katiki, kajinso abor-eh ladi ke kalek. Piyok pu tene ladi pap katiki anat ako-ong thilo, tene konbak ongchotsi Arnam kajinso aro kajinso abor-eh, la-hini, ihutdet arleng, lake Jisu Khristo kajinso long ako-ong arlengyok bor-eh hlongo.
Aro pap katiki ihut parasi jibadi pap chiplango, kajinso abor-eh ladi kalek. Piyok pu tene ihut pap katiki para bisar ado wano, manta ako-ong pap parasi dhorom kangthir aphan bor-eh wangpilo.

La-anat, ihut pap katiki along, ihut arleng apap parasi kithipo halo, tene inghosi kajinso aro dhorom kangthir ong-ongsi hlongman, anali aro ongchotsi ihutpo, lake Jisu Khristo parasi ajiulong kajinso haldong bo.
Lasi, pot badi isi apap parasi ahuwit arlengyok ado kolo, ladisi dhorom kangthir isi katiki parasi ahuwit arleng yok ajiu long dhorom kangthir kajinso bor-eh pilo.
Piyok pu tene, ihut arleng kithan lamthe kapangho parasi jibadi ako-ong arleng yok papi ingholo, ladisi ihut kithan alam kamainot parasi ako-ong arlengyok dhorom kangthir ingholo.
Manta kanong wango, pap katiki pachan ongo; manta daksi pap katiki halo, ladisi kajinso pensi hal un,
la-anatsi, jibadi kithi aphan dak long pap ong-ongo, labadi si ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo long kido kajinso pensi kikrol kangthir pensi ki-or-eh len ajiuli lut dun uno.
Ili ke pot te punang? Arnam kajinso kihlong ayok ili pap tikisi donange ma? Ladi ke kalek.
Ili pap alongke akithi, ili lalong aro pot badi hrengsi doye?
Lale, ili konbak arleng Jisu Khristo aronsi baptist chiplang hlongo, ahuwit ta anang kithi aronsi baptist chiplang hlongo, bangpo nali chithan un-eh yong ma?

La-apot Apa yok jortang padosi pot badi Khristo yok kithi asitem para pangthuro, ladisi ilita ajiu akimine kengkam chijornang, la-anat baptist kachiplang parasi anang pen kithidun aphansi ahilik long kibi badi chiplango.
Piyok pu tene anang kithi badi ilita chingchong hlongo, tene kibur badi ta chingchong hlonge.
Ili ke aro pap aturu kalek, lasi pap abangpo chipanghon si, ili aban munusi poyok anang pen kros long tarduno, bangpo ili chithan un.
Piyok pu tene ingho thilo, anang pap para joksi, dhorom kangthir pusi alekhot otno.
Manta ili Khristo pen thilo, pu tene anang pen ili ajiu pen chingchonge, bangpo ili krolman;
kithi asitem para kapangthur Khristo aro anang jat thithe, anang phuthak kithipo aro hal un-eh, bangpo ili chithan un.
Anang potbadi kithi aduk cholo, bangpo ke pap aronsi iphong det dukcholo; manta anang jipe ajiubong aduk cho do, bangpo Arnam aphansi duk chodo.
Lasi nalita Jisu Khristo long nang pap aphan ke akithi, aro Arnam aphan akihreng pusi alekhot en-no pune chiron.
Latene nali akithi abang po yok ajatjat kar-ih arlo chipek ke, nali kithiman abangpo long pap pahal hlonge not.

Abithang abangpo aroremhel akangho katiki abihini badi pap asal long chipek ngek, manta abithang yok kithihel asitem para hreng hlongo pusi Arnam aphan, nali abang arorem hel yok dhorom kangthir asal abihini pusi Arnam yok chipek.
Piyok pu tene nali phuthak pap hal un-eh ye, piyok pu tene nali kanong arlo kalek, kajinso arlosi do.
Tene pot te? Ili kanong arlo dodesi, Arnam kajinso arlo chiplango apotsi ili pap tikijong nang ma? Ladi kalek.

Kithi aphansi pap, lale dhorom kangthir aphan kithan alam kimeng, labang hini long nali bithangke kithan alam kimeng aturu badi chipekpe si, labang kithan alam hel mengsi anang aturu chiplangman, bangpo nali chithan un-eh yong ma?
Manta la-anat Arnam yok kardom pajirnang, aporong ke nali pap aturu kido, manta kachirli alamyok chipekngo, ingthin wakphlen si bangpomar kimengyok nali kithan alamthe arlo chiplango,
aro nali ke, pap para joksi, dhorom kangthir amurkiya chiplango.

Nali a-ok long ki-un-eh anat, ne munusi badisi nali thando; piyok pu tene jibadi aporong kangho katiki anat, abithang abang arorem hel akisim aro akangho asal aturu badisi kachipek, ladi ke minon kangthir kihlong dun aphan, abithang abang aroremhel amurkiya badi dhorom kangthir asalyok chipekngot.
Piyok pu tene konam nali pap aturu kido, la-amun ke dhorom kangthir aphan ke joksi kido.
Lasi jibak alam anat minon nali chitharakdo; la-amun lamehel along nali pot angban kido? Piyok pu tene lamehel asal kijut ke kithi.
Manta minon ke nali pap para jokngo, aro Arnam amurkiya chiplango, nali phan apor akime pisi chipangthir hlongo; aro labang kijut ke or-eh len ajiu do.
Piyok pu tene pap adatke kithi, manta Arnam kipi bor-eh ke, ili Hemphu Khristo Jisu parasi or-eh len ajiubong hlong do.
Ei korte aro ingjir hel— arleng konbak adinyok hrengsi doman, la-an adin kanong anang aphuthak pangdom man, bangpo nali chithan un-eh ma? Piyok pu tene ne kanong thek-re abangyok pudo.
Pihan ki-en arloso apihanpo kihreng alengke kanong pen chingnaksi dohlong man, manta anang pihanpo thilo tene, anang apihanpo kanong parake jokman.

La-anat anang pihan po kihreng alengke, kamprek apenso pen dodun tene, la-amun anang yok kidoner arlosope puye. Manta apihanpo thilo tene, la kanong parake joksi, aphel bang apenso pen dun yongta, anang kidoner arlosope kalek.
Labadisi, ei kortehel, ili Arnam yok athe pawangot, lasi nalita prek ihutpo, lake kithi hel asitem para kibur adun kachiplang yok, Jisu Khristo abangpo parasi kanong badike akithi chiplango.
Piyok pu tene konam ili ok-wi arlo kido, la-amun kithiyok athe kapawang, kanong parasi kiwang pap para ajatjat kar-ih hel pensi ili abang arorem long abithang asal patikilo.
Manta daklongsi ili chibengsi kido, labang aphan akithi chiplangsi, minon ke kanong parake jokngo, la-amun ili kiwi kanong penke kalek, manta ajiulong Ajiuli akimi murkiya asal tikiman.

Laparake ili pot punang? Lake kanong po si pap ma? Ladi ke kalek. Yongta pap ke potsi bangpo ne chithan un-ehsi kido, kanong parasi chithan uno. “Nang alop doyek;” pune kanong along bangpo kithanthe nang tene, alop ke pot te, bangpo chithan un-eh lo hoi.
Manta pap, awak hlongsi, labang kithan alamthe parasi ne ingthin long alop pen ahuwit ajatjat kar-ih hel tiki tango. Kanong wedet ke pap ke akithi.
Aporong ke kanong wesi ne hrengsi kido, manta labang kithan alam wangsi, pap yok pahreng phakngo,
aro ne la-amunsi thihlongo. Kihreng aphan kipi jibak kithan alamthe, bangpo si nephan ke kithi akorom chiplango.
Piyok pu tene pap ke awak hlongsi, labang kithan alam parasi neyok chobelsi, bangpo pen neyok nemarilo.
Lasi kanong ke kangthir, kithan alam ta kangthir, abisar kangthir aro akime lo.

Potsi akime bangpo tikilo, laparake, nephan kithi nepilo? Ladi ke kalek. Pap si, bangpo neyok kapathi parasi bangpo pap pusi pachiklang ngo, aro kithan alam parasi alekha kangwe pho pap nephan honjokngo.
Piyok pu tene kanong ke ajiuli do, lake ili chithan un; manta ne ke a-okpen, aro pap yok chijor det hlongo.
Ne potsi tiki si pachok, ne ke abhu hlonghle. Piyok pu tene ne katiki aneng ateng ne tiki hlonghle, manta ne kisim jong posi ne tiki hlongman.
Minon ke ne katiki aneng ateng tiki hlonghle, pu tene kanong ke akime, pusi ne hoi chodo.
Manta bangpo ke nebithang ke tiki ke, nelong kido pap posi bangpo nepatiki do.
Piyok pu tene nelong, lake ne ok along, akime ke wedung pusi ne than un. Ne potsi kadhorom ne ar-ih, manta ne bangpo tikike.
Piyok pu tene ne aneng do yongta ne tikiye, manta potsi akangho katiki aneng wepen, bangposi ne tikiman.
Minon ke ne aneng kido ateng tiki hlonghle, tene bangpo ke nebithang ke bangpo tikike, manta nelong kidojong pap posi bangpo tiki do.
Lasi, ne konam akime asal katiki yok ne aneng doman, la-amun akanghopo nedung hetsi doman, ladi isi akanong kido ahari hlongdo.
Piyok pu tene ne nengthin along arlengpo Arnam kanong alongsi nengsam hlongman,
manta neneng along kanong ayok ado kolsi kachirbu jong, aro nebangpo arorem hel along kido pap akanong arlo nebeng klakdo, ladi prek isi akanong nebangpo arorem along thek hlongman.
Ne konbak nengsamse pho arleng! Labang akithi abangpo para neyok ingho nepajok nge?
Ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo pensi ne Arnam yok kardom pajirdo. Lateng, neneng samjin pen Arnam akanong along, manta a-ok pen pap akanong long aturu asal tiki hlongdo.
Lalong la-apotsi minon ke Jisu Khristo long kido abangke jatsi adai ingjongot.
Piyok pu tene Jisu Khristo long Ajiuli kido akanong ke, neyok pap aro kithi akanong para pajok ngo.
Piyok pu tene kanongpo potsi chakche pho a-ok long, tiki un-eh yongo: abithang Asoyok pap det a-ok badi wangtolsi, pap aphan, a-ok long pap adai batsi Arnam pachokngo.
La-apot ingho a-ok ateng ke kengkam chijorje si, Jiuli atengsi kengkam chijorman, anangke kanong kanange ili longsi pachokman.
Piyok pu tene ingho a-ok ateng kido abangke a-ok abihini hel chironman, manta jiuli ateng kido abang ke ajiuli alam chironman.
A-ok long neng kachi-en abang ke akithi, manta neng along Ajiuli aneng kachi-en abang ajiubong aro nengsamdo.
Piyok pu tene a-okpen kachiron ke, Arnam yok hutur doman; labangsi Arnam kanong arlo chipabekbe— chipabekso ta un-eh,
aro inghosi a-ok arlo do dundo, anali ke Arnam yok neng pangsam un-eh.
Manta Arnam Ajiuli nali ingthin long do, tene nali a-ok arlo dode yong, Ajiuli arlo longsi do. Ingho anenglong Khristo ajiuli ingjong, anang ke Khristo long kalek.
Manta Khristo nali ingthin along doman, yongta pap aphanke nalibangpo akithi; dhorom kangthir aphan Ajiuli si ajiubong.

Inghosi Jisuyok kithi asitem para pangthuro, anang Ajiuli nali long doman, tene Khristo Jisu yok kithi asitem para kapangthur posi, nalilong kido anang Ajiuli pensi, nali pirthimipe abangpo yok ta panghrenge.
Laparake, ei korte aro ingjirhel, ili a-ok arlo kidoyok ke a-ok adhar kicho arleng kalek ngo—
piyok pu tene nali ke a-ok arlo arjak-thur, pu tene nali jibadi yongta thihlonge; manta ajiuli parasi abanglong katikihel paprel-un, pu tene hrenge.
Piyok pu tene konbak arleng Arnam ajiuli pen kengkam chijorman, labang ahuwit ke Arnam aso lo.
Piyok pu tene nali kachiphere phakyok turu ajiuli hlongo, ladi kalek; manta pot ajiuli parasi ili “Abba! Apa!” ladi pusi taramman, ladi kachi-al aso Ajiuli hlongo.
Labang Jiuli abithang, ili Arnam aso pusi, ili jiuli pen hakhi piman,

aro aso chiplango, tene Khristo pen jortang kidoyok, bor-eh kihlonge aidot chiplango; lasi ili anang pen duk-chihi duno, tangsi ili Arnam bor-eh kihlonge aidot, aro Khristo pen bor-eh kihlonge aidot chiplango.
Iliyok potsi jortang chiklange, bangpo pen minon apor kiduk kapachingbar yok jat michangche pusi alekhot otman.
Piyok pu tene Arnam aso hel wang kachiklang arniyok, kithep-kichor ajal dung ta chihasi inghongdo.
Piyok pu tene kithep-kichor ajal dung si abithang ar-ih si asisik arlo meng dun detno, ladi kalek; manta Arnam kar-ih ateng kachiha pensi chokngo,
ladi kachiha pensi, kithep-kichor ajaldungsi abithang ta kipreljong aturu kido para joksi, Arnam asohel jortang kido aphan joknge.
Piyok pu tene minon hok kithep-kichor ajal dungsi so kiplang abi badi aduk hlongsi, inan ar-emjeng si do hlongdo, bangpo ili chithan undo;
aro ladet kalek, ili Jiuli-Kangthir abor-eh kihlong cheng abang, ili ta kachi-al aso aphang, lake ili abangpo kijoktang yok inghongsi, ili ingthin long ar-emsi do hlongdo.
Piyok pu tene ili kachiha pensi jokngo. Minon ke kithek jong kachihapo, labang kachihapo kalek, piyok pu tene dak bangpo thekjong do, bangpoyok ingho chiha do?
Manta ili dak bangpo thek hlonghle lang, bangpo aphan chiha do, tene ili chihisi bangpoyok inghongne donang.

Labadisi Jiuli pota ili ki-un-eh along jakong rungdun do; piyok pu tene kanange amun pot badisi pingkit nange, bangpo ili chithan un-eh, manta Jiulisi abithang ili phan kithan nangne alamhel pen ar-emsi chingduk man.
Aro ajiuli kachironpo potne, bangpo ingthin katorol Arnamsi than-un do, piyok pu tene Arnam aneng ateng, anang kangthir adun hel aphan pingkit chingdukman.
Aro ili than-un do ke, inghosi Arnam yok nengdok do, anang kar-ih ateng taramo, anali phan ahuwit bor-eh kichok aphan inansi tikisi do.
Piyok pu tene Arnam Aso ke, ako-ong kortehel asitem ango kiplang badi, lasi Arnam ingho yok ango chinilo, analiyok anang Aso arjan natsi, aporong honjok weno.
Aro inghoyok aporong honjokweno, analiyok taram tango aro inghoyok anang taram tango, analiyok dhorom kangthir pusi alekhot otno; aro ingho yok dhorom-kangthir alekhot eno anangyok jortang ta pilo.
Tene lamehel alam anat ili pot te puye? Arnam ili phan do, pu tene ingho ili ado kol une?
Ingho si abithang Aso yok chibibe yongot, manta ili ahuwit aphan anangyok champi detno, anangsi ili yok ahuwit abihini ili pipe ye ma?
Arnam karwal arleng hel yok ingho ado piye? Arnamsi pap kolsi dhorom kangthir pusi alekhot ki-en pon po.
Ado kibatpo ingho te? Inghosi thilo, layok ke, kithihel asitem para pangthuro, anang ke Khristo Jisu; anang Arnam ancho-ari aga dosi, ili phan chingduksi do.
Khristo nengdok parake inghote iliyok patikang un-eh? Kiduk lale tongklak, honjat lale ka-ongkal, pe-rik kangwe lale kiprel, lale nokjir, lamehel patikang une ma?
Kiwi alamthe pudo, “Ili nang natsi arnijon ta kamari pahlong si do; kithatyok kipon bherabik badisi ili alekhot chiplango.”
Layong ta, iliyok nengdokpo parasi, labang ahuwit alam ili kihal yongta haldongsi do.
Piyok pu tene ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo long Arnam nengdok, bangpo para kithi lale ajiubong, Arnam tharlon lale apharan, minon jong lale monphel yok alam, lale kihal ajakong,
angsong lale aling, lale kamprek kithep-kichor abihini ta iliyok patikang un-eh, ne ladi krolpen do.
Ne Khristo long dosi khanang alam thando chobelbe yong; ne kachiron ta Jiuli-Kangthir along dosi nephan hakhi pido—
Ne ingthin la-an aduk dopen do aro or-eh lensi nengthin long sohrimsi do.
Piyok pu tene inghosi a-okpo badike nebithang ajat, ne kortehel aphan, nebithangsi Khristo para hao kipahlong yok ahisa lo hoi.
Analike Israyel arleng ajat, aro analiyok kachi-al aso adeng, jortang, kachingnak angton kido, kanong kihlong abang, kachirdom, aro seme-kitang hel anali phansi kido;
sar-lar abangta anali ajatsi, aro anali ajat a-ok badi yongta, Khristo ta anali sitemsi wang plango, anang kithechot Arnam awe-awe bor-eh chokman. Amen.
Arnam alamthe akijol chiplango, ladike kalek. Piyok pu tene Israyel hel para kiwang arleng ahuwit ta Israyel arleng kalek,
aro anali Abraham po agijing chiplangsi, aro ahuwit ta anang so-su lo labang ta kalek; manta “Aijak po parasi nang agijing amen-anang doye.”
Labang lo-kangthir lamthe achoke lalo, a-okpo jipe kiplang aso, anali Arnam aso kalek, manta Arnam seme-kitang kipu aso, analisi agijing pusi alekhot otman.
Piyok pu tene Arnam seme-kitang alamthe lalo; “Labang apunsi ne wange, la-amun Sara pe ihut aso penso choknge.”
Ladet kalek; konam ili sar Aijak po, para aso agat dolo apot, Rebeka pe ta labadi ihutpe natsi kido.
Aso kiplangple amunsi, aro kime lale kangho jatsi katikike amunsi, manta katarampo kar-ih apot, (lasi sal katiki anat ta kalek,
Arnam karwal tang badi karwal pachok ngo,) anang yok kipu, lake “Aklengpo si amupo aturu asal tiki hlonge.”
Labang alam lo-kangthir long wido, “Ne Jakup poyok nengdok ngo, manta Esau po yok ne simo.”
Tene ili pot te pu nang? Arnam long akangho doma? Ladi ke kalek.
Piyok pu tene anang Mosi poyok kipu, “Ne inghoyoksi jinsodo, anang yoksi jinsoye, aro ingho yoksi bor-eh batdo, anangyoksi bor-eh batne.”
La-apot, arleng kar-ih kido, lale ki-en dun para ke kalek, manta kajinso kapaklang Arnam parasi chokman.
Piyok pu tene lo-kangthir along Pharau po yokta pudo, “Ne nang yok kihal ajakong nang paklange, la anat aro pirthepe ajal dungsi nemen kapaharpon aphan, ne nangyok pathelo,”
La-apot inghoyok anang kar-ih, anangyoksi anang bor-eh piman, aro inghoyok si anang ar-ih, anang yoksi anang angthin parthat man.
Holek nang neyok puye, te “Tene anang akangho pangthek une ma? piyok pu tene Arnam anang kar-ih long inghote ado kol une?”
Manta ei munusi hel, Arnam yok ado ki-ot unpo nang ke inghote? Kithep tang abihinipo, “Neyok labadi piyok nethepmo pusi kithep poyok pu ye ma?”
Idum alungle pensi isi ke kilangme aro isike kilangho, labadi hini adorop ka-ote yok, lunglepo aphuthak komarpo thep un-eh ye ma?
Arnam ke, anang akang kachipaklang ayok, aro anang apharan kapaklang ar-ihsi, kachipangho aphan kahonjok akang kihlonge hel yok ongsi chipanengding si chihilo,
aro inghoyok jortang aphan anang aporong honjokngo, labang kajinso aron long jortang kapahar aphan si tikilo,
anang iliyok ladisi, Jihudi abangdet parake kalek, manta Bang-ajat hel asitem parata taramre yongma?
Labadi si anang Hosiya alo long pudo, “Inghosi nelong kalek, anangyok ‘ne arleng pusi,’ aro ne nengdokde peyok ‘nengdok pe’ pusi tarame.”
“Aro analiyok ne arleng kalek, ladi alam daklongsi analiyok kithan hlong,” lalong anali kihrengjong Arnam aso pusi amen-anang chitha-ange.”
Manta Israyel alamke Jisoya po labang alam pahar do, “Israyel aso hel alekha langpe sangtel badi ongman, layongta anali angkhan abang detsi kijok hlonge;
piyok pu tene Hemphu anang lamthe pathi-otsi aro pa-ordapsi, pirthimipe athak tikisi patange.”
Labang alam Jisoya turkipo yok aporong kipathan badi, “Tharlon hel Hemphu ili phan agijing bibe nang tene, ili Sodum badi chiplang hlongo hoi, aro Gomora badi pangbaro hoi.”
Tene ili pot punang? Bang-ajat hel dhorom kangthir yok ar-ih dunde yongta, dhorom kangthir hlongo, lake kikrol parasi dhorom kangthir pahlongo;
manta Israyel arleng hel dhorom kangthir kanong pensi tiki-tung yongta, labang kanong pachok un-eh yongo.
Pot anatsi? Piyok pu tene anali kikrol parake kalek, manta katiki parasi hlongman pusi tiki-tung rongo. Patukung arlong along anali patukung dutno,
ladi alam kiwi ta do, “Langot, ne Jayon long kapatukung arlong, lake patukung si kijang arlong biye, aro anangyok kikrolpo tharak hlonghleye.”
Ei korte aro ingjirhel, nengthin ke ar-ido, aro anali phan Arnam yok angot pingkit do, anali kijok pahlong nang.
Arnam yok kachirdom aneng arleng do pusi ne anali phan hakhi pido; manta la kachirdom agiyan atengke kalek.
Piyok pu tene anali Arnam dhorom kangthir chinine si, abithang kaparjap ayok chilangsi, Arnam dhorom kangthir long chipabekbe yongot.
Piyok pu tene dhorom kangthir aphan kikrol abangten yok Khristo si kijut akanong.
