Piyok pu tene Mosi po wilo, te “ingho arleng kanong tikisi dhorom kangthir pusi mainot pon, anangsi bangpo parake hrenge.”
Manta kikrol para kihlong dhorom kangthir abang ladi pu do, nang bithang ingthin long pu yek, “Ethakpe yok inghote thursi dame?” (lake Khristo yok kapasun yok;)
“lale, ‘harang longyok inghote sune?’ ” (lake, kithi hel asitem Khristo yok pangthursi kiwan yok).
Manta bangpo ke pot te pudo? “Labang lamthe nang dung hetsido, nang angho long aro nang angthin longsido” (lake, hali kapahar kikrol nange alamthe);
piyok pu tene, nang bithang anghopen Jisu yok Hemphu pusi hoicho, aro Arnam si anangyok kithi asitem parake pangthuro, pusi bangpo ingthin long kroldo, tene kijok hlonge.
Piyok pu tene dhorom kangthir aphan ingthin pensi krol hlongman; aro kijoktang aphan angho pensi hoicho hlongman.
Piyok pu tene lo-kangthir long pudo, “Inghosi anangyok krolman, anang tharak hlonghle ye.”
Piyok pu tene Jihudi aro Grik labang ajat prek-prek donangne; abangten aphan ihutdet Hemphu si do; konbak arleng anang ngo pingkit, la ahuwit ayok anang bor-eh apuru do;
piyok pu tene “Inghosi Hemphu amenpen pingkitdo, anang kijoktang hlonge.”
Manta Jisu yok, anali krolkre yong, anang ngot pot badi pingkit bo? Aro anang lamthe arju hlonghle yong, anang yok pot badi krol une?
Aro tolte lengke pot badi pahar dam bo? Ladi alam kiwi wendo, “Bor-eh kichok kime-alamthe kapahar abang akeng konbak athok!”
Manta ahuwit arleng kime-alamthe mengo, ladi kalek; piyok pu tene Jisoya po pudo, “O Hemphu, hali kapahar alamthe ingho krol lo?”
Lasi karju parasi kikrol, aro Khristo lamthe parasi arju hlongman.
Manta ne pudo, anali ke arju hlonghle yong ma? Khanang ke arju hlongo; “Anali asi ajal dungsi pirthimipe yok, aro anali lamthe pirthepe kijut yok chingtang detno.”
Manta ne pu bang, Israyel abang ke abhu hlonghle yong ma? Kicheng ke Mosi po si pudo, “Aso ajat parasi nalimek kachiso paplange; aro kamango ajat parasi nali neng pakange.”
Aro Jisoya pota chipangtang si pudo, “Ingho neyok bisarse yongot, anali neyok pahlongo; aro ingho nelamthe kabisare yongot, analingot ne chiklango.”
Manta Israyel arleng hel alam anang pudo, “Kithan alam kimengme aro kachikeng ke abangyok ne arsini ne ari jarsi dolo.”
Laparake, ne pudo, Arnam abithang arleng helyok ke selo ma? Ladi kalek; piyok pu tene nebithang ta Abraham po agijing, Benjamin akhel ihut Israyel arleng.

Arnam aporong para kachini abithang arleng helyok anang sese yong. Lale, Elija po kipanir lo-kangthir long pot pudo: bangpo nali chithan un-eh yong ma? Anang Israyel arleng hel ado kolsi Arnam ango ladi kachingduk,
“O Hemphu, arleng hel nang turki helyok marisi, nang athuli hel pangho lo, ne hudet si rikok do; aro anali neyok ta kamari yok chirondo.”
Manta anangyok Arnam ke pot pudo? “Baal kipu arnam hel ango kachirdomde hajar thorok isi arleng nelong chiwansi bilo.”
Ladisi minon hok ta kikrol kangthir, jinso si karwal tang abang beksodet si do.
Manta labangso ta kajinso anatsi ri-do, apot sal katiki parake kalek; lale labang kajinso det ke aro khanang kajinso kaleknge.
Lapara ke pot te? Israyel abang pot si bisardo, bangpo hlonghle yong. Karwaltang arleng helsi bangpo hlongo; manta kiri abang ke neng parthat no,
labang alam lo-kangthir long kiwi do, “Arnam analiyok aphu karti ajiu pilo, aro jatsi thekthe ye, ladi amek, aro jatsi arjuje ye, ladi anoso pilo; mini hok labadisi do.”
Dabhit po ta pudo, “Anali chojun ahong, analiyok pasulkango aro kachiwur apham chiplango, kapangho aro katiki angban pahlong nang;
Anali thek hlonghle ayok, anali mek pangting nang, aro nang anali anung arni pachingkuk-rung ngo.”
Lasi ne pu do, anali kijang ayok patukungo ma? Ladi kalek! Manta Israyel abang neng-pasojin hlong ayok anali ado parasi Bang-ajat hel aphan joktang pahlongo.
Minon ke anali ado katiki parasi pirthepe apuru chokngo, aro anali akijol kichok parasi Bang-ajat hel aphan apuru hlongo, tene Jihudi hel joktang hlong phrot tene konbak ongchot apuru choknge.
Manta Bang-ajat hel nalike, naliyok ne pudo. Ne Bang-ajat hel aphan kapachak adunpo chiplango apot, ne labang kapahar aphang ayok jortang pido.
Un pu tene nibithang ajat hel yok neng pasohrim si, analiyok angkhan pajoktang un mene.
Piyok pu tene analiyok katikang si pirthepe long Arnam pen pachilok un, pu tene analiyok kachideng ke kithi hel ajiu kihlong aparke prek pot doye?
Aro him adumpo, ango kangtonso ke kangthir, tene ajal dung him adumpo ke kangthir; aro thengpepe angkur kangthir, tene arohel ta kangthir.
Manta angkhan arorem hel panghlok detno, aro nang ingnam kido jolphai arong chiplang si, labang asitem jolphai arorem thuhletsi pachirhapmo, aro nang jolphai arong alang chilok duno.
Arorem hel yok ado kolke aborai doyek. Kaborai do pu tene, layongta nang angkur long chirhapsi do ladi kalek, manta angkurposi nangyok chirhapsi do.
Lalong nang pu do, neyok pachirhap yok arorem para panghlok tangdo.”
Labang ke khanang, nang kikrolkre anatsi labang hel panghlok detno, manta nang kikrol anatsi arjap sido. Nang neng aborai chiplangek, la aniste Arnamyok pherene do.
Piyok pu tene Arnam kidowen arorem helyok nengdokde tene, nali yokta nengdokde ye.

Laparake si Arnam kajinso aro akang anengyok langot; inghosi pap long jango analiyok ke akang aneng do; manta naliyok ke Arnam kajinso do; nalike labang kajinso long donot; kangwe yok ke naliyok ta nali tikange.
Aro Jihudi kikrolmo anengpo tikang pu tene, analiyok pachirhapme, piyok pu tene lahel yok pachirhap phakyok Arnam apharan do.

Piyok pu tene nang ke ingnam kido jolphai arong para thuhletsi kiwang, nang kido alenta weyong ta akimepen jolphai arong long pachirhap mo, tene ango kidowen arohel, labang konbak me-atsi abithang jolphai arongpe long pachirhap unbo.

Lasi, ei korte aro ingjirhel, nali abithang ayok agiyan dochot puke chironek, konam Bang-ajat arleng wang dun detde lengke, la-amunyok angkhan Israyel hel angthin karthat dolo, bangpo kabutisit agiyan alam nali chithan un-ehsi kido neneng long ingjong.
Aro labadisi ahuwit Israyel hel joknge; lo-kangthir long kiwi do, “Jayonpe para Ral Hemphu wange; anang Jakup po agijing para akangho hel kol detne.
Aro konam ne anali pap hel kole, la amun anangsi analipen ne niyom chiplange.”
Kime-alamthe aphan Jihudi hel Arnam pen hutur dolo; manta sar-larhel anat karwalyok anali phan nengdok ke doman;
piyok pu tene Arnam kajinso bor-eh aro kataram amun, lalong anali neng kachipharlep wepen.
Jibadi nali angoke Arnam kimengme kido, manta minon nali kimengme kido anat kajinso hlongo,
ladisi nali kajinso hlongsi paklango apot analita kajinso pahlongo, lasi anali minon kimengme chiplango,
piyok pu tene Arnam ahuwit yok kajinso pahlongyok, ahuwit yokta kimengme along bengklak si bilo.
Arnam agiyan aro botsere apuru konbak akarnuk! Anang bisar-kangthir bomdun un-eh pho! Aro anangpen kidun aduwar kangthun dun un-eh pho!
Piyok pu tene Hemphu aneng alam ingho than uno, lale anangpen kachirhep dunpo ingho chiplang uno?
Lale ingho anangyok aporong banta pilo, tangsi anangyok wang piphak nange?”
Piyok pu tene ahuwit abihini anang para, aro anang pensi, aro anang phansi chokman; anang jortang mo-mo yok padonang. Amen.

Lasi, ei korte aro ingjirhel, Arnam ahuwit kajinso parasi ne naliyok chingduk bang, nali abithang abangpo akihreng, kangthir, aro Arnam kachideng buli karkli badi chipekngot; labangsi nali phan Jiulipen kachirdom nengpangsam man.
Pirthepe badike chingbar dunek; la-apot dak bangposi Arnam ar-ih do nang archal langsi, lake potsi akime, aro kachideng ateng aro khanangpo pen neng akimine, angthin long neng chipharlep mot,

piyok pu tene neyok kipi kajinso parasi ne nali abangten yok pubang, me-at kachiron aphel kaita anang thekchot puke chiron ponek; manta Arnam inghoyok jipe apun atengsi kikrol po pilo, anang latengne anang lamthe hel chiron pamenot.
Piyok pu tene ili isi abangpo longsi, ili jibadi ako-ong prek-prek abang po arorem do, layongta labang ahuwit arorem isidet badi sal tikike,
ladisi ilita, ako-ong yongta, Khristo longke isi abangpo chiplang do, aro abangten isi para isiyok abangpo arorem chiplangsi do.
Manta iliyok kipi kajinso bor-eh pomar ke, ili prek-prek kajinso bor-eh hlong do apot, labang bor-eh hel ke lam katurki un abor-eh chiplang, tene kikrol apun ateng langsi bangpo than undo;
labang helke Arnam asal katiki abang ke Arnam asal tikine donang; lale, kapaklang poke kapaklang asal along,
nengkirung poke nengkirung asal long padonang; banta kipipo ke banta pajirlongne padonang; phu-phang po ke me-atsi palang ponnang; kajinso poke nengrong jinso dunnang.
Nengdok ke khanang padonang; jipe kangho, bangpo simmot, akime poke enponnot;
korte-nengdok ihut para ihut yok chingdom pon; aman kipado alam long, ihutpo para ihutpo yok mechotne aman paklang;
mesone sal katiki amun kaselep wanek; ajiuli long chirdom pame not; Hemphu murkiya asal tikinot,
kachiha long nengrong chipado; kiduk-hap amun chipaning dingot; pingkit jongne donot;
kangthir adun helyok kanange amun banta rap dun, don kachingden pamepon.
Inghosi naliyok honjat langman, analiyok bor-eh pajir; hao pipesi bor-eh batdun.
Inghosi nengrong chipado do, analipen nengrong chipadodun; ingho si suruman, analipen surudun.
Nali ihut para ihut chingbar si arjap-pachip. Kaborai alam chironek, manta akibek hel ateng kengkam chijordun. Abithang yok thekchot chipuyek.
Akangho aholan kaiyok ta kangho tiki ponek; ahuwit arleng kithek ke jipe akime, bangpo chironot.
Un putang tene, nali ki-un ateng ahuwit arleng pen ching barne donot.
Ei nengdok hel, nali ka-ongnai hel paduk dun nek; manta Arnam akang ayok chipek ngot; piyok pu tene lo-kangthir long kiwi do, “Hemphu pudo, ne si ajar hule, ne si katiki angban ta piye.”
Manta “Nang huturpo ingchir do, tene anang yok an-pacho pon; anang lang ikdo, tene anangyok lang pajunot; ladi tikilo apot, anang phulong kikar angkri kibat badi tharak nge.”
Akangho asalpen remresi, akime asal pensi kangho asal poyok parem mot.
Abangten arleng kapangdom apharan kido helyok mengdun nang; piyok pu tene Arnam parane pipe tene kaita apharan hlonghle tene jat apharan ingjong; aro jibak do, lamehel Arnam parasi honjok wendo.
La-apotsi ingho labang apharan yok teng dunman, anangke Arnam kapachak poyok teng dun do; aro inghosi teng dun do, anali abithang yok ado chibatne.

Piyok pu tene kilangpon phu-phang hel akime katiki yok kalek, akangho katiki hel yoksi kaphere doman. Nali apharan kidohel yok kaphere dode ma? Tene akime asal tiki not, tangsi nang anang para hawang hlonge.

Piyok pu tene nang bor-eh kihlong aphansi, anang ihut Arnam murkiya chiplangdo. Manta nang kangho asal tiki, tene phere; piyok pu tene anang nokpo akijolsi otdo, ladi kalek; piyok pu tene anang Arnam amurkiya, kangho katiki arleng yok Arnam akang badi anang nang katiki angban piman.
Lasi Arnam akang kaphere det ta kalek, ingthin kachiron anat ta chipabek dun nange.
La-anatsi nali khajana ta pidun not; piyok pu tene anali Arnam asal aphu-phang chiplangsi, labang asal tiki si doman.
Ingho bangpo kipi nange doman, bangpo anangyok pidun not; khajana kipi nange doman tene khajana pidun not; aro kaphere nange po yok pherenot; aman kipi nangepo yok aman pinot.
Ihut para ihutyok nengdok aparke, kamprek alam along nali jat kipi nange abam badi do yek; piyok pu tene inghosi bangyok nengdok doman, anang kanong yoksi pachokngo.

Piyok pu tene kangho donerek, arleng mariyek, chunghuyek, bang abihini hel amek soyek, lamehel chengsi kamprek kithan alamdo, tene “Nang kung abangyok abithang yok badi nengdok ngot,” bangso lamthe hlongman.
Nengdok ke nangkung abangyok panghohe; lasi nengdok si kanongpo pachokman.
Labang aparke, nali labang apor chithan undo ke, minon amek kijang para ahari kihlong apor chokngo; piyok pu tene konam ili krolo, la aporyok ke minon kijok ili adungo.
Anuwe jarlo damtango; katha-ang adung hetno; lasi wangot, kangting asal tikangsi, katha-ang ape-rik chi-ik minang.
Kangri-kangkrang aro jun-chopakner, kapamok-mok aro kapharlep-lep, ahul aro mek-thoro no-thoro, lamehel tikikesi, adap katha-ang kamichang ateng kengkam-chijor nang.
Manta nalike Hemphu Jisu Khristo yok chingchol, aro kar-ih kapachok aphan abithang a-ok long isita chihonjok ngek.
Ingho kikrol un-eh yong, anangyok nali enpon; manta lam kachihul abisar aphan ke kalek.
Inghone bakpo ahuwit abihini kicho phrotyok kikrolpo do; manta ingho krol un-eh yong, anang han-bapsi choman.
Ingho choman, anang kichochepo yok patharak ngek; ingho choche anang kicho po yok bisar oteyek; piyok pu tene Arnam anangyok chidengo.
Nang ke bang atoru yok bisar ka-ote, nang ke ingho ma? Anang abithang ahem ahemphu angot un tene arjak dunman lale ingho man. Aro anangyok pathirpiye, piyok pu tene Hemphu analiyok pathir un man.
Inghone bak ke inirsiyok prek adinyok mainot chotdo; kamprek ihut ke arniten ta inansi mainot do. Abang ten abithang aneng long kaphere wesi chinengtang ngot.

Inghosi me-at adin pusi mainot do, anang Hemphu aronsi bangpo mainot do; inghosi choman, anang Hemphu aronsi choman; piyok pu tene anang Arnam yok kardom piman; aro inghosi choche, anang Hemphu aronsi choche; aro Hemphu yok kardom piman.
Piyok pu tene ili kaita abithang aphan ke hrenghre, aro kaita abithang aphanke thithe.
Lasi, ili hrengman, tene Hemphu aronsi hrengman; aro thiyong ta, lasi Hemphu aronsi thiman; labang anat hrengman lale thiman, ili Hemphu pensido.
Piyok pu tene akithi aro akihreng hel Hemphu kachiplang yok Khristo thilo aro hreng phakngo.
Manta nang piyok abithang korte ayok bisar oteman? Nang korte ayok ke piyok pangwe detman? Piyok pu tene ili ahuwit ta Khristo bisar ka-ote anghol angot arjap dam hlonge.
Piyok pu tene lo-kangthir long wido, “Hemphu pudo, ne hrengsi do, ahuwit ta nengo tarhuksi nechirdom nange, aro abangten ade Arnam jortang pisi hoi chonange.”
Lasi laparake, ili abangten Arnam angot abithang alam alekha pihlonge.
Lasi wangot, ili ihut para ihutyok bisar ote nangne lo; manta nali ke, korte ango patukungek lale kijang thengtut chibi nangne pune chipachip mot.
Ne than-un do aro Hemphu Jisu amen yok krol pendo lake isi abihini ta akisim ingjong; manta ingho jipe abihini ta akisim pusi chirondo, anang phan labang abihini akisim chiplang man.
Nang kicho abihini para nang korte aneng doho man, tene nang aro nengdok pen kengkam chijorje yong. Ingho aphan Khristo thilo, anangyok nang kicho abihini parake panghoyek.
Lasi nali akimepo akangho puke pathan hlongek.
piyok pu tene kicho lale kijun parake Arnam-alongri chokche; manta dhorom kangthir, nengsam, aro Jiuli-Kangthir kipi nengrong, lamehel si Arnam-alongri long khanang.
Labang alam anat inghosi Khristo murkiya asal tikiman, anang Arnam nengdokman aro arleng hel angot aporman hlong tango.
Lasi nengsamjin, aro ihut para ihut yok kapangthur alam jibak do, lamehel mesone tikinang.
Kicho abihini anat ke Arnam asal pangho yek. Ahuwit abihini ingthir phlen; manta nang pot cholo labang nang kapangho yok tikilo;
nang korte yok patukung do, pu tene a-ok kicho, lale hor kijun, lale labadi kamprek hel tiki ke si kime.
Nang long kikrol do, bangpo nang Arnam angot pap hoi kicho aphan chibi. Ingho bangpo lam wang kabisar nange dode anangke bor-eh chok.
Manta hik-hak laksi cho, cholo pu tene ado batman, piyok pu tene labang kikrol ateng tikike yong; piyok pu tene jibak kikrol ateng tikike, bangpo ahuwit pap dolo.
Ili kikrol abang ke, ili bithangyok neng pangsamse si, kikrol un-eh helyok kirung un-eh abhar natsi rungdun nange.
Ili abangten ibithang akung abangyok dhorom kihari yok, anang kimeyok, anangyok neng pangsamot.
Piyok pu tene Khristo ta abithang aphan ke neng chipangsamse yongot; manta jibadi lo long wido, lake, “Nangyok nang kapatharak abang kapatharak alam nephuthak wango, ladisi chiplango;”
Piyok pu tene aporong ahuwit kiwi alam, ili chineng-otsi aro lo kiwi alamthe hel, ili nengkirung pon kachirli chiha ayok labang hel wilo.
Lateng nali isi anengpen isi alamthepen ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo Apa Arnam ayok jortang pinot,
la-anat Arnam yok jortang kipi isi alamthe kachiplang yok aro Apa ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo long nali inan lamthe isi chiplang une.
La-apot, Arnam jortang kapado aphan, jibadi Khristo naliyok chidengo, ladisi nalita ihut para ihutyok chidengot.

Piyok pu tene ne nali pudo, sar-lar hel kapang-ak hel kapachip yok, aro Bang-ajat helta Arnam kajinso anat anangyok jortang kipi yok, Arnam khanang pen Khristo sunnot kachiplang abang amurkiya chiplango.
La aphan lo long wido, “Lasi ne Bang-ajat hel asitem nangyok parklame; aro nang menpen lun lune.”
Aro puphak do, “O Bang-ajat hel, anang arleng hel pen nengrong chipado.”
Aro puphak ngo,“O ahuwit Bang-ajat hel, Hemphuyok parklam;”
Aro Jisoya pota pudo, “Anangsi Bang-ajat arleng helyok kapangdom yok thursi dame, Jesi po para labadi irong angjok wange; anangyok Bang-ajat hel meng penbo.”
Lasi nali Jiuli-Kangthir jortang pensi kachiha ongpon, lasi kachiha apharan Arnam nali long, kikrol ahuwit nengrong aro nengsam pawang nang.
Ei ne korte aro ingjirhel, nali lam ne bithangta krolsi do, nali ahuwit agiyan pensi, aro ihut para ihut yok ahari pipon thek si, akime agunhel chansi wangdo.
Layongta labang nali neng kachipurki aphan ne chihasi wilo, piyok pu tene Arnam kajinso neyok pilo.
Khristo Jisu Bang-ajat hel aphan katiki yok Arnam kime-alamthe long murkiya badi chiplangsi do, tangsi Bang-ajat hel kipi banta pomar Jiuli-Kangthir pen pangthirsi chideng pon une.
La-amun Arnam badi katiki alam ke, Jisu Khristo long ne aborai do.

Piyok pu tene asombhik asin aro bismat angtar hel anat, Jiuli-Kangthir apharan pen, Bang-ajat helyok kithan alam hel kimeng aphan, lamthe aro katiki long ne parasi Khristo jibak pachokngo, labang aparke prek jatsi kipuyok ne aha dode ye,
asombhik asin aro asot hel Arnam Jiuli apharan pen tikisi, Jerusalem aro Iliriyam long yok artingsi Khristo kime-alamthe me-atsi paharo.

Aro ne kar-ih ke Khristo alam karjuje athem long kime-alamthe kapahar yoksi, bang kapahar abhitipo athak kemke, manta jibadi lo long kiwi do, te “Ingho angot anang lamthe than damde lang, analisi theknge, aro inghosi arjuje lang, analisi abhu hlonge;”
Labang kichok badi, lasi, mehel athem Khristo amen pahar damde lang, labang athem long kime-alamthe paharyok ne mesosi tikilo.
Labang aronsi ne nalidung kiwang yok wang kitengdun ong abang dolo.
Manta minon ke labang ahol ne katikiyok aro athem hlonghle si, Ispain alongri kidamjong amun, nali dung ayok kidampen yok jokha anengkan para nineng ar-ih si do, piyok pu tene ne chihasi do,
ne Ispain yok kidam amun ne nali kilange anengdo, aro ango nalipen chithansi nengsam si, la aphel nali parasi lalongyok pango si nepon hlonge.
Minon ke kangthir adun hel aphan kapahar aphan Jerusalem yok damsi do.
Piyokte pu tene Mesidoniya aro Akhaya alongri arleng hel Jerusalem kido kangthir arleng hel asitem kicho kangwe hel aphan, bekso banta kapajirdam akime thek hlongo.

Piyok pu tene me-at chithek hlongo, aro anali adhar kicho chiplang hlongsi do. Piyok pu tene Bang-ajat hel jiuli alam anat analipen chingchongo, tene a-ok alam anat anali al-ki-en along adhar chosi dohlongdo.
La-apot lamehel asal patangsi, lake anali phan kirung banta bor-eh hel analiyok champi tangsi, ne nali dungsi Ispain ayok dame;
aro ne than undo, nali dung kidam amun Khristo bor-eh plengsi dame.
Ei korte aro ingjirhel, Hemphu Jisu Khristo amen pen, aro Jiuli-Kangthir nengdokpen nali nephan, Arnam angot pingkitsi nephan nengchipine meso katikiyok, nalidung chingdukdo,
Judiya long kithan alam kimengme hel para ne kijok-un yok, aro Jerusalem yok ne kapahar asal, la kangthir adun hel angot chideng pame nang,
lasi Arnam kar-ih pen nalidung nengrong damsi, nalipen neneng chipangsam bang.
Nengsam Arnam nali ahuwit long pado dun nang. Amen.
Kinkriya arongpe long Phoibi amen ili ingjirpeyok, kachikruk dikon pe, michang pusi nali thando,

lasi nali Hemphu long anangyok chingden, anang kangthir adun kamichang pe aro anang potsi kanange doman anang sal long nali rap dunot, lasi ne anang phan nalidung kapingkit yok chingduk do; piyok pu tene anangta ako-ong arlengyok aro neyokta wang kirapdun arlengpe dolo.
Jisu Khristo long ne sal katiki alok Priskila pe pen Akila poyok kardom pinot,
aro anali ne jiubong aphan aduk pahlonghle yok anali angphun ta kachihi; ne det kalek, Bang-ajat kachikruk helta anali yok kardom pajirdo.
Anali hem kachingrum kachikruk yok bor-eh batdun. Khristo aronsi Asia alongri kiwangcheng athe ninengdok alok Epentas po, anangyok kardom pinot.
Mary peyok kardompajir, anang nali nat ako-ong chipaduk hapsi tikilo.
Adunhel asitem amen-anang kachitha-ang, aro neyok ta angot Khristo long kiwang, nedon aro akrol kido alok Andronikas po aro Juniyas po, analiyok bor-eh bat dun.
Hemphu long nenengdok alok Ampliyatas poyok kardom pajir.
Khristo long hali aduk kirap alokjor Urbanas po yok, aro nenengdok alok Satakhiyas po yok bor-eh pinot.
Khristo long honjat karchal tang Apeles poyok bor-eh pajir. Aristobalas po ahem abang yokta bor-eh pajir.
Ne don mat Hemphu long kido Herodiyan poyok ta kardom pajir. Narkisas po ahem arleng Hemphu long do, analiyok bor-eh pajir.
Hemphu long meso sal katiki Triphena aro Triphosa po yok kardom bor-eh pi, Parsis nengdokpe yokta Hemphu long ako-ong chipaduk ngo, anangyok kardom pajir.
Hemphu long karwaltang kachini det Ruphus po yok aro ne aipe ateng anang aipe yokta kardom pajir.
Anali pen kido Asinkritas po, Phlegon po, Hermes po, Patrobas po, Hermas po aro anali pen kido korte hel yokta kardom pajir.
Philologos po pen Juliya pe, Neriyas po pen anang angjirpe aro Olimpas po aro anali pen kido ahuwit kangthir arleng hel yokta kardom pajir.
Nali kangthir kachimung pen kardom pajir. Ahuwit Khristo kachikruk hel parata naliyok kardom pajirdo.
Ei korte aro ingjirhel, ne naliyok chingduk do, naliyok potsi paklang hlongo, bangpo para kamprek dosi ingho tikang phlung man aro neng panghoman, analiyok chini, anali parake chiterekne do.
Piyok pu tene labadi arleng hel Hemphu Khristo murkiya asal tikike si, abithang apok aturu asalsi tikiman; aro kapadok alam aro karjume-at alampen nengkangthir arleng helyok aneng chobelpon man.
Piyok pu tene nali kithan alam kimeng a-odi ahuwit chisang detno. Apot, ne nali anat nengrong chipado do; layong ta nali akime alam agiyan, aro kangting alam archal phrot, bangposi ne ar-ih do.
Nengsam apharan Arnam apharan pensi si-ik poyok nali kengpak arlo pado ye. Ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo kajinso nali pen padonang.
Neyok kirap alokjor Timothi po, aro ne jat Lusiyas pe, Jason po aro Sosopatar po, analiyok kardom nali hlodo;
labang lo-kiwi ne Tartiyas po, Hemphu long naliyok bor-eh nali batdo.
Ne pen kachikruk don ajaldung kachingden apor kido Gaiyas po naliyok kardom wang hlodo. Labang arongpe puru aphu-phang Erastas po aro ili Kartas korte po naliyok bor-eh nali hlodo.
Ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo kajinso nali ahuwit long pado nang.
Minon ke aporong para butisi kibi, labang kabutisit agiyan alamthe atengsi chiklango aro non-jong ke ne kime-alamthe aro Jisu Khristo yok kapahar ponpen si nali apharan pahlong unman,
manta non-jong ke aporong Arnam kithan alam badi turki hel kiwi lo alamthe ateng si chiklansi, or-eh len Arnam kithan alamthe ateng, krolsi kimeng hel kiwan ayok, ahuwit ason ango pahar ponsi do—
labang ihutdet agiyan chot Arnam yok, Jisu Khristo pensi anang jortang mo-moyok padonang. Amen.
Arnam kar-ih atengsi Jisu Khristo kataram adun Pol po aro korte Sosthenis po,
Korinthiya long kido Arnam kachikruk, Khristo Jisu long pangthir si karwal tang kangthir adun, anali, aro ahuwit athem long, lake ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo amen kapingkit abang ahuwit abangyok.
Ili Apa Arnam aro Hemphu Jisu Khristo para naliyok kajinso aro nengsam pado nang.
Arnam kajinso Khristo Jisu long nali pilo, lasi ne nali phan arni ne Arnamyok kardom pajirsi do;
piyok pu tene ahuwit lam kithanthek aro ahuwit agiyan apuru nali sitem Khristo labadi si ong-ongo,
piyok pu tene Khristo long hakhi kipi ahuwit alam, nali sitem chipmo—
lasi nali isi bor-eh parata chipangbobe si, ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo kachiklang arniyok inghong dingsi do.
Anang kijut arniyok naliyok parjapsi nali biye; lasi ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo kiwang arniyok nali ado weye.
Arnam ke kimeng loi-loi; anang parasi, anang Aso ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo pen kachingchong yok, naliyok Arnam taram tango.

Minon ke ei korte aro ingjirhel, ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo amenpen naliyok chingduk do, lake nali ahuwit neng isine lam chithan, aro nali sitem kachiphat weye, manta isidet asap aro isidet kabisar aneng chingbarnot.
Piyok pu tene, ei korte aro ingjirhel, nali lam Kloipe hel parasi arju hlongo, lake nali sitem ahul do.
Ne kipuye alam ke lalo, nali abangten ta pudo, “ne ke Pol po arleng,” ihut ke puman, “ne ke Apolos po arleng,” aro ihut po ke pudo, “ne ke Pitor po arleng,” bang ihut ke pudo, “ne ke Khristo arleng.”
Khristo yok chiphat det no ma? Pol poyok nali phan kros long kitar ma? Lale Pol po amen pensi nali baptist kachiplang ma?
Nali nemen pensi baptist chiplango puke, kaita thanenot,
lasi ne, Krispas po aro Gaiyas po aparke nali sitem kai yok ta baptist otete yong apot, Arnam yok kardom pido.
Aro (ne Stiphen po ahem bang yokta baptist otelo, la aparke prekyok baptist otete yong ngot, ne chithan un-eh yong.)

Piyok pu tene baptist ka-ote yok kalek, kime-alamthe kapahar aphan si Khristo netolo; manta Khristo kros alamthe akijol chiplange mene pusi, munusi kachimangkai agiyan pen ke kapahar yok netolte yong.
Piyok pu tene labang kros alamthe kiprel asohel aphan ke pasotonga, manta kijoktang adeng ili ke, aro iliyok Arnam khanangpo pensi jokngo.
Piyok pu tene lo long wido, “Ne agiyan kido abangyok agiyan po panghoye, aro akireset po akire akijol ote ye.”
Agiyan kido po daklong do? Kanong paklang po ke daklong do? Labang owe po kithan thek dak long do? Arnam ke pirthepe agiyan sotonga ingholhe yong ma?
Piyok pu tene Arnam agiyan long, pirthepe agiyan pen Arnam yok chinine yongot, kapahar kasotonga parasi kikrol hel yok pajok yok Arnam nengsamo.
Piyok pu tene Jihudi hel ke asin lang man, aro Grik hel ke agiyan bisarman,
manta ili ke Khristo yok kros long kitar alamthe si pahar do, Jihudi hel aphan ke patukungo, aro Bang-ajat aphanke sotonga lo,
manta Jihudi lale Grik padonang, kataram tang hel aphan ke Arnam apharan do aro Arnam khanang agiyan peno.
Piyok pu tene Arnam kasotonga ke arleng yokta agiyan do chot, aro Arnam ki-un-eh ke arleng yokta ajakong dochot.
Ei korte aro ingjir hel, nali bithang Arnam kataram alam chiron lang, a-ok ateng ke agiyan, ajakong dokeng, aro kithe-kiding arleng ako-ong ingjong.
Manta Arnam agiyan chot abangyok kapatharak aphansi, pirthepe sotonga abangyok arwalo; aro ajakong dokeng abang yok kapatharak yok, Arnam bharasot ki-un-eh abangyok arwalo;
lasi Arnam pirthepe long akibek ajat yoksi aro katharak abangyok arwalo, layong ta kalek, abithangyok kachipangwe phrot helyok, aro pirthepe long kanangne apot yok paprel aphan arwal lo,
lasi Arnam amahang semsemsi munusi majit aborai do un-eh ye,
Jisu Khristo long, anangsi ili long kiwang len jiuli, ingho Arnam para ili phan agiyan chokngo, aro dhorom kangthir, aro pangthiro, aro kijok tang pahlong pilo,
latengsi, lo long wisi pudo, “Inghone bakpo kaborai aneng do, pu tene anang Hemphu long aborai chipado.”
Ei korte aro ingjir hel, konam ne nalidung yok kidam, ne damsi Arnam neng-hong alamhel akarsit agiyan alamthe pen ke paharhe yong.
Piyok pu tene ne khanang pachip wensi, nali sitem kido amun prek alamthe than thekthe yong, manta Jisu Khristo yok kros along taro kipu alamthe detsi pahardo.
Aro ne sitem than un-eh ye natsi aro kaphere, aro la-an klem si kido hlong.
Ne kithan aro ne kapahar alamthe arleng agiyan pen kalek, manta Jiuli pen aporman paklangsi aro apharan pensi kipahar,
lasi nali kikrol ke munusi agiyan penke kalek manta Arnam apharan pensi kido.
Yongta ili thek-re tang arleng hel asitem agiyan alamthe thanman; lake, labang owe po, lale labang awelong kiprel adeng kilangpon phu-phang hel agiyan pen ke kalek.
Manta hali Arnam, akarsit aro kabutisit acho alam owehel along aporong parasi ili jortang kipi pon aphan honjok wensi kibi alamthesi than do.
Labang agiyan alam, bangpo owepo kilangpon phu-phang hel kaita labang abhu hlong un-eh yongot; piyok pu tene, kitheknang tene, anali jortang kithe Hemphu yok kros long tartelo hoi.

Manta labang alam lo long kiwi do, “Mek pen jipe thekthe yongot, ano pen jibak arjuje yongot, aro arleng angthin long jibak hlong dunde yongot, Arnam ke anangyok nengdok kido abang aphan la ahuwit honjok ngo”—
labang alam Ajiuli pensi ili ngo pachiklango; piyok pu tene Jiuli ke ahuwit parnuk si, torol pon unman.
Piyok pu tene arleng aneng alam, arlengpo long kido ajiupo aparke, arleng hel asitem ingho chithan une? Labadisi Arnam alamthe ta Arnam-Ajiuli aparke, prek kaita chithan un-eh.
Arnam ke jinso si haliyok jibak pilo, mehel kithan un yok, ili pirthepe ajiu hlonghlesi, Arnam para kiwang ajiuli hlongo.
Aro hali lamehel alamthe, arleng agiyan pen kapachirli lamthepen hali thanthesi, Ajiuli kapachirli lamthe pensi, ajiuli alamthe pharlepsi ajiuli pen kido-kithak abangyok thanpon man.
Ingho a-ok aneng arleng ke Arnam ajiuli abor-eh alam hlonghle, piyok pu tene anali phan labangke sotonga, aro anali acho abhu pahlong un-eh, piyok pu tene ajiuli atengsi bangpo mar pharli ponman.
Ingho ajiulipen kidopo ke ahuwit yok pharli phrot unman, aro anali labang kithanpo alam ihut ta turki dunde.
Piyok pu tene, lo long kipu badi, “Hemphu yok pachirli ayok, anang nengke ingho abhu hlongdun une? Manta ili Khristo aneng do.
Ei korte aro ingjirhel, ajiuli kido arlengyok kipu badi ne naliyok lam than un-eh, manta nali a-ok pen arleng helyok kipu badi, Khristo yok kikrol oso helyok kipu badisi nali than hlong do.
Ne naliyok an kangtang ke pachoche si, chulangsi nali kipajun; piyok pu tene la-amun ke nali kicho un-eh kido. Minon hok ta chihonjok un-eh lang,

Piyok pu tene nali minon hok ta a-ok anengsi dojong dolang. Piyok pu tene nali sitem nenglong mek kachiso aro ahul dolong do, aro lasi nali ke a-ok arleng, aro pirthepe arleng badi kengkam chijorje yong ma?
Piyok pu tene inghone bak ke, “Ne ke Pol po arleng,” aro ihut ke pu man, “Ne ke Apolos po arleng,” chipu si nali pirthepe arleng badi kalek yong ma?
Laparake Apolos po ke inghote? Aro Pol po ke ingho te? Murkiya si, inghoyok Hemphu abangten yok kipek atengsi kikrol pilo.
Ne ke elo, Apolos po ke lang wang dungo, manta Arnam si pathe-padingo.
Lasi ki-eh arleng po ta khanang kalek, lang wang kidung po ta khanang tikilo lata kalek, manta kapathe ke Arnam si khanang pathe-padingo.
Ki-eh arleng ihut aro ihut po ke lang wang kidung arleng, la bang-hini aron ta isidet, aro abangten ta anali katiki badisi adat hlonge.
Piyok pu tene ilike Arnam amurkiya, inansi tikido; nali bithang ke Arnam abithar, aro Arnam ke hem kikempo.

Arnam kajinso neyok pilo, lateng si hem kikem thekchot po badisi, ne bhitipo pangningo, aro labang athak bangke kemdun phak ngo. Abang ten pot badi kem ponman bangpo abangten ta meso pachilang pen nange.
Piyok pu tene ihut ke jibak ke abhiti pangningo, labang aparke kamprek abhiti kaita jat pangning un-eh; labang abhiti ke Jisu Khristo.
Minon ke bangpo abhitipo athaksi, ser, rupa, akimechot arlong manik, lale thengpe, phalang, nara, pensi inghone bak kemman, tene abangten katiki asal chiklang detne—

abangten katiki asal pot badilo chiklang detne, piyok pu tene la Arni ke paklang detne, piyok pu tene la arnike melong chiklange; aro abangten katiki asal pot badi lo, me longsi bangpo aporman paklange.
Labang abhiti athak kikem inghone bak katiki asalpo ri-len, tene kikem adat hlonge.
Kikem asal katiki hel sek det, tene anang prel le; kikem arlengpo joknge, manta anang bithang melong para kijok badisi joknge.
Nali si Arnam ahem, aro Arnam-Ajiuli nalipen doman, labangpo nali thekthe yong ma?
Inghone bak ke Arnam ahempo pangho, tene Arnam anangyok ta panghoye. Piyok pu tene Arnam ahempo kangthir, aro nali si labang ahempo.
Nali abithang yok chichobel lek. Nali sitem inghone bak ke, labang owepo alamthe pen agiyan kidopo pusi chironman, tene anang agiyan kihlong ayok sotonga chiplangot.
Piyok pu tene labang pirthepe agiyan ke, Arnam aphan ke sotonga. Piyok pu tene lo long wido, “Anang pirthepe agiyan hel anali kasotonga pensi nep unman.”
aro puphak do, “Hemphu ke agiyan kido arleng aneng angthin hel, anali kachingje hel akijol pusi than det un.”
Lasi munusi phu-phang anat aborai doyek. Piyok pu tene ahuwit abihini nali phansi.
Lake Pol po, Apolos po, Pitor po lale pirthepe, lale nali jiubong, lale kithi-kijang lale minon jong, lale monphel yok—ahuwit nali phansi,
aro nali Khristo long do, aro Khristo ke Arnam along do.
Haliyok arleng hel Khristo asal katiki amurkiya pusi aro Arnam kabutisit acho alam apuru salchakpo pune pachiron nang.
Layok ta, apuru salchak ke kikrol phlen arleng chiplang nange.
Manta nali parasi, lale munusi abisar ahem parasi ne bisar doyongta, bangpo nephan ke akibek alam pusi chiron do. Ne bithang yok ta bisar chingholhe.
Ne bithang yok ke ado chithek the; la-amun ne lalong ado weke kalek yong. Hemphu, anangsi neyok bisar ote ye.

Lasi Hemphusi kangting kabuti alam hel katha-ang yok wane, aro angthin kachirhep hel pachiklange, anang wangwe leng, apor ango ke jat bisar ote yek. Laparake abang ten Arnam parasi kamichang aporman hlonge.

Ei korte aro ingjirhel, potsi “Lo long kiwi abi-pun alamthe hel arkan nangne,” labang kachirli alam hali para hlongsi, nali kaita ihut yok ado kolsi prek ihut po yok aborai do yek, lasi nali phan, nebithang aro Apolos po yok parhlansi, la ahuwit alam nali thano.

Piyok pu tene ingho nangyok paprek man? Bang parake hlonghle yong, ladi abihini, lale nanglong pot te do? Hlonghle yongta, nang kihlong badi aborai piyok do pon do? Aro hlong yongta, nang bor-eh kihlonghle badi piyok te aborai do?

Nali minon jongsi nali kanange hel chok krengo! Nali hem kime chiplango! Hali weyong ta nali recho chiplang uno! Nalipen halita recho chiplang une, lasi nali aserengsi recho chiplang un tene kime kido.

Piyok pu tene, ne chirondo, hali Arnam adun hel, haliyok ahuwityok aphel, kithiyok kahonjok arleng badi pachiklango; piyok pu tene pirthepe ango, lake Arnam tharlon aro munusi ango haliyok kijong ren aden chiplang hlongdo.
Khristo anat hali mango lo, manta nali Khristo po long agiyan do, hali ke un-eh pholo, manta nali ajakong dokengo. Nali aman kido arlengo, manta halike mahang welo.
Minon jongsi hali ke kangchir aro kalang-ik si do, hali ke pe-rik weklong, aro kipam kitheng ong, aro ahem wepho lo,
aro hali abithang aripen sal tiki hlongdo. Konam hali patharak, yongta bor-eh pidun do; konam aduk hlongdo, hali chihido;
konam ingnek hu do, hali ke jinsosi thando. Hali ke bharasot kichelap, ahuwit abihini kiti alobo, labadi minon hok dohlong do.
Ne naliyok bangpomar alam wisi nali patharak hlongdo ladi kalek, manta ne nengdok aso pusi atot kachipado alam nali thando.
Piyok pu tene Khristo long nali hajar kep ateng kapaklang phu-phang do, layong ta nali Apa akong-ong kalek; piyok pu tene Khristo Jisu kime-alamthe parasi nali plang si, ne so apun chiplango.
Lasi ne nali chingduk do, lapara ke, nali neyok chirlinot.

Piyok pu tene labang aronsi, Hemphu long ne kikrol nengdok aso Timothi po yok nali dungyok tolo, ne ahuwit athem ahuwit kachikruk long jibak pachirli do, la atengsi Khristo badi ke ne ahuwit angton anang naliyok paklang phaknge.
Manta nali angkhan ke, ne nalidung wangwelo pusi chiron si aborai chiplangdo.
Manta Hemphu aneng do tene, ne nali dungyok dam dapme, aro la-apor labadi kaborai arleng hel kipu alam det kalek, manta anali apharan pensi pochaknge.
Piyok pu tene Arnam-alongri lamdet ke kalek, manta apharan pensi chokman.
Nali pot badi anengdo? Ne nali dungyok tokok ensi damnang ma, lale nengdok pen kachipabek ajiuli pensi dam nange?

Khanangsi karju alam ke, nalidak kangho donerdo pusi arju hlongdo aro labadi kidoner Arnam kachinine arleng hel asitem ta ladi kidoner arju hlonghle yong; piyok pu tene inghone bak ke abithang anang ai amupe pen ido pusi neyok wang thando.
Aro nalike aborai dosi! Nali neng dohohe yong ma? Ingho ladi kangho katiki po yok nali sitem para terekngot.
Ne ke, abang po pen nali do dunde yong ta, ne ajiuli pensi do dunsi, kidokuk badi si, labadi katiki arlengpo alam bisar pido,
ili Hemphu Jisu amen pen ingho ladi tikido, anang phuthak ke ladi pachip tangdo. Konam nali ne ajiuli penta chingrum, aro ili Hemphu Jisu apharan pen ne jiu ta dodundo,
labadi arleng yok, anang a-ok po kipaprel aphan, si-ik arideng champidet not, lake Hemphu kiwang arni si anang jiu ke pajoknge.
Nali bangpo aborai kido po akime kalek. Bekso athengkur ta him adum po ajaldungsi pangkang man, labangpo nali thekthe ma?

Nali jibadi athengkur ingwe dungsi do, labadi akimi him adumpo kachiplang yok ke, aban athengkur po pangthir det nok. Piyok pu tene Kijoktang-kamai arni Bherabik Aso lake Khristo, anangyok buli arkli tango.
Lasi, pap mat-mat aban athengkur pen kalek, lake kachilangset aro kasotonga mat-mat athengkur pen ke kalek, manta thengkur kangwe onga ahim, lake nengsik wedet aro khanang po pensi kamai mainot nang.
Nali dak kangho kidoner arleng pen ke chilok nangne pusi naliyok lopen kiwi—
manta labang kipusi, la pirthepe long kidoner, lale alot kido aro keng-ari samphrat, lale agoya kachirdom arleng pen jatsi chilok nangne, ladi ke kalek; ladi tene bang pirthepe para tikang hlonge.
Manta kikrol korte pusi kachitha-ang jipe ihutpo kidoner, alot, agoya kachirdom, bangyok patharaksi, cho-junsi kangri, lale keng-ari samphrat kido abang. Anali pen cho-jun dun nangne pusi kiwi.
Piyok pu tene bang mokol arlengyok bisar kipi nange ne pot do? Kachikruk arlo arlengyok nali bisar otete ma?
Bang mokol arleng yok bisar Arnam si ote man. Lo long ke pudo, “Nali sitem para la kangho arleng po yok terek.”
Nali ihutyok lang un-eh si prek ihut po ado kipi pene bak alamthe do tene, anang kangthir adun po adung chi-ojorje si, kangting arleng hel ango ka-ojor dam nali sitem inghonebak doma?

Lale, kikrol kangthir arleng pirthepe yok ke bisar ote une, bangpo nali chithan un-eh yong ma? Aro nali parasi pirthepe yok bisar ote-un, tene akibek alamthe so yok bisar ka-ote yok, nali un-eh ye ma?
Ili Arnam tharlon helyok ta bisar ote un— tene ili ajiu kachipho alamyok bisar pi un-eh ma?
La-apot ado alam bisar ka-ote me do, pu tene, kachikruk kachidengde abang yok bisar angholpo long pangninge ma?
Nali kachitharak meme alam nali than do. Korte hijan-jan asitem ihut kikrol korte po ihut korte yok lam kapamet un agiyan arleng nali sitem ihut ta ingjong ma?
Manta kikrol hijan-jan ado ojorsi— kikrolkre hel ango si chi-ojor damman?

Khanang ke nali ihut para ihut yok kachi-ojor detsi, nali ahuwit along chipangho do. Layok ke nali ka-ongnai piyok te chihihe? Aro abithang yok kangho kachiplang yok piyok te nang bithangyok aduk chihihe?
Manta bangpo tikike si, nali bithangsi ongnai tikido si, ladet kalek, kortehel ayokta pangho pondo.
Akangho hel ke Arnam-alongri long bor-eh hlonghle ye, labang nali chithan un-eh ma? Nali bithang chichobelek! Kidoner, agoya kachirdom, bang apiso kiphat, kaselep, kachilem,
kanghuhel, amek alop abang, hor kijun abang, kapatharak abang, lale dakuwal abang ke Arnam longri long bor-eh hlonghle ye.
Aro nali angkhan ke labadi arleng si kido. Manta minon ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo amen pensi aro ili Arnam-Ajiuli pensi naliyok chamo, pangthir phlen chiplango, aro dhorom kangthir pusi alekhot eno.
“Nephan ke ahuwit abihini ta tiki un,” manta ahuwit abihinita ne phan akime kalek. “Nephan ke ahuwit abihini ta tiki un,” manta ne isi penta aturu chiplangple ye.
“Apok aphan si cho-jun do, aro cho-jun aphan si apok po do;” Arnam la hini yokta pangwe ye. Layong ta abangpo kidoner aphan kalek, manta Hemphu aphan si do.
Aro Arnam abithang ajakong pen Hemphu yok kithi para paburo, aro anang ajakong pensi ili yokta pabure.
Nali abang po ke Khristo abang po arorem, labang nali chithan un-eh ma? Lasi ne Khristo abangpo ensi, aro chopakner abang pen do ye ma? Ladi jat chiplangek!
Kachopak arloso pe yok kachilok arlengke bangpe pen isi abang chiplangman, labang po nali chithan un-eh yong ma? Piyok pu tene alamthe do, “Labang-hini isi abang chiplange.”
Manta inghone bak Hemphu pen chilokngo tene anang pen ajiuli isi chiplangman,
kachopak tikangot! Arleng ihut potsi apap tiki, labang hel anang abangpo anglang pho yongta kachopak apap ke anang abangpo yok ado dopensi tikiman.
Lale, nang bangpo ke Arnam parasi kihlong aro abang nang abithang kalek, Jiuli-Kangthir nang neng arlo kido ahem, labang nali chithan un-eh ma?
Piyok pu tene naliyok ador pisi namo; lasi nali abang po long Arnam yok jortang pado.
Minon ke nali wisi kitol alam anat, angkipu dun nange ke, “penso ihut ke arloso ihut yok ki-ot-esi mechot.”
Manta bang pen kangho kidoner hlonghle yok, abangten apenso abithang apiso pa-en nang; aro abangten arloso ta abithang ihut apihan pa-en nang.
Apihan po anang apiso peyok ahuwit pahlong nang, aro ladisi apisope ta apihanpo anang kapahlong nange ahuwit papinang.
Piyok pu tene apiso pe anang abangpo along jatsi apharan ingjong, manta apihan posi do; ladisi apihan pota anang abangpo along jatsi apharan ingjong, manta apiso pesi do.

Nali ihut para ihut yok pahlonghle ke doyek; pingkit aneng kipiyok bang-hinita isi chirwalsi angkhan adin prek do-une; la-aphel nali agar-ari chipangdom un-eh pho anat, si-ik para naliyok honjat kitong hlonghle ayok, wang phaksi chilok une.
Labang ke hawangsi nali pido, nali kithankuk alam ke kalek.
Ahuwit arleng ne badine chiplang un, pu tene, ne bangpo si aneng do. Manta abangten prek-prek, labadi abangten Arnam para bor-eh pilo.
Apihan, lale apiso en-eh lang abang ke aro himepe helyok ne than bang, anali ne kido badi do-un tene, ahudet kidosi mechot.
Manta anali agar-ari chipangdom un-eh, pu tene jorme-pachihap nang; piyok pu tene kar-ih aneng kidoyok ke jorme-pachihap si akime.
Manta jorme-kachihap arleng helyok ne than do— ne kalek, manta Hemphu pido— apiso pe anang apihan poyok chiseyek,
(manta apiso pe tikang tene, anang pihan en-eh detne pado nang, lale apihan po pen pachilok phak nange), aro apihan po ta apiso peyok pachise nangne.
Kido-er abang aphan ke — Hemphu kalek, nesi than do— inghone bak kikrol arleng kikrolkre apiso do pu tene, aro anang apihan po pen kidoyok chikeng do, tene apihan po anangyok pachise nangne.
Aro inghone bak arloso pe ihut kikrolkre apihan do pu tene, aro anang pen kidoyok chikeng do, tene anangyok pachise nangne.

Piyok pu tene kikrolkre apihan po apiso pe parasi ingthir phlen no, aro kikrolkre apiso pe ta anang apihan po parasi ingthir phlenno. Ladi dode pu tene, anali so hel ta akisim chiplango hoi, manta minon ke anali ingthiro.
Layongta kikrolkre alok ihut tikangjang, tene patikang nang; labang alam anat akorte po lale angjirpe aturu natne kachingnak badi donangne. Labang ke Arnam neng kangsam kapado aphansi naliyok taramo.
Ei apiso pe, nang pihan po yok pajok une ma un-eh, ladi alam nang thek nange? Ei apihan po, nang ta nangpiso peyok kapajok une ma un-eh, labang alam nang kithek nange do.
Jipe yongta, Hemphu inghoyok pot badi nang pachakngo, aro potbadi apunsi Arnam taram tango, latengne nang arjapmot. Labangsi ahuwit kachikruk along ta ne abi-pun paklang do.
Inghone bak sunnot kachiplang apun si Arnam taramo ma? Anang sunnot kido asin pen parjak nang. Inghone bak sunnot kangwe apun si Arnam taramo ma? Anang yok sunnot ote nangne lo.
Sunnot ka-ote po chakche pho, aro ka-otete po ta chakche ye; manta Arnam kithan alam kimengsi khanang.
Nali abang tenta kataram apun pot badi kido, ladi pado nang.
Nang aturu kido apunsi Arnam taramo ma? Labang anant chiron nek. Nang kijoktang nang pahlong yongta, angoyok ke minon apor mechot sal-lap mot.
Piyok pu tene ingho yoksi aturu apunsi Hemphu long taramo, anang Hemphu long kijoktang arleng. Labadisi, inghoyok kijoktang apunsi taramo, anang Khristo amurkiya lo.
Naliyok Arnam ador pisi namtango; munusi aturu doye not.
Ei korte aro ingjirhel, abang ten yok pot badi apunsi taramo, nang labang apun Arnam pen do not.
Minon ke so-arjang hel alam ke, Hemphu para kithan alam hlongle yong, manta ne kachiron badi, ne Hemphu kajinso kihlong arleng badi nangthan do.
La-apot chirondo, aduk kiwang adin langsi, anang minon kido badi kidojong si mechot.
Nang piso pe pen kachingnak alam do ma? Kachiphlok yok chironek. Nang piso chi-en-eh lang ma? Piso pe ki-en yok chironek.
Manta nang jorme-chihap yongta, nang pap tikike yong, aro so-aloso jorme-chihap yongta, nangpap tikike yong. Layong ta ingho jorme-chihap abang ajiu long duk-lak chitonge, aro naliyok ne jinso do.
Ei kortehel, ne pubang, la-arnipe adung het wangsi do. Minon parake apiso kido hel apiso kangwe badi,
aro inghosi surusi do, anali kasurure badi; ingho si nengrong kido anali nengrong kangwe badi; aro ingho si nam-man, anali bihini hel kangwe badi,
aro inghosi bharasot abihini chijor chihrep man, anali labang pomar chijor-chihrep penpe badi. Piyok pu tene labang bharasot athok-agor chipharlep jongsi do.
Nali kachiron-ir ke dodesi, joktang si kido yok ne nali ar-ido. Piso kangwe po pot badi Hemphu aneng pangsam-une, Hemphu asal tingki un;
manta piso ki-en po pirthepe abihini helyok, lake apiso pe yok pot badi aneng pangsam unbo, labang abihini hel yoksi chironchot man,

aro anang kachipek aneng ta kamprek do. Aro apihan kangwe arloso pe aro so-arloso pe abang ke Hemphu asal tingki un, lasi anali abang aro ajiu longta kangthir doman; manta apihan ki-en arlosope pirthepe, lake anang pihanpo yok pot badi neng pangsam unbo, labang si chironman.
Nali angphun long arik kihom ayok kalek, manta nali ke me-at arkel-pasi, aro kikrolthip anengpen Hemphu along ar-ihne dopon, labang po nali kime aphan nalithano.

Layongta inghone bak anangyok pibo pusi ahorthin thontang yongta, menso akisarpelo apot anang bangpeyok lam chirkel pameme yong pusi chironman, aro bangpe yoksi jorme-pachihap pen nange, tene anang pot ahisa, bangpo patikinot; lalong pap ingjong, anali jorme-pachihap nang.
Manta inghosi aneng pachipsi, abithang pot katiki aneng do si, jorme-pachihap helo pusi, anang phan ahorthin kithontang menso peyok mensone kapadoyok neng pachipmo, anang ta kime tiki ye;
laparake ingho anangpen jorme-pachihap yok kido mensope yok jorme-pachihap man, anang kime tikiman; aro jorme-pachihap welo pusi doman lake mechot tikiye.

Apihan po konbak arniyok hreng si doman, la-arniyok apiso pe chingnaksi doman; manta apihan po thilo tene, anang chiphloksi, Hemphu long detsi kikrol pe anang kikrol adak ingho poyok ahisa, labang po pen jorme-chihap une.
Manta layok ke, ladisi do une pu tene, ne kachiron ateng ke anang bor-eh chok. Aro ne ta chironman lake Arnam-Ajiuli long do hlongdo.
Minonke agoya helyok kangton alamke: ili than undo, “ili abang tenta agiyan do.” Agiyan posi aborai wanman, manta nengdok ke dhorom kihari wanman.
Inghosi bekso thek pusi chiron do, tene anang thek phlen nange ateng jatsi thekthe.
Manta inghosi Arnam yok nengdok, anangyok si anang kachini arleng.
Agoya along kangton hel chojun alamthe ke: “pirthepe long prek agoya ingjong,” aro lasi “ihut Arnam aphuthak prek arnam ingjong pen,” bangpo ili than undo.
Piyok pu tene, ethakpe long lale pirthepe athak arnam amen kihlong abang do yongta— lalong ako-ong “arnam hel” aro ako-ong “ahemphu hel” do—

yongta ili phan ke ihut Apa, Arnam do, anang parasi ahuwit abihini chiplangman, aro anang phansi ilita hlongdo, aro ihut Hemphu, Jisu Khristo do, anang parasi ahuwit abihini aro anang pensi, ili do hlongdo.

Manta ahuwit arleng ladi agiyan ingjong. Piyok pu tene angkhan arlengke aporong agoya hel yok kimeng minon hok dojong do apot, anali agoya kangton abihini pusi cho-jun man; aro anali kachiron aneng, un-eh pho, lasi sim-man.
“Kicho abihinike iliyok Arnam angoyok chideng ponpe ye.” Ili choche yongta ili inghohe, aro cho yongta ili kihari wepho.
Manta nali labang ajakong chipangtang un-eh arleng hel aphan patukung athengtut pachiplang hlongek, bangpo meso chilangben.

Piyok pu tene nang agiyan dosi, nangyok ke inghone bak agoya kachirdom ahem long cho-jun kangning dun thek hlong, tene anang kikrol un-eh apot, anang chironsi agoya kangton hel cho-jun ayok aha dode ye ma?
Lasi, korte po aphansi Khristo thilo, labang krol un-eh anenglong doho jinsi, nang agiyan parasi panghoman.
Manta konam nang hembang korte helyok aro ado kikol apap tikisi, lahel kachiron un-eh anenglong aduk piye, nali Khristo yok pap tikiman.
Lasi, kicho abihini hel ne korte yok aduk pawang, tene kortepo aduk kiwangwe aphan ne aro jatsi a-ok choche.
Ne ke kijoktang kalek ma? Ne kangthir adun ihut kalek ma? Ne Hemphu Jisu yok thek hlonghle yong ma? Aro Hemphu long katiki angban nali kalek yong ma?
Ne bang hel aphan ke ihut kangthir adun kalek yongta, manta naliphan ke chiplang do; piyok pu tene Hemphu long ne kangthir adun asap nalilo.
Neyok bisar ka-ote yok, ne angkipu nange alam lalo.
Kicho kijun yok hali apharan ingjong ma?
Prek-prek kangthir adun hel, Hemphu akortehel aro Pitor po, anali badi apiso chi-enpon-wor yok apharan hali ingjong ma?
Lale, kabunsi asal katiki apharan ne aro Barnabas po detsi ingjong ma?

Ladi arleng inghote do, anang abithang chipanghon si sonturi asal tikiman ma? Inghote rihanthu barik chi-esi labang athe kichoche arleng do? Inghote bik chorong panghreng si, anali chulang kijunje arleng do?
Ne labang alam pomar munusi abi-pun badi nalithan hlongdo ma? Kanong along labang hel alam pupe yong ma?
Piyok pu tene Mosi po kanong long wido, “Nali sok kapasi amun chorong hel angho khanghara bamek.”

Lale Arnam chorong alo helyok detsi chiron man ma? Lale, ahuwit patengsi hali phan ta pupe yong ma? Akiwang alam ke hali phan si labang alamthe kiwi, piyok pu tene inghosi chorong panong-man, anang chiha dingsi chorong panong hlong-man aro inghosi sok pasi, anang bangpo abhak kihlongdun chihasi sok pasiman.
Hali nali phan jiuli akime achili ripsi, nali para kanange abihini hel pahlong, tene bangpo akithe abihini chohang hlongdo ma?

Nalithak bang hel labadi kihlongdun abhak doman, tene hali layok ta ongchot do deye ma? Layongta hali labang abhak kihlong yok chohanghe yong, manta Khristo kime-alamthe kapahar kiteng hlonghle aphan, hali ahuwit ta chihisi do.

Inghosi Arnam ahem long kangthir asal tiki, anali kangthir Arnam ahem parasi kichoyok pahlongman, aro inghosi athuli long asal tiki analike buli kipi aman abhak hlong dunman, nali labangpo chithan un-eh ma?
Labadi si kime-alamthe kapahar pon aphanta Hemphu labang abi-pun otelo, te anali kicho-karjak la kime-alamthe parasi pahlonge.

Manta ne labang hel isita sal-lap ponpe yong, lale ne labang hel wiwe-yong, la-apot mehel nelamthe ateng pachok nang, labang ta kalek. Piyok pu tene ne aborai pahlongkel aholan— akijol kidoyok ke ne kithisi kime.

Piyok pu tene ne kime-alamthe pahar hlongdo yongta, labang nelong aborai kiwang kalek, piyok pu tene, mengsi katiki nange asal aphangpo ne phu-thak pido, lasi, kime-alamthe paharhe pu tene ne hao hlonge.
Piyok pu tene ne ar-ih si bangpo asal tikido, tene ne kihlong adat do; manta ahisa wesi tikido, tene kime-alamthe apuru murkiya aphang neyok nipi do.

Laparake nephan labang adatpo ke pot te? Kime-alamthe kapahar amun, labang kime-alamthe nelong kipi apharan si, nebithang katiki hlong yok, labang kime-alamthe laparasi pahar hlong, bangposi ne adatpo.
Piyok pu tene ne ahuwit long kijoktang hlong do yongta, ako-ong arleng pahlong yok nebithang ahuwit aphan murkiya chiplang do.

Jihudi helyok kapahlong yok, Jihudi pen katiki amun Jihudi hel badi arjak duno; nebithang ke Mosi po kanong arlo kalek yong ta, kanong arlo kido helyok kapahlong anat, kanong arlo kidohel pen, kanong arlo chiplang dun badi dolo.
Ne Arnam kanong kangwe kalek, manta Khristo kanong arlo chiplango, yongta kanong arlo kangwe hel pahlong ayoksi, kanong kangwe ihut badi chiplango.
Kikrol un-eh hel kiwan ayok, kikrol un-eh long un-eh pho badisi chiplango. Angkhan yok kijoktang adeng pahlongyok, ahuwit long ahuwit badi chiplang duno.
Ne labang ahuwit kime-alamthe aphan, lake aduk parphang nangset ta tikilo.
Inghosi kikat dun kachilem along ahuwit kat dun man, lahel abangten chibatsi kat, manta ihut detsi banta ke hlongman, puke nali chithan un-eh ma? Nali labadi pahlong un yok, ladi ne katdun.

Aro ingho kachilem long kachibat abangten kihal yok chilare, lahel abithang abangpo chipangdom yok abi-pun chirliman. Analike kiprel phurkup po yok bangpo tikiman; manta ilike, ki-or-eh aphur-kup pahlong aphansi bangpo tikiman.
Lasi, ne katdun do, yongta ingdende phoke kalek, chiteng si, manta tomon long akijol kiteng badike tengte.
Manta arleng hel ango paharsi, manta kijut amun abithang chakchepho ke kalek, lasi ne abithang abangpo yok tengsi pangdomsi bido.
Ei korte aro ingjirhel, nali chithan un-ehsi kido ne aneng ingjong, te ili aporong sar-lar hel ahuwit inghun arlo kido, aro ahuwit langpe asitemsi kiwang,
aro ahuwit ta inghun aro langpe along Mosi po baptist chiplango,
aro ahuwit isidet ajiuli ahim kicho,
aro ahuwit isi ajiuli alanghan kijun. Piyok pu tene anali aphel phel kidun ajiuli arlongpo para anali lang kijun, labang arlongpo Khristo kido.
Layongta, anali ako-ong chot arleng aphuthak Arnam nengsamse yongot, aro analiyok aporman ke, analiyok ingnam longsi pathiphrot no.
Minon ke anali pot badi akangho kar-ih kido, labang aduk po iliphan isi arjan chiplango.
Anali sitem angkhan ke agoya chirdom rongo, nalike ladi chiplangek; labadi kiwi alam do, “Arleng hel kicho yok iningo, aro kijun yok eno aro anali kikan ayok thuro.”
Ili ke anali angkhan ke anali bang pen kidoner asal tikilo apot, inirsi detsi angkol isine hajar kithom arleng thilo, ladi ke ili doner nangne.
Angkhan ke honjat kilang yok katiki apot, phurul kangthok detsi mari lo, labadi ke ili Hemphu yok honjat lang nangne.
Aro anali angkhan ke jibadi neng pasumseng si kipu dun anat, anali kapangho po aridengsi ingholo, nali ke labadi pasumseng ke do nangne.
Analiyok ke ili phan isi arjan badi lamehel kachiplang, ki-or owe along arleng ili phan ahari kipi alam paklangsi wido.
Lasi inghosi krolthipsi do pusi chironman, anang kikrol para kijangje ayok, la-anat meso chilangben nok.

Potsi honjat arlengyok wangman, la aparke naliyok prek honjat chiplangple yong. Arnam ke kikrol loiloi, aro anang naliyok letchot ke honjat pipeye, manta nali kachihi un, atengsi honjat pensi kachipajok anghor ta otepiye.
Lasi, ei nengdok khoi hel, agoya hel kachirdom para chiterek.
Ne naliyok abudi-ater kidopo pusi chithan unsi than do, nali bithang nelamthe bisar tangne chiron not.
Ili bor-eh kicho kijun alanghan yok bor-eh piman, labang Khristo awilong kachingrum kalek ma? Aro potsi ahim ingbeng hlongman, labang Khristo abangpo long kachingrum kalek ma?
Piyok pu tene ili ako-ong do, ili ahuwit ta iplang himpo, isidet abangpo, piyok pu tene ili ahuwit ta labang iplang himpo chithaksi choman.
Israyel arleng hel yok chiron langot; anali buli kipi a-ok choman, anali athuli long kachingrum kalek ma?
Lapara ke ne pot pen nali parhlan do? Agoya long kangton pot te kime do, lale agoya hel pot te akime ma?
Kalek, ne parhlan si kithane ke Bang-ajat hel buli piman, anali Arnam ayok ke kalek, si-ik samon aphansi buli piman. Ne bangposi pudo, aro ne nali thando si-ik samon kachirdom long chingrum dun nek.
Nali Hemphu alanghan aro si-ik samon alanghan, hini long jun nangne. Nali Hemphu ahong aro si-ik samon hel ahong la hini ta chodun nangne.
Lale, ili Hemphu aneng pakang yok anengdo ma? Ili anang yok ke ajakong dochot pusi chirondo ma?
“Ahuwit abihini katiki un loi-loi,” manta ahuwit abihini akime kalek. “Ahuwit abihini katiki un loi-loi,” manta ahuwit ta kachikem kihari wanwe.
Abangten abithang aphan kime chilangle si, bang akime aphan chilangot.
Jibak ke a-ok hathi along chijor-chihrep hlong, kime-kangho agiyan do apot ithe chithan chipupe si bangpo chonot.
Piyok pu tene lo long pudo, “Pirthimipe aro lalong kido kidothip abihini Hemphu si.”
Kikrolkre abang naliyok cho-jun yok taram tene aro nali lalong chingbar dun tene, kime-kangho agiyan do apot si, chithan-chipupe si, pot abihini nalipi, bangpo chonot.
Manta inghone bak naliyok pu, “Labang ke buli kipi tang apot,” pusi nalithan tene labang alam kaparju arleng po anat, aro nang kime-kangho agiyan do apot, bangpo choye nok—
Ne kipuye ke kachiron agiyan do, nali bithang parake kalek, bangsi nang kipu. Piyok pu tene ne kijoktang along bang hel kachiron agiyan paklang apotsi piyok nang bisar pa-ote ye?
Ne kardom pisi cho-jun man, pu tene kicho abihini anat kardom pajirman, la anat ne kachitharak nange pot do?
Lasi, potsi nali cho aro jun, lale pot si tiki, ahuwit Arnam jortang padone tikinot.
Nali Jihudi, ma Grik, ma Arnam kachikruk, kaiyok aneng pangho yek,
ne ahuwit arleng yok neng kapangsam yok si ahuwit asal ne katiki yok chironpon do, ne bithang yok kime chironre, manta ako-ong arleng pajok une mene pusi tikido.
Ne jibadi Khristo pen chirliman, nalita ladi neyok nechirli dunot.
Nali ahuwit alamthe long neyok chipurki ne nalikipi abi-pun hel mainotsi do, lasi naliyok parklam do.
Manta, Khristo abangten apenso hel aphupo, apihan ke apiso hel aphupo, aro Arnam ke Khristo aphupo, labang alam nali thek-resi kido, labang ne aneng do.
Ingho apenso anang-phu chidipsi pingkit, lale ajiuli alam turkisi pahar, tene anang aphupo ayok aman pipe,
manta ingho arloso pe anang phu chidipde si pingkit, lale ajiuli alam turki, anang aphu aman pipe— ithe alam aro la matmat anang aphu-achu thangklang kachingtep badi chiplang do.
Piyok pu tene arlosope aphu chidipde yong, pu tene anang achu kachingtep atengo lale pangtep nang, anang aphu pachidip nang.
Piyok pu tene apenso ke Arnam arjan aro ajortang si chiklango apot si, apenso arleng ihut ke anang aphu chidip nangne; manta arloso pe ke apenso po parasi ajortang dolo.
Piyok pu tene apenso ke arloso pe parake kalek, manta arloso pesi apenso para.
Lake arloso pe aphan apenso po kahurji kalek, apenso aphansi arloso ayok kasanse.
Piyok pu tene Arnam tharlon hel anatsi arloso pe abithang aphu long apharan asin ensi anang paklang nange.
Yongta, Hemphu long ke arloso pe apenso para ke kiphlok tang kalek, lale apenso po arloso pe parake kiphlok phlen kalek.
Piyok pu tene apenso po parasi arloso pe kasanse, lasi apenso po arloso pe parasi wangman; manta ahuwit Arnam parasi wangman.
Nali nenglong chironne langnot: arloso pe aphu chidipde si Arnam ango kapingkit nange do ma?
Bharasot abithang naliyok paklangkle ma, apenso achu kiding kido analiyok aman wephoman?
Manta arloso pe ihut achu akiding kido si anang phan ke ajortang dode yong ma? Piyok pu tene labang achu akiding ke aphu kachidip aphan si pilo.
Manta inghone bak ke ahul kipawang yoksi nengpi man, tene Arnam kachikruk hel aro ili sitemta ladi abi-pun ingjong.
Minon ke kachirli nange alam long ne isi alam thando, aro lalong ne nali parklamkle yong, labang alam ke lalo, nali kimeyok kalek, kangho yok si chingrum do.
Piyok pu tene, kicheng ke, konam nali kachikruk long chingrum man, ne karju badike nali sitem chiphlak detsi do; aro angkhan alam ne kroldo.
Piyok pu tene, nali sitem kikrol arleng hel yok kachiklang yok nali sitem prek-prek alamta donange.
Nali konam ilong chingrum, la-amun Hemphu onga ahim kicho-kijun chokche.
Piyok pu tene, kicho-kijun amun abangten bang kichoche angot abithang a-ansi cho-jun do, aro la-amun inghone ke an-kangchir doman, inghone ke ingrido.

Lake pot te! kicho-kijun ayok, nali bithang ahem ingjong ma? Lale Arnam kachikruk yok pangwe detsi, kicho kangwe abangyok patharakre yong ma? Ne naliyok pot punang? Ladi apot nali yok parklam nang ma? Kalek, parklamkle!
Piyok pu tene ne Hemphu para pahlongsi ne naliyok paklange, labang ke lalo, Hemphu Jisu yok hutur arideng chobelsi kichampi anuwesi anang him eno,
aro konam anang Arnam yok kardom pilo, anang himpo ingbeng si pulo, “Labang ke nali phan kipi nebangpo, bangpolo. Neyok neng chipurki aphan, nali labang tiki.”
Ladisi anithu kichotang aphel, anang langhan ta eno, pulo, “Labang langhan ne wi pensi kapachok Akimi-Angton. Nali phongkan labang jun, neyok neng chipurki aphan, bangpo tikinot.”
Piyok pu tene nali phongkan labang himpo cho, aro labang langhan jun, lateng Hemphu wangwe leng ke nali anang kithi pahar pon.
Lasi inghosi michangche phosi Hemphu ahim choman, lale langhan jun, anang Hemphu abang aro awi ado doye.
Abithang yok archalne langot, aro latangsi labang him pacho nang, aro labang langhan pajun nang.
Piyok pu tene inghosi la abang pharli thek the pho si chodo aro jundo, anang abithang ado chibatsi hlongman.
Piyok pu tene la anat nali sitem ako-ong arleng kikrol un-eh pho aro kiso ingjinje; aro angkhan ke thisi damo.
Manta ili abithang yok chibisar chilang, tene ili long abisar hlonghle lo hoi.
Manta ili Hemphu pen chibisar tangdo putene, ili chingdom undo, lasi pirthepe penke abisar ado hlongle ye.
Lasi, ei ne korte aro ingjir hel, nali konam kichoyok chingrum, la-amun ihut para ihutyok chinghong.
Nali kachingrum along nali ado kiwangwe aphan, lasi inan kachingrum amun inghone bak ingchir yongta, anang ahemlong pachonang. Kido-er alamthe hel, ne dam tangsi nali paklange.
Ei korte aro ingjirhel, ajiuli abor-eh alam nali chithan un-ehsi kido ne aneng ingjong.
Nali thek, konam nali Bang-ajat kido, la-amun hangkhone kengkam chijorsi, lamthe kangwe agoya hel adung nali kipon.
Lasi ne naliyok nali parjudo, Arnam-Ajiuli pen lam kithan abang kai ta “Jisu ke hao kipho” arleng pupe lo; aro Jiuli-Kangthir aparke, kaita “Jisu yok Hemphu” pu un-eh ye.
Minon ke bor-eh prek-prekdo, manta Ajiuli ke isi det;
aro lalong kachirdom asal prek-prek do, manta Hemphu ke ihut det,
aro lalong katiki agun prek prek do, manta Arnam ihutdet, anang ahuwit katiki pachok do.
Amungten long kime aphan amungten yok Ajiuli kachiklang abor-eh pido.
Ihutyok budi-ater alam kithan Ajiuli, aro ihut yok agiyan alam Ajiuli kipiye atengsi matmat Ajiuli parasi piman,
lamat-mat Ajiuli parasi prek yok ke kikrol pido; la isi ajiuli parasi inghone bak ke kiso kapaham bor-eh,

prek ihutyok ke asombhik asal katiki abor-eh, kamprek ihutyok ke turkipon alamthe kithan, prek ihutyok ajiulihel kachini bor-eh, prekyok ke ajat-jat alam kapathan abor-eh, prek ayok ke ajat ajat alamthe acho alam kapahar apharan pido.
Labang isidet ajiuli inghoyok potsi anengdo, bangpo anang yok thak relsi, labang ahuwit pachok do.
Piyok pu tene jibadi abang po isi det, aro labang arorem ako-ong do, aro labang abangpo ahuwit arorem ako-ong yongta isidet abangpo do, ladisi Khristo ta do.
Piyok pu tene ili Jihudi do, lale Grik do, aturu do lale kijoktang do, ahuwit isidet abang kachiplang yok isi Ajiuli long baptist chiplang hlongo— aro ili ahuwit ta isi Ajiuli junhlongo.
Piyok pu tene abangpo isidet aropo kalek, manta ako-ongdo.
Akeng ke papu nang, “Ne ke ari kalek apot si, abangpo arorem kalek” tene anang labang kipu anat abangpo long kalek, ladi pu un-eh.
Aro anopo papu nang, “Ne amek kalek apot, abangpo arorem kalek,” tene anang labang kipu anat abangpo arorem kalek, ladi kalek.
Abangpo dungsi amek det tene, daklong arjulo hoi? Aro abangpo dungsi karjudet tene, daklongte angnim hlongbo?
Manta minon Arnam abithang kar-ih ateng arorem helyok, lamehel arorem tenyok abangpo along paloksi bilo.
Lale ahuwit arorem hel isi arodet nang, tene abangpo daklong chiplango hoi?
Manta minon ako-ong arorem yong ta, abangpo isi det.
Aro amek ta aripo yok, “Ne nangyok nangne” pu un-eh, lale aphupo akeng hong-ni yok, “Ne nangyok nangne,” puke pu un-eh.
La-aholan, abangpo pipotsi arorem kamprek arorem yok un-eh pho pangthek labang arorem ta kanange pen,
aro ili abangpo pipotsi arorem do prek helyok aman pipe, lamehel yoksi al-ensi aman pichot hlongman;
aro ili kanangne arorem helyok ta palangme chot hlong man. Manta ili athok kido arorem hel lateng kanange ingjong.
Manta abangpo long ahul kiwangwe ayok, la aholan arorem hel isipo la isiyok kapame ayok chiron ponman, lasi Arnam kanangne po yok pamechot si, abangpo al-enman.
La-amun isi arorem aduk hlong tene, anangpen ahuwit arorem hel aduk hlong detman; isi arorem aman hlong tene, anang pen ahuwit arorem anengrong chipadoman.
Minon ke nali Khristo abangpo, aro abangten arleng isi arorem chiplang do.

Aro Arnam kachikruk long: ango ke kangthir adun hel yok, hini ke turkihel yok, kithom ke paklang helyok, laparake asombhik katiki helyok, la-aphel kiso kapame-un abor-eh yok, kirap abang helyok pangsemo, kilangpon phu-phang hel pangsemo aro prek-prek alamthe kapahar ade pilo.
Aro ahuwit ta kangthir adun hel ma? Ahuwit ta turki hel ma? Ahuwit ta paklang hel ma? Ahuwit ta asombhik katiki ma?
Ahuwit ta kiso kapame abor-eh hlong do ma? Ahuwit ta prek alam pharli thek ma?
Manta akihe abor-eh ar-ih pon. Aro layok isi akime aduwar ne nali paklang bang.
Ne arleng lale Arnam tharlon alampen lam than, yongta ne nengdok weh, pu tene ne kithep jeng asenge, lale pangreng khring angchin mat-matsi chiplang do.

Aro ne turki un ajakong pahlong ta, ahuwit acho alamthe aro ahuwit kachimangkai alam abhu hlong, aro inglong kartulpe ayok katerek un kikrol do, yongta ne nengdok wedet tene, ne isita kangwe klong ateng.
Ne kido majit banta piphrot, aro ne bangpo pasek det yok chipek det yongta, nengdok dode tene, lalong isita chok plengple.
Nengdok ke kachihi or-eh; nengdok ke jinso man; nengdok ke amek sose lale aborai ta wedet, lale ingjeje,
lale neng kangke. Abithang aphandet kichok chironre; kang phlutphle lale akangho neng en-eh;
akangho tikipi yongta nengrong dode, manta khanang along nengrong doman.
Ahuwit alam chirchiman, ahuwit long kikrol doman, ahuwit long kachiha doman, ahuwit chipaning dingman.
Nengdok ke jatsi or-eh. Manta katurki alam hel jutne; ajatjat alam kithan hel jutne; agiyan alamthe hel ta chilutne;
Piyok pu tene ili thek-re ta ibengdet, aro ili katurki ta ibeng det;
manta kichokphrot arni wang hlenge, kichokche pomar chilut detne.
Konam ne oso kido, la-amun oso ateng lam kithan, oso badisi kachiron; ne oso badi kachirwal; konam abo chokngo, la-amun para oso ahuwit alamthe tikango.
Piyok pu tene minon ili aharchi long kithek badisi, chithek phri-si thekdo, manta laparake ili mahang semsemsi chitheknge. Minon ne ibakdet thekdo; laparake ne abhu hlong phrotsi, chithek phrotne.
Aro minon ke kikrol, kachiha, aro nengdok dojong; manta la kithom; aro aghaichot ke nengdok.
Nali nengdok ar-ih dun aro ajiuli abor-eh hel kihlongyok chirbu, aro layokta nali Ajiuli alam kapahar bor-eh ar-ih dun.

Piyok pu tene, ingho bang-alam kithan ajakong abor-eh hlongsi pahar, anang arlengyok thanthe, manta Arnam yoksi thanman; piyok pu tene kaita mehel abhu hlonghle; anali Ajiuli pensi kabutisit agiyan alam thanman.
Kamprek isi ke, ingho ajiuli katurki alam pahar, anang arleng helyok dhorom long kihari aphansi, aro neng kirung aro neng kapadok alam thanman.
Inghosi bang-alam than man, anang abithang ayok dhorom kihari wanman, manta inghosi ajiuli katurki alam pahar, anang kachikruk yok kihari wanman.

Minon ke ne nali ahuwit yok bang-alam kapathan aneng do, manta layok ke katurki alam kipathan ayok neneng dolet do. Ihut ingho katurki alam pahar, bang-alam kithan ayokta kime chot; kachikruk long dhorom kihari ayok, arlengpo yok katurki alam kapahar acho alam papharli nang.
Minon, ei korte aro ingjirhel, ne nali dung damsi, bang alam thansi pahar, tene katurki alam lale kachiklang labang hel abor-eh isi para isi thanthe si, bang-alam than tene, nali pot pahlonge?
Ajiu kangwe asi kipi abihini asitem ta pongsi aro gengong ati-ir asi pachini thekthe tene, pongsi lale gengong pen potsi thep, bangpo pot badi chithan une?
Aro dhawa apongka kibut asi wangdak de, tene ingho dhawa aphan trepsi do une?
Lasi nali bithang ta; abhu hlongdak alam ade-angtur thanthe, tene kipu alam hel, ihutpo potdi chithan une? Piyok pu tene nali tomon long lam kithan badi chiplange.
Pirthepe along ako-ong ajatjat asi do, yongta bangpo asi det acho alam ithe wepen.
Laparake ne labang alam achopo abhu hlonghle, tene kithanpo aphan ne si kamango chiplange aro kithanpo ne phan ihut kamango chiplangbo.
La-apot nali ta; nali ajiuli bor-eh long ar-ih si do apotsi, kachikruk long kachikem kihari yok, meso chirbu not.
Lasi, inghosi bang alam than, anang acho alam pharli-un ajakong aphan, pingkit not.
Piyok pu tene ne bang-alam pen pingkit tene, ne jiuli ta pingkitman manta nebudhi athe wangwe.
Laparake ne pot tiki nang? Ne ajiuli pen pingkitne, manta neneng penta pingkitne; ne ajiuli penta parklamme, manta neneng penta lune.

La kalek tene, nang ajiuli pen bor-eh bat, tene rat long kangning abang nang kardom kapajir pingkit amun, pot badi “Amen” nang pu dun une? Piyok pu tene bang-arleng poke nang potsi pudo, bangpo anang chithan un-eh yong.
Piyok pu tene nang Arnam yok me-atsi kardom pajirdo, manta bang arleng po ke harhe yong.
Ne nali ahuwit yokta ongchot bang-alam thanman, labang anat ne Arnam ayok kardom pajirdo.
Yongta kachikruk long ahajar kep ateng bang-alam kithan ayok ke, arleng yok kapaklang ayok, bot-sere pen the-phongo bak alamthe kithan yok mechot hlongman.
Ei korte aro ingjir hel, nali kachiron amun oso badi chironek; layok ke, kilangset-set oso badi si, kachiron amun ke abo kichok badi chiplang.
Kanong alo long wido, “Hemphu pudo, bang-alam kithan arleng parasi, aro bang-arleng ade-tur pensi, ne labang arlengyok lam thane; manta bangpo tiki yongta, anali nelamthe onene ye.”

Lasi bang-alam kithanpo, laparake, kikrol arleng hel aphan kalek manta kikrolkre arleng hel aphan isi asin si, manta ajiuli katurki alamthe kapahar, kikrolkre hel aphan kalek, manta kikrol abang aphan asin si.
La apot, kachikruk ajaldungsi chipangrum tene, aro ajaldungsi bang-alam than, tene bang-arleng lale kikrolkre hel wanglut, tene analike naliyok ingcham nali pupeye ma?
Manta ahuwit katurki alam pahar, tene kikrolkre lale kamprek arleng wanglut, ahuwit parata anang adohel aporman parjusi, ahuwit para anang bisar arjusi,
anang kabutisit acho alamthe hel pachiklan si, lalong anang phu-chingkuksi, asereng si “Nali sitem Arnam do,” pusi Arnam yok bokhone ye.

Laparake, ei nekhoi hel, lam acho ke pot te? Nali konam wangsi chingrume, la amun inghone bak ke lun, ihut bak ke kapaklang, ihut bak ke Arnam kachiklang alam, ihut po bang-alam kithan, ihut po ke lam pharlisi acho alam pachiklang dak nange alam do. Ahuwit alam kihari ki-ongyok, mehel asal patiki nang.
Inghone bak bang-alam than, tene bang-hini, lale letchot yongta, bang kithom ta aro ihut para ihut apal ensi pathan not; aro ihut ke bangpo alam pharline pathan not.
Manta labang acho alam kapharli arleng ihut ta welo, tene anang kachikruk long doklipne pado nang aro anali abithang aphan aro Arnam yok pachithan nang.
Turki hel bang-hini, lale bang-kithom lam pathan nang, aro kamprek hel ke pot si pudo pachiron nang.
Akung arel iningsi kido inghone bak ango penebak Arnam alam pachiklang do tene ango po ke padosit nang.
Piyok pu tene ahuwit ta kachirli aro nengsam pahlong yok, nali ahuwit ihut para ihutne ajiuli katurki alam paharpon nang.
Aro turkihel Ajiuli turkihel arlo doman,
piyok pu tene Arnam ke kachirwul-nuk ka-ote Arnam kalek, manta nengsam piman. (Ahuwit kachikruk long kido kangthir-arleng hel,
labadi ne nali kachikruk longta arloso hel padoklip nang. Piyok pu tene analiyok lam pathan hlonghle yong, manta kanong longta kipu badi, “Anali padoklip nang,”
Manta anali pene bak kapaklang alamthe kihlong yok do, tene hem along abithang apihan poyok pachirju nang. Piyok pu tene kachikruk long arloso arleng lam kithan katharak nange alam.
Lale, Arnam alamthe nali sitem parasi kiwang ma? Lale, nali dung yok si kihleng ma?)
Inghone bak anang abithang yok ajiuli long apharan hlongdo, lale ajiuli kipleng po pusi chiron, tene ne naliyok kiwi alamthe hel, labang pomar Hemphu kithan pusi anali yok paklangot.
Inghone bakpoyok pachini un-eh, pu tene chinine natne padonang.
Lasi, ei ne korte hel, ajiuli katurki alam kapahar ayok kar-ih yok ar-ih aro bang-alamthe kithanyok teng dunek;
manta ahuwit katiki pomar palang me-atsi aro meso chingbarne patiki nang.
Minon ke, ei korte aro ingjir hel, kime-alamthe ne nali ngot paharo, bangpo naliyok parju hlongo; bangpo nali chidengo, aro lalong krolsi do,
la alamthe pensi, ne nali ango kime- alamthe pahar hlongo, bangpone nali ot-thip si dopon, tene bangpo parasi kijoktang hlong; lale nali akijolsi kroldo.
Piyok pu tene, ne potsi chirli hlongo, labang kasongkhan kachirli alam ne naliyok pilo te, lo-kangthir long alam ateng Khristo ili pap anat thilo,
aro anang yok ahilik long bilo, aro lo-kangthir long alam atengsi nithom arni paburo,
aro anang Pitor po yok klango, la-aphel bang kere-hini adun yokta klango.
La-aphel phoro phongo yok let chot korte aro ingjir hel yok inansi klango, anali ongchot arleng minon hok ta dolang, manta angkhan ke thilo.
La-aphel Jems po yok, aro labang aphel ahuwit kangthir-adun hel yok anang klango.
Ahuwit aphelsi, adap wangsi kiplang badi ne, neyok ta klango.
Piyok pu tene kangthir-adun hel asitem ne ahuwityok ajut, kangthir-adun kachipu michangche yong, piyok pu tene ne ihut Arnam kachikruk ayok honjat kipi.

Manta ne Arnam kajinso hlongo ne ke potsi nelong, aro anang ne kajinso akijol chokche yongot. La aniste, ne anali ahuwit ayok ta letchotsi chipadukngo— yongta ne katiki para ke kalek, manta Arnam kajinso si nepen tikilo.
La-apot, laparake ne lale anali, ladisi ali wang paharo aro ladisi nali ta krolo.
Minon ta Khristo yok akithi hel asitem para paburo, pune bangpo nali paharpon, tene akithi hel kibur ingjong pusi nali angkhan ke pot badi puman?
Kithi hel burbe, pu tene Khristo yokta paburbe yongo;
aro Khristo yok paburbe yongot, tene hali kapahar akijol lo, nali kikrol po ta akijol.
Hali yongta Arnam asisik hakhi pido pusi chiklan do, piyok pu tene hali Arnam alam ladi hakhi pilo te, Arnam si Khristo yok paburo— khanangne kithi hel burbeye, tene anang Khristo ta burbe yong.
Piyok pu tene kithi hel yok paburbe yong, pu tene Khristo yok ta paburbe yongot.
Khristo burbe yongo, tene nali kikrol ta chakche aro nali minon hok ta abithang pap long si dolang.
Laparake ladi tene ingho-hosi Khristo long wang sang si kithi hel ta, prel detno.
Khristo long ili kachiha, lake labang ajiubong aphan det si, pu tene ili ahuwit arleng yok ta korom kangwe chiplang hlongo.
Manta khanangsi minon Khristo kithi arleng hel kicheng-cheng athe chiplangsi kithi para buro.
Piyok pu tene kithipo munusi parasi kiwang, kithi hel kiburpo ta munusi parasi chiplango.
Piyok pu tene Adam po long ahuwit thiman, labadisi Khristo long ahuwit yok pahrenge.
Manta abangten yok abithang abhaklong pabure, ango athepo ke Khristo, la-aphel Khristo kiwang arni ke anang arleng hel bure.
La-aphel si kijut arni wange; la-amun anang ahuwit kapangdom, ajakong, aro apharan pa-orsi, Apa Arnam arideng longri champi detbo.
Piyok pu tene konam arni anang hutur hel yok anang kengpak arlo bibe, lengke anang pangdom ponne.
Kijut hutur ke akithi, bangpo ta pa-ore.

“Piyok pu tene Arnam “ahuwit abihini yok pangdom detsi anang kengpak arlo bilo.” Manta “ahuwit abihini” pangdom tango pusi konam anang thano, la-amun inghosi “Ahuwit abihini hel anang arlo bilo,” kipu, anang ke ahuwit abihini ke chiku detde yongot, ihut po yok apar ke, ahuwit abihini yok pangdom detsi anang kengpak arlo bilo, labang posi chiklan man.
Konam ahuwit abihini hel anang arhum bilo, laparake, Aso anang bithang ingho si ahuwit abihini hel anang arlo bilo, anang arhum doye, lasi ahuwit abihini along tenta Arnam do lenne.
Lale tene, kithihel aphan baptist kachiplang arleng hel pot chiplange? Akithi hel jatsi burbe, tene anali anat labang arleng piyok baptist chiplangman?
Aro ili bithang yok aporten ta phere memesi dohlong do?
Ne arnita kithi amahang do hlongdo! Ei korte aro ingjir hel, khanangsi ne Hemphu Khristo Jisu long nali lam anat ne aborai do—Hemphu Jisu pensi ne isi aborai do pendo.
Ne munusi badisi Ephisiya long ingnam ape pen chilarelo, tene ne labang anat pot te hlonge? Akithi hel burbe yong, tene, “Cho minang jun minang, piyok pu tene minap ili thi hlonge.”
Abithang yok chichobelek, “Kangho alok jor hel akime asoi pangho man.”
Chipabek hop aneng aro dhorom angthin en-not, aro pap tikiye nok. Piyok pu tene angkhan ke Arnam alamthe agiyan ingjong. Nali katharak hlong yoksi ne labang alam nali thando.
Manta inghone bak ke arjuye, “Akithi hel pot badi bur man? Pot badi abangpo ensi wang man?”
Ei kamango! nali pot amu rip mo, labang thithe lengke arong wangwe.
Aro jipe nang rip mo, nang labang abang ahrong ke ripre yong, manta gom asok, lale kamprek asok, nangke amu sosi rip do.
Manta Arnam ke abithang arwalsi labang arongten abang ahrong po piman, aro amuten ajat tenyok abithang abang ahrong piman.
Ahuwit a-ok hel, isidet arjan a-ok kalek, manta arleng lale okpe hel papunang, wo lale lang a-ok papu nang, prek arjan a-ok do.
Lalong ethakpe abangpo do, pirthepe ta abangpo do, manta ethakpe abang pomar ajortang isi do, aro pirthepe abang pomar isi kamprek do.
Lalong arnipe ajortang isi do, chiklope ajortang isi do, chiklolangso helta ajortang isi do; aro ajortang alamke chiklolangso jortang anat chiklolangso para chiklolangso tenta prek ajortang do.
Lasi akithi hel kibur pota do. Jipe eh-hlong, lake kiprel adeng, jipeyok pabur, labang ke ki-or-eh adeng.
Jipe aman kangwe adeng long rip mo, labang ke jortang kido ateng paburo. Jipe chakche pho adeng ripmo, labang ke apharan adeng thuro.
Jipe yok abang arpumpo along rip hlongo, bangpo ke isi ajiuli abangyok paburo. Lalong abang apumpo do, tene ajiuli abang arpumpo do.
Ladisi lo-kangthir long kiwi do, “Aporong Adam po, kihreng ok-wi hlongo;” manta kijut Adam po kipanghreng ajiuli chiplango.
Yongta Ajiuli po ke, ango kiwang po kalek, manta kidowen abang apum po, manta la-aphel Ajiuli wango.
Ango munusi po, ihut inghan amunusi, pirthepe para kiwang; aphel munusipo ethakpe para kiwang.
Labang inghan munusi pot badi, ladisi ingho inghan hel para wango; aro la ethakpe para kiwang po pot badi, ladisi ethakpe kihlong nange abangta labadi lo.
Ili jibadi la inghan agoya athok chihlongsi plango, ili ta ethakpe kido amunusi amahang chipahlonge.
Ei korte ari ingjir hel, ne labangpo pubang: a-ok aro awi pen ke Arnam-alongri long bor-eh adeng hlonghle, lale kanghon po kanghonhe along bor-eh adeng hlong dunde ye.
Onenot, ne naliyok isi kabutisit acho alamthe thando! Ili ahuwit thihlonghle ye, manta kijut arni ili ahuwit chipharlep hlonge,
pongka butne, amek kapabrip apor, photsi ili ahuwit chipharlepme. Piyok putene pongka asi ingrenge, aro akithi hel kanghonhe longyok ingthure, aro ili chipharlep det hlonge.
Piyok pu tene labang kanghon abang po kanghonhe yok chi-ik nangeje, aro labang kithi abangpo ke kithithe yok chi-ik nangeje.
Konam kanghon abanpo kanghonhe yok, aro labang kithi abang po kithithe yok chi-iknge, la-amun labang alam lo-kangthir kiwi alam choknge, lake “Kithi poyok kihalpo jole.”
“O kithi po, nang kihalpo daklong do? O, kithi po, nang kichang plup po dak long te?”
Pap ke kipathi yok chang plupman, aro pap katiki apharan ke kanong po.
Manta Arnam yok kardom pajirdo, anang ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo pensi kihal ili piman.
Lasi, O nenengdok hel, Hemphu long nali chipangtang, klem phroke doyek, Hemphu asal tiki pame pen, piyok pu tene Hemphu long kachipaduk ke akijol chipharlole.
Kangthir adun hel aphan banta kirung alam ke, ne Galatiya kachikruk helyok kithan alam badi, ladine nalita tiki pon.
Ne konam wanghlenge, la-amun banta rung hlongle yok, anang kachingthur aphan, hat-arulten kicheng arni, nali abangten bek-bekso bipon aro chihansi.
Aro konam ne hlenge, la amun nali inghoyok arwal, nali labang banta, Jerusalem yok kipon arideng kapachini alo wisi tole.
Aro labang banta ongbong apotsi, ne bithang dampen nange, anali ne pensi dam-une.
Ne Mesidoniya agak kidam aphel nali dungyok wange, piyok pu tene Mesidoniya agak kidam nange do.
Un pu tene nali pen bekso arniyok do hlonge, lale kichum adin ta parkanne, la-aphel kidam nange athemyok ne kidam amun nali neyok nethon dun, labang aneng do.
Piyok pu tene duwar along kapochak badi, nali kapochak aneng ingjong; piyok pu tene Hemphu hawang-tho pu tene, nalipen bekso adin kido aneng do.
Manta Pentikos kamai arniyok ne Ephisiya longsi doye;
piyok pu tene sal kapachok isi akithe aduwar nephan ingpusi do; aro kiteng abang ako-ong dojap do.
Timothi po wanghleng, tene anang nali sitem mesosi kapado, yok chiron; piyok pu tene ne badi, anangta labadisi Hemphu aphan chipaduk do.
