Lasi ihut ta anangyok pangwedet badike langek; manta anang ne dung yok kiwang yok lasi nali anangyok nengsam rapne wangthon dunot; piyok pu tene ne anang korte helpen wang kihleng yok inghongsi do.
Aro Apolos po korte po alam ke, anang korte helpen nali dung kidamyok, ne anangyok chingdukdo; manta minon kidam ayok anang aneng ingjong; layong ta konam kime apor hlonge, la-amun anang dame.
Nali trepne do, kikrol long chipangtang, penso aha chipaklang, ajakong chiwan.
Aro nali ahuwit katiki anengdok penne patiki ponang.
Minon ke, o korte aro ingjir hel, Istiphanas ahem abangsi Akhaya alongri ango kiwang athe, aro anali ke kangthir-arleng yok kachingden asal aphang chi-eno, bangpo nali chithan undo.
Nali ladi arleng helyok, aro sal katiki long rapdun aro kachipaduk ahuwit arleng arlo mengdun.
Stiphanas po, Phortanatas po aro Akhaikas po holek kiwang apot, neneng arong do; piyok pu tene nali kangwedet apot, ne jibadi kangwe kido, bangpo anali wang pachok duno.
Piyok pu tene ne jiuli aro anali yokta neng pangsamo; la-apot nali labadi arleng helyok kardom pajir nange.
Asia alongri long kachikruk hel naliyok kardom hlodo. Akila po, Priskila pe aro anali hem long kachingrum kachikruk pota naliyok Hemphu long nengsam kardom nali hlodo.
Ahuwit korte hel naliyok kardom hlodo. Nali kangthir kachimung pen ihut para ihutyok kardom chipi.
Ne labang bor-eh kibat, Pol po, ne bithang ari pen lo wilo.
Inghone bak Hemphu yok nengdok de, anang hao papho dunnang; maranatha, lake ili Hemphu yok wangot!
Hemphu Jisu Khristo kajinso nalipen pado dun nang.
Khristo Jisu long ne nengdok nali ahuwit pen pado nang. Amen.
Arnam ahisa si Jisu Khristo adun kachiplang Pol po aro korte Timothi po, para Korinth long kido Arnam kachikruk, aro Akhaya alongri long ahuwit kangthir arlenghel adung yok.
Ili Apa Arnam aro Hemphu Jisu Khristo para naliyok kajinso aro nengsam pado nang.
Ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo Apa Arnam bor-eh pachoknang aro anangsi kajinso Apa, aro ahuwit neng pangsam Arnam.
Ili abithang Arnam para pot nengsam hlongman, labang nengsam ili ahuwit duk-tap kido amunta nengsam pahlong unman, lasi anang ili duk-lak asitem nengsam piman.
Piyok pu tene jibadi Khristo aduk-tap iliyok wang ong-ongman, ladisi Khristo parasi ili nengsam ong-ongsi wangman.

Ili duk-tap choman, labang ke nali neng kangsam aro kijok aphansi; aro ili neng kangsam hlongman, lata nali neng kangsam aphan; labang neng kangsam ke, ili jibadi duk choman, labadi aduk-lak chipaning dingsi, ili bithang asal katiki pachokman.
Nali jibadi duk-lak choman, ladisi neng kangsam ta chingchong man pusi theksi, nali phan hali kachiha dokuk do.

Ei korte aro ingjir hel, Asia alongri haliyok jipe duk-tap kachiplang, labang alam nali chithan un-eh si kido hali aneng ingjong; ladi aduk-tap chihi un-eh pho, hali jakongpen chirung un-eh pho dohlongo, hali kihreng chiha un-eh si kido.
Piyok pu tene hali abithang yok chihahesi, akithi helyok kapangthur Arnam yok krolman, lasi hali kithi nange ado kibat para kijok ahari kihlong;
anang si la-an kaphere meme kithi nange along para haliyok pajokngo, aro pajoksi doye, aro angoyok ta pajoksi doye pusi hali anangyok si chihado,

holek nalita pingkitsi hali phan wangrung dundo, lake, ako-ong arleng parasi kajinso abor-eh hali pahlongo, labang anat, ako-ong arleng para haliyok kajinso bor-eh hali pilo apot, ako-ong kapingkit parasi haliphan Arnam ayok kardomta pajir len do.

Piyok pu tene, hali aborai poke lalo, hali kachironpo hakhi pido, lake a-ok agiyan pen ke kalek, Arnam kajinso pensi pirthepe long, layok ke, let chotsi naliyok Arnam kipi kangthir aro nengwak phlensi hali arkel-pasi lo.
Piyok pu tene nali potsi chiporhe hlongdo, bangpo yok ke, me-atsi abhu hlongdo, aro nali kachihaman ke aphel yok nali abhu hlonge, la aparke hali prek alam wiwelo—
Ladisi nali ango para haliyok angkhan alam abhu hlongo te, ili Hemphu Jisu arni jibadi nali hali phuthak aborai doman, ladisi halita nali phuthak si aborai doman.
Ladi ne krol pensi labangpo, nali sitem phong-ni jinso pahlong aphan, ne ango ke nali dung yok dame; aro nali kengthunsi Mesidoniya alongri damsi;
laparake Mesidoniya para nali dung yok wang phaksi, Judiya long kidam ayok, nali pensi neyok wang pathon dune.
Ladi ne tikiye pusi, neneng thirthe phosi paklang hlong ma? Lale ne jipe chirondo, labang nelong pachikeng si “oik, oik,” lale aphel,“kalek, kalek” kapapu ayok, ne a-ok aneng pensi puman ma?
Manta Arnam krol-meng loiloi; lasi naliyok hali lamthe yok, “oik” aro aphel, “kalek” ladike kapapu yok kalek.

Piyok pu tene hali si, lake ne pen, Silbanas po, aro Timothi po pensi nalingo jibak alam kipahar hlong, Arnam la Aso Jisu Khristo ke, “oik” la-aphel “kalek” chiplangple yongot; manta anang long ke “oik” si chiplang ngo.
Piyok pu tene Arnam konbak si semetang doyong ta, labang “oik” kipu anang longsi do; Piyok pu tene hali pensi Arnam jortang kapadoyok, anang parasi, “Amen” kipu ta chok.
Manta inghosi hali yok arwal tangsi nali pen hali yokta Khristo long kikrol pido, anang ke Arnam;
anangsi hali ingthin long kapang-ak Jiuli-Kangthir pisi, haliyok asap pilo.
Nali yok nenengdok kido theksi, ne minonhok Korinth ayok damde lang, ne Arnam yoksi labang alam hakhi endo.
Hali ke nali kikrol nali paphu do, ladi ke kalek, manta nali anengrong alokjor badisi dodun do; piyok pu tene nali krolsi do.
Manta ne neng aduksi nali dungyok damphak-phe pusi chipachip peno.
Piyok pu tene ne naliyok nengduk pi hlongman, tene neyok nengrong kipiyok ingho dobo? Ne det parake nengduk anali si doye.

Ne nengrong along nali ahuwit ta nengrong chiplang, nalilong labang krolsi, ingho arideng parasi ne nengrong hlongnange, anali para, ne kiwang amun neyok nengduk hlonghle aphan naliyok labang alamthe pomar wilo.
Nali neng aduk kipawang ayok kalek, manta naliyok ne ako-ong nengdok do, bangpo nali thek-re yoksi, la-an duk-lak pensi, angthin ihik-bihiksi aro mek-kri pajangsi ne naliyok wilo.
Manta inghone bak aduk nalipi tene, anang neyok detsi paduk do, ladike kalek, apun atengsi nali ahuwit yok aduk pilo.
Labadi arlengyok jokha arleng aduk kipi pensi dor.
Lasi minon ke ladi arleng neng aduk ke kapadode yok, lasi nali anangyok ronpi aro neng kangsam kipi dam ke akime.
Lasi labang arlengyok nali nengdok kidoyok ne nali nengrung do.
Labang anat ne nali kithan ahuwit alam menge ma mengme, aporman kihlong yok chironsi wilo.
Inghone bakyok nali adohel ron, tene ne ta anangyok ronpi ye. Ne pot ayok ron pilo, pene bakyok ron pilo pu tene, Khristo angosi nali phan ron pilo,
Aro labang katiki aron poke, si-ik hel ili phuthak honjat kipi awak pahlong nangne; piyok pu tene anang asol kihlongman alam ili thekthe ke dode yong.
Khristo kime-alamthe aphansi ne Troyas yok wango, Hemphu aphan neyok isi duwar kangpu thek hlongo;
manta ne korte Titas po yok hlonghlesi, ne ajiu long jat nengsam hlonghle yong ngot; lasi anali para chipadi tangsi Mesidoniya yok wango.
Manta Arnam yok kardom pajir nangeje, ingho ili yok ensi Khristo yok honjeng pahar pon man badi, aro hali pensi anang yok kachini agiyan matmat kanempru ahuwit athemyok pachiklang man.
Piyok pu tene kijoktang aro kiprel hel aphan Arnam yok Khristo pensi hijung kar-uh badi katiki ke halilo;
analiyok akithi para kiwang kithi anempru, lahelyok ajiubong para kiwang ajiuli kido anempru pilo. Ingho te mehel aphan pador phrot man?

Piyok pu tene ako-ong arleng badi hali Arnam-alamthe yok harlangsi kithan abang kalek; manta kikrol pachiwak phlensi Khristo yok than pono, aro Arnam para wang kitol badi, aro Arnam ango mahang semsemsi thano.
Hali bithang aphansi chiparklam yok cheng phak hlongdo ma? Khanangke, anghkan hel katiki badi, nali para, lale nali para amen-anang aporman alekha pahlong yok, hali ta kanange doma?
Hali phan aporman alekha ke nali bithang longsi do, kithek aro ahuwit kaporhe yok nali ingthin longsi do;

aro nali ke, hali para kiwitang Khristo alo badi chiklang do; labang ke sihipen kalek, kihreng Arnam ajiuli parasi wiman; arlong asilot longta kalek, manta a-ok mang-mang angthin asilot longsi witango.
Arnamyok ladi kikrolthip hali Khristo parasi hlongo.
Hali abithang sal pachok unyok abithang agun pensi michangman, ladi kalek; hali kamichang ke Arnam parasi wangman,
anangsi iliyok Akimi-Angton amurkiya kachiplang pamichango; kiwi abi-pun penke kalek, manta ajiuli pensi; piyok pu tene kiwi kanong ke mariman; manta Ajiuli ke panghreng man.

Minon ke akithi akorom aphan tiki hlongdo, tene arlong along kiwi pensi ladi aklar kipi, Israyel aso hel yok Mosi po amahang semsemke lang-et ke do un-eh yongot, layong ta labang aklar jut chot chotsi kiwang,
ajiuli long murkiya asalpo layok ta aklar dochot chiplangple ye ma? Piyok pu tene ado kachibat hlong murkiya asal po aklarchot man, tene dhorom kangthir murkiya asal po layok ta aklarchot dode ye ma?
Piyok pu tene ado kachibat murkiya si jortang tha-angman, tene dhorom kangthir amurkiya layok ta aklar dochot man.
Piyok pu tene, kiletchot aklar anat, labang alam, aklar kido murkiya asal aklar jutno,
piyok pu tene jutne kidam si aklar dochot, tene moyok kidopo layokta aklar dochotman.
Laparake hali ladi kachiha do apotsi; hali neng ingtang dutsi thanman;
Mosi po badi ke kalek, inghosi Israyel asohel, labang jutsi kidam aklar thek kel lo, anang jibadi amahang chidip mo, halike anang badi chidipde.
Manta anali ingthin hel parthat detno. Piyok pu tene aban-angton alo long chiporhe pu tene minihok ta lamat-mat ape chidipsi do, labang ke Khristo parasi pa-oro,
layongta minihok ta Mosi po alo kachiporhe amun, anali angthin long arnita pe chidip do lang;
manta konam Hemphu yok neng chipharlep, la-amun labang pe kachidip terek det hlongman.
Minon ke Hemphu si Ajiuli; aro daksi Hemphu Ajiuli do, lalongsi kijoktang do.

Aro hali ahuwit ta, pe kachidipde amahang pen aina along kithek badi Hemphu ajortang langding si kido alengke, labang jortang para ajortangyok chipharlepsi, Hemphu ajiuli parasi kachipharlep badi chipharlepsi, labang isidet athok agor chipharlep dundo.
La-apot, Arnam kajinso si lake hali labang murkiya asal pahlongo, lateng hali neng chipanghohe.

Hali katiki jol badike, katharak asal katikijol hel tikango, aro Arnam alam kapapangwe aro kasotonga katiki tikango; manta Arnam angot ahuwit arleng angthin kiron khanangpo pachiklangsi abithang yok kamichang paklang do.
Aro hali kithan kime-alamthe dipklak, tene kachingbo abang hel yoksi dipman.

Anali ladi kachiplang ke, labang pirthepe long arnam agoya helsi kikrolkre abang agiyan-amekpo, Khristo jortang kachiklang, ingho Arnam amahang do, anang kime-alamthe katha-ang pachiklangkle aphan, labang owe asi-ik po labang mek pachotokngo.
Piyok pu tene hali bithang aphan paharhe; hali ke Khristo Jisu yok Hemphu pusi aro Jisu aphan nebithang yok nali murkiya pusi paharman.

Piyok pu tene, Arnam kipu, “Kangting asitem para katha-ang pachiklange,” pusi thano, Jisu Khristo angho pen Arnam jortang kachiklang agiyan pachitha-ang ayok, labang Arnam hali ingthin long katha-ang pachiklango.
Manta lasi hali long labang lungle aphule apuru thalo, hali long labang apharan kithe katha-ang apuru hali long dolo, labang ke hali para chokche si Arnam parasi wang chokngo;
hali hangkhone aduk cho-yong ta, tongklak ke kalek; neng hing-hang dang yong ta, neng dohohe;
honjat hlongta, jangre te kalek; warchor yong ta, prel-pre yong;
Jisu ajiubong hali abang long pachiklang yok, hali arnita Jisu kithi abang en pon-wor do.
Piyok pu tene hrengne kido hali ke, hali pirthepe long Jisu ajiubong paklang yok, hali Jisu aphan arnita kithi arideng champi hlongdo.
Ladisi kithipo hali long, manta jiubong ke nalipen, abithang asal katiki pachokpon sido.
Manta lo-kangthir long kiwi do, “Ne krolo, la apotsi ne lam thano,” Ladisi halita kikrolpon ajiuli hlongo apotsi, krolsi do, la-apotsi lamthe than pondo;
piyok putene inghosi Hemphu Jisu yok paburo, anangsi la Jisu pen hali yokta pabure, aro anang mahang semsemsi nalipen hali yokta wanne, labang alam hali thekdo.
Oik, labang hel ahuwit nali phansi chokdo, lake kajinso pensi ako-ong arleng Arnam jortang aphan, kardom pipon ongman.
Lasi hali aneng dohohe. Yongta hali anglang munusi prel jongsi dohlong do, layongta hali ingthin arlo munusi po arniten akimi chiplangsi damdo.
Piyok pu tene labang bekso apor aduk kihlong ke isi kijutje jortang alin ahuwit pen pachingbar tene letchot si hali phan honjok do,

piyok pu tene hali mekpen kithek abihini yok langle lo manta mekpen kithek the abihini yoksi langdo; piyok pu tene amekpen kithek abihini ke dolenle, manta ili amekpen kithekthe abihini si or-e len doman.
Piyok pu tene hali thekdo ke, hali labang kuntulu ahem nak pirthimipe ahempo chingho man, tene ari pen kikem Arnam para kiwang isi ki-or-ehlen ahem ethakpe long do.
Piyok pu tene hali bangpo arlo ar-em jong si dohlong do, ethakpe parasi kiwang ili hem badi ape pen kachidip ayok ar-ih jongsi do—
Khanangne, konam ethakpe ili pone, ili pe-rik wepho ke dohlonghle ye.

Piyok pu tene ili labang kuntulu long kido arni yok ke, ili duk hapsi ar-emsi do hlongdo, piyok pu tene ili pe-rik wephoke kido aneng ingjong, manta ajiubong pensi pirthepe yok pajoldet nang, lasi pe pen kidip detyok anengdo man.
Ingho haliyok labang ahuwit abihini honjok pilo, anang ke Arnam si, anangsi haliyok kapang-ak badi Jiuli-Kangthir hali pilo.
Lasi hali arniten aha dutsi do; chithek pendo lake, konam yok labang abangpo long kido aleng ke, Hemphu para akaholo dohlong do—
piyok pu tene hali kithek para kengkam chijorje si, kikrol parasi kengkam chijor do.
Oik, hali neng aha dodut yong ta, aro abangpo para chiterek hrolsi aro Hemphu pen kido si akime thekdo.
Lasi hali hem longdo, lale chipaholo do, anangyok nengdok kido yok hali meso tiki pondo.
Piyok pu tene abangten katiki pame, lale pangho nang, la badi, abangpo pensi katiki angban pahlong yok, hali ahuwit Khristo bisar anghol ango long chiklang dam hlonge.
Lasi Hemphu yok kaphere chithek si, hali arleng helyok nengrung pon hlongdo; manta Arnam ango hali chiklangsi do; aro ne chihado ke, nali neng kachiron longta hali thekdun si do;
nali yok hali bithang aphan chiparklam phak do, ladi kalek, manta ingho angthin alampen kalek, aro anglang amahang alampen aborai paklangman, anali hali phan aborai paklang phak analiyok awak pido.
Piyok pu tene hali kachiron un-eh pho hlong, tene labangpo Arnam aphansi; hali ingthin dhoromsi dohlong tene, labangpo nali phansi.
Piyok pu tene Khristo anengdok hali yok nengrungsi do, piyok pu tene hali krol do lake ahuwit aphan ihut thilo, lasi ahuwit ta thilo.

Aro anang ahuwit aphan thilo, la-apot ingho pensi hrengsi dolang, ajiu kihlong abang abithang aphan hreng nangnelo, manta ingho anang phan thisi damo aro anali phan ingho bur phakpo anang phansi hreng nange.
Minon para ke, lasi, hali a-ok atengke kaiyok ta aman pi pe; angoke Khristo yok a-ok atengsi aman kipi yongta, minon parake ladi ke amanpi un-eh lo.
Lasi inghone bak Khristo long do, tene anang akimi hurjilo; ahuwit abanhel chilut detno; langot, ahuwit akimi wangsido!

Labang ahuwit Arnam Khristo parasi, anangpen haliyok pachilok ngo, aro labang kapachilok amurkiya aphang hali yok pilo, labang Arnam parasi iliyok pachilokngo, aro labang pachilok amurkiya asal haliyok pilo, Arnam parasi ahuwit choman.
Labangke kapachilok lamthe lalo, Arnam Khristo pen dosi, pirthepe pap alekha en-eh si, anang pen analiyok pachilok si kido, aro labang kapachilok alamthe haliyok pekdetno.
La-apot haliyok Khristo aphan ahara pachaksi, hali pensi neng kirungpon badi, hali Khristo aphan ahara asal tikido, Khristo aphan nali chingduk bang, nali Arnam pen chilokngot.
Piyok pu tene hali anangpen Arnam dhorom kangthir matmat chiplangsi, anang pap tikike yongo, Arnam ili phan anang yok si pap natsi inghol lo.
Hali Khristo pen inan katiki abang, chingduk bang, nali Arnam kajinso akijol badi ke chidengek.
Piyok pu tene Arnam pudo, “Ne kachideng amun nali kapingkit arjulo; aro kapajok arni nang rapmo.” Langot, minon kajinso kihlong mechot apor; langot, minon kijok arni!
Hali murkiya aphang ke pangho nangneye, la anat hali kai alamta aduk pawangwe;
manta hali bithang yok Arnam murkiya pusi chipuye, prek-prek kachihi, tomon-arwe para aduk-tap,
pam-thengo, akrol kithal, kachihul dut, chipaduk hap, mi-ih mekthu, an-kihum,
kangthir pensi, agiyan, kachirchi, kajinso, khanang nengdok, khanang ajiuli, Arnam ajakong,
khanang kikrol len, aro Arnam apharan; ancho ari aro debera ari agak dhorom kangthir,
aman-kipi aro aman kipipe, kangho anang aro kime anang, labang ahuwit parata kamichang paklang do; hali kachobe hel badi, aro yongta khanang pen do;
kachinine badi, yongta chini phrot; aro kithi rang-rang badi, aro langot—hali hrengsi do; aduk kipi badi, aro yongta thithe yong;
aneng aduk dolen, yongta arni neng arongdo; kicho kangwe badi, yongta hem kime natsi; isi kangwe klong badi, yongta ahuwit dojap.
Ei Korinthiya abang, naliyok hali anghopen nali thanphlen do, hali angthin akithe.
Hali kiduk hel anat nali angthin pen ral dunde, nali phansosi ke chiralman,
labang kiwoldun yok—ne osohel badi nali pudo— nali ingthin pathe nang.
Kikrolkre abang pen kachingbar be asal inanke tiki yek; piyok pu tene dhorom kangthir aro kanong wedet pot badi chikenge? Lale kangting popen katha-ang potbadi chingrume?
Samon pen Khristo pot badi chingnak si do une? Kikrolkre pen kikrolpo pot badi chipeknge?

Aro Arnam ahem pen agoya pot badi ching naksi doye? Piyok pu tene ili ke kihreng Arnam ahemo; labang alamthe Arnam kipu, “Ne anali sitem doye, aro anali pen kengkam chijore; ne anali Arnam chiplange, aro anali ne arleng chiplange.”
La-apot “Hemphu pu do, lasi anali sitem para wangsi prekne donot, aro akisim abihini ot nek;”
“Aro ne lalong naliyok chidenge, aro anali Apa chiplange, aro nalita ne so penso aro so arloso hel chiplange; labangpo jakong thechot Hemphu pudo.”
La apotsi, ei nengdok hel, labang seme-kitang pahlongo apot, ili abangpo aro ajiuli long ahuwit kisim hel para chikolsi, Arnam yok pheresi, chipangthirne do minang.
Haliyok nali ingthin long chi-en; hali kaita ka-ongnai asal tikike yong, kai yokta panghohe yong, kaiyokta chobelbe yong.
Ne nali ado ki-ot yok labang alam pudo, ladi kalek; piyok pu tene halipen kithiyok aro kihreng yok ta nali hali ingthinlong do pusi angot ta nali than tango.
Nalipen ne aborai do; nalinat ne neng kartul dopen do; ne ingthin long aduk yongta nengsam pendo, aro nengrong ong-ongsi do.
Piyok pu tene hali Mesidoniya alongri yok kiwang apot, hali sang chok hlonghle yong; manta ahuwit agak duk-lak detsi dolo— mokol along ahul det, aro angthin arlo phereder do hlongdo.
Manta neng kachipabek abang nengsam kipi Arnam Titas po kiwang parasi haliyok aneng pangsamo;

aro anangdet si kiwang para ta kalek, manta nali kar-ih, nali nenghlok aro haliphan nali Aneng kirung alam kithan amun, nali lam para anang kihlong nengsam ta haliyok nengpangsam mo, ne si aneng rong hlong chot no.
Piyok pu tene ne la lopo parasi naliyok neng-aduk pilo, neng kidoho lo, yongta minon aro neng dohohelo; piyok te pu tene thek hlongdo ke, labang kiwi alo po bek so arniyok si nali nengduk kiwan.

Minon ke nali neng-aduk do apot puke kalek, manta nengduk kiwang parasi nali neng chipharlep mo, labang anat minon nengrong do; piyok pu tene hali parasi nali kaita inghohe, labang anat nali Arnam ahisa badi nengduk kido.
Piyok pu tene Arnam kar-ih badi nengduk kiwang ke, kangthir neng chipharlep si joktang do, aro neng kadoho wanwe, manta a-ok long kadoho ke kithiyok ponman.

Piyok pu tene, langot, Arnam ahisa badi kiwang la nengduksi nali ingthinlong pot badi meso tikido, pot badi ado kachipangthir, pot badi pasiksak, pot badi kaphere kachiwan, pot badi kar-ih, pot badi neng-kirung, pot badi kachipame! La mehel along nali ahuwit abihini yok adowesi chipaklango.
Yongta ne naliyok wilo, layong ta akangho katiki aphan kalek, manta hali phan nali meso kilang, labang ke Arnam kithek ke naliyok pachiklan do, bangpo anatsi kiwi;
lasi hali neng chipangsamo. Hali la nengsam yongta Titas po anengrong hali aro aneng rong ong-ongo; piyok pu tene nali ahuwit parasi anang ajiu kanange hel pador pilo.

Piyok pu tene yongta ne anang ngot nali phan ingho jortang pilo, tene ne tharak hlonghle, manta pot badi hali nalingot ahuwit alam khanangpo paharo, ladisi Titas po angot ta hali labang jortang khanangsi chokngo.
Aro nali ahuwit kithan alam mengsi, pot badi kaphere aro klemphro si anang yok kachideng, bangpo anang neng kachipurki amun, naliyok anang nengdok ong-ongo.
Ahuwit alam longta ne nalipen kikrol chiha do labangsi neneng arongdo.
Ei korte aro ingjir hel, Mesidoniya alongri kachikruk helyok kipi Arnam kajinso alam ne analiyok parju bang;
duk-tap akithe kido adak yongta anali aneng arong dochotsi, aro anali kicho kangwe yongta banta kipajir apuru ong-ongsi pilo.
Piyok pu tene, ne hakhi pi-un ne, analike kipi-un ateng, lake, kido yok ta letchot si abithang kipi anengsi, pingkit pen,
kangthir arleng helyok kirap asal wangrap dunyok kihlong kajinso hali ngot pingkitsi, hali kachiha atengsi pilo, ladike kalek,
layok ke abithang Arnam anengsi, ango Hemphu yok, aphel ke, hali phan banta pilo.
Lalong Titas po pot badi aprong kicheng, ladisi minonta tiki si, naliyok kajinso ta plenge, labang anat hali anangyok nengrungo.
Manta nali, kikrol, lamthe, agiyan, ahuwit aga meso katiki, aro haliyok nali nengdok, la ahuwit long pot badi nengwak phlensi do, ladisi la kajinso ong ponyok chiron.
Labang nang than pendo, ladi kalek, manta bang hel mesosi katiki anali nengdok khanang archal tangsi thando.
Piyok pu tene nali ke ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo kicho-kangwe natsi, yongta hem-kime atengo, la anat anang hem-kime yongta kicho-kangwe chiplango, anang la kajinso nali chithan un do.
Labang alamthe ne naliyok ladi nali pubang; piyok pu tene, ango anengkan ke penebak katiki det ta kalek, katiki kar-ih si nali dung kiwang, nali phanke ladisi michang—
minon ta katiki kar-ih badi si kachihonjok nange do, ladisi ki-un ateng tiki pachok un ne, la-anat minon nangrideng katikime asalta pachok;
piyok pu tene kipi chihonjok do, anali kipi-un ajakong kangwe badi kalek, kipi-un badisi pipon man.
Piyok pu tene, prek hel ayok nengsam aphan, aro naliyok paduk-hap aphan kalek,

manta pubang pu tene, nang teng aro lahel kidole amun, nali ka-ongkal hel pahlong phrot man, lasi jong jongke nali kidole amun anali ka-ongkal hel kapador dun ayok, pachingbar ayoksi banta rung pondo;
lasi lo-kangthir long wido, “Inghosi ako-ong kido, ateng yok letchetche yongot, aro inghosi bekso kido, anangta ingjinje yongot.”
Manta naliphan Titas po angthin long la isi nengrong paplangdo, lasi Arnam yok kardom pido.
Piyok pu tene anang neneng kirung alam anang chideng ngo, layok ke abithang neng rongsi, abithang ahisa si nali dungyok damo.
Aro kime-alamthe kapahar asal badike ahuwit kachikruk hel asitem, parklam yok ke kalek, Hemphu ajortang aro hali phan kachihonjok anatsi,
hali parasi kapachok nange kido labang kajinso asal along hali kachilokdun ayok, kachikruk para kipachak ihut korteyok hali anangpen angtol duno.
Aro hali parasi kapachok nange kido labang banta-akithe alam kaita hali ado kolke, la anat hali trepsi dowendo.
Piyok pu tene Hemphu yok kipaklang det kalek, munusi kithek aphan ta, pusi akime bangpo hali chirondo.
Aro labang korte poyok hali aphongten kamprek alam hel archal langsi nengrong do aro naliyok anang kikrolthip anat, minon nengrong ongchot do, lasi hali labang korte yok ta analipen tolduno.
Titas po alam ke, anang nelokjor, aro anali ta nelokjor; aro hali korte bang-hini alam, naliyok kachikruk hel atharlon, aro Khristo ajortang matmatno.
Lasi nali nengdok, aro naliyok paklango pu tene, kachikruk helyok kapaklang atengo.
Piyok pu tene kangthir arleng hel kapame asal alam ke ne kiwi nange ingjong;

lake ne nali nenglong trepsi kido chithan undo; aro labang alam, mini nengkan isi para Akhaya alongri arleng trepsi do, Mesidoniya arleng hel angot nali phan aborai do; aro nali la nengrong ongchot arlengyok nengrungo.
Layongta naliyok hali labang aborai ke ladi kirap akijol kalek aro ne pot badi kipu, ladisi nali ke chihonjok do, la-apot nalidungyok korte hel yok tol duno.
Lale tene, Mesidoniya long angkhan arleng nepen damsi naliyok kachihonjok kangwe pahlongman, tene, nali lam thanthe ta, hali labang kikrol kachiha long tharak hlonge.

Lasi nali ango para kapang-ak wen labang abor-eh naksi banta hel alop badi ke kalek, bor-eh badi honjok wenot, la anat korte angkhan nalidung ango hrel damsi, labang hel kapachok yok ne analiyok kachingduk nange thekngo.
Manta labang alam ladi chikeng do, pusi inghosi amu bekso rip man, anangke beksosi athe hlonge, aro inghosi amu ako-ong rip man, anangke athe ako-ong hlonge.
Abangten aneng dohosi, lale kanange ateng pipesi, abithang angthinlong jibadi chipachipmo, ladine pi not; piyok pu tene nengrong aneng pen kipi poyok Arnam nengdokman.
Aro jipe, ahuwit alam ahuwit apor nali ahuwit kidor ateng kido apotsi, nali ahuwit kime asal along ong-ongsi pidun unman, labang anat Arnam naliyok ahuwit kajinso long pador unman.
Labadi alam wido, “Anang kanange abangyok nengwak daksi pi pono, kicho kangwe abangyok banta pajiro; anang dhorom kangthir moyok doman.”
Inghosi kiripyok amu piman aro cho-jun aphan him pajirman, anangsi naliyok achili pisi pachane, aro nali dhorom kangthir angban kihari pachoknge.
Ladisi nali ahuwit banta kipijong anat ahuwit alam along ajiuli kihari apot, la banta kipijong hali parasi Arnam yok kardom pachokman.
Piyok pu tene labang banta pisi kapachok pi asal katiki kangthir arleng hel ka-ongkal along rap mo, ladet kalek, manta Arnam kardom ako-ong pisi Arnam aronsi ong-ongsi damdo.

Labang kirapdun asal katiki mat-mat archal tangsi, nali Khristo long kime-alamthe hoi kicho alamthe ateng kimeng apot, aro analiyok aro prek ahuwit nali kipi banta ako-ong anat, anali Arnam yok jortang patha-angdo.
Aro hali bithang naliphan pingkit jongsi, naliyok Arnam asombhik jinso do, ladi naliyok ar-ih dun do.
Arnam thanta pa-or un-eh pho abanta kipi anat anangyok kardom pi nang.
Ne Pol po nali mek sungdang ke Khristo badi chinomhop aro kangduk alampen naliyok chingkuk si pudo— ne nali mahang semsemke chipabek si, manta nali para chikakngo tene, nali pen chipangtang dut man!—
Ne nali chingdukdo, ne konam wange angkhan kachiha ateng pangtangke pupeta halo, piyok putene angkhan arleng ke neyok pirthepe long atengsi tikido pusi chironman.
Piyok pu tene hali munusi badi arjak yongta, munusi atengke chirbube;
piyok pu tene ili kachirbu nokjir ke a-ok pen kalek, manta arlong ahem kapangho ateng ta Arnam angot ajakong do;
hali nenglong kachingje, aro aborai alam hel Arnam ajiuli agiyan along paprelsi, Khristo arlo mengdo.
Aro nali kimeng chok phrot pu tene, ahuwit kimengme hel kitengdun yok ta honjok wensi do.

Mek angot potdo, bangpo nali langot. Inghone bakpo abithangyok Khristo adun pusi aporman pi tene krolman, tene anang pot badi Khristo pen doman, hali ladi kipu anang bithang chiron phakne pachilang nang.
Nali yok kapangho aphan ke kalek, manta nali dhorom kangthir kihari yok Hemphu haliyok apharan pilo, hali labang apharan alam yongta bekso aborai doman, layong ta ne tharak hlonghle ye;
aro jipe ne kiwi lo hel pensi nali paphere ye, ladi ke aneng ingjong.
Piyok pu tene arleng hel puman, “Anang lo hel alin do aro apharan do; manta anang kipu alamthe ke, un-eh pho aro anang kithan alam acho ingjong.”
Hali pot alamthe than hlong, hali kidode amun thanthe si, anang kido amun than pone, tangsi labang arleng abhu pahlong nang.

Piyok pu tene abithangyok kaparklam pon angkhan arlengpen, hali bithang ateng alekhot, lale pachingbar yok aha dode; anali abithang yok pachirlinsi, aro abithang pachingbar ke, agiyan kido asal tiki ponpe.
Hali, chironre phoke aborai dopon pe, Arnam pot badi hali kihlonge abhak ateng arwalsi, nali dungyok wang pahlengo, labang bangkan arleng karwal alekhot ateng aborai doye.
Piyok pu tene nali labangso ayok hali kipu nange ahol kangwe badi, hali abithang yok thekrak ke paklangkle yong; piyok pu tene Khristo kime-alamthe paharpon jongsi, hali nali dungyok kihleng dam;
hali alekhot weke bang hel katiki hap aborai dunde, ladi kalek; manta hali kachiha dun ke hali katiki karwal asal ahlam pathepon ongne padonang,
bang kapahar angbong hel along aborai wesi, nali kido alongri apar ta kime-alamthe pahar dam hlonge pusi chihado.
Manta kipuman badi, “Inghosi aborai doman, anang Hemphu longne aborai padonang.”
Piyok pu tene inghosi anang abithang kamichang chipaklang man, lake archalsi kihlong tang kalek; manta ingho yok Hemphu kamichang pusi arwalman, anangsi karchal tang kichok arlengpo.
Ne bekso kamango yok nali ke chihiman, labangpo ne ar-ih do; ne pen chihido pusi chihado!
piyok pu tene ajiuli neng kachiso badi naliphan halineng chisodo, lake Khristo arideng uklong osope mat-mat kachipek angden pensi, naliyok ihut det apihanpo ayok, lake Khristo yok lam-athip pilo.
Manta labang phurulpo jibadi anang kaborai anatsi Hawa pe yok kachobel, ladisi Khristo yok nali nengsamjin aro kangthir aneng, lalong para nali neng pene bak ke ingho mene, labang si ne chiphereman.

Piyok pu tene ingho alamthe hali paharhe lang, ladi kamprek Jisu alam inghone bak wang paharman, lale nali jibak ajiuli hlonghle lang, ladi kamprek ajiuli pahlong, lale jipe kime-alamthe nali en-eh lang, ladi prek isi kime-alamthe yongta en-man, tene nali pot badi chihi unman.
Piyok pu tene ne chirondo, labang aghai adun helyok ke ne bekso ta aphel dode yong.
Manta ne lam kithan nange ateng than-thekthe yong, ne agiyan kangwe badi; ahuwit apor salpen lamthe pakeng hletsi ahuwit nali sitem pachiklango.
Nali kaparklam pon aphansi, ne bithang ke chipabek si, Arnam kime-alamthe nali ngot kapahar amun, ne pap tiki hlongo ma?
Nali sitem kirap ayok bang kachikruk para wang-kirap banta pomar chidengsi nali sitem sal-lap hlongo ma?

Aro konam nalipen kido apor, aro ne jokha kanange kidojap, la-amun nali kaiyokta aduk pipe yongot; piyok pu tene kortehel Mesidoniya para wangsi ne kanange hel pador detno; aro isi alamta nali phuthak padukde yongot, lasi nali padukdesi nebithang do pono aro do pon jonge.
Khristo khanang nelong do, pu tene Akhaiya alongri ahol nelamthe long aborai jutje ye.
Aro piyok? Ne naliyok neng kidokde anat ma? Arnamsi thek neke nalyok nengdok man.
Aro ne potsi tiki do, labang kijongdun abang pot alam aborai, labang kapachak asal anali hali pen isi alam chiplang man, la-apot anali angkijong awak pahlonghle ayok, bangpo aro tiki jonge.
Piyok pu tene lamehel arleng ke kachobel adun aro kachobel abang.
Aro asombhik kalek; piyok pu tene si-ik ke abithang ta katha-ang tharlon paklangman.
Lasi labang murkiya hel ta kadhorom murkiya hel badi kapaklang po ke, labang akithe alam kalek; manta abithang katiki pensi anali ore.
Ne nalithan phakdo, nali kaita neyok kamango pu ke chironek; manta nali chiron, yongta ne kamango chetdo, la-anat neyok kamango badi enot.
Labang potsi nali pu hlongdo, labang ke Hemphu apharan badi ke pupe yong, ihut mangohap si, aborai kido agiyan alamthe pensi nali puhlongdo;
munusi hel kaborai badisi ne ta aborai than hlongman.
Piyok pu tene nali agiyan kido badisi, nengrongsi kamango hel yok chihido.

Piyok pu tene inghone bak naliyok turu oteman, inghone bak naliyok paremrop man, inghonebak naliyok beng-thotsi ponman, inghone bak aborai doman, lale inghone bak nali ang-om nali ardepman, inghone bak nali sapman, yongta nali chihisi do.
Oik, hali penebak kikrol kapherjok natsi kido! Layok ne tharaksi hoi chodo— layong ta penebak alamlong prek abang ke chironsi kamango pensi thando— lalong neta ladi si chiron man.
Anali Hibru arleng ma? Ne ta lalo. Anali Israyel arleng ma? Ne ta lalo. Anali Abraham po agijing ma? Ne ta lalo.
Anali Khristo amurkiya ma? Ne ingcham badi pudo, ne layok ongchot; labang aporman ongchot chipaduk ngo, akrol along ongchot chibeng tango,
lake bar-phongo Jihudi hel arideng, angkol hini aphong nesap mo,
barthom pri-chek atokok pen nesap mo, iphongke arlong nekiwar, phong-thom jahaj kachingho aduk cholo, langpe asitem inirsi anuwe-anelo dolo;

ne aphongten kidam long kaphere meme, langjon long kaphere meme, kanghuhel para kaphere meme, abithang ajat arleng para kaphere meme, Bang-ajat hel para kaphere meme, rongpe along kaphere meme, langpe long kaphere meme, asisik kapahar abang korte hel asitem kido kaphere meme;
aphongten ne ami-ih wesi kidam, ne an kangchir aro kalang-ik long, aphongten an-humsi kido hlong, kichum ong, aro pe-rik wepho si kido aduk kihlong.
Aro lamehel alam padam nang; manta kithane ke, arni ten kachikruk hel aphan ne pachiron hapsi do hlongdo.
Ingho krol un-eh pho kido, lalong ne ke krol un-eh phoke kalek? Ingho pap katiki, lalong neneng doho dunde kalek?
Ne aborai kido nang, tene ne ajat-jat ki-un eh pho alampen ne aborai doye.
Ne ke kachobel alam ingjeje, bangpo Hemphu Jisu Apa Arnam, inghosi arni kiwang bor-eh chok, anang than undo.
Damaskas long Aristas gobornor po arlo kido amun, phu-phang hel ne kinep yok chironsi Damaskas abang rongpe owa kapahon sonturi kibi,
manta inghap aso para arpong ajon pachik pen pasuno aro anang arideng para jokngo.
Kaborai para akime chokche; yongta kaborai nange doman, manta ajat-jat kachimangka aro Hemphu kachiklang alamthe pubang.
Khristo long kido ihut arlengyok ne chithan uno te, nengkan kere-phili ango, abang akihrengsine, apharlosi chithan un-eh, Arnamsi than-un, anangyok thak-thom ethakpe angsong yok kipon.
Ladi natsi ihut arlengpo yok ne than un do, abang kihreng pensi ma apharlosi labang si ne chithan un-eh, Arnam si than une,
aro anangyok ethakpe-alongri yok pangthur pono, anang kipu nangne aro arleng kachithan thekthe alam karju.
Labadi ihut aphansi ne aborai doye; manta ne kamprek ki-un eh aniste, ne bithang anat ke prek alam aborai dode ye.

Piyok pu tene aborai kido ahisa do, layong ta ne kamango dode ye; piyok pu tene ne khanang posi nang thane; manta kaita neyok langke, lale ne lamthe onesi, neyok pot badi nechiron, layok ta neyok kimechot chironek, la-anatsi neng pangdom si endo,
aro labang kachiklang alam hel pen neng kime la-an aborai kido nangne. Lasi ne bangso long isi angthek nepido, ne la-an aborai kido hlonghle yok, nekiteng-klung badi isi nengsik ajiu nepilo.
Labang ne para katerek aphan ta Hemphu ango phong-thom ne pingkitno,

manta la-amun anang neyok pulo, “Ne kajinso detsi nangphan dor-re; piyok pu tene kikrol un-eh long ne jakong pensi chok phrot.” La-apot Khristo ajakong nelong do, la-apotsi nenengrong ongsi ne prek-prek apor kikrol un-eh amun aborai doye.
Piyok pu tene Khristo aphan ne ki-un eh, mahang katharak, kicho-kangwe, honjat, kaphere-meme lamehel along nengsam man; piyok pu tene konam ne kikrol un eh, layong ta ajakong dochot.
Ne mango hlongo! Nalisi bangpo kanange kido; piyok pu tene nali parasi ne parklam hlong nange kido; piyok pu tene ne kangwe pu yongta, la aghai adun hel yokta bekso ta paphelphe yong.
Ahuwit kachirchi, asombhik aro katiki asin, aro jakong kithe katiki parasi khanang kangthir-adun asal nali sitem kapachok.
Ne thanot, nebithang naliyok kapaduk hap pipe yong, la-aparta, nali prek pot alam long prek kachikruk yok ta ingho chotno ma? Ne labang ado do pu tene neron not.

La phong-thom ne nalidungyok kidam chihonjok do. Aro minon ta naliyok aduk pipe ye; piyok pu tene nali boi-bihinihel kalek, naliyoksi bisar do; piyok pu tene apo-ape aphan osohel chithansi nangne, aso hel aphan si apo-ape hel kachihansi nange doman.
Ladisi ne nali jiu aphan nengrong panghon ne, aro panghon pisi doye. Yongta ne naliyok nenengdok chot man, tene nali neyok nengdok wedet do ma?
Ladi pachok nang, ne naliyok paduk hap-he yong, manta chiparesi naliyok arwalo.
Nali dung kitol abang inghone bak para naliyok kachobel ma?
Nali dung kidam yok Titas po kachingduk, aro anangpen la korte po yokta tolo. Titas po naliyok kachobel ma? Hali bang-hini isidet ajiuli long, inan kengkam chijorjiyong ma?

Nali la-an apor, hali bithang ado kangweh kapaklang yok meso tikido pusi chirondo ma? Hali Arnam ango dosi Khristo alam thando; aro ei nengdok hel, nali dhorom kihari ayoksi labang ahuwit nali thando.

Piyok pu tene ne phere do te, ne kidam amun naliyok pot badisi kilang ar-ido, lateng nali thek hlonghle ye, aro anali pot badi kilangyok anengdo, neyok labang ateng nethekthe ye; aro nali sitem ahul, mek-kachiso, kachingchek, kachursi, chithanjol-jol, aborai, charu-maru, labang ahuwit chiplange.

Lalong damphak hlong tene, ne Arnam nali ngot neyok pabek-chotne; aro inghosi ango pap tikilo, manta anali aneng aduk ingjong, la ako-ong arleng akangho asal katiki, kidoner, kapamok-mok alam, ne anali anat nengduk dohlonge.
La phongthom ne nalidung wangdo. Bang-hini lale bang kithom hakhi angho si ahuwit ado kido alam porman pihlonge.
Ango pap katiki abangyok aro kamprek ahuwit yok ango than tango; phong-ni kiwang amun kipu badi, minonta kidamde angotsi thando te, dam phak tene, ne nengdokde ye;
piyok pu tene Khristo ne parasi lam thando, labang aporman nali chohang dundo. Anang nali long ki-un eh kalek, manta nali sitem apharan do.

Piyok pu tene ki-un eh parasi anangyok kros long kitar, manta Arnam ajakong pensi anang hrengsi do. Piyok pu tene halita ananglong ki-un-eh badi dohlong do; manta Arnam ajakong anat, hali anangpen naliphan arjak dune.

Nali krolpensi doma ingjong, bangpo kilang yok, abithang archal ne long aro abithang aporman chilang. Lale nali bithang alam chithan un-eh ma? Khristo nali long do puke nali than un-eh yong ma? Ingjong pu tene nali khanangsi akijol arleng.
Manta chihasi do, nali than-une, hali akijol arleng kalek.
Manta nali akangho tikiyek, Arnam ango hali pingkit do, hali akijol pusi kachiklang yok kalek, manta hali akijol arleng badi halithek yongta, nalike kime asal tiki, labang ne pingkit si do.
Piyok pu tene khanangpo ado kipi hali ajakong ingjong, manta khanangpo aphansi do.
Piyok pu tene konam hali ki-un eh, manta nali ajakong do, la amun hali anengrong chipado do;

la-apot si, kapangho yok kalek, manta dhorom kihari yok Hemphu neyok pot apharan nepilo, labang apharan si badi, ne wang-kido adak ke pachurwit ke arkel-pasi nangne ye, ladi aron si kidamde amunsi, lamehel alam wido.
Kijut longke, ei korte aro ingjirhel, nali nengrong chipado, sal pachok, nengsam do, neng isi ne do, chingbarne do; lalong nengdok aro nengsam ajiubong katha-ang Arnam nalipen doye.
Kangthir kimung pen kardom pajir.
Ahuwit kangthir arlenghel naliyok kardom pajirdo.
Hemphu Jisu Khristo kajinso, Arnam anengdok, aro Jiuli-Kangthir kachingrum nali ahuwit pen pado dun nang.
Arleng parata kalek, lale arleng arideng para ta kalek, manta Jisu Khristo aro anangyok akithi hel asitem para ingthursi Apa Arnam parasi kapachak kangthir-adun ne Pol po—
aro nepen kido ahuwit Apa Arnam ahem arleng hel, Galatiya long kachikruk hel adungyok:
Apa Arnam aro Hemphu Jisu Khristo para kajinso aro nengsam padonang,
anangsi ili Apa Arnam kar-ih badi, labang kangho pirthepe para kapajok yok ili pap aphan abithang ajiu chipi lo.
Labang Apa Arnam yok jortang pi nang aro mo-moyok padonang. Amen.
Khristo kajinso long ingho naliyok taramsi wano, nalike khantok detsi anang para tikang si, kamprek kime-alamthe yok chipharlepsi dam do, bangpo ne asombhik pahlong do—
Labang prek kime-alamthe long det kalek, naliyok neng kapadoho aro Khristo kime-alamthe yok kamprek aga kithanpon abang angkhando.
Manta hali nali ngo pot badi kime-alamthe paharo, la-aparke kamprek kime-alamthe, hali yongta, lale ethakpe tharlon yongta, inghone bak nali ngot pahardo, tene anangke hao pa-un nang.
Hali aporong pot badi kithan, ladisi minon ne nalithan phakdo, nali potsi kime-alamthe chidengo, labang aparke prek kime-alamthe, inghone bak nali ngo pahardo, tene anang hao pa-un nang.

Piyok pu tene ne minon munusi neng pangsam nang ma, Arnam aneng pensi nali neng pangsam pon nang? Lale ne munusi aneng pangsam ayok si tiki hlongdo ma? Ne ke minon ta arlengyok aneng kapangsam aphan tiki hlongdo, tene ne Khristo amurkiya kalek.
Piyok pu tene ei korte aro ingjirhel, pot badi kime-alamthe ne parasi paharo, labang ke arleng badi kalek, ne munusi para bangpo hlonghle yong, labang ne nali kithan aneng do,
piyok pu tene ne bangpo munusi arideng parake thanthe yong, lale chirlile yong, manta ne bangpo Jisu Khristo kachiklang alamthe parasi pahlongo.
Neli Jihudi adhorom kido amun, ne pot badi kengkam kachijor, labang alam nali arjulo. Ne Arnam kachikruk yok letchorsi honjat kipi aro bangpomar kapangho phrot asal katiki;
aro ne sar-lar hel para awe-awe mainotsi kiwang abi-pun hel me-at nengpisi, nebithang ajat ajawor arleng abang hel yokta Jihudi adhorom along kiharipon.
Manta Arnam neyok ne aipe apok kiplang ango parasi anang ne arwalo aro anang kajinso pensi neyok netaramo,
anang So kime-alamthe ne si Bang-ajat hel angot pahar nange, la-apotsi anang konam abithang Aso nelong pachiklang yok nengsamo, la-amun ne a-ok aro awi arleng penke chirwal ponpe yongo;
lale Jerusalem yok, neyok ta ango kido adun hel adungyok damdesi, Arabiya alongri yok kidam, aro la aphel Damaskas yok wang chiru phakngo.
Laparake nengkan kithom aphel, Pitor po pen kachichini ayok Jerusalem damsi, anang pen ni kere phongo dolo;
manta anang aparke kamprek adun helyok ihut ayok ta pochakche yongot, Hemphu akorte Jems poyok detsi pochakngo.
Lamehel alam ne naliyok wido, langot, Arnam amahang semsemsi thando, labang alam asisik kalek.
Laparake Siriya aro Silikiya aholyok wango,
aro Khristo long wang kidun Judiya long Khristo kachikruk arleng helpen chipochak ke chinine si kido;
manta anali karjudet si kipu, “Ingho si aporong ke iliyok honjat kipi, minon ke anang ango kapanghodet yok kikrol phak alamthe pahardo.”
Aro anali niphan Arnam yok jortang padolo.
Laparake nengkan kere-phili aphel, ne Titas po yokta enpon si, Barnabaspo pen Jerusalem yok kidam phak.

Manta kachiklang amun kithan alam hlongsi lalong yok kidam. Laparake kime-alamthe ne Bang-ajat hel asitem pahar nange, bangpo lahel angot thanphrot no (yong ta aman kido phu-phang hel ango ahudet si kachithan) penebak ke chithan un-eh phosi ne akijolsi katdun hlongdo, lale kat hlonge mene pusi kachiron.
Manta halipen murkiya badi wang kidun Titas po, anang Grik ajat yongta, anangyok sunnot otete yongot.
Manta hali teng angkhan asisik kikrol korteyok Khristo Jisu long kijoktang alam kihumpon jol arleng wang padunsi iliyok aturu kangholpon kiron,
kime alamthe khanangpo nalithin parinang pusi khantok yongta anali arlo chingdom dunde yongot.
Aro inghosi labadi kithan aman kido phu-phang arleng, (labang hel nephan ke jat kanange kalek; piyok pu tene Arnam ibakdet ke langle) — labang phu-phang hel ne kanange isi bod-sere nepi un-eh yongot.
Labang aholan ke, sunnot ka-ote hel asitem pot badi Pitor poyok pahar tolo, ladisi sunnot ka-otete hel aphan ke neyok kime-alamthe kapahar aphang nepekngo pusi anali thekngo,
(piyok pu tene sunnot ka-ote hel aphan adun aphang anat Pitor po pensi sal kapachok yok kangthir-adun pekngo, labadisi anangsi Bang-ajat hel aphan nelong sal pachokngo),

aro neyok kipi labang kajinso chithan uno, la-amun pamurda arleng kido Jems po aro Pitor po aro Johon po, anali neyok kachiklang kajinso theksi, Barnabas po aro neyok anali alokjor pusi ancho-ari aga arwalo, anali haliyok ke Bang-ajat abangyok dam nange pusi, aro anali ke sunnot ka-ote abangyok dame chikengo.
Anali ithe alam hali kithan ke, halike kicho-kangwe abang yok kilangdun neng chipari nange pusi thano, ne manta katiki kar-ih si kido.
Manta konam Pitor po Antiyok yok wango, la-amun ne anang mahangsi anangyok honthe lo; piyok pu tene anang bithang ado tikisi kido.

Piyok pu tene Jems po adung para angkhan arleng kiwang angot, anang Bang-ajat helpen cho-junsi kido; manta konam anali wango, la-amun sunnot kachiplang helyok anang pheresi, paphel phaksi abithangyok chipaprekngo.
Aro kamprek ahuwit Jihudi helta anang pensi chingbar dunsi nengsik chipaklango, Barnabas poyokta nengsik along analipen chipon detno.

Manta anali kime-alamthe khanangpo badi krolke arjakje yong, bangpo theksi, ne ahuwit ango Pitor poyok pulo, “Nang Jihudi arleng yongta, Jihudihel badike kengkam chijorje yong, Bang-ajat badisi kengkam chijordo, tene Bang-ajat yok Jihudi hel badi piyok kengkam pachijorpon do?”
Manta kiplang parasi ilike Jihudi aro Bang-ajat papi badi kalek;

yongta ili than undo, lake ihut arleng kanong kimeng asal parake kalek, manta Khristo kikrol parasi dhorom kangthir alekhot hlongdo. Aro ili Jisu Khristo yok krolsi wango, la-apot Khristo yok kikrol parasi dhorom kangthir alekhot otno, aro kanong mengke hlonghle yong, piyok pu tene kaita kanong mengke dhorom kangthir chokche.
Manta ili meso kimeng anat Khristo long dhorom kangthir alekhot hlongman pu tene ili bithang yok papi chiplango, tene Khristo ke pap amurkiya ma? Ladi ke kalek!
Manta ne iphong pangholo, bangpo yok kemphak tene ne bithang pap ado paklang hlongdo.
Piyok pu tene, ne kanong pensi plango kanong pensi thilo, la-apot ne Arnam longsi hreng nange. Ne Khristo pen kros along thilo;
aro ne hrengsi kidoke ne kalek, manta Khristo si nelong hrengsi do. Aro minon nebang long ajiu kidoke, neyok nengkidok, aro nephan anang kichampi det Arnam Aso long kikrol parasi ne do hlong do.
Ne Arnam kajinso akijol otete lo; piyok pu tene dhorom kangthir ke kanong parasi chok tene Khristo ke isi aron wedung si thilo.
Ei kamango Galatiya abang! Inghote naliyok muhuni nali otelo? Nali mek angosi Jisu Khristo yok kros long kithi chiklang daksi paklang tango!
Ne nali para ke labang ithe kachirli yok rondo te: nali kihlong ajiuli, labang kanong mengsi hlongo ma, lale kikrol alam ka-one parasi hlongo?
Nali la-an kamango ma? Ajiuli pen chengsi, minon a-ok pensi ki-oryok damdo ma?
Nali akijolsi la-an aduk cholo ma? —khanang si akijol chiplango bak hole.
Tene inghosi naliyok ajiuli piman, aro nali sitem asombhik asal pachokman, nang kanong mengsi hlongo ma, kikrol alam ka-one parasi hlong?
Labadisi Abraham po “Arnam yok krol, aro labangsi anangyok dhorom kangthir alekhot eno.”
Lasi, nang thekngo, ingho si krolo anali Abraham po aso hel.

Aro lo-kangthir ke labang ango thek weno, lake Arnam Bang-ajat hel yok kikrol parasi dhorom kangthir pusi alekhot en pone, pusi Abraham po yok ango kime-alamthe parjulo, “Ahuwit Bang-ajat nang long bor-eh hlonge.”
La anatsi, ingho krol do, anali Abraham po pensi kikrol bor-e hlongdo.
Piyok pu tene lo-kangthir long pudo, “Inghosi kanong alo long kiwi ahuwit alam mainot ke dode, anang hao phoye.” Ingho kanong kimeng asal tikido labang ahuwit ta hao undo.
Minon ke aporman hlongo lake kaita kanong parake Arnam ango dhorom kangthir pu ke alekhot chiplangple, piyok pu tene, “Dhorom kangthir ke kikrol parasi hrenge.”
Manta kanong ke kikrol nange ingjong; la-aholan “Inghosi kanong mengman, anangsi bangpo pen hrenge.”
Khristo si anang iliphan hao ki-un natsi chiplangsi kanong ahao parake iliyok pajokngo — piyok pu tene kiwi alamthe do, “Ingho yok thengpe long weksi biman, anang hao ki-unpo.” —
Abraham po abor-eh ke Khristo Jisu parasi Bang-ajat yok wango, aro hali kapang-ak ajiuli kikrol parasi hlongman.”
Ei korte aro ingjirhel, ne arni kid-kithak para isi parhlansi pubang: inghut arlengpo iphong pangning tangdo, pu tene kaita lalong pachanche, lale akijol ke tikike.

Minon ke Abraham po aro “Nang agijingpo” yok kapang-ak alam kido aro anang, “Agijing helyok” pu ke ako-ongyok pupe yong; manta ihut alam kipu ke, “Aro nali agijingyok” lake ihut arlengyok, bangpo agijing, anang ke Khristo.
Minon ne labangsi thando, kanong ke, phoro-philil ne thom-kep anengkan aphel kiwang, Arnam aporong parasi pangningsi kibi kachingnak abi-pun hel long kapang-ak alam akijol otete.
Piyok pu tene kihlong nange adeng kanong parasi wangdet kapang-ak parake wangweye; manta Arnam kapang-ak parasi Abraham po yok bangpo pilo.
Laparake kanong ke pot ayok te? Ingho agijingyok pang-akngo, anang kiwange agijing po oweyok, kithan alamthe kapangho aphansi kanong pilo; bangpo Arnam aphan tharlon asitempo parasi arwalo.
Minon ke asitempo ihut yokta ongchot doman; manta Arnam ke ihut det.
Tene kanong Arnam kapang-ak hel tengklak man ma? Ladike kalek! Piyok pu tene kanong ke ajiu kipi-un nang tene, dhorom kangthir labang kanong kiwang nange lo hoi.
Manta kapang-ak athe ke Jisu Khristo long kikrol pensi kikrol abangyoksi pipono, la-apot lo-kangthir ke ahuwit pap arlo bengsi bilo.
Minon ke kikrol nange po kachiklang arniyok, ili kanong arlo bengsi aro kuk-klaksi kido hlong.
Manta ili kikrol parasi dhorom kangthir pusi alekhot kihlong yok Khristo kiwang arniyok, kanong si ili pangdom khokhrepo badi kido.
Manta minon ke kikrol wango, ili pangdom khokhre po arlo welo.
Piyok pu tene Khristo Jisu long kikrol parasi nali ahuwit Arnam asomar chiplangdo.
Konbak arleng Khristo long baptist chiplango, nali abangten Khristo ayok chi-ikngo.
Lalong ke Jihudi, lale Grik, aro prek-prek ke kalek ngo, turu lale kijok prek-prek ke kalekngo; arloso aro penso prek-prek ke kalekngo; piyok pu tene nali ahuwit Khristo Jisu long isidet.
Aro nali Khristo long kido abang pu tene, nali Abraham po agijing, kapang-ak atengke bor-eh kihlong aidot kido abango.
Ne kipuye ke, bor-eh kihlonge aidot kido abang ke, oso kido alengke, lahel kido-kangwe apuru ahemphu yongta, aturu natsi dodun hlongman;
manta lahel kipi akhap yok apo aro sal-chak hel arlo do dun hlongman.
Ladisi iliyok ta; oso kido amun, bharasot abi-pun arlo aturu badi kido.
Manta apor wang chokngo, kanong arlo kiplang, aro kanong arlo kido abang kapajok yok, arloso apok pensi kiplang, Arnam abithang Aso yok wang tolo,
kanong arlo kido abang kapajok yok, la-apotsi ili ke kachi-al aso aphang pahlong yok wangtol lo.
Aro nali Arnam aso chiplango apot, Arnam anang Aso Ajiuli ili ingthin longyok wangtol lo, lasi hangsol si, “Abba! Apa!” pusi taram man.
Lasi nali ihut aturu ke kalek ngo, manta aso chiplang do, aro aso chiplang tene, nang Arnam pensi bor-eh kihlonge aidot, chiplang do.
Ango ke konam nali Arnam kachinine kido, la-amun jipe arnam kalek yong ta, nali labang hel aturu asal katiki dun.
Minon ke, nali Arnam yok chinilo, aro layok ta Arnam ta nali chinilo, layong ta pot badi apharan kangwe aro ki-un eh aban abi-punyok chirulsi, aro kichorhi ajiu hel aturu katiki ar-ido?
Nali akime arni hel, achiklo hel, kamai hel, abotor hel aro anengkan, lamehel chimainot do.
Nali phan ne pot badi chipaduk-hapmo, bangpo akijol chiplang bo ma, pusi nali nat ne chipheresi do.
Ei khoi hel, chingduk si nalithan do, nali ne badi chiplangot, piyok pu tene neta nali badi chiplangdo. Nali neyok akangho tiki pipe yong.
Ne bangpo kimaime kido apotsi, ne kicheng apor nalingot kime-alamthe pahar un-eh yongot, bangpo nali than undo;
ne aduk-tap kido amun nali yok archalsi kilang atengo, la-amun nali neng hohe yongot lale nisese yongot; layong ta neyok Jisu Khristo long, ihut Arnam tharlon badi kachideng.
Nali neng akime aneng pot chiplango? Piyok pu tene naliyok ne labang hakhi pido, ki-un nang tene, nali mek hel hleksi nepi uno hoi.
Minon ke naliyok khanang alam kithan apot ne nali hutur chiplang hlongo ma?
Mehel arleng nali pame-atsi nali langdun do, ladi kalek; manta nali phan akime aron isi ingjong; nali bhalak si kibiyok aneng do, tangsi anali pen chipek det hlonge.
Konam ne nalidung kido apor ke, akime aphan pu tene, aporten ta akime asal aron ki-en pon thek ke akime.
Ei ne somar, Khristo apharan wang chiklangkle leng ke, ne naliphan oso kiplang yok apok-abi natsi aduk-cho hlong do.
Ne minon jong nalipen kidodun anengdo, aro prek asi pen kithan yok aneng do; piyok pu tene nali lamhel ne kaphere meme hlong do.
Ei kanong arlo kido kar-ih hel, nethan not, nali kanong alam hel arjuje ma?
Piyok pu tene lo-kangthir long wido, lake Abraham po so-penso bang-hini kido, ihut ke aturu arloso pe apok para kiplang, aro ihut ke kijok apiso pe apok kiplang.
Ihut ke, aturu pe asopo a-ok badisi kiplang; prek poke, kijok apisope asopo, labang ke kapang-ak ateng si kiplang.
Minon hini kaparhlan alamthe do: labang-hini arloso ta hini kachingnak alam do. Ihut arloso pe, khanang ke Hagar pe, kachingnak alamthe Sinai Inglongpe parasi, aturu kido aporsi kipaplang.
Minon ke Hagar pe ke Sinai Inglong kartulpe Arabiya alongri alamthe aro kido jong Jerusalem rongpe yok puman, bangpe ke aturu apunsi apok aso kido.
Manta prek ihutke, ethakpe long kido Jerusalem pe puman, anang si kijokpe bangpe si ili aipe.

Piyok pu tene kiwi alam do, “Ei aso kachibube, baji arloso pe nengrong chipado; ei so-kiplang apok abi kangwe arloso pe, nengrong chipado aro hangsol; piyok pu tene apihan kido pe yok ke baji arloso pe oso dochotne.”
Minon nali, ei khoihel, Isak po badi kapang-ak aso chiplang do.
Manta a-ok badi kiplang po, ajiuli badisi kiplang po yok honjat pilo, ladisi minon ta chiplang do.
Manta lo-kangthir long pot pudo? “Turu pe yok aro anang so soyok ujharnot; piyok pu tene kijokpe asopo pen, turupe asopo bor-eh kihlong aidot weye.”
La-apot ei khoi hel, ili ke turu pe aso kalek, manta kijok arloso pe aso chiplang hlongo.
Khristo kijoktang aphansi iliyok pajok ngo. La-apot, neng chipachip mot, aro aturu badi jongali long chibat dun phakngenot.
Monon, ne, Pol po, nali pubang, nali sunnot ote ye pu tene Khristo long nali sal chakche phoye.
Sunnot kachiplang ahuwit yok ne hakhi piphak bang, anali abangten sunnot ka-ote hel lake anang kido kangwe kanong kamainot pen nange doman.
Nali ahuwit ta kanong kimeng parasi dhorom kangthir pusi alekhot en do, nali Khristo para chipangbo lo; nali kajinso para jango.
Piyok pu tene ili Ajiuli parasi kikrol pensi dhorom kangthir kachiha inghong si dohlongdo.
Piyok pu tene Khristo Jisu long sunnot jatsi chakche, sunnot ka-otete pota chakche; manta kikrol pensi nengdok pensi alekhot endo.
Nali me-atsi kikat; laparake khanangpo kimengme yok ingho te nali tengo?
Ladi aneng kachiwan, naliyok kataram ihutpo parake kalek.
Bekso det athengkur posi him adumpo yok pangkang man.
Ne nali chinengtang dolang lake nali prek chironreye pusi nali kroldun si doman. Manta inghosi naliyok aneng paso hlokdo, anang bithang aduk choye.
Ei korte hel, ne sunnot abi-pun minon ta pahardo, pu tene honjat tongsi dode yong ma? Ladi hak kapahar nang tene, kros aduk hel chohlonghle lo hoi.
Inghosi naliyok pangho, anali abithang a-ok kachingtep si kime.

Piyok pu tene, ei korte aro ingjirhel, nali kijoktang aphansi nali taramo; labang kijoktang det ke nali a-ok long kar-ih karpat hel pachok aphan kalek, manta nengdok pensi ihut para ihutyok murkiya asal tiki pon.
Piyok pu tene, “Nang dung arel abangyok nang bithang badi nengdok,” bangpo kiwi alam pensi kanong ajaldung chokpleng do.
Yongta, nali ihut para ihut yok kachingchek aro chi-ot prup do, pu tene nali ihut para ihut yok chipangho do, labang meso chilangwen.
Ne pubang, nali Jiuli-Kangthir pen kengkam chijor aro lalong jatsi nali a-ok kar-ih badi pachok ponek.

Piyok pu tene a-okpo kar-ih ke Jiuli-Kangthir yok tenge, aro Jiuli-Kangthir ta a-ok long kar-ih tenge; piyok pu tene nali potsi katikiyok aneng do, bangpo nali tiki nangne, la-anat la-hini isi para isiyok chiteng prup man.
Manta nali Jiuli-Kangthir pensi kengkam chijorpon, tene nali kanong arlo ingjong.
Minon ke a-ok asal hel ke thek-er do: lamehel ke kidoner, akisim asal katiki, kapharlep-lep, kapamok mok,
agoya kachirdom, montoro kachirli, chipa hutur phro, ahul, amek kachiso, neng-akang, kilang setset, kachiphat, lam chingbarbe, kachitheng, aborai, kangri,

Aneng aborai kido, kangri klang, kachihang hlok, aro labadi akangho majit. Ne naliyok kapachilang wenyok, ne ango ta pachilang wenyok than tango; inghosi ladi kengkam chijorman, anali Arnam-alongri aidot hlonghle ye.
Manta jiuli- kangthir para kiwang atheke: nengdok, nengrong, nengsam, kachipaning ding, kajinso loi-loi, bor-eh kibat, kikrol, kachinom, kikrol loi-loi,
kachinomhop loi-loi, aneng kachipangdom; lamehel athak kamprek ke kanong wepeno.
Aro inghosi Khristo Jisu long do, anali akro aro kar-ih hel a-ok po yok kros long tar duno.
Ili Jiuli pensi do pon, tene Jiuli pensi chilangpon nange.
Ili ihut para ihut yok neng chipakang nangne, aro ihut para ihutyok chithengke, akijol aborai paklang nangne.

Ei khoihel, inghone bak penebak pap tikisi chinep dung, pu tene nali Jiulipen kido abang, nali chipabek hop ajiulipen ladi arleng yok raldun phak. Aphelyok nang bithang honjat wangwe yok, abithng yok ta chilangpon.
Nali ihut para ihut aduk rung dunsi, Khristo kipi angton pachok pon nange.
Piyok pu tene inghone bak ke jat thekthe dung yongta ne ihutpo pusi chironman, tene anang abithang yoksi chichobel man.
Ahuwit ihut para ihutyok abithang katiki hel archalne lang ngot; tangsi adung-arel abang katiki badi kalek, nang katiki hel anat aborai do chotne.
Piyok pu tene abangten abithang duk-hap hel rungpon nange.
Inghosi kapaklang alamthe hel chirliman, anang kapaklang po yok ahuwit akime abihini abhak chipi man.
Nali bithangyok chobel lek, Arnam yok chongnek-hopot; piyok pu tene arleng ihut potsi rip, ladisi anang rot-rimme.
Piyok pu tene nang abithang a-ok aronsi rip tene, anang a-ok para kanghon nange athe rot-rimme; manta inghosi Jiuli aphan rip, anang Jiuli para or-eh len Ajiuli athe rot-rimme.
Lasi akime asal tikilen si ili nengrong pajut nangne; piyok pu tene ili lak hulhe pu tene, owe po chokchit apun athe rot-rim hlonge.
Lasi kime akhen hlong pu tene, ahuwit aphan akime, layok ke kikrol hem isi aphan kime asal tiki nange.
Langot, la-an akithe alam kiwi alo ne bithang aripen naliyok wido!
Labangke mehel arleng aphan ingho a-ok long athok kilangme paklang, anali ahuwit yok sunnot ka-ote yok nalipon man; manta anali ke Khristo kros anat honjat hlonghle, la-apot si lamehel tikiman.
Piyok pu tene sunnot ka-ote abang kanong mengme; nali a-ok long anali aborai kido ayok si, naliyok anali sunnot ka-ote aneng do.
Manta ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo kros apar ke, prek alamthe aborai ne para pangwe nang; labang kros parasi pirthepe dung neyok, aro ne pirthepe adak kros long thilo.
Piyok pu tene sunnot pen alekhot chiplangple, sunnot kangwe penta alekhot chokche; manta ajiuli akimi kiplang posi khanang.
Aro konbak arleng ladi abi-pun ateng do dun ne— anali aro kajinso aro Israel Arnam aphuthak nengsam pachok dun nang.
Minon parake, kaita neyok aduk nepi yek; piyok pu tene ne bithang abang long Jisu ajat-jat aduk kicho asinhel chi-en worsi do.
Ei korte aro ingjirhel, ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo kajinso nali ajiuli long pado dun nang. Amen.
Arnam ahisa parasi Khristo Jisu kapachak kangthir-adun Pol po, Ephisiya long kido kangthir arleng, aro Khristo Jisu long kikrol arleng hel adung yok.
Ili Apa Arnam aro,
Hemphu Jisu Khristo para naliyok kajinso aro nengsam padonang.
Arnam aro ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo Apa bor-eh pachok nang; anangsi ahuwit ajiuli bor-eh pensi ethakpe ateng kangthir athem badi Khristo long iliyok bor-eh batno.
Anang mahang semsem si kangthir nengdok long ado wesi pangthiro, lasi anang pirthepe kaparjak ango para iliyok Khristo long arwal tango.
Anang kar-ih anat, Jisu Khristo pensi aso kapachiplang aphan anang iliyok nengdok weno.
Anang kajinso ajortang kaparklam yok anang nengdok ili pajir phleno.
Anang long kido kajinso apuru kido atengsi anang wipen ili pajokdo, ili pap kolo.
Labang kajinso apuru iliyok wangpi phrotno.
Anang neng ateng ahuwit kabutisit acho alamthe Khristo longsi pachok phrotsi ili yok pachiklang ngo,
Khristo long apor kichok phrot angden atengsi, ethakpe kido aro pirthimipe long kido ahuwit yok ta anang long kapangrum ayok rono.
Anang aneng kar-ih kachirhep ateng ahuwit kapachok yok, anang katiki pon aneng badi aporong karwal wen apotsi, ili labang Khristo longsi bor-eh kihlonge aidot ili pilo,
Iliyok Khristo long ango kachiha piweno aro anang jortang kaparklam aphan pachakngo.
Anang longsi nalita, khanang lamthe lake nali kijoktang aphan kime-alamthe arju hlongo, aro anang yok krol lo, labang si kapang-ak Jiuli-Kangthir pensi amohor pilo;
labang si anang jortang parklam pon hlongyok, kijoktang adeng kihlonge aphan Arnam abithang arleng pusi ili taram si wan do.
Hemphu Jisu long potsi kikrol do, aro ahuwit kangthir abang yok, aro labang anat si,
ne ta kapingkit amun nalimen sunungsi, nali phan ne jutje lensi kardom pajir pon do.
Ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo Arnam, jortang kido Apa, naliyok agiyan kipi yok aro anang kachiklang alam abhu kihlong ajiuli kipi yok ne pingkitsi do,
la-apot si, Anang kataram kachiha nange alam pot do, lake kangthir arleng asitem anang bor-eh kihlonge ajortang matmat apuru ke potsi mene,
aro anang apharan kithe pensi katikipon long, ingho anang yok krol, ili yok anang alekha pi un-eh pho ateng apharan kithe asal pachokngo.
Konam Khristo long pharan kithe pensi kithihel asitem para anangyok pangthuro, aro ethakpe athem anang ancho-ari aga pangningo,
ahuwit abi-pun yok aro aphu-phang aro pangdom po, aro minon pirthepe long aro monphel oweyok chengsi konbak amendo, ahuwit amenyok artul chot pilo.
Aro ahuwit yokta anang kengpak arlo bilo aro anangyoksi ahuwit aphuthak paphusi, kachikruk yok pekdet no,
labang ke anang abang, ahuwit alam ahuwit yokta padorsi ahuwit pachok plengman.
Aro konam nali katiki ado aro pap pensi akithi kido, la-amun nali panghreng phakngo.
Iphong ke nali ta labang kido, pirthepe abi-pun atengsi, sunengpe kapangdom apharan long mengdunsi, lake kimengme asohel adak kapatiki ajiuli badi, iphong ke nalita kengkam kachijor.
Ili ahuwit ta iphong ke a-ok aro aneng kar-ih ateng tikisi, ibithang a-ok kar-ih pen chironsi kengkam kachijor, aro ili kido asoi ke bang hel badi akang along asohel kido.
Manta Arnam, ingho long kajinso apuru do, nengdok kithe pen anang iliyok nengdokngo,
layong ta konam ili pap anat thisi kido, la amun Khristo pen iliyok pahrengo— kajinso pensi nali kijok hlongo—
aro anangpen pangthuro si ethakpe badi kangthir athem long anangpen ili pangningo,
lasi kiwange awelong Jisu Khristo long alekha un-eh pho kajinso apuru ili yok paklang pen ne.
Piyok pu tene kajinso anat nali kikrol pensi kijok hlongo, aro labang ke nali bithang katiki para ke kalek; labang ke Arnam kipi banta pajiro—
kaita aborai kido un-eh aphan, sal katiki angban para ta kalek.
Piyok pu tene ili ke anang phan sanselo, kime asal katiki pon yok Khristo sanselo, ladisi Arnam aporong ili kido-kithak nange aduwar honjok pilo.
Lasi, iphong ke nali Bang-ajat arleng kipuman “sunnot ka-otete” abang pusi jipe —

ango ke nali Khristo para kamprek, kapang-ak kanong Israyel alongri parata kamprek kido, kapang-ak angton hel kachiphophe, kachiha wedetsi, aro Arnam wesi labang pirthepe long kido, labang helneng chipari.
Manta minon ke Jisu Khristo long do apotsi, angoke kaholo kido yongta, Khristo awi pensi adung hetno.
Piyok pu tene anangsi ili nengsam; anang hini arat yok ta anang-ok long isidet otelo aro rat kabhalak arpong panghosi, hutur pa-oro.
Arnam anang a-oklong kanong abi-pun aro aban angton hel kolpon detno, anang bithang along la hini pangwesi isi akimi arleng sansesi nengsam wanpilo,
aro kros pensi isidet abang long Arnam pen hini arat yok pachiloksi, labang hutur kido pa-oro.
La-anatsi Anang kiwang aro nali kahalo kido abang asitem nali ngot nengsam aro adung kido abangyok nengsam kime-alamthe paharo;
piyok pu tene anang parasi ili hini arat kido arleng hel Apa adung isidet ajiulipen kilut dun apharan hlongo.
Lasi nali kamprek arat aro bang alongri arleng kalek ngo, manta nali kangthir abang pen karjap arleng aro Arnam ahembang arleng chiplango,
aro Jisu Khristo abithang atok long aghai arlong matmat dosi, adun aro katurki abang kaparjap abhiti long nali chirhapsi chikem dundo.
Anang longsi athawol aru-rang chiplangsi Hemphu Arnam ahem long inan chingbarsi aro chingthursi kihari dopon do;
anang longsi Arnam aphan ajiuli kido athem chiplangsi nali inan kihari dopon do.
Labang anatsi ne, Pol po, Jisu Khristo aphan akrol along dohlongsi nali Bang-ajat hel aphan—
piyok pu tene khanangsi nali phansi Arnam kajinso neyoksi nekipi alamthe nali arju hlongdo,
aro pot badi si neyok chiklangsi kabutisit alamthe agiyan neyok paklango, ladi angkhan athak kipu alamthe wilo,
nali labang kiwi alam chiporhe tene, Khristo long kabutisit acho alamthe ne jipe abhu kihlong hel, nali ta abhu hlonge.
Minon jibadi anang Jiuli-Kangthir pensi kangthir-adun aro katurki helyok pachiklando, aporong awelong labadi kabutisit acho alamthe munusi yok paklangkle yongot:
holasi, kime-alamthe parasi Bang-ajat hel Jisu Khristo long adun adeng hlongduno, isidet abang long abangphu chiplango, aro kapang-ak bor-eh hlong duno.
Arnam jibadi anang apharan pen katiki pon yok jinso neyok nepilo, la-anatsi ne labang kime-alamthe amurkiya chiplango.
Ne ahuwit kangthir hel asitem akibek chot ke ne lo, layong ta Bang-ajat angot kime-alamthe kapahar dam ayok Khristo alekha pi un-eh pho kajinso apuru nepilo,
aro ahuwit yok Arnam kahurji long kicheng amun parasi kabutisit acho alamthe angden abangten yokta kapaklang ayok pekngo;
la-anat minonke kachikruk parasi Arnam along ajat-jat agiyan hel, ethakpe ateng kapangdom abang aro aphu-phang helyok kapahar ponyok pek ngo;
labang ke ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo long moyok kidolen aron atengsi anang long pachok ngo,
labang Jisu long ili anangyok kikrol parasi, kilut dun aha aro chineng tangsi lutdun un do.
La-apot ne kapingkit amun, ne nali phan aduk kicho anat nali neng ingho yek; lamehel nali long jortang rido.
La-anatsi Apa angot ne tarhuksi labadi pingkit do,
anang parasi ethakpe aro pirthimipe athak kido ason tenta anang amen endo.
Ne pingkit do, anang jortang kipi apuru atengsi, anang Ajiuli parasi ingthin along munusi aphan naliyok apharan anang pensi papidun nang,
aro ladisi kikrol pensi Khristo nali ingthin along parjap nang; nali ladi nengdok angkur kido badi aro nengdok chipangkur nang.
Ne pingkitman ke potsi ajon pen apan aro kartul pen karnuk yongta, ahuwit kangthir abangpen, nali abhu kapahlong apharan padonang,
aro abhu hlonghle pho agiyan Khristo nengdok kithek yok, ladisi nali neng long Arnam asoi hel abhu hlonge.
Minon ke anang long ili kapingkit ahuwit lale kachimangka yokta letchot si kime asal katiki ajakong wangdo,
kachikruk long anangyok aro Khristo Jisu long kiwang mo-moyok anang jortang pado nang. Amen.
Lasi ne, Hemphu aphan ne akrol long kido badi, nali kataram aron kamichang ateng kido-kithak pon yok naliyok chingduk do,
ahuwit chingdom si aro chinom hopsi aro chipaning dingsi nengdok pen ihut para ihutyok chihine do,
nengsam chikeng-chirlinsi, Jiuli-Kangthir asap kachipado yok, mesone tikipon.
Abangpo isidet, aro ajiuli ta isidet, ladisi naliyok kataram ta isidet kachiha ayoksi taramo,
Hemphu ihutdet, kikrol isidet, baptist isidet,
Arnam ihutdet, aro ahuwit Apa, anangsi ahuwit aphuthak aro ahuwit pen chingtang detsi do aro ahuwit angthin pleng si do.
Manta Khristo abor-eh atengsi ili abangten yok kajinso bor-eh pilo.
Lasi kipu alamthe do, ‘‘Anang ethakpe yok kidam amun, anang akrol kibeng helyok pono, aro anang arleng helyok ajat-jat bor-eh pilo.’’
(Konam labang kipu, ‘‘Anang ethakpe thuro,’’ labang ke pot pulo, manta anang pirthimipe longyok wang kisun kipu, para prek pot alamthe ili pudo?
Inghosi wang kisun, anangsi ahuwit along wang karjak yok ethakpe angsong yok damo.)
Anang kipi bor-eh hel angkhan yok kangthir-adun, angkhan yok turki, angkhan yok kime-alamthe kapahar, angkhan yok khokhre aro angkhan yok kapaklang abor-eh pilo,
kangthir abangyok murkiya asal katiki kahonjok yok, Khristo abang kihari aphansi,
konam ili ahuwit krolsi aro Arnam Aso agiyan asap chokche lengke, jinso thekyok, lake Khristo asoi chok plengple lengke tikine donang.
Lasi sal kipek yongta ili ke oso badi kalek, aro arleng hel khanang alamthe abi-pun kachobel long inglang plang ke do dunde si, aro ahuwit ajat-jat chirlisi tomon kangjar ponman badike kalek.
Manta khanang alam chithansi nengdok chipado nang, ili Khristo long paphu si, anang pen ahuwit alongta kihari dopon nang,

anang parasi ahuwit abangpo, chirhapsi aro chikrong si, anang parasi kipi-kipahle ahuwit pangot pon abor-eh, abithang ki-un apun amungten asal katiki kapachok badi, nengdok long abangpo kihari pachok pleng aphan abithang kihari chipachok nang.
La-apot minon ke ne bangposi nalithando, aro Hemphu long hakhi pisi pubang, Bang-ajat hel anali aneng asisik pensi anali kengkam-kachijor badi nali jat tiki yek.
Piyok pu tene anali ingthin kangting bang detno, anali abithang angthin parthat ong anat aro anali angthin kamango anat, Arnam kipi ajiuli para chipahlo lo.
Anali katharak wedet no, aro aneng alop pensi ahuwit akisim asal katiki yok, kapamok-mok kengkam kachijor along chichampi det no.
Nali ke Khristo long kachirli ladi kalek!
Piyok pu tene khanangsi nali anang lamthe arjulo hlongdo aro Jisu long kido khanang alam atengsi anang long chirli lo.
Nali aporong badi kido-kithak hel, nali bithang kido jipe aban, aro aporong kar-ih alot hel katikang nange alamthe chirlilo,
aro nali abithang aneng jiuli pen akimi kachipharlep yok,
aro khanang dhorom kangthir aneng aro kangthirphlen Arnam agoya badi akimi kasanse, nang akimi ajiuli kachi-ik ayok nali chirlilo.
Laparake, nali asisik hel tikangsi, abangten adung-arel abangyok khanang lamthe hel chithan, piyok pu tene ili abangten ihut para ihut abangphu chiplangsi do.
Nali aneng kang yongta pap tiki yek; arni kichel ango nangneng akang chipangsam mot,
aro si-ik ayok nenglong anghor chibi piyek.
Kanghu hel kachunghu patikang nang; layok ke arleng yok banta kipi-kapahle dun aphan, anali kime aneng ensi abithang akeng-ri sal patiki nang.

Nali angho para jat kangho alam ingjeyek, manta kanange amun pot badi kime nengrung pon une, la aphan ka-one arleng hel kajinso kapahlong yok, kanange ateng dhorom pensi kihari aphan kime alam than pon.
Aro Arnam Jiuli-Kangthir yok aneng pangho yek, labang pensi nang kijok-arni yok amohor pisi nang bilo.
Ahuwit karjuho alam aro neng akang neng kithi ahul aro kapatharak, aro chilang setset lamehel ajaldung nali sitem para tikangot,
aro nali ihut para ihutyok jinso, neng kangsam aneng chiplang ngot, Arnam Khristo long ado nali kiron badi, nali ihut para ihutyok pap hel ronpi not.
Lasi nengdok asohel badi, nali Arnam yok chirli dunnot,
aro Khristo jibadi naliyok nengdokngo, kanempru kapajir aro Arnam aphan nibot kipi buli karkli badi, iliphan champi detno, ladine nali nengdok long donot.
Manta kidoner asoi hel ahuwit akisim lale alop alamthe chingje yek, kangthir abang ladisi kido michang.
Chongnek lam, chihang hlok-hlok, kapachurwit alam, ladi kanangne karkel-kapasi nali sitem athem piyek; manta la aholan Arnam yok kardom pajirnang.
Labadi chilang pame, Khristo aro Arnam-alongri long jatsi kidoner, lale akisim arleng, lale alop kido arleng hel (la mehelke agoya kachirdom atengo) bor-eh hlonghle ye.
Kaita akijol alam chingje si naliyok pachobe hlongek; piyok pu tene mehel anat kikrolkre asohel aphuthak Arnam akang wangman.
Lasi analipen chingbar dun nek.
Piyok pu tene angoke nali kangting si kido, manta minon ke Hemphu long katha-ang hlongdo. Katha-ang aso badi donot—
piyok pu tene katha-ang aso atheke ahuwit akime aro dhorom aro khanang pusi ahuwit long chiklanman.
Hemphu long pot badi neng ingsam bangpo chirline en pon;
kangting akijol asal hel along chilok dun nek; la-aholan lamehel ado pomar katha-ang long paklang phlen.
Piyok pu tene anali katikijol hel, kithan yok ta tharak man;
manta konam ado katiki hel, katha-ang pensi pachiklan phlen tene chithek phlan ne,
piyok pu tene khatha-ang long ke ahuwit chiklang detman. Lasi lamthe doset do, ‘‘O kami-ih hel, ahari hlongot! Akithi asitem para thurnot, aro Khristo nangyok katha-ang nangpiye.’’
La-apot si, pot badi kengkam chijorman, bangpo meso chilangwen, kamango hel badike kalek, manta agiyan padosi kengkam chijornot,
kime apor en dunot, piyok pu tene owepo akangho.
Lasi nali kamango chiplangek, manta Hemphu ahisa potne, bangpo thekwenne do pon not.
Aro hor jun-ingri klangke doyek, piyok pu tene bangpo long kanghon detsi do; manta ajiuli pen plengne do pon,
Arnam parklam-alun, pingkit alun, aro jiuli parklam alun, at-ir pensi arju meso lun pen nalidak Hemphu yok neng chipine chithan,
arniten Apa Arnam yok kardom pajirlong aro ahuwit abihini anat ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo amen pen kardom pajir.
Khristo yok mainot si ihut para ihut yok chingdom si do pon.
Ei apiso hel nali Hemphu yok kimeng badi, nali pihan yok mengne do dunot.
Piyok pu tene Khristo si kachikruk ahemphu badi, apihan po ke apiso pe ahemphu lo.
Kachikruk ke Khristo arlo kido badi, apiso helta ahuwit apot long anang pihan po arlo dopon.
Apihan hel, Khristo jibadi kachikruk yok nengdok ngo aro anang phan po si anang bithangyok champi lo, ladine nalita abithang apiso yok nengdok ngot,
anang lamthe pen ingthirsi, langpen palusi pangthir phrotsi anang kangthir kachiplang yok champi lo;
anang adai wedung, lale kachotor ladi asin angtar wesi layong ta kangthir kachikruk isi abithang ango kachiparjak ayok champidet no.
Ladisi anali abithang abangpo yok nengkidok badi apihan helta apiso yok nengdok nange, inghosi abithang apiso yok nengdok, abithang yoksi nengdokman.
Piyok pu tene kaita abithang a-ok yok ke simse yong; manta al-poson enpon jongsi doman,
Khristo ta anang kachikruk yok ladisi al-poson enman; piyok pu tene ili ke anang abangpo aro-rem.
‘‘La-anat si arleng ihut anang aipe, anang papo ayok tikangsi, abithang apiso ayok chilok nge, aro lahel isi-abangpo chiplange.’’
Labang isi akithe kabutisit acho alam; manta ne Khristo aro kachikruk parhlansi bangpo thando.
Layongta abangten ta abithang apiso yok ladisi nengdok pen do nok; manta apiso pe ke apihan yok kaphere pado nang.
Ei oso hel, Hemphu long nali ape-apo kithan alamhel mengot, piyok pu tene bangpo ke kimeng nange dolo.
‘‘Nang aipe yok aro nang apapo yok aman pi’’ (labangsi seme-kitang alamthe kipi cheng kanong kido.)
La-tangsi nang bor-eh choknge, aro pirthimipe athak ajiu dingsi do une.
Aro, ei apa hel, nali abithang asohel ayok tam ke aneng pakangek; manta Hemphu abi-pun aro lamthe paklangsi lahel yok pathe pon not.
Ei aturu hel, nali jibadi Khristo yok mengman labadi ingthin chingbarsi, pheresi aro klemsi abithang a-ok ahemphu hel yok nali kithan alam mengpon.
Amek ango kapaklang chot soyok tikikesi, aro lahel neng pangsam detke kalek, manta Khristo murkiya badi mengsi, angthin long Arnam kar-ih badi tiki not.
Apenso aro arloso paklangke tiki yek, aro Hemphu long badi nengpen ar-ihne sal tikipi not,
pot si akime asal ili tiki, lalong turu yong ta lale, kijok arleng yongta, labang angban kime Hemphu para hlong phaknge, pusi thek nange.
Aro, ei ahemphu hel, aturu helyok ingje yek. Aturu hel yok kitam tikangot, piyok pu tene nali dak la mat-mat Hemphu ethakpe long do, aro anang ke ibak detke langle pusi nali than undo.
Kijut amun, Hemphu long chipangtang aro anang apharan pen jakong chipado.
Si-ik ajiu ajat-jat kangho katiki kiron ango krolsi kido un ayok, Arnam ahuwit adorson hel chi-ik.

Piyok pu tene awi aro a-ok penke ili chilarere yong, manta labang pirthepe kithe-kiding hel pensi, pirthepe apharan kido helpen, aro labang kangting suneng apharan hel pensi, aro kangthir athuli along sotonga ajiuli helpen si chirbu hlongdo.
Lasi, nali kangho arni kiteng ayok ke, aro ahuwit asal patangsi krolsi kido un yok, Arnam ahuwit adorson hel chi-ik.
Lasi khanangyok amicheng chikok, nenglong dhorom kangthir achong chi-ik,
nengsam kime-alamthe chihonjok wen akeng-op chi-iksi krolne do.
La aparke pot pensi nali pap-ajiu hel me-ade badi ki-ap hel kapajut-un ayok kikrol achong en not.
Kijoktang aphurkup en not, aro ajiuli nokjir-en not, labangsi Arnam alamthe.
Ajiuli pen pingkit apor tenta chohang aro chingdukne pingkit. Labang anat, pingkit pen trepne dopon, aro arnita mesone kangthir-arleng hel aphan chingdukne do.
Nephan ta pingkitne do, lasi konam ne kabutisit kime-alamthe agiyan aha dodutsi kithanyok ne angho kithan amun kamichang alamthe neyok papinang,
piyok pu tene ne ke hirkulo kibam aharapo. Ne jibadi than nange, bangpo alam aha dodut si kapahar un ayok pingkitne do.
Minon ne lam, lake ne pot badi do hlongdo, pot tikisi do hlongdo, bangpo mar nalita thek do, lasi Hemphu pen kikrol murkiya aro nengdok korte Tisikas po, anang naliyok kido kangwe nali thane;
nali ke hali long kachiplang alam hel chithan un yok, aro anang nali ingthin kikrol paklang une, labang chironsi ne anang yok nalidung tol do.
Apa Arnam aro Hemphu Jisu Khristo para korte helyok nengsam, aro kikrol pen nengdok pado nang.
Ingho si ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo yok or-eh len si nengdok do, labang ahuwit yok kajinso pado nang.
Khristo Jisu murkiya Pol po aro Timothi po, para Khristo Jisu long kido ahuwit kangthir arleng Philipi long kido abang, aro anali alokjor bishop hel aro dikon hel adungyok.
Ili Apa Arnam aro Hemphu Jisu Khristo para naliyok kajinso aro nengsam pado nang.
Naliyok neng chipurkisi ne Arnam yok kardom pajirdo,
aporten ta ne nengrongsi kapingkit amun naliyok abangten aphan ne pingkitsi do.
Nali kicheng arni para minonhok kime-alamthe kapahar long kachirap dun apot kardomo.
Aro inghosi kime asal katiki chengo, anango la Jisu Khristo kiwang arniyok pachoknge pusi ne kroldo.

Nali ahuwit alam neng kachiripo nephan akime; piyok pu tene naliyok ne ingthin long endo; piyok pu tene ne akrol kibeng amun, aro kime-alamthe kithan amun aro aporman kipi alam long, nali ahuwit ta, ne kihlong kajinso long wang chingchong dun do.
Piyok pu tene Khristo Jisu nengdok long ne nali ahuwit ayok kapochak anengdo, labang alam Arnam ne hakhi do.
Aro ne pingkit si do, lake nali nengdok agiyan aro kime-kangho kachiron thek ong-ongsi doye labangsi pingkitsi do.
Lasi Khristo kiwang arniyok nali ingthir phlen aro ado wesi chiklang une.
Arnam jortang aro parklam pon aphan, Jisu Khristo parasi dhorom kangthir athe wangne dopon, ne labangsi pingkitsi do.
Ei nengdok hel, naliyok labang alampo kapathek anengdo, lake nelong pot badi chiplango mehel kime-alamthe kihari aphansi ahuwit chokngo,
lasi neyok recho ahem long akrol kibeng, aro ahuwit kihon arleng hel angot aro ne akrol kido aron ke Khristo aphan pusi ahuwit ango chiklango;
aro korte aro ingjir hel neyok akrol kibeng theksi Hemphu long kikrol ensi, pherere phosi aro Arnam alamthe kipuyok aha chipangtang do.
Angkhan ke langset-satsi aro angkhan ahul pawang dutsi paharo, aro angkhan ke kime aneng pensi Khristo aphan pahar do.
Lamehel ne nengdok pensi Khristo yok paharman, kime-alamthe kiraldun aphan holek nebido pusi chithan undo;
manta adhok ke ajar hulsi paharpon man; anali ke aneng damphlen ke kalek, manta akrol kithal long neyok kapaduk chot chironsi ladi paharman.
Lalong pot te chiplange? Lalong ingho nengsik mene, lale khanang mene, jotmehel along Khristo alamthe paharsi ne neng-arong do. Oik, aro ne neng-arong dojonge,
piyok pu tene nali pingkit para aro Jisu Khristo Ajiuli nekirung parasi nerapsi pajok nge.
Ne kar-ih aro kachiha ke chokplenge, ne jatsi tharak hlonghle ye, manta ne kithan chipang dut si, lake akihreng lale kithi yongta, arnita nebang long Khristo yok jortang padodo.
Nephan ke, hrengsi kido ke Khristo long, aro kithi ke alap chihlonge.
Ne a-ok long akihreng kidoyok ke, nephan katiki asal choknge; aro dak thusi chideng nang, bangpo ne thekthe.
Ne la-hini adak chingkepsi dohlong do: ne kidam yoksi ar-ih do, aro Khristo pen dodun bo, piyok pu tene bangposi akimechot;
manta nali phanke a-ok long kido si kanange dochot do.
Bangpo ne chinengtangsi, ne dobang aro nali ahuwit pen nali sal pango ponyok aro kikrol nengrong kidoyok chilokdam phaknge bangpo ne than undo,
lasi ne nali dung konam wang phak, nali Khristo Jisu long kaborai alam me-atsi chithan phlen une.

Konam ne nalidung wange aro wang kilang amun, lale damde yongta, nali isidet ajiuli krolsi kido thek hlonge, aro isidet aneng kime-alamthe aphansi kikrol chirbusi katiki pon, nali para lamthe arju hlonge, bangso anat Khristo kime-alamthe ateng kamichang do pon, labang si ne nali chingduk do.
Nali kiteng arleng hel anat isi alam phere nangne. Piyok pu tene anali phan bangpo si kapangho asin, manta nali phanke Arnam para kijok aporman do. Aro bangpo ke Arnam si tikido.
Piyok pu tene anang jinsosi nali pajiro Jisu Khristo yok kikrol detyok kalek, manta anang duk kicho aphanta pajiro—
konam para ne kido, nalita lamat-matsi chirbusi duk chodo aro ne ke minon jong duk chojongsi do hlongdo.
Laparake Khristo long penebak neng kirung nange, nengdok para aneng kapangsam nange, Jiuli pen kachingto dun nange do, aro penebak kachineng-ot nange aro kachirondun nange do,
ne neng arong pachok ngot: lamat-mat aneng chiplang, lamat-mat anengdok dosi, chingbar phlensi aro isi aneng chiplangot.
