Abithang aphan det ke chiron nek, lale aborai pen ke isi asal tiki yek, manta chingduk hop aneng pen abithang yok ke bangyok kime aphan chiron.
Abangten abithang aphan kachiron det kalek, manta bang kachiron alam yokta lang dun nang.
Khristo Jisu long potsi aneng kido, nalilong ta lamat-mat aneng pado nang,
ingho, anang Arnam asoi pen kido yongta, Arnam ateng kidopo aneng chi-en detde yongot;
manta abithang yok chipangwe detsi, murkiya amahang badi chiplangsi, munusi athok badi plango. Aro munusi asoi chipaklangsi,
anang bithang yok chipangwesi, aro kithi meng dunsi, layok ta kros long kithiyok kimeng paklango.
Lasi Arnam anangyok ahuwit yok ta parklam chotno aro amenpo ta ahuwit aphuthak kithechot amen pilo,
lasi ethakpe long, aro pirthimipe athak aro pirthimipe arlo kido ahuwit ta, Jisu amenyok tarhuk nange,
aro Jisu Khristo si Hemphu, Apa Arnamyok jortang kipi aphan abang ten ade pen hoi chonange.
La-apot, nenengdok hel, nali arnita ne lam kimeng badi, ladisi ne kido apor detke kalek, manta minon ne kangwe apor ta, kaphere do longsi aro sohrimne abithang kijoktang pachok;
piyok pu tene Arnamsi nali ingthin kar-ih aro anang nengsam aphan, la hini asal katiki pachok pondo.
Ahuwit asal ahul pangwesi, aro angchek wedetne tiki pon,
lasi nali ado wesi aro inghohesi, kikrolkre aro kangho owe arleng asitem Arnam asohel badi, pirthepe adak tha-angklir nat klolangso badi pachiklan do.
Lake nali ajiuli alamthe en-ketsi kido anat Khristo kiwangphak arni nelong akijolke katke yong lale akijol chipadukde yong pusi aborai kido aron choknge.
Manta nali kikrol khanang buli kipi aro kachirdom asal along, ne nibot kipi badi wi chipi do, layong ta ne neng-arong, aro nali ahuwit penta nengrong doye—
aro labadi alam anat nalita nengrong chipado, aro ne penta nengrong chipadonot.
Ne nali lam than-unsi, ne ke neng kangsam hlonge, lasi bekso aphel nali dungyok Timothi po yok nali dung kitol ne Hemphu Jisu long chirondo.
Piyok pu tene inghosi nali kime aphan chiron, ladi arleng kaita ingjong.
Piyok pu tene, ahuwit ta Jisu Khristo alampen kalek, abithang aphansi chiron man.
Manta Timothi poke, apo po pen aso po sal katiki badi, ladi si nepen kime-alamthe aphan me-atsi tikilo, labang nali than-undo.
Lasi, nelong pot chiplang mene, bangpo chithan un-eh amun anangyok si kitolyok ne chiron do;
aro ne bithang ta parajangsi nali dung wange pusi Hemphu long krolsi do.
Minihok kanange apor kirap ne korte, aro kapahar alokjor, nali ahara aro salchak ihut—Ipaphroditas poyok, nali dung kitol yok akime thek ngo;
piyok pu tene anang naliyok ahuwit aphan inghongsi kido, aro anang kisosi do pusi nali karju aneng aduk do.
Anang khanangsi kiso tan-ongsi kithi bo, manta Arnam anang phuthak jinso lo; anangyok detke kalek, manta ne kiduk aphuthak aro kiduk hlonghle yok, neyok ta jinsolo.
La-apot nali anangyok theksi nengrong chipado phak, aro ne neng-aduk ta pangsamsi, lasi anangyok parjang si tolo.
Lateng ahuwit anengrong pensi nali Hemphu long anang yok chideng; aro labadi arlengyok aman pinange pune chironot,
piyok pu tene nali jipe ne phan tikipi un-ehsi kido, anang labang kapachok ayok anang kithi bo ateng Khristo aphan chirbusi tikilo.
Kijut longke, ne korte aro ingjir hel, Hemphu long nengrong chipado. Naliyok lamatmat alamthe kiwiyok ne aduk hlonghle, manta nali ral dune.
La hik hel para chilang, akangho katiki abang para chilang wen, a-ok long kapaduk abang para chilang!
Piyok pu tene ilisi khanang sunnot chiplang tango, ili Arnam Ajiuli pensi chirdom man aro Khristo Jisu long parklam man, aro a-ok pen jat krolkre—
layong ta ne, a-ok long chinengtang aron do; bang hel a-oklong chinengtang man pu tene, layok ne ongchot chinengtang man:
ne kiplang para hinarkep arni a-ok long ingtepmo, Israyel ajat ihut abangphu, Benjamin akhel arleng, Jihudi hel asitem Jihudi, kanong badike Pharisi;
neng pisi, kachikruk yok aduk kipi, aro kanong long dhorom kangthir ateng ado wedung si kido.
Manta nephan jipe hlongo, labang ahuwit Khristo aphan ne panghono pusi chirondo;
ladisi, ne Hemphu Khristo Jisu agiyan akime aphan, ne ahuwit chipanghon do pusi alekhot endo;

ne bithang dhorom kangthir kalek, lake kanong para kihlong dhorom kangthirpo hlonghlesi, Khristo long kikrol para dhorom kangthir chokngo, Arnam para kihlong kikrol dhorom kangthir hlongsi, Khristo yok hlongo,

aro anang longsi ne bithang yok chichini hlongo, aro kithihel para kiburphak abhak kihlong dun aphan, ne Khristo kithi chimangkai si, anang yok aro anang kibur ajakong, aro anang duk kicho ateng chingchong dun thekngo,
lasi anang nat ahuwit kanghon yongta chihi do, aro ahuwit abihini simeme pahlong det do.
Ne minon hetsi hlongo, lale minon thek-at no, ladike kalek; manta pot anatsi Khristo Jisu si neyok arwalsi wano, manta ne ingdensi kihlong dunyok katdun hlong do.
Ei nengdok hel, ne ke nepdun penno, nebithang ke ladi ke minonhok chironre yong; manta isi alam, aphel kido ahuwit yok tengesi,
ango kido pomar yok meso tikisi, Khristo Jisu long Arnam ethakpe yok kataram banta kapahlong aphan khanangsi kihlong dun yok katdun jongdo.
La-apot ili ingho Jiuli long la-an kikrol arleng dohlong do, ahuwit lateng isidet chiron minang; aro inghone bak nali kamprek chiron do, tene Arnam labang naliyok pachiklange.
Ili bang so yok wang hlengo, latengsi kengkam chijor minang.
Ei korte aro ingjirhel, nali neyok wang chirli dun, aro nali phan arjan hali lo, hali badi ingho kengkam chijorman, analiyok wang mainot dunot.
Piyok pu tene ako-ong arleng bang kar-ih hel badisi kengkam chijordo; anali lam ne naliyok thanjongo, minon ta surusi pudo, anali ke Khristo kros ahutur.
Anali ki-or ke prele, apokpo si anali arnampo, abithang kachitharak ta anali phan ke jortang do, analike pirthepe alamsi chironman.
Manta ili ke jibak longri arleng, labang longri ethakpe along do, lalong parasi wangpene pusi ili Ralpo, lake Hemphu Jisu Khristo yok inghong dingsi do.
Anang jipe katiki agun pensi ahuwit yok anang arlo chibiman, labadisi anang ili pirthepe long a-ok abang poyok pachiselesi, anang jortang kido abang po ateng abithang chikarleng nge.
Lasi, ne korte aro ingjir hel, nali ne nengrong aro ne phurkup matmat hel, ei nengdok hel, ladi Hemphu long krolpenne donot.
Ne Iudiya pe yok chingduksi, aro Sintikhe pe yok chingduksi, Hemphu long isidet aneng kidoyok nengrungdo.

Oik, aro nekimeng lokjor helyok ne thando, labang arloso bang-hiniyok rapdunot, piyok pu tene Klemen pe hel inansi, kime-alamthe kapahar amun chirbu hapmo aro adun-dun nekirap dun hel amen Jiu-Alo long wisi dolo.
Hemphu long arnita nengrong chipado nok; laben thotsi ne thanphak do, nengrong chipado nok.
Nali kachipabek hop asoi abangten yok pachitha-ang nang. Hemphu kiwange adung het no.
Nali jat chiron-ir ke doyek, manta ahuwit alam yok nali pingkit, kardom kapajir apingkit aro chingduksi Arnam ango chihangot.
Aro ahuwit budhi-ater kido Arnam nengsam, Jisu Khristo long nali ingthin aro nali nenglong ral dune.

Kijut amun, nenengdok hel, pot si khanang, pot si aman kipi nange, pot si bisar-kangthir, pot si kilangme, pot si kamichang, pene bak amen-anang kiri, pene bak kime agun aro lalong pene bak kaparklam nange, labang abihini hel chironnot.
Nali neyok kachirli hel, aro kachideng hel, aro karju hlong hel aro nelong wang kithek dunhel tikipon jongot aro la-amun nengsam kido Arnam nalipen doye.
Minon ke, la-an arni aphel nephan nali kajinso kiwang anat, ne Hemphu long nengrong akithe hlongdo; piyok pu tene, naliyok kime-apor hlonghlesi kido, nali neyok wang kachiron dunke melo,
kakungthin apotsi nali thando, labang ke kalek; piyok pu tene ne pot badi haksi dohlong, ne lalongsi neng chipangsam si kido yokta chirlilo.

Ne oso badi kido yokta thek, ong-ongsi kidoyok ta thek; isi-isi alam ensi ahuwit alam para lam chipateme yok aro kachithan yokta thek, ongle si kido hlongyok ta thek aro kakungthin kido yokta ne tongsi thek-re lo.
Neyok jakong kipi along dohlong si, ne katiki ahuwit apharan hlongdo.
Yongta nali ne aduk-tap kido apor nikirap dunsi, kime asal tikilo.

Aro nali Philipiya abang, nali bithangta than-un do, kime-alamthe kapahar kicheng adak konam ne Mesidoniya arongpe katikang amun, la-amun isi kachikruk, banta wang kipi-kapahle alam ne pen wang chirap dunde yongot; nalidet si wang kirap dun abango.
Layongta, ne Thesalonika long kido amun, nali neyok iphongne phong-ni bak ne kanange amun nekirap yok wanghlo duno.
Ne banta si nali chihang dundo, bangpo kalek, manta nali alekha ki-en amun, ako-ong alap kiwang athe kithek hlong anengdo; manta ne ahuwit alekha do, layok ke, ong-ongsi kidopon nalithek hlongdo.
Nali rideng para ahuwit banta kanempru kapajir matmatno, aro Arnam kachideng aro neng kapangsam buli karkli ateng pot abanta ne Ipaphroditas po parasi pahlongo, bangpo pensi dordetno.
Aro ne Arnam, nali kanange hel, anang jortang apuru kido Khristo Jisu amen pensi wang pador detne.
Minon ili Apa Arnam ajortang mo-mo ayok pado nang. Amen.
Khristo Jisu long ahuwit kangthir arleng helyok kardom pajir pon. Ne pen kido korte hel naliyok kardom pido.
Ahuwit kangthir abang, pame-at si Koisor rechopo ahembang naliyok kardom pido.
Hemphu Jisu Khristo kajinso nali jiuli pen pado nang.
Arnam ahisa pensi Khristo Jisu kapachak kangthir-adun Pol po aro korte Timothi po,
Kolosiya along kido kangthir aro Khristo yok kikrol korte aro ingjir hel adungyok. Ili Apa Arnam para naliyok kajinso aro nengsam pado nang.
Nali phan hali arni kapingkit amun, Apa Arnam Hemphu Jisu Khristo yok arniten hali kardom piman,
piyok pu tene ahuwit kangthir abang aphan nali nengdok kido, aro Khristo Jisu long nali kikrol hali arju hlongo,
piyok pu tene nali phan kachiha apuru ethakpe long hansi si bido. Kime-alamthe, khanang alamthe long nalisi ango arju hlongo,

labangsi nali long yok wang hlengo. Labang arni para labang athe wangsi aro pirthepe ajaldung chansi do, lake Arnam kajinso khanangsi abhu hlongsi aro nali karju arni para kime-alamthe nali sitem athe kiwang kihari pon dolong do.
Labang nali, hali nengdok alokjor murkiya Ipaphras po parasi chirlilo. Anang nali phan Khristo pen kikrol phlen murkiya,
aro anangsi nali Jiuli long nengdok, haliyok pachitha-ango.
Piyok pu tene labang anatsi, labang alam karju arni para, hali nali phan kapingkit tikangke yongot aro lake nali abhu-kihlong aro Arnam Ajiuli agiyan nali chipathek-at yok pingkitsi chohang duno,

la-apot nali Hemphu pen kamichang kengkam chijorsi, Arnam agiyan alamthe pen aro anangyok neng pangsamsi, ahuwit kime asal katiki athe pawangsi aro Arnam agiyan alamthe aro ahuwit kime asal katikiyok athe pawangot.
Nali anang jortang kido apharan pahlongsi ahuwit ajakong chipadokengo, aro la-amun nengrongsi, nali ahuwit aneng chihi chipaneng ding aphan chihonjokngot,
ingho naliyok katha-ang long kido kangthir arleng hel bor-eh kihlonge adeng kido aphan lamthe paharpon tolo la Apa yok kardom pajirnot.
Anangsi iliyok kangting apharan para pajok ngo, aro anang nengdok Aso alongri long parjap mo,
anang longsi ili joktango, pap hel kolo.
Anang kachini un-eh Arnam agoya, aro ajaldung si kahurji adak kiplang chengpo;

piyok pu tene anang longsi ethakpe long aro pirthimipe long, kachini aro kachini un-eh potsi do, lalong recho anghol lale kapangdom lale kithe-kiding lale apharan kidohel— ahuwit abihini yok anang parasi aro anang phansi hurjilo.
Anang bithang ahuwit yokta aporong kido, aro anang longsi ahuwit inan risi do.
Anang kachikruk po, lake abangpo aphulo; la apotsi anang ahuwit abihini yok ta ango wangnange, anangsi kicheng cheng, aro kithihel asitem para burphak si kiplang chengpo.
Piyok pu tene, anang longsi Arnam asoi pachiklan phrot si kaparjap ayok nengsamo,
aro anang parasi Arnam ahuwit abihinyok pachiloksi kibiyok nengsamo, lake pirthimipe long yongta, lale ethakpe long yongta, Jisu kros long kili awi pensi nengsam parjap mo.
Aro nali ingho aporong ke Arnam para kaholo aro neng long hutur dosi kangho asal hel katiki,
anang minon ke anang kithi abang along pachilok ngo, lake anang ngot kangthir, ado wesi, aro anang mahang semsemsi parjapmo—

layong ta, suneng pe arlo kido ajaldung sanse-chanjalhel ango paharsi kiwang kime-alamthe nali arju hlongo; labang kime-alamthe kachiha para prek-chiterekresi, nali krol thipne arjap mot. Ne Pol po labang kime-alamthe amurkiya aphang hlongo.
Minon ke ne nali natsi aduk-tap chodo, bangposi ne neng-arong wangdo, aro Khristo long potsi ajat-jat aduk kicho yok dolang, labang nebangpo longsi, lake kachikruk aphan ne-ok long pachok do.
Arnam alamthe pachitha-ang ayok, lake nali phansi neyok peksi ne Arnam kitol murkiya chiplang hlongo,
labang akarsit acho alamthe aporong para aro awe hel along butisit si kibi manta minonke anang kangthir adun hel arideng pachiklango.
Bang-ajat asitem labang kabutisit acho alamthe jortang kido apuru, kangthir abang pensi pachitha-ang yok Arnam arwalo, labang Khristo nalilong do, bangposi kachiha jortang do.
Anang lamthesi hali ke nali pahardo, abangten arlengyok kaphere wando aro ahuwit agiyan abangten yok paklang do, lake ili Khristo asoi pachirli nang.
Piyok pu tene bangpo si ne tiki hlongdo aro ahuwit ajakong pen nelong kipi nengkirung pon apharan pen chirbudo.
Piyok pu tene nali phan aro Laudikiya kido abang aphan konbak chirbu hlongo aro konbak arleng neyok mahang semsem ke thekthe yong, bangpo nali kapathek aneng do.

Arnam kabutisit alamthe, lake Khristo yok nali abhu kihlong aphan, anali ingthin long khanang kikrol kihlong ayok, aro anali khanang nengdok pen chingirsi, ahuwit jortang kido apuru ajiuli kipapi tol aneng do,
anang longsi ahuwit agiyan aro agun chibutisi do.
Ihut yokta naliyok akidok alamthe chingjesi nali chobel hlonghle yok, ne bangpo nali thando.
Piyok pu tene ne abangpo nalipen dode yongta, ne jiuli penke nalipen do; aro nengrongsi nali kime abi-pun aro Khristo long kikrol thirkuk si kido, nalilang dunsi do.
La-apotsi nali Khristo yok, lake Hemphu Jisu yok jibadi hlongo, ladine anang longne donot,
aro anang long chipangkursi, jibadi chirlilo, ladine ananglong chirhap si, aro kikrol thirkuksi, kardom kapajir kihari doponot.

Kaita naliyok kachimangkai agun aro kachobel penke aturu ka-ote ponpe ayok chilang wen; labang ke munusi awe para awe tikisi kiwang abi-pun aro bharasot ango kicheng abi-pun mat-mat; labang Khristo alam matmat kalek.
Piyok pu tene anang longsi Arnam ajortang kichok a-ok abangpo arjanpen arjapdo,
aro nalike anang ajiu pen isidet chokpleng do; anang ahuwit ajiuli kapangdom aro apharan kido aphupo lo.
Anang longsi nali aripen ka-otete sunnot, lake a-ok mang-mang abangpo ape-rik chisele phlensi, Khristo ajiuli sunnot pensi sunnot chiplango;

aro nali baptist kachiplang amunsi anang pen kithi ahilik long bilo, aro labang baptist kachiplang alongsi kithihel asitem para anangyok kapangthur Arnam asal katiki long krolsi, anangpen wang kangthur dunta chiplango.
Nali pap alongsi aro a-ok long sunnot ka-ote pensi akithi kido, naliyok anang pensi Arnam pahreng ngo; khanangke anang ili ahuwit ado ron pilo;
iliyok kapangho alam kithan hel kido jipe ari pen kiwi lo alam hel ili phan kimaime kido, bangpo wendet no aro gojal saksi kros long taro, bangpo mar kol pon det no.
Aro kapangdom apharan aro kihal ajakong ensi, lamehel aphuthak haldetsi, mehel yok patharak arjan pachiklan daksi paklango.
Lasi kicho, lale kijun, lale kamai, lale chiklo akimi, lale kisang-arni alam ke, kaita naliyok bisarpa-ote hlongek.
Lamehel ahuwit kiwangme kido alamthe aharchi detsi; manta abangpo ke Khristo si.
Ingho chipabek hopsi aro ethakpe atharlon hel kachirdom ar-ihsi, ajatjat kachimangkai alam nengpisi, abithang a-ok aneng aborai pensi akijol chironsi do,

manta aphu para chihing kringsi aro asek tenlong chirhapsi aro chingir thipsi ajaldung abangpo Arnam-Ajiuli kihari long the-dingsi wangman, labang aphupo yok chingdom dunde, pu tene labadi ihut parasi nang banta pahlong kel hlongek.
Nali bharasot kicheng abi-pun pen Khristo long thilo, pu tene piyok te bharasot kido-kithak badisi mengdun do? Piyok te arleng kithan alam abi-pun,
‘‘Jatsi ot dun nek, chowet nek, lari yek?’’ mehel meng dun do.
(Jibak ke abihini kicho-kijun parasi kanghon loi-loi si do, lamehel ot nek) lamehel ke munusi kithan abi-pun kachirli ateng aro kimeng atengsi kalek ma?

Aneng kar-ih atengsi kachirdom, kachipabek, aro abangpo yok duk kipi, lamehel parasi labang kithan abi-pun aro kapachirli, agiyan badi chithek hlongdo, yongta a-ok kar-ih hel kipangdom aphan ke apun wangwe.
La-apot naliyok Khristo pen pangthuro pu tene Arnam ancho-ari aga dak long si Khristo iningsi do, ethakpe long kido athem alam bisar not.
Pirthimipe alam longke chiron nek, ethakpe long alam chiron not.
Piyok pu tene nali thidun tango; aro nali jiubong Khristo pen Arnam long chibuti si do.
Ili jiubong mat-matke Khristo konam wang chiklange, la-amun anang pen nalita jortang long chiklang hlonge.

La-apot nalike, pirthimipe long kido abithang abangpo aro-rem mat-matke kangho kidoner, akisim, kachopak kar-ih aneng, kangho katiki kar-ih aro alot kido, lake agoya kachirdom, mehel ahuwit paprel det not.
Lamehel anatsi kimengme asohel athak Arnam akang wangman.
Aporong konam nali mehel along kengkam kachijor, la-amun nalita lamehel along si kido-kithak dun.
Manta minon ke nali aneng-akang, neng kithi, kachilangle, kapatharak, anghopen kanangne hel kangje, lamehel tikangot;
ihut para ihutyok asisik alam thanek; piyok pu tene nali labang katiki helpen aban ajiuli arlengpo yok kangrak phlen ape badi chisele det no,
aro akimi arleng nang kahurjipo agoya badi, akarsit lamthe agiyan aphan akimi chipharlep si dolo, bangpo chi-ik ngo;

lalong Grik lale Jihudi, sunnot ka-ote lale ka-otete, pasotonga ajat, kamango arleng, aturu, kijok arleng, ladike prek do nangne lo; manta ahuwit long, Khristo ahuwit long chok, aro ahuwit chok dunman.
La-apot Arnam karwal tang kangthir aro nengdok nalike kamichang badi kajinso, chipanel, neng kangthir, kachinom hop, nengsamjin, aro kachipaneng ding, labang ahuwit chi-ikngot;
nali ihut para ihutyok chipaneng ding dunot; aro ihutpo kangho aneng ihutpo yok ado kikol aron do, tene ihut para ihutyok ron prup mot; Hemphu ke jibadi naliyok pap rondet no, nalita ladine tiki not;
aro labang ahuwit aphuthak nengdok yok chi-ik ngot; labangsi ahuwit yok inan chingnak si asap doye. Aro Khristo nengsam nali ingthin along pangdom pon nang;
nali yok la-anat si isidet abangpo long nali taram tango; aro ingthin pen kardom pajirnot.

Khristo lamthe ahuwit agiyan alamlong nali sitem pachingtang detne pado nang. Dhorom alun, pingkit alun, aro ajiuli parklan alun chirlisi aro ahari pisi, kajinso alamthe along abang ten angthin long Hemphu aphan lun pon not.
Aro lamthe long, lale jibak ke tiki, ahuwit Hemphu Jisu amen pen tiki not; aro anang pensi Apa Arnam ayok kardom pajirnot.
Ei apiso pe mar, Hemphu long jipe tiki nange, ladisi nali abithang apihanpo yok mengne do dun not.
Ei apihan pomar, nalike abithang apisohel yok nengdok pon, aro analiyok neng-thi ke arkel-pasi yek.
Ei oso hel, nalike ahuwit alam aipe pen apa po kithan alam meng dun not, piyok pu tene Hemphu labangsi aneng ingsam man.
Ei apo mar, nali bithang aso helyok aneng pakange not, pene bak ke anali nenghodak nge.
Ei aturu hel, nali lam a-ok badi ke abithang ahem ahemphu hel kithan alam mengdun not.
Nali jipe asal tiki, bangpo arleng aphan kalek, manta Hemphu aphansi pune aneng pine, nali hem ahemphu aphan murkiya asal tikinot,
Hemphu para nali bor-eh kihlong adeng doye pusi chithan undo; manta nali Hemphu Khristo aphan ta murkiya asal tiki pon.
Piyok pu tene ingho si ka-ongnai asal tiki, anang abithang ka-ongnai katiki angban hlong phaknge; aro lalong jat ibakdet ke lalngle.
Ei hem ahemphu mar, nali aturu hel yok kadhorom aro pamene molpon, piyok pu tene ethakpe long naliyokta ihut Hemphu do, bangpo than-undo.
Nali pingkit pado long, aro kardom pajirsi chinghongne do.

Aro Khristo kabutisit acho alamthe aphan ne chibeng klaksi dohlong do, labang kabutisit acho alamthe kithanyok aro ne jibadi than nange, ladi pachiklansi kithanyok, Arnam haliyok lamthe aphan duwar pangpu pinang,
labang aporsi hali phanta pingkit padonot.
Aro bang arleng angot agiyan ateng arkel-pasi, aro kime apor en dun not.
Aro inghoyok pot badi si lam than dun nange, bangpo nali ke thek, la-apot nali kachithan alam arnita kajinso aro ingti kidok badi nengsam alamthe chirkel not.
Hemphu long nengdok kortehel, kikrol murkiya aro katiki kirap alokjor Tisikas po, nali yok anang ahuwit alam nali than phlenne.
Hali lamhel nali karju hlongyok, aro anang nali ingthin long kachiha piponne, la-apot anangyok ne nalidung tol lo.
Aro anang pen nali anang Onesimas amen ihutpo kikrol aro nengdok korte poyokta tol dun do; anali labang ahuwit alam nali parju ye.
Ne lokjor akrol kidodun Aristarkhas po aro Barnabas po korte adon Mark po, kardom nali pajirdo, (anang lam nali parju tango, anang nali dung wango tene chidengot;)
Aro Jisu, anangyok Justas ta puman, lahel naliyok bor-eh pajir do; anali sunnot ka-ote tang arleng; anali detsi Arnam-alongri aphan nekirap; analisi neneng pangsam mo.
Khristo Jisu murkiya Ipaphras po, anang naliyok kardom pido; nalike Arnam ahuwit jinso ahisa pachok aro khanang pen chipathirne donot, lasi anang arni pingkitsi nali phan chirbusi do.
Piyok pu tene naliyok aro Laudikiya aro Hirapolis long kido abang aphan, anang chipaduk hapsi tiki do, anang lam ne hakhi pido.
Luk amen nengdok dactor aro Demas po naliyok kardom nali pajir do.
Laudikiya long kido korte helyok, Nimpha pe aro anali hem kachingrum kachikruk korte hel yokta ne para nengsam kardom pajirdam.
Aro nali dungyok labang alo nali sitem chiporhe tango tene, Laudikiya long kido kachikruk alongta kachiporhe tolyok chiron, aro Laudikiya para jipe alo hlonge, bangpo nalita chiporhe.
Aro Arkhipas poyok labadi than, ‘‘Nang, Hemphu long murkiya asal pahlongo, bangpo jinsosi pachok aphan chilang wenne dopon.’’
Ne labang bor-eh kipi ke ne Pol po abithang ari pensi wilo. Nali ne akrol kibeng alam neng purki. Nalipen kajinso pado dun nang.
Pol po, Silbanas po aro Timothi po para Apa Arnam aro Hemphu Jisu Khristo long kido Thesalonika abang kachikruk adung yok. Naliyok kajinso aro nengsam pado nang.
Hali pingkit along nali menhel karisi, nali ahuwit aphan arnita Arnam yok kardom pajir do.
Hali nali krolsi katiki, nengdok si kachipaduk asal aro ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo alam kachiha long kanghong chipaning dingsi ili Apa Arnam angot or-eh len chipurki si do,
piyok pu tene Arnam nengdok kihlong korte hel, nali ke karwaltang arleng, bangpo hali thek do;
piyok pu tene hali kime-alamthe kiwan ke lamthedet kalek, ajakong, Jiuli-Kangthir aro khanang aporman pensi nali sitem yok wango; hali ke nali phan pot badi arleng kido, bangpo nalita than undo.
Aro nali la-an aduk-tap asitem Jiuli-Kangthir kihlong anengrong alam pahlongsi, haliyok aro Hemphu yok kachirli arleng chiplango.
Mesidoniya aro Akhaya alongri long kido ahuwit kikrol helyok isi arjan rilo.

Piyok pu tene Mesidoniya aro Akhaya alongri long nali parasi Hemphu alamthe chitha-ango, labang det kalek, Arnam yok nali kikrol, a-odi ahuwit athem long yok la-an chisango te, hali aro kipu nange wedet no.
Piyok pu tene hali nali dung kidam amun pot badi kachingden, aro pot badi nali agoya hel para khanang Arnam yok neng chipharlep mo,

ingho yok Arnam akithi hel asitem para pangthuro, la ango kiwang nange akang para ili kapajok Arnam Aso— Jisu si, anang ethakpe para kiwang phak arniyok kanghong, lamehel alam labang angbong arleng para hali arju hlongo.
Ei korte aro ingjirhel, nali bithang than undo, nali longyok hali kidam akijol chiplangple yong ngot,

manta Philipi arongpe long hali angoke ajat-jat duk cholo aro hali patharakngo yongta, (bangpo alam ta nali than-un do,) la-an chirbu tangsi Arnam kime-alamthe nali ngo kithan yok hali Arnam yok aha chipado do.
Piyok pu tene hali kapaklang alamhel kachobel, lale akisim det, lale kapadok alam kangwe,
manta Arnam pot badi archal si hali yok kikrol hlongsi haliyok kime-alamthe kapaharpon pachak ngo, ladisi hali lamthe than no;
piyok pu tene hali jatsi chongnek-hu ke thanthe yong, bangpo nali thek do; aro alop kangwe badi asoi paklangkle yong, Arnam hali hakhi do;
hali Khristo kangthir-adun yongta, nali para aro bang parata, mahang parklam basarse yongot.
Manta nali sitem chipabek hopsi, mok kipi arlengpe oso al ki-en badi chipabek ngo,
Lasi, nali la-an nengdok kido anat, hali naliyok kime-alamthe det ta kalek, naliyok hali nengdok kido anat, hali bithang ajiu naliphan kachipi yokta aneng ahisa kido.
Ei korte aro ingjirhel, hali kachipaduk aro sal kapachok long nali neng rido; nali ihut aphuthak sal akardip kibatbe yok, hali anuwe-anelo sal tikisi nalingo Arnam kime-alamthe kapahar.
Nali sitem la-an neng kangthir, dhorom kangthir, aro adowesi katiki asoi pen kido. Labang hakhi nali do lo.
Hali ke apo hel abithang aso helyok pot badi al-enman, ladi ilita nali abangten yok chingduksi kithan,
nali Arnam kamichang badi kido-kithak yok, ingho Arnam-alongri aro jortang long taram man, kijok kachiha aro hakhi pisi neng-kirung,

Nali konam hali para Arnam-alamthe karju, la-amun arleng alamthe puke kalek, Arnam-alamthe pusi kachideng, lake khanang Arnam-alamthe, lasi hali ta Arnam yok kardom pajir longsi dolo; labang alamthe krolsi kido abang asitem akithe asal pachokngo.

Ei korte aro ingjir hel, nali phansi Judiya along Khristo Jisu long Arnam kachikruk hel lamthe hel chirli duno, piyok pu tene lahel Jihudi hel para jokha aduk hlongo, nalita nali bithang ajat arleng para ladihak si aduk pido;
la Jihudi hel, arni anali pap asal chipa-ongsi, Hemphu Jisu yok aro katurki abang yok ta marilo, ladisi haliyok honjat pilo; aro Arnam yok neng pangho lo, ahuwit arlengyok langset setno,
jakong hlonge pusi Bang-ajat hel ango lam kithan yok hali teng klakngo. Ladisi anali pap katiki alekha pa-ongsi damo; manta Arnam aneng akang anali phuthak wang hlengo.
Nali ke, ei korte aro ingjir hel, aneng pen ke kalek, arleng posi nali para bekso arniyok kachiterek apot, nali mahang kachithek hlongyok ahisa wango.
Lasi hali kiwang yok anengo, layok ke —ne Pol po, mat-matsi phong-ni yok nalidung kidam phaknge aneng kido — si-ik helsi hali teng do.
Piyok pu tene, hali kachiha, lale nengrong, lale aborai aphurkup poke pot te? Ili Hemphu Jisu kiwang amun anang mahang semsemsi nali kalek ma?
Piyok putene nalisi hali jortang aro nengrong!
La-apotsi hali aro chihi un-eh si, Ethens arongpe long hali hudet si kidoyok anengo;
aro hali Khristo kime-alamthe paharsi nali phan kikrol aro nali neng-kirung yok Arnam murkiya hali korte Timothi poyok, nali dungyok kitol;
labang hel aduk-tap anat nali kaita pimpro-soro ke chiplang nangne. Piyok pu tene labang anatsi ili arwal tangdo pusi nali bithang than undo.
Piyok pu tene, hali aduk-tap chiplange pusi ango adak hali nalipen kido amunsi kipu, aphel ladisi chiplango, nali than undo.
Labang alam anatsi, ne ta chihi un-eh si, pene bak ke nali honjat kipi karchal dun amun hali kachipaduk akijole mene, pusi nali kikrol kilang dungyok kitol.

Manta minonke Timothi po nali long para hali dungyok wangsi, nali kikrol aro nengdok alam wang thano. Anang hali kithan badi ke, naliyok thek hlonge pusi, nalita hali thek hlong aneng do, pusi arni nengsam chipurki do pusi arju hlongo.
Lamehel a-odi anat, ei korte aro ingjirhel, hali ahuwit kiduk pen sohrim yongta nali kikrol parasi neng kangsam hlongo;
piyok pu tene minon hali kido-kithak ke, Hemphu long krol longsi arjapdo.
Pot badi hali bithang Arnam amahang semsem nali natsi ahuwit nengrong plengsi do, la ahuwit nengrong kachipi phakyok, nali phan Arnam yok pot badisi kardom pajir unbo ma?
Hali ta nali mahang chithek hlong yok aro nali kikrol kangwe pho amun nali rapdun yok anuwe-anelo pingkit jong do.
Minonke ili Apa Arnam abithang aro ili Hemphu Jisu naliyok duwar ingpu piye.
Aro naliyok hali nengdok jibadi, ladisi ihut para ihutyok, aro ahuwit yokta Hemphu nengdok kihari pa-ong pon nang.
Aro ili Hemphu Jisu konam anang ahuwit kangthir arleng helpen anang wang phaknge, la arni ili Arnam aro Apa ango, anang nalineng ajakong piye, nali ingthin ado wepensi parjapme.

Kijut amun, ei korte aro ingjirhel, Hemphu Jisu long nali chingduk si than do, lake pot badi kengkam chijorsi Arnam yok neng pangsam mo, aro do pono (aro ladisi nali dopon do), layok ta nali kihari ong-ongsi dopon nange.
Piyok pu tene Hemphu Jisu amen pensi hali nali kachirliyok jibak kithan, bangpo nali than undo.
Piyok pu tene labangsi Arnam nengsamo, nali ke kachipangthir ajiubong arjap pon: lake nali kidoner hel para chiterek ngot;
lake nali abangten abithang abang pot badi chipandomsi pot badi kangthir aro aman pinange, labang nali kithek nange do,
Arnam yok kachinine Bang-ajat hel badike kangho kidoner kachiron do nangne,
lake kaita ado tiki nangne lale ihut korte aro ingjir yok kachobel awak endun nek, piyok pu tene naliyok ango kithan badi, Hemphu mehel katiki ahuwit angban piman;
piyok pu tene Arnam ili yok akisim ayok kalek, kangthir kido ayoksi taramo.
La-apot inghosi lamthe mengme, anang arleng yok kalek, manta inghosi naliyok abithang Jiuli-Kangthir nali pido, labang Arnam yoksi mengme si doman.
Minon ke kikrol korte rongbong nengdok alamke, naliyok kiwi nange ingjong; piyok pu tene nali bithang ihut para ihutyok nengdok Arnam para kachirli arleng;
aro khanang ke Mesidoniya ahol kido ahuwit korte aro ingjir helyok nengdok paklang ngo. Manta ei nengdok hel, naliyok chingduksi pubang, nali aro ongne ongsi ladi tiki pon;
lasi hali nali kithan ateng, chingdom si kido-kithak yok, aro abithang remdi-remru asal kachitki ayok aro abithang arideng asal nengpi si katikipon ayok, neng chipinot.
La-apot, bang arleng helyok nali aman paklang, aro nali ka-ongkal amun kaiyok ta chiha dunkuk ke doyek.
Manta ei kortehel, bang hel badi kachiha wephosi, nali neng aduk ke do yek, lasi thisi kidam arleng hel alam nali thekthesi kido hali aneng ingjong,
piyok pu tene, Jisu thisi burphak ngo, pusi ili kroldo, Arnam ke Jisu long wangdunsi kithi arleng helyok ladisi anang pen pon detne.

Piyok pu tene, Hemphu lamthe parasi hali naliyok labang alam thando te, ili konbak kihreng arleng Hemphu kiwang phak arniyok hrengsi dobang, ili labang kithi arleng hel ayok ke jatsi ango dam hlonghle ye.
Piyok pu tene kithan alam pen hangsolsi, tharlon aghaipo taramsi wange, aro Arnam pongka kibut asipen Hemphu abithang ethakpe para wang sune; aro Khristo long wangsi kithihel ango thure;
la-aphel ili hrengsi kido helyok, suneng athak long Hemphu pen kachilok ayok, anali pen ing-hun aplang long pangthur pone.
La-apot lamehel alam pensi nali ihut para ihut yok aneng rungpon not.
Minon ke, ei korte aro ingjirhel, labang owe lale apor alam ne naliyok kiwiyok nali kanange welang.
Piyok pu tene anuwe apun jibadi kanghupo wangman, ladisi Hemphu arni pe wange, bangpo nali khanangsi than undo.
Konam arleng hel puye, ‘‘Lalong nengsam aro kiral abang do,’’ kipu amun, arloso pe oso kihlong abi kiwang badi, anali photsi anali phuthak kangho apor wange aro lalong jok un-eh ye!
Manta nali ke, ei nengdok hel, kanghupo badi labang adin nali dung wang kihleng yok, nali kangting long dode yong,
piyok pu tene nalike ahuwit katha-ang aro anelo aso; ili anuwe lale kangting arleng kalek,
lasi, wangot, ili bang hel katiki badi ili ami-ih ke dodesi, inghongsi ahari hlongne donang;
piyok pu tene inghosi ami-ih si do, anali anuwe si ami-ih wangman; aro inghosi hor-ingri, anali anuwesi hor-ingriman.
Manta ili ke katha-ang aso apot, ili ke kikrol aro nengdok aneng achong chi-iksi aro kijok kachiha matmat aphurkup aphuthak ensi ahari hlongne do nang.
Piyok pu tene iliyok Arnam akanglong biwen weh, ili Hemphu Jisu parasi joktang kapahlong yoksi, Arnam ili pachakngo,
ili prang-etne do yongta lale thisi dam yong ta, Khristo pen hrengsi do hlongdo, lasi anang ili phan thilo.
La-apot nali jibadi tikisi dolang, labadi ihut para ihut yok neng-rungne do, aro ihut para ihut yok dhorom along kihari pipon long nang.
Manta ei korte aro ingjirhel, nali chingduk do, inghosi anali sitem chipaduksi tikido, aro Hemphu long nali phuthak pachaksi do, aro analiyok ahari pido, analiyok aman pinot.
Aro anali katiki asal anat, nengdok pen me-atne analiyok aman pajirnot. Nali ihut para ihut yok nengsam pado pon.

Aro ei nengdok hel, ne naliyok nengrungsi than bang, katiki mo abangyok nali neng ahari pipon, kaphere abangyok kikrol pangtang dun, kikrol un-eh pho hel ayok rap dun, aro ahuwit penta chipaning dingne dopon.
Meso chilang, kaita kangho katiki aholan kai yokta akangho tiki piphak ngek; manta ihut para ihutyok, aro ahuwit yokta arnita me-at kachirap dunsi meso tikipon.
Arnita nengrong chipado.
Jutje len pingkitne do.
Ahuwit aron long kardom pajir; piyok pu tene nali phan Khristo Jisu long Arnam bangpo si ar-ih man.
Jiuli-Kangthir yok pajut nek.
Katurki alam hel pangwe yek,
ahuwit alam archal langsi, jipe akime bangpo mesone chi-en ponthip.
Aro ahuwit kiwangjap akangho hel para prekne do pon.
Aro nengsam Arnam naliyok pangthir phlen nang; aro ili Hemphu Jisu kiwang phak arni nali ajiu, asithe, aro abangpo ado wepensi paral pen nang.
Inghosi naliyok taramsi wando, anang ke kimeng loi-loi, aro anangsi bangpo tiki ye.
Ei nengdok hel, hali phan pingkitne do.
Kangthir kimung pensi ahuwit korte aro ingjir helyok kardom pajir.
Ne naliyok Hemphu long semesi labang than do, labang lo ahuwit rat ango taramne parju pon.
Ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo kajinso nalipen pado nang.
Pol po, Silbanas po aro Timothi po, ili Apa Arnam aro Hemphu Jisu Khristo long kido Thesalonika abang kachikruk po adungyok.
Ili Apa Arnam aro Hemphu Jisu Khristo para naliyok kajinso aro nengsam padonang.

Ei korte aro ingjirhel, nali phan arnita Arnam yok hali kardom kipi nange do man, aro bangpo katiki nange asal; piyok pu tene nali kikrol la-an ong-ongsi damsi do, aro nali ahuwit ta nengdok ihut para ihut yok ong-ongsi damdo;
la-amun nali ahuwit honjat aro aduk-tap chihisi do, labang ahuwit long nali kachipaning ding aro kikrol, anat hali bithang Arnam kachikruk along naliyok aborai wangdo.
Nali labang alongri long kamichang abang aro labang si Arnam kangthir bisar-ote ye, piyok pu tene labang anat nali aduk-chodo.
Piyok pu tene labang apor Hemphu Jisu kime-kangho katiki angban aphan, naliyok duk-tap kipi abangyok duk-tap piye;
aro labang apor Hemphu Jisu anang jortang kapachok Arnam tharlon helpen,
kikar amelong ethakpe para chiklangsi, nali duk-tap kihlong abang, nali halipen kiduk chipaham si, Arnam yok kachinine helyok aro ili Hemphu Jisu kime-alamthe kimengme helyok katiki angban piye.
La-amun lahel Hemphu amahang semsemsi, aro anang jortang kido jakong parata, lahel so-sele su-seleyok kiprel bisar ado chibat hlonge.
Konam, anang labang arni abithang kangthir arleng helyok jortang kihlong yok, aro kikrol ahuwit long, nalike hali hakhi hel kikrol apot, nali phanta, asombhik aman kihlongyok wang phaknge,
lake ili Arnam, nali yok kataram abang alekhot otsi, aro anang pharan pen ahuwit kime agiyan aro kikrol asal, pachok piye pusi nali phan hali arni pingkitsi do,
la-apot si, ili Arnam aro Hemphu Jisu Khristo kajinso ateng, ili Hemphu Jisu amen jortang pado, aro nalita ananglong jortang pado nang.
Ei korte aro ingjirhel, Hemphu Jisu Khristo kiwang phak aro anang dung ili kachingrum alam hali naliyok hali chingduk do,
Hemphu kiwang apor chokngo pu ke ihut bak ajiuli, lale hali kipu pusi angkhan alam, lale hali kiwi pusi inghone bak nalineng jong-jong aneng klemjorek, aro nali ihik-bihik chiplangek.
Naliyok jatsi pachobe pon hlongek; piyok pu tene angoke labang dhorom-kimengme po wang hlenge, aro kanghon aso po labang pap katikipo chiklange.
Anang pahutur si, ahuwit arnam kachipu aphuthak, aro kachirdom abi-pun aphuthak abithang yok chiparklamme; layokta, Arnam ahem iningsi, abithang yok arnam pusi amen pachitha-ange.
Ne nali pen kido amunsi lamehel alam naliyok kithan hlong, labang nali kithan aneng chipurkike yong ma?
Aro anang pachip wen apor kachiklang yok anangyok ingho paklem undo, bangpo nali minon chithan un do.
Piyok pu tene so tonghler kiwang akarsit alamthe minon jong sal pachoksi do; labang minon kapalor para chiterek-re lengke sal tiki ponsi pachokman.
Aro laparake tango tene, labang kimengme ihutpo wang chiklange, anangyok Hemphu Jisu angho achithe kibut me pensi paprel detne; anang kiwang phak arnike pachilut detne;
si-ik ajiu kangho katiki badi, kanghon abang aphan anang kiwange ke, asisik ahuwit ajakong, asombhik asin aro bismat katiki, aro pap asal katiki ahuwit kachobel detsi doye;
aro anali kijoktang kihlong yok, aro khanang alamthe poyok nengdokde yongot, apot kiprel pon along ahuwit kangho katiki parasi pachok pone.
Labang aronsi, anali ke asisik long krol lo, lasi Arnam analiyok kachobel asal patiki yok tol hrol do.
Lasi ingho khanang long krolkresi pap asal longsi nengsamo, anali yok paprel le.

Manta, ei korte aro ingjirhel, ili Hemphu nengdok abang, nali natsi arnita hali Arnam yok kardom kipi nange dolo; piyok pu tene ajiuli ke kangthir aro khanang kikrol along, Arnam kicheng amun para naliyok kapajok yok arwal tangdo;
labangpo aronsi, ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo jortang kapahlong aphan hali kime-alamthe kapahar amun nali yok taram mo.
Lasi, ei korte aro ingjirhel, thirkukne do; aro hali lam lale kiwi lo para nali potsi chirlilo; labang ahuwit chi-ot thipne do.
Minon ke ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo abithang, aro Apa Arnam inghosi iliyok nengdoksi aro iliyok jinso pensi or-eh len kido-kangsam aro akime kachiha pilo,
nali angthin long kidome aro ahuwit apor kime asal aro ajakong padonang.
Kijut amun, ei korte aro ingjirhel, hali phan pingkitne do, Arnam alamthe nali sitem jibadi paharo, lateng pachitha-ang aro jortang pado nang,
aro kasotonga aro kangho arleng arideng para ili jok-un; piyok pu tene ahuwit labang alamthe kroldo, ladi ke kalek.
Manta Hemphu ke kikrol loi-loi; anangsi naliyok kikrol pangtang piye, aro labang pap ajiuli para ral le.
Aro hali kipi ahuwit alam nali mengdo aro meng pone pusi phan Hemphu long hali kikrol chinengtang do.
Hemphu nali ingthin long Arnam anengdok aro Khristo kachipaning ding aduwar kengkam pachijorpon nang.
Ei nengdok hel, ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo amenpen nali yok than do, ingho korte ihut selet-memesi doman, hali para wang kachirli abi-pun ateng kalek, aro kikrol abang para kaholo pado,
piyok pu tene nali pot badi angkachirli nange dolo, bangpo nali bithang than undo; halike nali sitem kido amun kaselet-meme ke dode yongo,
aro ador pipe det ke ihut para an choche yongot; manta nali ihut aphuthak abhar bat hlonghlesi, anuwe anelo ta chipaduksi aro sal-chipachok si tikilo,
holek nali sitem kipu dun apharan weke puke kalek; manta nali haliyok wang chirli dunnot, la-anat nalingo hali bithang isi arjan kapaklang yoksi bangpo tikilo.
Piyok pu tene, sal katiki yok ta inghone bak chikengke, pu tene anang an-pacho hlongek, ladi pusi nali sitem kido amunsi, hali naliyok kithan.
Piyok pu tene hali arju hlongdo, nali inghone bak ke kaselet si do, aro isi asal tikike si, bang yok lam chursi si dowor do.
Minon labadi arleng helyok ke hali Hemphu Jisu Khristo amen pen nali thansi chingduk do, anali nengsam sal tiki, abithang a-an pacho hlong nang.
Ei korte aro ingjirhel, nalike kime asal tiki yongta chipaphel kukngek.
Labang lo pensi kaparju pon hali lamthe hel inghone bakpo mengme, pu tene labang arlengpo yok chinine do, aro anang kachitharak hlongyok anangpen lam-lun chihi dunek.
Layongta anangyok hutur puke chironek, manta kortepo pusi neng ahari pipon.
Minon nengsam kipi Hemphu arnita nali ahuwit anenglong nengsam papidun nang. Hemphu nali ahuwit pen alokjor parjapdun nang.
Ne labang kardom pajirsi Pol po ne bithang aripen wido. Lo apak ten bangposi asin; ne ladisi wido.
Ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo kajinso nali ahuwit pen padonang.
Ili Ral Hemphu Arnam, aro kachiha un Khristo Jisu kithan badi Khristo Jisu long ihut kangthir-adun Pol po,
kikrol along neso khanang Timothi po adungyok: Apa Arnam aro ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo para kajinso, nengdok, aro nengsam nalilong padonang.
Ne Mesidoniya yok kidam amun, nangyok pot badi kithan, ladisi minonta thando; nang Ephisiya long ri-si angkhan arleng yok than, anali kamprek akarsit acho alam pachirli hlongek,
atono atomo aro sar-lar alam mehel chingje-krungsi dopon do, mehel kikrol ajiu aphan akime kalek.
Manta hali kipachirli aphanke, kachipangthir angthin para kiwang nengdok, aro kachiron pame, aro kikrol len parasi ajiuli wangman.
Bangpomar para angkhan ke angthin chipharlep dunsi, kanangne alam hel along anengpidun phakngo,
kanong pachirli yok ronsi anali pot pudo, lale pot pangthek pondo abhu hlongle phosi pachirli do.
Minon ke abi-apun pen langpon pu tene, kanong ke akime pen, bangpo ili than-un do.
Labang alam acho ke, kanongpo dhorom kangthirhel aphan ke kalek, manta so tonghler, kimengme, kachirdomde, aro papi, kangthirthe aro dhorom yok kapatharak, apo kamari, ape kamari, arleng kamari,

kidoner, kachilem, turu kijor, kachobel, asisik kithan, akijol seme-kitang, labang ahuwit anat, kamprek paklangsi lale asisik pachirlisi do, ladi hel pipot dolang, lamehel kikrol-kachirli aphan akime,
lake nerideng kipek Arnam bor-eh kichok jortang kido kime-alamthe badi kangthir abi-pun alongsi parjakngo.
Inghosi neyok jakong pilo, ili la Hemphu Khristo Jisu kajinsoyok hoichodo; piyok pu tene neyok kikrol pusi murkiya asal long ne pachakngo ne anangyok kardom pajirdo,
manta abhu hlonghlesi kikrol un-eh anat ne kapatharak, honjat kipi, manta ne jinso hlongo piyok pu tene ne thekthe anatsi tiki hlongo,
aro neyok Hemphu kajinso para kikrol lisi nepilo aro Khristo Jisu long nengdok hlongo.
Kipu alam krol nange, aro ahuwit chideng pen nange, lake Papi kido arleng yok kapajok aphan, Jisu Khristo ke pirthepe long yok wango, labang papi arleng asitem ne si kanghochot polo.
Manta inghosi ki-or-eh ajiuli aphan anang yok krole, anali phan arjan badi, Jisu Khristo si anang ahuwit chipaning ding, kangho chotke ne lo, nelong pachiklan do, la-apotsi ne kajinso hlongo.
Minon binong Recho yok, lake kanghonhe, kachinine, aro ihut det Arnam yok aman pinang aro anang jortang arni aporten padonang. Amen.
Ei neso Timothi po, nang kikrol aro kime kachiron thek kido pon aphan, atono katurki alamthe nangthan tango bangpomar ateng me-at chipadukne tiki pon,
la-apot la kikrol aro kime angthin chiron not. Manta angkhan arleng la kikrol aro kime kachiron thekthesi, anali kikrol kanghorop ajahaj badi chiplango;
anali sitem ke Himenayus po aro Alekjendar po labang hini yok si-ik arideng champilo, tangsi kapatharak chirlile ye.
Ne ahuwit yok ango ke, nang than do, ahuwit arleng aphan, laparake, ili ke ahuwit pingkit aro kardom pajirsi, bor-eh chohang, aro bang aphan Arnam yok chirdompi nang.
Recho hel aphan aro phu-phang kihlong helyok, ili ahuwit mengdunne aro samjinne, aduk kiwangwe yok aro nengsam aro aman chipadosi karjak-kithur hlongyok pingkit nang;
labangsi ili Ral Hemphu Arnam amahang semsemsi akime aro kachideng ponman,
anang abangten arleng ta kijok aro wangsi khanang agiyan pahlong aneng do.
Piyok pu tene, Arnam ihut det, aro Arnam pen munusi labang hini adak asitem po, anangsi munsi Khristo Jisu;
anang ahuwit aphan kapajok aholan badi abithang yok ajiu chipilo;
labang hakhi pisi kapahar arleng aro adun (ne khanangsi pudo, asisik pupe yong), kikrol aro khanang po pen Bang-ajat helyok kapaklang aphan ne pachakngo.
Lasi apenso hel, neng thithe aro ahul wesi ahuwit athem long kangthir ari rungne pingkit nang, labang ne nali than do;
ladisi arloso hel ta mahang tha-angwet aro abhu hlong phrotsi aneng pen, chipalangme pe-rik pachi-ik nang;
achu kachisubi let, ser-lek kachi-ik, muni aro ador-ong pe-rik hel pen kalek, manta Arnam long kimeng dun asal katiki kamichang kadhorom arloso chiplangot.
Arloso arleng hel chipabek si, nengsam pen pachirli nang.
Kapaklang, lale apenso aphuthak ajakong kido yok, ne arloso helyok ne hawang thothe yong;
manta neng chipabeksi kapadoyok thando; piyok pu tene Adam poyok ango kithep, aro laparasi Hawape yok kithep.
Aro Adam poyok ke chobelbe yong, manta Hawa pe yoksi chobel tangsi, Arnam akanong kapangho.
Layong ta anang so-kapaplang parasi joktange; manta abhu hlong phrotsi kikrol, nengdok aro kangthir dotangsi hlonge.
Khanang kipu alamthe doset do; inghosi ihut bishop aphang ar-ih do, pu tene anang akime asal ayok ar-ih do.
Minon lasi ihut bishop poyok bang kapatharak-ren hlong nangne ye, apiso ihut kido, atengsi kicho, kachironthek, kachi-ik kangthir, don kachingden thek, kapaklang thek-at,
aro hor kangri-re, lale akeng-ari samphrat nangne, chipabek thek nange, neng samjin, aro nohok anengdok do nangne.
Abithang ahemyok me-at kilangthek, aro asohel pangdomsi aro rat asitem aman kido nange.
Manta inghone bak anang abithang ahemyok pangdom thekthe, tene anang pot badi Arnam kachikruk al-en pon theknge?
Aro aborai ongsi si-ik ado kipi hlonghle yok, la-apot anang akimi kikrol arlengyok en-nangne.
La yongta, bang para ado kibat aro si-ik ahonjat kitong para jok nange, tangsi bang hel parata kime hakhi kihlong arleng do nange.
Labadisi dikon ta kime asoi, angthin hini kangwe, lale hor kangrire, lale abithang det yok kachiron do nangne, nohok alop donangne,
anali kikrolsi kime angthin kachiron thek Arnam kabutisit acho alamthe chi-en thek arleng do nange.
Aro ango analiyok archal lang nange, la-aphel adowe hlong pu tene dikon asal patiki nang.
Ladisi arloso helta kime asoi donange, bang patharak hlong nange, bangyok kachursi do nangne, manta atengsi kicho, aro ahuwit alamlong kikrol akime donange.
Dikon hel ihut arloso apihan, abithang aso hel, aro ahemyok kapangdom thek do nange;
piyok pu tene ingho dikon katiki abangke anali bithang kime aphan aro Khristo Jisu aphan kikrol apharan pahlong man.
Ne bekso arni aphel nali dung kiwangyok chiron do; manta nang kithek aphan, ne bangpomar nangyok wido.
ne arni ding pu tene, long-eh arlong nat khanangpo aro lamthe abhiti natsi Arnam ahempo, lake kihreng Arnam kachikruk, lalong nang pot badi do pon nangene, nali thek-re hlonge.

Ili dhorom long kabutisit acho alamthe khanangsi kithepen, lalong ihik-bihik do nangne: Anang a-ok long pachiklango, jiuli long dhorom kangthir pusi alekhot eno, tharlon hel parasi chiklango, Bang-ajat hel ango pahar tango, pirthepe long kikrol wango, jortang padosi pangthur ponno.
Minon ke Jiuli-Kangthir than phlendo, monphel owe long angkhan arleng kikrol para chiti kange; kachobel ajiu long, aro samon hel kachirli dun along anali neng piponne;
inghosi abithang kachiron angthin long ingchin akiso kapangdak asin bilo, labadi neng kachobel neng-sik parasi labang hel chiplange.

Anali asisik kithan hel jorme-chihap nangne pu ye, aro kikrol aro khanang kachithan un abang kardom pajirsi kachideng ayok, jipe kicho apot hel Arnam sanselo, bang pomar para chiterek si kidoyok nang thanne.
Piyok pu tene Arnam ahuwit kasanse abihini majit akime det; aro isi ta kise nange ingjong, kardom pajirsi chideng nange;
piyok pu tene Arnam alamthe pensi aro pingkit pensi ahuwit pangthir man.
Nang mehel alam korte aro ingjir helyok hikepon, nang kikrol alamthe aro nang kahike kikrol-kapachirli alamthe hel pensi nang ihut Jisu Khristo akime amurkiya chiplange.
Manta atono atomohel aro akisar alam long pateme dut si dhoromyok patharak nangne. Nang bithang kijok-kangthir pen chirdom thek aphan chirli,

piyok pu tene, agar-ari long chirli yong ta beksosi alab chok do, manta kikrol-kangthir pen kachirdom pame tene, ahuwit apor ta alap chokman; piyok pu tene mehelke minon aro monphel kido aphan bor-eh pang-ak wendo.
Kipu alamthe doset do, aro ahuwit ta kachideng nange alam do.

Piyok pu tene lamehel kachiha pensi hali chipaduk hapdo aro chirbusi tiki do. Piyok pu tene Arnam ahuwit arleng aphan, layok ke, kikrol abang hel aphan Pajok Hemphu pahlongyok, hali labang kihreng Arnam long chihalo.
Nang labang hel alam thannot, aro hikenot.
Nang riso ajiu kaiyokta pangwedet tolek; manta nang lamthe long, lam-lun along, nengdok long, kikrol long, aro kapangthir long, kikrol arleng hel arjan chiplang.
Ne wang hlenghle leng ke, nang lo-kangthir kaporhe, neng kirung, aro kapaklang along anengpi.
Aso kithe-kiding abang ari kibat amun, lalong turkisi kithan pen kajinso bor-eh nangyok nangpilo, bangpo nangthin long panung kulek.
Ahuwit ango nang kihari asal pachiklan nang, lasi lamehel alam anengpi, aro lamehel along chiti klungne tikinot.
Nang bithangyok meso chilang, kapahar amun, aro nang kapaklang alam long meso chilangwen; lamehel asal meso tikine do; piyok pu tene ladi tiki tangsi, nang abithang aro karju helta pajok nge.
Akisar arlengyok tam-mek, manta anangyok apo po badi nengrung ponne than, riso arleng helyok korte badi arkel,
arloso akisar pe helyok ili ai pe badi langpon, aro so-arjang helyok ingjir pehel badi chipangthir phlen aneng pen chingduk.
Inghosi anang mat-mat ke himelo, labang hime abang badi aman pipon.
Manta dakne bak hime aso-asu dolang, tene anali angoke abithang ahemyok kamainot nange asal katiki yok, aro ape-apo yok kirap dunyok pachirli nang; piyok pu tene bangpo Arnam ango neng pangsam man.
Manta ingho pe anang mat-matsi hime aro jangrete, bangpe ke Arnam yok chihi si, anuwe-anelo chingduksi aro pingkit chihonjokne pado nang.
Manta ingho hime pe abang kaseletsi dokuk, labangpe hrengsi kido amunsi akithi badi lo.
Anali kachitharak hlonghle yok, lamehel alam than not.
Manta inghone bak ke abithang arleng, yongta abithang ahem-bang aphan chironre, anang kikrol hoi choche yong, aro kikrolkre abangyok ta kangho chot.
Inghosi kep thorok anengkan yok ta abo kikom kalek, aro ihut apihan po apiso kido,

aro ajat-jat akime asal katiki-anang dolo, labangpe aso hel kipathe-kipading, don kachingden, kangthir hel yok akeng-ri kicham, aduk-tap kihlong abangyok kirap, aro ahuwit kime asal katiki, tene labadi arloso hime pune alekhot pado nang.
Manta hime amu helyok alekhot en nenot, piyok pu tene anali Khristo para chirtingsi pihan ar-ih phakman,
aro lasi kikrolcheng amun kikrol tihup apotsi, anali phuthak bisar ado chibatman.
Aro la aporsi anali adon para adon arting-worsi apor padaman; ladet kalek, lam chursiman, aro bang ahem tiki cho-hreksi, kanangne hel chirliman.
Lasi ne kithan alamke lalo, hime amu abang pihan pa-en nang, aso pachibu nang, hemtung asal patiki nang, aro kangho kapatharak hutur hel ayok jat asol pihlong ngek.
Piyok pu tene minonta angkhan ke si-ik aphel chipharlep dunphak ngo,
kachikruk abang khanang himepe yoksi rapdun nange, la-apot kikrol himepe khanang pu tene, anang kachipho ahembang aphan parap dun nang, kachikruk long parpu dung hlongek.
Ingho kithe-kiding abang kilangpon pame, layok ta, inghosi lamthe kapahar aro pachirli pon, analiyok barni ateng aman kipinange kamichang pusi alekhot en pon nange.
Piyok pu tene lo-kangthir long pudo, ‘sok kapasi amun chorong yok khanghara bamek; aro ‘Sal katiki poyok anang adat pahlong nange.’
Phu-phang helyok pasumseng alamthe do pu tene, bang-hini lale bang-kithom hakhi we-leng ke oneyek.
Kamprek abang ke kapaphere yok, pap katiki helyok rat angot ado katiki helyok paserek.
Arnam, Khristo Jisu, aro karwaltang atharlon hel amahang semsemsi ne nangyok khanangsi than do, lake arju-phlen tangte leng ke bisar ote yek, lamehel abi-pun mainot pon; ibakdet ke isita lang ponek.
Ihut yok ta phot ke ari jar-rek; aro bang hel apap rungdun nek; abithang yok chipangthir phlenne do.
Nang pokpo, apor aporke ki-un eh anat, lang detke junje si, bek bekso athe alang cho-junlen.
Angkhan arleng apap hel pachini dak un, aro anali pap bisar aphan padung hetman; aro angkhan apap anali phelsi chiklangman.
Akime asal hel ta labadisi pachini dak un; aro prek asinhel pachini phlenphle, manta chibutike do un-eh.
Arnam amen, aro kapachirli jatsi tharak nangne, lasi jongali kaparphang aturuhel, nali bithang ahemphu yok me-at chimainot si donange pune chironot.

Aro ingho Hemphu yok kikrol ahemphu do, analike korte chiplango apot, analiyok aman pangwe yek, manta layok ta anali turu asal pamechotne patikipi nang; piyok pu tene sal peksi sal pachok abang kikrol do aro ili nengdok ta do.
Lamehel katiki nange asal alam hikepon aro chingduk pon.
Inghone bak prek pachirlipon, aro lake ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo long lamthe-kachirli alam, aro kijok-kachirli po chingbarbe ye,
anang aborai mat-matsi doman aro anang jatsi thekthe pensi doman, manta lam chingbarbe aro lam kachingje ahul dolong man,

bang pomar para kachitheng, angchek, kachipatharak, kachingthok, aro jat lam abhu hlonghle, aro khanang po long aneng kangwe anat, ahul pawangchot-chot man, ladi arleng hel kachirdom so aporsi akime kachipaklang ayok chiron man.
Layongta, anang kidoso neng kachingsam do pu tene dhorom kangthir ajiuli hlong lenman;
piyok pu tene ili pirthepe long isi abihini chiwanwe yong, aro holek pirthepe para isi chipon un-eh ye;
manta ili chojun aro pe-rik do tene, latengsi ili neng ingsamsi do nange.
Manta inghosi hem kime kachiplang yok ar-ih, anali ladisi honjat wangman aro aduk chitongman, aro chithan un-ehsi aro kangho kachiron long dopon si arleng paprel ponman.
Piyok pu tene nohok alop ahuwit akangho kiwang si-ik akangri aro anali neng kar-ih anat angkhan arleng kikrol para ingho lo, anali angthin nok kichang nengduk chiwan phak ngo.
Manta ei Arnam arleng hel, nang lamehel para chiterek; aro dhorom kangthir chorhi dun, kijok-kachirli, kikrol, nengdok, kachirchi, kachingduk hop, labang hel en dun.
Kikrol kime ensi me-at tikine chirbu pon; or-eh len ajiuli arjak pon; bangpo anatsi nang taramo; aro ako-ong hakhi ango la-akime alamthe hel hoicho.
Ahuwit yok ajiu kipi Arnam amahang semsemsi, aro ingho Pontiyas Pilat po ango me-at hoi kicho, la Khristo Jisu amahang semsemsi ne nang than do,
ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo wang chiklang phak weleng ke, kithan alam adai wedetne aro patharak hlonghle detne enot,
ingho apor chok penpan wang chiklange—anangsi arnamhel Arnam, Rechohel Arecho, ahemphu hel Hemphu, kanghonhe ihut det kithe po, hlong dunkal katha-ang kido po;
ihut arlengta jat anang yok thek hlonghle yong, aro thek hlonghle ye; anangyok amanpi aro jortang pajutje nang. Amen.

Ingho labang pirthepe long hem-kime abang, analiyok bangpo than not, anali nengkartul pado hlongek, aro anali kachiha po long krolkre si, Arnam ili nengrong kachipado ahuwit abihini pangrumsi pido, labang Arnam yok kikrol yok thannot.
Anali kime asal tiki nange, kime asal katiki apuru badi chiplangot; nengwak phlen pidun not, aro kajinso kapahar aneng donot;
ladisi anali bithangyok khanang ajiuli chi-ot thipsi monphel aphan kime abhiti natsi jiuli apuru chihansi not.
Ei Timothi po, nangyok potsi asal pek tango, bangpo chiral ponnot; aro dhorom kapatharak alam kangje-wor hel para, aro chimangkai si kachirli agiyan akangho alamthe hel para chiterek ngot;
angkhan arleng ke labang kachimangkai agiyan aborai dosi kikrol aduwar para chiterek hrolo. Nali pen kajinso padodun nang.
Jisu Khristo long kido ajiuli seme-kitang badi, Arnam ahisa parasi Khristo Jisu kapachak kangthir-adun Pol po, nengdok aso Timothi po adungyok.
Apa Arnam aro ili Hemphu Khristo Jisu para kajinso, nengdok, aro nengsam nangpen padonang.
Ne pingkit jutjelensi nangyok neng kachipurki amun, ne sar-lar hel katiki badi ingthin chipangthir si Arnam yok chirdom man, anang kajinso hel hoi choman.
Aro ne nang mek-kri hel neng chipurki si, nengrong kachipado yok, nangyok ajo-anelo kithek hlong yok aneng doman.
Nali kikrol ne thekngo ango ke nang phupe Luis pe, aro nang ai pe Iunis pe angthin long kido, aro aserengsi ne chironman, nangthin longta do, nang long kido la me-at kikrol alam ne nenglong wangman.
Lasi ne ari kibat parasi Arnam kajinso abor-eh nang long do, bangpo pachitha-ang pon yok ne nangyok neng purki phak do.
Piyok pu tene Arnam ili yok kaphere ajiuli ke pipesi, ajakong, nengdok, aro neng-kachipangdom ajiuli pilo.
La apot, ili Hemphu kipi hakhi alam, aro anang phan akrol kachibeng hlong, ne lamthe long nang tharak nangne; manta Arnam ajakong ateng, kime-alamthe aphan ne pen duk-tap hel chihinot;

anangsi iliyok pajokngo, aro kangthir kataram along arwalo; ili sal katiki badi kalek, manta anang bithang kar-ih aro kajinsosi bangpo tiki lo; labang kajinso kicheng ango para Khristo Jisu long iliyok kipi,
manta minon ili Ral Hemphu Khristo Jisu kiwang parasi chiklango; anang kithi pangwesi, kime-alamthe parasi ajiuli wano aro or-eh len yok katha-ang wano;
labang kime-alamthe aphan ne kaharipo, kangthir-adun aro paklangpo ne pachak ngo,

lasi ne lamehel katiki aduk chohlong do; layong ta ne tharakre yong; piyok pu tene ne inghoyok krolo, anangyok ne chinido; aro anang arideng ne chipek detno, bangpo anang la arni aphan neral pon, bangpo krol pendo.
Ne para potsi arju hlongo, bangpo kijok alam kachirli arjan pune Khristo Jisu alam kikrol aro nengdok long chi-en thip.
Potsi akime bor-eh nanglong nangbat do, bangpo ili long kido Juli-Kangthir pen chiralpon.
Phagelas po aro Harmogenis po mehel Asia alongri kido ahuwit ne para tikangsi damo, labang nang than undo.
Onesiphoras po ahem bangyok Hemphu kajinso pado nang; piyok pu tene anang aphongten ne neng-arong kapado, aro nepen akrol long hirkuli kibam tharakre yongo.
La-aholan Rom arongpe long kido amun, anang meso chilang-worsi neyok kapahlong;
anang ke la-arni Hemphu para kajinso pahlongo, Hemphu ladi kajinso papi len nang; aro Ephisiya along ta anang la-an al ne-eno, bangpo nangta me-atsi than undo.
Nang ke, ei ne so po, Khristo Jisu long kido kajinso long nang chipangtang ngot;
aro ako-ong hakhihel ango ne para potsi arju hlongo, labang ahuwit alam, bang ayok ta kahikethek arlengyok pekngot.
Khristo Jisu long ihut akime sunturipo badi, nang nepen aduk chihinot.
Sonturi asal long kido amun, abithang aphan kijor-kihrep asal patiki tol te; manta inghosi sonturi asalyok en pono, anangyok neng kapangsam yok chiron hlongman,
aro kachilem long kihalyok inghone bak chiron do tene, layong ta anang abi-pun ateng mesone chirlile tene, kihal phurkup chi-ik hlonghle.
Ingho khiti long chipaduk, anangsi ango ke athepo chohlong nange.
Ne potsi pudo, bangpo mesone chiron; piyok pu tene Hemphu ahuwit alam nangyok abudi piye.
Ne kime-alamthe poke, Jisu Khristo kithi asitem para burphak ngo—Dabhit po agijing kido neng chipurki,
labang kime-alamthe badike, ne ihut akangho arleng badi akrol long hirkuli bamsi duk chodo. Yongta Arnam alamthe yok ke bam un-eh yong.
Lasi ne karwal abang hel aphan, lake lahelta Khristo Jisu long kido kijoktang, aro bangpo pen or-eh len jortang pahlong man, la-anat ne ahuwit chihi do,
labang kipu alamthe krol nange : Ili anang pen thilo, tene anang pensi jiuli ta abhak hlong dune;
ili chihi, tene anang pensi pangdom ta une; ili anang yok hoi-choche, tene anangta ili yok hoi-choche ye;
ili kikrol mo yongta, anang ke iliyok kikrol loi-loisi doman; piyok pu tene anang abithang yok hoi choche ke do un-eh.
Nang labang ahuwit alam neng pachipurki tolnot, aro lam chingje phakphe ayok, Hemphu amahang semsemsi analiyok than nok, lamehel jatsi kime chokche, karju abangsi aneng dohoman.
Nang bithang yok honjat kachihi arleng, tharakresi katikipo, aro khanang alamthe kapharli pame arleng chiplangsi, Arnam ango karjak yok me-at tikinot.
Manta dhorom kapatharak badi kipu mang-mang para chiterekne do; piyok pu tene lake ladi kithan akime kihlong hel kimeng pangho ong-onge,
aro anali kithanhel amek kimenpon badi thupone, anali sitem Hemenayus aro Philetaspo ladi kachirli,
anali khanang aduwar para tikangsi kiburphak ke choktango pusi anali kikrol pangho lo. Anali angkhan arleng yok kikrol pachihok saldo.

Manta Arnam kapangning abhitipo iningthipsi do, labangpo alamthe asap bisi than do, “Hemphu ke anang abithang arlengyok chini man;” aro “Inghosi Hemphu amen en, anang kangho pap para pachiterek nang.”
Hem akithe long, ser-rupa adorop det ke dode, thengpe aro inghan adorop ta doman; labang hel angkhan ke pormo apor en man, aro angkhan ke enlong hlongman.
Inghosi mehel para abithang chipangthir si do un, tene anang akime apor aman do, chipangthir phlensi, Hemphu asal aphan kamichang, aro ahuwit kime asal aphan chihonjoknge.
Manta nang riso aneng kar-ih hel tikangot; aro dhorom kangthir, kikrol, nengdok, aro neng chipangthir ne Hemphu long kapingkit abangpen isap kido, mehel ahuwit endunot.
Sotonga aro kamango hap alam anat kachirbu hel ke angchek pawangman, bangpo theksi, labang hel along neng piyek.
Aro Hemphu murkiya ke chingchek nangne manta ahuwit yok kachingduk, kapaklang pame thek, aro bang paduk yongta chihi,
kachingchek abangyok chingduk hopne pame pon. Anali neng chipharlepsi aro khanangpo thek-resi Arnam bor-eh piye,
aro analiyok si-ik aneng pen ahisa katiki aphel, anali pasulkang-nuk kidodun para ahari wange.
Ki-or arni kaphere-meme apor wanghleng nge, bangpo abhu hlongot.
Piyok pu tene labang owe arleng hel abithang yok kachironchot, nohok alop, kachiborai, angthin karthat, bangyok kapatharak, anang ai pe pen apa poyok kimengme, kirap poyok kimengme, akisim,
al ki-en eh-det, jinso wedet, ado ki-ot, abang chipangdomde, chipu rao-rao, kangthir poyok kisim,
rung-tihut, abithang anengsi kido pon, Arnam anengdok aholan abang kaselet,
anglang chirdom paklang pon, manta Arnam ajakong hoi chochesi doye, mehel arleng para nang chiterek.
Piyok pu tene anali sitem angkhan arleng chobelsi bang ahem lutsi, pap chibhar kringsi ajat-jat kar-ih kengkam chijorman,
ingho arniten kachirli jong, manta khanang alam agiyan hlonghle det anat, kamango arloso helyok padoksi kibeng thot arlengpe badi en ponman.
Jibadi Janis po pen Jambris po hel Mosi po yok lang setset no, ladisi aneng kangho aro kikrol aporman wephosi anali khanangpo yokta tengo.
Manta anali la-an kaholo aro ango dam un-eh ye; piyok pu tene Janis po pen Jambris po labang-hini arleng badi, analita abangten kamango ahuwit ango chiklange.
Minon ke nang ne kahike hel thek hlongo, karkel-kapasi, neneng katingki hel, ne kikrol, ne kachipaneng ding, ne nengdok, ne kimeng thip,
lalong honjat kitong, ne kiduk hap, Antiyok, Akoniyum, aro Lastra long neyok pot badi duk-kicho kachihi nang thekngo; yongta la ahuwit para Hemphu neyok pajoksi wano.
Piyok pu tene, Khristo Jisu long kikrol-chirlisi kido-kithak pon aneng pen katiki ahuwit ta honjat tonge.
Manta sotonga aro kachobe arleng hel aneng pharlep ponsi aro abithang ta chichobesi, kangho para inghochot si dame.
Manta nalike, potsi chirlilo aro pot badi aporman hlongsi krol lo, ingho parasi chirlilo banghel krolthipne donot,
aro lo-kangthir long Khristo Jisu yok oso adak para kikrol parasi kijok agiyan thek-resi dolo.
Ahuwit lo-kangthir Arnam ajiuli neng-kirung alamthe loi-loi, aro kachirli aphan, kapaserek aphan, aro dhorom kangthir kachirli aphan akime.
Lasi Arnam arleng ahuwit chokpleng, ahuwit akime asal katiki aphan chihonjok ngot.
Arnam ango aro kihreng pen kithi arlengyok bisar ka-oteye Arnam ango aro Khristo Jisu amahang semsem si, anang akihreng aro akithi, aro kachiklange aro anang longri hoichosi ne nali thando:
nang kime-alamthe pahar pon; lake kime aporta, aro kangho aporta songkhan pusi; chipaning ding, aro kikrol yok wanot, paserek, aro nengrung pon, kachihi alamthe hike pon.
Piyok pu tene ladi apor arleng hel kijok-kachirli amun chihihe ye, manta ano kapangthak arleng chiplangsi, anali kar-ih ateng kahike jap-jap arleng chipa-ongsi doye,
aro khanang alam ka-one ano chirduk deye, aro aporong atomo chithan phaknge, labadi apor wange.
Nali ke, arnita ahuwit alam long trepne do, duk-tap chihi, lamthe kihari asal tikipon, nang murkiya asal pachok pon not.
Jongsi nephan, nibot badi kichampi apor wangdo; aro ne jiu chitikangsi kachikak apor wang hlengdo.
Ne la-anat akime neng pisi chilarelo, ne karwaltang aduwar kapatang yok kat duno, ne kikrol chi-en thipsi dolo.

Minon para nephan dhorom kangthir aphurkup nephan ne bipiwen do; dhorom kangthir bisar poke Hemphu la-arni bangpo neyok nepi ye; neyok det ta kalek, manta anang kachiklang arniyok nengkidok ahuwit ayok piye.
Nedung kiwang ayok parjang letne nang meso tikinot,
piyok pu tene Demas po ke minon labang pirthepe yok nengdoksi tikango, aro Thesalonika yok damo; Kresken po Galatiya yok damo, aro Titas po ke Dalmatiya yok damo.
Luk po detsi nepen do. Nang Mark po yok en-ne wangot; piyok pu tene kapahar asal along nephan rapthekman.
Troyas rongpe long ne chol akiding Karpas po arideng thikangsi wang hlongo,
nang kiwang amun anang yok, aro lo hel, layok ke chul hel wanot.
Alekjendar homalpo neyok paduk hap mo, anang katiki hel aphan Hemphu piphak nge.
Anangyok nang manta meso chilang, piyok pu tene anang ili lamthe hel kiteng.
Ne angoke ne bithang alamthe angkipu apor, ihut ta nepen wang rung dunde yongo, manta ahuwit ta neyok tikang detno. Bangpo analiyok alekhot pa-en nangne.
Manta Hemphu nedung wang arjapsi neyok ajakong nepilo; la-apotsi ne ridengsi kapahar asal pachok detyok, aro ahuwit Bang-ajat hel parju hlongyok nepek ngo. Lasi ne tike-chalbe hel para jok uno.
Hemphu neyok ahuwit akangho kapaduk para pajok do aro anang ethakpe-alongri aphan ral le. Anang ajortang mo-moyok padong. Amen.
Priskila pe pen Akila poyok aro Onesiphoras po ahem bang yok kardom pajirdun.
Erastas po Korinth long rilo; manta Troplimas po Miletas long kisosi ne tikango.
Nang kichum adin ango kiwang ayok meso chitiki. Ebulus po nangyok, Padens po, aro Linas po aro Klaudiya aro ahuwit kortehel yok katiki badi kardom hlodundo.
Hemphu nali jiuli pen pado nang. Nali pen kajinso pado nang.
Arnam karwaltang abang kikrol, aro kamainot badi khanang alamthe agiyan, Arnam amurkiya aro Jisu Khristo kapachak kangthir-adun Pol po, labangke kijok-kachirli ateng,
kachobelbe Arnam, kichengcheng akal para kipiyok kapang-ak, labang ki-or eh ajiuli chihasi—
aro labang ateng kapahar parasi anang lamthe pen pachiklango, kapahar asalpo ili Ral Hemphu Arnam kithan atengsi nerideng champilo,
kapahar atengsi kikrol, ne long wang kimeng osopo apun naksi Titas po adungyok: Apa Arnam aro ili Ral Hemphu Khristo Jisu para kajinso aro nengsam nali long pado nang.
Kitangte asal hel kapachok phrotyok, aro ne kithan badisi, arongten kithe-kiding abang yok sal kapachak yok, Krete langlompe long ne nangyok bisi wango.
Inghone bak arleng ado kangwepen, anang iphong det piso ki-en, anang asohel kikrol det, kangho katiki alokjor aro ado kido lale kimengme kalek tene labadi arleng labang aphang michangman.

Piyok pu tene bisop, ihut Arnam ahem puru ahemphu badi, ado donangne ye; aneng neng kang-phlut nangne ye lale ahisasi kengkam kachijor lale hor kangri-klang do nangne ye, aborai kido nangne ye, lale neng kilangho alop donangne ye;
manta anang don-kachingden thek, akime loi-loi nengkidok, abangpo kachipangdom, kachiron thek, kangthir, atengsi kicho-kijun chiplang nange.
Khanang alam pachirlipon, aro lam kapasumseng abangyok kimaime hel pangthek si paklangthek nange.
Akijol alamthe kithan, Arnam ango kachobe aro kimengme ako-ong arleng do, lalong Jihudi sunnot kachiplang hel asitem do;
anali ladihak kido pangwe nange, anali ladihak kilangho alap aphan, anali kanangne hel paklangsi, angkhan ahem arlengyok kikrol pangho detman.
Anali ihut abithang arleng, anali turki posi, ladi pudo, “Krete alongri abang arnita kachobel det, achong kido okpe natsi, aro kaselet kicho akhok.”
Labang hakhi ke khanang. Lasi analiyok pasereksi kithan aro kikrol acho alam pachirli,
Khanang alamthe kachi-oh wedetsi Jihudi hel aporong atomo hel, lale khanang para kachirting arleng hel alamyok onedunek.
Kangthir phlen helyok ahuwit abihini kangthir phlen, manta akangho hel aphan aro kikrolkre helyok jatsi kangthir phlen kalek. Anali neng aro kime-kangho kachiron hel la-hini ta akangho.
Anali Arnam yok than-un pusi anali angho pen ke hoi chodo, manta anali salpen ke hoi choche. Anali simeme, kithan mengme, ahuwit akime asal katiki chakche pho.
Manta nang kijok-kachirli alam potsi kanange pomar paklangsi me-at alamthe pachirli pon.
Kithe-kiding helyok atengsi abang kapangdom, kime asoi, lam chironthek, aro kijok- pachirli ponthek, nengdok long, aro chipaneng dingsi kido pachirli.
Labadisi, arloso akisar helyok ta kangthir arleng badi kikrol kamichang arkel-pasi yok hikepon, aro ado tikiner lale cho-ingri sal aturu dodesi, potsi akime lamehel pachirlipon,
la-apot arlosohel apihan helyok aro abithang aso helyok nengdok thek aphan pachirli,
kachipangdom un, kachiron thek, abang kangthir-et, hem kilang thek, kajinso kido aro anali apihan hel arhum kidoyok pathek-paresi Arnam alam pen katharak hlonghle ayok pachirlipon.
Ladisi riso arleng hel yokta abithang abangpo chipangdom thek ayok nengrung pon.
Nang bithang ta ahuwit kime asal katiki arjan chipaklang, aro nang paklangne pachiklan, thirkukne dopon;
aro kijoktang alam paklangsi katharak nange ingjong, laparake kilang set-set abang ili yok wang kipu awak hlonghlesi, chitharak phaknge.
Turuhel ayok ili Ral Hemphu Arnam alam chirlisi ahuwit alamlong pamengdun nang,

la-amun pudun phak nangne, manta anali hem ahemphu mengdunsi, aro ahuwit alam along nengsamsi do dun nok, la-apot ahuwit asal long anali ili Ral Hemphu Arnam alam kachirli arje pachiklan unyok mehel neng rungpon.
Piyok pu tene Arnam kajinso ahuwit arleng kapajok aphan chiklango,
ili kimeng-kapangho aro pirthepe long kar-ih hel hoi chochesi, dhorom kangthir, aro kikrol-chirlisi labang pirthepe long arjak nang,
bor-eh long kachiha hlongyok aro Arnam aro ili Ral Hemphu Jisu Khristo jortang pen kachiklang arniyok inghong si donang, labang kajinso ladi hali paklangdo.
Anang ili ahuwit kanghohel para kapajok yok, aro akime asal katiki kar-ih anang aphan apharan pensi kapangthir arleng otesi, ili phansi champilo.
Nang lamehel alam thanphlen nok; apharan kido badi nengrung aro chingduk. Nangyok kapangwe det aphan kaiyokta awak piyek.
Kipangdom, aro apharan kihlong arleng arlo kidoyok, kimeng ponyok, ahuwit kime asal katiki trepne kidoyok, neng purkipon,
kaiyokta patharakngek, ado kol, aro chinom hopsi, ahuwit arleng yok kachingbar angthin kido aphan analiyok purkipon.

Piyok pu tene aporong ke ilita kamango, kithan kimengme, pamok-mok, ajatjat amek alop, aro abang kaselep turu asal tikisi, chilanglepho, aro chithengsi apor kapadam, kilang karjuho, aro ihut para ihutyok kachisim kido.
Manta konam ili Ral Hemphu Arnam nengsamsi, aro munusi ajatyok nengdok pachiklansi,
la-amun ili bithang kime asal katiki anatke kalek, manta anang jinso atengsi jiuli akimi pen kachulu, aro Jiuli-Kangthir akimi kasanse parasi ili pajok tango;
labang anat labang ajiuli ili Ral Hemphu Jisu Khristo parasi ili phuthak li-tungo,
la-apotsi, ili anang or-eh len ajiu kachiha ateng pahlong dun ayok jinso pensi dhorom kangthir kachipu alekhot chiplango.

Labang alamthe khanang kikrol nange do. Ne Arnam long kikrol abang kime asal otsi katikijong yok ar-ih do, labang anat lamehel along nang thirkuksi kithan ayok ne nangyok than do. Lamehel alam arleng hel aphan akime aro alap do pendo.
Manta kamango badi kachingchek, agijing hel atomo chingje si, kachingbarbe, aro kanong alam kachingje, labang ahuwit para nang chiterek, piyok pu tene labang hel kanangne aro akijol.
Inghosi rat asitem phlak ponman, mehel arleng yok iphong lale phong-ni paserek aphel, kachideng dun nange ingjong,
piyok pu tene ladi arleng kangho paklangponsi aro anang bithang aporman pisi pap tikido, bangpo nang thek do.
Ne nang dungyok Artemas po, lale Taikhikas po yok tole, Nikopoli long nedung kiwang yok chiron, piyok pu tene ne labang athem kichum adin kido damyok chirono.
Kanong ukil Jenus po aro Apolos po yok me-atne wangtol, lalong lahel ka-ongkal weye.
Aro ili arleng hel ta songkhan kanange apor kachirap thek aro kanange kakungthin amun pachok aphan anali kime asal katikiyok pachirli nang.
Ne pen kido ahuwit ta kardom nang hlodun do. Kikrol along iliyok nengdok kido abangyok kardom pajir. Nali ahuwit penta kajinso pado dun nang.
Jisu Khristo anat akrol kido Pol po, aro korte Timothi po, ili kirapdun alok aro nengdok Philimon poyok,
aro ili ingjir Aphiya pe aro ili lok sonturi Arkhipas po, aro nali hemlong kachingrum kachikruk, ahuwit adung yok.
Ili Pa Arnam aro Hemphu Jisu Khristo para naliyok kajinso aro nengsam pado nang.
Ne pingkit amun ne nangmen chipurki si, arnita ne Arnamyok kardom pajirsi do,
piyok pu tene nang Hemphu Jisu yok aro ahuwit kangthir arleng hel aphan nang nengdok aro kikrol alam ne arjusi do.
Nang kikrol along kachingchong dunsi hali pen kido ahuwit akime asal Khristo aphan pachok nang, labang pingkitsi do.
Piyok pu tene, ei ne-kortepo, nang nengdok para ne ako-ong nengrong aro nengkirung alam arju hlongo, piyok pu tene nang parasi kangthir arleng hel ajiu long pharat dakngo.
Labang anatsi, jipe kanange do, labang alam nangyok kithan yok Khristo long ne aha doman,
Jisu Khristo anat minon akrol kibeng, ne Pol po, ihut aharapo yongta nengdok anat layok ke nang chingduk do;
lake apo po apun, aro ne akrol long kido amun kiplang Onesimas po aphan ne nali chingduk do.
Anang ango nangyok kichakche si kido, manta minon ke nang phan aro nephan ta kirap chiplango.
Ne ingthin nengdok do, anang yok ne nangdung pachirul phaksi tolo.
Kime-alamthe kapahar anat ne akrol long kido hlong, nang holan anangke nephan sal nerapdo, lasi ne si anangyok nebithang aphan kachipon kiron;
manta, anang kirap ke neng ahisa wedung ke kalek, manta nang ahisasi chok, la-apot nang chikekngke lengke ne jatsi ki-en ponyok aneng dode yongo.
Nang anangyok mophel kapahlong phak ayoksi, anangyok angkhan adin kachikak bak hele.
Turu poyok hlong phakta turu badike kalek, turuyok kimechot nengdok korte apun chiplangot; anang neyok nengdok chotdo, manta layok ke a-ok long aro Hemphu long, la-hini nangpen konbak nengdok chotdo.
Lasi nang neyok alok badi nechiron do, tene neyok kachideng badi anang yokta chidengot.
Aro anang nangyok pene bak akangho tikilo, lale penebak kipime do tene, nang neyok pune alekha en nok.
Ne si nangwol piphak nge; bangpo nesi Pol po nebithang ari pen wilo; piyok pu tene nang neyok dhar badi ne kipime abam dolang, pusi nangyok nangthan do.
Oik, ei korte, Hemphu aronsi ne nangpara bekso nengrong hlongchet tene nephan kime lo; nang Khristo long neneng pangsam mot.
Nang kithan kimeng chinengtang pusi ne nangyok wilo; aro ne potsi nangthan hlongo, layok nang meso tiki chotne pusi ne thekdo.
Manta la-amunsi, nephan don kido apulu isi honjokne bi; piyok pu tene, nali pingkit parasi neyok naliphan banta badi pajir nangbo pusi chihado.
Jisu Khristo aphan nepen akrol kachibeng Ipaphras po naliyok kardom nali hlodo.
Aro Mark po, Aristarkhas po, Demas po, aro Luk po, ne pen katiki lokjor abangta kardom hlodo.
Ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo kajinso nali ajiuli pen pado nang. Amen.
Atono ke Arnam prek-prek apor aro ajat-jat badi turki hel parasi sar-lar helyok lam pathan no,
manta ki-or owelong anang ihut Aso parasi lam-thano, labang Aso yok si anang ahuwit abihini aphuthak aidot pekngo, aro anang parasi pirthepe ta hurjilo.

Labang Aso si Arnam ajortang pachituro, aro abithang apharan aben asap aro anang apharan kido alamthe pensi bharasot pangdomsi bilo. Konam anang pap hel kol pangthirsi, anang Kithechot Jortang kido ancho-ri aga iningo,
ethak tharlon helyok ta thechot amen hlongsi, jibak amen hlongo, ango abang yok ta kithechot amen pahlongo.

Piyok pu tene, Arnam labang tharlonhel asitem inghoyok pulo? ‘‘Nang ne So, ne mini nangyok paplangple yong ma?’’ Lale prek along pudo, ‘‘Ne anang Apa chiplange, aro anang ke ne So chiplange kalek ma’’?
Aro matmatsi, konam anang So tahangyok pirthepe long wanno, anang pulo, ‘‘Ahuwit Arnam tharlon hel anangyok pachirdom nang.’’
Tharlon hel yok Arnam pulo, ‘‘Anang abithang atharlon helyok tomon naksi, aro abithang turu helyok me-ade badi oteman.’’
Manta Aso aphan ke pulo, ‘‘O Arnam, nang inghol, binongyok do, nang longri bisar kangthir pensi pangdom man.
Nang kadhorom yok nengdokngo, aro kangho yok simo; lasi Arnam, nang Arnam, nangyok, alokjor yok kimechot, nengrong ajangthu helsi arwal tango.’’
Aro, ‘O Hemphu, nang kicheng amun pirthepe abihini hel pangningo, suneng peke nang-ri asal;
Labang hinita prel detne; manta nangke arni dolen; lamehel ahuwit ta pe badi banne;
nang jalso ape badi lamehel yok thul-wetne, aro chol ape badi lamehel yok chiseleye. Manta nangke isi detsi do, aro nang anengkan hel jatsi or-eh ye.’ ’’
Manta anang tharlon hel asitem inghoyok anang pulo, ‘Ne nang hutur hel yok nang kengpak arlo bibe lengke, ne ancho-ari aga iningne do?’
Labang ahuwit tharlon helke jiuli asal tikisi, kijoktang hel aphan murkiya asal katiki hel kalek ma?
Lasi ili karju alamthe long me-atsi ka-one neng pidun nange, piyok pu tene ili potsi one-hlong, khanang hel ili nepsi en nange, tangsi bangpo ili parake pon un-eh ye.
Piyok pu tene tharlon hel kithan alam parasi chipmo, aro amungten apap lale kanong kapangho anat kanange angban hlongo,
labang kijoktang alamthe kichengke Hemphu parasi paharo, aro karju abang parasi kikrol pilo, labadi akithe kijoktang yok seleptene ili pot badi chipajok une?
Konam asombhik asin, bismat angtar aro ajat-jat ajakong kithe asal, aro Jiuli-Kangthir abor-eh parasi Arnam ahisa badi hakhi kipipon aporman chokngo.
Piyok pu tene ili kiwang nange pirthepe alam pudo, bangpo anang tharlon hel arlo bibe yong.
Manta ihutpo hakhi pisi pudo, ‘Arlengke pot te, nang anangyok neng purkiman? Lale arleng asoke pot te, nangke anangyok la-an al-en dunman?
Nang tharlon hel para bekso si pabeksi thepmo; nang analiyok jortang aro aman kipi phurkup pen pachi-ik wetno,

‘ahuwit abihini anang kengpak arlo bisi, anang arhum bilo.’ Piyok pu tene ahuwit abihini anang arlo kibi apot, anang arhum kido-kangwe dophrot no, manta minon hok ili ahuwit yok anang arlo kibi thek hlonghle yong,

manta labang Jisu yok thek do, anangyok tharlon helyok ke beksosi pabekngo, anang kithi akorom anat kihal aro aman kido phurkup pachi-ik wetno; la-apot Arnam kajinsosi, ahuwit aphan anang kithipo angdom pahlonge, lalongsi labang kithi akorom aronpo do.
Piyok pu tene ingho aphansi, aro ingho parasi ahuwit chokngo, ako-ong asoyok hal phrotsi kiwan amun, anali kapajok cheng duk-kicho parasi jinso choknge, Arnam labangsi kamichang kido.
Piyok pu tene inghosi pangthirman, aro jibak ayok pangthir phlenman, labang ahuwit ihut Apa parasi chokman,
Labang anatsi Jisu ke anali yok korte pusi kataram yok tharakre, anang pudo, ‘Ne korte hel angot ne nangmen pahare, kachikruk hel asitem nang parklam alun lunne.’
Aro anang puphak do, ‘Ne anang longsi chihadutne,’ aro puphak do, ‘Holek langot, ne aro neyok Arnam kipi osohel do.’
Lasi osohel awi aro a-ok chingchong do apot, anang bithang ta labadi asoi long chingchongo, kithi apharan kidoyok, lake si-ik yok kithi parasi kaparem ayok,
aro konbak arleng kithi yok kaphere anat kidoso alengke kithi aturu kido, lahel yok kapajok aphan, anang bithang ta ladisi la-hini aphan chingchongo.
Piyok pu tene khanangke anang tharlon helyok wang rungre si, Abraham po agijing helyok wang rung ngo.
Lasi arleng hel pap kachikol ayok, Arnam abi-pun aphansi anang ke kajinso aro kikrol bor-bangthe chiplang ngo, la-apot ahuwit aphansi korte aro ingjir hel amahang badi kachiplang nange kido.
Piyok pu tene anang honjat tongsi duk-kicho amun, anang honjat kitong hel yok kirap apharan dopen do.
Lasi, ei ethakpe wang kataram tang kangthir korte aro ingjirhel, ili hoi kicho kangthir-adun, aro bor-bangthe yok, lake Jisu yok neng pipon.
Pot badi Mosi po Arnam ahem aphan kikrol dun, ladisi anang ta wang kitol poyok kikrol.
Piyok pu tene kido hem yokta mechot ahem kikem arlengpo konbak aman doman, anang Mosi po yokta ongchot jortang kido kamichang alekhot dolo.
(Piyok pu tene ahemten ihut parasi kemman, manta ingho ahuwit abihini kemo, anang ke Arnam.)
Minon ke jibak alam mophel aphan kithanme kido, labang ahuwit hakhi kido aphan Mosi po, murkiya asal tikisi Arnam ahemdung aphan kikrol kido;
Khristo ke, Aso chiplangsi, anang hem aphuthak krol lo; ili kachiha aborai aro aha kido kijut yok krol pensi ili pado lo, tene ili si labang anang hempo lo.
Lasi, Jiuli-Kangthir kipu badi, ‘Mini nali anang asi arju hlong man,
ahul wang tene, ladi ke nali ingthin long chiparthak ke do yek, labadi ingnam ajulong honjat kilang arni badi do yek,
lalong nali sar-larhel neyok katiki hel honjat kilang parasi neyok archal tango, aro angkol-hini anengkan yok ne katiki pomar thek hlongo,
lasi ne labang owepo yok neng-kithi wangsi puhlongo, anali arniten angthin kangho arleng, aro anali ne duwar hel anali chinine yong ngo.
La amun ne neng-akang si seme-kitang hlong, anali ne kisang athem long lut hlonghle ye.
