Ei korte aro ingjirhel, chilangwen, pene badi kihreng jong Arnam para kijang yok inghone bak kikrol-kresi kasotonga angthin chiplange.
Manta pap kachobel pensi nali kaita angthin chipangtang-er hlonghle yok, lasi ‘mini’ pune kipu apor kido aleng ke, arniten ta ihut para ihutyok nengrung pon nang.
Piyok pu tene ili Khristo long chingchongo, manta ili ke kachiha pen chengsi ki-or arniyok chiha pensi doman, tangsi hlong dune.
Labang lo-kangthir kipu badisi, ‘Mini nali anang asi arju hlongman, tene nali ahul kiwang jibadi nali ingthin karthak kido, ladi ingnam aju long honjat kilang arni badi do yek.’
Minon ke ingho arlengsi lamthe arjusi ahul kipawang? Ijip alongri para Mosi po arideng kiwan ahuwit arleng hel kalek ma?
Manta angkol-hini anengkan yok anang ingho arleng pen aneng akang kido? Labang pap tikisi kithi arang hel ingnam aju kiprel abang kalek ma?
Aro anali nepen kisang along lut dun hlonghle ye, pusi anang hopot kicho ke, anali kimengme hel yok ado kipi kalek ma?
Holek lasi ili thek hlongdo ke, kikrolkre anatsi anali lut dun un-eh yongo.
Lasi, anang kisang along kilutdun seme-kitang dowen yongta, nali ihut bak ke bisar chitongsi lalong lut dun kele pusi kachiphere donang.

Piyok pu tene ili ngo kime-alamthe har tango; labadisi analingo ta kipahar; manta labang a-odi alamthe analiyok alap chokche yongot; piyok pu tene anali ka-one abang anali kikrol pen alap chingbarbe yongo.

Piyok pu tene, ili kikrol abang, ili labang kisang alongyok lutdun hlongdo; ladisi Arnam pulo, ‘Ne nengkang ongsi hopot cholo, anali ne kisang along wanglut dun hlonghle ye,’ pirthepe kapangning cheng amunsi anang sal-katiki tang yongta, anang labang hopot cholo.
Piyok pu tene ilong ke anang ni-thorok isi adin aphan pudo, ‘Aro ni-thorok isi arni Arnam anang ahuwit asal katiki para sang ngo.’
Aro ilong ke anang puphak do, ‘Anali ne kisang long lut dun un-eh ye.’
Lasi angkhan ke jibadi manta lut dune, jibak ango kime-alamthe kipahar, anali kikrolkre anat lut dun hlonghle yongot,
matmatsi anang— ‘mini’ —pusi prek isi arni arwalsi, arni dingkol aphel, ango kipu badi Dabhit po parasi papuman, ‘Mini, ke nali anang asi arju hlongman, tene nali ingthin hel chiparthak ke do yek.’
Piyok pu tene Josuwa po analiyok kisang adin kipi nang tene, Arnam aphel kamprek adin alam pupelo hoi.
La parake Arnam arleng hel aphan kisang-arni minonhok kihlongme do-er do lang.
Piyok pu tene jibadi Arnam anang sal katiki para sango, ladisi, inghosi anang kisang-arni lut duno, bangpota abithang asalpara sang hlongo.
La-apot kaita labang kikrolkre hel arjan badi kijangje yok, lasi ili labang kisang along kilutdun chirbu nang.
Piyok pu tene Arnam alamthe kihreng, sal chokphlen, aro arangso hini anokjir yokta arangso chot, ajiu pen ajiuli, asek aro arupe, labang ahuwit yok wak phlen aro aneng kachiron aro kar-ih kachinipo.
Aro potsi kahurji abihini anang mek parake chibuti un-eh, manta ingho angot ili alekha pihlong man, anangmek ango ahuwit ta ahuna aro pe-rik weklung.
Laparake ethakpe asitem kidam ihut akithe do, lake Arnam Aso Jisu si ili phan bor-bangthe chiplango apot, wangot, ili hoi kicho adhorom long ot-thipne do nang.
Piyok pu tene ili bor-bangthe, anang ili ki-un eh along ili duk-tap amun neng dohohe, ladike kalek; manta anang, pap wepen si, ahuwit aronlong ili badi honjat kachitong.
La-apot wangot, ili kajinso kipahlong yok, aro kanange apor wang parap aphan kajinso kapahlong yok, aha pensi kajinso recho anghol adungyok, chipadungne dam nang.
Abangten bor-bangthe ke arleng asitem parasi arwal tangsi, pap anat banta pajir ponman aro buli karkliyok, arleng aphan Arnam aronsi sal-katiki pachakman.
Anang kamango aro kangho helyok kangduk aneng pensi thanpon thek; piyok pu tene anang abithang chipang tang un-eh si chikom plengsi doman,
aro la-anat si arleng hel aphan jibadi buli arkli man, abithang aphan ta ladisi, abithang pap kido anat buli karkli nange doman.
Aro kaita anang abithang aphan bangpo aman en-eh, manta Arnam parasi taram tangsi labang amanpo hlongo, Harun pota ladisi kataram aman kihlong.
La badisi Khristo ta bor-bangthe chiplangsi abithang yok parklamle yong, manta Arnam anangyok pulo, ‘‘Nangsi ne So, ne mini nangyok paplango’’; labang si anangyok parklamo.
Ladisi prek ilong long pudo, ‘‘Molkijedek po abi-pun ateng, nangsi mo-mo ayok bangthe po chiplangdo.’’

Jisu abithang a-ok abangpo pirthepe long kido amun, kithi para kiral un angot hangchirsi kasuru aro mek-kri pensi, kikrol kimeng chichampisi, kithi para kapajok Arnam yok chipabeksi, dhorom kangthir nengpen pheresi kapingkit apot, bor-eh hlongo,
anang So yong ta, duk-tap kicho parasi kimeng dunyok chirlilo;
aro anang agiyan choksi, Jisu ahuwit kimeng dun helyok momoyok Ral Hemphu chiplango,
Molkijedek po abi-pun atengsi kichok bor-bangthe pusi Arnam parasi aphangpo pilo.
Labang ihut alam kithan pa-or un-eh pho hali ako-ong kithanme dolang; manta nali anohel karju nothongo apotsi, bangpo kithan phlen un-eh yong.

Piyok pu tene minon apor yok ke nali bangyok paklangthek nange kido, la aniste, inghone bak naliyok Arnam lamthe hel kapachirli cheng badi, nali phan kanange chiplang detno; aro naliyok kangtang a-an kalek lang, chulangsi naliphan kanange dolo;
piyok pu tene ingho kicho a-an ke chulang, dhorom alamthe long anang thek-at kalek, piyok pu tene anang oso dolang.
Manta kangtang a-an ke, abo kichok hel aphansi, lake chirli-atsi abhu kihlong abangpo arorem arthopen kime-kangho alam pachini thek-phlenman, anali phansi.
Lasi wangot, ili Khristo kachirli cheng-cheng alam paphelsi, akithi asal para neng chipharlepsi, aro Khristo yok kamprek abhiti parjapjesi, agiyan kichokpleng long pango yok chirbu nang,
kamprek baptist ka-ote aro ari kibat ot dundesi, kithi-kibur, aro or-eh len bisar ka-ote alam kahikepon abhiti pangning nang.
Aro Arnam hawangtho pu tene, ili labang hel tikine pachoknang.
Piyok pu tene inghosi iphong katha-ang hlong tango, ethakpe bor-eh angdom hlongo, Jiuli-Kangthir long chingchongo,
Aro Arnam bor-eh alamthe, aro kiwange awepo ajiuli angdom hlongo, tene neng kachipharlep aphan analiyok neng akimi chiwan un-eh pen;
piyok pu tene lahel Arnam Aso yok abithang aphan akimi si kros long tar phakman aro pachiklang dangsi chipatharak man.
Piyok pu tene labang alungle athak jang jongsi arwe alang ingsipman apot, jibak aphan lungle panongman, analiphan kichome han-bap hel pawangman, labang alungle Arnam para bor-eh hlongman.
Manta ingsu aro bap arong pawang tene, labang ke sal chakche, aro Arnam para hao adung het; aro labang ki-or ke me paseknge.
Ei nengdok hel, hali labadi pu yongta, nali phan ladisi krolpen do, nali kido asoi hel layokta kimepen aro joktang do.
Piyok pu tene nali kangthir arleng hel yok jipe al-poson eno, aro ensi do, bangpo Arnam amenyok nali nengdok paklang do aro nali kachipaduk-hap ke Arnam tenge ye, anang ladi dhorom wepho kalek.
Aro nali abangten ta ki-or arniyok khanang kachiha aphan ar-ihne mesone tiki paklangpon,
la-apotsi nali kaselep wesi, jipe kikrol arleng aro chipaning ding parasi kipiye seme-kitang hel kihlonge aidot do, labang arleng yok chirli dun, labangsi hali ar-ih man.
Konam Arnam ke Abraham poyok seme-kitang amun, hopot kichoyok abithang yok akithe kaita kangwe dung apot, abithang amen pen hopot cholo,
pulo, ‘Ne khanangsi nang yok bor-eh nangpiye, aro nangyok pachan piye.’
Aro labadisi Abraham po chirchisi chipaning dingo apot, labang seme-kitang angban hlongo.
Munusi hel abithang yokta akithe chot amen pensi hopot chosi, aro kachineng-ot aphansi hopot chosi anali ahuwit kimetme alam hel chipamet man.
Ladisi Arnam labang seme-kitang bor-eh kihlong aidot kido helyok anang angden chipharleple asoi paklang anengsi, hopot kicho poyok asitempo otelo.
La-apotsi Arnam asisik pupe, la-hini chipharleple asoi pensi, ili ngo kachiha ajiu kijok aphan karjak dunyok do dunsi, ili kijokpen hlongyok, nengrong rungsi bilo.
Ili kihlong kachiha ajiuli kungwek dunlek ajiu badi, khanang kachiha pen, lake Arnam ahem arlo kangthir athuli long pachi-arsi kihing klak ape do wendo.
Labang athem Jisu ango damsi, Molkijedek po abi-pun atengsi mo-moyok ason bor-bangthe chiplangsi, ili phan lut damo.
Labang ‘‘Molkijedek po, Salem alongri arecho, Akithechot Arnam abangthe kido, aro recho helyok paremsi chirulne kiwang aduwar Abraham poyok pochaksi, anangyok bor-eh batno;’’
aro Abraham po ‘‘kachihansi abihini bhak kep para ibhak’’ Molkijedek poyok pilo. (anang amen acho ke, ‘‘dhorom kangthir arecho,’’ aro la aphel ke Salem arecho, achoke ‘‘nengsam arecho’’ ta kido.
Anang Pa, lale asar-lar wesi, lale anang kicheng abo wedet, lale ajiu ki-or wedet, manta anangyok Arnam aso natsi sanselo,) anang awe-awe bangthe doleno.
Anang konbak kithe chiron langot, ingho yok ili sar-lar Abraham po kapangrum abihini bhak kep para ibhak pilo,

aro Lebi po agijing hel adak inghosi bangthe aphang cholo, anali kanong atengsi arleng hel parasi, lake Abraham po aneng long kido angden para kiwang abithang agijing helpara kiplang kortehel parasi bhak kep para ibhak ki-en yok kithan alam hlongo.
Manta labang arlengpo ingho asar-lar hel asitem along alekhot en-eh yong, Abraham po para bhak kep para ibhak eno, aro seme-kitang bor-eh kihlong.
Akibek arleng hel akithe arleng hel parasi bor-eh pahlong man apotsi, holek kipu nange ingjong.
Isi alamthe ke, inghosi bhak kep para ibhak kithi akorom arlo arleng arideng para hlongman, anali manta holek ke, ingho bhak kep para ibhak hlong, anang hrengsi do pusi hakhi porman hlongsi do.
Inghone bak ke bhak kep para ibhak kapahlong Lebi po, anang bithangta Abraham po parasi bhak kep para ibhak pilo, pusi chithan un.
Piyok pu tene Molkijedek po konam anang apa poyok papochakngo, la-amun Lebi po ke Abraham po, lake sar-lar hel kachiron angden neng arlosi kido.

Minon ke Lebi bangthe po parasi khanang kichok phrot nang tene, (piyok pu tene, lasi Israyel arleng hel kanong pahlongo), Harun po abi-pun ateng alekhot chokchesi, Molkijedek po abi-pun atengsi kamprek bangthe kiwang nange aro pot kanange do?
Piyok pu tene bangthe po kachihole apot, kanong ta kachihole nange dolo.
Piyok pu tene ingho alam si lamehel thando, anang kamprek ason arleng kido; bangpo ason arleng poke athuli-thuman asal tikike yong.
Piyok pu tene ili Hemphu Juda ason parasi wango, bangpo chithek-er do; aro Mosi po ason yok bangthe alam jatsi thanthe yong.
Molkijedek po natsi labadi prek ihut bangthe wang, pu tene hali lamthe aro aporman chiplang chot bo,
inghosi a-okpen kithan kanong atengke bangthepo chokchesi, kiprelpre ajiu ajakong atengsi ihut bangthepo chokngo.
Piyok pu tene anangyok hakhi pisi pudo, ‘‘Molkijedek po angton atengsi, nang arni kiwang bangthepo chodo.’’
Isi agak ke, atono kithan alamhel ki-un eh aro chakchepho anatsi labang hel ordo,
(piyok pu tene kanong isita kiwang phlen kalek); hini ke, labang aholan isi kimechot kachiha wang plang do, anang pensi ili Arnam adung yok chipadung nang.
Anang isita hopot chocheke chokche yongot.

Piyok pu tene anali ke Hemphu yok isidet hopot chosi bangthe chiplangsi wango, piyok pu tene ihutpo pudo, ‘‘Hemphu ke hopot cholo, aro anang angthin chipharleple, nang arni kiwang bangthe dolen man.’ ladi pusi inghosi anang yok pulo, anang parasi Jisu hopot chosi bangthe chiplango;’’
la anat Jisu si kithe chot angton chingnaksi bilo.
Anali ango ke ako-ong bangthe chiplangsi wango, piyok pu tene akithipo analiyok aphang long pado hlonghle yongot;
manta anangke binongyok bangthe dolo, piyok pu tene anang mo-mo yok doleno.
Labang anatsi, ingho anang pensi Arnam adung chipadung man, anang lahel aphan kardom yok arni hrengsi do apot, moyok anali pajoktang un.
Piyok pu tene kangthir, ado kangwe, neng chingduksi, papi abang para chitereksi kido, aro ethakpe yokta arklamchot, labadi bangthe akithepo iliphan kamichang dolo.

Anang arniten la bangthe akithe hel badike, ango abithang pap anat, la-aphel arleng hel apap anat buli karkli yok anang ke nangne lo; piyok pu tene anang abithang yok karkli tang anat, la-asal iphong detsi pachok detno.
Piyok pu tene kanong ke bor-bangthe helyok pachakman, anali ke jakongwe pho munusi, manta kanong aphel kiwang, hopot kicho alamthe ingho yok pachakngo, anangke momoyok chokplengne kido Aso lo.
Minon ke kithan tang alamthe hel acho alamthe lalo, inghosi ethakpe bor-bangthe arklam pensi Akithe anghol long ancho-ari aga iningo, ladi ili phan bor-bangthe dolo.
Arleng kapangning kalek, Hemphu kapangning khanang kuntulu ahem aro kangthir ahem murkiya chiplang do,
piyok pu tene abangten bor-bangthe banta aro buli karkli pachak do, la-apot anangta jibak pajir un, anang ladi penebak kapajir nange doman.
Minon ke anang pirthimipe athak kido nang tene, anang jat bangthe chochelo hoi, piyok pu tene kanong atengsi banta lamehel kapajir abangdo.

Anali kachirdom athem ethakpe athem aben aro aharchi detsi; piyok pu tene Mosi po konamsi kuntulu ahem arjapmo, anangyok Arnam para pulo, ‘Chilang wenot, inglong kartul athak pot badi arjan kapaklang tang badi, lamehel nali ahuwit kem.’
Manta minon, anang konbak akimechotsi murkiya aphangpo pahlongo, la-an akime chot, aban-angton long seme-kitang kithehel pen kapangning labang angton asitempo chiplango.
Piyok pu tene ango-angton long ado kangwe nang tene, hini-angton yok kachipek nangnelo hoi.
Piyok pu tene anang ado otsi analiyok pulo, lake, ‘Hemphu pudo, langot, jibak arni hane Israyel agijing aro Juda agijing pen akimi-angton pangninge, labadi adin wangsi do;

pot bak arnisi ne anali sar-lar helyok Ijip alongri para phloksi kiwan ayok anali ari otsi, anali pen kachingnak angton pachipmo, labang arni angton badike kalek; piyok pu tene Hemphu pudo, anali ne kachingnak angton pen dode yong ngo; la-amun neta anali yok aneng pipe yongo.’

Piyok pu tene Hemphu pudo, ‘La-arni aphel, Israyel agijing hel pen ne labang kachingnak angton pangninge: anali angthin along ne kanong piye, aro anali angthin long labang wiye; aro ne anali Arnam chiplange, anali ne arleng chiplange.’
Aro, nang ‘Hemphu yok chiniye,’ bangpo pusi anali abangten abithang arong arleng helyok, aro abangten abithang korte helyok pachirlile ye.
Piyok pu tene anali akibek para akithe ahuwit neyok chiniye. Piyok pu tene ne anali pap katiki hel jinsoye, anali pap hel aro neng chipurkike ye.’
Labang anang ‘akimi-angton’ pulo apot, ango poyok pabano. Aro jipe aban aro ingrak phleno, labang ke imekpen thek hlonghle ye.
Minon ke ango-angton ke kachirdom ajat-jat angton-angbang hel kachirdom athuli, pirthepe along kachirdom kangthir-athuli kido.
Piyok pu tene jipe kuntulu ahem mokol alongsi kikem, labang angot apulu longke hola kilur gosa, anghol, aro Arnam-kangton ahim kido; bangpo yok Kangthir-athem puman.
Aro kihing ape pak-ni arlo agak jipe kuntulu ahem apulu kido, labangpo Kangthir para Kangthir chot athem pusi puman.
Labang arlo ke hijung kar-uh athuli, aro ser kapang-om angton-anghol kido, labang anghol arlo manna kido ser-athuku, Harun po arong kiwang atokok, aro plang-ni angtonpo tam-phuli kido;
la anghol athak ke kajinso anghol long jortang pen hini cherubim kido. Lamehel alam kithan phrot nange minon apor ingjong.
Labadisi mehel ote tango apot, bangthe hel kachirdom asal kapatang ayok ango apulu long arnita katikiyok lut damman;
manta hini long ke, bangthe po detsi nengkan isi long iphong lut man; manta jipe awi anang abithang aphan, aro arleng hel chithan un-eh si katiki pap hel aphan, awi ensi Arnam yok arklak daman.
Bangpo pen Jiuli-Kangthir thando, kuntulu ahempo ango apulu ape hingklak si kido alengke, kuntulu ango apulu kido, kangthir para kangthirchot athem arloyok kilut dam owa ingpu pe.
Labang ke mini owepo kapangninge anat parhlansi bido, lalong kachirdom abangyok nenglong kachiron alam agiyan chok phlen un-eh phosi, ajat-jat banta kipajir aro buli karkli,
manta la ahuwit kicho, kijun apot, aro ajat-jat baptist hel pen, kachipangthir arniyok katiki nange a-ok angton-angbang detsi dolo.
Manta konam Khristo, akime abihini wansi, bor-bangthe kiwang nange bor-eh arni wangsi, (ari pen kithep kalek, lake kahurji parake kalek) la akithechot aro khanang karjap kuntulu polong wanglut no,
bik alo aro amem hel awi ke en-ehsi, manta anang bithang awi ensi, iphong detsi kangthir para kangthir-chot athem lut damsi, momoyok kidolen kijoktang pahlongo.
Piyok pu tene bik aro adomora awi ke, aro akangho arleng helyok nengsam kipi bik kiphi hetlo hel anali yok a-ok akangho hel aphan pangthir man tene,

inghosi or-eh len Ajiuli pensi, ado kangwe buli karkli badi abithangyok Arnam aphan champilo, Khristo pen kihreng jong Arnam yok kachirdom aphan nali kachiron akithi asal para konbak ongchot pangthir piye!

Labang anatsi, Khristo isi akimi-angton asitem po, apot ango-angton panghosi, adohel para kapajok aphan thilo, kataram tang helyok momo yok jiuli bor-eh kihlong aidot doye pusi seme-kitang angban pahlongman.
Piyok pu tene dak longsi angton alam kiwi do, lalong angton kiwi arlengpo kithi aporman paklang hlongman.
Piyok pu tene kithi aphelsi kachiwi angton chip pen man; apot kachiwi arlengpo hrengsi kido alengke, bangpo penebak chokphlen manma?
Lasi ango angton-angbang hel kapangthir yok ke awi weleng ke chokche yong ngo.
Piyok pu tene ango Mosi po kanong long ateng ahuwit than tangsi, lang, aki-er ul-amel, aro hisop abap pensi adomora aro bik awi ensi, kanong alo long, aro ahuwit arleng yok nengsam si arklaksi,
anang puman, ‘‘Arnam nali phan potsi kachingnak angton pilo, bangposi la kachingnak angton awi.”
Aro labang aparke kuntulu aro kachirdom asal ahuwit adorop, ladisi awi pensi pangsam yok arklak ngo.
Aro kanong ateng ke ahuwit yok awi pensi pangthir man; aro awi lile pu tene, pap kol tangte.
Ladisi ethakpe long kido alamhel aharchi, lamehel abi-pun pensi chipangthir nange doman; manta khanang jipe ethakpe abihini, labang yokta kimechot buli karkli pensi chipangthir nange do.
Piyok pu tene khanang arjan badisi, ari pen kikem kangthir athem long Khristo lutle yong ngot, manta minon jongke ili phan Arnam amahang semsemsi karjap dam hlongyok ethakpe long lut damo.
Manta bangthepo jibadi bang awi ensi, anengkanten kangthir athem lut damman, ladi anang aphongten ta abithangyok buli kapajiryok lut damo, ladi kalek;
ladi nang tene, pirthepe kaparjap para anang aphongten duk chojong hlongo hoi; manta minon anang abithang buli kachipi parasi pap para kijok aphan, owe hel ki-or amun iphong detsi chiklango.
Aro pot badi iphong detsi kithiyok, aro la aphel ke bisar arleng aphan pachip wensi do,
ladisi Khristo ta ako-ong arleng pap abhar hel kikol aphan, iphong buli arklilo, phong-ni aporke, pap wedungsi, anangyok inghongne kido helyok, anang kapajok aphan chiklange.

Kanong ke kiwangme kido akime abihini aben badi, aro labang khanang po amahang imunso kangwe apot, lamatmat buli karkli asal anengkan jon-jan bangthehel arnita arklisi doman, la-ahuwit padungsi kidam abangyok jat kangthir pachok phlen pi-un eh.
Ki-un nang tene, buli karkli jutjelo hoi ma? Piyok pu tene kachirdom abang iphong detsi pangthir un nang tene, anali jatsi pap angthin aro dodelo hoi.
Manta lamehel parasi anengkan ten pap helsi chipurkisi dohlong do.
Piyok pu tene chal pen bik awi ke pap hel pangthir un-eh pen.
Labang aron anat, Khristo pirthepe long wang kilut amun, anang kipu: ‘Nang buli karkli pen nibot kipi ar-ih eh lo, manta nephan abangpo honjok pilo;
kiphi kangton aro pap aphan athuli athak okpe-okthe buli karkli nangneng ingsamse yong ngo;
laparake ne pulo, ‘Langot, ne wango, (kanong alo long ne lam ladisi wido,) O Arnam, ne nang kar-ih hel katiki ayok wango.’

Anang aphuthak ango ke pudo, ‘Buli karkli, nibot kipi, kiphi, aro pap kikol buli-karkli nang neng ar-ih-eh yongot, aro lamehel along neng pangsamse yongot, (mehel kanong ateng ington hlongman,) aphel ke pulo,
‘Langot, ne nang kar-ih hel katiki yoksi wango.’ La-aphelpo kapachip ayok, anang kicheng poyok terek det do.
Labang Arnam kar-ih atengsi ili Jisu Khristo abangpo nibot badisi iphong kichampi pensi pangthir phleno.
Abangten bangthe hel arjapsi arniten kachirdom asal hel tikisi, labadi buli karkli jat pap pangthir un-eh, la-isi buli karkli tiki thot-thotsi doman;
manta Khristo ke, iphong pap aphan buli arklisi, arniten aphan Arnam ancho-ari agak iningo,
la-amun para anang hutur helyok anang kengpak arlo bibeleng yok inghong si do.
Piyok pu tene anang kapangthir abangyok iphong nibot kipi parasi arni kiwang aphan pachok detno.
Aro la-aphuthak Jiuli-Kangthir ta anangyok hakhi pido; piyok pu tene anang pudo,
‘Hemphu pudo, la-arni aphel, anali pen ne labangpo lam-chingnaknge, ne anali angthin hel long ne kanong hel piye, aro anali thin along labang hel wiye;
aro la- aphel anang pudo, ‘Aro ne anali pap hel aro kangho asal hel chipurkike ye.’
Daklongsi lamehel ron tango, lalong pap aphan nibot kipi ingjongo.
Lasi, ei ne khoi hel, Jisu awi pensi kangthir athem kilutdun ayok ili aneng aha dolo,
lake anang a-ok long potsi akimi ajiuli aro kihreng aduwar iliphan paklango,
aro Arnam ahem aphuthak kapachak ili ihut akithe bangthe kido anat,
aro kangho kachiron para ili ingthin nengsam kipi un apot, wangot, ili khanang angthin pensi kikrol anengpen Arnam adung yok chipadungne dam nang,
ili abangpo kangthir alangpen chululo apot, ili hoi kicho kachiha po yok thirkukne donang, piyok pu tene inghosi seme-tango, anangke kikrol po.
Aro nengdok aro kime asal katiki neng arong kachipado ayok ili ihut para ihutyok neng pipon nang,
aro angkhan ke kachingrum abi-pun badisi ili kachingrum seleplesi, adin konbak adung het hlong, lateng ihut para ihutyok nengrung pon nang.
Piyok pu tene khanang alam agiyan kihlong aphel ili thek-ersi pap kengkam chijor, tene pap aphan buli karkli aro akijol chiplango,
manta bisar arniyok detsi isi phere-memesi inghong do, aro kapangho abangyok kapaprel ayok kahonjok me-akang inghongsi do.
Inghone bak ihut arleng Mosi po kanong mengmeye, anangyok bang-hini bang-kithom, lale ako-ong hakhi hel aporman ensi, kajinso wesi thido.

Laparake, inghosi Arnam Aso akimi-angton parasi anang chipangthir phrotno, anangyok mahang patharaksi bangpo chipasim man, aro kajinso ajiuli yok padoho man, nali kachiron badike, anang layokta konbak akangho aduk hlongyok alekhot dodeye ma?
Piyok pu tene, anang kipu, ‘Nesi ajar hule, nesi angban nangpiye,’ aro iphongke anang kipu, ‘Hemphu anang bithang arleng helyok bisar-ote ye;’ mehel alamthe inghosi thano, anangyok ili chinido.
Kihreng jong Arnam arideng kijang dam hlong konbak phere-meme alam do.
Manta nali katha-ang kihlong aphel, konam adin ajat-jat aduk-tap kicho matmat kachirbu amun kachihi,
dakne bak ke rat ango honjat pisi kapatharak aro aduk hap adeng kachiplang, isi aporke, kiduk arleng helyok chingchong si kirap dun, labang ango alam nengchipurki lang.
Piyok pu tene nali akrol kithal abang pen nengduk kidodun, aro nali bihini hel kanghon phrot yongta, nali phan isi akime apuru do pusi nengrongsi kachihi.
La-apot si nali bithang neng aha pen jat chineng tangek; labang si naliyok kime banta nali hlonge.
Piyok pu tene nali Arnam ahisa mainotsi kapang-ak ateng angban hlong penyok, nali kachihi pen nange dolang.
Piyok pu tene, lo-kangthir kipu badi, ‘Bekso aphel kiwang nangepo wange, pabhembhe ye;
manta neyok kikrol parasi dhorom kangthir abang hreng nge; manta chipaphel-phak, tene ne Jiuli labang yok aneng ingsamse ye.’
Manta inghosi kiprelyok paphel phak aro chingbo man, manta ingho abang krol thipsi doman, anali jokpene.
Minon ke kikrol poke, kachiha abihinimar aphan khanang kijok agiyan, kithekthe abihinimar kikrol aporman.
Piyok pu tene labang parasi ango akisar hel bor-eh pahlongo.
Kikrol parasi ili bharasot Arnam alamthe pensi parjapmo, lasi kithek hlong abihini hel kachinine abihini hel para wang chiklango pusi abhu hlongdo.

Kikrol anatsi, Abel po Arnam aronsi Koin po yokta kimechot buli pajiro, aro labang parasi, anangke dhorom kangthir, labang hakhi pahlongo, lake Arnam anang banta kipi anat hakhi kipi; aro labang pensi anang kithi yong ta, minihok ta lamthe thanjongsi do.
Kikrol anatsi Inuk po yok kithi pathek hlonghle yongo; aro ‘‘anang pahlong dunde yongot, piyok pu tene Arnam anang yok pondet no.’’ Piyok pu tene ‘‘anang Arnam yok neng pangsamo.’’
Aro Arnam ke arni dolen, piyok pu tene krolkre leng ke anang yok neng pangsam un-eh, lasi anang dung chipadungsi kachohang arleng ke krolpen nangeje.

Kikrol anatsi, Nowa po, mophel owe kachiplange alam kithan alam hlongsi kaphere anat, abithang ahemdung kachipajok ayok isi jahaj chikemo, aro bangpo pensi pirthepe yok ado pisi, abithang ke kikrol dhorom-kangthir aidot kido chiplango.
Kikrol anatsi, Abraham po kimeng, kataram aidot hlong dunsi, aro daksi dam nange mene, bangpo chithan un-eh detsi olesi dam mo.
Kikrol anatsi, Isak po aro Jakup po anang bang alongri yongta seme-kitang aidot hlongo, bang alongri yongta abithang binong alongri chiplangsi, purli ahemlong kido.
Piyok pu tene potsi arongpe kaparjap aro kaparjap ke Arnam, bhiti alungle kapangning arongpe yok anang inghong si kido.

Kikrol anatsi Abraham po abo sarlap amunta so kipaplang apharan kihlong— aro Sarape ta baji kido yong ta agat dosi agijing kapawang apharan hlongo— piyok pu tene seme-kitang Arnam yok anang kikrol loi-loi Arnam pusi kimeng.
Lasi ihut arleng, lake akithi si akime kidopo parasi, ‘‘suneng long chiklolangso ateng alekhot, aro langpe akung kido alekha un-eh pho sangtel badi ako-ong arleng paplango.’’

Anali ahuwit seme-kitang angban hlonghle phosi kikrol alongsi thilo, manta kaholo para lamehel theksi kardom kipi. Anali abithang ke pirthimipe athak bang alongri long aro kachinine arleng pusi hoi cholo,
piyok pu tene ingho ladi alam than, anali ke abithang alongri bisaro, pusi pachiklan no.
Anali daklong para olesi kiwang, bangpo kachiron lang pu tene, anali chirulsi kidam yokta kime apor hlongo hoi.
Manta minon anali layok ta kimepen, lake ethakpe badi alongri yok ar-ih man. Lasi Arnam ke, anali Arnam pusi kipu yok tharakre; piyok pu tene anali phan anang isi rongpe honjoksi pilo.
Kikrol anat Abraham po karchal apor chokngo, Isak poyok buli pilo. Inghosi seme-kitang hel kachideng, anang abithang ihutdet aso poyok buli karkliyok ki-en pon;
anang yok ladi kipu, ‘‘Aijak po parasi nang agijing helyok amen chitha-ange.’’
Piyok pu tene Arnam ke kithi hel asitem parata pangthur un, pusi anang khanangsi kachiron— aro labang parhlansi kithan aphel, anangyok pahlong phakngo.
Kikrol anatsi, Aijak po, kiwange adin aphan Jakup aro Esau po yok moyok abor-eh hlongo.
Kikrol parasi Jakup po, kithibo amun Jusep po aso bang-hini asitem abangten yok bor-eh kipi, aro ‘‘abithang atokok aphuthak chidalsi, Arnam yok chirdomo.’’
Kikrol anatsi Jusep po, anang kithibo amun, Ijip alongri para Israyel po asohel olesi kachirkan alam thansi, abithang yok kipep alam ta adinhel pilo.
Mosi po kiplang amun, kikrol anatsi ape-apo parasi chiklo jon-thom ayok anang yok butisi kibi, piyok pu tene anali oso soyok langme-at thekngo; aro anali rechopo ratyok kithan alam pherere yongo.
Kikrol anatsi Mosi po, anang the-dingsi, kikrol anat Pharau po asope anangyok asopo kachipu ayok hoi choche yong ngo,
anang kilang set-set chirchi si, Arnam arleng helpen duk-tap kichodun pachipmo.
Anang Ijip alongri ahuwit abihini yok ke Khristo yok kapatharak along jortang kapado kime chot pusi chirono, piyok pu tene anang banta-kapahlong yok aneng kido.
Kikrol anatsi Mosi po recho po akang yok phereresi, Ijip alongri tikango, piyok pu tene kachinine yongta anang kithek natsi me-at chineng-ot no.
Kikrol anatsi anang so-tahang kamaripo wangpa-ot hlonghle aphan Kijoktng-kamai aro awi karklak asal tikilo.
Kikrol anatsi arleng hel, akreng alungle kachirpat badi, Ki-er Alangpe asitem arpat no, manta Ijip arleng hel karpatyok kiron amunsi langpe pardip detno.
Kikrol anatsi, Israyel abang ni-thorok isi along chikomwelsi arting tang aphel Jeriko arlong ahem pakrep phrot no.
Kikrol anatsi Rahap kidoner pe lam-kihum abangyok adon badi kachingden apotsi, kimengme helpen anang thithe yongo.
Aro layok pa-ongchotsi pot punang? Piyok pu tene Gidiyon po, Barak po, Samson po, Jephtha pe, Dabhit po, Samuyel po aro turki hel, ahuwit aphan paniryok dam pu tene apor dorde—
anali kikrol anatsi prek alongri hel yok paremo, dhorom abi-apun pangning ngo, seme-kitang angban hel hlongo, tike-mungchal anghoyok pachinghap mo,
phere me-me ame bilo, nokjir pen kamari para jokngo, jakongweh alongta ajakong hlongo, dhawa along ajakong dolo, bang alongri sonturi helyok kachilare paremo.
Arloso hel abithang hem arleng kithihel burphaksi pahlongo. Angkhan ke kiburphak chingchong dun ayok, kijok hlonghlesi, aduk chosi thilo.
Angkhan ke chongnek-hulo aro sabuk pen sapmo, layong ta, hirkuli bamo aro akrol long kibeng honjat tong ngo.

Analiyok arlong warsi marilo, korot pen beng-ni ingholo, anali ajat-jat honjat chitongo, analiyok nokjir pen marilo; anali bherabik aro bik areng hel pachi-ik si partingo, aro hem-ret pangweh pholo, duk-tap cholo, aro paduk hapmo—
labang pirthepe anali phan ke kamichangche. Anali pirthepe nisot-jot sangtelpe athem, inglong kartul, aghurung aro longdang hel along karting-wor.
Aro lamehel ahuwit yongta, anali kikrol kamichang hlong yong ta, seme-kitang angban abor-eh hlonghle yongo,
piyok pu tene Arnam ili phan penebak kithechot aron kahonjok amun ili wedet ke analiyok pachok un-eh yongo.

Lasi, la-an inghun aplang badi hakhi ili komwolsi kidojap thek hlongsi, wangot, ilita ahuwit neng kardipkul aro ili yok komwolsi kido pap hel chikol detne, ili ngo kipi aduwar long chipaning dingsi katdun nang,
ili kikrol kipicheng aro sal kapachok Jisu ayok lang dun nang, anang anang ngo kido anengrong aphan kangnek-kapatharak hel langlesi, kros aduk chihi dunsi, Arnam anghol ancho-ari aga iningo.
Nali ajiu long kilak ta kilak hlonghle si, ingho abithang ado katiki papi hel ladi pasumseng abangyok kachihi, anangyok chiron lang.
Nali pap helpen chirbu si, minon hok ta wi-li nangset halpen un-eh lang.
Aro nali Arnam aneng kirung alamthe pen, aso pusi naliyok lam kachithan tengelo ma? Lake, ‘O ne so hel, Hemphu long kachingdom pajut nek, aro anang nali kangje amun neng chipa-il lek;
piyok pu tene Hemphu inghoyok nengdok, anangyok aso badi ensi duk ta piman, aro anang kachideng abangten yok pamman.’
Kipame pon anat aduk hongjat hel chichak. Arnam naliyok aso hel badi langpon do; piyok pu tene ladi ape-apo aso yok aduk kipipe ingho do?
Aso majit kapangdom hlongyok chingchong dunman, nalike lalong chingchong dundiyong, pu tene nali, mahang katharak aso si, neso ke kalek.
Labang aparke ili munusi mang-mang ape-apo hel ili kapangdom, aro ili analiyok aman kipi. Ili layok ajiuli hel Apa anangyok mengsi do nangne ma?
Piyok pu tene anali ke, pot badi akime kihlong, ladi bekso adin aphan aduk ili kipi, manta Arnam ke, ili akime aphan, kangthir long kachingchong dun, aphan aduk ili pido.

Minon ke ahuwit aduk kiwang amun, anengrong alam kalek, manta aneng aduk nanatsi chiron hlongman, layongta aphel yok ke, bangpo parasi kachirchi len arleng helyok, dhorom kangthir long nengsam angban wanpiman.
Lasi nalike, kiharjak arihel rungot, aro nali pahok-hak keng asek chipakeng ngot.
Aro la-apot akeng kengkok hel kidam ingho-heyok ke chipame phlen, lasi abithang kidam chipakeng un-ne.
Ahuwit penta nengsam, aro kangthir kido-kithak welengke, Hemphu yok ihut ta thek hlonghle ye, labadi kangthir jiubong arjak dunot.
Chilang, inghone bak ke Arnam kajinso hlonghle detsi, lale inghone bak ke akihodak angkur pangkursi nali sitem pap patiki si, ladi ongchot arleng kikrol chipasim ong-onge.
Esau po badi isan kicho anatsi anang abithang so-tahang aso abor-eh parata chijor detno, anang badi kaita dhorom kapatharak, lale inghone bak ke kidoner arleng chiplange, bangpo mesone langot.

Piyok pu tene nali chithan undo ke, Esau po aphel yok ke, labang bor-eh kapahlong yok ar-isi, mek-kri pajang nangset chibisar yongta, chidengde yongot, piyok pu tene anang neng kachipharlep awak hlonghle yong ngot.
Nali ki-ot un, aro me-ade kikar inglong kartul, inghun aki-ik, kangting, tomon, arwe kithe, lamthe kithan asi, aro pongka kibut lamehel chipadung ke nali wangwe yong,
aro pongka kibut asi, aro lamthe asi karju abang analiyok jatsi lamthe than nangnelo pusi pingkit no.
Piyok pu tene analiyok kithan alam hel chirchi un-eh si pulo, ‘‘Okpe yok ta labang inglong kartulpe long klim dam, tene arlong warsi mariye.’’
Khanang si labang kachiklang la-an kaphere me-me apot si, Mosi po kipu, ‘Ne kaphere si abang klemsi dohlongdo.’
Manta Jayon anglong kartulpe along nali wango, aro kihreng-jong Arnam arongpe, lake ethakpe Jerusalem long, aro aphoro ahajar Arnam tharlonhel nengrongsi chingrumdo,
aro ethakpe long amen alekhot kido sotahang hel melpe aro kachikruk, ahuwit ajatyok kabisar Arnam, krol arjap thipsi dhorom kangthir ajiuli hel,
akimi-angton asitem poke Jisu, aro Abel po ayok ta mechot alamthe kithan nengsam karkli awi, labang ahuwit adung yok nali wango.

Chilangwen, lamthe kapaharpo ayok nali seyek, piyok pu tene inghosi pirthimipe long lamthe kithan, labang poyok kise abang jokje yongo, tene inghosi ethakpe para than no, anangyok ke panung kul, tene ili jokjeye, tene angkhan arlengsi chipajoknge!
La-amun anang alamthe pensi pirthimipe kahujuk; manta minon anang pang-akngo, ‘Yongta iphong ne pirthimipe yok paklemme, ladi kalek, suneng ayok ta hujuknge.’
Bangso long, ‘aro iphong,’ la ithe, kithir abihini hel kiri aphan, kahurji abihini badisi kahujuk abihini hel katerek alam pudo.
Lasi, ili kithir alongri kihlonge apot, wangot, kajinso pensi ili kamainot aro kaphere neng kangsam Arnam kachirdom unyok, labang kajinso mengdun nang.
Piyok pu tene ili Arnam ke kapasek un me badi.
Korte helyok nengdok pado long nang.
Nali kachinine adon helyok kachingden ayok kaselet doyek, piyok pu tene bangpo parasi angkhanke chithan un-eh phosi Arnam atharlon hel yoksi don-chingden pen hlongman.
Lahel akrol kido alokjor pusi chirono; analiyok honjat pilo, abithang abangyok duk-tap pihlongo pusi chironno;
ahuwit asitem jorme-pachihap aman pado nang, aro anali penso-arlo adak ki-ih ahongpo ingthir phlenne pado nang; piyok pu tene kidoner, aro bang apiso kiphat abangyok Arnam si bisar-honthe ye.
Nali ajiu long nohok anengdok para chiterek; nali rideng potsi do, lateng neng chingsamne donot; piyok pu tene Arnam pudo, ‘‘Ne nangyok jatsi tikangke ye, jatsi seseye.’’
La-apot ili aha pensi than unbo ke, ‘‘Hemphu nerap man; ne pherere ye; arlengke neyok pot te inghole?’’
Nali kithe-kiding abang naliyok Arnam alamthe thansi damo, analiyok neng chipurki; aro anali jibadi keng-kam chijoro ki-oryok kikrol chiron not, anali kikrol chirli dun not.
Jisu Khristo ke atimi, mini aro moyok ta lamat-matsi do.

Nali ajatjat kachimangkai kachirli parake kangho aduwar keng-kam chijorek; piyok pu tene potsi kicho-kijun abi-pun kamainot arleng hel meme yongo; labang kicho apot parake kalek, kajinso parasi kikrol kachipangthir akime.
La-athuli long kachirdom abangke kicho yok kadhorom abang kalek, labadi ili isi athuli do.
Piyok pu tene labang ajiu hel awi pap aphan nibot pisi bor-bangthe parasi kangthirchot athem long ayok ponman, lamehel a-ok abangpo kuntulu ahem parake mokol longsi pasekman.
Lasi Jisu ta, anang abithang awi pensi arleng helyok kapangthir ayok, rongpepe owa para mokol alongsi kithi honjok weno.
Lasi, wangot, anangyok kapatharak aphangpo ki-en chilok dunsi, kuntulu ahem para mokol anang dung ayok dam nang.
Piyok pu tene holek ili phan kido binong rongpe isita ingjong; manta ili la kiwange rongpe ayoksi ili ar-ih do.
La-apot, wangot, ili anangpen arnita Arnam aphan lun-parklam si kardom pajirnang, lake anang menyok hoi chone athe kiwang ade-tur chipek pon nang.
Manta akime katikiyok aro nang thin kido alam kapahar ayok chitenge yek, piyok pu tene labang kaparklam apor kachipi longsi Arnam neng ingsam man.

Nali kithe kiding helyok mengsi anali arlo chingdom dunnok, piyok pu tene alekha kipi nange arleng badi analike nali jiu hel aphan kihon asal tikido. La-apot anali labang nengrong tikinot aro nengdoho ke tikiyek—piyok pu tene ladike anali phan jatsi akime chokche ye.
Hali phan pingkit nok; piyok pu tene hali kachiron apor, aro ahuwit alam me-at kengkam kachijor hali aneng do, bangpo hali krolsi do.
Ne nengsamsi nali pudo, neyok aro nali sitem arjap dam hlonge, la anat kapingkit yok ne naliyok chingduk do.
Minon ke or-eh len angton awi parasi, ingho ili Hemphu Jisu yok kithi asitem para pabursi wano, labangke bherabik khokhre kithe yok, anang kar-ih pachok yok Arnam nengsam nali angthin pachok nang;
anang mahang potsi nengsam, labang ili Jisu Khristo parasi me-at pachok nang, anang jortang mo-moyok pado nang. Amen.
Ei korte aro ingjirhel, ne naliyok chingduk do, nali labang aneng kirung alamthe chihi not; piyok pu tene ne naliyok pathik-otsi wilo.
Ili korte Timothi poyok akrol para phlok ngo, bangpo thek-rene donot; anang wang dap tene, anang pen ne naliyok chithek hlonge.
Nali ahuwit nali kithe-kiding hel aro ahuwit kangthir arleng helyok kardom pajir. Itali alongri arleng hel naliyok kardom nali pajir dundo.
Nali ahuwit pen kajinso pado nang. Amen.
Arnam aro Hemphu Jisu Khristo murkiya ihut Jems po para asem asemsi kachingchong kere-hini ajat abangyok: kardomo.
Ei ne korte aro ingjirhel, konam nali ajatjat honjat wang, labang ke nengrong alam pune chinengtang,
piyok pu tene la-apor ahuwit nali kikrol parasi honjat kachihi wanman, bangpo chithan uno;
aro la-apotsi nang kachihi dolen man, chinengtang un-eh pho wesi, kajinso aro katiki pachok nang.
Nali dak inghone bak agiyan wedungdo tene, ingho ahuwit arlengyok nengwak phlensi, aro ado kolkesi piman, la Arnam yok pacho hang nang, aro labang nang yok nangpi ye.
Manta angthin ihik-bihik dodene, anang krolne anangyok chihangot; piyok pu tene inghosi angthin ihik-bihik do, anangke tomon long kipon aro langpe adul long kipon badi chiplang man.
Ladi arleng ke Hemphu para penebak hlonge, pu ke anang chiron nek;
anang hini angthin arleng, abithang ahuwit angthin thirthe pho kido arleng.
Manta kicho-kangwe kortepo yok Arnam kapangthur apot aborai pado nang,
aro apuru kidopo, anangyok kichipabek amun along nengrong pado nang, piyok pu tene bap amirhel badi anangke orsi damme.

Piyok pu tene arnipe wangso ongsi aro bithar bap arong pakudu man; la-apor angphar ingjulman, aro anang thok ta pangwe detman. Labadisi apuru kido arlengpo sal ong-ongsi anang wepho chiplang dam detne.
Inghosi honjat kiwang amun chihisi krolsi do anang bor-eh chok, piyok pu tene Hemphu nengdok abangyok jiuli-aphurkup kipi pang-ak ngo, bangpo anang hlong penne.
Konam honjat wange, “Ne Arnam parasi honjat wangdo” puke kaita pu nangne; piyok pu tene Arnam yok samon honjat pi un-eh aro anang kai yokta honjat pipe.
Manta abangten arleng konam abithang ar-ih letsi ot dunne aro chobelsi kipon yok kar-ih honjat hlongman;
laparake, konam kangho kachiron aneng-apok long wangsi, pap paplang man, aro la pap asal tikiman, konam pap the-dingsi, kithiyok ponman.
Ei ne nengdok hel, nali bithangyok chichobel lek.
Ahuwit neng wak phlensi kipi bantahel, ahuwit kikrol kangthir abor-eh, kachipharlep aharchi ingjong, ethakpe kahurji, la Apa parasi wangman.
Anang kithep-kichor abihini hel asitem ili isi ango athe chiplang ngo, lasi anang si khanang alamthe pensi ili yok paplango.
Ei nengdok hel, nali labang abhu kihlong nange do, abangten ka-one parjang, kithanyok chipakom, akang ta chipangsam;
piyok pu tene arleng aneng akang penke jiulong Arnam dhorom kangthir chokche.
Lasi nali ahuwit akisim hel aro kachilang set-set hel chitikang, nang ajiu kapajok un nenglong kachinom hop alamthe chidengot.
Manta lamthe ka-one det dosi, nangyok chichobelek, manta lamthe kimeng abang chiplang.
Piyok pu tene inghone bak katiki ke wesi, ka-one detne do, tene anang aina long abithang amahang kachilang arlengpo badi;
piyok pu tene anang abithang chilangsi aro dam hrol man, la-amunsi anang pot badi bangpo tenge detman.
Manta inghosi kanongyok langdun, kijok akanong, aro meso katiki chiron, ingho tengengesi manta me-atsi tikipon man—anali katiki along bor-eh choknge.
Inghone bak anang bithang yok dhorom kangthir pusi chiron, aro abithang ade so chipangdomde det, abithang angthinyok chobelman, tene labang arlengpo dhoromsi karjak akijol.
So jangre aro hime hel aduk-tap apor kilang dun, aro pirthepe para abithang yok ado wesi kido nange: Apa Arnam ango neng kangthir aro chipasimse si kido si kadhorom.
Ei korte aro ingjirhel, nali ibak det kikrol abang ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo aphan jortang pado un ma?
Piyok pu tene nali Arnam ahemyok ser arnan aro kiphlan-et ape-rik pen ihut arleng wang pu tene, aro simkol ape-rik pen kicho kangwe arleng ihut wang tene,

aro nali la kiphlan-et pe-rik chi-ikne kiwang apot amahang langsi puman, “Nang holek kime anghol long wang iningot,” aro la kicho kangwe arlengyok ke puman, “Halek arjapne donot,” lale “Nekeng adung iningot,”
nali bithang adaksi prek-prek dode yong ma aro kangho angthin pen kabisar pon abang kalek yong ma?

Oneh nok, nengdok korte aro ingjirhel, pirthepe athak kicho kangwe abang, Arnam analiyok kikrol along hem-kimechot ateng, aro abithang yok nengkidok abang ango Arnam kapang-ak longri kapahlong yok arwalwe yong ma?
Manta nali la kicho-kangwe abangyok aman pithekthe yong ngo. Hem-kime abang naliyok aduk pipe yong ma? Anali naliyok bisar ango long hungpon ke ajatjat otete yong ma?
Aro akime kataram amenyok nali nenglong chihangsi, la amen kapatharak ta anali kalek ma?
“Nang dung arlengyok abithang badi nengdok,” pusi lo-kangthir bi-pun ateng arjapsi, kime tiki do.
Manta bithang aphan ibak detne chiron do, tene pap tikilo, aro kanong kapangho pusi kanong atengke ado tikilo.
Piyok pu tene inghone bak ahuwit kanong meng det, manta isi along meme, tene anang ahuwit ingho detno.
Piyok pu tene anang kipu, “Nang kangho doner rek,” ladi ta kipu, “Nang arleng mari yek,” pusi labang ihut posi pulo. Lasi nang kangho donerne manta arleng mari, tene nang kanong pangho lo.
Lasi inghosi than aro kapajok kanong parasi chok, nali abithang yok ladi arleng chithan unsi, labang asalta tikiman.
Piyok pu tene ingho jinsose, bisar arnita anang phan ke jinsose; kajinsosi bisar along kihal ajortang do.
Ei ni-korte aro ingjirhel, nang ihut pudo ne kikrol do manta anang tikike, tene pot akime dolo? Labang kikrol nangyok pajok une ma?
Inghone bak korte lale ingjir ihut pe-rik wepho, aro arni kicho a-an hlong lene do pu tene,
nali sitem inghone bak analiyok thando, “Nali nengrong chipadosi chipang krangne nengsam damot; manta anali abangpo kanange abihini pidunde, tene pot hlonge?
Ladisi kikrolpo ta; anang abithangke sal tikike pu tene akithi.
Manta inghone bak puye, “Nang kikrol do, aro ne ke sal tikido.” Tene sal tikike detne nang kikrol neyok paklangot, aro ne sal katiki parasi nangyok kikrol nang paklange.
Arnam ihut det pusi nang krol do; akime tikido. Si-ik helta ladisi krolman, aro pheresi hang-taramsi do man.
Manta, ei kamango arleng, sal tikike det ke kikrol akijol, bangpo nang kithan unyok aneng do ma?
Ili sarlar apo Abraham po, kachirdom athuli athak abithang asopo Aijak po yok buli kipi amun, labang asal katiki parasi dhorom kangthir pusi alekhot en-eh yong ma?
Nang thekngo, kikrol ke anang sal katiki pensi kido aro sal katiki parasi kikrol chok plengo.
Ladisi lo-kangthir long kipu alam chokngo, “Abraham po Arnam yok kikrol apot, la kikrol anang yok dhorom kangthir alekhot ot noh, aro anangyok khoipo pusi alekhot hlongo.”
Nali thekdo, sal katiki parasi arleng dhorom kangthir pusi alekhot endo, kikrol det parata kalek.
Labadisi Rahap pe kangho kidoner peta tutuki helyok don chingdensi, la aphel prek aduwarsi tol lo apot, anang labadi asal katiki parasi dhorom kangthir pu ke alekhot en-eh yong ngo ma?
Piyok pu tene pot badi ajiu kangwe abangpo akithi, ladisi katiki wedet tene kikrol pota akithi.
Ei korte aro ingjirhel, nali sitem ako-ong kapachirli abang chiplang un-eh, piyok pu tene nali chithan undo, ingho pachirlipon man lahelyok kithechot bisar-ote ye.
Piyok pu tene ili ahuwit prek-prek apor kichokche doman. Ihut ta kithan along kichok phlen dode, anangsi kikrol arleng, abangpo yokta pangdomsi bipon un.
Nosel hel ili kipangdom aphan ili lahel angho long arik homdung, tene anali abangpo parting un.
Lale langot, jahaj hel akithe, aro tomon akithe parasi jap pon yongta, lahelyok akibek kaparting asuri pensi kibepon aneng long parting ponman.
Ladisi ade so ta isi aso arorem, manta aborai-kithe alam than man. Langot, konbak aso amesi konbak akithe ingnam pasek un!
Aro ade so me nak ngo; ili abang arorem adak ade akangho pirthepe naksi; labangsi abang dungsi pangho phrot man, aro kiplang oweyok chikarleng ponman, aro abithang ta jom along me-aten long karman.
Piyok pu tene okpe-okthe, wote-woso, miso-musik, aro langpe okpe-okthe lamehel ahuwit kido asoi arleng kido asot parasi pangdom ponman, aro pangdom tango,
manta adeso kapangdom ayok arleng hel asitem kaita apharan ingjong— labang kisangse sotonga pen kamari un abi detsi do.
Labang pensi ili Apa Hemphu kardom pajirman; aro labang pensi Arnam athok-gor badi arleng helyok hao piman.
Labang angho po parasi kardom piman aro hao ta piman. Ei ne korte aro ingjir hel, ladike kime kalek.
Isidet ang-gog pensi lang ingbop si kijunme kidok aro akiho la-hini alang wangman ma?
Ei ne korte aro ingjirhel, dumuru arongpe long jolphai, lale rihanthu arong long dumuru athe wangman ma? Ingti alangta kijunme alang pawang un-eh.
Nali sitem long agiyan kido aro budi-ater arleng ingho do? Anang akime kido-kithak parasi agiyan ateng chinom hopsi sal katiki paklang ngot.
Manta nali ingthin along akiho dak, amek kiso, aro ado kipihel do, tene khanang ado pike aborai doyek, aro asisik alam than nek.
Labadi agiyan ethakpe para wangwe, manta labang ke pirthimipe kachirjap, ajiu kreng hap, aro neng-sik kidohel para wangman.
Piyok pu tene daklongsi amek kachiso do aro ado kachipi do, lalong si ahul aro ahuwit kangho asal katiki dolen.
Manta ethakpe para kiwang agiyan, ango ke ingthir phlen, aphel ke nengsam kido, kachipabek, jiuli kiwang, kajinso loi-loi aro akime athe, ibakdet chilangle lale neng-sik wedung.
Aro ingho nengsam kipawang abang parasi nengsam alam paharsi dhorom kangthir athe rot rimsi wanman.
Nalidak kachitheng aro neng-kachikengke pomar daklong para wang man? Nali abang aro-rem along kachilare abithang kidome kar-ih long para kalek ma?

Nali ar-ih man, manta nali pahlong un-eh; lasi nali arleng mariman. Aro amek alop, aro layong ta nali neng ingdom de; lasi nali lam chikengke aro chitheng man. Nali pahlonghle, piyok pu tene nali chihanghe.
Nali chihang, aro yongta nali hlonghle, piyok pu tene nali kangho anengpen chihang do, nali kachihang abithang kidome kar-ih ateng aphan si pingkit man.

Ei kangho kidoner abang, nali pirthepe pen alokjor kido ke Arnam pen hutur pu ke nali than un-eh yong ma? La-apot inghosi pirthepe pen alokjor kido ar-ih, anang abithang yok Arnam hutur chingholsi enman.
Lale nali lo-kangthir alam akijol pusi “Arnam anang ili long ajiuli kido, apot chilang set-set yok chiron do ma?”
Manta anang kajinso wangpi ongle; lasi lo-kangthir long thando, “Arnam ke aborai helyok tengdun man, manta kachipabek abangyok ke kajinso piman.”
Lasi nali Arnamyok chingdom dun hop. Si-ik yok ujhar aro anang nali para katne.
Arnam akung chikungune wangot, aro anang nalikung padungsi wange. Ei papi arleng, nali-ri hel chipangthir, nali pap katiki arleng hel, aro angthin hini abang, anali ingthin hel chipangthir.
Aneng aduk chipado, suru aro amek-kri chipajang. Nali kangnek hel nengduk yok pachiplang nang, aro nali nengrong hel neng pahodak nang.
Hemphu ango nali bithangyok chipabek ngot aro la-amun anang naliyok parklamme.

Ei korte aro ingjirhel, nali ihut para ihutyok ado kachipi prop alamthe chipuyek. Inghosi korteyok ado pisi lam ingje, aro korte poyok bisar ote, anang kanong poyok bisar ote man; manta nang kanong alamthe bisar ote pu tene kanong kimeng kalek, bisar kipipo chiplango.
Kanong kipipo aro bisar kipipo ihut detsi; anang kapajok yok aro kapangho yok ajakong do; manta adung abangyok bisar kipi, nangke inghopo te?
Minon wang ngot, nali puman, “Mini lale minap ili ladi rongpe yok damnang, lalong nengkan isi done hathi-chari chijor-chihrepne nohok pahlong nang.”

Yongta minap pot chitonge, labang nali chithan un-eh. Nali kido-kithak ke pot badi te? Piyok pu tene nali khontok apor chiklangsi, aro laparake bekso aphel ke thek hlonghle ar-u naksi, nali labang ar-u mat-matno.
La-aholan, nali ladi alamthe chipu not, “Hemphu ahisa tene, ili arjapsi, labang asal tikiye lale ha labang asal tikiye,”
Ladisi, minon nalike ingthin longsi aborai; labang ahuwit aborai kanghopot.
Ingho si kadhorom asal katiki ayok thek-ersi do aro tikike, anang pap doman.
Ei apuru kido abang, minonke wangot, nali potsi aduk-akal wangsi do, labang anat aneng chipadukne suru not.
Nali apuru kidohel thulo, aro nali pe-rik hel arhlok cholo.
Nali ser-rupa mamor choponno; aro labang hel mamor naliyok ado pisi hakhi pido, aro me-badi nali a-ok choye. Nali kijut adinsi apuru chihansi lo.
Onenot, nali bithar sok kirot kirim asal katiki hel kihlong nange adat nali chobelsi chi-endetsi pipe yong, labang adat surusi taram do, aro labang kirot abang kasuru Hemphu atharlon adung hlengo.
Nali pirthimipe athak kidome aro nengkar-ih pensi apor hel padamo; arleng kamari arni nali abithang angthin chipangsam mo.
Nali dhorom kangthir abangyok ado kol lo aro marilo, anang naliyok wangteng dunde yongot.

Lasi, ei nengdok hel, Hemphu kiwange arniyok chipaning dingne do. Khiti katiki abang ador ong sok-sang ensi inghong man, aro konam yok ango aro aphel arwe hlonghle, la arni yok chipaning dingsi doman.
Nalita chipaning ding nange. Nali ingthin hel chipangtang, piyok pu tene Hemphu kiwange adin adung hetno.
Ei nengdok hel, nali bisar kihlonghle aphan, la-apot ihut para ihut ado chipi yek. Langot, bisar ka-otepo hem honthulong wang arjapsi do!
Ei nengdok hel, katurki abang Hemphu amen pen kithan amun, anali aduk chihi aro chipaning ding arjan pune chironot.

Piyok pu tene, inghosi chihilo, analiyok ili nengsam kardom piman. Nali Jop po kachipaning ding alam arju lo, aro Hemphu pot badi katiki kachineng-ot aro kajinso kido, nali Hemphu kiwang aron thek hlongo.
La aphu thak, ei ne nengdok hel, nali ethakpe kido, lale pirthepe lale pene bak penta hopot choyek, manta nali bisar-ote hlonghle yok “oik,” tene oik pachok nang, aro “kalek,” tene kalek pachok nang.
Nali sitem inghone bak duk-lak do ma? Anali pingkit nange. Inghone bak neng rong do ma? Anali parklam alun palun nang.
Inghonebak kiso-kilak do ma? Anali kachikruk kithe-kiding helyok tarammot; la-aphel anali Hemphu amenpen anali abanglong jangthu helsi, anang phan pingkitnot.
Kikrol kapingkit pensi la kiso arlengpo meye, aro Hemphu anangyok pangthure; aro inghone bak pap tikilo, yongta ron piye.
Lasi nali kiso kipame yok ihut para ihut ango abithang apap hel hoicho aro ihut para ihut aphan pingkit not. Dhorom kangthir arleng hel kapingkit sal-kipachok yok pharan akithe do.
Elija pota ili badi munusi kido yongta, anang arwe kapajangje yok pingkit noh aro la-amun nengkan kithomne, chiklo jon-thorok pirthepe athak arwe kijangje.
La-aphel anang pingkit phakngo apot, inghun para arwe pajango, aro pirthepe abithang athe pawango.
Ei ne korte aro ingjir hel, nali sitem inghosi khanangpo para chingbojang pu tene, inghone bak anangyok wan phak un, tene inghosi papi yok anang duwar kangbo para wan phak un,
anang ihut ajiu yok kithi asitem para rale, aro pap hel ron detne, labang anang thek nange.
Jisu Khristo kangthir-adun Pitor po, bang alongri chidatsalsi kido arleng Pontas, Galatiya, Kapadokiya, Asia aro Bithiniya alongri chingsemsi do, anali dung yok,

ingho yok aporong alamthe agiyan ateng Jiuli-Kangthir pen kangthir bor-eh, kimeng yok aro Jisu Khristo awipen nengsam kapahlong aphan, Apa Arnam karwal tang: Kajinso aro nengsam naliyok ong-ongne pado nang.
Ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo Apa Arnam bor-eh chokman! Anang abithang jinso ongsi kido atengsi, kithihel asitem para Jisu Khristo kibur parasi iliyok akimi plangsi, kihrengjong kachiha aphan,
aro kiprelpre, ingthir-et, aro kangbobe ajiu kihlongme aden naliphan ethakpe long hansi si bido.
Kijut owe kachiklange ayok honjoksi kijok aphan, Arnam ajakong long nalita kikrol parasi ral do.
La longsi nali nengrong do, kiprel yongta, jai yok me-pensi archal tangdo, ladi ser yokta adorchot nali kikrol yok,

labang kikrol honjat archal tangsi Jisu Khristo kachiklang arni, kaparklam, jortang kapado aro aman kipi pame ayok chithek hlonge, la-anat kanange ateng minon bekso apor ajat-jat honjat long nengduk yongta, nali ke nengrong chipado do.
Anangyok nali thek hlonghle yong, manta nengdok do; aro minon thek hlonghle yongta, anangyok krolsi, pu un-eh pho anengrong aro kihal un anengrong chipado do,
piyok pu tene nali kikrol angban pensi, nali ajiu kijoktang hlongdo.
Turki hel nali phansi kapachip wen kajinso alamthe turkisi kithan, anali labang kijoktang alamthe mesosi kabisar aro kar-ih dun,

lake anali angthin along kido Khristo Ajiuli, Khristo aphan pachip wensi ajat-jat duk-chosi aro labang aphel kiwang nange kihal ajakong alam aporong hakhi kipi amun, pot badi owe alam kithan, anali labang kar-ih dun.

La-amun analiyok pachiklang si, anali phan kalek, manta nali phansi labang ahuwit alam kapahar; labang ahuwit abihini, lake ethakpe para wang kitol Jiuli-Kangthir pen ingho nalingo kime-alamthe kipahar, anali parasi minon jongke naliyok nali paharo; labang alam ethakpe tharlon wang kilangdun yok aneng do!
Lasi inengpo katikiyok trepsi kido chihonjok wensi, nang kachiha ta dolen nok, Jisu Khristo kiwang amun, naliyok kajinso wangpiye, labang kajinso long krol dutne tiki.
Kanong kimeng asohel badike, nali aporong kamango apun kar-ih badike doyek.
La-aniste, naliyok jibadi kangthiryok kataram, nali ta ahuwit kido-kithak long ladine kangthir chiplang;
piyok pu tene lo-kangthir long wido, “Nali kangthir chiplang, piyok pu tene neke kangthir.”
Nali ingho si ibakdet ke langlesi, abangten katiki atengsi bisar oteman, anang yok Apa pusi taram man, tene nali chipheresi abithang pirthepe athak kido adin parkan.
Nali chithan un nange, aporong sar-lar hel para tiki jongne kiwang akijol kido-kithak hel para, nali ser, rupa, ladi kanghon abihini parasi jokngo, labang kalek,
manta ingthir phlen aro ghunia kangwe Bherabik Aso badi Khristo ador-ong awi parasi jokngo.
Anang pirthepe kaparjap aporong parasi anangyok ango chithan unsi kido, manta owepo ki-or amun, anang nali phansi chiklango.
Anang parasi nali, kithi asitem para anangyok kapabur aro jortang kipi Arnam yok kikrol arleng chiplangot, la-apotsi nali kikrol aro kachiha Arnam long chohab un.
Minon ke nali asereng yok kimeng arlo dosi neng wak phlen korte-nengdok aphan abithang ajiu kachipangthir amun, ingthinhel ihut para ihutyok nengchipi penne nengdok chipado.
Nali kanghon amu para kalek, kanghonhe amu parasi, manta Arnam kihreng ajiuli aro binongyok kido alamthe parasi plang phak do.
Lo-kangthir kipu badi, “Ahuwit a-ok kido majit bap hel badi, aro ahuwit ajortang bap amirhel badi. Bap kreng-hap mo tene, aro amirhel ingjulman.”
Manta Arnam alamthe binong doman; aro labang alamthe nali ngo pahar tango.
Lasi, chilang set-sat hel tikang ngot, kachobel hel, nengsik hel, kachitheng, aro ahuwit lam kachursihel tikang ngot.
Akimi kiplang osohel badi, kangthir-phlen jiuli achulang kangchir badi, nali kijoktang aphan kihari do ponot—
piyok pu tene, nali Hemphu ke kime pusi nali angdom hlongo.
Arleng parake selo, yongta Arnam amahang semsemke arwal tango aro ador-ong arlong la Hemphu adung wangot, aro
nali bithang kihreng arlong badi chirhapsi, Jisu Khristo parasi Arnam kachideng ajiuli nibot kipiyok, kangthir bangthe hel kachiplang aphan, isi ajiuli ahem chiplangsi chingthur do.
Piyok pu tene lo-kangthir long wido: “Langot, ne Jayon pe long karwaltang aro ador-ongpen si atok long isi aghai arlong bido aro inghosi anangyok krol, anang long jatsi mahang tharakre ye.”
Lasi kikrol abang nalike, anang ador-ong; manta kikrolkre hel aphanke, “Hem kikem arleng hel kise arlong, atok along aghai arlong chiplango.”
Aro “Kapatukung arlong, aro kapaklo arlong chiplango.” Anali patukung man piyok pu tene lahel lamthe mengme, anat analiyok labang katikiyok pekngo.”

Manta inghosi kangting para anang asombhik katha-angyok nali taram mo, nalike anang asombhik akime abor-eh hel pachiklan ponyok, la-apot nalisi karwal tang agijing, recho ahem bangthe, kangthir ason, chiplang do,
ango ke nali anang arleng kangwe, manta minon ke Arnam arleng chiplang ngo; iphong ke kajinso kihlongle, manta minon kajinso hlong ngo.
Ei nengdok hel, nali bithang longri arleng aro bang alongri arleng kipu si, ajiu long ado kolsi kachilare a-ok long kar-ih hel para chiterekne do, pusi nali chingduk do.

Bang-ajat hel alam anat sotonga pusi naliyok ado piman, labang alam lahel naliyok kime asal katiki theksi nali phan kaparklam arni Arnam yok kardom pajir, lasi anali sitem nali kido-kithak pame nange.
Nali Hemphu aphan munusi adak kapangning ahuwit abi-pun mengdunne do; lake recho aghaipo pusi, aro kapangdom phu-phang helyok meng dunne do,
lale gobornor hel, kangho katiki helyok anang aduk piman, aro akime katiki pon helyok kaparklam aphan Arnam parasi wang toldo pusi meng dun nange.
Piyok pu tene akime asal tiki tikisi abhu kihlonghle arleng hel naksi kamango alam pupesi kithan apor Arnam nali kapado klip aneng do.
Nali kijok arleng badi, yongta la kijok abangyok kangho abang haldet ke pado yek, la-aholan Arnam murkiya hel badi do.
Ahuwit arlengyok aman pado. Kikrol ahem arleng yok nengdok. Arnam yok phere. Recho yok amanpi.
Ei aturu hel, nali abithang hem ahemphuyok mainotsi lam mengdun; kajinso aro chingdom hop helyok det ta kalek, manta akangho aneng hel yokta meng dun.
Piyok pu tene inghone bak ke Arnam yok chipek detsi ongnai dukchosi aduk chihiman, tene labangsi Arnam chidengman.
Piyok pu tene pap asal tikisi nang kipam nang chihi, tene lalong pot ajortang do? Manta kime asal tikisi dukcholo, aro chihi pu tene, bangposi Arnam ango chideng ponman.
Piyok pu tene labang anatsi naliyok nali taramo, piyok pu tene Khristo nali naliphan duk chosi, isi arjan bisi damo, la-apotsi nali ta anang kengkam chijor dun.
“Anang isi pap tikike yongot, aro anang angho pen kachobel thek hlonghle yongo.”
Kapatharak amunta, wang patharak dun phakphe yongot, aduk kihlong amun, karsak kuk alam pupe yongo; manta dhorom anengpen bisar ka-ote po aphuthak pek detno.
Anang bithangsi ili pap hel thengpe athak rung pon noh, ili ke pap anat thisi, dhorom kangthir aphan arjapdo, anangyok kichang asin parasi nali kiso hamo.
Piyok pu tene nali bherabik badi kachingbo, manta minon nali ajiuli kiral aro Hemphu adungyok chirulsi wang phakngo.
Labadi si, ei apiso hel, nali pihan hel apharan meng dun, la-apot anali angkhan apihan ke Arnam alamthe mengme, layongta abithang apiso kido-kithak parasi pameng pon,
konam nali kaphere doye, me-at karkel-kapasi nangthek si, la kime karkel pensi anali neng hlonge, la-anat anali yok chihi dun.
Achu kachisubi, lale lek-rol kachi-ik, lale ajat-jat pe-rik kachi-ik, ladi anglang kachingchol kapaklang nali do yek;
manta chinom-hop aro nengsam ajiuli badi kanghonhe ape-rik chi-iksi arlo munusi yok, nali chingchol nok, ladi ajiusi Arnam mahang semsemke ador ongchot.
Aporong adak kangthir arloso hel Arnam yok kachiha kido, anali abithang apihan ayok chipabeksi, ladi abithang yok palang me-at nang.

Labadi si Sara pe Abraham poyok hemphu po pusi anang kithan alamhel meng ngo. Nalita anang so pe hel chiplang ngo. Labang aporman ke lalo, nali jatsi kaphere nange long phere detsi, kime asal katiki pe chiplang do.

Labadisi, ei apihan hel, nali yokta arloso hel chipangtang un-eh pho, aro inan kajinso asal katikipe pusi theksi, nali pingkit amun honjat wangwe ayok, nali agiyan kido ateng chiloksi, analiyok aman pipon nange.
Ki-or amun, nali ahuwit yok pubang, angthin isi det arleng chiplang ngot, bang aduk apor nengduk dodun, korte nengdok, aneng kangduk arleng, aro kachipabek arleng chiplang ngot.
Kangho aholan pangho dun nek, aro hao kipi aholan hao pidun nek, la-aholan bor-eh bat dun. Labang bor-eh kipi aphansi naliyok taram mo.
piyok pu tene lo-kangthir long kipu badi, ‘Inghosi ajiu yok nengdok, aro bor-eh kichok arni kilang aneng do, anang kachobel kipu para abithang de-tur pangdom nang;
kangho asal katiki para chitereksi, akime asal tiki pon, nengsam bisarnot, bangpo yok khep dun not.
Piyok pu tene anang dhorom kangthir abangyok langdun man, aro anang anali kapingkit long ano chiduk; manta kangho asal katiki helyok Hemphu amahang pipe.”
Minon ke akime asal katiki yok aneng do, tene naliyok ajat-jat kapaduk ke ingho te?
Aro dhorom aphan aduk cho hlong, yongta nali bor-eh chokman. Anali kaphere hel nali phere yek, aro neng ihik-bihik doyek,
manta nang neng along Khristo yok Hemphu pusi angthin chipangthir. Inghosi nali ingthin long kido nali kachihapo alamthe nali arju, anangyok nali katiki hel kithanyok trepne do;

yongta chipabek si aro kapherepen angthan. Nang thin kikrol kime dopon, la-apotsi, ingho Khristo long dosi nali kime kido-kithak hel patharak, naliyok pot alamsi wang patharak dundo, labang alam anat anali tharak phak hlonge, la-anat nali kime kachiron angthin en-ne do.
Piyok pu tene kangho asal tikisi duk kichoyok ke, akime asal tikisi Arnam ahisa tene duk kicho mechot.
Piyok pu tene iliyok Arnam adung kipon yok, papchot arleng hel aphan dhorom kangthir, Khristo iphong det duk cholo; anang a-ok long thilo, manta jiuli long ke hreng-phak ngo,
labang ajiuli pensi anang dam mo aro ajiuli long chibeng thipsi kido ajiuli helyok paharo,

lake inghosi aporong awe long Nowa po adin jahaj kapakem amun, Arnam kachipaning-ding si kanghong amun, kithan alam mengmesi kido, anali ango lamthe po paharo, labang jahaj long angkhan arleng si, lake bang hinarkep ajiu detsi langpe asitem parake jok ngo.

Aro labang alang si, athenghlan aphan, baptist lo, lake abang aninik kachikolyok ke kalek, manta Arnam angot semetangsi ingthin chipangthirsi kachingduk, Jisu Khristo kithi-kibur parasi naliyok pajokman,
anangsi ethakpe yok damo aro Arnam ancho-ari iningsi, ethakpe atharlon, apharan, aro ajakong athawolsi anang arlo mengo.
Lasi, Khristo a-ok long duk-cholo, lasi nali bithangta labang isi anengpen Arnam adorson chihonjok ngot, (piyok pu tene ingho a-ok long duk-cholo, anang pap tikike yong ngo),
La-apotsi nali ke arleng hel a-ok long kar-ih badi aro arni padamde si, Arnam ahisa badi abang po kido-kithak arni hel mesone parkan not.
La-adin Bang-ajat hel badi kapamok-mok, kar-ih jap-jap, horkijun, chojun, chojun asel along, aro kisim meme agoya kachirdom, labang ahuwit dodunsi, aporhel dam tango.
Anali lahel pen lamat-mat kangho along chilok dunde apotsi, asombhik pahlongsi nali patharakman.
Manta inghosi kihreng aro kithi abangyok bisar kipi ayok honjoksi do, anang ango anali alekha pihlonge.
Piyok pu tene labang aronsi, akithi hel ango kime-alamthe pahar tango, la-apotsi anali arleng hel atengsi a-ok along bisar-honthe, manta lahel Arnam badi jiuli long hrengsi do.
Ahuwit ki-or apot hel padung het do; apot pingkit aphan chipangdom si aro trepsi do nok.
Me-at kithanne ke, nali asitem ihut para ihutyok nengdok chipadopen, piyok pu tene nengdok si pap hel dipman.
Pasumseng hel wedungne ihut para ihutyok don kachingden along nengpi dun.
Abangten pot badi kajinso bor-eh hlongo, bangpo Arnam kime kajinso apuru ahemphu badi, nali ihut para ihut al-poson chi-en pon.

Inghone bak pahar tene, anang Arnam alamthe badi thannot; inghone bak al-poson en pon, pu tene Arnam kipi ajakong badi tiki, ladisi ahuwit long Jisu Khristo parasi Arnam jortang aro kaparklam mo-mo yok padonang. Amen.
Ei nengdok hel, nali honjat kiwang anat nali sitem jipe ame kardo, bangpo naliyok kiwang nangne apot chiplangdo puke, mehel alam nali asombhik hlongek.
Layok konbak ateng Khristo duk kicho long chingchong do, labang ateng nengrong chipadonot, jai manta anang arklamsi kachiklang amun nali nengrong chipado unne.
Khristo amen pen nali patharak do, pu tene nali bor-eh chok do; piyok pu tene jortang kipi ajiuli, lake Arnam-Ajiuli nali phuthak do.
Nali sitem ihut ta arleng kamari arleng, lale kanghu, lale kangho asal katiki, lale bang yok lam kachursi abang puke paduk hlongek.
Yongta khristan wang kidun anat duk-cho, tene anang tharakre si, labang amen pensi Arnam yok parklam.
Piyok pu tene Arnam ahem long bisar kicheng yok apor wangdo; labang ili longne ango chok, tene Arnam kime-alamthe kimengme abang ki-or apor pot chiplange?
Aro “Dhorom kangthir abang ta kijok hlong damchit man, tene kimengme aro papi abang daklong mahang chipaklange?”
Lasi inghosi Arnam ahisa badi duk-kicho abang ke, anali akime asal tiki tikine, abithang ajiubong poyok kikrol kahurjipo arideng chichampi detnot.
Minon ke nebithang ihut phu-phang, aro Khristo duk-kicho hakhi, aro wang kachiklang yok kachihonjok jortang paharsi si, nali sitem kido kithe-kiding helyok nengrungsi than do,

nang aphang along Arnam kipi bik ipal do, bangso mesone khokhre badi al-en pon, katiki-nange anat kalek, manta neng ar-ihsi, Arnam asal katiki badi tiki— kilangho alap kihlong aphan kalek, manta nengsam tiki pon.
Naliyok ango kipek aphang aphuthak pangdomde si, manta bik apal aphan kime arjan paklang khokhre badi langpon.
Aro konam Khokhre Aghai wang kachiklang arni, nali jortang akar kachingbobe phurkup po nali pibo.

Labadi si ei nali riso hel, nali sarphi-sarphu arleng helyok meng nange. Aro nali ahuwit ihut para ihut kimeyok chipabek aneng ensi katiki chiron, lo-kangthir long pudo, ‘Arnam kaborai hel yok pangdom man, manta kachipabek abang yok ke jinso paklang man.’
Arnam kamichang apunsi naliyok pangthur ponne, anang jakong kithe arlo chipabek;
nali ahuwit ihik-bihik kidohel anang phuthak pek det, piyok pu tene anang naliphan chiron man.
Kangreng-cher tike-mungchal po badi nali hutur si-ik hel ingho yok paduk aphan lang-worsi do.
Labang aduk-kicho, pirthepe long kido nali kikrol korte aro ingjir hel majit jinso undo pusi than-un si, nali kikrol pangtangne, anangyok tengdun.
Aro Ahuwit kajinso akar Arnam anang or-eh len jortang anat Khristo long naliyok taramo, nali bekso kiduk tang aphel, Arnam abithang naliyok pajoknge, parjak pone, aro jakong piye.
Anang apharan mo-mo yok pado nang. Amen.
Ne Silas poyok, kikrol ne-korte badi chironsi, anang parasi pathik-otsi wisi naliyok kithan un yok hloduno, aro labang Arnam khanang kajinso pusi hakhi pilo. Labang ateng arjak-pachip.
Nalipen Arnam para karwaltang Babilon long kido kachikruk abang, aro neso apun Mark po naliyok kardom nali pajirdo.
Khristan nengdok chimungsi nali ihut para ihut yok kardom chipi. Khristo long kido ahuwit long nengsam padonang.
Jisu Khristo amurkiya aro kangthir-adun Simon Pitor po para ili Arnam aro Ral Hemphu Jisu Khristo adhorom anat inghosi ilipen inan ador-ong kikrol abhak hlongo, anali dung yok:
Ili Hemphu Jisu aro Arnam agiyan long ong-ongsi naliyok kajinso aro nengsam pa-ong nang.
Inghosi anang jortang kaparklam aro kihal pensi ili yok taram mo, anang lam agiyan parasi anang Arnam jiuli ajakong ili jiubong aro kimeng anat ahuwit alam iliyok pilo.
Aro lamehel parasi ador-ong aro akithe seme-kitang hel ili yok pilo, lamehel parasi nali bharasot kar-ih si kanghon para joksi, Arnam ajiuli asoi long chingchong dun not.
piyok pu tene la anatsi nalita meso tikisi, kikrol long kihal, along agiyan,
abang kachipangdom agiyan, aro abang kachipangdom long kachihi, kachihi long kachirdom, kachirdom long korteyok nengdok, aro korte nengdok long khanang nengdok piman,
aro labang ahuwit nali sitem do lo tene, aro ong-ongsi damo.
Piyok pu tene ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo alam agiyan pomar naliyok kaselet aro athe weke pado hlonghle ye.
Piyok pu tene labang ahuwit jai ingjong, anang mek chotok; anang adung hetsi thekman, anang aporong apap kiron tang tenge detno.
Piyok pu tene ei korte aro ingjirhel, naliyok kataram aro karwaltang long thirkuk kidoyok meso tiki pon-ongot; piyok pu tene bangpo tiki tene, nali jatsi inghohe ye.
Piyok pu tene ladisi ili Hemphu aro Ral Hemphu Jisu Khristo or-eh len longri kilut dun aduwar pahlong chot si naliyok honjok piye.
La-apotsi nali labang ahuwit alam thek yongta, aro nalipen kido khanang thirkukne do yongta, labang ahuwit alam naliyok purkipon yok ne arnita trepsi do ye.
Ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo jibadii neyok nethano, ladisi la kuntulu ahem kachikol parjang nge, labangpo theksi,
labang kuntulu ahem long kido alengke naliyok purki pon phaksi ahari kipi yok, ne kime agiyan pusi chiron do.
Aro nalike, ne thisi kidam aphelta, aporten ta lamehel alam chipurkisi do pon une, ne labadi meso chirondo.
Piyok pu tene ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo ajakong aro kiwang phaknge alam nali kithan amun, hali akire pen kithan atomo kalek; manta anang jortang kithek hakhi kido hlong.
Piyok pu tene “Anangsi ne nengdok ne So, anangyok ne nengsam do,” kipu jortang kihal jakong pen anangyok kiwang alamthe parasi, anang Apa Arnam inan aman aro jortang kihlong;
hali anangpen inglong kartul athak kido amunsi, ethakpe para kiwang alamthe abithang arju hlongo.

Lasi hali turkihel ahuwit alam angoyok ta thirchotsi dohlong do; adin chokche lengke, aro nali ingthin long tudap tha-angklir nak chiklolangso wangwe lengke, labang kangting klak athem katha-ang kipi melur badi labang alamthe yok nali neng pido, akime tiki do.
Kicheng amun chithan undo, lo-kangthir isi katurki alamthe, kipupo abithang kithan-dak alamthe kalek,
piyok pu tene katurki alamthe arleng ahisa para jatsi wangwe yong; manta arleng hel Jiuli-Kangthir parasi kipapu, Arnam para lamthe hlongsi thano.

Manta arleng hel asitem asisik paklang turki hel wango; ladisi nali sitemta asisik kithan hel wangsi, jul-julsi kapangho abi-apun nali paklange, inghosi analiyok wi pisi namo, labang Hemphu yok hoi-choche ye; ladisi abithang yok kangho wan dap me.
Aro ako-ong abangsi kapamok-mok hel chirli dune;
anali alot anat asisik alam pensi naliyok apuru alap aduwar ote ye; anali bisar ado-kibat aporong para inghong ke dode, aro anali kangho aphan amek-ih pen do de.
Piyok pu tene Arnam ke pap katiki tharlon helyok pajokje yongo, manta jom long tisi bisar arniyok inghongsi kangting long champi lo;
aro aban pirthepe yok nengdokde yong ngot, manta konam kimengme hel aphuthak ban-alang wano, la-amun dhorom kihari Nowa po pen prek bang thorok-isi arleng ayoksi pajokngo;
aro Sodum aro Gomora arongpe pasek detsi ka-ongnai poyok ado pisi, kimengme pho monphel abangyok arjan bilo;
aro la dhorom kimengme pamok-mok anat aduk kihlong dhorom kangthir Lot po, anangyok ral lo,
(piyok pu tene la dhorom kangthir po anali sitem kido amun anali pap katiki thek-resi, la-anat arniten anang dhorom anenglong ihik-bihik ongo),
lapara ke Hemphu kikrol helyok honjat para kapajok yok, aro papchot helyok, ingho a-ok ateng do dunner ar-ih man, analiyok ado pisi, bisar arni aphan chibiman,
—ingho abithang a-ok anengsi kengkam chijor, aro ingho apharan kido phu-phang yok ado kipi pherere. Chipangtang dut aro katiki anengsi, lahel jortang kido poyok kapatharak pherere,
la-amun analiyokta ajakong aro apharan kidochot tharlon hel, anali ta Hemphu ango analiyok ado pi ke bisar alam thanthe.

Manta agiyan wedet kahurji okpe-okthe hel asoi pangtheksi, nepsi aro kimari ayok plang ngo. Anali badi kapatharak abang ta abhu hlonghle, aro konam kahurji apot hel prel lo pu tene, anali ta prel klip hlonge;

aro ado asal katiki parasi aduk cho hlongdo. Anali anelo amun apok-pangkrang chosi kidome chiron man. Anali ado asin aro abotnam doman, anali ke chojun-kime long nalipen kicho amun, kidome pahlongman.
Anali mek kangho do dun-ner man, pap tikike leng ke neng ingsamse. Anali neng kithirthe long chobelpon man. Anali ingthin hel alop anat akire!
Anali kikengset aduwar tikangsi, kangho aduwar damo, Beor po aso Balam po, anang kangho aduwar long kengkam chijor ro,
manta papchot adatsi akime kihlong, manta abithang ado pomar anat tamcholo; lake debal noselmurep po munusi badi asipen lam thansi, turki hel kamango katiki teng dunnoh.
Anali kikreng lang-tuk badi, tomon kithe kapangjar pon inghun hel badi; piyok pu tene anali phan kangting solok athem ralsi bido.

Piyok pu tene anali a-ok long kidome kar-ih arlo dosi, kanangne alam aborai chithansi, ingcham badi karkel-kapasi hel asitem para minon joktangsi kiwang helyok kapamok-mok kido parasi chobelsi pon man.
Anali bang ango kijok pang-ak, manta abithangke kangho kido aturu; piyok pu tene ingho parasi remman, anang labang aturu chiplangman.

Piyok pu tene Hemphu aro Ral Hemphu Jisu Khristo alam agiyan parasi bharasot ajat-jat akisim hel para chipajoksi kiwang yongta, labang kisim long pasul kangnuk along jangsi rem man, anali kijut amun ango yokta ingho chotman.
Piyok pu tene agiyan hlongsi kachipek tang kangthir kanong para kachirul yok ke, dhorom aduwar chithan un-eh si kido anali phan kime kido.
Khanang sar-alam ateng analiyok chiplango, “Hik ijon abithang kaching-ok poyok chophak man,” aro “Lang kapalu tang phakpo inghan kachilem alomyok dam phak man,”
Ei nenengdok hel, ne naliyok kiwi labang minon phong-ni alo chokngo; labang pak-ni pensi purkisi nali kangthir angthin long ahari pido,
lake kangthir katurki hel aporong kithan alamthe hel, aro nali adun hel kihlong Ral Hemphu akanong nalike neng chipurkinot, labang anatsi wido.
Kicheng amun, labang chithan un do, ki-or owe long chongnek si kido kachongnek abang wange; anali abithang kar-ih ateng kengkam chijore,
aro puye, “Anang kiwange kapang-ak dak long te? Piyok pu tene konam para sar-lar hel thisi damo, la-amun para, layok ke, kahurji cheng arni para ahuwit ladi mat-matsi do.”
Lahel Arnam alam agiyan, suneng athak, ango para kido; aro lang pensi, aro lang parasi pirthimipe kipangning, anali ahisa atengsi labang tenge jangsi dolo,
aro lamehel parasi, la-amun pirthepe ban-alang ingbaksi kapaprel.
Manta labang thot alam agiyan anatsi, minon owe long sunengpe athak aro prithimipe, kimengme arleng hel bisar aro kiprel arniyok ili bisi, me-aphan pangrumsi bido.
Manta ei nengdok hel, nali imung alamthe chitenge yek, Hemphu aphan ke inirsi posi hajar anengkan badi, aro hajar anengkan ke inirsi badi.
Angkhan arleng ke jibadi abhem do pusi chiron do, Hemphu abithang kapang-ak alam long ladi pabhem-bhe; anang ihut yokta kapangho yok aneng ingjong, manta ahuwit ta neng chipharlep yok chipaneng.
Manta kanghu badisi Hemphu adin wange, la arnike sunengpe asi akithe pisi pachilut detne, aro suneng athak abihini hel sek detsi or-phrotne, aro pirthepe aro lalong kido kangwe abihini sek detne.
Ladisi labang ahuwit apot hel kachilut det theksi, nali Arnam la arniyok kiwang aphan inghongsi, aro ar-ih jongsi, ahuwit kangthir kido-kithak aro kimengpen pot badi hak arleng chiplang nange do?
Labang arni anat sunengpe sek detsi chilut detne, aro lalong suneng abihini hel melong mendetne?
Manta Arnam kapang-ak badi, dak dhorom kangthir abangsi doman, ili akimi suneng aro akimi pirthimipe yok inghongsi do hlong do, konam dhorom kangthir abangsi doman.
La-apot, ei kortehel, labang ahuwit inghongsi, nali ke anang angot abotnam wepho si aro adowesi, nengsamsi kachiklang yok, lasi meso donot;
aro ili Hemphu chipaning-ding poyok kijoktang pusi chiron do; ladisi ili nengdok korte Pol po ta, anangyok kipi agiyan atengsi naliyok wilo,

labang alam than ponsi, ladisi anang ahuwit alo longta wilo; lamehel long angkhan ke abhu hlongkal alamdo; kamango aro neng kithirthe arleng hel ke kachipangho aphan lo-kangthir alamhel, ladisi prek pharli pon phakman.
Lasi nali, ei nengdok hel, nali labang pangodap than unsi, kimengme hel kachobel yok papon hlonghle, nang thirkukne kido parake chipangho yek, la-anat chilang wenne do.
Manta ili Hemphu aro Ral Hemphu Jisu Khristo kajinso long aro agiyan long kihari dopon not. Minon aro mo-moyok anang jortang pado nang. Amen.
Kicheng para potsi kido, hali potsi arju hlongo, potsi abithang amekpen thek hlong, potsi lango, aro abithang ari penta ot hlongo, lake jiuli alamthe aphansi,
labang ajiuli chiklang ngo, hali thek hlongo aro hakhi pido, aro labang ajiu Apa pen kido, aro hali ngo chiklango, labang ki-or eh ajiu a-odi naliyok pido—
hali thek hlongo, aro arju hlongo, labang a-odi, hali pen nali longta kachingrum ayok, naliyok ta pido; aro ili kachingrum, bangpo ke Apa aro anang Aso Jisu Khristo pensi chingrum do.
Ili anengrong kihlong aphan, la-anat hali labang hel alam wido.
Labang alamthe a-odi hali anang para arju hlongsi naliyok pahar do, bangpo ke ladi, Arnam ke katha-ang aro kangting ananglong wepen.
Anang pen ili chingrum hlongdo, ladi pusi ili kangting long keng-kam chijorman, tene asisik than hlongman, khanang long mengme yong;
manta anang jibadi katha-ang long do, ladisi ili ta katha-ang long keng-kam chijorman, tene ihut para ihut adak ili chingrum un do; aro anang So Jisu awi ahuwit pap hel para ili yok pangthirman.
Ili ke pap ingjong pusi than do, tene ili bithang yoksi chichobel hlongman; aro ili ingthin long khanangpo ingjong.
Manta ili bithang apap hel Arnam adung hoi cholo tene, kikrol aro dhorom kangthir Arnam ke, anang ili pap hel ron piman, aro ahuwit kangho para iliyok pangthirman.
Ili pap tikike yong pusi than hlongman, tene Arnam yok kachobel sanse hlongman, aro ili ingthin along anang alamthe ingjong.
Ei oso niso hel, nali ke pap asal tiki ke, ladi chironsi ne naliyok labang mar alam wido. Aro inghone bak pap asal tikiman, layong ta Apa ango ili kirap dhorom kangthir Jisu Khristo do;
aro anangsi ili pap hel ronman; ili det ke kalek, pirthepe ajal dungsi.
Minon ke ili anang kanong hel mainot do, tene bangpo parasi ili thek nge, anangyok than un no.
Ne anang yok than un no, ladi pusi, inghosi anang kanong hel mainot ponpe, anangke asisik, aro anang angthin long khanang ingjong;
manta inghosi anang lamthe hel mainot pon do, anang angthin long Arnam nengdok khanangsi arjap mo. Labang parasi ili thek, ananglong ili dohlong do.
Ne anang long do, ladi pusi inghosi than, Jisu Khristo jibadi kengkam-chijor ro, anang ta ladi kengkam-chijor nange.
Ei nengdok hel, ne naliyok isi akimi kanong wido, ladi kalek, manta kicheng para nali pot si hlongo, ladi aban akanong si wido; nali potsi alamthe arju hlongo, bangposi labang aban kanong.
Ne naliyok akimi kanong wi-phak do, ladi alam Khristo long aro nali long, la hini khanang chok do; piyok pu tene kangting chitereksi dam jong do, aro minon jong ke khanang katha-ang wangsi do.
Ne katha-ang longsi do, ladi pusi inghosi anang kikrol korte yok sim-man, anang ke minon hok kangting long sido.
Inghosi anang korte-muso yok nengdok, anang katha-ang along do, aro anang angthin long kangho jatsi wedung.
Manta inghosi abithang akorte-muso yok sim, anang ke kangting longsi do, kangting longsi keng-kam chijor do, aro daklong yok dam man, anang than un-eh; piyok pu tene kangting anang mek pachotok ngo.
Ei osohel, anang amen anatsi nali pap hel ronpi detno; lasi ne naliyok wido.
Ei pa hel, inghosi kicheng amun para do, anangyok nali thek ngo; lasi naliphan wido. Ei riso hel, nali pap ajiu yok hal pen noh, lasi naliyok wido.

Ei osohel, nali Apa yok thek ngo; lasi naliyok wilo. Ei apo hel, inghosi kicheng arni para do, anangyok nali than un noh; la anatsi ne naliyok wilo. Ei riso hel, nali ajakong do, aro Arnam alamthe nali ingthin along do, aro nalike pap-ajiu halpen noh; lasi naliyok wilo.
Nalike pirthepe yok, lale pirthepe long kido alam helyok nengdok ngek. Inghone bak pirthepe yok nengdok, tene Apa anengdok anang angthin long dode;
piyok pu tene pirthepe long ahuwit do, lake a-ok aneng kar-ih, mek-hang, ajiu kido aleng ke kaborai, bang mar Apa para wangwe yong, pirthepe parasi wangdo.
Aro pirthepe, aro labang kar-ih hel chiterek si damjong do, manta inghosi Arnam ahisa mainot pondo, anang binong yok doman.
Ei neso hel, ki-or arni wang hleng do! Khristo ahutur wangsi do, lasi minon ke ako-ong Khristo hutur wang hlengo. Labang parasi ili than undo, kijut apor wang hlengo.

Anali ili sitem para ole si dam mo, manta ili pen kachingrum abang kangwe; piyok pu tene anali ili pen kachingrum alok kidonang tene, ili pen dojongo hoi; manta anali kachiklang dak aphan, lake anali ili pen wang kachingrum abang kalek, bangpo kachiklang dak yoksi tikangsi damo.
Manta nali ke, kangthirpo para Jiuli-Kangthir nali arwal tango, la-apot nali ahuwit than uno.
Nalike khanangpo yok than un-eh lang pusi ne naliyok wilo, ladi kalek, manta nali anang yok kithan-un anatsi, aro jatsi asisik poke khanang long parake wangwe, la-anatsi wilo.
