Jisu si labang Khristo, bangpo inghosi hoichoche, anang aparke aro ingho kachobel po dolang? Anangsi Khristo ahutur; anang Apa yok aro Aso yok ta hoi-choche.
Inghosi Aso yok hoi-choche, anang Apa yokta hlonghle yong; manta inghosi Aso yok hoi-cho do, anang ke Apa yok ta pahlongo.
Nali kicheng para potsi arju hlongo, labang nali angthin long pado pon. Labang kicheng para karju alam nali angthin long do, tene nalita Aso long ta aro Apa along dopon nok.
Aro anang hali ngo kapang-ak alam, lake or-eh len ajiu.
Ingho si naliyok chobel do, anali phansi ne labang mar alam wilo.

Anang parasi nali potsi jiuli pahlongo, labang nali ingthin long do apot, inghone bak naliyok pachirli pu tene, nali phan ladi kanange ta ingjong; manta anang labang karwal ajiuli badi ahuwit alamthe pachirli do, aro labang si jibadi khanang, asisik kalek aro labangsi jibadi nali pachirlilo, latengne nali anang long donot.
Aro minon ke, ei osohel, anang chiklango pu tene, ili aha doye, aro anang kiwang phak arni anang para katharak weye, la-anat anang longne donot.
Anangke dhorom kangthir, bangpo than un, tene ingho si dhoromsi kengkam chijordo, anang ke Arnam parasi plang do, bangpota nali than undo.
Langot, ili ke Arnam aso pusi pachitha-ang nang, holeksi Apa iliyok konbak nengdok pajiro! Aro ili Arnam aso chiplang ngo. Lasi pirtheke iliyok chinine; piyok pu tene anang yok chinine yongo.

Ei nengdok lokjor hel, minon ili Arnam aso chiplangsi do; manta mophel pot chiplange, labang ke minon hok ta chiklangkle lang. Anang chiklango tene, ili anang badi chiplange, bangpo than un do; piyok pu tene anang pot badi do, anang yok labadi si thek hlonge.
Aro Khristo phuthak ingho labang kachiha do, anang jibadi ingthir phlen, anang ta lateng abithang chipangthir phlen man.
Abangten inghosi pap asal tikiman, anang kanong panghoman; pap posi kanong panghoman.
Aro nali than unman, pap kikol pon yok anang chiklango, aro anang long jatsi pap ingjong.
Ingho si ananglong do, anang ke pap tikike; inghosi pap tiki do, anangke anangyok thekthe yong aro than un-eh yong.
Ei oso hel, nali kaiyok ta pachobel hlongek; inghosi dhoromsi kengkam chijor do, anang jibadi dhorom kangthir, anangta lateng dhorom kangthir doman.
Inghosi pap asal pensi kengkam chijorman, anangke si-ik parasi; piyok pu tene kicheng arni para pap asal tikisi do. Si-ik asal kapa-or aphansi Arnam Aso wang chiklango.
Inghosi Arnam para wang plangman, anangke pap asal tikike; piyok pu tene Arnam ajiu anang ingthin long doman; aro anang pap asal tiki un-eh; piyok pu tene Arnam para anang plangman.
Ladisi Arnam asohel, aro si-ik asohel chiklang dakman. Inghosi dhoromsi kengkam chijorje, anangke Arnam para kalek; aro inghosi anang akorte yok nengdok de, anangta Arnam aso kalek.
Piyok pu tene ili ke ihut para ihut yok nengdok chipado nang, nali kicheng arni para karju hlong a-udi ke labang ngo.

Koyin po jibadi pap ajiu parasi wangsi, abithang amuso yok marilo, lateng ili chiplang nangne. Parake Koyin po piyok te amuso yok mari lo? Piyok pu tene anang abithang katiki asal kangho, manta amuso asal ke dhorm loi-loisi kido.
Ei korte aro musohel, pirthepe arleng hel nali simman, la-amun asombhik hlongek.
Ili korte muso helyok nengdok chipadoman apotsi, kithi para ajiuli longyok arpat hlongo, bangpo ili than un do. Inghosi nengdok chipadode, anangke akithisi do.
Inghosi abithang akorte muso yok sim, anangke munusi kamari arleng; aro ihut munusi kamari angthin along or-eh len ajiuli dode, bangpo nali than-un do.
Khristo ili phan anang ajiu kachiti longsi, ili nengdok agiyan alam thek hlongo; aro ili ta korte musohel anat ibithang ajiu chiti nange.
Inghosi bharasot long kicho-karjak asal do, anang bithang korte muso hel kangwe klong theksi, anangyok nengdok chipipe, tene Arnam nengdok pot badi anang angthin long doman?
Ei osohel, wangot, ili nengdok alamthe det, lale ade adeng detke kalek, manta katiki aro khanang pensi nengdok nang.

Bangpo parasi ili than unne, te ili khanang para wangman; aro jibak ke alam long ta ili angthin ke ili yok ado piman, labang alam anat ili Arnam amahang semsemsi ibithang angthin kikrol chineng tang nange.
Piyok pu tene Arnam ili ingthin long yokta kithechot, aro anang ahuwit than phrotman.
Ei nengdok hel, ili angthin iliyok kachironhel ado pipe, tene ili Arnam aronyok ili aha do;
aro ili jipe chihangman bangpo ili anang para pahlong man; piyok pu tene ili anang kanong hel mainot man, aro anangmek sungdangsi pot neng pangsam, labangsi tikiman.
Aro labang anang kanong, lake anang So Jisu Khristo amen along ili krolman, aro anang iliyok kipi akanong badi ili ke ihut para ihut yok nengdok chipado nange.
Ahuwit ingho Arnam kanong hel mainot, anang Arnam long do; aro Arnam ili long do, labang anang ili yok kipi ajiuli parasi ili than un doh.
Ei nengdok hel, nali ahuwit ajiu hel krol dun nek, manta labang hel Arnam para la ma kalek bangpo than unyok, ajiu hel archalne lang; piyok pu tene ako-ong asisik kithan katurki pirthepe long wango.
Nali Arnam ajiuli yok ladisi than un: Jisu Khristo ke a-ok pensi wango, bangpo ahuwit ajiu hoi choman, la-ahuwit ajiuli hel Arnam para,

aro ahuwit ajiuli Jisu yok hoi choche, la ahuwit Arnam parake kalek. Aro labangke Khristo ahutur ajiuli, labangsi wange pusi nali arju hlongo; aro minonke khanangke bang hel minon pirthepe adak wang arjakngo.
Ei oso hel, nali ke Arnam pen do, aro nalike labang helyok halpeno; piyok pu tene pirthepe long kido poyok ta nalipen kido posi akithechot.
Lamehel ke pirthepe para; lasi pirthepe alamthesi thanman, aro pirthepe lamehel alamyok oneman.
Ili ke Arnam long do. Inghosi Arnam yok chini do, anang ili lam oneman; inghosi Arnam long para kalek, anang ili lamhel onene. Labang parasi ili khanang ajiuli aro kachobe ajiuli yok chini uno.

Ei nengdok hel, wangot, ili ihut para ihutyok nengdok chipado nang; piyok pu tene nengdok ke Arnam parasi wangman, aro inghosi nengdok chipadoman, anang Arnam parasi plangman; aro anang Arnam yok chini-un.
Inghosi nengdok dode, anang Arnam yok chinine; piyok pu tene Arnam ke nengdok.
Arnam ihut det Aso parasi ili ajiuli pahlong yok Arnam anangyok pirthepe long wangtol loh, labang pensi Arnam nengdok chiklango.
Arnam yok ili nengdok ngo, ladi kalek, manta anangsi ili yok nengdok ngo, aro ili pap kiron yok anang Aso yok wangtol loh; holeksi nengdok do.
Ei nengdok hel, Arnam ili yok ladi nengdok ngo, tene ili ta ihut para ihutyok nengdok chipado nange.
Ihut ta Arnam yok jatsi thekthe yong; ili ihut para ihutyok nengdok chipado, tene Arnam ili sitem do, aro anang nengdok ili sitem chokman.
Aro anang iliyok anang ajiuli pajiro apot, anang ke ili sitem doman, aro ilita ananglong doman, bangpo thek doh.
Aro pirthepe Pajok Hemphu kachiplang yok, Apa ke Aso yok wangtol loh, bangpo theksi, hali hakhi pido.
Jisu ke Arnam Aso; labang ingho hoicho, Arnam anang long doman, aro anangta Arnam long doman.
Ili yok Arnam anengdok do, labang ili than uno, aro krol lo. Arnam ke nengdok, aro ingho nengdok chipado, anang Arnam long doman, Arnam ta anang pen doman.
Bisar arni ili aha dut kidoyok nengdok ili pen chokman; piyok pu tene anang jibadi do, ili ta labang pirthepe long ladisi dohlong doh.
Anengdok long ke kaphere ingjong; manta chok phlen anengdok ke kaphere pangweman; piyok pu tene kapheresi aduk piman; aro inghosi phere, anang nengdok kichok phlen kalek.
Anangsi ango iliyok nengdok ngo, la-anat ili ta nengdokman.

Ne Arnam yok nengdok do, ladi pusi inghone bak ke anang akorte musoyok sim, tene anang ke kachobel po; piyok pu tene akorte aro amusoyok anang thekngo, anang yok nengdok de, tene inghoyok thek phlan hlonghle yong, ladi Arnam yok anang nengdok un-eh.
Inghosi Arnam yok nengdok, anang abithang akorte aro amuso yok ta nengdok chipado nange; labang akanong hali Hemphu para hlongo.
Jisu si labang Khristo, labang ingho krol, anang Arnam para plangman; aro inghosi kapaplang poyok nengdok, anang labang para kiplang poyok nengdokman.
Ili konam Arnam yok nengdok, aro anang kanong mainot, la-amun Arnam aso helyok ta nengdokman, labang than un noh.
Piyok pu tene ili ke Arnam kanong hel mainot do, Arnam kipi nengdok aron labang ngo; aro anang kanong hel kirung pon kardip kalek.
Piyok pu tene ingho Arnam parasi plango, anang ke pirthepe yok halman. Aro pirthepe yok kihal jai ihutpo halman, labangke ili kikrol polo.
Jisu Arnam Aso lalo, labang ingho krolman, anang aparke pirthepe yok kihal un ingho do?
Lang aro awi parasi kiwang posi, lake Jisu Khristo; lang pen det kalek, manta lang aro awi, la hini pen. Aro Jiuli ke hakhi piman; piyok pu tene Jiuli si khanangoh;
lalong kithom ta ajiuli si hakhi piman:
lang, aro awi, aro Ajiuli aro labang kithom ta hakhi isi det chikengman.
Ili arleng hel hakhipo hoichosi chidengman, tene Arnam ahakhi layok ta kithechot; piyok pu tene labangsi Arnam hakhi te, anang abithang Aso alam hakhi pilo.
Inghosi Arnam Aso yok krol, labang hakhi anang angthin long do; inghosi Arnam yok krolkre, anang Arnam yok chobelman; piyok pu tene Arnam abithang Aso alam hakhi pilo, anang bangpo krolkre yongot.
Aro labang hakhi ke lalo te, Arnam ili yok or-eh len ajiu pilo, aro labang ajiubong anang Aso longdo.
Inghosi Aso yok pahlongo, anang ke ajiubong po do; inghosi Arnam Aso yok hlonghle yong, anang ajiubong ingjong.
Arnam Aso amen kikrol nali ke, nali ke or-eh len ajiuli do, bangpo ke than un, lasi naliyok ne lamehel alam wilo.
Aro anang phan ili kihlong aha poke lalo, ili anang kar-ih badi pene bak pingkit chihang, tene anang ili labang kachihang pingkit arjuman.
Aro ili pene bak pingkit chihangman, ili labang kachihang pingkit anang arjuman, labang ke than un, tene anangyok jipe pingkit no, labang ahuwit hlongo pusi ili than undo.

Inghone bak anang korte aro amusoyok thi hlonghle det apap katiki thek dun, tene anang pingkit chihange, aro anang yok, lake kithi hlonghle apap katiki arleng yok ajiu piye. Lalong kithi nange apap do langsi; labang alamthe kapingkit yok ne thanthe lang.
Ahuwit akangho asal katiki pap det; aro kithi hlonghle apap hel dolong do.
Ili than undo, inghosi Arnam para plangman, anang ke pap tiki ke; manta Arnam para kipaplang posi anangyok ralman, aro pap ajiu anangyok wangho un-eh.
Ili than un do, ili Arnam pensi chokman, aro pirthe pe ajal-dungsi pap ajiu arlodo.
Ili aro than undo, Arnam Aso wango; aro ingho pensi ili labang khanang yok than undo, ladi aneng ili yok pilo; aro ili labang khanang long, anang Aso Jisu Khristo longsi do.
Anangsi khanang Arnam aro or-eh len ajiuli. Ei osohel, agoya hel parake nang bithang yok chiralpon not.
Kithe phu-phang para la khanang pen karwal arloso pe aro anang so helyok, ne khanang long nengdok abangyok, aro ne hudetke kalek manta inghosi khanang long nengdok kithan un abang adung yok,
piyok pu tene khanang anat ili ingthin long mengsi doman, aro mo-moyok ili pen doye:
Apa Arnam para, aro Apa Aso Jisu Khristo parata kajinso aro nengdok, aro nengsam, khanang long aro nengdok long ili pen doye.
Hali Apa para kihlong kanong atengsi, ne nali so hel angkhan yok khanang long kengkam kachijor theksi, ne-nengrong ongoh.
Aro minon ke, ei arlosope, ne nangyok akimi kanong isi kiwi kalek, manta kicheng amun para hali pot akanong hlongo, la atengsi ili ihut para ihutyok nengdok chipado, nangyok ladi chingduk do.
Aro ili ke anang ahuwit kanong ateng keng-kam chijor, labangsi nengdok aron, nali ke labang ateng keng-kam chijor, labang si la kanong; nali ke ango para ladisi arjulo.
Piyok pu tene ako-ong kachobe arleng hel pirthe long wang-ole loh; Jisu Khristo a-ok long wangdo pusi lahel hoi choche; labang arleng hel kachobel aro Khristo ahutur.
Nali pot aphan tikilo, la ahuwit chipangbobe ayok, manta nali isi banta pahlong pen aphan, nali bithang meso chilang.
Inghosi Khristo kapaklang mengmesi ango damman, Arnam anang long ingjong; inghosi anang kapaklang mengman, anangsi Apa aro Aso, labang hinita do.
Inghone bak labang kapaklang alam en-eh si nangdung dam, tene anangyok hem long chingden nek, aro bor-eh pado dun nang puke pudun nek;
piyok pu tene bor-eh pado dun nang pusi inghone bak pudun tene, anang anali akangho asal chideng dun man.
Naliyok kiwiyok ne ako-ong doyong ta, lo icher aro sihi kapanghon aneng ingjong, manta ili nengrong kapachok phlen aphan, nali dungyok damsi, chimahang phrongsi kachithan ayok ne chihado.
Nang karwal tang ingjirpe asohel nangyok kardom nang pajirdo.
Kithe-kiding po, la Gayas poyok ne khanangsi nengdokman, labang nengdok Gayas po adung yok.
Ei nengdokpo, nang jiubong ke bor-eh kihlongpo, latengsi ahuwit alam long nang bor-eh pachok nang aro agar-ari pame-at nang, labangsi ne pingkit do.
Piyok pu tene angkhan korte wangsi nangthin long kido khanang alam, lake nang pot badi khanang long kengkam chijor do, la alam hakhi kipi apot, ne nengrong ongo.
Ne sohel khanang along kengkam kachijor a-odi karju amun nengrong wangman, la-an parake ne ke aro la-an neneng arong ingjong.
Ei nengdok po, nang korte hel yok, lake kachinine donhel yok, pot badi rap mo ma, labang kikrol arleng kamichang asal tikilo,
anali kachikruk ango nang nengdok alam hakhi pilo. Nang analiyok Arnam kamichang ateng, anali kidamjong apor, al-poson enponsi than dam tene, la-an kime asal chiplange;
piyok pu tene anali kikrolkre hel para kirap mar en-eh si, Hemphu amen aphan olesi damo.
Lasi, ili khanang long kirap dun ayok, labadi arleng yok ili si al-en pon nange.
Ne kachikruk yok pene-pena kiwi; manta anali sitem ango aman kar-ih apot Diotrophas po ne songkhanke hoi choche.

Lasi ne wang tene, anang pot tikisi do, labang alam nali than phrotne, anang kangho alamthe hel pensi haliyok mahang pangwe man. Aro lamehel ta neng domeme si, korte helyok abithang ta chideng ponpe, inghosi chidengpon yok aneng do man, anali yokta raldun klakman aro kachikruk parata mokol pa-oledet man.
Ei nengdok po, nang kangho chirli dundesi, kime asal katiki chirlinot. Inghosi kime asal tiki anang Arnam pensi doman; inghosi akangho asal tiki, anang Arnam yok thekthe yong.
Abangten Dametriyas po aro khanang long kidun abang hakhi pido. Ili ta anang phan hakhi pido, aro labang hakhi kipi ke khanang pusi than undo.
Naliyok kiwi aphan ne ako-ong alam kido; manta sihi aro phongten pen kiwi neneng ahisa ingjong;
la-aholan ne kachiha ke, bekso adin aphel chithek hlonge; la amun amahang semsemsi ili lam chithan nang.
Nang pen nengsam pado nang. Nang lokjor hel kardom nang pido. Nang lokjor hel amen en-enne kardom pajir pon.
Jisu Khristo amurkiya ihut, Jems po akorte Jud po,—Apa Arnam long inghosi nengdok hlong do, aro Jisu Khristo aphan ralsi bido, labang kataram tang arleng hel adung yok:
Nali yok jinso, nengsam, aro nengdok nali pa-ong nang.
Ei nengdok hel, ili kijoktang alam nali kiwiyok ne meso chironsi kido amun, kangthir arleng helyok iphong kichampi tang kikrol abhak kachirbu ayok neng kirung aphan, naliyok kiwi aneng ngo.

Piyok pu tene angkhan arleng jolsi nali sitem lutsi wango; anali la ado hlong joknge pusi anali lam aporong kiwi alam do; anali kimengme arleng; analike ili Arnam kajinso long kapamok-mok oteman, aro ili ihut det Akithe aro Hemphu yok, lake Jisu Khristo yok hoi choche.
Manta nalike ahuwit alam than un yongta, lake naliyok kapurki yok aneng do, Hemphu si Ijip alongri para arleng helyok pajoksi, aphel kikrolkre helyok paprel klip mo.
Aro ethakpe tharlon hel anali akithe chibibesi, abithang kido athem tikango, analiyok Arnam bisar-arni aphan, monphel yok hirkuli bamsi kangting arlo bilo.
Labadisi Sodum aro Gomura, aro labang chikom plengne kido rongpe hel, anali badisi pachilar aro kangho donero apotsi, kijutje me-akar long aduk hlongsi, ango arjan klang wensi do.
Yongta labadi arleng hel ke, lamat mat apharlo chimangkai si, a-ok long pasim man, jortang kido ihut poyok patharak man aro anangyok meng dunde.

Manta aghai ethakpe tharlon Mikhayel po, konam Mosi po abangpo alam si-ik pen chingjesi lam chibat noh, la-amun anangyok ado kolsi kapatharak abisar kipi aha ingwesi, “Hemphu nangtam do.” La ithesi thano.
Manta lahel jipe than un-eh, labangsi patharak man; aro agiyan kangwe okpe hel badi lahel anglang kithan-un apot, ladisi prel-phrot noh.
Anali konbak kaphere memedo; piyok pu tene anali Koyin po badisi kengkam chijoro, aro adat kihlong aphanke Balam po asisik kidun badi duno, aro Korah po pasumseng-ongsi analiyok paprel phrotno.

Lahel nali nengdok cho-jun long ilong cho-jun amun, lang arlo kido si kapaduk arlong natsi; anali bithang yok chipherere phosi chi-al pon man; anali tomon kapangjar pon arwe kangwe inghun badi; anali kichum apor athe kangwe arong hel, phong-ni kithi aro kaching phur arong;
anali abithang katharak aplep kiwangsu langpe wang kitong lang-adul badi; anali kikak-wor klolangso badi; anali phan or-eh len kangting kuk hansisi bido.
Labang ke Adam po para thorok-isi awe Inuk po, anangta anali phan katurki alamthe paharsi kipu, “Langot, Hemphu, anang alakh alakh kangthir arleng helpen wange,

ahuwit ayok bisar ka-ote yok, aro kimengme helyok abithang ahuwit kimengme asal katiki parasi kimeng pangho loh, aro kimengme pap katiki hel anangyok jibadi neng pakeksi kithan, labang ahuwit alam ado hel aporman paklang detne.”
Anali ahul kipawang, abithang adak kapatharak prop, aro abithang kar-ih hel ateng chirli dun; anali angho aborai alam thanman; anali abithang alap aphan angho alamsi anokan padingsi parklamman.
Manta nali, ei nengdok hel, ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo kangthir-adun hel aporong-kipu alamhel nali neng chipurki,
anali naliyok kipu, “Kijut arni abithang kimengme kar-ih badisi kengkam kachijor kachongnek hel wang chiklang nge.”
Anali rat kabhalak, a-ok aneng arleng, Ajiuli weklung inghol le.
Manta nali, ei nengdok hel, nalike abithang yok kangthir kikrol abhiti long nali chirhap, aro Jiuli-Kangthir pen pingkitne, Arnam nengdok chiral not;
aro or-eh len Ajiubong anat, ili Hemphu Jisu Khristo kajinso yok inghongne do.
Aro angkhan, lake neng sohrim abang yok jinso dun;
aro angkhan yok me para nep dunsi pajok; aro a-ok aneng asal para kisim kol ape-rik simsi, angkhan yok ke phere dunsi jinso dunnot.
Minon ke, anangyok kanghophak para kiral yok, aro anang jortang amahang si ado weh nengrong chipadosi kaparjap dun apharan do,

ili Ral Hemphu Jisu Khristo parasi, anangsi ili Ral Hemphu yok, labang ihut det Arnam jortang katha-ang, ajiuli, jakong aro apharan ahuwit awe aporong para, minon hok, aro ahuwit awe ayok pado nang. Amen.

Labang alo posi Jisu Khristo kachiklang kiwi alo; lake bekso adin aphel jibak kachiplang nange do, bangpo Jisu Khristo anang murkiya poyok kapaklang, Arnam anang yok kachiklang alamthe ke anang abithang atharlon yok wangtolsi abithang murkiya Johon poyok parjulo;
anang Arnam-alamthe aro Jisu Khristo nenghong aphan jibak thekngo, labang ahuwit alam hakhi pilo.
Ingho si labang katurki alo alamthe hangsi chiporhe, anang bor-eh choknge; aro inghosi oneh aro lalong kiwi alamthe hel mainot, anali ta bor-eh choknge; piyok pu tene, aporpo adung hetno.
Johon po, Asia alongri kido thorok isi kachikruk yok. Inghosi minon apor, kidamtang apor aro mo phel apor long, Jisu Khristo para, aro anang anghol polong kido thorok-isi ajiuli hel para,
aro kikrol len hakhi, lake kithi hel asitem para kiplangcheng, aro pirthepe athak arecho hel yok kapangdompo inghosi ili yok nengdok, aro abithang awi pensi ili pap hel para ili yok pajok ngo;

aro inghosi ili yok nengdok aro abithang awi pensi ili pap para ili pajok ngo, aro iliyok longri matmat aro abithang Apa Arnam aphansi bangthe otelo, anang jortang aro jakong arni kiwang pado nang. Amen.
Langot, anang inghun pen wangsi do, abangten amek, aro inghosi anangyok tokan kijor, analita anangyok thek hlonge; pirthimipe ahuwit ajat anang anatsi neng aduk doye. Labadi chiplange. Amen.
Inghosi minon apor, kidam tang apor, aro mophel apor, aro apharan kithechot, labang Hemphu kithechot Arnam pudo, “Ne si Kicheng aro Kijut.”
Ne nali korte, aro Jisu badi duk-tap kicho, longri, aro kachihi long nali kachingchong Johon po, Arnam alamthe aro Jisu hakhi aphan, Patmos amen langlom along kido hlong.
Ne Hemphu arni jiuli long kido; aro nephel pongka kibut asi badi akithe asi arju hlongo.

Aro pulo, “Nang jipe kachiklang thek hlongdo ma, bangpo lo-athul long winot, aro Ephisiya, Samirna, Pargaman, Thayatira, Sardis, Philadelphiya aro Laudikiya labang thorok-isi kachikruk long yok hlodun not.”
La-amun neyok lam kithan asipo kilangyok chirtingsi ne thorok-isi ser sati agosa,
aro la sati agosahel asitem Arleng Aso badi ihut yok thek hlongo; anang akeng-tir ayok katolom phlut isi akiding chol chi-iksi kido, aro anang aneng long ser pensi awam kachikok.
Anang phu aro anang chu akilok, bherabik akilok amel aro ingphet badi akilok; anang mek hel me-ade hel badi;
anang kengpak ke, me-aten along karche, klarjosi kido pitol badi; aro anang asike, langjar asi badi.
Aro anang ancho-ari long thorok-isi klolangso kido; anang angho para ipak arangso hini anokjir oleman; aro anang mahang ke abithang apharan pen ka-ole anelo arni asok badi.
Konam anangyok thek hlongo ne kithi badi anang keng-ari long klolo. La-amun anang abithang ancho-ari nebang long batsi pulo, “Phere yek; nesi kicheng aro kijut.”
Aro nelo kihreng-jong po; ne thilo, aro langot, mo-moyok hrengsi do; aro kithi alongta jom alongta asabi hel neri-deng si do.
Minon nang jibak thek hlong ngo, aro jipe do, labang aphel jibak kachiplang ayok honjok do, labang ahuwit winot;

ne ancho-ari aga jipe thorok-isi klolangso hel thekngo, bang hel aro thorok-isi ser sati agosahel kabutisit acho alamthe winot. Labang thorok-isi klolangso hel ke thorok-isi kachikruk hel atharlon, aro thorok isi sati agosa helke thorok-isi kachikruk hel.

“Ephisiya long kido kachikruk atharlon yok nang labang alamthe winot : Inghosi abithang ancho-ari aga thorok-isi chiklolangso otsi do, aro thorok-isi ser-sati gosa hel asitem dam-wangsi do, anang labangpo alamthe thando,

“Nang katiki asalhel ne thek do, nang kachipaduk hap hel thek do, aro kachipaning ding ne thekdo, nang kangho arlengyok chihi un-eh; aro inghosi abithang adunpo puman, manta adunke kalek, analiyok archal tangsi asisik pahlongo;
ne thek do, nang chipaning ding jongsi, nemen anat chihisi lakle yong ngo.
Manta, nangyok ado kikolyok ne lamthe do, nang ango kicheng nengdok tikang ngo.

Lasi nang daklong para jango, labangpo neng chipurki not; aro neng chipharlep si angopo tiki ponot; lale, nangneng chipharleple pu tene, ne nang longyok damsi, nang sati gosapo kido athem long para pondetne.
Layongta Nikolaitas po arleng hel jibak katiki asal ne simman, bangpomar nangta sim do.
Kachikruk helyok ajiulipo jipe alamthe than do, ingho ano do, anang bangpo onenot. Inghosi pirthepe yok hal un, anangyok ne Arnam-alongri long kido ajiuli-arongpe athe nang kichoyok piye.
“Aro Samirna long, kido kachikruk atharlon yok labang alamthe winot: Ingho si kicheng aro kijut, inghosi kithi yongta hreng phakngo,

anang ladi alam thando, nang duk kicho, aro kicho-kangwe ta ne than-un; layongta nangke apuru do; aro inghosi abithang yok Jihudi puman manta Jihudi ke kalek, si-ik arongbong ngo, anali dhorom kapatharak ta ne than undo.

“Nang bekso adin aphel jibak aduk-cho hlonge, labang yok phere yek; langot, naliyok honjat anat, si-ik nali angkhanyok akrol along kibamyok chihonjok do; lalong ni-kep adinyok nali aduk-tap doye. Nang kithiyok ta krolne do not; lalong ne ajiuli phurkup nangyok nangpiye.
Kachikruk helyok ajiuli potsi alam than do, ingho ano do, anang bangpo onenot. Inghosi hal un, anang phong-ni kithi long inghonhe ye.
Aro Pargamam long kido kachikruk atharlon poyok labang alamthe winot: “Inghosi arangso-hini anokjir do, anang labang alam thando, nang daklong do, bangpo ne than-undo;

Dak longsi si-ik anghol do, lalong, aro nemen ensi, neyok kikrol hakhi pilo; nali lalong, si-ik kido athemlong, konam neyok kikrol hakhi kipi Antipas poyok kamari, labang aporta nali kikrol tikangke yongo.

Manta nangyok ado kikol ne lamthe do, nang labang athem long Balam po kapaklang alam kimeng dun arlengyok pado do; anang Israyel asohel ango kapatukung ayok, lake agoya long nibot kipi abhog kapacho tol aro kapado dun-ner yok, Balakh recho yok kapaklang.
Labadisi nangta angkhan Nikolaitan hel kapaklang kimeng dun abang hel mat-matsi pado do.
La-apot nang neng chipharlep mot; lale tene, ne nangdung wangsi, ne angho para ka-ole nokjir analipen chilareye.

Kachikruk helyok ajiuli jipe alam thando, ingho ano do, anang labang oneh not. Ingho si hal un, anangyok ne kabutisit manna piye; aro isi akilok arlong ta anang yok piye; labang arlong athak isi akimi amen kiwiwen do; ki-enpo aparke kaita labang amen chinine.
Aro Theyatira long kido kachikruk atharlon poyok labang alam winot: “Inghosi amek me-ade badi, aro akengpak kinelwet tama badi; Arnam labang Aso ladi alam than,
Nang katiki asal hel, nengdok, kikrol, murkiya asal, kachihi aro nang ango katikiyok ke minon nali tikichot do pusi ne thek do.

Manta nangyok ado-kikole ne lamthe do, nang Jejebel amen arloso pe abithang yok turkipe pusi ne murkiya helyok kachobel, kapadoner yok aro agoya hel kachirdom abhog hel kapacho yok paklang do, anangyok chihisi do.
Aneng kachipharlep yok ne anangyok apor pilo; manta anang abithang anang kangho kidoner para chipharleple yongo.
Langot, ne bangpe yok pasosi pa-ih hetne, aro inghosi anang pen kangho donere, anali abithang kangho katiki para neng chipharleple, tene anali yok ta duk tap-akithe long tiye.
Aro kithipo parasi ne anang sohel yok ta mariye; lalong ne ke aneng aro angthinsi langdo, pusi ahuwit kachikruk hel than unne; aro nali abangten yokta abithang katiki badisi angbanta piye.

Manta nali Theyatira long kiri nali bangkan labang kapaklang en dunde yong, lake angkhan ke bangpe, si-ik ajiu kabuti alam puman labang si-ik ajiu kabuti alam pomar nali inghosi thekthe lang, nali than do, nali phuthak ne kamprek aphang nali pekpe;
manta nali-ri potsi do, ne wangwe lengke bangpo chi-ot thipne do.
Inghosi halsi kijutyok ne katikipomar mainot ponne, ne jibadi Apa para hlongo, labadisi anangyok Bang-ajat hel asitem aphuthak apharan piye;
aro la-amun kumarpo lungle kithep hel abeng-ano kachiplang badi, ladisi anang ingchin atokok pen analiyok pangdom ponne;
aro ne anangyok tudap tha-angklirnak klolangso piye.
Kachikruk helyok ajiulipo jipe alam thando, inghosi ano do, anang labangpo onenot.

Aro Sardis long kido kachikruk atharlon poyok labang alam winot: Inghosi, Arnam thorok-isi ajiuli aro thorok-isi klolangso hel do, anang labang alamthe pudo, “Ne nang sal hel thek do, nang amen chotsosi hrengsi do, manta nangke akithi.”
Thur not; aro kirichok jibak hel thirang-rang ngo; labang yok pangtang pon not; piyok pu tene ne Arnam amahang semsem nang sal kichok phlen pahlonghle yong ngo.

Lasi, nang pot badi en noh, aro arjulo, labang neng chipurkisi, mainot pon not, aro neng chipharlep mot. Piyok pu tene nang thurthe, pu tene ne kanghu badi dame; aro konbak apor nangdung dame, nang than un-eh ye.
Layongta inghosi abithang pe-rik hel chipasimse yongo, Sardis along nang ladi angkhan amen do; analike akilok pe-rik pen nelong kengkam chijore; piyok pu tene anali kamichang abang.
Inghosi hal man, anangta ladi akilok pe-rik pachi-ik nge; aro ne anang ajiuli alo long para anang menpo terekre ye; ne Apa aro anang tharlon amahang semsem ne anang menpo hoi choye.
Kachikruk helyok ajiulipo pot alam thando, inghosi ano do, anang bangpo onenot.

“Aro Philadelphiya long kido kachikruk atharlon poyok labang alam winot: “Inghosi kangthir aro khanangpo, inghosi arideng Dabhit po asabi do, ingho ingpulo pu tene jat inghap un-eh, inghap tene kaita ingpu un-eh;”

“Langot, nali jipe owa jat inghap un-eh, nali sal hel ne thekdo, langot, jipe owa kaita inghap un-eh, ladi isi kangpu owa nali mahang pilo te, nang bekso ajakong do, aro ne lamthe mengot, nemen hoi chocheke dode yong ngo.

Langot! si-ik arongbong arleng hel abithang yok ke Jihudi chipu do, manta Jihudi ke kalek, anali ladi chobelsi puman. Langot, ladi angkhan arlengyok ne nali keng-ri long wansi patarhuk nge; la-amun ne nangyok nengdokman, bangpo nali chithan unne.
Nang ne chipaning-ding alam kimeng apot, potsi honjat apor pirthepe kido helyok kikrol karchal aphan, pirthepe dung aphuthak kiwang yok honjoksi do, labang aporpo para ne ta nangyok nang ral le.
Ne wang dapsi do; nang phurkup kai yokta thipon un-eh ayok, lasi nang pot do, bangpo ot-thipne do.

Inghosi hal un, anangyok ne Arnam ahemlong kido long-eh matsi inghole; la-amun anang aro jatsi mokol damde ye; aro anang thak ne Arnam amen, aro ne Arnam rongpe labang akimi Jerusalem, ethakpe long ne Arnam adung para wang pasunne, anang men, aro nebithang akimi amen wiye.
Kachikruk helyok ajiulipo pot alam pudo, ingho ano do, anang onenot.
Aro Laudisiya long kido kachikruk atharlon poyok labang alam winot: “Inghosi amen, ingho si kikrol aro khanangpo hakhi, inghosi Arnam kasanse cheng, anang labang alam thando,
nang katiki asal hel ne thek do, nang kangsam ta kalek akiso ta kalek. Nang un pu tene akangsam, un-eh pu tene akiso chiplangsi kimechot kido.
Ladisi, nang kisota kalek, kangsam ta kalek, kisopom kido apot, ne bithang angho para nangyok ching-ok phak yok honjoksi do.
Piyok pu tene nang pudo, ne hem kime aro ne puru chihansi lo, ne kanange wepen; manta nangsi ihut atahang kangho, cho-hrek abang, kicho kangwe, aro darang-klung, labang nang than un-eh yong.

La-apot nang hem kime kachiplang yok, mepen karchal ser, aro nang kadarang klungpo katharak chipaklangkle yok, kachi-ik yok pe akiphlan, aro nang mek asarti kihlong yok, mek long kachiti thengkur ne para kapanam tol yok bot-sere nali pido.
Ingho yok ne nengdok, lamehel yok ne ingje do, aro hasti pido. Lasi nang nengrungsi, neng chipharlep.
Langot, ne owa long arjapsi pardengsi doman; inghone bak ne asi arjusi owa ingpu, tene ne anang hem long wangsi anang pen cho-junne, aro anangta ne pen cho-jun hlong nge.
Ne bithang pot badi halsi ne Pa pen anang anghol po athak iningo, ladi, ingho halman, anangyok nepen ne anghol long pang-ninge.
Kachikruk helyok ajiulipo pot alam pudo, inghosi ano do, anang bangpo onenot.

Labang aphel ne langsi thek hlongo, ethakpe long isi owa ingpusi do, aro ne pen lam kachirwal, pongka asi badi, isi asi ne ngo karju, ladi asipen inghone bak pulo, “Holek yok wang ngot; labang aphel potsi chiplang ponne, bangpo ne nangyok paklange.”
La-amun si ne ajiuli long kido; aro langot, ethakpe long isi recho-anghol pangningsi kido, labang anghol long ihutpo iningsi kido;
labang kangning kukpo kihlongkal chepan arong aro ki-erjo arong arlong badi; la angholpo komwolsi mokak kido, kilang athok chepan arlong badi kithek.
Aro labang recho angholpo komwolsi angkol isine phili prek anghol kido; lamehel anghol athak anali aphulong ser aphurkup aro pe akilok kachi-ik angkol isine bang phili sar-larhel iningsi kido.

Aro labang recho angholpo para suneng kabarlang katha-ang kipi, asi, aro akithe suneng kangder dolongman; recho angholpo angot thorok isi metheng-tom lursi kido; labang hel Arnam thorok isi ajiuli hel;

aro labang recho angholpo amahang langpe kathi-ing aina natsi isi langpepe badi thek hlong do; labang recho anghol adung, aro labang recho anghol chikomwolsi jon-phili apei do; lahel ango agak aphel agak amek kido kreng.
Ango akihreng apei poke tike-chalbe po badi; hini kihreng apei ke chorong alo badi; kithom kihreng apei ke arleng badi amahang do; phili kihreng apei ke kangjar mumu awo badi.

Labang jon-phili kihreng apei hel, anali apei tenta awengkong thorok-thorok kido, aro anali long amek hel athak aro arlota pleng klaksi kido; aro lamehel, “Kangthir, Kangthir, Kangthir Hemphu Arnam, anang ajakong kithe chotpo do, aro inghosi minon dojong do, kidamtang, aro mophel kiwangwe po.” ladi pusi anelo, anuwe anali kilun jutje.
Aro konam kihreng apei hel mophel yok kihreng jong kido, inghosi ingholpo athak kangning kukpo yok jortang, aman aro kardom piye;

angkol isine bang phili asar-lar abangke recho anghol athak kangningpo parklamsi, aman pisi, aro kardom pajire, la-amun la angkol isine bang-phili sar-lar hel, labang anghol athak kangningpo ango tarhuksi, mo-moyok kihreng jongpo angot chirdomsi, la angholpo angot abithang phurkup tisi puye,
“O hali Hemphu aro Arnam, nangsi parklam, aman kihlong aro kihal jakong kamichangpo; piyok pu tene ahuwit nangsi sanselo; nang ahisa anatsi labang ahuwit wang ngo; ahuwit sanselo.”
Aro recho anghol athak kangningpo ancho-ari long, arlota anglangta kiwi, aro thorok isi asap kipi isi lo-athul thekngo;
aro ne ihut ajakong kido atharlon thekngo; anang asi akithe pen labang alam kapahar kithek, “Labang lo-athulpo kiphlok yok, aro labang asap hel kapangho ayok kamichangpo ingho te?”
Aro ethakpe long, lale pirthimipe, lale pirthimipe arlo, labang kiwi lo-athulpo kiphlok unyok, lale bangpo kilang ayok kaita kangwe.
Labang lo-athulpo kangpu pon, lale labang kilang kamichang kai-yokta kihlonghle theksi, ne surusi kido.
La-amun ihut akisar ihut neyok thano, “Nang suruyek; langot, potsi Juda ajatpo tike-chalbe, aro Dabhit po agijing, anangsi labang thorok isi asap hel aro lo-athulpo kiphlokyok hal un noh.”

Aro ne labang ingholpo aro phili kihreng apei hel asitem aro sar-larhel asitem ta, kithat ayok kipon Bherabik Aso badi natsi parjap koksi kido thek hlongo; anang anuk hong thorok isi aro amek thorok isi kido; labang ameksi pirthepe dung yok kitol, Arnam thorok isi ajiuli hel.
Anang wangsi recho angholpo athak ining kuksi kidopo anang ancho-ari para labang lo-athulpo en-no.

Aro konam anang lo-athulpo en-no-, labang phili kihreng apei hel aro angkol isine bang-phili sar-lar hel Bherabik Aso amahang semsemsi tarhuk ngo; anali abang ten geng-gong, aro kangthir arleng hel kapingkit mat-mat kanempru hijung paplengsi, ser abati hel kido.

Aro anali lun akimi isi luno, lake, “Lo-athul ki-en yok aro labang asap hel kiphlok yok nangsi kamichang po; piyok pu tene nangyok marilo, aro ahuwit ajat, alam, alongri, aro ajat ten arleng asitem para Arnam aphan anang abithang awipen arleng helyok nam mo;
aro ili Arnam aphan analiyok isi alongri long aro bangthe pangningo; lalong anali pirthimipe athak pangdomme.”
La-aphel ne ango langsi, labang recho anghol, apei hel, aro sar-lar helyok komwolsi, ako-ong Arnam tharlon asi arju hlongo; anali alekha ke ojut para ojut, aro hajar para hajar kido;
aro anali asi akithe pen thano, “Thisi kidam Bherabik Aso si, anangsi kihal ajakong, puru, agiyan, ajakong chot, aman, ajortang aro bor-eh kihlong yok michang do.”

Aro ethakpe long, pirthepe aling, aro langpe long potsi sanse-chanjal abihini, aro labang ahuwit asitem potsi do, lalong ahuwit ladi kipu arjulo; “Recho anghol athak kangning po, aro Bherabik Aso yok bor-eh choksi, aman, jortang pen kihal ajakong mo-mo yok pado nang.”
Aro labang phili akihreng apei hel thano, “Amen.” Aro sar-larhel tarhuksi chirdomo.
Laparake, Bherabik Aso labang thorok isi asap hel isi kangpu ne thek hlongo, la-amun labang phili apei hel ijon ke suneng kangder ateng asipen, “Wangot,” ladi kithan ne arju hlongo.
La-amun ne langsi ijon nosel akilok thek hlongo, aro anang athak karlupo arideng isi batuluk kido; aro anangyok isi phurkup pilo; lalong jongsi anang hal-halsi, olesi damo.
Aro konam anang asap hini long phlokngo aro hi-ni along akihreng apeipe, “wangot,” ladi kipu arju hlongo.

La-amun aro ijon nosel ole lo; anang aki-er sek; aro lake arleng hel ihut para ihut yok mariye, la-anat, lalong karlupo yok, pirthimipe para nengsam kapangwe yok hawang pilo; aro anangyok ipak akithe nokjir pilo.
Aro konam anang asap kithompo phlokngo, la-amun kithom kihreng apeipe, “wangot,” ladi kipu arju hlongo; aro la-amun ijon nosel aki-ik thek hlongo; aro la athak karlupo ari long isi kipun apot kido.

La-aphel jon-phili kihreng apei hel asitem para kiwang asi badi, ladi alam kipu ne arju hlongo, “Iser gom asok ador isi adhuli atheng; ser thom thengthe asok ador isi adhuli atheng; aro jangthu pen rihanthu alang panghon nek.”
Aro konam anang asap phili long phlokngo, la-amun, “wangot,” ladi kipu arju hlong ngo.

Lalong ne langsi, nosel aki-et ijon thek hlong ngo; la-athak karlupo amen kithi; aro jom anang aphel-phel kidun. Aro nokjir, ka-ongkal, kithi, aro pirthimipe long ingnam okpe parasi kamariyok pirthimipe long bhak philine ibhak athak la-hini ayok apharan pilo.
Aro konam anang phongo asappo phlokngo, la-amun inghosi Arnam alamthe aro abithang kapahlong hakhi anat kithi, anali ajiuli athuli arhum long thek hlongo.
Anali asi akithe pen hangsi thano, “O kangthir khanang Hemphu, bisar ka-ote yok, aro pirthepe long kido arleng hel yok hali wi-kipajang kime-kangho athe kipiyok, nang konbak arni pabheme?”
Laparake anali abangten yokta ipak akilok apei pilo; aro anali yok labang alam thano, “Nali pot turu alok aro korte helyok nali badisi mariye, anali alekha chokche lengke, bekso apor inghong ngot.”
La-aphel anang konam asap thorok po phlok ngo, la-amun ne langsi akithe chiklik kiwang thek hlongo; aro amel kido bosta ape badi arnipe aki-ik chiplang ngo; chiklope ahuwit awi badi chiplango;
aro tomon akithe kahujuk dumuru athe kapangjul badi, ladisi suneng chiklo langso hel pirthimipe athak wang pajango;
aro sunengpe, kithul alo badi, pa-ordet no; ahuwit inglong kartul hel aro langlom helyok kido athem para terek detne.
Aro pirthepe long recho hel, kithe arleng hel, thawang, hem kime aro ajakong kido hel, turu abangten aro kijok tang abang, longku aro inglong arlong hel asitem long chibutisi.
Anali labang inglong kartulpe aro arlong helyok pulo, “Hali thak jangne recho angholpo athak kangningpo amahang para, aro la Bherabik Aso akang para haliyok buti not.
Piyok pu tene anali Arnam akang kiwang-arni wang hlengo, aro pot badi do unne?
La aphel pirthimipe athak, lale langpe, lale thengpe hel athak tomon kapajapje ayok, pirthimipe athak phili atomon ot-thipsi, pirthimipe atok phili long arjapsi kido bang-phili atharlon thek hlongo.

La-aphel kihreng ajiuli Arnam asap ensi, arnipe kiwang athem para thursi kiwang prek ihut atharlon thek hlongo; anang asi pathesi, pirthimipe aro langpe yok kapangho yok apharan kihlong labang-phili tharlon yok anang thano,
pulo, “Ili bithang Arnam murkiya hel atahang long asap pipe lengke, nali pirthimipe, lale langpe, lale thengpe hel ayokta pangho yek.
Aro labang asap kipi hel alekha arju hlongo; Israyel ahuwit ajat hel athupsi lakh isine, angkol hinine phili ahajar ayok asap pitang ngo;
Juda ajat ayok asap kipi hajar kere-hini, Ruben po ajatyok hajar kere-hini, Gad po ajatyok hajar kere-hini,
Aser po ajatyok hajar kere-hini, Nepthali po ajatyok hajar kere-hini, Mannase po ajat yok hajar kere-hini,
Simiyon po ajatyok hajar kere-hini, Lebi po ajatyok hajar kere-hini, Isakhar po ajat yok hajar kere-hini,
Jebulun po ajat yok hajar kere-hini, Jusep po ajat yok hajar kere-hini, Benjamin po ajat yok asap kipi hajar kere-hini hlong ngo.
La-aphel ne langsi thek hlongo, ahuwit ason, ajat, arleng, aro alam, akilok ape-rik kachi-ik, kaita alekha en un-eh pho isi rat akithe yok labang recho anghol aro Bherabik Aso ango arjap si do;
anali ari along khajur arwo kido; aro anali asi pathesi hango, “Kijoktang recho anghol athak kangningpo ili Arnam aro Bherabik Aso si.”
Aro ahuwit Arnam tharlon hel, labang recho anghol kithe-kiding hel, aro phili kihreng apei chikomwelsi arjap si kido; anali recho anghol ango chingkuksi, Arnam yok chirdomsi,
pulo, “Amen! Bor-eh kichok, jortang, agiyan, kaparklam, aman, kihal apharan, aro ajakong mophel yok ili Arnam yok pado len nang. Amen.”
La-amun akisar hel ihut ne arkelsi arjulo, “Akilok ape kachi-ik arleng hel ingho te? Aro daklong para anali wang do?”

La-amun ne anangyok thano, “O ne Hemphu, nangsi than undo.” La-amun anang neyok nethano, “Analike la duk-tap akithe para kiwang abang; anali Bherabik Aso awi pen abithang ape-rik chichok si palok ngo.
La-apot si anali Arnam recho anghol angot dosi, anelo-anuwe anang ahemlong long anangyok kachirdom; aro recho anghol athak kangningpo kapadosi anali phuthak abithang kachirdom ahem kemdo.
Anali jatsi ingchirche ye; anali abang long arni tokte ye, lale jatsi lang ik-eh ye;
piyok pu tene recho anghol asitem kido Bherabik Aso si analiyok khokhre chiplange, aro anangsi ajiu kiboilen arlok alangcheng adung yok ponne, aro Arnam anali amekten ahuwit amek-kri wendet bo.”
Konam anang asap thorok isipo phlokngo, ethakpe long ghonta ibeng yok watsi arki ingsam het kido.
Aro Arnam ango arjapsi jibak thorok isi atharlon helyok thek hlongo; aro analiyok thorok isi pongka pilo.

Aro ser hujung methekpo ki-en prek tharlon wangsi, athuli adung arjap mo; aro recho anghol angot kido ser athuli athak ahuwit kangthir arlenghel aphan kapingkit pensi kidojong aphan, analiyok hujung ako-ong pilo.
Lalong kangthir arleng hel kapingkit pensi tharlon arideng para hujung amihik amahang yok ingthuro.
Laparake tharlon athuli para hujung kar-uhpo ensi, lalong me paplengsi, pirthepe athak wang tilo. Lalong suneng kangder, asi badi kido, kar blip-blipsi kabarlang, aro chiklik wang ngo.
La-aphel thorok-isi pongka ki-en la thorok-isi tharlon hel pongka kibutyok abithang chihonjok ngo.

Lapara ke angopo butcheng amun, awi pen chiloksi herel aro me wango, aro lamehel pirthimipe athak wang tilo; aro la-amun pirthimipe bhak thom para ibhak sek detno, thengpe hel bhak thom para ibhak sek detno, aro ahuwit akicham thengpe-thengso helta sek det noh.
Laparake hini atharlonpo pongka kibut amun, me-karsi kido inglong akithe badi pene bak isi langpe long wangti lo;
aro langpe long kido kasanse abihini hel okpe-okthe bhak-thom para ibhak thilo; aro jahaj helta bhak-thom para ibhak pangho det noh.
Lapara ke tharlon kithompo pongkapo kibut amun, isi meklan kikar kido badi isi akithe klolangso suneng para wang jangsi, langjon hel bhak thom para ibhak langjon athak, aro arlok alang athak jango.
Klolangso amen ke Abi; la-amun bhak thom para ibhak alangke abi chiplang ngo; aro lang akiho apot, labang alang anat ako-ong arleng thilo.

Laparake tharlon philipo anang pongkapo kibut amun, arnipe bhak thom para ibhak, aro bhak thom para ibhak chiklope aro bhak thom para ibhak chiklolangso, tangsi khanang bhak thom para ibhak katha-ang wedet noh, aro anuwe ta ladisi chiplango, la apot lamehel amungten long bhak thom ghuniya chiplango.

Laparake ne langsi kido yok ke, ijon wo-mumu kurwak sunengpe asitem ingjarsi isi asi akithe pen labadi alam kithan arju hlongo, “Potsi bang kithom tharlon pongka kibutyok chihonjok do, anali labang kido-er pongka asi anat pirthepe long kido abang ayoh, ayoh, pusi anengduk doye.”
Laparake tharlon bang phongopo anang pongka po kibut apot, suneng parasi pirthimipe yok kijang isi klolangso ne thek hlongo; aro ingting bhang harang long sabipo anang yok pilo.
Laparake klolangso ingting bhang harang phlokngo apot, jom along para me-akar akithe mihik badi mihik ole lo; la-amun la jomlong amihik pensi arni aro sunengpe yok pangting det noh.
Labang mihik para pholong chopurhel pirthimipe long wang ole lo; aro me helyok pirthimipe long chehe-lang bong hel kido apharan badi anali apharan pilo.
Aro pirthimipe long jatsi akicham thengpe arong hel, lale han-bap, lale thengpe arongyok paduk de si, ingho atahang long Arnam asappo weye, analiyok detsi kapaduk yok, lahelyok thano.

Analiyok kamariyok ke kalek, manta chiklo jon phongo yok duk-tap kapahlong aphan, anali yok apharan pilo. Chehe-lang bong akujuk arleng helyok kisakjok amun pot badi aduk-tap, lamehel aduk-tap labadi.
Aro labang arnilong arleng hel kithi ayok ar-iye, yongta bangpo jatsi hlonghle ye; anali kithi ayok inghong dinge, manta anali para kithipo ingjare.
Labang pholong hel athok, dhawa along kahonjok noselhel badi kido; anali phu-athak ser-phurkup badi arje kido thekman; anali mahang helke munusi amahang badi.
Aroloso achu badi anali achu kido; anali angho-aso helke tike-chalbe aso badi kido.
Aro anali neng along ingchin achong badi anali nengdip detsi kido; aro anali awengkong pomar asi, dhawa ayok kidam nosel gari ako-ong kikat asi badisi.
Chehe-langbong hel badi anali armel aro akujuk kido; aro chiklo jon-phongo yok arlengyok kapadukyok anali apharan anali armel long do.
Jom along atharlon po anali phuthak kilang recho kido; anang Hibru alampen amenke Abadon, Grik alam pen amenke Apolyon (lake Kapangho).
Ango kaphere memepoke damo; langot, hini kaphere-meme hel kiwangme do lang.
Laparake tharlon thorok po anang pongkapo butno apot, Arnam ango kido ser athuli anuk phili helpara isi asi kiwang ne arju hlongo;
lalong para pongka ki-en tharlon thorok poyok thano, “Euphrates, langjonpe adung potsi bang-phili tharlon komklaksi do, analiyok phlok ngot.”
La-amun arleng helyok bhak thom para ibhak arleng kamari ayok, potsi bang-phili tharlon helyok labang apor, arni, chiklo aro anengkan hel aphan honjok wenne kibihel analiyok hlolo.
Nosel athak karlu kachilare sunturi alekka hajar hini alakh kido; anali labang alekha ne arju hlongo.

Aro ne pharlo long ne labang noselhel aro la athak arlusi kido abangyok, ladi thek hlongo; anali neng achong hel me karsi, manik, aro gondhok detsi; aro nosel aphuhel, tike-chalbe hel aphu badi; anali angho para me, mihik aro gondhok oleman.
Anali angho para ka-ole me, mihik aro gondhok, labang kithom kiso awurhel parasi bhak thom para ibhak arleng mari lo.
Piyok pu tene la nosel hel apharan, anali angho long aro arme along si do; piyok pu tene anali armehel ke phurul badi, aro aphu-do; labang popen arleng yok pachangman.

Labang kiso awurhel para thithene kiri munusi helyok marire yongot, anali ke, thek hlonge, arju hlonge, aro kiklem un-eh pho ladi ser, pitol, arlong, aro thengpe pen kithep agoya, aro arnam helyok kachirdom tikangke aron anatsi abithang katiki asal para anali neng chipharleple yong ngo.
Aro anali arleng kamari, anali bhiliki, anali kangho kidoner lale kachunghu, lamehel parata neng chipharleple yongo.
Aro inghun kachi-ik kamprek ihut ajakong kido tharlon yok, ne ethakpe para wang kisun thek hlongo; anang aphulong apumpak mokak kido; anang amahang arnipe badi, aro anang keng kikar me-ade badi.
Anang ari-long ipak asosi kipur ham lo athul kido. Aro anang ancho-ari akengpo langpe long, debera-ari akengpo ke bam athak bilo,
aro tike-chalbe kangreng asi badi hang-wongo; anang kangreng apot, suneng kangder thorok isi ta asi ole lo.
Aro konam thorok isi suneng kangder asi olelo, ne kiwiyok chihonjok ngo; la-amunsi ethakpe para isi asi arjulo, “Suneng kangder asap thorok isi pot pulo, aro lamehel asap pamne bi, aro wi ke biyek.”
La-aphel langpepe aro lungle athak arjapsi kido pot tharlon thek hlongo, anang sunengpe yok abithang ancho-ari rungsi, sunengpe aro lalong potsi do,
pirthimipe aro lalong jibak do, langpe aro lalong jibak do, labang ahuwit kasanse mo-moyok kihreng jong kidopo, anang men ensi seme-tangsi pulo te, “Abhem dode ye;
manta thorok isi tharlonpo pot aporsi pongka kibut ayok chihonjok nge, labang kibut amun, Arnam kabutisit acho alamthe, anang murkiya la turkihel, analiyok kaparju a-odi kime atengsi pachoknge.”
Laparake ne karju hlong ethakpe para kithanposi ne pen thanphak si thano, “Langpe, aro lungle athak arjapsi kido la tharlonpo ari long jipe kipur lo-athul do, nang damne bangpo en not.”

La-amunsi ne la tharlonpo adungyok damsi anangyok pulo,“Aso lo athulso neyok nepi not.” La-amun anang neyok pulo, “En not, bangpo chodet not; bangpo nang pok arlo akiho ye, manta angho longke piyo alang badi dok nge.
La-amun ne tharlonpo arideng para la aso lo-athulso ensi, ne cholo; bangpo ne angho long piyo alang badi ahowat kihlong; manta bangpo yok kicho aphel, nepok arlo ke akiho chiplango.
Laparake neyok pulo, “Nang ako-ong ajat, ako-ong arleng, ako-ong alampen aro ako-ong rechohel adak nang iphong turki alamthe pahar phak nange.”
Laparake ihong tokok badi kipun ingchin neyok pilo, aro neyok kithan, “Thurnot, nang Arnam ahem, nebot kipi athuli, aro lalong kachirdom abangyok apun-pan en.

Manta Arnam mokol sotal tikangne, bangpo yok pun-nek; piyok pu tene bangpo Bang-ajat helyok pi tango; la-amun anali angkol-hinine chiklo jon-ni ayok kangthir rongpe yok dong dam me. Aro ne bang-hini hakhi ayok ne apharan piye;
lalong anali bosta kangrak ape chi-iksi, hajar isine, pharo hinine, angkol kithom adin turki alamthe pahareh.”
Anali pirthimipe Hemphu angot arjapsi kido jolphai arong rongni, aro sati kibi gosa hini mat-mat noh.
Anali yok inghone bak kapangho yok ron do, tene anali angho para me olesi anali hutur helyok pasek man; aro inghone bak analiyok pangho rondo, tene ladisi anang anali yokta mari ye.

Anali turki alamthe kapahar adin arni arwe pajangjeye, sunengpe kahangar yok anali ladi ajakong do; aro phong kansi langyok awi ka-ote yok aro ahuwit kapaso yok pirthimipe long kapaduk anali ar-ih ye, la-ateng kapaso yok anali ajakong do.
Anali konam abithang hakhi kipi pa-ore, la-amun la jom para potsi a-okpe wange, bangpo analipen dhawa chilaresi, anali yok halsi mari phrotne.
La-amun Sodum aro Ijip ladi ajiuli kido amen kido jipe arong pe long anali Hemphu yok kros long taro, la rongpe aduwar long anali kithi abang hel tirulsi do ye.
Ahuwit prek-prek arleng, ason, alam aro ajat arleng ne-thom adap ayok anali kithi abang pomar lang-langsi doye, aro analiyok thiri along papep hlonghle ye.

Aro pirthimipe athak kido abang anali thak nengrong chipado ye, aro ihut para ihut yok aro nengsam pen banta chipajireh; piyok pu tene la bang-hini turkihel pirthepe athak kido abang ayok duk-tap pisi kido.
Manta ni-thom adap aphel, Arnam para analiyok ajiu asithe wang kilut aphel, anali abithang akengpen arjap mo; la-amun inghosi analiyok langsi kido, anali chiphere dero.

La-aphel anali abithang yok kachipu labang ethakpe alamthe arju hlongo, “Holek yok nali ingthurne wang ngot.” La-amun anali inghun aplang pen ethakpe long yok ingthursi damo; aro anali hutur hel anali yok langsi kido.
Labang aporsi chiklik akithe wang ngo; la-amun rongpe long bhak kep para ibhak jangrop mo; aro la chiklik parasi hajar thorok-isi arleng thilo; aro kiri aholke pheredetsi, ethakpe Arnam yok parklamo.
Ladisi kaphere meme hinipo arpat noh; langot, kaphere meme kithompo wang dapsi do.

Laparake thorok-isi tharlonpo anang pongkapo kibut apot, ethakpe long lamehel alam asi-akithe wangsi pulo, “Labang pirthimipe alongri, ili Hemphu aro anang Khristo alongri chiplang ngo; aro anang mo-mo ayok recho-chosi pangdom me.”
Aro Arnam ango abithang recho anghol long iningsi kido la angkol-isine bang-phili sarhel Arnam yok phu-chingkuk phrongsi pulo,
“O minon dojong, kidam tang, aro Hemphu Arnam kithe chotpo, hali nang yok kardom pajirdo; piyok pu tene nang bithang akithe kihal-ajakong ensi, kapangdom yok en noh.”

Aro Bang-ajat hel neng kikang, aro nang akang apor wango, aro kithi hel bisar-kahonthe yok, aro nang murkiya turki helyok, aro kangthir abangyok, aro nang menpen kaphere akithe-akibek ahuwityok banta piponsi, aro pirthimipe yok kapangho helyok kapa-or apor wang hlengo.”
Laparake ethakpe long kido Arnam ahem duwar ingpulo; la-amun suneng kabarlang, asi, suneng kangder, chiklik, aro herel akithe wang jango.
Laparake ethakpe long isi akithe asin chiklang ngo; arnipe ayok kachi-ik, aro kengpak along chiklope dosi, aro aphulong kere-hini phurkup kachi-ik, ladi ihut arloso chiklango; anang apok aso kido;
aro aso paplang ayok apok-abi dolet si hang chersi kido.
Aro ethakpe along prek isi asin chiklang ngo; langot, thorok isi aphu, hong kep anuk, aro aphulong thorok isi phurkup kido, ladi ijon aki-er akithe phurul chiklango.

Anang armepo ethakpe chiklolangso hel bhak-thom para ibhak pajang detsi, pirthimipe athak wang tilo. Aro so ihut paplang yok kahonjok la arlosope so kiplang jong-jongsi, labang phurulpo anangyok kichodet ayok anang phelsi arjapsi kido.
Laparake labang arlosope ihut aso paplango; anang ingchin atokok pen si ahuwit ajat yok pangdom me; labang Asoyok Arnam aro anang recho angholpo adungyok pangthursi pon noh.
Aro labang arlosope hajar isine, phoro hinine, angkol kithom arniyok pathe-pading aphan, jipe ingnam long Arnam parasi honjoksi kibi anang athem isi do, labang ingnam alongyok kat hrolsi damo.
Minon ethakpe long dhawa chiklango; Mikhayel po pen anang tharlon hel phurulpo pen chirbulo; aro labang phurulpo ta anang tharlon hel pen chilare loh.
Manta phurulpo, aro anang tharlon helta dhawa chilare loh, manta remo; aro ethakpe long anali phanke athem aro hlonghle yong ngot.

Aro labang phurul akithe poyok, lake si-ik salchakpo aro si-ik pusi kachitha-ang, atono aphurulpo bharasot yok kachobel manpo, anangyok pirthimipe longyok wangti lo; aro labang atharlon helyokta anangpen wangti lo.

La-amun ne ethakpe long asi akithe pen kipu labang alam arju hlongo, “Minon kijoktang, ajakong, aro Arnam longri, ili Arnam, aro apharan anang Khristo arideng dolo; piyok pu tene ili kortehel pot ado ensi anelo-anuwe ili Arnam ango analiyok ado kolman, bangpo yok wangti lo.
Aro anali Bherabik Aso awi, aro anali abithang hakhi alamthe parasi bangpo halpen noh; anali kithi yokta abithang ajiu chipangwe detno.

Lasi, O ethakpe aro lalong kido abang, nali nengrong chipado; manta O pirthimipe aro langpe, nali konbak pherememe do ye; piyok pu tene si-ik nali dungyok wang sun noh; aro anang apor beksosi kido thek si, anang akang pensi do.
La-aphel phurulpo abithangyok pirthimipe long wang kiti theksi, aso kapaplang labang arlosope yok honjat pilo.

Manta labang arlosope ingnam ajuyok abithang athem long kangjar yok, anangyok akithe mumu arweng hi-ni pilo; labang athemlong labang phurulpo amahang para kaholo yok, bekso apor, apor dingsi, ibeng aporyok kachiralyok ingjarsi damo.
Laparake labang aphurulpo, labang arlosope yok kiboi alang long panglang pon yok, abithang angho para langjon badi lang paboi si padamo.
Manta pirthepe arlosope yok ral loh, abithang angho ingkosi, phurulpo kapaboi langjon alangpo jol det noh.
La-amun phurulpo labang arlosope ayok nengkang-ongsi, anang agijing kiri ahol, lake Arnam kithan alam kimeng abang, aro Jisu hakhi pisi karjap abang pen dhawa kachilare yok olesi damo;
aro damsi, langpe akung sangtel along arjapsi dodam mo.
Laparake ne langpe para ijon okpe yok ingthursi kiwang thek hlongo; anang anuk hong-kep, aphu thorok-isi kido, anukten long phurkup kido, aro aphuten long Arnam kapatharak angkhan amen kido.

Labangpo a-okpe thek hlongo, bangpo ijon tike-thengpak po badi; akeng pak poke tho-am akeng badi; aro tike-mungchal po badi anang angho; aro phurulpo abithang ajakong, abithang recho anghol, aro apharan-kithe okpe yok pi loh.
La-aphel okpe aphu isi, kithi ateng kichangpo thek hlongo; manta labang kithi ateng kichang amekpo pame tang aphel, bharasot kido labang a-okpe alam asombhik hlongo.
Aro phurul poyok chirdom mo, piyok pu tene anang okpe poyok abithang apharan pi loh; aro anali okpe poyok ta chirdomsi pulo, “Labang okpe ateng inghote do? Anang pen inghote chilare unne?”
Bangpo aborai alam kithan aro Arnam yok kapatharak alamthe kithan angho pi loh, aro angkol-hini achiklo yok ladi asal katiki yok ajakong pi loh.

La-amun anang abithang angho pen, Arnamyok ado kikol Arnam yok kapatharak alamthe pensi, anang men, aro anang kido athem, lake ethakpe kido ahuwit ayok kapatharak alampen, anang men, aro anang kido athem, lake ethakpe kido ahuwityok patharak si dolo.
Aro kangthir arleng helpen chilare si, anali yok kihal ayok anangyok jakong pilo. Aro ajat, arleng, alam, aro ason hel aphuthak anang yok aphang pi loh.
La-amun pirthepe kahurji ango para kamari Bherabik Aso Ajiu-Alo polong inghosi amen wiwe-yong, pirthimipe long kido ahuwit arleng anangyok chirdome.
Inghosi ano do ma anang pa-one nang;

inghone bak yok akrol-kibi aphansi nep pon tene, anang akrol kido yok dam me; inghone bak nokjirpen kithi nange doh, tene anangta nokjirpen thiye, holek kangthir arleng hel kachipaning ding aro kikrolpo do.
La aphel Bherabik Aso badi anuk hini kido, aro phurul badi lam kithan prek ijon a-okpe pirthepe para kangthur thek hlongo.
Anang ango a-okpe ahuwit apharan anang amahang semsemsi sal-salap ponman; aro potsi ango okpe kithi ateng amek pame tango, pirthimipe aro lalong kido ahuwit, anang yok pachirdom man.
Aro kamprek akithe asin paklangsi; yongta arleng amahang semsem si ethakpe para pirthimipe longyok me-wangpasun man.

Ladisi labang okpe amahang semsem si, potsi asin kapaklang apharan anangyok pilo, bangpo parasi anang pirthimipe kido abang yok kachobe pawangman; labang ke, ango cheng kihreng a-okpe nokjir para kichang amek hlong yongta hrengphak ngo, labangpo isi agoya kithep yok pirthimipe long kido abangyok pulo.
Aro labang okpe la agoya poke lam than un, aro konbak arleng la okpe agoya poyok chirdomde ye, analiyok ke mariphrot unne, lasi okpe agoya poyok ajiu-asithe kipi-un apharan anangyok pilo.
Lalong anang aso-akithe, hem-kime pen kicho-kangwe, kijok pen aturu, la-ahuwit ancho arilong lale atahang long asap papi lo;
lasi labang asap, lake okpe amen, lale anang amen alekha inghosi ingjong, anangyok ladi ote loh, anang kijor-kihrep aro tiki un-eh ye.
Holek long agiyan alamthe do; ingho abudi do, anang la okpe alekha pa-en nang; piyok pu tene labang arleng alekha; aro la alekha pharo thorokne, kep thorokne, thorok.

La-aphel ne langsi thek hlong ngo, la Bherabik Aso Jayon anglong kartulpe athak arjapsi kido; aro anangpen lak isine, angkol hinine phili hajar arleng kido; anali atahang hel athak anangmen aro anang Apa amenta wisi kido.
La-aphel ne ethakpe para, ako-ong lang asi badi, aro suneng kangder asi badi isi asi akithe arju hlongo; ne karju labang asipo ke geng-gong kithep abang anali geng-gong kithep asi badi;

aro anali labang recho anghol ango la phili kihreng apei ango aro sar-larhel angota isi akimi alun lun do; pirthimipe para namsi ki-en la lakh isine kep philine phili ahajar arleng aparke, prek kaita labang alun chirli un-eh yong ngot.

Piyok pu tene mehel ke abithang arloso pen kangho donerne yongot. Labang Bherabik Aso daklong damman, analita anang aphel-phel lalongyok dunman; Arnam aro la Bherabik Aso aronsi ango athe pusi, anali munusi hel asitem para namsi wano.
Aro anali angho long isi asisik alamthe pahlonghle yongo; anali ado wepen.

Laparake suneng asitem prek ihut ethakpe tharlon kangjar thek hlong ngo, anang pirthepe athak kido abang, lake ahuwit ason, ajat ten, alam ten, aro arleng angot kapaharyok or-eh len kime-alamthe hlongsi,

asi kithepen thano, “Arnam yok pheresi, anang jortang hoi chonot; piyok pu tene anang bisar-kahonthe apor wang hleng ngo; aro ethakpe, pirthimipe, langpe aro arlok alang hel, labang ahuwit kahurjipo yokne chirdom mot.
La-aphel prek hini tharlonpo anang aphel-phel dunsi pulo, “La Babilon abithang kangho kidoner, akang mat-matsi asok ahor ahuwit ason yok kapajun, la-akithe Babilon jango, jango.”
Laparake prek kithom tharlonpo ihut, anang aphel-phel arting-worsi, asi pathesi pulo, “Inghone bak labang okpe aro anang agoya poyok chirdom, aro abithang atahang lale arilong asap enman,

ananlita Arnam akang kido hor alang-han long anang potsi akang asok ahor palok-lesi honjoksi bido, bangpo anangta junne; aro kangthir tharlon amahang semsemsi aro la Bherabik Aso amahang semsemsi, me aro gondhok long aduk choye;
anali aduk kicho amihip mo-moyok angsong ujelo; aro lamehel la apei aro anang agoya ayok chirdomo, aro inghosi anang asappo eno, anelo-anuwe anali jat sang hlonghle.”
Holek, Arnam kithan alam aro Jisu kikrol kimeng kangthir hel kachipaning-ding thek hlongo.

Aro labang ethakpe alamthe asi arju hlongo, “Winot, minon para inghosi Hemphu long thido, la kithi hel bor-eh chokdo; oik, jiulipo thando, anali abithang kachipaduk para kisangpo hlong nge; piyok pu tene anali sal katiki analipen angdun man.”
Laparake ne langsi iplang inghun akilok, aro inghun athak ihut Arleng Aso badisi ihut yok iningsi kido thek hlongo; anang phulong ser phurkup, aro arilong nok ke kire-set ipak kido.

La-aphel Arnam ahempo para prek ihut tharlonpo wang olesi, inghun athak kangningpo yok asi pathesi pulo, “Nang nok-ke ensi sok rot not; piyok pu tene kirot apor wang hlengo; piyok pu tene pirthimipe athak asok hel men det noh.”
La-amun inghun athak kangning po pirthimipe athak anang nok-ke bilo; ladisi pirthimipe asok rot noh.
Aro ethakpe long kido Arnam ahempo para aro ihut tharlonpo wang chiklang ngo; aro anangta arideng nok ke kire ipak kido.

La-aphel prek ihut tharlon, lake me-athak apharan kihlongpo nibot kipi athuli para olesi; bang kire nok ke ki-en poyok asi akithe pen hangsi pulo, “Nang kire anuk keppo ensi pirthimipe long rihanthu athe achongka hel rotsi pangrum mok, piyok pu tene labang rihanthu hel menno.”
La-amunsi la tharlonpo pirthimipe athak abithang nok ke pensi, pirthimipe long rihanthu athe achongka hel rotsi pangrumsi, Arnam akang mat-mat kisor long wang tilo.
Aro rongpe para mokol along alang kisoryok dong ngo apot, kisor para awi olesi, nosel alagam ateng partulsi, phoro hi-ni amayel yok boisi dammo.
Laparake ne ethakpe long prek isi asombhik kithe asin, lake thorok-isi awur aphuthak apharan kihlong thorok-isi tharlon thek hlongo; labang hel kijut awur; piyok pu tene lamehel Arnam akang jutman.

La-aphel me chiloksi ka-ole ipak aina badi langpe ne thek hlongo; aro inghosi la okpe, aro labang agoya, aro anang amen alekha athak halpen noh, analiyok Arnam ageng-gong ensi la aina naksi langpe akung arjapsi kido ne thek hlongo.
Aro anali, Arnam amurkiya Mosi po alun, aro la Bherabik Aso alun lunsi pulo: “O jakong dochot Hemphu Arnam, nang sal-katiki thechot aro asombhik; o binong Recho, nang duwar dhorom aro khanang.
O Hemphu, ingho te nang pherere ye? Aro nangmen jortang pipe ye? Piyok pu tene nangdetsi kangthir; piyok pu tene, dhorom asal pachiklan no apot, ahuwit ason hel nang ngot chirdomme.”
La-aphel, ethakpe long kido hakhi-kuntulu ahem kangpu ne thek hlong ngo;
La-amun la arnam ahem para la thorok-isi kiso awur aphuthak apharan kihlong thorok-isi tharlon wang chiklang ngo; anali ingthir-et aro akar-kido monik chi-ik wetsi, aro ser achong kachibam thip kido.
Laparake labang jon phili a-okpe ijon ke la thorok-isi atharlonpo yok mo-moyok akihreng Arnam akangpen plengsi kido thorok-isi ser bati pilo.
Arnam apharan aro kihal-ajakong para kiwang mihik pen Arnam ahempo pleng detno; aro la bang thorok-isi tharlon hel thorok-isi kiso awur or-eh leng ke, kaita Arnam ahem long lut dam un-eh yongo.
Laparake kachirdom ahem para labang thorok-isi tharlon hel yok kipu labang lam kithan asi akithe ne arju hlongo, “Nali damsi, Arnam akangpo thorok-isi bati pirthimipe long dung ngot.”
La-amun ango atharlon poke damsi, pirthimipe athak anang batipo thokngo; lalong la okpe asap kido aro anang agoya kachirdom arleng hel abanglong kiso-ong chirchi un-eh pho amek wango.
Laparake tharlon hinipo langpe long batipo dung ngo. La-amun labang kithi arleng awi badi chiplang ngo; aro ahuwit akihreng okpe hel, lake langpe long kido ahuwit thilo.
Laparake tharlon kithompo langjon aro arlok alang athak anang batipo dung ngo aro anali awi chiplango.
Latangsi lang atharlonpo labang alam kipu arju hlongo, “O minon, kido aro ingho kido, aro kangthirpo, anang bisar-kangthirpo, la-anatsi nang ladi bisar pilo.
Piyok pu tene anali kangthir arleng aro turkihel awi pajang ngo; lalongsi nangta analiyok kijunyok awi pilo; anali bangpo michangdo.”
Laparake athulipo para labangpo alam kipu asi arju hlong ngo, “O jakong-thechot Hemphu Arnam Kithe, nang bisar-agiyan hel khanang aro dhorom.
Laparake tharlon philipo arnipe athak anang batipo dung ngo; aro arlengyok mepensi pangdak yok anangyok apharan pilo.
La ako arleng hel me kangdak para seksi, labang kiso awur aphuthak ajakong kido Arnam amenyok anali hao pilo, anali jortang hoi kichoyok neng chipharleple yongot.
Tharlon phongopo okpe anghol athak anang bati po dungo; la amun okpe anang alongri ingting klak ngo; aro anali aneng kadoho anat abithang ade chikor-ro;
Aro abithang aneng kadoho aro abang amek abi anat ethakpe Arnam yok hao pilo, abithang katiki asal para neng chipharleple yongot.
Laparake tharlon thorok po Euphrates langjon kithe long anang bati dungo; la ako neneng aga para kiwang rechohel aduwar kahonjok yok, labang langjon kreng detno.
Laparake labang phurul angho para, okpe ango para, aro turkihel asisik hel angho para sarkatik athok naksi kithom si-ik olesi kiwang thek hlongo.
Anali si-ik, asombhik asin kapaklang; lahel ajakong chot Arnam la-akithe arni ronyok bharasot recho helyok kapangrum aphan anali dungyok olesi daman.

“Lang ngot, ne kanghu badi wangsi do. Inghosi ahari hlong-etsi doman, aro la-amun anang pe-rik wephoke artingte ye, aro anang chitharak thekthe, la-anat abithang pe-rik chibiman, anang bor-eh chokman.
La-aphel anali Hibru alam pen Armagedon kipu isi athem long rechohel yok inan pangrum mo.
Aro la-aphel tharlon thorok-isi po suneng along anang bati dungo; lalong la Arnam ahem aro recho anghol para la-kithe alamthe wango, “Patango.”
Lalong suneng kabarlang, asi, aro suneng kangder; aro pirthimipe long munusi karjap arni parasi phere meme aro chiklik akithe wango, ladi chiklik jatsi chiplangple lang, ladi chiklik akithe wango.

La-amun rongpepe bhak thom chiplang ngo, aro ahuwit Bang-ajat arongpe hel jangdetno; aro Arnam akang mat-mat hor plengsi kijun alanghanpo Babilon rongpe yok kipi aphan, Arnam amahang semsemsi bangpo neng chipurkilo.
Aro ahuwit langlom akithe hel chilutno, inglong kartul hel ta aro thek hlonghle yong ngo.
Aro arleng hel athak, suneng para kilo kep phongo alin kido akithe arwe herel jango; labangpo arwe herel aduk kipi awur anat arleng hel Arnam yok hao pilo; piyok pu tene labang awurpo akithe pen.

Laparake la thorok-isi bati ki-en bang thorok-isi atharlonpo para ihutpo wangsi nepen lam chithansi pulo, “Wangot, ako-ong langjon athak iningsi kido la kangho kidonerpe ado kipi nangyok nang paklang bang.
Pirthimipe arecho hel pot badi kidonerpe pen kangho dodun nero, aro bangpe kidoner asok ahor parasi pirthimipe kido helyok pangrilo,”

La-amun anang neyok ajiulipen ingnam ajuyok nepono. Lalong Arnamyok kapatharak amen papleng si, aro thorok-isi aphu, hongkep anuk kido ijon aki-er arohon okpe athak iningsi kido ihut arloso thek hlongo.

Labang arlosope hapek aro aki-er sek ape kachi-ik, ser alek rol, aro ador-ong muni chi-iksi kido; aro bangpe ari long kisim meme abihini pen, aro bangpe kangho kidoner mat-mat aninik kipleng, ser langhan anang ari long kido.
Aro anang atahang athak ladi acho amen wisi kido, “Babilon aghai, pirthimipe kangho kidoner abang aro simeme abihini hel apeipe.
Aro la arlosope ayok kangthir arlenghel awilong, aro Jisu hakhi pisi kithi hel awi kijun ne thek hlong ngo.

Labangpe yok thek hlongsi, ne asombhik hlong ngo. La-amun la tharlonpo neyok pulo, “Nang piyok asombhik hlong detno? Labang arloso pe aro bangpe yok ki-en-wor la thorok-isi aphu aro hongkep anuk kido okpe acho ne nangyok thando;

nang pot okpe yok thek hlong ngo, anang kido, manta nonjong ke ingjong ngot; anang jom ahem para wangsi, kiprel athemyok kidam chihonjok do. Aro bharasot kapangning para ajiu-alo long inghosi amen wiwe-yong, ladi pirthimipe kido abang konam la okpe yok thek hlonge, te anang kido, manta nonjongke ingjong, la-aphel wang hlenge, la-amun anali asombhik hlonge.
“Holek agiyan kido anengpo do. La thorok-isi aphu hel thorok isi inglong, labang athak arlosope iningsi do, mehel bang thorok-isi recho;
anali bang phongoke jango, ihutke minonhok do, aro prek ihutpo wangwe lang; layongta anang bekso aporsi dohlonge.
Aro anang okpe kido, manta minon jongke ingjongot, anangsi Recho hinarkep po, aro la bangthorok-isi adak ihutpo, anangke kiprel yok dame.
Aro nangkithek anuk kep poke bang kep arecho; anali ke minon longri hlonghle lang; manta ghonta isi aphan okpe pen kilangyok ajakong hlonge.
Anali bang kepta chirwalsi, abithang ajakong aro apharan la okpe yok piman.

Anali Bherabik Aso pen dhawa chilare ye; manta Bherabik Aso analiyok hal le, piyok pu tene anang Hemphu yokta Hemphu lo, aro Recho yok ta Recho, aro anang pen kido abang yokta kataram, aro karwal tang, aro kikrol abang.”
Anang neyok thanoo, “Nang jipe ako-ong langjon thek hlongo, lake daklongsi kodoner pe iningsi do, la-alangjon helsi ako-ong arong bong, arleng hel, ason hel, aro alam arleng hel.
Aro nang kithek hlong anuk hong-kep aro okpe kangho kidoner arlosope yok simme, aro bangpe yok jangre aro pe-rik weklongsi, anang a-ok cho ye, aro anangyok aro bangpe yok me along pasek detne.
Piyok pu tene Arnam alamthe chokche lengke, anang neng kar-ih pachok yok, aro isi aneng pen anali abithang alongri okpe yok kipiyok, Arnam anali aneng rungo.
Aro nali potsi arlosope yok thek hlongo, bangpe pirthimipe arecho hel aphuthak kapangdom aghai rongpe.”
Labang aphel ne prek ihut pharan-kithe kihlong tharlon poyok ethakpe para wang kisun thek hlongo; anang haldongsi pirthimipe dungsi patha-ango.
Aro anang asi pathesi taramo, “Jango, Babilon arongpe jango, aro si-ik hel kido athem, aro ahuwit akisim ajiuli kibeng athem, aro ahuwit akisim awo kibeng akhanghara chiplango.

Piyok pu tene ahuwit ajat hel bangpe kangho kidoner akang asok ahor parasi pangholo; pirthimipe arechohel bangpe pen kangho donero, aro bangpe puru ong-ongsi pirthepe kijor-kihrep abang ta ahem chipamelo.”
La-aphel labadi kithan prek isi ethakpe asi arju hlongo, “Ei ne arleng hel, nalike bangpe katiki apap chingchong dunek, aro bangpe kipi awur abhak pahlongek, lasi bangpe parake wang olenot.
Piyok pu tene bangpe apap hel sunengpe yok tokdam klokngo; aro bangpe katiki ado hel Arnam neng chipurkilo.

Bangpe pot badi pilo, nalita labadi bangpe yok angban pinot, aro bangpe katiki ateng phong-ni pa-ong angban pinot. Aro bangpe jipe alanghan kijun honjokngo, labang alanghan long nalita bangpe yok phong-ni langhan pachilarne kijun honjokpi not.

Anang konbak aboraido aro puru kapangrum, bangpe yok lateng abilai aro neng-aduk pinot, piyok pu tene bangpe aneng long thando, “Ne rechope chiplangsi iningsi do, ne himepe kalek, ne nengduk adin jat chithek hlonghle ye”
Lasi, kithi, neng-aduk, ka-ongkal, bangpe la-ahuwit awur inirsi detsi wanghlenge, aro bangpe yok mepen paseknge; piyok pu tene bangpe yok bisar kipi Hemphu, Arnam anangyok jakong dochot.”
Aro pirthimipe jibak ke arecho hel, bangpe pen kangho donersi aro puru kapa-ong, anali konam bangpe yok me-kapasek amihik theknge, la-amun bangpe aphan suru ye,
aro bangpe duk-kicho kaphere anatsi akaholo long arjapsi puye, “Ayoh, ayoh Babilon rongpepe, jakong kihal arongpe. Nang kaphere meme do, piyok pu tene ghonta isi longsi nang bisar ado hlonge.”
Aro pirthimipe long kijor-kihrep abang bangpe anat suru do aro neng chipaduk do,

piyok pu tene anali kijor-kihrep abihini, lake ser, rupa, lek rol, muni, kang-ar ape, hapek arong ape, honki ape, aro aki-ersek ape, ahuwit thengpe, ingnar angi apot hel, ahuwit ador chot thengpe, tama, ingchin,
marbol arlong apot hel, theng kiching, mosola, dhup aro hijung, hor aro jangthu, ata aduk, gom, bherabik, nosel labadi okpe, gari, roth, turu aro munusi ajiuli, anali la ahuwit abihini kaita namnelo,
“Nang jiulipo kar-ih athehel nang para damo, aro ahuwit kilangme aro aklar abihini hel nang arideng para ingbo detno; arleng ke lamehel aro jatsi hlong phakphe ye.”
Labang ahuwit abihini pensi jipe kijor-kihrep arleng hel bangpe parasi apuru chipa-ongsi damo, anali bangpe aduk-kipi kapheresi akaholo arjap si, surusi aro nengduk dosi puye, inghosi
aro puye, “Ayoh, ayoh, kang-ar ape aro hapek arong ape, aro ersek ape chi-ikman, aro ser-lek, ador-ong monik, labang hel chi-ikman.

Piyok pu tene ghonta isi awak alongsi anang ahuwit apuru panghon detne.” Aro ahuwit jahaj hel, jahaj kiponhel, along-alongke jahaj karlu abang, jahaj adorop kapangsun hel, aro langpe along kijor-kihrep abang akaholo arjap mo,
aro anali bangpe yok kisek amihik theksi hangchirsi surulo, “Labang rongpe ateng akithe prek rongpe daklong do?”

Aro anali phuthak dhula warsi, surulo aro neng chipaduksi hangchirsi thano, “Ayoh, ayoh, pot rongpe puru kidojap parasi langpe long kido jahaj ahemphu hel hem chipamedet noh, labang rongpe konbak kaphere meme do? Piyok pu tene ghonta isi detsi bangpe chipangho phrotno.
O ethakpe, anali phuthak kido kangthir-arleng hel, kangthir-adun aro turkihel nengrong chipado! Piyok pu tene nali bangpe aphan Arnam nali bisar-ote pido.
La-aphel ihut ajakong kido atharlonpo isi arlong aghai ensi, langpe long tisi pulo, “Ladisi Babilon rongpe yok jakong pensi warchore, aphel aro jatsi pahlong dunde ye.

Aro geng-gong kithep, cheng-muri asi, pongsi aro pongka kibut asi nali sitem aro jatsi arju hlonghle ye; aro penebak bi-pun kijor-kihrep arleng nali sitem jatsi hlong dunde ye; aro phukuli kitok asi nali sitem jatsi arju hlonghle ye;

sati kilur katha-ang nali sitem jatsi chiturte ye, aro jorme-pachihap long osope-osopo asi nali sitem jatsi arju hlonghle ye; piyok pu tene nali kijor-kihrep arleng helsi pirthimipe dung ajakong kithe kido; piyok pu tene nali kangho bhiliki pen pirthimipe dung ahuwit ason arleng yok chobelo.
Aro turki hel, aro kangthir-arleng ango chengsi konbak arleng hel pirthimipe long marilo, la ahuwit awi labang rongpe alongsi pahlong damo.”
Labang aphel, ethakpe long rat arleng asi-akithe naksi arju hlongo, “Halleluya! kijoktang, apharan-kithe, aro kihal jakong, ili Arnam,

piyok pu tene anang ahuwit bisar khanang aro dhorom; piyok pu tene pot kangho kidonerpe anang kidoner parasi pirthimipe yok kapang ho, anang kidoner ongpe bisar otesi, bangpe arideng para anang murkiya hel awi kili Arnam honjat hel en noh.
Phong-ni ayok anali pu phakngo, “Halleluya, aro bangpe amihik mo-moyok angsong yok damdo.”
La-aphel la angkol isine bang phili kithe kiding abang aro jon-phili kihreng okpe recho anghol athak kangning Arnam yok chirdomsi thano, “Amen! Halleluya!”
Aro recho angholpo para aro isi asi wangsi thano, “O Arnam murkiya hel, O anang kaphere hel, nali oso-akithe ahuwit ili Arnam yok parklam!”
Lapara arat arleng asi badi, aro ako-ong langjar asi badi, aro suneng kangder asi badi labang asi akithe ne arju hlongo, “Halleluya! piyok pu tene ili jakong-dochot Hemphu Arnam kapangdom chideng do.
Wangot, ili aneng arong pen lunne, anang jortang pinang; piyok pu tene Bherabik Aso jorme-pachihap wang hlengo; aro anang Apiso pe ke abithang chihonjok ngo.
Aro kachi-ik yok, kang-ar klar-et ape aro kangthir kangduk ape apiso yok pilo; piyok pu tene la kangduk ape kangthir hel dhorom kangthir mat-mat.
Lapara tharlonpo neyok pulo, “Nang winot; Bherabik Aso jorme-pachihap anethu cho-jun ayok inghoyok taramdo, anali bor-eh do.” Anang neyok aro pulo, “Labang hel Arnam khanang alamthe.”

La-amun ne kachirdom ayok ne anang keng long kloloh. La-amun anang neyok pulo, “Chilangwen, labadi tiki yek; ne nang murkiya alokpo, aro Jisu hakhi pisi karjapthip nang kortehel aphan ta murkiya alok po; Arnamyok chirdom;” piyok pu tene Jisu ahakhi poke katurki ajiuli.
Lapara ne ethakpe owa kangpu thek hlongo; la-amun ijon nosel akilok chiklang ngo; anang thak karlu poyok kikrolpo aro khanangpo puman; anang dhorom pensi bisar aro ron chilare man.
Anang mek me-akar; anang phuthak phurkup ako-ong do. Aro anang isi amen wisi bido; labang amen anang parake kaita than un-eh.
Anang kachi-ik ape awi ajir haksi do; anangmen ke Arnam Alamthe pusi kipu.
Aro ethakpe sonturi hel kang-ar ape akilok aro kangthir-et kangduk ape chi-iksi, nosel akilok hel athak arlusi anang aphel-phel duno.
Anang ason helyok kaparem ayok, anang angho para ihong nokjir akire oleman; anang ingchin atokok pen lahel yok pangdom me; aro ajakong dochot Arnam akang pen asok ahor alang kisor anangsi dongman.
Aro anang pe-rik long, anang akeng-dham long, “Recho hel recho aro hemphuhel Hemphu,” ladi amen wisi kido.
Laparake ne arnipe athak karjap ding ihut tharlonpo thek hlong ngo; anang suneng long kangjar wohel yok asi akithe pen hangsi pulo,

“wangot, nali recho hel a-ok, thawang hel a-ok, jakong kido hel a-ok, nosel aro lalong karlu hel a-ok, kijok aro turu, akithe-akibek ahuwit arleng hel a-ok kicho yok, Arnam cho-jun akithe long wang chingrum mot.”
La-aphel la nosel athak karlupo aro anang sonturipen dhawa ayok, labang okpe aro pirthimipe arecho hel anang sunturi helyok ta wang kachingrum thek hlongo.

La-amun okpe aro anang pen potsi asisik turkipo anang ango asombhik asin kapaklang, labang a-okpe asap ki-en hel yok aro nang agoya kachirdom abang yok kachobel; la bang hi-ni yok nep tango; aro gondhok pen kar si kido me-akar ajulong, kihreng kihrengsi tilo.
Aro kido aholke la nosel athak kangning arlengpo angho para ka-ole nokjir pensi marilo; aro ahuwit wohel anali a-ok hel chosi ingkrang ngo.
La-aphel labang jom athem asabi aro ijeng hirkuli arilong ki-en ihut tharlon yok ethakpe para wang kisun thek hlongo.
Anang labang phurulpo, lake aporong aphurul, anangsi si-ik aghai, aro samonpo, anangyok nepsi, hajar isi anengkan yok bamsi, labang jom athem polong wang tilo;
Aro la hajar isi anengkan chokche lengke, anangke ason helyok chobel un-eh ayok, lasi angho bamsi anang thak asap pilo, labang aphel bekso oweyok anangyok hlopok nange.

La-aphel ne angkhan recho anghol thek hlongo; labang athak inghosi iningo, analiyok bisar aphan ajakong kipi ne thekngo; aro Jisu yok hakhi kipi anat, aro Arnam alamthe anat ingho aphu kithu, aro inghosi labang okpe, lale agoya poyok chirdomde yongot, aro anali atahang long aro ari long anang asap en-eh yong; anali kihreng ajiu thek hlong ngo; anali hrengo, aro hajar isi anengkan yok Khristo pen chingdomo.
Labang hajar anengkan chokche lengke, kithi aphel kiri arleng hel hrenghre yongo. Labangsi ango kithi-kibur.

Inghone bak labang ango kiburpo chingchong dun, anang bor-eh do aro kangthir; lamehel aphuthak ke phong-ni kithi ke jat apharan ingjong; manta analike Arnam aro Khristo bor-bangthe chiplangsi, anangpen hajar isi anengkan pangdom meh.
Laparake la hajar anengkan chokngo tene, si-ik anang akrol para joksi,
pirthimipe atok phili long kido asonhelyok, lake langpe asangtel ateng alekha kichok Gog aro Magog, anali yok chobelsi, dhawa yok kapangrum yok, olesi wange.
Anali pirthimipe chingtang detsi dame, kangthir arleng hel kido athem aro nengsam kido arong apumpak komwolo. Lalong ethakpe para me wang jangsi, analiyok sek detno.
Aro analiyok kachobel asi-ik poyok, me aro gondhok ajulong tilo; lalong la okpe aro turki asisik helta do; aro lahel anelo-anuwe mo-moyok aduk-cho hlonge.
Lapara ipak akithe akilok recho anghol, aro labang athak iningsi kido poyok thek hlongo; anang amahang para pirthepe pen sunengpe katno; lamehel aphan athem aro hlonghle yongo.

Labang recho anghol angot akithe-akibek ahuwit kithihel arjap dingsi kido thek hlongo; la-aphel angkhan lo hel puro; aro ajiu-alo amen prek ipak alo ta puro; aro la alo hel along kiwi atengke, kithihel abithang katiki ateng bisar tango.
La-amun langpepe long kido kithi helyok champi loh; kithi aro jom long kido kithi helyok champi detno; la-amun ahuwit abithang sal-katiki ateng bisar tango.
La-aphel kithi aro jom abangyok me-aten long tilo. Labangsi, lake me-aten longsi phong-ni kithipo.
Aro ajiu-alo long ingho amen amenpo kiwi hlonghle yongo, anangyok la me-akar ajulong waro.
La-aphel ne akimi sunengpe aro akimi pirthimipe thek hlongo; piyok pu tene ango suneng pe aro ango pirthimipe dam tango; langpe ta ingjongo.
Aro osopo aphan pe-rik kapa-ikwet osope badi, kachihonjok kangthir rongpe akimi Jerusalem poyok, Arnam adung para, lake ethakpe para wang kisun thek hlongo.

La-aphel ne la recho anghol para la asi pathesi kipu alamthe arjulo, “Langot, munusi hel pen Arnam do, aro analipen anang doye; anangsi anali Arnam chiplange, aro Arnam abithang analipen dosi anali Arnam chiplange;
aro anali mek para amek-kri wendet bo; lalong kithi aro webo; aneng aduk, lale kasuru, lale aneng abi aro dode ye; ango hel damo.”
La-aphel recho anghol athak kangningpo pulo, “Langot, ne ahuwit apot hel akimi ingholman.” Anang aro neyok pulo, “Winot, piyok pu tene lamehel alam khanang aro krol nange.”
La-aphel anang neyok pulo, “Tiki tango! Nelo Alpha aro Omega, kicheng aro kijutpo. Kalang-ik poyok ne Jiuli-alang kiboi arlok alang para ador-wesi nangpiye.
Inghosi halman, anang ne para kihal kihlong aden doye; ne anang Arnam chiplange, aro anang ne sopo chiplange.

Manta inghosi kaphere, kikrolkre, simemehel, arleng kamari hel, kangho kidoner hel, bhiliki katiki hel, agoya kachirdom hel, aro ahuwit kachobel hel, me aro pholo karsi kido me-thengdang long abithang abhag hlonge, bangposi phong-ni kithipo.”
