Laparake ki-or amun thorok-isi kiso awur kiplengklak thorok-isi bati ki-en thorok-isi tharlon hel para ihut wangsi, nepen lam chithansi pulo, “Wangot, ne nangyok labang osope, lake Bherabik Aso apiso yok paklang bang.”
La-amun anang neyok Jiuli long isi akithe aro kartul inglong yok ponsi, Arnam adung para, lake ethakpe para wang kisun, Arnam apharan kido la kangthir Jerusalem arongpe neyok paklango.
Bangpe ajortang ser-lek arni kiklar arlong; aro lake ador-ong arlong kathi-ing kringsi kido badi;
bangpe kartul aro akithe arpongpo, aro kere-hini owa long bang kere hi-ni tharlon do, aro angkhan amen kiwi wen do; lamehel Israyel along kere hi-ni asohel kere hi-ni ajat amendo;
bangpe kithom owa neneng aga, kithom owa ni-tang aga, kithom owa ni-tu aga, kithom owa ni-chel aga.
Aro rongpe arpongpo kere-hini abhiti do; lalong Bherabik Aso bang kere-hini kanghthir-adun hel amen kiwi do.
Aro la rongpe aro labang owahel aro labang arpong kipunyok, nepen lam kachithan po ari long ser ingchin ahong kido.

Labang rongpe atok-phili, anang ajonpen awarpo ke isi ateng. La-aphel anang ingchin ahongpen rongpe poyok puno apot, labangpo phoro kere-phongo amayel hlongo; akiding aro awar, aro kartulpo ta isi apun kido.
La-aphel arpongpo puno apot, arleng, lake tharlonpo ingchin ahongpo pen ingruk angkol thorok isine ingruk phili chokngo.
Aro arpongpo kapachirhap arni kiklar arlong badi, aro rongpe serpen, aro kathi-ing aina badi.

Rongpepe arpong bhiti hel ahuwit ajat-ajat ador-ong arlong pensi kikem, ango poke arni aklar aki-et arlong, hi-ni poke akilir arong arlong, kithom poke chilok put arohon arlong, phili poke honchepan arong arlong,

phongo poke longhreng arohon arlong, thorok po ke ajatjat amir arlong badi, thorok-isi poke et-jo ajatjat arohon arlong, narkep poke kabongtolok phro thengpe athe badi, sirkep poke ajatjat arlong anglur kido arlong, kep poke thengpe-thengso arong, kere-isi poke honchepan arlong arong, kere-hini poke akilir amir arong.
Isi isi monik pensi ipak-ipak owa; ladisi kere-hini monik pensi kere-hini owa; aro rongpe aduwarpo ke ser khanang, aina akang-ar badi do.
La arlo ne jatsi Arnam ahem thek hlonghle yongot; piyok pu tene jakong-kithechot Hemphu Arnam aro Bherabik Aso si Arnam ahempo.
Labang arongpe yok patha-angyok, arni lale chiklo katha-ang nangne; piyok pu tene Arnam jortangposi patha-angman, aro Bherabik Aso si bangpo melur mat-mat.
Aro asonhel la katha-ang long kengkam chijore; aro pirthimipe arecho hel anali jortang chiwane,
anang owa ten anelo ke jatsi inghap-he ye; aro piyok pu tene lalong ke nuwewe ye;
aro asonhel ajakong aro aman chiwane.
Aro pene bak akisim abihini, lale simeme asal katiki aro asisik alam kipu kaita labang arlo jatsi lut un-eh ye; inghosi amen la Bherabik Aso ajiu-alo long kiwi-wen doye, analisi lut hlonge.
La-aphel Arnam aro Bherabik Aso la recho angholpo para boisi kiwang, chithi-ing kringsi klarjo ajiuli-alang alangjon ne paklango;

la tharlonpo kidam aduwar asitem neyok ne paklango; la alangjon lili aga ajiuli kihreng athengpe kido; la athengpepe mung kere-hini ajat athe wangman, nengkan jon-jan athe wangman, anang achikloten athe wangman, aro anang arwohel hel ke, ason hel pameman.
Aro kaita hao aro weye. Manta la asitem Arnam aro Bherabik Aso recho anghol doye;
aro anang murkiya hel anang yok chirdom me, aro anang mahang chithek hlonge; aro anali atahang long anang men kiwiwen do ye.
Anuwe ta aro weye; aro melur katha-ang lale arni katha-ang anali nangne lo; piyok pu tene Hemphu Arnam thechotpo analiyok katha-ang piye; aro anali mo-moyok pangdom me.

Lapara anang neyok tharlonpo neyok pulo, “Lamehel alamthe khanang aro krol nange; bekso owe aphel potsi chiplange, la ahuwit turki hel ajiuli kipi Hemphu Arnam kithechotpo, anang murkiya helyok paklangyok, anang tharlon poyok wangtol lo.
Aro, “Langot, ne wang dapsi do.” Inghosi labang lo along katurki alamthe hel mengman, anangsi bor-eh do.
Ne Johon po lamehel alam arju hlongo, aro thek hlongo. Karju aro kithe hlong aphel, ingho tharlonsi labang ahuwit neyok paklango, anangyok kachirdom ayok anang akeng ari-otsi chirdom mo.

La-amun anang neyok pulo, “Chilangwen, nali ladi tiki yek! Ne nang murkiya alokjor po, aro nang korte turkihel aro labang alo long kiwi alamthe kimeng abang yok murkiya alokjor po; Arnam yokdet chirdom!”
Anang nethan phaksi pulo, “Labang alo long katurki alamhel asap pisi harlu klak ke biyek; piyok pu tene aporpo adung hetno. Ingho ka-ongnai po, anang aro ongnai tikisi pado sonang;
ingho ado-katikipe, anang aro kangho patiki sonang; dhorom kangthirpo, anang aro dhorom keng-kam pachijor sonang; inghosi kangthir, anang kangthirsi pado nang.”
“Langot, ne wangdapsi do; ingho potsi asal tiki, anangyok ladi angban kipiyok, ne kipi nange banta nepensi do.
Nesi Alpha aro Omega, ango aro aphel, kicheng aro kijut.
Inghosi ajiuli thengpe arongpe kihlonge-aden do, aro owapensi rongpe long kilutyok abithang pe-rik chipangthir man, anali bor-eh do.
Manta hik hel, bhiliki hel, kangho kidoner hel, arleng kamari hel, agoya kachirdom hel, aro asisik alam kime kihlong hel, aro bangpo kachokem abangten arleng mokol doman.
Ne Jisu, kachikruk hel aphan nali lamehel alam hakhi kipiyok, ne tharlonpo yok tol lo. Ne Dabhit po ahem aro agijing, tudap tha-angklirnak klolangso katha-angpo.”
Ajiuli aro so-arlope thando, “Wang ngot;” aro ingho oneh, anang yokta kipuyok than do, “Wangot;” ingho lang-ik do, anang wangot; ingho aneng do, anang ador wesi ajiuli-alang enot.
Labang alo long turki alamthe hel karju abangten yok ne labang hakhi pisi thando, inghone bak labang alamthe hel along penebak pa-ong, tene labang lo along kiwi awur helta Arnam labang poyok pa-onge;
aro inghone bak la turki alo long alamthe hel para penebak terek, tene labang alo long kiwi ajiuli-arongpe, aro kangthir rongpe para Arnam anang abhakpo pon detne.
Inghosi labang alam hakhi pido, anangsi thando, “Aserengsi, ne wang dapsi do.” Amen. O Hemphu Jisu, wangot.
Hemphu Jisu kajinso kangthir hel pen pado nang. Amen.
